column2: Ogu lukwalo ngekwe ludzi gwa Jesu Kirisiti* nkololo wa Dafite, Dafite iye ali nkololo wa Abhurahama:
Abhurahama wakazwala Isaki, Isaki kazwala Jakubo, Jakubo kazwala Juda ne banung'una babe.
Juda kazwala Perezi na Zera, mme babo bali Tama, Perezi kazwala Hezironi, Hezironi kazwala Aramu.
Aramu kazwala Aminadabhu, Aminadabhu kazwala Nashoni, Nashoni kazwala Salimoni.
Salimoni kazwala Bhoazi mmeyabe bali Rahabu, Bhoazi kazwala Obhedi mmeyabe bali Ruti; Obhedi kazwala Jesi.
Jesi kazwala Dafite She.
Dafite ne nkadzi wa Uriya bakazwala Solomoni.
Solomoni kazwala Rehobhoamu, Rehobhoamu kazwala Abhija, Abhija kazwala Asafi.
Asafi kazwala Josafati, Josafati kazwala Joramu, Joramu kazwala Uziya,
Uziya kazwala Jotamu, Jotamu kazwala Ahazi, Ahazi kazwala Hezekiya.
Hezekiya kazwala Manase, Manase kazwala Amoni, Amoni kazwala Josiya,
Josiya kazwala Jekoniya ne banung'una babe be tjilume nge tjibaka tje kutapigwa ku Bhabhiloni.
Shule kwe kutapigwa ku Bhabhiloni, Jekoniya kazwala Sheyalitiyele, Sheyalitiyele kazwala Zerubhabheli.
Zerubhabheli kazwala Abhiudi, Abhiudi kazwala Eliyakimu, Eliyakimu kazwala Azori.
Azori kazwala Zadoki, Zadoki kazwala Akimu, Akimu kazwala Eliudi.
Eliudi kazwala Eleaza, Eleaza kazwala Matani, Matani kazwala Jakubo.
Jakubo kazwala Josefa nlume wa Mariya iye kazwala Jesu unoyi Mesiya.

Ndizo kwakabe ne zwizekugwana zwili gumi lina zwinna kudwa kuna Abhurahama kunoti kuna Dafite ne zwizekugwana zwili gumi lina zwinna kudwa muna Dafite kunoti mutjibaka tjekutapigwa ku Bhabhiloni ne zwizekugwana zwili gumi lina zwinna kudwa mu kutapigwa ku Bhabhiloni kunoti tjibaka tjakazwagwa Mesiya.
Kuzwagwa kwa Jesu Kirisiti kwakazha sahwoku: Mmeyabe Mariya bakabe bakabigilidzigwa kulobogwa ndi Josefa, ngono bakati basathu bakawalilana Mariya kaboneka atjizwisenga nge Meya yakayengemala.
Josefa nlume uwe wakabe ali nthu wakalulwama kakale asingashake kumbhatisa shoni, ngono kakumbula kunlamba nge zila yakasumbikala.
Koga kwakati atjakumbula ikoku, ntumwa* wa She kaboneka kunli mu hwope eti, “Josefa nkololo wa Dafite, usitje kukotosa Mariya nkadzi uwo, ngobe tjaakazwisenga nge tje Meya yakayengemala.
Unowowana mwana we tjilisana, ngono unowontumila zina uti Jesu, ngobe unowotjidza bathu babe mu matjinyo abo.”
Kose ikoku kwakashingikala kuti matama a She akalebgwa nge nlebesambeli asiwile pasi. Nlebesambeli wakabe aleba eti,
“Mmwanadi
Ndizo Josefa kati emuka mu hwope kashinga tjaabudziwa nge ntumwa wa She ngono kakotosa nkadzi uwe.
Koga kasiwalilane naye kudzina atshibama mwana we tjilisana, ngono kantumila zina eti Jesu.
Kwakati Jesu asinobe azwagwa mu nzi we Bhetelehema we Judiya, mu tjibaka tje mbuso wa Herode she nkulu, kukazha balume bakatjenjela ku Jerusalema bedwa ku bhezhuba, ngono bakabhuzwa bakati,
“Ungayi She nkulu we Bajuta wazwagwa kene? Tabona nyenyedzi iye ku bhezhuba ngono tawonnamata.”
Ngono kwakati she nkulu Herode ne bunji gwe bathu mu Jerusalema, behwa ikoku bakadziyidzika kwazo.
Herode wakakubunganya Bapirisiti bakulu bose ne badiyi be nlayo* ngono kababhuzwa kuti Mesiya unowozwaligwa ngayi.
Bakashandula beti, “Mu nzi we Bhetelehema mu ntuthu we Judiya, ngobe ikoku ndiko kwakakwagwa nge nlebesambeli eti,
‘Koga iwe nzi we Bhetelehema, mu ntuthu we Juda,
aute uli ntukununu tjose mu balauli be Juda,
ngobe mukuli kowobhuda nlauli
unowolisa bathu bangu Baiziraela.’ ”
Ipapo Herode kadana balume ibabo bakatjenjela nge kwakasumbikala, kuti awane malebeswa mubali ekuti nyenyedzi yakaboneka tjibaka tjipi.
Ndizo Herode kabatumila ku Bhetelehema eti, “Yendani munoshaka mwana iwoyo nge njele. Muti ha mambona, mundizibise kuti namibo ndiyende ndinonnamata.”
Bakati basinohwa tjalebgwa ndi She nkulu, bakayenda, ngono bakabona nyenyedzi yabakabe babona ku bhezhuba, ikabatungamila kudzina ima pezhugwi kwe pakabe mwana alipo.
Bakati bebona nyenyedzi bakashatha kwazo kwazo,

ngono bakati bengina mu ng'umba bakabona mwana na mmeyabe Mariya, bakazwiyisa pasi bakan'namata. Kudwapo bakadusa fumwa yabo bakampa zwipo zwe golide ne nti we motsha unonuhwa zwinozipa ne nti we mira.*
Ngono balume ibabo se bakabe batjenjedziwa mu hwope kuti basibgwilile kuna Herode, bakabgwilila ku shango yabo nge zila ipoga.

Bakati bayenda, ntumwa* wa She kaboneka kuna Josefa mu hwope eti, “Muka, tola mwana na mmeyabe utizhile ku Egipiti. Ugale ikoko kudzina ndikubudza kuti utini, ngobe Herode wabe pejo ngoshaka mwana kuti ambulaye.”
Ndizo kamuka, katola mwana na mmeyabe busiku kayenda ku Egipiti,
kwaakagala kuswikila Herode efa. Oku kwakashingikala kuti ndizo kusiwile pasi matama a She akalebgwa nge nlebesambeli eti, “Ndakadanila Nkololo wangu kuzhe kwe Egipiti.”

Herode kati ebona kuti balume bakatjenjela bantjenjelela, kangina bushongola kwazo, ngono kadusa ndaulo kuti bana bose be tjilisana mu Bhetelehema ne ntuthu wose bana makole mabili ne kuyenda pasi babulawe. Makole iyawa Herode wakabe ealebela pezhugwi kwe tjakabe tjalebgwa nge balume bakatjenjela.
Ipapo matama akalebgwa nge nlebesambeli Jeremiya kasiwile pasi, Jeremiya wakabe ati,
“Hwi lakahwika mu nzi we Rama
kumimila ne kulila kukulu kulu
Rahele elilila ngawana dzidze
elamba nyaladziwa, ngobe dzafa.”
Herode kati asinofa, ntumwa we kudzimu kaboneka mu hwope kuna Josefa ali ku Egipiti, eti,
“Milika utole mwana na mmeyabe uyende ku shango ye Iziraela, ngobe ibabo bakabe beshaka kupedza butjilo gugwe bakafa.”
Ndizo kamilika katola mwana na mmeyabe kayenda ku shango ye Iziraela.
Ngono Josefa kati ehwa kuti Akelaosi wagala tate babe Herode thaka, unobusa mu Judiya katja kuyendako. Ndizo kati atjenjedziwa mu hwope kashandukila ku ntuthu we Galili.
Wakayenda kanogala mu nzi we Nazareta, kuti ndizo kusiwile pasi matama akalebgwa nge balebesambeli* beti, “Unowodang'wa Nnazareta.*”
Mu mazhuba iyawo kukazha Johani we N'dubiki, esumikila mu tjilambanyika tje Judiya
eti, “Shandukilani matjinyo enyu ngobe bushe gwe kudzimu gwasedzela.”
Oyu ndiye wakalebgwa nge kukwe ndi Isaya nlebesambeli eti,
“Hwi le unodanilila mu tjilambanyika eti,
‘Lulwamisani zila ya She,
tambunudzani zijana dzidze.’ ”
Johani wakabe eambala zwiambalo zwakathamiwa nge bukuse gwe kamela ne mmwandabula we ganda mu thunji dzidze, ngono zojiwa zwizwe zwakabe zwili phashu ne butji gwe nyutji.
Bunji gwe bathu be Jerusalema ne Judiya ne be ntuthu we Jorodani, gukayenda kunli,
bakazwileba zwibi zwabo, ngono kabadubika mu gwizi gwe Jorodani.
Koga kati ebona Bafarasi* banjinjbezha kuwodubikiwa, kati kubali, “Bana be nyoka ndimwi! Ndiani wamutjenjedza kuti mutizhe bushongola gunozha kene?
Shingani mishingo inolakidza kuti makashandukila matjinyo enyu.
Ngono musitongo kumbula kuti mungazwidwa muti, ‘Iswi ti bana ba Abhurahama.’ Ndomudwa nditi, Ndzimu unotubula kuthamila Abhurahama bana nge mabgwe iyawa.
Nangwenu wali shathu lakabigwa kale pa midzi ye miti, ndizo nti mmwe ne mmwe usingazwale zwizwalo zwakalulwama unowotemiwa ukalashigwa mu moto.

Imi ndomudubika mu vula ili tjilakidzo tjekushandukila matjinyo enyu. Koga unozha shule kwangu una masimba kundipinda, iye wandisakalizana kusenga khwebana dzidze. Iye unowomudubika mu Meya yakayengemala nenge mu moto.
Luselo
Ipapo Jesu kazha edwa ku Galili, kayenda ku Jorodani kuna Johani kunodubikiwa ndiye.
Koga Johani kagwisa kulamba, eti, “Ndakafanila kudubikiwa ndiwe, apa unozha kundili kene?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Letja kube sa ikoko ngwenu, ngobe kwakafanila kuti kushingikadziwe ndulamo yose.” Ipapo Johani kaduma.
Jesu kati adubikwa kabhuda mu vula tjinyolotjo. Ipapo kudzimu kukazhuka ngono kabona Meya ye Ndzimu ideluka se njiba ngono ikagala pezhugwi kukwe.
Ngono hwi likadwa kudzimu liti, “Oyu ndiye Nkololo wangu wandinoda, unondishathisa kwazo.”
Ipapo Meya ikayisa Jesu ku tjilambanyika kulikwa ndi Nvanganyi.
Wakazwinyima zojiwa mazhuba ali makumi manna ne masiku ali makumi manna, ngono shule kabe ne zhala.
Nliki kazha kunli kati, “Ha uli Nkololo we Ndzimu idwa mabgwe iyawa abe zwiwunga.”
Jesu kanshandula kati, “Kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Nthu aangatjile nge tjiwunga koga, koga nge dama limwe ne limwe linodwa mu nlomo we Ndzimu!’ ”
Ipapo Nvanganyi kantola kan'yisa ku Jerusalema, nzi nkulu wakayengemala, kammisa pa tjilungwane tje Ng'umba ye Ndzimu*
ngono kati kunli, “Ha uli Nkololo we Ndzimu, uzwiposele pasi, ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi,
‘Unowodwa batumwa bawo be kudzimu nge kuko.
Ngono banowokugama,
kuti usilobe gumbo lilo mu bgwe.’ ”
Jesu kanshandula kati, “Kwakakwagwabo kuyi ‘Usilike She Ndzimu uwo.’ ”
Kakale Nvanganyi kantola kantathisa dombo lefu lefu kwazo kanlakidza mibuso yose ye shango ne bubuya gwayo.
Ngono Nvanganyi kati kunli, “Kose ikoku ndowokupa ha ungawila pasi ukandinamata.”
Jesu kati kunli, “Idwa pandili Satani, ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Namata She Ndzimu uwo ushingile iye ega!’ ”
Ipapo Nvanganyi kansiya, ngono batumwa be kudzimu bakazha bakambhatsha.
Jesu wakati ehwa kuti Johani wasungwa, kabhuda mu ntuthu we Jorodani kayenda ku Galili.
Ngono wakati ebhuda mu Nazareta kayenda kanogala ku Kapenaume pejo ne gungwa mu ntuthu we Zebhuloni ne Nafutali
kuti kusiwile pasi matama akalebgwa ndi Isaya nlebesambeli eti,
“Shango ye Zebhuloni ne shango ye Nafutali,
kuyendila ku gungwa, seli kwe Jorodani,
Galili we Bezwitjaba*!
Bathu bakabe begala mu zhalima
bakabona tjedza tjikulu.
Ibaba bakabe begala mu ntuthu
we zhalima le lufu,
tjedza tjabepo.”
Kudwa mu tjibaka itjetjo Jesu katangisa kusumikila eti, “Shandukilani matjinyo enyu, ngobe bushe gwe kudzimu gwasedzela.”
Jesu kati eyenda akasupha nge gungwa gwe Galili, kabona bana be nthu babili, Simoni unoyi Pita na Enduru nnung'una uwe belashila gwanga mu gungwa, ngobe bakabe bali babhati be hwobe.
Jesu kati kubali, “Munditobele ngono ndowomuthama babhati be bathu.”
Tjinyolotjo bakasiya njanga dzabo bakantobela.
Kati, eyendila mbeli kudwa ipapo, kabona bamwe bana be nthu babili, Jakubo nkololo wa Zebhedi na Johani nnung'una uwe, bali mu n'goro bana tate babo Zebhedi beluka njanga dzabo ngono kabadana.
Tjinyolotjo bakasiya n'goro na tate babo bakantobela.
Jesu kayenda ntuthu wose we Galili ediya mu ng'umba dzabo dze mitembezelo esumikila ndebo mbuya ye bushe kakale epodza njigwele ne buworoworo gumwe ne gumwe pakati kwe bathu.

Tjilumbi tjitje tjakahwika Siriya yose, ngono bathu bakazhisa kunli bose banogwala njigwele dzakasiyana siyana ne zwibhayo ne bakasungwa nge meya mibi ne bana zwifafa ne bakalobgwa nge gulukadzi, ngono kabapodza.
Mibunga mikulu yakantobela idwa ku Galili ne ku Dekapoli ne ku Jerusalema ne ku Judiya ne ntuthu useli kwe Jorodani.
Jesu wakati ebona mibunga ye bathu katatha dombo kagala pasi. Badiyiwa* babe bakazha kunli,
ngono katangisa kubadiya sahwoku:
“Bakakombolegwa bashayi mu meya,
ngobe bushe gwe kudzimu nge gwabo.
Bakakombolegwa banolila,
ngobe banowonyaladziwa.
Bakakombolegwa bana mimoyo minyolo,
ngobe banowothuwa shango.
Bakakombolegwa bana zhala ne nyota ye ndulamo,*
ngobe Ndzimu unowobagutsha.
Bakakombolegwa bana ngoni,
ngobe banowohwigwa ngoni.
Bakakombolegwa bana mimoyo mitjena,
ngobe banowobona Ndzimu.
Bakakombolegwa bagadzanyi,
ngobe banowodang'wa bana be Ndzimu.
Bakakombolegwa banodziyidzigwa ndulamo,
ngobe bushe gwe kudzimu nge gwabo.
“Makakombolegwa imwi ha bathu bemutuka kakale bemudziyidza kakale bemulebela bubi gose gwe manyepkhwa nge kwangu,
shathani mu pululudze, ngobe mbhayilo wenyu nkulu u kudzimu, ngobe banomudziyidza sekwa bakadziyidza balebesambeli* bakazha mbeli kwenyu.
“Ndimwi munyu we shango, koga ha munyu washuluka, ungabgwilizigwa njo wawo tjini wali? Ha utjina tjawakalulwamila ha kusi kulashigwa kuzhe koga kuti utshambiwe nge bathu.
“Ndimwi tjedza tje shango. Nzi nkulu wakabakwa pezhugwi kwe dombo aungasumbikike.
Bathu naibo abangavoneke bakabe betshibikila lovone nge itundu. Banogubiga patjena gukavonekela mmwe ne mmwe umu ng'umba.
Ndizoke tjedza tjenyu ngatjipenye sa ikoko mbeli kwe bathu kuti ndizo babone mishingo yenyu mibuya bakudze Tate benyu ba kudzimu.
“Musikumbule kuti ndakazha kuwokolomodza nlayo kene matama e balebesambeli, andizozha kuwozwikolomodza koga ndakazhila kuti matama iyawo ashingikale.
Ndolebesa nditi, kudzina kupinda kudzimu ne shango, akuna na iyo shanga tukununu padzili dzose, kene bala dukununu lakakwagwa mu nlayo linowobhuda kudzina kose kushingikala.

Iye unotjuluka mmwe ntukununu we milayo iyeyi kadiya bathu kuti bathamebo sa ikoko unowodang'wa ntukunu tjose mu bushe gwe kudzimu, koga iye unowothama kakale kadiya milayo iyeyi unowodang'wa nkulu mu bushe gwe kudzimu.
Ndomudwa tjose nditi, ha kululwama kwenyu kusingapinde kwe Bafarasi* ne badiyi be nlayo,* nge malebeswa amungangine mu bushe gwe kudzimu.
“Makahwa kuti kwakadwiwa bathu ba ntolo kuyi, ‘Usibulaye, ngono iye unobulaya unowosumikilisiwa.’
Koga ndomubudza kuti iye wagwadzilamoyo ikamu* tjitje unowosumikilisiwa. Kakale iye unotuka ikamu tjitje unowodabidzana ne Gulukota, na iye unoti ‘Tjilengwe ndiwe,’ wakalingisana ne moto usingadzime.
Ndizo, ha udusa tjipo* tjitjo tjinopisiwa pa tjibeso ukakumbula kuti ikamu tjitjo tjong'ong'ola nge kuko,
siya tjipo itjetjo mbeli kwe tjibeso, uyende. Tje kutanga gadzana ne ikamu tjitjo, ndizo ukoshanduka uwopa tjipo tjitjo.

“Tjimbidza ugadzane ne una nlandu nawe, mutji mu zila muyenda ku nlayo kuti ndizo iwoyo wakutilika nlandu asidwe ekuyisa ku nsumikilisi, ngono nsumikilisi ekokuyisa ku nlindi, ukoyisiwa ku ng'umba ye busungwa,
ndokubudza malebeswa nditi, autowobhuda mukati kudzina ulipa nge mari e bupelo.
“Makahwa kuti kukayi, ‘Musiyite bupombgwe.’
Koga ndomudwa nditi, iye unolinga nkadzi nge kun'yemula wayita bupombgwe kale naye mu moyo uwe.
Ha zhisho lilo le luji* likuthama kuti uyite jinyo ulikonyombole ulilashe. Koyita, kuti ulashikigwe nge ndungululo ye mbili uwo ing'ompela pana kuti mbili uwo wose ulashigwe mu moto usingadzimike.
Ne luboko gugo gwe luji ha gukuthama kuti uyite jinyo uguthubule ugulashe. Koyita, kuti ulashikigwe nge ndungululo ye mbili uwo ing'ompela pana kuti mbili uwo wose uyende ku moto usingadzimike.
“Kakale kwakayi, ‘Iye unolamba nkadzi uwe ngaampe lukwalo gwe kunlamba.’
Koga ndomudwa nditi, iye unolamba nkadzi uwe kuzhe kwe nlandu we bupombgwe, unonthama kuti abe phombgwe, koga iye unolobola nkadzi wakalambiwa unothama bupombgwe.
“Kakale makahwa kuti kwakayi ku bathu ba ntolo, ‘Usitune manyepkhwa, koga wakafanila shingila She tjawatuna nge kwatjo.’
Koga ndomudwa nditi, musigale matuna, kene nge kudzimu, ngobe tjigalo tje bushe gwe Ndzimu,
kene nge shango, ngobe tjigalo tje makumbo e Ndzimu, kene nge Jerusalema, ngobe nzi* nkulu wa She nkulu.
Usitune nge nsholo uwo, ngobe aungashandule vudzi likabe jena kene likabe dema.
Tjaunoleba ngatjibe ‘Ee’ kene ‘Aa,’ koga ngobe tjimwe ne tjimwe tjinopaphiwa pezhugwi kwa ikoku tjodwa mu bubi.
“Makahwa kuyi, ‘Zhisho ngalilipiwe nge zhisho kakale zhino nge zhino.’
Koga ndomudwa nditi, musinyanyayidzane ne nthu mbi. Ha nthu ekuloba mu lushaya gwe luji, umpe gumwe lushaya.
Ngono ha mmwe ekusekesa ekulipisa ekutolela hempe iyo, unletje atole kose ne baki tjitjo.
Kakale ha mmwe ekukombeledza kuyenda khilomitha ing'ompela, yenda naye khilomitha mbili.
Unokukumbila umpe, kakale usinyime unoadzima mukuli.
“Makahwa kuyi, ‘Ida wawakabakidzana naye, ngono ushime tjita tjitjo!’
Koga ndomudwa nditi, idani zwita zwenyu kakale mutembezelele banomudziyidza,
kuti ndizo mube bana ba Tate benyu ba kudzimu banobhudisila zhuba babi ne balulwami, bakanisila vula balulwami ne basi balulwami.
Ha muda banomuda mowowana mbhayilo weni? Apa bakhethisi abatothama sa ikoko kene?
Kakale ha mudumilisa zwikamu zwenyu zoga mopinda bamwe ngeni kene? Apa bathu basibagalimoyo abatokuyitabo ikoku kene?
Ibeni balulwami bakapelela sa Tate benyu be kudzimu bakalulwama kwakapelela.
“Yelani njele kuti musiyite zwiyito zwe ndulamo mbeli kwe bathu muyita mashungwa ndibong'we. Ha muyita ikoku amutowobe ne mbhayilo unodwa kuna Tate benyu ba kudzimu.

“Ndizo ha upa bashayi, usizibise nge kulidza lunyanga se kunoyita batjengedzi mu ng'umba* dze mitembezelo ne mu zila kuti balumbidziwe nge bathu. Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, bakauamutjila mbhayilo wabo kale.
Ha upa bashayi usiyite kuti luboko gugo gwe lumeshwe guzibe tjinoshingwa nge luboko gugo gwe luji,
kuyita kuti kupa kuko bashayi kube kwakasumbikala. Ipapo Tate babo ibo banobona zwakasumbikika, banowokupa mbhayilo.

“Ha mutembezela, musifanane ne batjengedzi, ngobe banoda kutembezela bali mile mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo ne mu mashanganilo e zila kuti babong'we nge bathu. Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, baamutjila mbhayilo wabo.
Koga ha utembezela, ngina mu ng'umba iyo uzhalile nkoba utembezele kuna Tate babo basingaboneke. Ipapo Tate babo banobona pakasumbikika, banowokupa mbhayilo.
“Kakale ha mutembezela musilombolodze matama asina nshingo se bathu basibagalimoyo, ngobe banokumbula kuti banowohwika nge matama manji.
Musifanane nabo, ngobe Tate benyu banoziba tjamunosheta musathu mukakumbila.
Tembezelani sahwoku,
‘Tate bedu ba kudzimu,
zina lenyu ngaliyengamadziwe.
Bushe gwenyu ngaguzhe
kuda kwenyu ngakuyitiwe mu shango
sekwa kunoyitiwa kudzimu.
Mutipeni nasi zojiwa zwedu zwe misi nge misi.
Mutizwiibhatigwe milandu yedu,
sekwa tinozwiibhatigwa banotithamila milandu.
Musitilonge mu kulikwa,
koga mutisunungule mu bubi.’
“Ngobe ha muzwiibhatigwa bathu milandu yabo, Tate benyu be kudzimu banowomuzwiibhatigwabo.
Koga ha musingazwiibhatigwe bathu milandu yabo, Tate benyu abatowomuzwiibhatigwa milandu yenyu.
“Ha muzwinyima zojiwa musifubale se batjengedzi banoshobesa njiso dzabo kuti kuzwinyima zojiwa kwabo kubong'we nge bathu. Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, baamutjila mbhayilo wabo kale.
Koga ha uzwinyima zojiwa, zhodza nsholo uwo mafuta ungule buso gugo,
kuti ndizo kuzwinyima zojiwa kuko kusibong'we nge bathu, koga kubong'we ndi Tate babo bakasumbikala, ndizo Tate babo banobona kwakasumbikala banowokupa mbhayilo.
“Musizwikubunganyile fumwa mu shango panotjinya sole ne bulala ne mbava padzinoti dzikapkhwanya dzikakwiba.
Koga muzwikubunganyile fumwa kudzimu pasingatjinye sole ne bulala ne mbava padzisinga pkhwanye dzikakwiba.
Ngobe ipapo pana fumwa iyo ndipo panowobe ne moyo uwo.
“Zhisho ndilo luvone gwe mbili. Ndizo ha zhisho lilo lipitsha, mbili uwo wose uzhele tjedza.
Koga ha zhisho lilo lisingapitshe, mbili uwo wose uzhele zhalima. Ha tjedza tjimukuli tjili zhalima, ligulu kungapani zhalima ilelo kene!
“Akuna iye ungashingila botetshi babili, ngobe ungabenga mmwe wabo kada mmwe, kene unowokudza mmwe kadeelela mmwe. Aungashingile Ndzimu kose ne fumwa.

“Ndizo ndomudwa nditi, musidziyidzike ngekwe butjilo gwenyu, ngekwe tjamunowoja kene tjamunowong'wa, kene ngekwe mibili yenyu kuti mowombalani. Apa butjilo agutopinda zojiwa kene ne mbili autopinda zwiambalo kene?
Bonani nyuni dzinowuluka, adzitolima kakale adzitovuna kene kuli kubiganya mu matula, koga Tate benyu be kudzimu banodzijisa dzose. Apa amutodzipinda kunjinji kwazo kene?
Ndiani wenyu ungati ngodziyidzika nge moyo kapaphidza kuli kutukununu bulefu gwe butjilo gugwe kene?
“Apa modziyidzikilani ngekwe zwiambalo? Bonani kuti maluba e shango anokula tjini. Aatoshinga kakale aatoluka.
Koga ndomubudza kuti na iye Solomoni mu bukulu gugwe gose aazobe akaambala se ling'ompela lawo.
Ikoko ha kuli iko Ndzimu sekwa unombadza maluba e shango iyawa ayapo nasi koga mangwana eposegwa mu tjibeso, apa autowomumbadza kupinda ikoku kwazo kene, imwi bathu be kugalamoyo kutukununu kene?
“Ndizo musidziyidzike muti, ‘Towojani kene towong'wani kene towombalani?’
Ngobe bathu basibagalimoyo banotizhilila zwithu izwezwi zose. Tate benyu ba kudzimu banoziba zose zwamunotjila ndizo.
Koga shakani bushe gwabo ne ndulamo yabo kutanga, ngono zwithu izwezwi zose mowozwipiwa na izobo.
Ndizo musidziyidzike ngekwa mangwana, ngobe mangwana kowozwidziyidzikila nge kwako. Limwe ne limwe zhuba lina tshiyilo yakalilizana.
“Musisumikilise, kuti ndizo musisumikilisiwe.
Ngobe nge zila yamunosumikilisa bamwe ndiyo, namwibo mowosumikilisiwa ndiyo, nge tjilizanyo tjamunolizanya nditjo mowolizanyigwabo nditjo.
Ini una hanya nge lubatsha gumu zhisho le ikamu tjitjo ngono ushayila hanya guni limu zhisho lilo kene?
Apa ungadwa ikamu tjitjo tjini uti, ‘Ima ndiduse lubatsha mu zhisho lilo,’ koga kuna guni muna lilo zhisho kene?
Ntjengedzi ndiwe! Kutanga dusa guni mu zhisho lilo, kudwapo ndiko kwaunowobona zubuyanana kudusa lubatsha mu zhisho le ikamu tjitjo.
“Musipe mbgwa tjakayengemala dzingadwa dzimushandukila dzimupalulanya. Musilashile ndalama dzenyu dzakanaka mbeli kwe hwotji, dzingadzikanyanga nge makumbo.
“Kumbilani mowopiwa, shakani mowowana, kokodzani mowozhuligwa.
Ngobe mmwe ne mmwe unokumbila unopiwa na iye unoshaka unowana, kakale na iye unokokodza, unowozhuligwa.
Ndiupi wenyu ungati mwana uwe ekumbila tjiwunga kampa bgwe kene?
Kene ungati ekumbila hwobe kampa nyoka kene?
Apa imwi nenguba muli babi muziba kupa bana benyu zwipo zwakanaka, kukulu seni kwa Tate benyu ba kudzimu kwabanowobapa zwipo zwakanaka ibo banobakumbila kene!
“Tjimwe ne tjimwe tjamunoyemula kuti bamwe bamuyitile itjo, mubayitile itjobo, ngobe oyu ndiwo nlayo ne balebesambeli.
“Nginani nge nkoba wakamanikana, ngobe nkoba wakashatha ne zila yakazhuka inoyenda ku golomodzo ngono banongina ndiwo banji.
Koga nkoba wakamanikana ne zila inolema inoyenda ku butjilo, ndizo banoiwana bashomanana.
“Tjenjelelani balebesambeli be manyepkhwa. Banozha kumuli bakaambala makukuta e pkhwizi, koga mukati bali phele dzina bushongola.
Mowobaziba nge zwizwalo zwabo. Apa zhambi dzotjegwa mu mihwa kene, kene makuyu mu zwishosho?
Sa ikoko nti mmwe ne mmwe wakalulwama unozwala zwizwalo zwakalulwama ne nti wakabipa unozwala mitjelo yakabipa.
Nti wakalulwama aungazwale mitjelo yakabipa, kakale nti wakabipa aungazwale zwizwalo zwibuya.
Nti mmwe ne mmwe usingazwale zwizwalo zwakalulwama unotemiwa ukalashigwa mu moto.
Ndizo mowobaziba nge zwizwalo zwabo.
“Ate mmwe ne mmwe unoti kundili, ‘She, She,’ unowongina mu bushe gwe kudzimu, koga kowongina iwoyo unothama kuda kwa Tate bangu ba kudzimu.
Muna ilelo zhuba, banji banowoti kundili ‘She, She, apa atizolebelambeli nge zina lenyu, tikadusa meya mibi nge zina lenyu, tikathama matjenamiso makulu nge zina lenyu kene?’
Ipapo ndowobadwa ati, ‘Andizotongo muziba. Idwani pandili bashingi be bubi ndimwi!’
“Ndizo mmwe ne mmwe unohwa matama angu iyawa kaalondolodza unofanana ne nlume wakatjenjela wakabaka ng'umba iye pezhugwi kwe bgwe.
Vula ikana, kukabe ne mikubila ne phepo dzikatutudza, koga ng'umba iyeyo ikasiwe, ngobe yakabe yakabakwa mu bgwe.
“Koga mmwe ne mmwe unohwa matama angu iyawa kasialondolodze unofanana ne nlume we tjilengwe wakabaka ng'umba mu nsetje.
Vula ikana njizi dzikazhala ne phepo dzikatutudza, ng'umba iyeyo ikawa tjose.”
Jesu kati apedza kuleba izwezwi zwithu, mibunga ye bathu ikakaabadziwa ngodiya kukwe,
ngobe wakatubula kudiya lebeswa, asingafanane ne badiyi babo be nlayo.
Jesu wakati edeluka mu dombo, mibunga mikulu ye bathu ikantobela.
Ngono kukazha mmwe nlume egwala mapele, kazha kathigama mbeli kukwe kati, “She, ha muda, mungandipodza.”
Jesu katambunudza luboko gugwe kankutha kati kunli, “Ndoda. Pola!” Tjinyolotjo kapola.
Ipapo Jesu kati kunli, “Ubone kuti akuna waunobudza ikoku. Koga yenda uzwilakidze ku mpirisiti, uduse tjipo tjakalebgwa ndi Mushe, ili ndakidzo mubali.”
Jesu wakati engina mu Kapenaume, nlauli we babhayani bali zana kazha kunli ekumbila
eti, “She, nlanda wangu ulele ku nzi aatokuyenda, unogwala kwazo.”
Jesu kati kunli, “Ndowozha awompodza.”
Nlauli we babhayani bali zana kadabila kati, “She andizolizanila kuti mungangina mu ng'umba yangu. Lebani dama koga, ngono nlanda wangu unowopola.
Ngobe ndi nthu upasi kwe nlayo, ndina babhayani pasi kwangu. Ndoti kuna hwoyu, ‘Yenda!’ kayenda, ati kuna hwouje, ‘Izha!’ kazha. Ndoti ku nlanda wangu, ‘Shinga hwoku!’ kakushinga.”
Jesu kati ehwa ikoku katjenama kwazo, ngono kati kuna bakabe bakantobela, “Ndolebesa tjose, andithu abona nthu ne nng'ompela mu Iziraela una bugalimoyo bukulu zwingapa.
Ndoti kumuli, banjinji banowozha bedwa ku bhezhuba neku golombedzo, ngono banowogala pa tafuli na Abhurahama na Isaki na Jakubo mu bushe gwe kudzimu.
Koga bana be bushe banowolashigwa kuzhe mu zhalima, ngono kowobe ne tjililo tjikulu kwazo ne kulobana kwe meno nge kuhwa zogwadza kwazo.”
Ipapo Jesu kati ku nlauli we babhayani, “Yenda! Ngakukushingikalile koga sekwa wagalamoyo kuti kowojalo.”
Ndizo nlanda uwe wakapola nge tjibaka itjetjo.
Jesu kati engina mu nzi wa Pita, kabona mmezwale ba Pita bali lele bakabhakhwa nge luzhazhamo.
Kabhata luboko gwabo, luzhazhamo gukabhuda mubali, bakamilika bakampa tjinojiwa.
Madekwana iyawo bathu bakazhisa kunli bathu banjinji bakabe bakabhakhwa nge meya mibi, ngono kadusa meya nge dama, kapodza bose banogwala.
Oku kwakathama kuti kushingikale matama akalebgwa nge nlebesambeli Isaya eti, “Wakatola buworoworo gwedu kasenga njigwele dzedu.”
Jesu kati ebona mbunga nkulu we bathu wakampoteleka, kabe eti kutjulukigwe seli kwe gungwa.
Ipapo N'diyi we nlayo kazha kunli kati, “N'diyi, ndowomutobela kumwe ne kumwe kwamunoyenda.”
Jesu kan'dabila kati, “Phungubgwe dzina madzete ne nyuni dzinowuluka dzina mashaka, koga iye Nkololo we Nthu aana paanobiga nsholo uwe.”
Mmwe kakale we badiyiwa babe kati kunli, “She mundiletje ndinobiganya tate bangu kutanga.”
Koga Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Unditobele, letja bafi babiganye bafi babo.”
Jesu kati engina mu n'goro, badiyiwa babe bakantobela.
Ipapo kukamuka dutu gulu mu gungwa, mapundu e vula kangina mu n'goro. Koga Jesu wakabe akaizela.
Badiyiwa bakammusa bakati, “She, mutitjidze tonyungila mu vula!”
Kabadabila kati, “Bathu be bugalimoyo butukununu ndimwi! Motjisiwa ngeni?” Ipapo kamilika katjemela phepo ne gungwa, ngono kukabe ne kunyalala kukulu.
Balume ibabo bakakaabala kwazo, bakati, “Nthu wakatini iwoyu unohwiligwa nge phepo nenge gungwa dumbu?”
Jesu wakati eswika seli mu ntuthu unoyi Gerasa, balume babili bakabhakhwa nge meya mibi bakanshanganidza bedwa ku zwikumbu. Bakabe bana bushongola kwakabe kusina ungapinda nge zila iyeyo.
Ngono bakamimila beti, “Unoshakani mutili kene Nkololo we Ndzimu? Apa wazha kuwotihwisa zogwadza tjibaka tjisathu tjikaswika kene?”
Hwotji njinji dzakabe dzifula thambgwana kudwa pabali.
Meya mbi ikakumbila Jesu iti, “Ha utidusa, utitatile mu hwotji idzedzi.”

Kati ku ili, “Yendani!” Ndizo ikabhuda ikanongina mu hwotji, ngono, danga lose le hwotji likapadzamuka likatizha nge phili yakakunguluka. Danga lose ilelo le hwotji likawila mu gungwa likafila mu vula.
Bathu bakabe bakalisa hwotji bakatizhila ku nzi, bakanoleba kose ne tjaka shingikalila balume bakabe bakabhakhwa nge meya mibi.
Ipapo nzi wose ukakulumuka kunoshanganidza Jesu. Bakati bembona bakankumbila kuti abhude mu ntuthu wabo.
Jesu wakangina mu n'goro kabgwilila seli ku nzi wa kanyi kwabo.

Ngono bathu bakazhisa nlume kunli wakalobgwa nge gulukadzi akasengwa nge thobo. Jesu kati ebona kugalamoyo kwabo, kati kuna wakalobgwa nge gulukadzi, “Simamoyo, nkololo wangu, ndakuzwiibhatigwa matjinyo awo.”
Ipapo bamwe be badiyi be nlayo bakati behwa ikoku bakalebesana beti, “Nlume iwoyu unotuka Ndzimu!”
Nge kuziba mikumbulo yabo, Jesu kati kubali, “Ini mukumbula mikumbulo yakabipa mu mimoyo yenyu?
Ndikupi kulelu kuti, ‘Matjinyo awo waazwiibhatigwa,’ kene kuti, ‘Milika uyende?’
Ngono kuti ndizo muzibe kuti iye Nkololo we Nthu una ndaulo mu shango ye kuzwiibhatigwa matjinyo.” Ndizo ipapo kati kuna wakalobgwa nge gulukadzi, “Milika, tola thobo iyo uyende kanyi.”
Ndizo kamilika kayenda kanyi kwabo.
Kukati mbunga we bathu ubona ikoku, ukabe ne kutja, ukakudza Ndzimu, iwo wakapa bathu ndaulo yakajali.
Jesu kadwa paakabe alipo kayenda ngono kabona nlume unoyi Matewu ali gele pa bugalo gwe bakhethisi. Jesu kati kunli, “Unditobele.”
Ndizo Matewu kamilika kantobela.
Jesu kati atjimu ng'umba ya Matewu eja, bakhethisi ne batjinyi* banjinji bakazha bakaja naye ne badiyiwa babe.
Bafarasi bakati bebona ikoku bakabhuzwa badiyiwa ba Jesu beti, “Ini n'diyi wenyu eja ne bakhethisi ne batjinyi kene?”
Jesu kati ehwa ikoku kati, “Ate bathu banomuka zubuyanana banoshaka ng'anga koga bagwele ndibo banoshaka ng'anga.
Ndizo yendani munozwidiya kuti oku kodwani, ‘Ndoshaka mahwilo ngoni, kusi tjibhayilo.’ Andizozha kuwodana balulwami, koga ndakazha kuwodana batjinyi.”
Ipapo badiyiwa ba Johani bakazha kuna Jesu bakambhuzwa bakati, “Ini iswi ne Bafarasi tizwinyima zojiwa, koga badiyiwa babo basingazwinyime izo?”
Jesu kabashandula nge bhuzo eti, “Apa bathu bakokiwa ndobolo bangalila nkwasha atji nabo tjini? Koga misi inowozha ye kuti batolegwe nkwasha, ipapo ndiko kwabanowozwinyima zojiwa.”
Akuna unolonga nguli tshwa mu tjiambalo tjikulukugwi, ngobe nguli tshwa inowobuya ngono ikashweshwana, ndizo kupaluka kukapindilila.

Akuna nthu unodila nkumbi ntshwa mu makukhwa makulukugwi. Ha angadila, makukhwa anowophutuka, nkumbi ukatebuka, ngono makukhwa katjinyika. Nkumbi ntshwa unodigwa mu makukhwa matshwa, ngono kose kukatjengeteka.
Kati atjaleba ikoku nabo, kukazha ntungamili we nzi kathigama mbeli kukwe kati, “Nkololokadzi wangu wafa sangwenu. Ngono izha umbige maboko awo ndizo unowotjila.”
Jesu kamilika kantobela ne badiyiwa babe.
Ipapo nkadzi wakabe ana makole ali gumi lina mabili egwala e bhizha malopa, kazha shule kukwe kabhata lupeto gwe tjiambalo tjitje.
Ngono nkadzi kati mu nkumbulo uwe, “Ha ndingakutha tjiambalo tjitje koga, ndowopola.”
Jesu katjebuka, kambona ngono kati kunli, “Sima nkololokadzi wangu, kugalamoyo kuko kwakupodza.” Ipapo nkadzi iwoyo kapola.
Jesu kati engina mu ng'umba ye nlauli ebona balidzi be nyele ne mbunga we bathu upoyongana,
kati kubali, “Idwani ipapa. Mmwanadi aazofa ulele.” Koga bakanseka mahanya.
Mbunga we bathu wakati wadusigwa kuzhe, kangina mukati kambhata nge luboko, ngono mmwanadi kamilika.
Thawu dza ikoku dzikaandama nge ntuthu iwoyo wose.
Jesu kati edwa ipapo balume babili be mapofu bakantobela bedanilila beti, “Utihwile ngoni Nkololo wa Dafite!”
Kati engina mu ng'umba, balume ibabo be mapofu bakazha kunli, ngono kababhuzwa kati, “Mogalamoyo kene kuti ndingakuyita ikoku?”
Bakadabila beti “Ee, She.”
Ipapo kabhata mesho abo eti, “Nge kugalamoyo kwenyu ngakuyitikale mumuli.”
Mesho abo kapofunuka. Jesu kakowomedza eti, “Mubone kuti akuna waziba ngekwa ikoku.”
Koga bakabhuda bakaandamisa tjilumbi tjitje mu ntuthu iwoyo wose.
Bakati batjayenda, mmwe nlume we mbebebe wakabe akasungwa nge meya mibi, kazhisiwa kuna Jesu.
Ngono kukati meya mbi wadusiwa, nlume iwoyo we mbebebe kalebeleka. Mbunga we bathu ukakaabala ukati, “Akuna tjinonga itjetji tjakatongo bong'wa mu Iziraela.”
Koga Bafarasi bakati, “Unodusa meya mibi eshingisa she we meya mibi.”
Jesu kapalama mizi yose ne mizana ediya mu ng'umba dzabo dze mitembezelo esumikila ndebo mbuya ye bushe gwe kudzimu kakale epodza njigwele dzose ne buworoworo gose.
Kati ebona mibunga ye bathu kabahwila zogwadza, ngobe bakabe bedziyidzika basina bhatsho, benga pkhwizi dzisina nlisi.
Ipapo kati ku badiyiwa babe, “Kuvuna kukulu kulu koga bavuni bashomanana.
Ndizo kumbilani kuti She we ndimo atumile bavuni ku nnda uwe.”
Jesu wakadana badiyiwa babe bali gumi lina babili kabapa ndaulo pezhugwi kwe meya mibi, kuti baiduse ne kupodza bugwele ne buworoworo gumwe ne gumwe.
Awa ndiwo mazina e batumwa bali gumi lina babili. We kutanga ndi Simoni iye unoyi Pita na Enduru nnung'una uwe na Jakubo nkololo wa Zebhedi na Johani nnung'una uwe,
na Filipo na Bhatolomeo na Tomasi na Matewu wakabe ali nkhethisi na Jakubo nkololo wa Alifeo na Tadeo
na Simoni wakabe egwila sununguko ye bathu na Judasi Isikariyoti, iye wakawonga Jesu.
Ibaba bali gumi lina babili, Jesu wakabatuma ebalaya sahwoku, “Musitongoyenda pakati kwe Bezwitjaba kene kuli kungina mu mizi ye Basamariya.*
Koga yendani ku pkhwizi dze ng'umba ye Iziraela dzakalashika.
Muyende musumikila muti, ‘Bushe gwe kudzimu gwasedzela.’
Mupodze bagwele, mumuse bafi, mupodze banogwala mapele. Muduse meya mibi. Makapiwa musingalipisiwe, namwibo ipani musingalipise.
Musitongosenga golide kene siliva kene khopa mu mmwandabula yenyu.
Musitongosenga gobhodo mu gwendo gwenyu kene zwiambalo kene bokhwebana kene ludozo, ngobe nshingi unofanigwa ngopiwa zojiwa zwizwe.
“Nzi mmwe ne mmwe kene nzana wamunoswika muuli, shakani nthu wakafanila mugale naye kuswikila mubhuda ipapo.
Muti mungina mu nzi mudumilise.
Ha nzi iwoyo wakafanigwa nge kunyalala, kunyalala kwenyu kube muuli, ha usakafanila, kunyalala kwenyu ngakubgwilile kumuli.
Iye usingawomuamutjila kene usingawohwilila matama enyu muwole gumbo lenyu ha mubhuda mu ng'umba iyeyo kene nzi iwoyo.
Ndolebesa tjose nditi, sumikiliso inobendelu mu mizi ye Sodoma ne Gomora mu zhuba le kusumikilisiwa kupinda ye nzi iwoyo.
“Mubone! Ndomutuma munga pkhwizi dzipakati kwe phele. Tjenjelani se nyoka mube basina nlandu se njiba.
Yelani njele bathu, ngobe banowomuyisa ku Makulukota* bakamuloba mu ng'umba dzabo dze mitembezelo,
banowomukwebela mbeli kwe balauli na boshe bakulu nge kwangu. Ngekujalo mowobe mupa butendeki* mbeli kwabo ne Bezwitjaba nge kwangu.
Ngono ha bemusunga musidziyidzike ngekwe kuti mowolebani nenge kuti mowotjileba tjini. Nge tjibaka itjetjo mowopiwa tjamunowoleba,
ngobe kowobe kusingalebeleke imwi, koga kowobe kulebeleka Meya ya Tate benyu.
“Nthu unowosungisa ikamu tjitje kuti tjibulawe na tate bakasungisa mwana wabo kuti abulawe, bana banowopandukila bazwadzi babo bakabasungisa kuti babulawe.
Bathu bose banowomubenga nge kwangu, koga iye unobhatilila kunoti ku bupelo unowotjidziwa.
Ha mudziyidziwa mu nzi mmwe tizhilani ku mmwe. Ndolebesa nditi, amutowoyenda mukashanganya mizi yose ye Iziraela Nkololo we Nthu asathu kazha.
“N'diyiwa aangabe nkulu mu n'diyi uwe, kene nlanda aangabe nkulu muna tetshi uwe.
Kwakalizana kuti n'diyiwa alizane ne n'diyi uwe ne nlanda kuti alizane na tetshi uwe. Ha iye nsholo we nzi akadang'wa kuyi Bheelizebhuli,* be nzi uwe ibo banowodang'wa saikoko kungapani kene!
“Ndizo musibatje, ngoti akuna tjakazwimbiwa tjisingawozumbunugwa kene tjakasumbikala tjisingawozibgwa.
Tjandinomubudza mu zhalima mutjilebe mu tjedza, tjamunohwa tjinyebezegwa mutjiandamise.
Musitje ibabo banobulaya mbili koga basingatubule kubulaya meya. Bukulu itjani iye iwoyo ungalobesa kose meya ne mbili mu moto usingadzime.
Apa zhazho mbili adzitotengesiwa nge peni ing'ompela, koga kusina ing'ompela yadzo ingawila pasi kuzhe kwe kuda kwa Tate benyu kene.
Nenge mavudzi e nsholo wenyu akabagwa wose.
Ndizo musitje, ngobe mopinda zhazho dzili njinji.
“Iye unowoleba kuti unami mbeli kwe bathu, namibo ndowoleba kuti ndi naye mbeli kwa Tate bangu ba kudzimu.
Koga iye unowondizwilandula mbeli kwe bathu, namibo ndowonzwilandula mbeli kwa Tate bangu ba kudzimu.
“Musikumbule kuti ndakazha kuwozhisa mbakiso mu shango. Aandizozha kuwozhisa mbakiso koga ndakazhisa thumo.
Ndazha kuwogwisanya nthu na Tate babe, nkololokadzi na mmeyabe, nlongo na mmezwale babe
zwita zwe nthu kowobe ibabo be nsha uwe!
“Iye unoda tate babe kene mmeyabe kupinda imi aazondifanila na iye unoda nkololo kene nkololokadzi uwe kupinda imi aazondifanila.
Na iye usingatole tjileyanyo tjitje kanditobela aazondifanila.
Iye unowana butjilo gugwe gowonlashikila. Iye unolashikigwa nge butjilo gugwe nge kwangu unowoguwana.
“Iye unomuamutjila unoamutjila imi na iye unoamutjila imi unoamutjila wakandituma.
Iye unoamutjila nlebesambeli, ngobe ali nlebesambeli unowoamutjila mbhayilo we nlebesambeli, na iye unoamutjila nlulwami, ngobe ali nlulwami, unowoamutjila mbhayilo we nlulwami.
Iye unopa mmwe wa ibaba batukununu kene uli nkombe we vula inotothola, ngobe ali n'diyiwa, ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, aatowolashikigwa nge mbhayilo uwe.”
Kwakati Jesu apedza kulaya badiyiwa babe bali gumi lina babili, kudwa ipapo kayenda kunodiya ne kunosumikila mu mizi yabo.
Johani kati ali mu ng'umba ye busungwa kahwa ngekwe mishingo ya Kirisiti katuma badiyiwa babe
kunombhuzwa beti, “Apa ndiwe wakafanila kuzha kene tilindile mmwe?”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Yendani munobikila Johani tjamunohwa nenge tjamunobona.
Mapofu anopofunuka, zwilema zoyenda, banogwala mapele banopodziwa, mabhubuzebe anohwa, bafi banomusiwa ne ndebo mbuya inosumikigwa ku bashayi.
Wakakombolegwa iye usingakuthike nge kwangu.”

Kukati badiyiwa ba Johani boyenda Jesu katangisa kulebeleka ne mbunga we bathu ngekwa Johani ebhuzwa eti, “Ini tjamakayendila kunobona ku tjilambanyika? Apa makabe munobona lushanga guzunguziwa nge phepo kene?
Akusakajalo makabe manobonani ngono? Makabe manobona nthu wakaambala zwiambalo zwakanaka kene? Bonani, ibabo bakaambala zwiambalo zwakanaka bamu ng'umba dza boshe.
Makabe manobonani ngono? Kunobona nlebesambeli kene? Ee, ndomubudza tjose, na iko makabona nkulu kupinda nlebesambeli.
Oyu ndiye wakakwagwa nge kukwe kuyi, ‘Ndowotuma ntumwa wangu mbeli kuko iye unowolulwamisa zila iyo mbeli kuko.’
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, pakati kwabo bakazwagwa nge bakadzi akuna wakaleliwa nkulu pana Johani we N'dubiki; nenguba iye ntukunu tjose mu bushe gwe kudzimu ali nkulu panli.
Kudwa mu mazhuba a Johani we N'dubiki kudzina kube ngwenu, bushe gwe kudzimu gongingwa nge masimba, ne bana masimba banogutola nge masimba.
Hwalo dze balebesambeli bose ne nlayo dzakalebesambeli kuswikila Johani ezha.
Ndizo ha kuli kuti moda kuamutjila, ndiye Elija wakabe ewozha.
Iye una zebe dze kuhwa, ngaahwe.
“Bathu bangwenu ndingabafanidzanya ngeni kene? Banonga bana bali gele pa thanga bedana babanozana nabo beti,
‘Tamulidzila nyele mukasizane, tikamba lumbo gwe tjililo koga mukasilile.’
Johani wakazha asingaje kakale asingang'we, ngono bakati, ‘Una meya mbi.’
Nkololo we Nthu wakazha eja kakale eng'wa, ngono bakati, ‘Bonani, eli govu le tjidakwa ne nzwalani we bakhethisi ne batjinyi.’ Koga butjenjedu golakidziwa kuti gu malebeswa nge mishingo yago.”
Ipapo Jesu katangisa kasola mizi yaakati muili kashinga bunji gwe matjenamiso awe, ngobe basakashanduka mu matjinyo abo.

“Yee mme wee! Wapalala iwe Korazini! Yee mme wee! Wapalala iwe Bhetisaida! Ha matjenamiso akashingwa mumuli ha akabe ashingwa mu mizi ye Tire ne Sidoni bathu bako banobe bakashandukila ku Ndzimu ntolo, bakaambala masaka* bali gele mu nlota.
Koga ndomudwa nditi mu zhuba le sumikiliso, sumikiliso inobendelu mu bathu be Tire ne Sidoni pana yenyu.
Nawe nzi we Kapenaume, apa unowomilidzigwa kudzimu kene? Aa, unowodelusigwa pasi, ku bugalo* gwe bafi. Ha matjenamiso akashingwa mukuli akabe ashingwa mu Sodoma, nzi iwoyu unobe uli yapo na nasi.
Koga ndomudwa nditi, mu zhuba le sumikiliso, sumikiliso inowobendelu mu bathu be Sodoma pamuli mu zhuba le kusumikilisiwa.”
Nge tjibaka itjetjo Jesu kati, “Ndomuboka Tate, She we Kudzimu ne shango, ngobe makasumbikila zwithu izwezwi batjenjedu ne bakadiyika, koga mukazwizumbunulila basakadiyika.
Ee, Tate, ngobe oku kwakabe kumushathisa.
“Zwithu zose zwakapiwa imi ndi Tate bangu. Akuna unoziba Nkololo kuzhe kwa Tate, kakale akuna unoziba Tate kuzhe kwe Nkololo na ibabo Nkololo baanoshaka iye kubabudza kuti na ibo babazibebo.
“Izhani kundili imwi makanyala kakale munolemegwa, ndowomunyalulusa.
Muzwitilike jokwi
Ngobe jokwi langu lilelu ne ntolo wangu nlelu.”
Mu tjibaka itjetjo Jesu kapalama minda mu zhuba le Sabata. Badiyiwa babe bakabe bana zhala ndizo bakatangisa kamwaula zwiyako mu nnda kuti baje.
Bafarasi bakati bebona ikoku bakati kunli, “Bona! Badiyiwa babo banothama tjisimu nlayo nge zhuba le Sabata.”
Kati kubali, “Amuzobala kuti Dafite ne baakabe anabo bakati bakathamani bana zhala kene?
Wakangina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono iye ne baakabe anabo bakaja zwiwunga zwinopiwa Ndzimu, koga nge nlayo zwakabe zwili zwiwunga zwe Bapirisiti koga.
Amuzobala mu nlayo kuti mu zhuba le Sabata Bapirisiti banoshinga mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu banotjuluka nlayo we zhuba le Sabata, koga bakabe basina nlandu kene?
Ndomubudza kuti iye nkulu pa Ng'umba ye Ndzimu upano.
Ha mabe makaziba kuti matama iyawa anodwani anoti, ‘Ndoshaka mahwilo zogwadza, kusi tjibhayilo,’ mobe musakabona nlandu basina nlandu.
Ngobe Nkololo we Nthu ndi She we Sabata.”
Wakayendila mbeli kudwa ipapo, ngono kangina mu ng'umba yabo ye mitembezelo.

Ipapo kwakabe kuna nlume una luboko gwakashweshwana. Kwakabe kuna bathu bakabe beshaka tjimwe tjabangabona Jesu nlandu nditjo, ngono bakabhuzwa Jesu bakati, “Apa kumu nlayo kupodza nge zhuba le Sabata kene?”
Kati kubali, “Apa ndiupi wenyu ungati ana pkhwizi ing'ompela yawila mu gomba nge Sabata, kasiyiduse kene?
Ngono nthu iye unopinda pkhwizi kungapani kene! Ndizo kumu nlayo kuyita ndulamo nge zhuba le Sabata.”
Ipapo kati ku nlume iwoyo, “Tambunudza luboko gugo.”
Ndizo nlume iwoyo kagutambunudza gukapola tjose gukafanana ne gumwe.
Koga Bafarasi bakabhuda bakanolangana sekwa bangabulaya Jesu.
Jesu wakabe abona tjabanoshaka thama ngono, kabhuda mu magalo iyawo. Banjinji bakantobela, ngono kabapodza bose,
kakowomedza kuti bashaye wababudza kuti ndiye ani.
Oku kwakabe kuli kuti kushingikale matama akalebgwa nge nlebesambeli Isaya eti,
“Hwoyu nlanda wangu wandakashalula,
iye wandinoda, wandinoshatha munli.
Ndowodelusila Meya yangu munli,
ngono unowozibisa nge kwe ndulamo muna Bezwitjaba.
Aatokakabadzana ne nthu kene kulonga zhoba,
akuna unowohwa hwi lile mu dzizila.
Lushanga gwakakombama aatoguvuna,
ne luvone gunothungayila aatowogudzima,
kudzina etungamilila ndulamo mu kukunda.
Bezwitjaba banowogalabgwe munli.”
Ipapo bakazhisa kunli nlume wakabe akasungwa nge meya mbi ali bhofu kakale ali mbebebe, ngono Jesu kampodza, ndizo kalebeleka kakale kabona.
Bathu bose bakatjenama kwazo bakati, “Apa ungabe ali Nkololo wa Dafite iwoyu kene?”
Ngono Bafarasi bakati behwa ikoku bakati, “Nlume iwoyu unotata meya mibi ndi Bheelizebhuli koga, iye she we meya mibi.”
Jesu ngekuziba mikumbulo yabo kati kubali, “Bushe gumwe ne gumwe gwakazwithubukanya gowokolomoka, kakale akuna nzi kene nsha wakazwithubukanya inowobakika.
Satani ha etata Satani, wakathubukana nge kukwe, bushe gugwe gungasima tjini kene?
Ngono ha kuli kuti ndodusa meya mibi na Bheelizebhuli, bakololo benyu ibo banoidusa nayani? Ndizoke, banowobe basumikilisi benyu.
Koga ha kuli kuti ndodusa meya mibi nge Meya ye Ndzimu, ipapo bushe gwe Ndzimu gwatjiswika mumuli.
“Kene, apa nthu ungangina mu ng'umba ye nlume wakasima tjini katapa thundu iye asasunga iwoyo nlume wakasima kutanga? Ipapo ekotapa ng'umba iye.
“Iye usimile nami unonyanyayidzana nami, na iye usingakubunganye nami, unopaladza.
Ndizo ndomubudza nditi, jinyo limwe ne limwe ne kutuka Ndzimu kwe bathu kowozwiibhatigwa, koga kutuka Meya yakayengemala aatokuzwiibhatigwa.
Iye unonyanyayidza Nkololo we Nthu, unowozwiibhatigwa, koga iye unonyanyayidza Meya yakayengemala aatowozwiibhatigwa, mu misi iyeyo kene mu misi inozha.
“Itani kuti nti ululwame, ngono zwizwalo zwawo zowolulwamabo, kene itani nti kuti ubipe zwizwalo zwawo zwobipabo, ngobe nti unozibgwa nge zwizwalo zwawo.
Bana be nyoka ndimwi! Mungati muli babi mukaleba tjakalulwama tjini? Nlomo unoleba tjizhele mu moyo.
Nthu wakalulwama unodusa bubuya mu fumwa iye yakanaka ne nthu wakabipa unodusa bubi mu fumwa iye yakabipa.
“Koga ndomubudza nditi, bathu banowobe ne kuzwidabiligwa mu zhuba le kusumikilisiwa mu dama limwe ne limwe le butjapa labakaleba.
Ngobe mowolulwamisiwa nge matama enyu kakale mukabong'wa nlandu nge matama enyu.”
Ipapo bamwe be Bafarasi ne badiyi be nlayo bakati kunli, “N'diyi, toshaka kubona tjilakidzo tjinodwa kumuli.”
Jesu kabadabila kati, “Bathu ndimwi bangwenu babiibi kakale musingagagwebgwe nge Ndzimu moshaka tjilakidzo, ngono akuna tjilakidzo tjamunowopiwa kuzhe kwe tjilakidzo tje nlebesambeli Jona.
Koga sa Jona akabe mu ntumbu we hwobe hwulu mazhuba matatu ne masiku matatu, sa ikoko Nkololo we Nthu unowobe mu ikumbu mazhuba matatu ne masiku matatu.

Balume be Ninive banowomuka ne bathu ibaba bangwenu mu nsi we kusumikilisiwa, bakababona nlandu, ngobe ibo bakashandukila matjinyo abo pa kusumikila kwa Jona, ngono ngwenu bonani, iye nkulu pana Jona upano.

Nfumakadzi we burwa unowoma ne bathu ibaba bangwenu mu zhuba le kusumikilisiwa, ngono kababona nlandu, ngobe wakazha edwa ku phelelo dze shango kuwohwilila butjenjedu gwa Solomoni, ngono bonani, iye nkulu pana Solomoni upano.
“Ha meya mbi ibhuda mu nthu, inopinda mu magalo akawoma ishaka kunyaluluka, koga isingakuwane.
Ipapo unoti, ‘Ndowobgwilila ku ng'umba yangu yandakadwa muili.’ Ha iswika, inowana ng'umba iyeyo isina mmwe umuili, yakatshwayigwa, kakale yakabiganyika.

Ipapo inowoyenda ikanotola meya mimwe ili kutendeka mibi kuupinda, ngono ibe ingina igala mukati. Ngono tjimo tje nthu iwoyo tje bupelo tjokobipa kupinda tje kutanga. Ndiko sekwa kunowobe iko nge bathu bangwenu bakabipa.”
Jesu kati atjalebeleka ne bathu, mmeyabe ne banung'una babe bakama kuzhe, bekumbila lebeleka naye.
Mmwe kabudza Jesu kati, “Mmeyabo ne banung'una babo bamile pazhe banokumbila lebeleka nawe.”
Kadabila nlume wambudza kati, “Mmeyangu ndiani ne banung'una bangu ndiboani?”
Katendeka badiyiwa babe ngono kati, “Aba ndibo mmeyangu ne banung'una bangu.
Iye unoshinga kuda kwa Tate bangu ba kudzimu ndiye nnung'una wangu ne hazwadzi yangu na mmeyangu.”
Mu zhuba ilelo zwalo Jesu wakabhuda mu ng'umba kanogala pa gungwa.
Mibunga ye bathu ikankubunganila, kadzina kangina mu n'goro kagala muuli, bathu bose bali mile mu phili ye gungwa.
Ipapo wakababudza zwithu zwinjinji nge zwifaniso eti,
“Ndzwali wakabhuda enodzwala.
Ngono kati edzwala, imwe mbewu ikawila mu zijana, ngono nyuni dzikazha dzikaija.
Imwe ikawila mu lushale, ngono ikashaya mavu akalizanila. Yakatjimbidza kumela, ngobe kwakabe kusina mavu manjinji akaivukidza.
Koga kukati zhuba libhuda, mmela ukatshwa ngono ukawoma, ngobe usina midzi.
Imwe mbewu ikawila pakati kwe mihwa, ngono mihwa ukakula ukadzipa mmela.
Kakale imwe mbewu ikawila mu mavu mabuya ikazwala zwizwalo zwinopinda zwakadzwagwa ka zana (100), imwe kuli makumi matathatu (60), imwe kuli makumi matatu (30).
Iye una zebe, ngaahwe.”
Badiyiwa babe bakazha kunli bakambhuzwa beti, “Ini ulebeleka ne bathu ibaba nge zwifaniso kene?”
Kabashandula eti, “Zibo ye masazibgwe e bushe gwe kudzimu yakapiwa imwi koga ibo abazoipiwa.
Iye unohwa unowopiwa kuhwisisa, ndizo unowohwisisa nge buzhalo, koga iye usingahwe ne tjitukununu tjaanohwisisa unowotjitolegwa.
Ndizo ndilebeleka nabo nge zwifaniso, ngobe ne bakalinga abatobona ne bakahwilila abatohwa kakale abatohwisisa.
Nge kwabo, kowoshingikala tjakalebgwa nge nlebesambeli Isaya eti,
‘Nge malebeswa mowohwa koga musingahwisise;
nge malebeswa mowobona koga musingabonesese,
ngobe mimoyo ye bathu ibaba yakakukutala,
ne zebe dzabo dzolema kuhwa,
kakale bakazwimba mesho abo.
Ha babe bangabona nge mesho abo,
bakahwa nge zebe dzabo,
bakahwisisa nge mimoyo yabo,
bakashandukila kundili, ndabe ndingabapodza.’
“Akakombolegwa mesho enyu, ngobe anobona ne zebe dzenyu dzakakombolegwa ngobe dzohwa.
Ndolebesa ndoti, balebesambeli banjinji ne balulwami, bakayemula kubona tjamunobona koga bakasitjibone ne kuhwa tjamunohwa koga bakasitjihwe.
“Tjihwililani kuti tjifaniso tje ndzwali tjodwani.
Ha mmwe ehwa dama le bushe asingalihwisise, mbi unozha kadzamula tjadzwagwa mu moyo uwe. Eyi ndiyo mbewu yakadzwagwa mu zijana.
Yakadzwagwa mu lushale imilile nthu unohwa dama kaliamutjila tjinyolotjo nge kushatha.
Koga se asina midzi, unolibhata tjibaka tjifupi koga. Kudziyila ne kuhwisiwa zogwadza ngekwe dama koti kuzha, katjimbidza awa mu kugalamoyo.
Yakadzwagwa pakati kwe mihwa imilile nthu unohwa dama ngono kudziyidzika nge zwe butjilo igogu kose nenge butjengedzi gwe fumwa zwikalidzipa, kukayita kuti lishaye zwizwalo.

Koga yakadzwagwa mu mavu mabuya imilile nthu unohwa dama kalihwisisa. Unodusa zwizwalo zwinopinda zwakadzwagwa kuli zana (100), nge tjimwe tjibaka kuli makumi matathatu (60), ngono tjimwe tjibaka kuli makumi matatu (30).”
Jesu kababudza tjimwe tjifaniso eti, “Bushe gwe kudzimu gungafanidzanyiwa ne nthu wakadzwala mbewu mbuyanana mu nnda uwe;
koga kukati bathu bakayizela, tjita tjitje tjikazha tjikadzwala gotsha pakati kwe mathunde, ngono tjibe tjiyenda.
Kukati mathunde ekula edusa zwizwalo, gotsha na ilo likabhuda.
Balanda be mweni we nnda bakazha kunli bakati, ‘Tetshi, apa amuzobe madzwala mbewu mbuyanana mu nnda wenyu kene? Ini nnda una makotsha?’
Kati kubali, ‘Kuna tjita tjakathama ikoku.’ Balanda bakambhuzwa bakati, ‘Apa moshaka kuti tiyende tinolisimula kene?’
Kashandula eti, ‘Aa, ngobe mowoti musimula makotsha, mukadwa musimulilanya ne mathunde.

Letjani kukule kose kuswikila nsi we kuvuna. Nge nsi iwoyo ndowobudza bavuni nditi, Kutanga kubunganyani makotsha muasunge nge zwishwa kuti apisiwe, kudwapo mu kubunganye mathunde mualonge mu dula langu.’ ”
Kababudza tjifaniso tjimwe eti, “Bushe gwe kudzimu gofanana ne shanga tukununu ye lusaba, yakati nthu kaitola kaidzwala mu nnda uwe.
Ndiyo mbewu tukununu tjose mu mbewu dzose, koga ha ikula ndiyo inobe hwulu pa matenjana wose, ngono inobe nti, nyuni kwadzinozha dzikabaka mashaka mu thabi dzawo.”
Kababudza tjimwe tjifaniso eti, “Bushe gwe kudzimu gonga mbidzo yakatogwa nge nkadzi kaishanganya ne bgwisa gunjinji gwe tjiwunga kudzina bgwisa gose gubila.”
Jesu wakaleba zwithu zose izwezwi ku mibunga ye bathu nge zwifaniso. Akuna tjaakababudza asingashingise tjifaniso.
Oku kwakabe kuli kuti kusiwile pasi matama akalebgwa nge nlebesambeli eti,
“Ndowozhula nlomo wangu nge zwifaniso,
ndowoleba tjakabe tjakasumbikala
kudwa mu kubumbiwa kwe shango.”
Ipapo kasiya mbunga we bathu kangina mu ng'umba. Badiyiwa babe bakazha kunli beti, “Utitjenesele tjifaniso tje gotsha mu nnda.”
Kadabila eti, “Oyu wakadzwala mbewu yakalulwama Nkololo we Nthu.
Nnda i shango, ngono mbewu mbuyanana imilile bana be bushe. Gotsha bana be mbi,
ne tjita tjinobadzwala ndiye Nvanganyi. Kuvuna kodwa bupelo gwe shango, ngono bavuni batumwa be kudzimu.
Koga se gotsha lisimugwa likapisiwa mu moto, kowobe kwakajalo mu bupelo gwe shango.
Iye Nkololo we Nthu unowotuma batumwa babe, ngono banowosimula bedusa mu bushe gugwe tjimwe ne tjimwe tjinozhisa jinyo na ibo bose banoyita mbipo.
Banowobalashila mu bhuba le moto, kunowobe yapo kulila ne kulobanya meno nge kugwadziwa kukulu.
Ipapo balulwami banowopenya se zhuba mu bushe gwa Tate babo. Iye una zebe ngaahwe.
“Bushe gwe kudzimu gofanana ne fumwa yakasumbikiwa mu nnda. Ha nthu aiwana kaivumbika ngono mu kushatha kukwe kanotengesa kose kwaakabe anako katenga nnda iwoyo.
“Kakale Bushe gwe kudzimu gofanana ne ntengi unoshaka mabgwe mabuya.
Kukati awana le ntengo upezhugwi, kayenda kanotengesa kose kwaanako kalitenga.
“Kakale bushe gwe kudzimu gofanana ne gwanga gwakaposegwa mu gungwa ngono gukabhata njudzi dzose dze hwobe.
Gukati gwazhala balume bakagukwebela pa phili. Ipapo bakagala pasi bakakubunganyila hwobe dzakalulwama mu zwija, koga belasha dzisakalulwama.
Kowobe kwakajalo mu bupelo gwe shango. Batumwa be kudzimu banowozha kuwothubukanya babi mu balulwami.
Bakalashila babi mu bhuba le moto kunowobepo kulila ne kulobanya meno nge kugwadziwa kukulu.”
Jesu kababhuzwa kati, “Apa mahwisisa zwithu izwezwi zose kene?”
Bakadabila beti, “Ee.”
Ngono kati kubali, “Ndizo N'diyi mmwe ne mmwe we nlayo wadiyiwa ngekwe bushe gwe kudzimu unofanana ne mweni we ng'umba unodusa mu dula lile fumwa tshwa ne hwulukugwi.”
Kukati Jesu apedza zwifaniso izwezwi kadwa ipapo,

kalinga ku shango ya kanyi kwabo kati eswika katangisa kudiya bathu mu ng'umba yabo ye mitembezelo, ngono bakakaabala. Bakabhuzwana beti, “Iwoyu nlume wakawana poni butjenjedu igogu ne masimba iyawa e kuthama matjenamiso kene?
Apa ate ali iye nkololo we mbezhi kene? Apa mmeyabe ate Mariya kene, kakale apa banung'una babe ate Jakubo na Josefa na Simoni na Judasi kene?
Apa hazwadzi dzidze dzose adzinaswi kene? Ngono iwoyu nlume wakazwitola ngayi kene zwithu izwezwi?”
Ngono bakakuthika nge kukwe. Koga Jesu kati kubali, “Nlebesambeli aatoshaya tjilumbi mu shango imwe ne imwe kuzhe kwe shango ya kanyi kwabo nenge mu nsha wa kanyi kwabo.”
Aazoyita matjenamiso manjinji ipapo nge kusheta kugalamoyo kwabo.
Mu tjibaka itjetjo, She Herode, kahwa ngekwe tjilumbi tja Jesu,
ngono kati ku balanda babe, “Oyu ndi Johani we N'dubiki wakamuka mu bafi; ndizo wali masimba iyawa eshinga munli.”
Herode wakabe abhata Johani, kansunga kanlonga mu ng'umba ye busungwa ngekwa Herodiyasi nkadzi we nnung'una uwe Herode, wakabeyi Filipo,
ngobe Johani wakabe egala endwa eti “Ate kuli mu nlayo kuti unlobole.”
Nenguba Herode akabe eshaka bulaya Johani, wakabe etja bathu, ngobe beti Johani nlebesambeli.
Mu zhuba le kuzwikumbuludza kuzwagwa kwa Herode, nkololokadzi wa Herodiyasi kabazanila, kashathisa Herode kwazo,
Herode kwaakadzina kan'gadzabgwe nge kutuna kuti unowompa tjimwe ne tjimwe tjaangakumbila.
Nge kukulumbidziwa ndi mmeyabe kati, “Mundipe nsholo wa Johani we N'dubiki uli mu ndilo.”
She nkulu kahwa zogwadza, koga nge tuna kukwe kakale ngekwe bakokiwa babe, kalaya kuti nkololokadzi apiwe tjaakumbila.
Ndizo katuma bathu bakanothubula nsholo wa Johani mu ng'umba ye busungwa.
Nsholo uwe wakazhisiwa uli mu ndilo, ukapiwa mwanadi iwoyo, ngono kauyisa kuna mmeyabe.
Badiyiwa ba Johani bakazha bakatola itumbu tjitje bakatjibiganya. Kudwa ipapo bakayenda bakanobudza Jesu.
Jesu kati ehwa tjakashingikala, kamilika ipapo nge n'goro kayenda kanobe ega, pasina bathu. Koga mibunga ye bathu ikati ihwa kwaayako ikantobela nge makumbo bedwa mu mizi yabo.
N'goro ukati uswika pa phili, kabona mbunga nkulu we bathu, ngono kabahwila zogwadza, kapodza bagwele babo.
Madekwana badiyiwa bakazha kunli beti, “Pathu ipapa tjilambanyika kakale zhuba lamila. Paladza mibunga iyeyi ye bathu kuti ndizo bayende ku mizi banozwitengela zojiwa.”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Abazofanila kuti bayende. Mubape tjabangaja imwi.”
Bakati kunli, “Pano tina zwiwunga zwili zwishanu koga ne hwobe mbili.”
Jesu kati kubali, “Muzwizhise kundili.”
Ngono kadwa bathu kuti bagale pasi mu bushwa. Katola zwiwunga zwishanu ne hwobe idzedzo mbili kalinga kudzimu, kaboka Ndzimu, kazwipemula, kapa badiyiwa zwiwunga bakazwikobela bathu.
Bose bakaja bakaguta, ngono badiyiwa bakanunga mamburumburu bakazhadza seme dzili gumi lina mbili.
Ibabo bakaja bakabe bali balume bali zwiwulu zwishanu, kuzhe kwe bakadzi ne bana.
Ipapo Jesu kadwa badiyiwa kati bangine mu n'goro babe bali mbeli, bayende seli, iye atjapaladza mibunga ye bathu.
Kati abapaladza katatha dombo ali ega kunotembezela. Kukati kube madekwana kabe ali ikoko ega,
ngono n'goro, wakabe wabe thambo kudwa mu phili, wakabe uhwuhwunganyiwa nge matuthu e vula inokapha, ngobe phepo yakabe yakalingisana nawo.
Kukati mazhokuyedza, kayenda kubali enangayila pezhugwi kwe vula.
Kukati badiyiwa bembona enangayila pezhugwi kwe vula bakapalukamoyo ngono bakamimila ngotja beti, “Ipuku.”
Koga tjinyolotjo Jesu kati kubali, “Simisani moyo! Ndimi, musitje.”
Pita kati, “She, ha muli imwi mundidwe ndizhe kumuli ndinangayila pezhugwi kwe vula.”
Jesu kati kunli, “Izha.” Ipapo Pita kadeluka mu n'goro kanangayila pezhugwi kwe vula eyenda kuna Jesu.
Koga kati ebona phepo katja, ngono kati etangisa kunyelela kadanilila eti, “She, munditjidze!”
Tjinyolotjo Jesu kan'abilila kambhata kati kunli, “Nthu we kugalamoyo kutukununu ndiwe, wadudumwani?”
Bakati bengina mu n'goro, dutu likanyalala.
Ipapo bakabe bali mu n'goro bakan'namata, beti kunli, “Tjose u Nkololo we Ndzimu.”
Bakati batjulukila seli bakaswika mu shango ye Genezareta.
Kukati balume be nzi iwoyo baziba kuti ndi Jesu, bakazibisa ntuthu wose. Bathu bakazhisa bagwele babo kunli,
ngono bakankumbila kuti bagwele babhate lupeto gwe tjiambalo tjitje. Bose bakagubhata bakapodziwa.
Ipapo Bafarasi ne badiyi be nlayo bakazha kuna Jesu bedwa ku Jerusalema, ngono bakambhuzwa beti,
“Ini badiyiwa babo betjuluka tjilenje tja bobatategulu kene? Abatongula maboko abo ha beja!”
Jesu kabashandula nge bhuzo eti, “Ini tjilenje tjenyu tjithama kuti mutjuluke nlayo we Ndzimu?
Ndzimu wakati, ‘Kudza tate babo na mmeyabo,’ kakale, ‘Iye unoleba bubi ngekwa tate babe na mmeyabe, nge malebeswa ngaabulawe.’
Koga imwi moti, ‘Ha nthu angati kuna tate babe kene mmeyabe, bhatsho yamabe mungawana mundili yatjibe tjipo tjapiwa Ndzimu,
aazotjafanila kudza tate babe.’ Ndizo molandulila dama le Ndzimu tjilenje tjenyu.
Mapitipiti ndimwi! Isaya wakabe elebesa ha elebelambeli nge kwenyu eti,
‘Bathu ibaba banondilumbidza nge nlomo koga,
koga mimoyo yabo ikule nami.
Banondithigamilila suli,
ngobe banodiya milayo ye bathu se banodiya nlayo wangu.’ ”
Jesu kadanila mbunga we bathu kunli kati, “Mundibhulutane muhwisise.
Tjinongina mu nlomo we nthu ate itjo tjinonthama kuti asibe mbuyanana kwaangasanamata Ndzimu, koga tjinobhuda nge nlomo, itjetjo nditjo tjinonthama kuti atemapale.”
Ipapo badiyiwa bakazha kunli bakambhuzwa beti, “Apa unoziba kuti Bafarasi bakuthika behwa ndebo iyeyi kene?”
Kashandula eti, “Mmwe ne mmwe nti usakadzwagwa ndi Tate bangu ba kudzimu unowodzikunugwa.
Mubaletje, mapofu e batungamili. Ha bhofu likweba bhofu limwe, wose anowila mu gomba.”
Koga Pita kati kunli, “Utitjenesele tjifaniso itjetji.”
Jesu kabe eti, “Apa namwibo amuthu mukabe ne kuhwisisa zwenyu kene?
Amutobona kuti tjinongina mu nlomo tjongina mu ntumbu kudwa ipapo tjibhuda mu mbili kene?
Koga tjinodwa mu nlomo tjodwa mu moyo, ngono nditjo tjinothama kuti nthu atemapale.
Ngobe mu moyo kobhuda mikumbulo mibi, kubulaya ne bupombgwe ne kuwalilana ngubo kuzhe kwe ndobolo ne bubava ne manyepkhwa ne kutjinya bamwe mazina.
Ezwi ndizo zwinoyita nthu kasibe mbuyanana. Koga kuja nge maboko asakangugwa akutoyita nthu kuti asibe mbuyanana.”
Jesu kabhudila ku ntuthu we Tire ne Sidoni.
Ngono nkadzi we Nkanana, edwa mu ntuthu iwoyo kazha kunli elila eti, “She, Nkololo wa Dafite, mundihwile ngoni! Nkololokadzi wangu unodziyila kwazo wakasungwa nge meya mbi.”
Jesu kasidabile. Ndizo badiyiwa babe bakazha kunli bakankumbila beti, “Untate, ngobe unodwilila koga etililila.”
Kadabila eti, “Ndakatumwa ku pkhwizi dzakalashika dze Iziraela koga.”
Nkadzi iwoyo kazha kathigama mbeli kukwe kati, “She, mundibhatshe!” Arimateya
Kadabila eti, “Akuzolulwama kuti zojiwa zwe bana zwitogwe zwiposegwe mbgwa.”
Nkadzi iwoyo kati, “Ee, She, koga na idzo mbgwa dzoja mamburumburu anowa edwa mu tafuli ya tetshi wadzo.”
Ipapo Jesu kanshandula eti, “Nkadzi, kukulu kugalamoyo kuko! Yemulo iyo yashingikala.” Ngono nkololokadzi uwe kapodziwa nge tjibaka itjetjo.
Kudwa ipapo Jesu kayenda, kasupha nge gungwa gwe Galili. Wakatatha dombo kanogala pasi.
Mibunga ye bathu mikulu ikazha kunli kuzhisa banoshudza ne mapofu ne zwilema zwakasiyana siyana ne mbebebe ne bamwe banjinji, bakababiga pa makumbo awe, ngono kabapodza.
Bathu bose bakakaabala kwazo ha bebona mbebebe dzilebeleka ne zwilema zwipodziwa ne banoshudza beyenda ne mapofu epofunuka. Ngono bakakudza Ndzimu we Iziraela.
Jesu kadanila badiyiwa babe kunli kati, “Ndohwila zogwadza bathu ibaba, kwabe mazhuba matatu banami, ngono akuna tjabanoja. Anditoshaka kubapaladza bana zhala, ngobe banowokonegwa mu zila.”
Badiyiwa bakati kunli, “Tingawana ngayi zwiwunga zwakalizana kujisa mbunga we bathu ungapa mu tjilambanyika itjetji kene?”
Jesu kabhuzwa eti, “Muna zwiwunga zwingana?” Bakadabila beti, “Zwili tendeka ne hwobe shomanana tukununu.”
Kadwa mbunga we bathu kuti ugale pasi.
Ipapo katola zwiwunga seme dzili tendeka ne hwobe, kukati aboka, kazwipemula kazwipa badiyiwa, badiyiwa bakakobela mibunga ye bathu.
Bose bakaja bakaguta. Kudwa ipapo badiyiwa bakanunga mamburumburu asala bakazhadza zwitundu zwili tendeka.
Ipapo bakaja bakabe bali balume bali zwiwulu zwinna, kuzhe kwe bakadzi ne bana.
Kukati Jesu apaladza mibunga ye bathu kangina mu n'goro kayenda pejo ne ntuthu we Magadani.
Gupo le Bafarasi ne Basadusi* lakazha kuna Jesu ngon'lalila benkumbila kuti abalakidze tjilakidzo tjinodwa kudzimu.
Kabadabila eti, “Ha kuli madekwana makole ali mashaba moti, ‘Kowomuka kwakalulwama,’
kakale ha zhuba libhuda moti, ‘Nasi kowobe matutu, ngobe zhuzhugwi ishaba lina makole matema.’ Moziba kutjenesa kulingika kwe makole, koga musingazibe kutjenesa zwilakidzilo zwe misi.
Bana bangwenu babi basingagalikebgwe nge Ndzimu banoshaka tjilakidzo, koga akuna tjilakidzo tjabanowopiwa kuzhe kwe tjilakidzo tja Jona.”
Ipapo Jesu kabasiya kayenda.
Kukati badiyiwa beswika seli kwe gungwa, bakabe bakangang'wa kusenga tjiwunga.
Jesu kati kubali, “Lingani mube ne njele ngekwe mbidzo ye Bafarasi ne ye Basadusi.”
Bakalebeleka tje kwabo beti, “Akuna tjiwunga tjatazha natjo.”
Jesu kaziba tjabanoalakana ndizo kababhuzwa kati, “Bathu be kugalamoyo kutukununu ndimwi, ini mulebeleka tje kwenyu ngekwe kuti amuna tjiwunga?
Apa amuthu mukahwisisa zwenyu kene? Amutoalakana zwiwunga zwishanu zwakajiwa nge bali zwiwulu zwishanu (5000) ne kuti makazhadza seme dzili ngana?
Kene zwiwunga zwili tendeka zwakajiwa nge bali zwiwulu zwinna (4000) ne kuti makazhadza seme dzili ngana?
Ini musingahwisise kuti imi ndabe ndisingalebeleke namwi ngekwe tjiwunga? Koga ibeni nge njele ngekwe mbidzo ye Bafarasi ne Basadusi.”
Ipapo bakahwisisa kuti aatodwa kuti batjenjelele mbidzo ye tjiwunga, koga kuti babe ne njele ngekwe zwidiyo zwe Bafarasi ne Basadusi.
Kukati Jesu ezha mu ntuthu we Sizariya Filipi kabhuzwa badiyiwa babe kati, “Bathu banoti Nkololo we Nthu ndiye ani?”
Bakashandula beti, “Bamwe banoti ndi Johani we N'dubiki, bamwe banoti ndi Elija, koga bamwe banoti ndi Jeremiya kene mmwe we balebesambeli.”
Kababhuzwa kati, “Koga imwi moti ndimi ani?”
Simoni Pita kashandula eti, “Ndimwi Mesiya, Nkololo we Ndzimu unotjila.”
Jesu kadabila kati, “Wakakombolegwa Simoni Nkololo wa Jona, ngobe oku auzokuzumbunuligwa nge nthu koga wakazumbunuligwa ndi Tate bangu ba kudzimu.
Kakale ndokubudza kuti ndiwe Pita, ngono pezhugwi kwe shongwe iyeyi, ndowobaka gubungano langu, ngono masimba e lufu atowolikunda.
Ndowokupa khiyi dze bushe gwe kudzimu, tjimwe ne tjimwe tjawasunga mu shango tjowosungwa kudzimu ne tjimwe ne tjimwe tjawasunungula mu shango tjowosunungugwa kudzimu.”
Ipapo kadwa badiyiwa babe akasimisa kuti bashete wabanobudza kuti ndiye Mesiya.

Kudwa mu tjibaka itjetjo Jesu katangisa kulakidza badiyiwa babe kuti wakafanilo yenda ku Jerusalema, ngono adziyidziwe nge zwinjinji mu maboko e Bakulu* ne Bapirisiti banolaula ne Badiyi be nlayo ne kuti wakafanila kubulawa, ngono mu zhuba le butatu amusiwe.
Pita kantolela ntome, katangisa kuntjemela eti kunli, “Akungajalo She! Zwithu izwezwi azwitowo mushingikalila!”
Jesu katjebuka kati kuna Pita, “Idwa pandili Satani! Utjidzibilidzi kundili, ngobe autoalakanila zwethu zwe Ndzimu, unoalakana zwithu zwe bathu koga.”
Ipapo Jesu kati ku badiyiwa babe, “Ha mmwe enditobela, ngaazwilandule, atole tjileyanyo tjitje anditobele.
Ngobe iye unoshaka kuzwitjidza, butjilo gugwe gowonlashikila, koga iye unowolashikigwa nge butjilo gugwe nge kwangu, unowoguwana.
Kubuzilani kuti nthu athuwe shango yose koga atjinyikigwe nge meya iye. Apa nthu ungatetshanya butjilo gugwe ngeni kene?
Ngobe Nkololo we Nthu unowozha nge gudzo* la Tate babe, ana batumwa babe be kudzimu ngono ipapo unowolipa nthu mmwe ne mmwe muna tjaakathama.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, kuna bamwe bamile ipapa banowobona kuzha kwe Nkololo we nthu mu Bushe gugwe, basathu bakafa.”
Shule kwe mazhuba matathatu, Jesu katola Pita na Jakubo na Johani nnung'una wa Jakubo kabatungamila kayenda nabo pezhugwi kwe dombo lefu lefu, pasina nthu.
Ikoko kashanduka mbumbiko mbeli kwabo. Buso gugwe gukapenya se zhuba ngono zwiambalo zwizwe zwikabe zwitjena se tjedza.
Ipapo koga kukaboneka mbeli kwabo, Mushe na Elija belebeleka na Jesu.
Pita kati kuna Jesu, “She kubuyanana kuti tibe tili pano. Ha muda ndowobaka mishasha mitatu ipapa, mmwe uli wenyu, mmwe uli wa Mushe, ngono mmwe uli wa Elija.”
Kati atjalebeleka, gole linopenya likabafukidza, ngono hwi likabhuda mu gole liti, “Oyu ndiye Nkololo wangu unodika, ndoshatha kwazo nge kukwe. Munhwilile!”
Badiyiwa bakati behwa ikoku, bakathigama bakakotamisa misholo ngotetema.
Koga Jesu kazha kababhata kati, “Milikani, musitje.”
Bakati bemilidza mesho bakashaya wababona kuzhe kwa Jesu ega.
Bakati bedeluka mu dombo, Jesu kabadwa eti, “Kushete wamabudza tjamabona kudzina iye Nkololo we Nthu emusiwa mu bafi.”
Badiyiwa bakambhuzwa beti, “Ini ngono badiyi be nlayo beti Elija wakafanilo zha kutanga?”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Tjose, Elija unozha kutanga, ngono unowolulwamisa* zwithu zose.
Koga ndomubudza nditi, Elija wakazha kale koga bathu abazonziba, bakathama tjimwe ne tjimwe tjabada munli. Nkololo we Nthu na iyebo unowodziyila ali mu maboko abo.”
Ipapo badiyiwa bakahwisisa kuti wabe elebeleka nabo ngekwa Johani we N'dubiki.
Bakati beswika pa mbunga we bathu, mmwe nlume kazha kuna Jesu ngono kathigama mbeli kukwe kati,
“She, hwilani nkololo wangu ngoni. Una zwifafa, ngono unodziyila kwazo kwazo. Kanjinji unowila mu moto kakale kanjinji kawila mu vula.
Ndakanzhisa ku badiyiwa benyu koga bakakong'wa kumpodza.”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Bathu ba ngweno basingagalemoyo kakale bakakombama ndimwi, ndowobe namwi tjibaka tjingapani kene? Ndowobe ne moyonlefu nge kwenyu tjibaka tjingapani? Unzhise ngeno kundili.”
Jesu katjemela meya mbi, ngono ukabhuda munli ndizo mbisana kapola ipapo tjinyolotjo.
Ipapo badiyiwa bakazha kuna Jesu bali boga, bakambhuzwa beti, “Ini iswi takong'wa kuudusa?”

Kadabila eti, “Ngobe muna kugalamoyo kutukununu. Ndolebesa nditi, ha muna kugalamoyo kungapa shanga tukununu ye lusaba, mungati ku dombo ileli, ‘Idwa ipapa uyende apaje,’ ngono lowodwa. Akuna tjinowomukona.”
Kukati bekubungana mu Galili, Jesu kati kubali, “Nkololo we Nthu unowobhakhwa kalongwa mu maboko e bathu.
Banowombulaya, koga mu zhuba le butatu unowomusiwa.”
Ngono badiyiwa bakazhala buyendasi.
Kukati Jesu ne badiyiwa babe baswika mu Kapenaume, baamutjili be lukhetho gwe Ng'umba ye Ndzimu
Kadabila eti, “Ee, unogulipa.”
Kukati Pita engina mu ng'umba, Jesu kalebeleka naye kutanga eti, “Unobona tjini Simoni? Boshe bakulu be shango banotola lukhetho muna ani? Banogutola mu bathu babo kene mu bazhi?”
Pita kadabila eti, “Mu bazhi.”
Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Ngono kodwa kuti bathu babo bakasununguka.
Koga kuti tisibagwadzise moyo, yenda ku gungwa uposele hwuka iyo mu vula. Utole hwobe yawabhata kutanga, unowoti uzhula nlomo wayo unowowana mari akaswika kulipila imi nawe, uatole ubape.”
Nge tjibaka itjetjo badiyiwa bakazha kuna Jesu bakambhuzwa beti, “Ndiani nkulu tjose mu bushe gwe kudzimu?”
Wakadana mwana ntukununu kammisa pakati kwabo,
ndizo kati kubali, “Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, kuzhe kwe mungashanduka mukafanana ne bana batukununu, amungatongo ngina mu bushe gwe kudzimu.
Ndizo, iye unozwiyisa pasi sa iwoyu mwana, ndiye nkulu tjose mu bushe gwe kudzimu.
Na iye unoamutjila mwana ntukununu unonga iwoyu nge zina langu, unoamutjila imi.
“Koga iye unothama kuti mmwe wa ibaba batukununu banogalamoyo mundili athame jinyo, kungabhatsha kuti gwiyo gulu lisungiligwe mu ntshibha uwe atshindikigwe mu gungwa lakangina afe.
Yee mme wee! Shango yapalala ngekwe ndiko inothama bathu kuti bathame jinyo! Kwakafanila kuti ndiko izhe, Yee mme wee wapalala! Iye unowoti zwithu izwezo zwikazha ndiye!

“Ha luboko gugo kene gumbo lilo likuthamisa jinyo, ulithubule ulilashe. Koyita kuti ungine mu butjilo uli tjilema kene ushudza, pakuti ube ne maboko mabili kene makumbo mabili ukowoposegwa mu moto usingapele.
Kakale ha zhisho lilo likuthamisa jinyo, ulikonyombole ulilashe. Koyita kuti ungine mu butjilo una zhisho ling'ompela pana kuti ube ne mesho mabili ukowolashigwa mu moto usingapele.
“Mubone kuti musilingile pasi mmwe wa ibaba batukununu, ngobe ndomubudza nditi, batumwa babo be kudzimu banobona buso gwa Tate bangu ba kudzimu misi yose.
[Iye Nkololo we Nthu wakazha kuwotjidza bakalashika.]

“Mobona tjini? Ha nlume ana pkhwizi dzili zana ling'ompela (100), ngono ing'ompela yadzo ibe imila, apa aangasiye makumi ali zhanalume ana dzili zhanalume (99) mu matombo, enoshaka ing'ompela yamila kene?
Ha eiwana, ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, unoshatha ngekwa iyeyo ing'ompela kupinda dzili makumi ali zhanalume ana zhanalume dzakabe dzisamila.
Ndizo ate kuli kuda kwa Tate bangu ba kudzimu kuti mmwe wa ibaba batukununu alashike.
“Ha ikamu tjitjo tjikutjinyila, yenda kutjili utjilakidze nlandu watjo, muli babili koga. Ha tjikuhwilila unowobe watjidza ikamu tjitjo.
Koga atjisingakuhwilile dana nng'ompela kene babili, kuti ndizo dama limwe ne limwe lisimisiwe nge batendeki babili kene batatu.
Ha tjilamba kubahwilila, ubudze gubungano, koga ha tjilamba kuhwilila na ilo gubungano, utjitole se mmwe we zwitjaba kene nkhethisi.
“Ndolebesa nditi, tjimwe ne tjimwe tjamunosunga mu shango tjowosungwa kudzimu ne tjimwe ne tjimwe tjamasunungula mu shango tjowosunungugwabo kudzimu.
“Kakale, ndomubudza kuti ha babili benyu bedumilana mu shango ngekwe tjimwe tjabanokumbila, mowotjiyitigwa ndi Tate bangu ba kudzimu.
Pakubungana babili kene batatu nge zina langu, ipapo ndi pakati kwabo.”
Ipapo Pita kazha kuna Jesu kambhuzwa kati, “She, ndizwiibhatigwe ikamu tjangu kangana ha tjinditjinyila? Katendeka kwakalizana kene?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Ndokubudza nditi, kusi katendeka koga, koga kuswikila makumi ali tendeka katendeka.
Ndizo, bushe gwe kudzimu gofanana na She nkulu wakabe eshaka kuti balanda babe banonkolota banlipe.
Kati etangisa kukumbuludzana nabo, nlume wakabe enkolota talenta
Se akabe asina tjaangalipa nditjo, tetshi uwe kalaula kuti iye ne nkadzi uwe ne bana babe na kose kwaanako, batengesiwe kulipiwe ikoloto.
Nlanda iwoyo kawa nge zwidwi mbeli kwa tetshi uwe, enkumbila eti, ‘Ibeni ne moyonlefu nge kwangu. Ndowolipa tjimwe ne tjimwe.’
Tetshi uwe kanhwila ngoni, kabukusha ikoloto tjitje, kanletja kayenda.
“Kukati nlanda iwoyo ebhuda, kawana mmwe we balanda sa iye unonkolota mari e siliva ali zana ling'ompela. Kambhata nge hwulo kati kunli, ‘Lipa ikoloto tjitjo.’
Iwoyu mmwe we balanda sa iye kankumbila eti, ‘Ibe ne moyonlefu nge kwangu, ndowokulipa.’
Koga kalamba, kamilika kanomposela mu ng'umba ye busungwa kudzina elipa ikoloto tjitje.
Kukati balanda bamwe bebona tjashingikala, bakahwa zogwadza kwazo, bakayenda bakanobudza tetshi wabo.
Ipapo tetshi kadanila nlanda iwoyo kunli kan'dwa kati, ‘Nlanda wakabipa ndiwe! Ndakabukusha ikoloto tjitjo tjose, ngobe wandikumbila.
Apa wabe usakafanila kube ne ngoni ngekwe mmwe nlanda sawe sekwa ndabe ne ngoni nge kuko kene?’
Nge bushongola, tetshi uwe kan'yisa ku balindi be ng'umba ye busungwa kudzina alipe ikoloto tjitje tjose.
“Oku ndiko Tate bangu ba kudzimu kwabanowoyita mu mmwe ne mmwe wenyu kuzhe kwe mungazwiibhatigwa zwikamu zwenyu nge moyo wose.”
Kukati Jesu apedza leba zwithu izwezwi, kabhuda mu Galili, ngono kaswika kangina mu ntuthu we Judiya seli kwe Jorodani.
Mibunga mikulu ye bathu ikantobela, ngono ikoko kabapodza bakabe begwala.
Bafarasi bakazha kunli bakanlika beti “Apa kumu nlayo kuti nlume alambe nkadzi uwe enlambila tjimwe ne tjimwe kene?”
Kabashandula nge bhuzo eti, “Amuzobala kene kuti iye wakababumba mu kutangisa wakabayita we tjilume ne we tjikadzi,
kadwilila kati, ‘Ndizo ngekwa ikoko nlume unowosiya tate babe na mmeyabe kabhatana ne nkadzi uwe, ngono bubili gowobe mbili nng'ompela?’
Ndizo abatji babili batjibe mbili nng'ompela. Ndizo Ndzimu tjawabhatshanya, kushaye nthu watjithubukanya.”
Bakati kunli, “Ini ngono Mushe akati nlume ape nkadzi uwe lukwalo gwe kuthubukana mu ndobolo abentata?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Mushe wakamudumila kulamba bakadzi benyu, ngobe mimoyo yenyu ili mikukutu. Koga kwakabe kusakajalo kutanga.
Ndomubudza nditi, iye unolamba nkadzi uwe, kuzhe kwe nlandu we bupombgwe, etola mmwe nkadzi, unothama bupombgwe.”
Badiyiwa bakati kunli, “Ha kuli kuti kwakajalo pakati kwe nlume ne nkadzi uwe, kusalobola koyita.”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Ate bathu bose bangaamutjila zwidiyo izwezwi, kuzhe kwe bakazwipiwa koga.
Ngobe kuna ngomwa dzakazwagwa dzakajalo, kuna ngomwa dzakathamwa nge bathu, koga kuna ngomwa dzakazwithama ngomwa ngekwe bushe gwe kudzimu. Iye unotubula kuamutjila ikoku ngaakuamutjile.”
Ipapo bana bakazhisiwa kuna Jesu kuti ababige maboko abatembezelele. Koga badiyiwa bakatjemela ibabo banozhisa bana kunli.
Jesu kati kubali, “Letjani bana bazhe kundili, musibadzibe, ngobe bushe gwe kudzimu nge gwe bakajali.”
Kababiga maboko ngono kayenda.
Kwakashingikala kuti mmwe nlume azhe kuna Jesu ngono kati kunli, “N'diyi, ini tjakalulwama tjandakafanila kushinga kuti ndiwane butjilo gusingapele kene?”
Jesu kati kunli, “Ini undibhuzwa ngekwe tjakalulwama kene? Uyapo nng'ompela koga wakalulwama. Ha ushako ngina mu butjilo, londolodza milayo.”
Nzhuzha kabhuzwa kati, “Ipi?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Usibulaye, usithame bupombgwe, usikwibe, usipe butendeki gwe manyepkhwa,
kudza tate babo na mmeyabo, kakale ida mmwe nthu sekwa unozwida.”
Nzhuzha kadabila eti, “Kose ikoku ndakakulondolodza. Ngono nditjashetani?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Ha ushaka kululwama kwakapelela, yenda utengese kose kwaunako ukobele bashayi, ngono unowobe ne fumwa kudzimu. Ipapo uzhe unditobele.”
Kukati nzhuzha ehwa ikoku kayenda ana buyendasi, ngobe wakabe akafuma kwazo.
Ipapo Jesu kati ku badiyiwa babe, “Ndolebesa ndoti, kowosimila nthu wakafuma kungina mu bushe gwe kudzimu.
Kakale ndomubudza nditi kulelu mu kamela kuti ipinde nge buli le lunji, pakuti nfumi angine mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Badiyiwa bakati behwa ikoku bakakaabala kwazo bakambhuzwa beti, “Ndiani ngono ungatjidziwa?”
Jesu kabalinga kati kubali, “Mu bathu ikoku akutotubuka koga mu Ndzimu zwithu zose zotubuka.”
Pita kan'dabila eti, “Bonani, takasiya zose tikamutobela. Ini ngono tjatinowowana?”

Jesu kashandula eti, “Ndolebesa ndoti, mu shango tshwa, ha Nkololo we Nthu ewogala mu tjigalo tje bushe gugwe, imwi makanditobela mowogalabo mu zwigalo zwe bushe zwili gumi lina zwibili, musumikilisa njudzi dze Iziraela dzili gumi lina mbili.
Iye wakasiya ng'umba kene minda, kene bana ba tate babe, kene tate, kene mme kene bana ngekwe zina langu, unowowana kunopinda ikoku kuli zana (100), kakale unowowana butjilo gusingapele.
Koga banji be kutanga banowobe be bupelo ne be bupelo banowobe be kutanga.
“Bushe gwe kudzimu gofanana ne mweni we nnda wakabhuda mangwanana kunopa bathu nshingo kushinga mu nnda uwe we mizhambi.
Kadumana nabo kubalipa mari e zhuba ling'ompela, ndizo kabayisa ku nnda uwe we mizhambi.
Kati ebhuda mangwanana zhuba latatha kabona bamwe bathu bali mile pa matengeselo basingashinge tjimwe,
kabadwa kati, ‘Namwibo yendani munoshinga mu nnda wangu we mizhambi, ngono ndowomulipa kwakafanila.’ Ndizo bakayenda.
Kabhuda kakale masikati ne mu matewuko kayita sa ikoko.
Kukati madekwana kabhuda kanowana bamwe kakale bali mile koga. Kababhuzwa kati, ‘Ini mashwa muli mile ipapa zhuba lose musina tjamunoshinga kene?’
Bakanshandula beti, ‘Akuna watipa nshingo.’ Kati kubali, ‘Namwibo yendani munoshinga mu nnda wangu we mizhambi.’
“Kukati zhuba limila, mweni we nnda we mizhambi kati ku nshingisi uwe, ‘Dana bashingi ubape mibhayilo yabo, utange nge be bupelo kudzina kunoti kuna be kutanga.’
Bashingi bazha madekwana bakazha, ngono mmwe ne mmwe wabo kaamutjila mari e zhuba ling'ompela.
Ndizo kukati be kutanga bezha bakakumbula kuti banowoamutjila kunji. Koga mmwe ne mmwe wabo kaamutjila mari e zhuba ling'ompelabo.
Bakati beaamutjila, bakang'ong'ola ku mweni we nnda,
bakati, ‘Balume ibaba be bupelo bashinga tjibaka tjifupi, ngono wabalizanya koga naswi, iswi tashwa tilemegwa nge nshingo kakale titshwa nge zhuba.’
“Koga kadabila mmwe wabo eti, ‘Nzwalani, anditokutjebela. Apa auzodumana nami kushingila mari e zhuba ling'ompela kene?
Tola mbhayilo uwo uyende. Ndada kupa ibaba be bupelo sekwa ndapa iwe.
Apa andina fanilo ye kushinga tjandada nge mari angu kene? Ini una ndandala, imi ndishaka kuyita buthu?’ ”
Jesu kati, “Ndizo be bupelo banowobe be kutanga ne be kutanga bakabe be bupelo.”
Ngwenu Jesu kati etathila ku Jerusalema kadanila ntome badiyiwa babe bali gumi lina babili, ngono kati kubali,
“Bonani, totathila ku Jerusalema, kunowoti Nkololo we Nthu kayisiwa mbeli kwe Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo, kwabanowontilika nlandu kuti abulawe,
ngono banowonsa kuna Bezwitjaba kudadigwa ne kulobgwa nge rwabha ne kubambugwa ngono unowomusiwa mu zhuba le butatu.”
Ipapo mme be bakololo ba Zebhedi bakazha kuna Jesu ne bakololo babo, ngono bakathigama bakankumbila tjimwe.
Kababhuzwa kati, “Ini tjamunoshaka?”
Mme be bakololo ba Zebhedi bakati, “Ndokumbila kuti bakololo bangu babili ibaba bagale mmwe ku luboko gugo gwe luji, mmwe kuna gwe lumeshwe mu bushe gugo.”
Jesu kati kubali, “Amutoziba tjamunokumbila. Apa mungatubula kung'wa nkombe wandinowong'wa kene?”
Bakati kunli, “Tingatubula.”
Jesu kati kubali, “Mowong'wa nkombe wangu koga kugala ku luboko gwangu gwe luji kene ku luboko gwangu gwe lumeshwe ate kuli kwangu kukukoba, koga ngekwa ibabo bakwakabigigwa ndi Tate bangu.”
Ngono kukati bamwe badiyiwa bali gumi behwa ikoku bakagwadzilamoyo bakololo ba Zebhedi ibabo babili.
Jesu kabadanila kunli, ngono kati kubali, “Moziba kuti boshe be zwitjaba banobusa bathu babo nge kubadziyidza, ngono balauli ibabo banobalaula nge masimba.
Koga ngakusijalo mumuli. Ha kuli kuti kuna mmwe unoshaka kube nkulu pa bamwe mumuli, ngaabe nlanda wenyu,
na iyebo unoshaka kube mbeli, ngaabe iye nlanda wenyu.
Ngobe na iye Nkololo we Nthu aazozha kuwoshingigwa koga wakazha kuwoshingila ne kupa butjilo gugwe kudzitunula banji.”
Ngono kukati Jesu ne badiyiwa babe bebhuda mu Jeriko mbunga we bathu nkulu ukabatobela,
mapofu e balume babili bakabe bali gele pa hwunde ye zila, ngono bakati behwa kuti Jesu unopinda ipapo bakamimila beti, “Nkololo wa Dafite utihwile ngoni!”
Mbunga we bathu ukabatjemela ukabadwa kuti banyalale, koga bakamimila kwazo beti “She mutihwile ngoni, Nkololo wa Dafite!”
Jesu kama kabadana kababhuzwa kati, “Moshaka kuti ndimuyitileni?”
Bakashandula beti, “She, toshaka kuti mesho edu azhuke.”
Jesu kabahwila zogwadza, ngono kabhata mesho abo. Tjinyolotjo bakapofunuka, ngono bakantobela.
Bakati babepejo ngoswika ku Jerusalema, babe pa nzi we Bhetifage ku Dombo le Mitoba, Jesu katuma badiyiwa babili
eti kubali “Yendani mungine mu nzi iwoyu wamakalingisana nawo, ngono mowoti muswika koga mowowana donki yakasungiligwa ina donkana yayo. Muasunungule muazhise kundili.
Ha mmwe angamudwa tjimwe, mun'dwe muti, ‘She banoashaka,’ ngono iye unowoasunungula tjinyolotjo.”
Ikoku kwakashingikala kuti kushingikale matama e nlebesambeli anoti,
“Budza Nkololokadzi we Ziyoni* uti,
‘Bona, She nkulu uwo unozha kukuli,
nge kuzwiyisa pasi akatatha donki,
ali pezhugwi kwe donkana, mwana we donki.’ ”
Badiyiwa bakayenda bakashinga sekwa badwiwa ndi Jesu.
Bakazhisa donki ne donkana, bakawala zwiambalo zwabo pezhugwi kwawo, ngono Jesu kaitatha.
Mbunga we bathu nkulu kwazo ukawala zwiambalo zwabo mu zila, bamwe bakakwaula thabi dze miti bedziwala mu zila.
Mibunga ye bathu yakabe iyenda mbeli ne yakabe ili shule ikapululudza iti, “Hosana
Jesu kati engina mu Jerusalema, nzi wose ukadzongeka ukabhuzwa uti, “Ndiani iwoyu?”
Mibunga ikadabila iti, “Oyu ndi Jesu, nlebesambeli, unodwa ku Nazareta mu Galili.”
Jesu kangina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu katatila kuzhe bose bakabe betengesa ipapo. Kapitula tafuli dze bakabe betenganya mari, kakale kapitula zwigalo zwe bakabe betengesa ngurukuku.
Kati kubali, “Kwakakwagwa kukayi, ‘Ng'umba yangu inowodang'wa ng'umba ye ntembezelo,’ koga imwi moithama guwu le mbava!”
Mapofu ne zwilema bakazha kunli ku Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono kabapodza.
Koga Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo bakagwadza moyo bebona zwithu zwinotjenamisa zwaakathama ne bana bemimila mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu beti, “Hosana ku Nkololo wa Dafite.”
Bakambhuzwa beti, “Apa unohwa kuti bana ibaba bakatini kene?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Ee, apa amuthu mukabala panoti, ‘Makathama milomo ye zwitole ne ngawana kuleba gudzo le zhele.’ ”
Ngono kasiya bathu kabhuda mu nzi kayenda ku Bhetani kwaakanolalako.
Ngono kukati kuli mangwanana Jesu, ebgwilila ku Jerusalema, kabe ana zhala,
kabona nti we ntjelo pa zila kayenda kuuli koga kawana kusina tjimwe kuzhe kwe mazhani woga. Ipapo kati kuuli, “Kusitjabe ne mitjelo inowobhuda mukuli kakale.” Tjinyolotjo nti ukawoma.
Badiyiwa bakati bebona ikoku bakakaabala kwazo. Ngono bakabhuzwa beti, “Nti iwoyo we ntjelo wawoma tjinyolotjo zwingapa tjini?”

Jesu kashandula eti, “Ndolebesa ndoti, ha muna kugalamoyo, musingatongo dudumwa, amutowoyita tjayitiwa mu nti iwoyu we mpaya koga, koga mungati ne ku dombo ileli, ‘Simuka uwile mu gungwa,’ ngono kowoshingikala.
Ha mugalamoyo tjimwe ne tjimwe tjamunokumbila mu mitembezelo mowotjiwana.”
Jesu kangina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono kukati atjadiya, Bapirisiti bakulu ne bakulu* be Bajuta bakazha kunli bakati, “Zwithu izwezwi unozwishinga nge simba lipi? Ndiani wakakupa simba ileli?”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Ndowomubhuzwabo bhuzo ing'ompela. Ha mungandidabila, ndowomubudza kuti simba landinoshingisa ndilipi.
Kudubika kwa Johani kwakadwa ngayi? Kwakadwa kudzimu kene mu bathu?”
