Bakalebeleka tje kwabo beti, “Ha tingati, ‘Kwakadwa kudzimu,’ unowobhuzwa eti, ‘Ini ngono musakan'galamoyo?’
Koga ha tingati, ‘Kwakadwa mu bathu,’ totja mbunga we bathu, ngobe banogalamoyo bose kuti Johani wakabe ali nlebesambeli.”
Ndizo bakashandula Jesu beti, “Atitoziba.”
Ipapo kati kubali, “Namibo andingamubudze kuti zwithu izwezwi ndozwiyita nge simba lipi.
“Mobona tjini? Kwakabe kuna mmwe nlume ana bakololo babili. Kayenda kuna we kutanga kati kunli, ‘Nkololo wangu, en'da unoshinga mu nnda we mizhambi nasi.’
Nkololo uwe kan'dabila kati, ‘Anditoyenda.’ Koga shule kashandusa nkumbulo kayenda.
Ipapo tate babe bakayenda kuna we bubili bakaleba sa ikoko. Kashandula kati, ‘Ndowoyenda, tate,’ koga kasiyende.”
Jesu kababhuzwa kati “Ndiupi wa ibaba babili wakashinga kuda kwa tate babe?”
Bakashandula beti, “We kutanga.”
Jesu kati kubali, “Ndolebesa ndoti, bakhethisi ne fukula banongina mbeli kwenyu mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.
Johani wakazha kumuli kumulakidza zila ye ndulamo, koga mukasingalemoyo, ngono bakhethisi ne fukula bakan'galamoyo. Koga kukati ne mabona, mukasishanduke kuti mungalemoyo.
“Hwililani tjimwe tjifaniso, kwakatongobe kuna nthu ali mweni we nzi akalima nnda we mizhambi. Wakaushoshela, katsha gomba linokobolegwa zhambi pakati kwawo, kabaka thungamakole
Kwakati tjibaka tje mitjelo tjisedzela katuma balanda babe ku bahiri* be nnda kunotola gobe lile le mitjelo.
Bahiri be nnda bakabhata balanda babe bakaloba mmwe, bakabulaya mmwe, ngono bakakikithidza mmwe nge mabgwe.
Ngono mweni we nnda kapapha katumila balanda bamwe banji pana be kutanga, ngono bahiri be nnda bakabayita sa ikoko kakale.
Kudwapo katumila nkololo uwe kubali eti, ‘Banowoteta nkololo wangu.’
Koga kukati bahiri be nnda bebona nkololo uwe bakan'langana beti, ‘Oyu ndiye n'gali thaka, izhani, ngatimbulayeni titole thaka iye.’
Ndizo bakantola bakanlashila kuzhe kwe nnda we mizhambi bakambulaya.
“Ndizo ipapo mweni we nnda we mizhambi ha ezha unowoshingani ku bahiri ibabo kene?”
Bakashandula beti, “Unowolobesa ibaba balume bakabipa kunogwadza, kayisa nnda mu maboko e bahiri bapoga banowompa gobe lile bavuna.”
Jesu kati kubali, “Apa amuthu mukatongo bala hwalo dze Ndzimu dzinoti,
‘Bgwe ilo lakalambiwa nge babaki
lakabe bgwe linotambunudza mbako;
ikoku kwakayitiwa ndi She,
ngono kotjenamisa mu mesho edu?’
“Ndizo ndomubudza nditi, bushe gwe Ndzimu gowotogwa mumuli gokapiwa itjaba tjinodusa mitjelo yago.
Iye unowila pezhugwi kwe bgwe ileli unowovunikana kasala ali zwitibhutibhu, koga ha liwila nthu lowompkhwanya.”
Kukati Bapirisiti bakulu ne Bafarasi behwa zwifaniso zwa Jesu bakaziba kuti unolebeleka nge kwabo.
Bakashaka zila ye kunsunga, koga bakabe betja mbunga we bathu, ngobe bathu bakabe beti nlebesambeli.
Jesu kalebeleka nabo ne zwifaniso kakale eti,
“Bushe gwe kudzimu gofanana na she nkulu wakalulwamisila nkololo uwe ndobolo.
Ngono katuma balanda babe kunodana bakabe bakokiwa ku nzano we ndobolo, koga bakalamba zha.

Ipapo katuma bamwe balanda kati, ‘Kabudzeni bakakokiwa kuti, ndalulwamisa zojiwa zwangu, mangabe angu ne makondogwana angu akakola abhayiwa ne tjimwe ne tjimwe tjalulwama. Izhani ku nzano we ndobolo!’
Koga bakanshayila hanya bakayenda, mmwe ku nnda uwe, mmwe ku mishingo iye,
bakatola balanda babe bakababhata nge kunobhatisa shoni bakababulaya.
She nkulu kagwadzamoyo, katuma babhayani babe bakalobesa babulayi ibabo kakale kapisa nzi wabo.
Ndizo kati ku balanda babe, ‘Nzano we ndobolo walulwamisiwa, koga ibabo bandakakoka abazobe bakafanila kuzha.
Yendani mu dzizila mukoke mmwe ne mmwe wamunowobona azhe ku nzano.’
Ndizo balanda ibabo bakabhuda bakayenda mu dzizila bakakubunganya bathu bose babanowana, babi ne balulwami, ngono ng'umba ye ndobolo ikazhala bakokiwa.
“Koga she nkulu kati engina kunobona bezi, kabona mmwe nlume ipapo wakabe asakaambala tjiambalo tje ndobolo.
Kambhuzwa kati, ‘Nkhwinya, wangina tjini ipapa usina tjiambalo tje ndobolo?’ Nlume iwoyo kasheta tjaangaleba.
Ipapo she nkulu kadwa balanda babe kati, ‘Munsunge maboko ne makumbo munlashile kuzhe mu zhalima. Ikoko kowobe ne kulila ne kulobanya meno nge kugwadziwa kukulu.’
Ndizo wali, banjinji banodang'wa, koga bashomanana banoshalugwa.”
Ipapo Bafarasi bakabhuda bakanolangana kuti bangambhatshila tjini nge matama awe.
Bakatuma badiyiwa babo ne batobeli ba Herode kunli beti, “N'diyi, toziba kuti muna malebeswa ne kuti modiya zila ye Ndzimu nge malebeswa. Amuna hanya kuti nthu ndiani ngobe amutolinga mamo e bathu.
Mutibudze ngono, mobona tjini? Apa kumu nlayo kene, kuti tilipe lukhetho kuna Kaisara She nkulu we Roma, kene?”
Koga Jesu, ngoziba mikumbulo yabo yakabipa, kati kubali, “Batjengedzi ndimwi, ini mundilalila?
Mundilakidze mari anoshingisiwa kulipa lukhetho.”
Bakanzhisila mari e zhuba ling'ompela,
ngono Jesu kati kubali, “Tjifano tjaani itjetji ne zina nge laani ileli?”
Bakashandula beti, “Nge zwa Kaisara.”
Ipapo Jesu kati kubali, “Ipani Kaisara zwithu zwizwe, ngono mupe Ndzimu zwawo.”
Bakati behwa ikoku bakatjenama. Ndizo bakansiya bakayenda.
Mu zhuba ilelo zwalo Basadusi, ibo banoti akuna kumuka kwe bafi, bakazha kunli nge bhuzo.
Bakati kunli, “N'diyi, Mushe wakati, ‘Ha nlume efa asina bana, nnung'una uwe wakafanila agale thaka nkulu uwe, kuti anzwalile bana.’
Ngwenu kwakabe kuna thobeledzani pakati kwedu dze balisana dzili kutendeka. We kutanga kalobola, ngono kafa. Wakabe asina bana kasiyila nkadzi uwe nnung'una uwe.
Kukayitika sa ikoko mu nnung'una uwe we bubili ne we butatu kudzina kunoti kuna we butendeka.
Gwe bupelo, nkadzi na iye kafa.
Ngwenu ipapo mu kumuka kwe bafi unowobe nkadzi waani muna bali kutendeka ngoti bose bakabe banlobola?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Makadzimila, ngobe amutoziba hwalo dze Ndzimu kene simba le Ndzimu.
Mu kumuka kwe bafi, bathu abatolobola kene kuli kulobodziwa. Koga banonga batumwa be kudzimu.
Ngekwe kumuka kwe bafi, apa amuzobala tjakalebgwa kumuli nge Ndzimu uti,
‘Apa ndimi Ndzimu wa Abhurahama, ndimi Ndzimu wa Isaki, ndimi Ndzimu wa Jakubo kene?’ Ate Ndzimu we bafi koga Ndzimu we batjili.”
Kukati mibunga ye bathu ihwa ikoku ikakaabadziwa nge kudiya kukwe.
Bafarasi bakati behwa kuti Jesu wanyaladza Basadusi bakakubungana.
Mmwe wabo, wakabe ali nthu wakazwidiya milayo, kambhuzwa bhuzo enlika, kati,
“N'diyi, ndiupi nlayo nkulu pa mimwe?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “ ‘Ida She Ndzimu uwo nge moyo uwo wose nenge meya iyo yose nenge nkumbulo uwo wose.’
Oyu ndiwo nlayo nkulu tjose kakale we kutanga.
Ne we bubili unonga iwo, unoti, ‘Ida mmwe nthu sekwa unozwida.’
Nlayo wose ne balebesambeli bose bakateyegwa mu milayo iyeyi mibili.”
Bafarasi bakati batjakakubungana, Jesu kababhuzwa kati,
“Mokumbula tjini ngekwa Mesiya? Nkololo waani?”
Bakadabila beti, “Nkololo wa Dafite.”
Kati kubali, “Ngono kwakazha tjini kuti Dafite paakabe ali mu Meya an'dane eti She? Dafite wakati,
‘She bakati kuna She wangu,
gala ku luboko gwangu gwe luji
kudzina ndibiga zwita zwizo pasi kwe makumbo awo.’
“Ha Dafite en'dana eti ‘She,’ apa ungabe nkololo uwe tjini kene?”
Akuna wakatubula kun'dabila, ngono kudwa mu zhuba ilelo tjose akuna wakambhuzwa dzimwe bhuzo.
Ipapo Jesu kalebeleka ne mibunga ye bathu ne badiyiwa babe eti,
“Badiyi be nlayo ne Bafarasi bagele mu tjigalo tja Mushe.
Ndizo itani kuti mulondolodze tjimwe ne tjimwe tjabanomubudza. Koga musitongo shinga zwabanoshinga, ngobe abatoshinga zwabanoleba.
Banosunga mitolo mikukutu inolema beibiga mu mathudzi e bathu, koga ibo tjekwabo basingake bakainyanyula.
Zose zwabanoyita nge zwe mashungwa ndibong'we. Banothama zwitshwegu zwabo zwe mitembezelo
Banoda magalo a pezhugwi mu mizano ne magalo mabuya mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo.
Banoda kulezwiwa ku matengeselo ne kudang'wa nge bathu kuyi, ‘N'diyi.’
Koga imwi amuzofanila dang'wa kuyi ‘N'diyi,’ ngobe muna N'diyi ali ung'ompela koga kakale imwi mose mu zwikamu.
Kakale musitongo dana mmwe muti tate mu shango, ngobe muna tate bang'ompela ba kudzimu.
Kene musitongo dang'wa kuyi ‘Ntungamili,’ ngobe muna ntungamili ng'ompela koga Mesiya
Nkulu tjose pakati kwenyu wakafanila kube nlanda wenyu.
Iye unozwikudza unowoyisiwa pasi na iye unozwiyisa pasi unowokudziwa.

“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi badiyi be nlayo ne Bafarasi, batjengedzi ndimwi! Mozhalilila bathu bushe gwe kudzimu. Imwi nge kwenyu amutongina mu bushe gwe Ndzimu kakale amutoletja banoshaka ngina bakangina.

“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi badiyi be nlayo ne Bafarasi, batjengedzi ndimwi! Moyenda shango yose ne gungwa kushandulila nthu nng'ompela mu bugalimoyo gwe Tjijuta, koga kati ashanduka mukan'yita mwana we mbipo kabili kupinda sekwa muli iko.
“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi mapofu e batungamili! Moti, ‘Ha mmwe etuna nge Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, akutoti tjimwe, koga ha mmwe etuna nge golide le Ng'umba ye Ndzimu wasungwa ngotuna kukwe.’
Mapofu e zwilengwe ndimwi! Tjikulu nditjipi, i golide kene Ng'umba ye Ndzimu inoyita kuti golide liyengemale?
Kakale moti, ‘Ha mmwe etuna nge tjibeso, akutoti tjimwe, koga ha mmwe etuna nge tjipo tjipezhugwi kwatjo, wasungwa ngotuna kukwe.’
Mapofu e bathu ndimwi! Tjikulu nditjipi, tjipo kene tjibeso tjinoyita tjipo kuti tjiyengemale?
Ndizo iye unotuna nge tjibeso unotuna nditjo na iko kose kumutjili;
na iye unotuna nge Ng'umba ye Ndzimu unotuna ndiyo, na iye unogala muili.
Na iyebo unotuna nge kudzimu unotuna nge tjigalo tje bushe gwe Ndzimu na iye ugele pezhugwi kwatjo.

“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi badiyi be nlayo ne Bafarasi, batjengedzi ndimwi, mopa tjebugumi* tje matenjana enyu e nvavani ne dili* ne kumini.* Koga moletjedza zwikulu kwazo zwe nlayo: kusumikilisa kwakalulwama ne mahwilo zogwadza ne kugalamoyo. Mobe muyita izwezwi koga musingalashe zwimwe.
Mapofu e batungamili ndimwi! Mowungunula nyunyu koga mumidza kamela.
“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi badiyi be nlayo ne Bafarasi, batjengedzi ndimwi! Mosuka kuzhe kwe nkombe ne ndilo koga mukati dzezhele kusazwidziba ne bugovu.
Nfarasi we bhofu ndiwe! Suka mukati kwe nkombe ne ndilo kutanga, ndizo na kuzhe kwayo kowobe kubuyananabo.

“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi badiyi be nlayo ne Bafarasi, batjengedzi ndimwi! Mofanana ne zwikumbu zwakadzulugwa nge butjena, zwakanaka kuzhe koga mukati zwili zhele mafupa e bathu bakafa ne zwakatemapala.
Sa ikoko, kuzhe molingika ku bathu muli balulwami, koga mukati muzhele butjengedzi ne jinyo.
“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi badiyi be nlayo ne Bafarasi, batjengedzi ndimwi! Mobakilila zwikumbu zwe balebesambeli mukanakisa zwikumbu zwe balulwami,
muti, ‘Hatingabe takatjila mu misi ya bobatategulu bedu, tingabe tisakabhatana nabo mu nshingo we kutebula malopa e balebesambeli.’
Ndizo mozwileba kuti mu bana be bathu bakabulaya balebesambeli.
Zhadzisani tjilizanyo tje jinyo la bobatategulu benyu.
Nyoka ne nyokana ndimwi! Apa mowotizha tjini kusumikilisigwa kulashigwa mu moto usingadzime?
Ndizo ndomutumila balebesambeli ne balume bakatjenjela ne badiyi be nlayo. Bamwe babo mowobabulaya mukababambula, bamwe mubaloba mu ng'umba dzenyu dze mitembezelo mukabadziyidza nzi ne nzi.

Ndizo kowobe pezhugwi kwenyu malopa e balulwami akatebugwa mu shango, kutangisa nge malopa a Abele usina nlandu kunoti mu malopa a Zakariya nkololo wa Bharakiya wamakabulayila pakati kwe Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ne tjibeso.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, kose ikoku kowozha pezhugwi kwe bathu bangwenu.

“Jerusalema, Jerusalema wee! Iwe unobulaya balebesambeli ukakikithidza nge mabgwe ibabo batumwa kukuli. Ndikangana ndiyemula kukubunganya bana babo se hwuku ibubatila hwukwana dzayo nge mapapiro ayo, koga ulamba.
Bona, ng'umba iyo yafupatigwa kakale yabe dongo.
Ndizoke ndokubudza nditi, autowondibona kakale kuswikila uti, ‘Wakakombolegwa iye unozha nge zina la She.’ ”
Jesu kabhuda mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono kati atjayenda badiyiwa babe bakanlakidza bakika kwe Ng'umba ye Ndzimu.
Kabadabila eti, “Mobona kose ikoku kene? Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, akuna bgwe ling'ompela linowosala lakatiliyana ne limwe, lisingawoligigwa pasi.”

Kukati Jesu atjigele pezhugwi kwe Dombo le Mitoba, badiyiwa babe bakazha kunli bali boga, ngono bakambhuzwa bakati, “Mutibudze, zwithu izwezwi zowoshingikala lini ne tjilakidzo tje kuzha kwenyu ne tje kupela kwe shango tjowobeni?”
Jesu kabashandula eti, “Ibeni ne njele kuti mmwe asitongo mudzimidza.
Banji banowozha nge zina langu beti, ‘Ndimi Mesiya,’ ngono banowodzimidza banji.
Mowohwa ngekwe ngwa kose ne makwayi e ngwa, koga itani kuti musipaluke moyo. Zwithu izwezwi zwakajalo zwakafanila shingikala, koga bupelo gutjawozha.
Itjaba tjowomukila itjaba ne bushe gukamukila bushe. Kowobe yapo bhamba ne kutengenyeka kwe shango mu magalo akasiyana.
Zose izwezwi zofanana ne kutangisa kwe zwibhayo zwe thumbgwa.
“Ipapo mowosungisiwa kunohwisiwa zogwadza mukabulawa ne zwitjaba zose zowomubenga ngekwe zina langu.
Mu tjibaka itjetjo banjinji banowowa mu kugalamoyo kakale banowongana kakale bakabengana.
Ne balebesambeli be manyepkhwa banjinji banowobe yapo bakadzimidza bathu banji.
Nge kuwanda kwe matjinyo, ludo gwe banji gowotothola.
Koga iye unowodzikitadza kunoti ku bupelo ndiye unowotjidziwa.
Ngono ndebo mbuya iyeyi ye bushe inowosumikigwa mu shango yose, guli butendeki mu zwitjaba dzose, ndizo ipapo bupelo gowozha.
“Ndizo mowoti mubona kuli mile mu magalo akayengemala ‘Zhithu le mbipo linopaladza,’ lakalebgwa nge kwalo ndi Daniyele nlebesambeli (unobala ngaahwisise),
ipapo bamu Judiya ngabatizhile ku matombo.
Upezhugwi kwe ng'umba ngaasideluke kunotola zwithu zwimu ng'umba iye.
Ngono na iye umu nnda ngaasibgwilile kunotola ngubo iye.
Yee mme wee! Kowobangalala seni kumuli imwi bakadzi bakazwisenga ne banomwisa mu misi iyeyo.
Tembezelani kuti kutizha kwenyu kusibe mu mbaba kene mu zhuba le Sabata;
ngobe ipapo kowobe ne kudziyidziwa kukulu kusathu kukabe yapo kudwa mu kutangisa kwe shango kuwoti ngwenu, kakale kusingatjawobe yapo.
Ha mazhuba iyawo akabe asatapudziwa, kwabe kusina unowotjidziwa. Koga ngekwe bashalugwa, mazhuba iyawo anowotapudziwa.
“Mu misi iyeyo ha mmwe eti kumuli, ‘Bonani woyu Mesiya kene eti, bonani hwouje,’ musitongo duma ikoko.
Bomesiya be manyepkhwa ne balebesambeli be manyepkhwa banowobe yapo bakayita zwilakidzo zwikulu ne matjenamiso makulu kudzimidza na ibo bashalugwa ha kwabe kutubuka.
Bonani, ndamubudza tjibaka tjitjiyapo.
“Ndizo ha beti kumuli, ‘Bonani umu tjilambanyika,’ musibhudileko. Kene beti, ‘Bonani, umukati kwe ng'umba,’ musitongo duma,
ngobe se lupenyo gwe vula gudwa ku bhezhuba gukaboneka ku golombedzo, kowojalo ne kuzha kwe Nkololo we Nthu.
“Pana itumbu magola anokubunganapo.
“Koga tjinyolotjo shule kwe budziyili gwe mazhuba iyawo, zhuba lowoti zwii ne mwedzi autowopa tjedza tjawo. Nyenyedzi dzowowila pasi na zose zwe zhuzhugwi zowotengenyeka.
Mu misi iyeyo tjilakidzo tje Nkololo we Nthu tjowoboneka zhuzhugwi, ndizo njudzi dzose dze shango dzowolila. Dzowobona Nkololo we Nthu ezha ali mu makole ana simba ne gudzo gulu.
Unowotuma batumwa babe be kudzimu kuti badane ne nsindo nkulu we lunyanga, ngono banowokubunganya bashalugwa babe kudwa mu mbizho nna dze shango ne kudwa ku bupelo gwe kudzimu kunoti mu gumwe bupelo.
“Muzwidiye tjidiyo tje mpaya, tjinyolotjo ha thabi dzawo dzibe nyolo dzidusa mazhani, moziba kuti tjilimo tji pejo.
Ndizo sa ikoko, ha mubona zwithu zose izwezwi muzibe kuti wabe pejo, pa nkoba.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, zwithu izwezwi zowoshingikala imwi bathu bangwenu musathu mapinda.
Zhuzhugwi ne pasi zowopinda koga matama angu anowosala.
“Akuna unoziba ngekwe zhuba ilelo kene tjibaka itjetjo, kene bali ibo batumwa be kudzimu, kene iye Nkololo
Sekwa kwakabe kuli iko mu misi ya Nowa, kowobe sa ikoko pa kuzha kwe Nkololo we Nthu.
Ngobe mu misi iyeyo, nkubila usathu ukabe yapo bathu bakabe beja, beng'wa, belobola, belobodza, kunoti mu zhuba Nowa laakangina mu n'goro.
Bakabe basingazibe tjimwe kudzina nkubila uzha ubatola bose. Ndiko sekwa kunowobe iko pa kuzha kwe Nkololo we Nthu.
Balume babili banowobe bali mu nnda, nng'ompela unowotogwa mmwe kasiyiwa.
Bakadzi babili banowobe bekwiya pa gwiyo, nng'ompela unowotogwa mmwe kasiyiwa.
“Ndizo galani makalindila, ngobe amutoziba kuti She wenyu unowozha mu zhuba lipi.
Ngono hwisisani hwoku, ha mweni we ng'umba akabe aziba kuti mbava inowozha nge tjibaka tjipi tje busiku, unobe akalinda kasiletje ng'umba iye ipkhwanyiwa.
Ndizo namwibo galani makazwilulwamisa, ngobe Nkololo we Nthu unowozha nge tjibaka tjamusakakumbula.
“Ndiupi ngono nlanda unogagwabgwe, wakatjenjela unowoti tetshi kambiga kabe nlingilili we balanda mu nsha uwe kuti abape zojiwa zwabo nge tjibaka tjakalingisana?
Wakakombolegwa nlanda iwoyo ungati tetshi uwe ebuya kawana eshinga sa ikoko.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, unowompa masimba mu zwithu zose zwaanazo.
Koga ha nlanda iwoyu ali mbi ebe ezwidwa eti, ‘Tetshi wangu wanonoka,’
ebe etangisa kuloba balanda bamwe, eja eng'wa ne zwidakwa,
tetshi wa iwoyo nlanda unowobuya mu zhuba laasakankumbula nenge tjibaka tjaasingazibe.
Unowonloba kunogwadza kan'gadza ne batjengedzi. Ikoko kowobe yapo kulila ne kulobanya meno nge kugwadziwa kukulu.
“Ndizo bushe gwe kudzimu gofanana ne baanadi bali gumi bakatola mavone abo bakabhuda kunoshanganidza nkwasha.
Bashanu mubali bakabe bali zwilengwe, koga bashanu bakatjenjela.
Bezwilengwe bakati betola abo mavone bakasisenge mafuta.
Bakatjenjela bakasenga mavone abo kose ne mafuta ali mu zwikuyu.
Nkwasha wakanonoka kuzha, ndizo bose bakatshumwaila bakayizela.
“Kwakati pakati kwe busiku mima ikahwika iti, ‘Bonani nkwasha hwoyu! Bhudani munshanganidze!’
Ipapo baanadi ibabo bose bakamuka bakalulwamisa mavone abo.
Bezwilengwe bakati kuna bakatjenjela, ‘Mutipenibo mafuta enyu, ngobe mavone edu anodzima.’
Bakatjenjela bakadabila beti, ‘Aa, aangalizane iswi kose namwi. Mungayenda ku batengesi mukazwitengegwa enyu.’
Bakati batjimu zila benotenga mafuta, nkwasha kaswika. Baanadi bakabe bakazwilulwamisa bakangina naye mu nzano we ndobolo, nkoba ukazhaligwa.
“Shule kwe tjibaka bezwilengwe bakabuya bakati, ‘She! She! Mutizhulile!’
She kashandula eti, ‘Ndolebesa ndoti, anditomuziba.’ ”
Ndizo Jesu kati, “Galani makalindila, ngobe amutoziba nsi ne tjibaka.
“Kakale, bushe gwe kudzimu gowofanana ne nthu unoyenda gwendo, kadana balanda babe kabakobanya thundu iye kuitjengeta.
Wakapa mmwe talenta dzili shanu, mmwe kampa dzili mbili, mmwe kampa ili ing'ompela, mmwe ne mmwe epiwa kwakalizana kutubula kukwe. Ipapo kayenda gwendo gugwe.
Ngono tjinyolotjo, wakapiwa talenta dzili shanu kayenda kanoshaba ndidzo, dzikambuzila dzimwe talenta dzili shanu.
Sa ikoko na iyebo una talenta mbili kawana mbili kwadzo.
Koga iye wakaamutjila talenta ing'ompela kayenda kanotsha gomba kasumbika mari a tetshi uwe mulili.
“Shule kwe tjibaka tjilefu tetshi we balanda ibabo kabuya kuwolulwamisa zwikoloto nabo.
Nlume wakabe apiwa talenta shanu kazhisa dzimwe shanu eti, ‘Tetshi, makandipa talenta dzili shanu. Bonani, ndakashaba abuyigwa nge dzimwe shanu.’

Tetshi uwe kadabila eti, ‘Wakayita zubuyanana, u nlanda wakalulwama kakale unogalikabgwe! Wakabe ne kugagwabgwe mu zwithu zwitukununu; ndowokubiga ntjengeti we zwithu zwikulu. Izha ushathe na tetshi uwo.’
“Nlume una talenta dzili mbili na iyebo kazha kati, ‘Tetshi, makandipa talenta mbili; bonani ndakashaba abuyigwa nge dzili mbili kakale.’

Tetshi uwe kadabila eti, ‘Wakayita zwibuyanana, u nlanda wakalulwama kakale unogalikabgwe! Wakabe ne kugalikabgwe mu zwithu zwishomanana; ndowokubiga ntjengeti we zwithu zwangu zwinjinji. Izha ushathe na tetshi uwo!’
“Ipapo nlume wakabe apiwa talenta ing'ompela kazha, ngono kati kunli, ‘Tetshi, ndoziba kuti mu nthu nkukutu, movuna pamusakadzwala, mukawolela pamusakawulusa.
Ndakabe nditja, ndizo ayenda anosumbika talenta yenyu mu mavu. Bonani, kwenyu hwoku.’
“Tetshi uwe kadabila eti, ‘Nlanda mbi we simbe ndiwe! Wakabe uzibazo kuti ndovuna pandisakadzwala, awolela pandisakawulusila?
Ndizo unobe wakayisa mari angu ku babiganyi be mari, ndobe ndakati ndibuya aamutjila kwangu kwazwala.
Muntolele talenta iye muipe una talenta dzili gumi.
Ngobe iye una tjaanatjo unowopaphidzigwa, ndizo unowobe ne kunjinji nge buzhalo. Koga iye usina ne tjitukununu tjaanatjo unowotjitolegwa.
Mumposele kuzhe mu zhalima, nlanda iwoyu usina nshingo; ikoko kowobe yapo kulila ne kulobanya meno.’
“Kowoti Nkololo we Nthu ezha nge gudzo lile ne batumwa be kudzimu bose ba naye, unowogala mu tjigalo tjitje tje bushe tjinokudziwa.
Njudzi dzose dzowokubunganyigwa mbeli kukwe, ngono unowothubukanya bathu se nlisi ethewula pkhwizi mu mbudzi.
Unowoyisa pkhwizi ku luboko gwe luji, kayisa mbudzi kuna gwe lumeshwe.
Ipapo She nkulu unowoti kuna ba ku luji, ‘Izhani imwi bakakombolegwa ndi Tate bangu; amutjilani bushe gwamakabiganyidzigwa kudwa mu kuteyiwa kwe shango;
ngobe ndakati ndina zhala mukandipa zojiwa, ndikati ndina nyota mukandipa tjinong'wiwa, ndikati ndili mwezi mukandiamutjila.
Ndakati ndiyenda mbujo mukandiambadza, ndikati ndigwala mukandishola, ndikati ndili mu ng'umba ye busungwa mukandishola.’
“Ipapo balulwami banowondabila beti, ‘She, iswi takamubona lini muna zhala tikamupa zojiwa, kene muna nyota tikamupa tjinong'wiwa?
Takamubona lini muli mwezi tikamuamutjila, kene musina zwiambalo tikamuambadza kene?
Takamubona lini mugwala, kene muli mu ng'umba ye busungwa tikamushola?’
She nkulu banowobashandula beti, ‘Ndolebesa nditi, itjo tjamakayitila mmwe ntukununu wa izwezwi zwikamu zwangu makatjiyitila imi.’
“Ipapo unowoti kuna ba ku lumeshwe gugwe, ‘Idwani pandili imwi makalongwa bhiso, muyende ku moto usingadzimwe wakabiganyidzigwa Nvanganyi ne batumwa babe.
Ndakati ndina zhala mukasindipe zojiwa, ndikati ndina nyota mukasindipe tjinong'wiwa.
Ndakati ndili mwezi mukasindiamutjile. Ndakati ndisina zwiambalo mukasindimbadze, ndikati ndigwala kakale ndili mu ng'umba ye busungwa mukasindishole.’
“Na ibabo banowobhuzwa beti, ‘She, takamubona lini muna zhala kene muna nyota kene muli mwezi kene musina zwiambalo kene mugwala kene muli mu ng'umba ye busungwa, koga tikasimubhatshe?’
Unowoshandula eti, ‘Ndolebesa ndoti, tjamusakayitila mmwe wa ibaba batukununu, amuzotjiyitila imi.’
Ipapo banowoyenda ku shamu isingapele, koga balulwami ku butjilo gusingapele.”
Jesu kati aleba zwithu zose izwezwi, kadwa badiyiwa babe kati,
“Sekwa munoziba kuti Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi* wasaligwa nge mazhuba mabili, ngono Nkololo we Nthu unowolongwa mu maboko a ibabo banowombambula.”
Ipapo Bapirisiti bakulu ne bakulu be Bajuta bakakubungana mu magalo e Ntungamili we Bapirisiti wakabe edang'wa Kaifasi,
ngono bakalangana kusunga Jesu nge kwakasumbikala kuti bambulaye.
Koga bakati, “Kusi pakati kwe nzano, ngobe kungamuka zhoba pakati kwe bathu.”
Jesu kati ali mu Bhetani mu ng'umba ya Simoni wakatongo gwala mapele,
mmwe nkadzi kazha kunli ana tjilongo tjakathamiwa nge bgwe linoyi alabhasita* tjina mafuta e themba ipezhugwi kaatebulila mu nsholo wa Jesu ali gele pa tafuli eja.
Badiyiwa bakati bebona ikoko bakagwadzamoyo, ngono bakabhuzwa beti, “Mafuta anozanisigwani iyawa?
Mafuta iyawa abe angatengesiwa nge themba ipezhugwi kwazo, ngono mari kapiwa bashayi.”
Jesu kati aziba ikoku, kati kubali, “Ini mudziyidza nkadzi iwoyu? Washinga tjithu tjakanaka mundili.
Bashayi munabo misi yose, koga imi amutowobe nami misi yose.
Kudila mafuta iyawa mu mbili wangu, wakushinga kundilulwamisila mbiganyo yangu.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, kumwe ne kumwe kunowosumikigwa Ndebo mbuya iyeyi mu shango yose, tjashingwa nge nkadzi iwoyu tjowolebgwabo, kuti libe gumbuludzo nge kukwe.”
Ipapo mmwe we bali gumi lina babili, wakabe edang'wa Judasi Isikariyoti, kayenda ku Bapirisiti bakulu ngono
kabhuzwa eti, “Mowondipani ha ndingamupa iye?” Ndizo bakanlipa mari e siliva ali makumi matatu.
Kudwa ipapo tjose Judasi kashaka tjibaka tjaangabapa Jesu nditjo.
Mu zhuba le kutanga le Nzano we Tjiwunga* tjisina mbidzo badiyiwa bakazha kuna Jesu bakambhuzwa beti, “Moshaka kuti timululwamisile ngayi kujila zojiwa zwe Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi?”

Kashandula eti, “Yendani mungine mu nzi nkulu, mowoswika ku mmwe nlume, mumbudze muti, ‘N'diyi bakati, tjibaka tjangu tjasedzela. Ndowojila zojiwa zwe Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi ne badiyiwa bangu ku ng'umba iyo.’ ”
Ndizo badiyiwa bakashinga sekwa balayigwa ndi Jesu, bakalulwamisa zojiwa zwe Kupinda pezhugwi.
Kukati madekwana, Jesu kagala pa tafuli eja ana badiyiwa bali gumi lina babili.
Bakati beja kati kubali, “Ndolebesa ndoti, mmwe wenyu unowondiwonga.”
Bakazhala buyendasi, ngono mmwe ne mmwe wabo kati kunli, “Apa ndimi kene She?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Iye unoseba nami mu ndilo ndiye unowondiwonga.
Nkololo we Nthu unowofa sekwa kwakakwagwa nge kukwe. Koga Yee mme wee! Wapalala iwe nlume unowonga Nkololo we Nthu! Kwabe kuyita ha nlume iwoyo akabe asagala azwagwa.”
Ipapo Judasi iye wakan'wonga kati, “N'diyi, apa ndimi kene?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Waleba.”
Bakati batjaja, Jesu katola tjiwunga, katjikombolela, katjipemula katjipa badiyiwa babe eti, “Tolani muje, oku mbili wangu.”
Katola bhepe le nkumbi we zhambi, ngono kaukombolela kabapa ilo eti, “Ing'wani mulili mose.
Oku malopa angu e tjidumano* anotebuligwa banji mu kuzwiibhatigwa matjinyo.
Ndomubudza nditi, anditowong'wa kakale kwe ntjelo iwoyu we nzhambi kuswikila zhuba landinowoung'wa butshwa namwi mu bushe gwa Tate bangu.”
Bakati basinomba lumbo gunokudza Ndzimu, bakabhuda bakayenda ku Dombo le Mitoba.
Ipapo Jesu kabadwa kati, “Busiku igogu mowopalala mose nge kwangu, ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Ndowobulaya nlisi, ngono pkhwizi dze danga dzowopalala.’
Koga ha ndamusiwa ndowoyenda mbeli kwenyu ku Galili.”
Pita kashandula eti, “Kene bose bepalala nge kwenyu, imi andingamusiye.”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Ndolebesa ndoti, mu busiku igo igogu, gukurume lowoti lisathu likalila, unowondizwilandula katatu.”
Koga Pita kalebeleka eti, “Imi andingamuzwilandule bukulu ndingafa namwi.”
Ngono bose bamwe badiyiwa bakalebabo sa ikoko.
Ipapo Jesu kayenda ne badiyiwa babe pathu panodang'wa Getsemane, ngono kati kubali, “Galani ipapa imi nditjayenda apaje kunotembezela.”
Wakatola Pita ne bakololo babili ba Zebhedi kayenda nabo, ngono kangina buyendasi ne kudziyidzika kukulu.
Ipapo kati kubali, “Meya yangu izhele buyendasi kukulu kwandingafa. Salani ipapa mulinde nami.”
Ngono kapindila mbejana kawila pasi nge buso katembezela eti, “Tate bangu ha kutubuka, bhepe ileli le kudziyidzika ngalindipinde. Nenguba kwakajalo, musiyite kuda kwangu, itani kuda kwenyu.”
Ngono kabgwilila ku badiyiwa babe, ngono kawana bakayizela, ndizo kabhuzwa Pita eti, “Apa mabe musingake mukatubula kulinda nami awara ing'ompela kene?
Lindani mutembezele, kuti ndizo musingine mu kulikwa. Meya inoda tjose, koga nyama inokong'wa.”
Kayenda gwe bubili katembezela eti, “Tate bangu, ha kusingatubuke kuti bhepe ileli lekudziyidzika lindipinde, ndisaling'wa, kuda kwenyu ngakushingikale.”
Kati ebuya kakale kabawana bakayizela, ngobe mesho abo akabe elema nge hwope.
Ngono kabasiya kayenda kakale kanotembezela gwe butatu eleba matama iwo zwawo.
Kudwapo kazha ku badiyiwa babe kati kubali, “Apa mutjakayizela munyaluluka kene? Lingani, tjibaka tjasedzela, ngono Nkololo we Nthu unowongegwa mu maboko e batjinyi.
Milikani, ngatiyendeni, ngobe n'wongi wangu wabe pejo.”
Jesu kati atjalebeleka, Judasi, mmwe we bali gumi lina babili, kaswika. Wakabe ana mbunga nkulu we bathu bakasenga mathumo ne dziswimbo, batumwa nge Bapirisiti bakulu ne bakulu be Bajuta.
N'wongi wakabe abapa tjilakidzo eti, “Iye wandinowoputa ndiye, mumbhate.”
Judasi kayenda pana Jesu tjinyolotjo kati kunli, “Dumilani N'diyi!” Ngono kamputa.
Jesu kati kunli, “Nzwalani, ini uli ipapa?”
Ipapo balume bakasedzela bakabhata Jesu, bakansunga.
Mmwe we bakabe bana Jesu kashomola bukanu gugwe nge luboko, katema nlanda we Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kanthubula zebe.
Jesu kati kunli, “Bgwiliza bukanu gugo mu magalo ago, ngobe bose banoshingisa bukanu banowofa nge bukanu.
Autokumbula kuti ndingakumbila kuna tate bangu, tjinyolotjo bakandipa miphatho ye ngwa dze batumwa be kudzimu inopinda gumi lina mibili kene?
Matama e hwalo dze Ndzimu angakowoshingikala tjini kene anoti, kwakafanila shingikala ndi iyeyo zila.”
Ipapo Jesu kati ku mbunga iwoyu we bathu, “Apa mabhuda se munoyenda ku tjigebeng'a kene, makasenga makanu ne swimbo kuwonditola? Misi yose ndakagala mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ndidiya, koga mukasindisunge.
Koga kose ikoku koshingikala kuti ndizo matama akakwagwa nge balebesambeli asiwile pasi.”
Ipapo badiyiwa bose bakanfupatila bakatizha.
Ibabo bakabe basunga Jesu bakansa kuna Kaifasi Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kwakabe kwakakubunganila badiyi be nlayo ne bakulu be Bajuta.
Ngono Pita kantobela ali thambgwana kunoti mu nsha we Ntungamili we Bapirisiti. Kangina kagala pasi ne balindi kubona tjinowoshingikala ku bupelo.
Bapirisiti banolaula ne makulukota wose e Bajuta bakabe beshaka butendeki gwe manyepkhwa gungasungisa Jesu kuti abulawe,
koga bakasiguwane, nenguba batendeki be manyepkhwa banjinji bakazha. Gwe bupelo kukazha balume babili,
ngono bakati, “Nlume iwoyu wakati, ‘Ndingakolomola Bugalo gwe Ndzimu abuya agubaka kakale mu mazhuba matatu.’ ”
Ipapo Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kamilika kati kuna Jesu, “Apa auna dabilo kene? Batendeki ibaba bakatini nge kuko?”
Koga Jesu kanyalala. Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kati kunli, “Ndokutunisa nge Ndzimu unotjila nditi, Utibudze kene uli iye Mesiya, iye Nkololo we Ndzimu.”
Jesu kati, “Waleba. Koga ndomubudza nditi, kudwapo mowobona Nkololo we Nthu ali gele ku luboko gwe luji* gwe Masimba, ezha mu shango ali mu makole e kudzimu.”
Ipapo Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kapalula hazu iye eti, “Watuka Ndzimu! Titjashakilani batendeki bamwe kakale? Bonani, ngwenu mazwihwigwa kutuka Ndzimu kukwe.
Moipedza tjini?”
Bakashandula beti, “Wakafanila kufa.”
Ipapo bakanthwila mate mu buso, bakanloba. Bamwe bakampkhwaula
beti, “Utibudze iwe Mesiya. Ndiani wakuloba?”
Pita wakabe ali gele mu nsha, ngono kukazha nlandakadzi kati kunli, “Nawebo wabe una Jesu we Galili.”
Koga kalandula mbeli kwabo eti, “Anditoziba tjaunoleba nge kwatjo.”
Kati ebhudila kuzhe ku nkoba kabong'wa nge mmwe nlandakadzi, kakale kadwa bathu ba ipapo kati, “Nlume iwoyu wabe ana Jesu we Nazareta.”
Kalandula kakale etuna eti, “Anditoziba nlume iwoyu!”
Shule kwe tjibaka tjifupi, bakabe bali mile ipapo bakayenda kuna Pita ngono bakati kunli, “Malebeswa tjose u mmwe wabo, ngobe lebeleka kuko kolakidza kujalo!”
Ipapo katangisa kuzwilonga bhiso kakale etukana nabo eti, “Anditoziba nlume iwoyu!”
Tjinyolotjo gukurume likalila.
Ipapo Pita kakumbula dama lakabe lalebgwa ndi Jesu eti, “Gukurume lowoti lisathu likalila unowobe wandizwilandula katatu.” Ndizo kabhudila kuzhe kalila kwazo.
Kukati mangwanana Bapirisiti bose bakulu ne bakulu be Bajuta bakalangana kubulaya Jesu.
Bakansunga nge mitjili, bakayenda naye bakansa kuna Pilato nlauli.
Kukati Judasi, we n'wongi wa Jesu ebona kuti Jesu wabong'wa nlandu, kazwibona nlandu kabgwiliza mari e siliva ali makumi matatu ku Bapirisiti bakulu ne bakulu be Bajuta
eti, “Ndatjinya nge kuti ndawonga lopa lisina nlandu.”
Koga bakan'dabila beti, “Oko kodwani mutili kene. Nlandu uwo.”
Ndizo Judasi kaposela mari mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono kabhuda, kayenda kanozwisungilila.
Bapirisiti bakulu bakanunga mari iyawo, ngono bakati, “Ate kuli mu nlayo kulonga mari iyawa mu dula, ngobe mari e malopa.”
Ndizo bakakumbuludzana, bakatenga nnda we mbumbi we majegwa beuyita pathu pe zwikumbu zwe bazhi.
Ndizo nnda iwoyo udang'wa Nnda we Malopa na nasi.
Ipapo matama e nlebesambeli Jeremiya akasiwile pasi anoti, “Bakatola makumi matatu e mari e siliva ali themba yakabigigwa iye nge bathu bamwe be Iziraela,
ngono bakaashingisa kutenga nnda we mbumbi we majegwa sekwa ndakalayiwa ndi She.”
Jesu kama mbeli kwe nlauli, ngono nlauli kambhuzwa kati, “Ndiwe She nkulu we Bajuta kene?”
Jesu kati kunli, “Waleba.”
Kukati etilikwa nlandu nge Bapirisiti bakulu ne bakulu be Bajuta kasidabile.
Ipapo Pilato kambhuzwa kati, “Apa unohwa butendeki gwabanopa nge kuko kene?”
Koga Jesu kasitongo shandula, kene kuli dama ling'ompela; kukatjenamisa nlauli kwazo.
Kwakabe kuli wolobela kwe nlauli kuti nge tjibaka tje Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi, asunungulile bathu mmwe nsungwa wabada.
Nge tjibaka itjetjo bakabe bana nsungwa wakabe ezibgwa kwazo edang'wa Bharabhasi.
Ndizo kukati mbunga we bathu wakubungana, Pilato kababhuzwa eti, “Moshaka ndimusunungulila ani, Bharabhasi kene Jesu unodang'wa Mesiya?”
Wakabe eziba kuti bazhisa Jesu kunli nge ndandala koga.

Kukati Pilato ali gele mu tjigalo tje nsumikilisi, nkadzi uwe kantumila dama linoti, “Usitongobe ne tjimwe tjaunoyita ngekwe nlume iwoyu usina nlandu, ngobe ndadziyidzika kwazo nasi mu hwope nge kukwe.”
Koga Bapirisiti bakulu ne bakulu be Bajuta bakakulumbidza mbunga we bathu kukumbila Bharabhasi nenge kuti Jesu abulawe.
Nlauli kababhuzwa eti, “Ndiupi we babili wamunoshaka kuti ndimusunungulile iye?”
Bakashandula beti, “Bharabhasi.”
Pilato kabhuzwa eti, “Ndishingeni ngono ndi Jesu unodang'wa Mesiya?”
Bakashandula bose beti, “Ngaabambugwe!”
Pilato kabhuzwa eti, “Ngekutini? Watjinyani?”
Koga bakamimilila pezhugwi beti, “Ngaabambugwe!”

Kukati Pilato ebona kuti akuna tjaangatubula, kakale kuti zhoba inowobe hwulu, katola vula kangula maboko awe mbeli kwe mbunga we bathu. Kati, “Imi andina nlandu mu malopa e nlume iwoyu, bonani imwi!”
Bathu bose bakadabila beti, “Malopa awe ngaabe pezhugwi kwedu ne bana bedu!”
Ipapo kabasunungulila Bharabhasi, koga kayita kuti Jesu alobgwe ekompa ibo kunobambugwa.
Ipapo babhayani be nlauli bakalonga Jesu mu ng'umba ye nlauli ngono bakankubunganyila mphatho wose.
Bakambula bakanfukidza hazu ye mbala nshaba wakabondelela,
ipapo bakaluka tjiala* tje mihwa bakammbadza itjo mu nsholo. Bakambhatisa lushanga mu luboko gwe luji, ngono bakathigama mbeli kukwe bakan'dadila beti, “Dumilani She nkulu we Bajuta!”
Bakanthwila mate, ngono bakatola lukuni bakanloba ndigo mu nsholo.
Bakati ban'dadila, bakammbula hazu bakambadza zwiambalo zwizwe. Ipapo bakayenda naye kunommbambula.
Bakati beyenda, bakashangana ne mmwe nlume edwa ku Sirene unodang'wa Simoni ngono bakankombeledza kusenga tjileyanyo.
Bakati beswika pathu panodang'wa Gologota, kodwiwa kuti Pathu pe ipepe tje nsholo.
Bakapa Jesu nkumbi wakashanganyiwa ne ndulu kuti aung'we, koga kati alabila kalamba kuung'wa.
Bakati bambambula, bakakobana zwiambalo zwizwe nge kukandila.
Bakagala pasi bakanlinda ipapo.
Tjapezhugwana kwe nsholo uwe bakakwala nlandu uwe beti, “OYU NDI JESU, SHE NKULU WE BAJUTA.”
Batoleli babili bakabambugwa naye, mmwe ku luboko gwe luji mmwe kuna gwe lumeshwe.
Bapindi bakansapula, bezunguza misholo yabo
beti, “Iwe wakati ungakolomola ng'umba ye Ndzimu ukaibaka mu mazhuba matatu, uzwitjidze! Deluka mu tjileyanyo, ha uli Nkololo we Ndzimu!”
Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo ne bakulu be Bajuta ben'dadilabo beti;
“Wakatjidza bamwe, koga aatotubula kuzwitjidza! Ndiye she nkulu we Baiziraela, ngaadeluke ngwenu mu tjileyanyo, ndizo towogalamoyo munli.
Unogalabgwe mu Ndzimu. Ndzimu ngaunsunungule ngwenu ha unshaka, ngobe wakati, ‘Ndi Nkololo we Ndzimu.’ ”
Sa ikokobo batoleli bakabe babambugwa naye bakansapulabo.
Kwakabe kuli tjibaka tje masikati makulu, ngono kukabe zhalima mu shango yose kuswikila tjibaka tje butatu matewuko.
Nge tjibaka tje butatu mu matewuko iyawo Jesu kamimila eti, “Eli, Eli, lama sabakatani?” Kunodwa kuti, “Ndzimu wangu, Ndzimu wangu, apa mandilashilani kene?”
Kukati bamwe bamile ipapo behwa ikoko bakati, “Nlume iwoyu unodana Elija.”
Tjinyolotjo mmwe wabo kalabuka katola lungudze kagudubika mu nkumbi wakatyorowa kagubhayila mu lushanga kapa Jesu kuti ang'we.
Koga bamwe bakati, “Tongoma, ngatiboneni kuti kene Elija unowozha kantjidza.”
Ngono kukati Jesu amimila kakale nge hwi lipezhugwi, kapela.
Nge tjibaka itjetjo, tjisitilo tje Ng'umba ye Ndzimu tjikapaluka na pakati, kudwa pezhugwi kunoti pasi. Shango ikatengenyeka ne shongwe dzikaphatuka.
Zwikumbu zwikazhuka, ngono mibili ye bathu banji bakayengemala bakabe bafa ikamusiwa.
Bakabhuda mu zwikumbu shule kwe kumuka kwa Jesu, bakangina mu nzi wakayengemala bakabong'wa nge bathu banjinji.

Kukati nlauli we babhayani bali zana (100) ne baakabe anabo bakabe bakalinda Jesu bebona kutengenyeka kwe shango na kose ikoko kwakashingikala bakatja, ngono bakati, “Tjoselele wabe ali Nkololo we Ndzimu iwoyu!”
Bakadzi banjinji bakabe bakalingilila bali thambgwana kudwa ipapo. Bakabe batobela Jesu kudwa ku Galili kumbhatsha.
Pakati kwabo kwakabe kuna Mariya we Magadala na Mariya mme ba Jakubo na Josefa, na mme be bakololo ba Zebhedi.
Kukati madekwana kukazha nlume wakafuma unodang'wa kuyi Josefa edwa ku Arimateya, wakabe na iye ali n'diyiwa wa Jesu.
Wakayenda kuna Pilato kakumbila itumbu tja Jesu. Pilato kalaula kuti atjipiwe.
Josefa katola itumbu katjipetela nge jila buyanana,
ngono katjibiganya mu ikumbu tjitje tjaakabe akopola mu shongwe. Kakunguludzila bgwe pa nkoba we ikumbu ngono kayenda.
Mariya we Magadala ne mmwe Mariya bakabe bali gele ipapo kulingisana nge ikumbu.
Kukati tjimuka, kuli zhuba linotobeledza le kululwamisila Sabata, Bapirisiti bakulu ne Bafarasi bakakubungana pana Pilato bakan'dwa bakati,
“She, tokumbula kuti wakati atjatjila ntjebeli iwouje kati, ‘Shule kwe mazhuba matatu, ndowomuka.’

Ndizo dusani ndaulo kuti kulindiwe ikumbu tjitje kudzina kube zhuba le butatu. Kungati pamwe badiyiwa babe bakayenda bakakwiba itumbu bekodwa bathu beti ‘Wamuka mu bafi,’ ngobe ha kungashingikala, butjebeli gwa shule gowobe gungapinda gwe kutanga.”
Pilato kadabila eti, “Tolani babhayani banolinda, muyende munotjilinda sekwa mungatubula.”
Ndizo bakayenda bakanolulwamisa ikumbu nge kubuwa bgwe nenge kulindisa balindi.
Shule kwe Sabata, mu mazhokuyedza e zhuba le kutanga mu tshipi, Mariya we Magadala na Mariya mmwe bakayenda kunobona ikumbu.
Kukabe ne kutengenyeka kwe shango kukulu, ngobe ntumwa wa She wakadeluka kudwa kudzimu, kayenda ku ikumbu kakunguludza bgwe kagala pezhugwi kwalo.
Wakabe elingika se lupenyo gwe vula ne zwiambalo zwizwe zwili zwitjena se kapuku.
Balindi bakantja kwazo bakatetema bakasala benga bathu bafa.
Ntumwa we kudzimu kati ku bakadzi ibabo, “Musitje, ngobe ndoziba kuti moshaka Jesu wakabambugwa.
Aapo ipapa, wamuka sekwa akaleba. Izhani mubone paakabe ali lele.
Kudwapo muyende tjinyolotjo munobudza badiyiwa babe muti, ‘Wamuka mu bafi,’ ngono unowoyenda mbeli kwenyu ku Galili, ikoko mowombona. Bonani ndamubudza.”
Ndizo bakadzi ibabo bakadwa pa ikumbu tjinyolotjo betja, koga bakashatha kwazo, ngono bakalabuka bakanobudza badiyiwa babe.
Ngono Jesu kabashangamidza kati, “Dumilani.” Bakazha kunli bakabhata makumbo awe bakan'namata.
Ipapo Jesu kati kubali, “Musitje, yendani mubudze zwikamu zwangu bayende ku Galili, banowondibona ikoko.”
Kukati bakadzi batji mu zila, bamwe be balindi bakangina mu nzi nkulu, ngono bakabudza Bapirisiti bakulu tjimwe ne tjimwe tjakashingikala.
Kukati Bapirisiti bakulu bashangana ne bakulu be Bajuta, balangana, bakapa babhayani mari manjinji ali tjizwimba nlomo,
beti kubali, “Muti, ‘Badiyiwa babe bakazha pakati kwe busiku bakankwiba iswi titjakayizela.’
Ikoku akungazha mu zebe dze nlauli, towon'gutsha kuti timuduse mu mbatsha.”
Ndizo babhayani bakatola mari, bakashinga sekwa badwiwa. Ndizo lungano igogu gwakadwilidzwa pakati kwe Bajuta kuswikila ngwenu.
Ipapo badiyiwa bali gumi lina ng'ompela bakayenda ku Galili ku dombo Jesu laakabadwa kuti bayende kulili.
Bakati bembona bakan'namata, koga bamwe babo bakabe bedudumwa.
Ipapo Jesu kazha kubali kabadwa kati, “Simba lose kudzimu ne mu shango lakapiwa imi.
Ndizo yendani muyite badiyiwa mu zwitjaba zose mubadubike nge zina la Tate ne le Nkololo ne le Meya yakayengemala,
mubadiya kulondolodza tjimwe ne tjimwe tjandakamulaya nge kwatjo. Ngono nge malebeswa ndinamwi misi yose kunoti ku bupelo gwe shango.”
Oku ndiko kutangisa kwe ndebo mbuya ya Jesu Kirisiti Nkololo we Ndzimu,
sekwa kwakakwagwa ndi Isaya nlebesambeli mu lukwalo gugwe eti,
“Ndotuma ntumwa wangu mbeli kuko,
iye unowolulwamisa zila iyo.”
“Hwi le unodanilila mu tjilambanyika eti,
‘Lulwamisani zila ya She,
tambunudzani zijana dzidze.’ ”
Johani we N'dubiki kaswika mu tjilambanyika, esumikila kuti bathu bashandukile matjinyo abo badubikwe ili tjilakidzo tje kuti bazwiibhatigwa matjinyo abo.
Shango yose ye Judiya ne bathu bose be Jerusalema bakabhuda bakayenda kunli. Bakazwileba matjinyo abo, ngono kabadubika mu gwizi gwe Jorodani.
Johani wakabe eambala zwiambalo zwakathamiwa nge bukuse gwe kamela, ne mmwandabula we ganda mu thunji dzidze. Wakabe eja phashu ne butji gwe nyutji.
Kasumikila eti, “Shule kwangu kowozha una masimba kundipinda, iye wandisakalizana kukotama ndisunungula mitjili ye khwebana dzidze.
Ndomudubika nge vula, koga iye unowomudubika nge Meya yakayengemala.”
Mu mazhuba iyawo Jesu kazha edwa ku nzi we Nazareta mu ntuthu we Galili, ngono kadubikiwa ndi Johani mu gwizi gwe Jorodani.
Kwakati Jesu ebhuda mu vula, kabona kudzimu kuzhuka, ngono Meya yakayengemala ikadelukila munli se njiba.
Hwi likadwa kudzimu liti, “Iwe u Nkololo wangu, iye wandinoda, unondishathisa kwazo.”
Tjinyolotjo Meya ikantakulila ku tjilambanyika.
Wakabe mu tjilambanyika mazhuba ali makumi manna, elikiwa ndi Satani. Wakabe ana phuka dze shango, ngono batumwa be kudzimu bakambhatsha.
Kukati Johani alongwa mu ng'umba ye busungwa, Jesu kazha mu Galili esumikila ndebo mbuya ye Ndzimu.
Wakabe eti, “Tjibaka tjazha. Bushe gwe Ndzimu
Jesu wakati eyenda ali mu hwunde ye gungwa gwe Galili, kabona Simoni ne nnung'una uwe Enduru, beposela gwanga mu gungwa, ngobe bakabe bali babhati be hwobe.
Jesu kati kubali, “Izhani munditobele, ndowomuthama babhati be bathu.”
Tjinyolotjo bakasiya njanga dzabo, bakantobela.
Wakati ayenda thambgwana kabona Jakubo nkololo wa Zebhedi na Johani nnung'una uwe, bali mu n'goro belulwamisa njanga dzabo.
Tjinyolotjo kabadana, ndizo bakantobela besiya tate babo Zebhedi mu n'goro bana bashingi.
Bakayenda ku nzi we Kapenaume, ngono kukati nge nsi we Sabata*, Jesu kangina mu ng'umba ye Bajuta ye mitembezelo katangisa kudiya.
Bathu bakatjenamila kudiya kukwe, ngobe wakabe ediya se nthu una ndaulo, asingange badiyi be nlayo.
Imomo mu ng'umba yabo ye mitembezelo kwakabe kuna nlume wakabe ana meya mbi,
ngono kamilidza hwi kalebeleka eti, “Unoshakani mutili iwe Jesu we Nazareta? Wazha kuwotilobesa kene? Ndoziba kuti uani, u N'yengemali we Ndzimu!”
Koga Jesu kantjemela kati, “Nyalala ubhude munli!”
Meya mbi ukazunguza nlume ihwoyo kwazo, ukabhuda munli utjema.
Bathu bose bakatjenama kwazo, bakabhuzwana bakati, “Ikoku kunoshingikala ini kene? Hwudiya kutshwa! Unotjemela na iyo meya mibi dumbu nge ndaulo, ngono inonhwa.”
Tjinyolotjo tjilumbi tjitje tjikaandama mu ntuthu wose we Galili.
Kati ebhuda mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo bakayenda tjinyolotjo ku nzi wa Simoni na Enduru, bana Jakubo na Johani.
Mmezwale ba Simoni bakabe bali lele bana luzhazhamo, ndizo bakabudza Jesu nge kwabo.
Kayenda kubali kababhata nge luboko kabaazha kumilika, ngono luzhazhamo gukabhuda mu bali ndizo bakatangisa kupa bezi zojiwa.
Madekwana iyawo, zhuba langina bathu bakazhisa bagwele bose ne bathu bana meya mibi kuna Jesu.
Nzi wose ukakubungana pa nkoba we ng'umba.
Ngono Jesu kapodza banjinji bakabe bana magwele akasiyana. Kakale kadusa meya mibi minjinji, koga asingaidumile kuti ilebeleke ngobe yakabe inziba.
Kukati kutji likundawudze,* Jesu kamuka, kabhuda mu ng'umba kayenda kushango kwaakaswika katembezela.
Simoni ne baakabe anabo bakanlonda,
bakati ben'wana bakan'dwa bakati, “Mmwe ne mmwe unomushaka.”
Koga Jesu kati kubali, “Ngatiyendeni ku mizi ipejo, kuti ndizo ndinosumikila ikokobo, ngoti nditjo tjandakazhila.”
Kayenda mu Galili yose esumikila mu ng'umba dzabo dze mitembezelo, kakale edusa meya mibi mu bathu.
Nlume wakabe egwala mapele kazha kunli, kankumbila akathigama eti, “Ha muda, mungandipodza.”
Jesu kanhwila ngoni, katambunudza luboko gugwe, ngono kambhata kati kunli, “Ndoda kuti upole; pola.”
Tjinyolotjo mapele kapola, kasala ali mbuyanana.
Jesu kanlaya akasimisa
eti, “Kushaye wawabudza ikoku, koga uyende unozwilakidza ku mpirisiti, uduse tjibhayilo tje kupodziwa kuko sekwakaleba Mushe, kuti tjibe tjilakidzilo mu bathu.”

Koga kabhuda, ngono katangisa kuleba akashaladuka eandamisa tjanshingikalila. Ikoku kukatjikonedza Jesu kungina mu nzi akasununguka, kagala mu shango, ngono bathu bakazha kunli bedwa mu magalo mamwe ne mamwe akasiyana.
Kukati shule kwe mazhuba mashomanana, Jesu abgwilila ku Kapenaume, bathu bakahwa kuti wabuya umu nzi.
Bunjinji gukakubungana, kukadza kukasheteka bugalo ne pa nkoba dumbu, ngono kabasumikilila dama le Ndzimu.
Bamwe balume bakazhisa nlume wakalobgwa nge gulukadzi kunli akasengwa nge balume banna.
Se bakabe basingatubule kunswikisa pana Jesu nge bunji gwe bathu, bakapubula denga le ng'umba kulingisana na Jesu, bakakodelusa n'gwele ali mu thobo.
Jesu kati ebona kugalamoyo kwabo kati ku nlume unogwala, “Nkololo wangu, wazwiibhatigwa matjinyo awo.”
Ngono kwakabe kuna badiyi be nlayo bali gele ipapo bezwibhuzwa mu mimoyo yabo beti,
“Ini iwoyu nlume elebeleka eijali kene? Unotuka Ndzimu. Ndiani ungazwiibhatigwa matjinyo kuzhe kwe Ndzimu woga?”
Ipapo Jesu kaziba mu meya iye kuti banokumbula sa ikoko mu mimoyo yabo, ndizo kabadwa kati, “Apa mokumbulilani zwithu izwezwi mu mimoyo yenyu kene?
Ndikupi kulelu pa kumwe, ha kuli kudwa n'gwele iwoyu nditi ‘Wazwiibhatigwa matjinyo awo,’ ne kun'dwa nditi, ‘Milika utole thobo iyo uyende?’
Koga kuti muzibe ha Nkololo we Nthu ana simba mu shango le kuzwiibhatigwa matjinyo.” Ndizo kati kuna wakalobgwa nge gulukadzi,
“Ndokudwa nditi, milika utole thobo iyo uyende ku nzi uwo!”
Kamilika, tjinyolotjo katola thobo iye, kabhuda kayenda bakanlinga bose. Oku kukatjenamisa mmwe ne mmwe, ndizo bakakudza Ndzimu beti, “Atithu tikabona kwakajali!”
Jesu kayenda kakale pa hwunde ye gungwa. Mbunga nkulu we bathu ukazha kunli, ngono katangisa kubadiya.
Kati eyenda akasupha nge gungwa, kabona nkhethisi Levi nkololo wa Alifeo ali gele pa bushingilo gwe nkhethisi. Jesu kati kunli, “Unditobele.” Levi kamilika kantobela.
Kwakati Jesu eja zojiwa mu ng'umba ya Levi, bakhethisi banjinji ne batjinyi* bakabe beja naye ne badiyiwa* babe, ngobe wakabe atobegwa nge bathu banjinji.
Badiyi be nlayo be Bafarasi* bakati bembona eja ne batjinyi ne bakhethisi, bakabhuzwa badiyiwa babe beti, “Ini eja ne bakhethisi ne batjinyi?”
Jesu kati ehwa ikoku kabadwa kati, “Ate bathu banomuka zubuyanana banoshaka ng'anga, koga bagwele ndibo banoshaka ng'anga. Andizozha kuwodana balulwami, koga ndakazha kuwodana batjinyi.”
Badiyiwa ba Johani ne Bafarasi* bakabe bezwinyima zojiwa. Bathu bakazha bakabhuzwa Jesu beti, “Ini badiyiwa ba Johani ne be Bafarasi bezwinyima zojiwa, babo basingazwinyime izo?”
Jesu kabadabila kati, “Apa bakokiwa ku nzano we ndobolo bangazwinyima zojiwa pa bukwe nkwasha atjinabo kene? Abangazwinyime zojiwa batjinaye.
Koga misi inowozha yabanowotolegwa nkwasha, ipapo ndiko kwabanowozwinyima zojiwa.
“Akuna unotongo thumila nguli tshwa mu tjiambalo tjikulukugwi, ngobe nguli tshwa inowobuya, ikamwaula tjiambalo tjikapalukila mbeli.
Kakale akuna unodila nkumbi ntshwa mu makukhwa makulukugwi, ngobe angaphutuka nkumbi ukatebuka, kube kwatjinyika kose nkumbi ne makukhwa. Nkumbi ntshwa unodigwa mu makukhwa matshwa.”
Zhuba limwe le Sabata Jesu wakabe eyenda akapalama nnda we mathunde ana badiyiwa babe, ngono badiyiwa babe bakatangisa kumwaula zwiyako zwe mathunde.
Bafarasi bakati kuna Jesu, “Ini badiyiwa babo bethama tjisi mu nlayo nge nsi we Sabata kene?”
Kabadabila eti, “Apa amuthu mukatongo bala tjakathamiwa ndi Dafite ne baakabe anabo bana zhala, beshaka zojiwa kene?

Nge tjibaka itjetjo, Abhiyata wakabe ali Ntungamili we Bapirisiti. Dafite wakangina mu Ng'umba* ye Ndzimu, ngono katola zwiwunga zwakapiwa Ndzimu kaja ne bathu baakabe anabo, koga nge nlayo zwakabe zwili zwiwunga zwe Bapirisiti koga.”
Jesu kadwilila kati kubali, “Nsi we Sabata wakathamigwa nthu, nthu aazothamigwa nsi we Sabata.
Ndizo Nkololo we Nthu ndi She wa kose nenge Sabata.”
Mu tjimwe tjibaka Jesu kangina mu Ng'umba ye Ntembezelo, ngono kukabe kuna nlume una luboko gwakashweshwana mukati.
Bamwe be bathu bakabe bali imomo bakabe beshaka tjimwe tjabangabona Jesu nlandu nditjo, bakanlinga nge njele kubona kene unowompodza nge nsi we Sabata.
Jesu kadwa nlume una luboko gwakashweshwana kati, “Izha ngeno.”
Ipapo kabhuzwa gubungano kati, “Apa kumu nlayo nge nsi we Sabata kushinga ndulamo kene kushinga mbipo, kutjengeta butjilo kene kubulaya?”
Ngono bakanyalala koga.
Kabalinga kupoteleka akagwadzamoyo, ehwisiwa zogwadza nge mimoyo yabo mikukutu, ngono kadwa nlume iwoyo kati, “Tambunudza luboko gugo.” Katambunudza luboko gugwe, ngono gukapola.
Ipapo Bafarasi bakabhudila kuzhe, bakatangisa kulangana ne Batobeli* ba Herode kuti bangambulaya tjini.
Jesu kayenda ku gungwa ne badiyiwa babe, ngono mbunga nkulu we bathu unodwa ku Galili ukantobela.
Bathu banjinji bakati behwa kose kwaakabe ethama, bakazha kunli bedwa ku Judiya ne ku Jerusalema ne ku Idumeya ne ku ntuthu useli kwe Jorodani na pejo ne mizi mikulu ye Tire ne Sidoni.
Jesu kadwa badiyiwa babe kati banzhisile n'goro, ngobe bathu bakabe bali banjinji kwabakabe bangantshamba.
Wakabe apodza bali banjinji, ndizo bose bakabe begwalabo, bakabe besundila mbeli kuti bambhate.
Meya mibi yakabe iti koga imbona, iwila pasi mbeli kukwe imimila iti, “U Nkololo we Ndzimu.”
Koga wakabe eitjemela akasimisa, kuti isilebe kuti ndiye ani.
Jesu kabe etatha dombo, ngono kadana baanoshaka, ndizo bakayenda kunli.
Kashalula bali gumi lina babili kabadana kati “Batumwa” kuti babe naye nenge kuti abatume kunosumikila
nenge kube ne ndaulo ye kudusa meya mibi.
Aba ndibo bali gumi lina babili baakashalula, Simoni, iye waakatumila zina kati Pita.
Jakubo nkololo wa Zebhedi ne nnung'una uwe we tjilume Johani ibo baakatumila zina eti Bhoanegesi, kunodwa kuti “Bakololo be dadamula kwe vula,”
na Enduru na Filipo na Bhatolomeo na Matewu na Tomasi na Jakubo nkololo wa Alifeo na Tadeo na Simoni Nzeloti
na Judasi Isikariyoti iye wakawonga Jesu.
Ipapo Jesu kangina mu ng'umba, ngono kakale mbunga we bathu ukakubungana kukadza kukati iye ne badiyiwa babe bakasitubule kuja.
Be nsha uwe bakati behwa ikoku bakayenda beti banonontola, ngobe kwakabe kuyi, “Unopenga!”
Badiyi be nlayo bakabe bedwa ku Jerusalema bakati, “Wakasungwa ndi Bheelizebhuli, Unoshingisa she we meya mibi kudusa meya mibi.”
Ndizo Jesu kabadana, ngono kalebeleka nabo nge zwifaniso eti, “Satani ungadusa Satani tjini wali?
Ha bushe gwakathubukana kakale gugwa tjekwago, bushe igogo agungadwilile.
Ha nsha wakathubukana nge kwawo, ugwa, nsha iwoyo aungadwilile.
Satani ha ezwipandukila, akathubukana, aangadwilile. Loba kukwe kobe kwatjiswika.
“Dumbu akuna nthu ungangina mu ng'umba ye nlume wakasima katola thundu iye asasunga mweni we ng'umba kutanga, kuti ndizo ekotapa thundu iye.
“Ndomubudza tjose ati, Ndzimu unowobazwiibhatigwa matjinyo abo wose ne masapa abanotuka Ndzimu ndiwo.
Koga iye unotuka Meya yakayengemala, Ndzimu autowonzwiibhatigwa, koga una jinyo lisingapele.”
Wakabe elebeswa ikoku nge matama abo abakabe beti, “Una meya mbi.”
Ipapo kukaswika mmeyabe ne banung'una babe. Bakama kuzhe bakatuma mmwe kunodana Jesu mukati.
Mbunga we bathu wakabe uli gele pasi wakampoteleka, wakati kunli, “Mmeyabo ne banung'una babo bakuzhe banokushaka.”
Kabadabila eti, “Mmeyangu ne banung'una bangu ndiboani kene?”
Kati eijalo, kalinga bathu bakabe bali gele kumpoteleka, kabe eti, “Bonani! Bomme yangu ne banung'una bangu ababa!
Iye unoshinga kuda kwe Ndzimu ndiye nnung'una ne hazwadzi na mmeyangu.”
Jesu katangisa kakale kudiya ali pejo ne gungwa. Mbunga usinshoma we bathu ukakubungana panli kwaakati kangina mu n'goro kagala muuli mu gungwa. Bathu bose bakabe bali pa phili ye gungwa.
Kabadiya zwithu zwinjinji eshingisa zwifaniso, ngono mu kudiya kukwe kati:
“Hwililani! Ndzwali wakabhuda enodzwala.
Ngono kati edzwala imwe mbewu ikawila mu zila ngono nyuni dzikazha dzikaija.
Imwe mbewu ikawila mu lushale, ikashaya mavu manjinji ngono ikatjimbidza yamela, ngobe kwakabe kusina mavu manjinji akaivukidza.
Kukati zhuba libhuda, mmela ukatshwa ngono ukaswaba, ngobe usina midzi.
Imwe mbewu ikawila pakati kwe matenjana e mihwa ngono matenjana akakula akaimanikanya ndizo ikasiyite zwizwalo.
Imwe mbewu ikawila mu mavu mabuya. Ikamela ikakula, zwizwalo zwikapaphidzika ne kungabe makumi matatu kunoti makumi ali matathatu ne kunoti ku zana.”
Ipapo Jesu kati kubali, “Iye una zebe dze kuhwa ngaahwe!”
Jesu kati aliyega, bamwe bakabe bali panli bana badiyiwa babe bali gumi lina babili, bakambhuzwa ngekwe zwifaniso.
Kabadwa kati, “Masazibgwe e bushe gwe Ndzimu makaapiwa, koga kuna ibabo bakuzhe tjimwe ne tjimwe tjolebgwa nge zwifaniso,
kuti ndizo,
‘Babone koga basibonesese,
kakale bahwe koga basihwisise.
Nge kuti ha bangahwa bangadwa beshanduka mu matjinyo abo,
bakazwiibhatigwa nge Ndzimu.’ ”
Ipapo Jesu kababhuzwa kati, “Apa amutohwisisa tjifaniso itjetji kene? Mowohwisisa zwimwe zose tjini ngono?
Ndzwali unodzwala dama.
Aba ndibo banonga mbewu yawila mu zila, banoti baamutjila dama bakalihwa; Satani kazha tjinyolotjo kadusa dama labaamutjila.
Koga aba bamwe nge zila inofanana, ndibo banonga mbewu yakadzwagwa mu lushale. Banoti ha behwa dama, bakaliamutjila tjinyolotjo nge kushatha.
Koga abana midzi, ndizo banobhatilila tjibaka tjifutshwanana koga. Ha kudziyidzika nenge kuhwisiwa zogwadza ngekwe dama kuzha, tjinyolotjo banowa.
Kakale bamwe banonga mbewu yakadzwagwa pakati pe mihwa, ndibo banohwa dama,
koga kudziyidzika nge zwe shango nenge kutjengeleka ngekwe fumwa nenge kuyemula zwimwe zwithu, kozha kukadzipa dama, likasibe ne zwizwalo.
Koga ibabo banonga mbewu yakadzwagwa mu mavu mabuya, ndibo banohwa dama bakaliamutjila, bakadusa zwizwalo, makumi ali matatu kene matathatu kene ali zana etjadzwagwa.”
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Apa uyapo ungazhisa luvone kakogutshibikila nge itundu, kene kagubiga kusi kwe bulawo wali? Apa aangagubige patjena kene?
Tjimwe ne tjimwe tjakasumbikika tjowodzutunugwa, tjakasitilika tjowodusigwa patjena.
Ha kuna mmwe una zebe dze kuhwa ngaahwe.”
Kadwilila eti, “Yelani njele tjamunohwa! Tjilizanyo tjamunoshingisa mu bamwe nditjo tjinowoshingisiwa mumuli nenge kunopinda ikoko.
Iye una tjaanatjo unowopaphidzigwa, koga iye usina tjaanatjo, tjitukununu tjaanatjo unowotjitolegwa.”
Kapapha kati, “Bushe gwe Ndzimu gonga nlume unodzwala mbewu mu mavu.
Busiku ne masikati ali lele kene amuka, mbewu inomela ikula, koga asingazibe kuti inokula tjini.
Mavu nge kwawo anokudza zwizwalo. Kotanga mmela, shule kukazha shotje, shule likazhala shanga.
Ha mathunde ebidwa koga, unovuna, ngobe tjabe tjibaka tje kuvuna.”
Kakale Jesu kabhuzwa kati, “Towoti bushe gwe Ndzimu gofanana neni kene? Tingauyelesedza nge tjifaniso tjipi wali?
Gofanana ne shanga ye mbewu ye lusaba, iyo tukununu mu mbewu dzose dzinodzwagwa mu shango.
Koga ha yadzwagwa, inokula ikabe iyo hwulu mu matenjana wose ne thabi dzalo dzikabe hwuluhwulu kunoti ne nyuni dzikabaka mashaka mu ntutshi walo.”
Jesu kasumikila dama nge zwifaniso zwakajali, elizanyidza kuhwisisa kwabo.
Aana tjaakaleba kubali asingashingise zwifaniso. Ngono wakabe eti ana badiyiwa babe koga, etjenesa tjimwe ne tjimwe.
Zhuba ilelo kuli madekwana kati ku badiyiwa babe, “Ngatitjulukileni seli.”
Bakasiya mbunga we bathu bakayenda naye bali mu n'goro sekwa akabe ali gele. Kwakabe kuna mimwe migoro inoyendabo kwabakabe beyenda.
Kukamuka dutu gulu, mapundu e vula kangina mu n'goro, ngono n'goro wakabe wozhala vula.
Jesu wakabe akaizela tjandishule, akasazamila nsazamilo, badiyiwa babe bakammusa bakati kunli, “N'diyi, amuna hanya naswi kene ha tiloba?”
Kamilika katjemela phepo, kadwa gungwa kati, “Nyalala! Udzikame!” Ndizo phepo ikama kukabe ne kudzikama kukulu.
Kabadwa kati, “Motjisiwa ngeni, amuna kugalamoyo kene?”
Bakabe ne kutja kukulu, bakabhuzwana beti, “Ndiani iwoyu unohwiligwa nge phepo nenge gungwa!”
Jesu ne badiyiwa babe bakatjulukila seli kwe gungwa ku shango ye Bagerasa.
Kati ebhuda mu n'goro, kashangamidziwa nge nlume wakabe ana meya mbi, edwa ku zwikumbu.
Nlume iwoyo wakabe egala ku zwikumbu, ngono kwakabe kusitjina na iye ungansunga kene nge ketani dumbu.
Nlume iwoyo wakabe kanjinji esungwa makumbo ne maboko, koga ethubula ketani, evuna tshipi dzakansunga makumbo. Akuna wakabe akasima kwaangankulila nge masimba.
Misi yose siku ne sikati wakabe egala mu zwikumbu na pezhugwi kwe matombo, emimila tjibaka tjose ezwitjekanya nge mabgwe.
Wakati ebona Jesu ali thambo kalabuka kanthigamila.
Kamilidzila hwi pezhugwi kati, “Unoshakashingani ndimi Jesu, Nkololo we Ndzimu Upezhugwi zhugwi? Ndokumbila nge zina le Ndzimu kuti usindihwise zogwadza.”
Jesu wakabe ati kunli, “Bhuda mu nlume iwoyu, meya mbi ndiwe!”
Jesu kabhuzwa meya mbi kati, “Zina lilo ndiani?”
Kadabila eti, “Zina langu ndi Mphatho, ngobe tibanjinji.”
Ukakumbila Jesu utshambilidza uti, asiyitatile kuzhe kwe ntuthu iwoyo.
Kwakabe kuna ngubi ye hwotji yakabe ifula pejo ne duthu.
Meya mibi ikakumbila Jesu iti, “Utitatile mu wotji idzedzi, utidumilile kungina mudzili.”
Kaidumila, ngono meya mibi ikabhuda ikangina mu ngubi ye wotji dzili zwiwulu zwibili (2000). Dzikatizha nge phili ye gungwa yakakunguluka, dzikawila mu gungwa dzikafa.
Ibabo bakabe bakadzilisa bakatizha, bakanoleba ku nzi nkulu ne mu shango, ngono bathu bakabhuda bakayenda kunobona kuti ini tjashingikala.
Ngono bakazha kuna Jesu, bakawana nlume wakabe abe ana meya mibi ali gele ipapo, akasungila ali mpezha, ndizo bakatja.
Ibabo bakabe babona bakabudza bathu tjashingikalila nlume wakabe abe ana meya mibi ne tjashingikalila hwotji.
Ngono ipapo bakakumbila Jesu kuti abhude mu ntuthu wabo.
Kukati Jesu engina mu n'goro, nlume wakabe abe ana meya mibi kankumbila kuti ayende naye.
Jesu kalamba kati, “Yenda kanyi kuna be nsha uwo unobabudza kuti She wakushingila tjikulu kungapani nenge kuti wakuhwila ngoni kungapani.”
Ndizo nlume iwoyo kayenda, katangisa kuleba kuti Jesu wanshingila kungapani mu mizi ili gumi inoyi Dekapoli. Bathu bose bakakaabala.
Jesu wakati atjuluka gungwa kakale nge n'goro ali seli, mbunga nkulu we bathu ukakubungana panli pa wunde ye gungwa.
Ipapo kukazha mmwe we balauli be Ng'umba ye Ntembezelo unodang'wa Jairo. Kati ebona Jesu kawila pa makumbo awe,
ngono kankumbila kwazo eti, “Nkololokadzi wangu unofa. Izha umbige maboko kuti ndizo apole, atjile.”
Ndizo Jesu kayenda naye. Mbunga nkulu kulu we bathu ukantobela ukammanikanya.
Kwakabe kuna nkadzi wakabe ana makole ali gumi lina mabili egwala bugwele gwe kubhizha malopa.
Wakabe adziyila kwazo alapiwa nge ng'anga njinji, ashingisa kose kwaakabe anako, ngono bugwele gugwe gukulila mbeli.
Kati ehwa ngekwa Jesu kazha ali shule kukwe mu mbunga, ngono kabhata hazu ya Jesu.
Wakazwidwa mu nkumbulo uwe kati, “Ha ndingabhata nenguba zwili izo zwiambalo zwizwe koga, ndowopola!”
Ngono kubhizha malopa kukwe kukama tjinyolotjo, kahwa mu mbili uwe kuti wapodziwa bugwele gugwe.
Jesu kahwa kuti simba lile labhuda munli, ipapo katendebuka pakati kwe mbunga, ngono kabhuzwa kati, “Ndiani wabhata zwiambalo zwangu?”
Badiyiwa babe bakanshandula beti, “Se mubona bathu bakamumanikanya saikoku mungabhuzwa wali muti, ‘Ndiani wandibhata kene?’ ”
Koga Jesu kadwilila elinga kumpoteleka kubona kuti ndiani wakabe ambhata.
Nkadzi iwoyo wakabe eziba tjanshingikalila, ndizo kawila pa makumbo a Jesu etetema ngotja, ngono kambudza malebeswa wose.
Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Nkadzi, kugalamoyo kuko kwakupodza. Yenda nge kunyalala, upole kugwala kuko.”
Jesu wakati atjalebeleka, kukazha bathu bedwa ku ng'umba ya Jairo, nlauli we ng'umba ye ntembezelo beti, “Nkololokadzi uwo aatjipo. Utjadziyidzilani N'diyi kene?”
Jesu wakati ehwa tjabaleba, kadwa nlauli we ng'umba ye ntembezelo kati, “Usitje, galamoyo koga.”
Ngono kasitongo dumila mmwe nthu kuntobela kuzhe kwa Pita na Jakubo na Johani nkulu wa Jakubo.
Bakati baswika ku nzi we nlauli we ng'umba ye mitembezelo, Jesu kawana bathu be poyongana belila bekuwa.
Kangina, ngono kati kubali, “Kupoyongana ikoku ne kulila ngekweni? Mwana wakayizela aazofa.”
Koga bakanseka mahanya. Kabadusila kuzhe bose, katola tate be mwana na mmeyabe ne baakabe anabo, ngono kangina kwakabe kuna mwana.
Kambhata nge luboko kati, “Talitha, kumi,” kunodwa kuti, “Mmwanadana, ndoti kukuli, milika.”
Tjinyolotjo mmwanadana kamilika kayenda yenda. Wakabe ana makole ali gumi lina mabili. Bathu bakakaabala kwazo.
Ngono kabalaya esimisa eti kusiyite nthu waziba ngekwa ikoku, ipapo kabadwa kati bape mmwanadana tjimwe tjaangaja.
Jesu kamilika ipapo kayenda ku shango ya kanyi kwabo, ngono badiyiwa babe bakayenda naye.

Kukati nge nsi we Sabata, katangisa kudiya mu Ng'umba ye Ntembezelo, ngono banjinji bakanhwa bakakaabala. Bakabhuzwana beti, “Iwoyu nlume wakawana poni kose ikoku? Butjenjedu gupi igogu gwaakapiwa? Unoshinga mishingo inolakidza simba.
Apa ate iye mbezhi iwoyu kene, mwana wa Mariya kakale ali nkulu wa Jakubo na Josefa na Judasi na Simoni? Apa hazwadzi dzidze ate dzili muno naswi kene?” Bakan'gwadzilamoyo.
Jesu kati kubali, “Nlebesambeli aatoshaya tjilumbi ha kusi mu shango ya kanyi kwabo koga ne pakati kwe makamu awe ne be nsha wa kanyi kwabo.”
Aazotubula kushinga mishingo inolakidza simba ipapo, kuzhe kwe kubiga maboko awe pezhugwi kwe bathu banogwala bashomanana, ebapodza.
Ngono wakakaabadziwa nge kusheta kugalamoyo kwabo.
Ipapo Jesu kayenda mu mizi ediya.
Wakadanila kunli bali gumi lina babili, kabatuma bubili nge bubili, ngono kabapa simba pezhugwi kwe meya mibi.
Kabalaya eti, “Musitongo senga tjimwe mu gwendo gwenyu, kuzhe kwe ludozo. Musitole tjiwunga kene gobhodo kene mari mu mmwandabula wenyu.
Muambale khwebana koga, muyende ne tjiambalo tjamakaambala koga.
Ha muswika mu nzi mugale ipapo, kudzina mubhuda mu magalo iyawo.
Magalo asingamuamutjile, belamba kumuhwa, muti mubhudapo, mushashamule hwuluba mu makumbo enyu, kube tjilakidzo mu bali kuti nlandu nge wabo.”
Bakabhuda bakanosumikila kuti bathu bashanduke.
Bakadusa meya mibi minjinji, ngono bakazhodza bagwele banjinji mafuta bakabapodza.
She nkulu Herode kahwa ngekwa ikoku, ngobe zina la Jesu lakabe lalumba. Bamwe bakabe beti, “Johani we N'dubiki wakamusiwa mu bafi, ndizo masimba iyawa eshinga munli.”
Bamwe bakati, “Ndi Elija.” Koga bamwe bakati, “Nlebesambeli unonga balebesambeli* ba ntolo.”
Koga Herode wakati ehwa ikoku kati, “Johani iye wandakathubula nsholo wakamusiwa mu bafi!”
Herode nge kukwe wakabe alaula kuti Johani abhakhwe, ngono kati asungwe, alongwe mu ng'umba ye busungwa. Wakathama ikoku ngekwa Herodiyasi, nkadzi wa Filipo nnung'una uwe, waakabe atjilobola.
Johani wakabe ati kuna Herode, “Ate kuli mu nlayo kuti ulobole nkadzi we nnung'una uwo.”
Ndiko Herodiyasi kabhata Johani nge moyo, kayemula kumbulaya. Koga aazotubula kumbulaya.
Herode wakabe etja Johani, eziba ali nthu wakalulwama, kakale wakayengemala, ndizo kantjengeta. Herode wakabe eti ehwa matama a Johani kashangana nsholo, koga eda kunhwilila.
Gwe bupelo nkoba ukazhuka. Herode wakati mu zhuba le kuzwikumbuludza mazwago awe kathamila hadzasha dzidze ne balauli be babhayani ne batungamili be Galili nzano we zojiwa.
Nkololokadzi wa Herodiyasi kangina kazana, kashathisa Herode ne bezi baanoja nabo. She nkulu kati ku mmwanadi iwoyo, “Undikumbile tjimwe ne tjimwe tjaunoda, ngono ndowokupa itjo.”
Kabuya katuna kati, “Tjimwe ne tjimwe tjaunokumbila ndowokupa itjo kene kuli gwamu le shango yangu.”
Nkololokadzi kabhudila kuzhe kanobhuzwa mmeyabe kati, “Apa ndi kumbileni kene mme?” Herodiyasi kan'dabila kati, “Kumbila nsholo wa Johani we N'dubiki.”
Tjinyolotjo nkololokadzi kayenda kuna She nkulu elibilidza kakumbila eti, “Ndokumbila nsholo wa Johani we N'dubiki uli mu ndilo.”
Ngono she nkulu kapuna moyo kwazokwazo, koga nge kutuna kukwe nenge bezi baakabe eja nabo, aazoda kuti unganlambila.
Ipapo katuma mmwe we babhayani banolinda, enlaya kuti azhise nsholo wa Johani. Iwoyo nlume kayenda, kanothubula nsholo wa Johani mu ng'umba ye busungwa,
ngono kauzhisa uli mu ndilo, kaupa mmwanadi iwoyo, mmwanadi kaupa mmeyabe.
Badiyiwa ba Johani bakati behwa ikoku, bakazha bakatola itumbu tjitje, bakanotjibiganya.
Batumwa* bakabgwilila kuna Jesu bakambikila kose kwabakathama ne tjabakadiya.
Bathu banjinji bakabe bezha, bamwe beyenda, ndizo bakasheta tjibaka tjekuti baje. Kabe edwa badiyiwa babe eti, “Izhani tiyende pakanyalala, munonyaluluka kushomanana.”
Ndizo bakayenda bali boga nge n'goro pathu pakanyalala.
Koga banji bakababona bemilika bakabaziba, ndizo bakalabuka kudwa mu mizi yose bakanobatangila.
Jesu wakati edeluka mu n'goro ebona mbunga nkulu we bathu, kabahwila ngoni ngobe bakabe benga pkhwizi dzisina nlisi. Ndizo wakatangisa ku badiya zwithu zwinjinji.
Kwakati zhuba lomila, badiyiwa babe bakazha kunli bakati, “Pano timu shango koga ne zhuba lashwa.
Paladzani bathu, bayende ku mizi ipejo banozwitengela tjabangaja.”
Kadabila eti, “Mubape tjinojiwa imwi.”
Bakati kunli, “Oku kungatola mari* e siliva ali mazana mabili (200)! Apa tishingise mari mangapo mu tjiwunga tibape baje kene?”
Kabhuzwa kati, “Muna zwiwunga zwingana? Kasholeni.”
Bakati bashola bakashandula beti, “Tina zwiwunga zwishanu ne hwobe mbili.”
Jesu kagadza bathu pasi nge mibungana mu bushwa butshwa.
Ndizo bakagala pasi nge mibungana ye bathu bali zana (100) ne bali makumi mashanu (50).
Wakatola zwiwunga zwishanu ne hwobe mbili, kalinga kudzimu kaboka, ngono kapemula zwiwunga. Kudwapo kazwipa badiyiwa babe kuti bazwipe bathu, kabe ebakobanya hwobe mbili bose.
Bose bakaja, ngono bakaguta.
Badiyiwa bakanunga mamburumburu e tjiwunga ne hwobe bakazhadza seme dzili gumi lina mbili.
Balume bakaja zwiwunga izwezo bakabe bali zwiwulu zwishanu (5000).
Kudwa ipapo Jesu kadwa badiyiwa babe kati bangine mu n'goro bayende ku Bhetisaida, iye atjasala epaladza bathu.
Kati edwa pabali kanotatha dombo kunotembezela.
Kwakati kube madekwana, n'goro ukabe uli pakati kwe gungwa, iye ali ega mu shango.
Kabona badiyiwa babe begwisana ne migoti inoyendisa n'goro, ngobe phepo yakabe yakalingisana nabo. Kukati mazhokuyedza kayenda kubali enangayila pezhugwi kwe vula. Ngono kayedza se unobapinda.
Bakati bembona eyenda nge makumbo pezhugwi kwe vula bakakumbula kuti ipuku, ndizo bakamimila,
ngobe bakambona bose, ngono bakapalukamoyo.
Tjinyolotjo kalebeleka nabo kati, “Simisani mimoyo! Ndimi, musitje.”
Ipapo katatha n'goro nabo ngono dutu likama. Bakakaabala kwazo,
nge kuti bakabe basahwisisa ngekwe zwiwunga. Mimoyo yabo yakabe yakakukutala.
Bakati batjulukila seli, bakaswika mu ntuthu we Genezareta, ngono bakayisa n'goro wabo ku phili.
Bakati bebhuda mu n'goro, bathu bakaziba Jesu.
Bakalabuka ntuthu wose, bakasenga bagwele mitengate bebayisa kumwe ne kumwe kwabanohwa kuyi uyako.

Kumwe ne kumwe kwaakabe eyenda mu mizana ne mu mizi mikulu, kene mu shango bakabe bebiga bagwele mu matengeselo, benkumbila kuti abadumilile kubhata nenguba guli lupeto gwe tjiambalo tjitje, ngono bose bakagubhata bakapola.
Bafarasi ne bamwe Badiyi be nlayo bakabe badwa ku Jerusalema bakakubungana pana Jesu.
Ngono bakabona badiyiwa babe bamwe beja nge maboko asimabuyanana, asakangugwa.
Bafarasi ne Bajuta bose, abatoja basangula maboko abo nge tjilenje tjabo. Oku banokuthama belondolodza tjilenje tje bawola.
Ha bedwa ku matengeselo abatoja basangula. Banolondolodza zwilenje zwimwe zwinjinji, zwinonga kusuka mikombe ne hali ne zwija zwe mikokoni.
Ndizo Bafarasi ne Badiyi be nlayo bakabhuzwa Jesu bakati, “Ini badiyiwa babo basingalondolodze zwilenje zwe bawola, beja zojiwa zwabo nge maboko asimabuyanana?”
Kadabila kati, “Isaya wakabe elebesa paakalebela mbeli nge kwenyu batjengedzi ndimwi eti, kwakakwagwa kuyi,
‘Bathu ibaba banondilumbidza nge milomo yabo koga,
koga mimoyo yabo ikule nami.
Banondithigamilila suli,
ngobe banodiya milayo ye bathu se banodiya nlayo wangu.’
“Moletjedza milayo ye Ndzimu, ngono mubhata zwilenje zwe bathu.”
Ngono kati kubali, “Muna zila mbuya seni ye kubigila ntome milayo ye Ndzimu, kuti ndizo mulondolodze zwilenje zwenyu!
Mushe wakati, ‘Kudza tate babo na mmeyabo.’ Kakale wakati ‘Iye unoleba bubi ngekwa tate babe kene mmeyabe, nge malebeswa ngaafe.’
Koga moti nthu ha eti kuna tate babe kene mmeyabe, ‘Tjamakabe makafanila tjidziwa ndimi nditjo tjabe Korobhani, kodwa kuti tjapiwa Ndzimu,’
ngono kudwapo amuton'dumila kuthamila tjimwe tate babe kene mmeyabe.
Ndiko muthama kuti dama le Ndzimu lisishinge, nge tjilenje tjenyu tjamunopitshila ku bana benyu. Mothama zwithu zwinjinji zwakajalo.”
Kakale Jesu kadana mbunga we bathu, ngono kati, “Mundibhulutaneni mose, ngono muhwisise.
Akuna tjikuzhe kwe mbili we nthu tjinganthama kuti asibe mbuyanana. Koga tjithu tjinodwa mu nthu nditjo tjinonthama kuti asibe mbuyanana.
[Una zebe dze kuhwa ngaahwe.]”
Kukati asiya mbunga we bathu angina mu ng'umba, badiyiwa babe bakambhuzwa ngekwe tjifaniso itjetji.
Kati kubali, “Apa namwibo amutohwisisa kene? Amutobona kene kuti akuna tjinongina mu nthu tjidwa kuzhe tjinganlonga shambgwa?
Atjitongina mu moyo uwe, koga tjongina mu ntumbu uwe kudwapo tjibhuda mu mbili uwe.” Nge kujalo Jesu wakabe edwa kuti zojiwa zose zwibuyanana.
Kadwilila kati, “Tjinobhuda mu nthu nditjo tjinonthama kuti asibe mbuyanana.
Ngoti tjinodwa mukati kwe nthu, mu moyo uwe, mikumbulo mibi, kuwalilana kuzhe kwe ndobolo ne bubava ne kubulaya ne bupombwe,
ne tjiba ne bubi ne kutjebela ne butjakwani ne bugovu ne ndandala ne tjinya bamwe mazina ne kuzwida ne bulengwe.
Zwithu zose izwezwi zwakabipa zodwa mukati kwe nthu, ngono zothama nthu kuti asibe mbuyanana.”
Jesu wakabhuda ipapo kayenda ku ntuthu we Tire ne we Sidoni, kangina mu ng'umba, ngono kaside kuti kube ne unoziba, koga kasitubule kubgwata.
Mmwe nkadzi wakabe ana mwana we tjianadana wakasungwa nge meya mbi, kazha kawila pa makumbo awe.
Nkadzi iwoyo wakabe ali N'giriki, akazwagwa mu Siriya mu ntuthu we Fenishiya. Wakakumbila Jesu kuti aduse meya mbi mu nkololokadzi uwe.
Jesu kati kunli, “Letja bana baje kutanga, ngobe akuzolulwama kuti zojiwa zwe bana zwitogwe zwiposegwe mbgwa.”
Nkadzi iwoyo kadabila eti, “Kwakajalo She, koga na idzo mbgwa dzikusi kwe tafuli, dzoja mamburumburu anowila pasi edwa mu ndilo dze bana.”
Ipapo kan'dwa kati, “Wadabila zubuyanana, ndizo ungayenda, meya mbi yabhuda mu nkololokadzi uwo.”
Kayenda kanyi, ngono kawana mmwanadana uwe ali lele mu bulalo meya mbi wabhuda munli.
Ipapo Jesu kashanduka edwa ku ntuthu we Tire, kapalama Sidoni edelukila ku gungwa gwe Galili nge zila ye ntuthu we Dekapoli.
Bamwe bathu bakazhisa mmwe nlume wakabe ali bhubuzebe, kakale asingatubule kulebeleka zubuyanana. Ndizo bakankumbila kumbiga maboko.
Jesu kati antolela ntome, edwa naye pa mbunga we bathu, kalonga zwinyala zwizwe mu zebe dze nlume iwoyo. Ipapo kathwa mate, ngono kabhata lulimi gwe nlume iwoyo.
Kalinga zhuzhugwi kudzimu, kafemela pezhugwi, kati kunli, “Efata” kunodwa kuti, “Zhulika.”
Zebe dze nlume iwoyo dzikazhulika ne lulimi gugwe gukasununguka, ndizo katangisa kulebeleka zubuyanana.
Jesu kabalaya kati kushaye wababudza. Koga kati ajalo ibo bakakuandamisa kwazo.
Bakatjenama kwazo bakati, “Unothama zwithu zose kubuyanana seni? Unothama ne mabhubuzebe akahwa ne mbebebe dzikalebeleka.”
Mu mazhuba iyawo, kwakati mbunga nkulu we bathu wakubungana kakale, koga basina tjabangaja, Jesu kadana badiyiwa babe kati kubali,
“Ndohwila bathu ibaba zogwadza, ngobe babe ne mazhuba matatu banami, koga basina tjabanoja.
Ha ndibapaladza kuti bayende ku mizi yabo bana zhala, banowokonegwa mu zila, ngobe bamwe babo bakadwa kule kule.”
Badiyiwa babe bakadabila beti, “Apa ndiponi mu tjilambanyika itjetji, kungati nthu kawana tjiwunga tjingalizana kubajisa?”
Jesu kababhuzwa kati, “Muna zwiwunga zwingana?” Bakadabila beti, “Zwili kutendeka.”
Kadwa mbunga we bathu kati ugale pasi. Katola zwiwunga zwili kutendeka, kati aboka kazwipemula, kazwipa badiyiwa babe kuti bazwikobele bathu, ngono bakathama sa ikoko.
Bakabe bana hwobe tukununu shomanana. Ngono wakati adzibokela, kadwa badiyiwa babe kati bakobele bathu.
Bathu bakaja bakaguta. Kudwapo badiyiwa bakanunga mamburumburu, bakazhadza seme dzili kutendeka.
Kwakabe kuna bathu bali zwiwulu zwinna. Kati abapaladza,
kangina mu n'goro ne badiyiwa babe kayenda ku ntuthu we Dalimanuta.
Bafarasi bakatangisa kukangazhana na Jesu, bakanteya nge kunkumbila kuti athame tjilakidzo tjinodwa kudzimu.
Kafemela pezhugwi kwazo kati, “Ini tjizekugwana itjetji tjishaka tjilakidzo kene? Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, akuna tjilakidzo tjinowopiwa tjizekugwana itjetji.”
Ipapo kabasiya kangina mu n'goro kakale, ngono katjulukila seli.
Badiyiwa bakabe bakangang'wa kusenga zwiwunga kuzhe kwe tjing'ompela tjabakabe banatjo mu n'goro.
Jesu kabatjenjedza kati, “Lingani mube ne njele ngekwe mbidzo ye Bafarasi ne ya Herode.”
Bakalebeleka tje kwabo beti, “Unolebesiwa, ngoti atina tjiwunga.”
Jesu kaziba tjabanoalakana, ndizo kababhuzwa kati, “Ini mulebeleka ngekwe kuti amuna tjiwunga? Apa amuthu mukabonesesa, kakale mukahwisisa zwenyu kene? Mimoyo yenyu yakakukutala kene?
Apa muna mesho koga mokong'wa bona, ne zebe munadzo koga mokong'wa hwa kene? Makangang'wa kene?
Ndakati ndipemulila bathu bali zwiwulu zwishanu (5000) zwiwunga zwishanu, makanunga mamburumburu mukazhadza seme ngana?”
Bakadabila beti, “Gumi lina mbili.”
“Eke ndipemulila bali zwiwulu zwinna (4000) zwiwunga zwili kutendeka, makanunga mamburumburu mukazhadza seme ngana?”
Bakadabila beti, “Dzili kutendeka.”
Kati kubali, “Amuthu mukahwisisa zwenyu kene?”
Bakayenda ku Bhetisaida, bamwe bathu bakazhisa bhofu kuna Jesu, bakakumbila kuti alibhate.
Wakabhata bhofu nge luboko, ngono kalikwebela kuzhe kwe nzi, kati athwila bhofu ilelo mate mu mesho, kakale alibiga maboko kalibhuzwa kati, “Kuna tjaunobona kene?”
Nlume we bhofu kamilidza mesho, ngono kati, “Ndobona bathu, banonga miti inoyenda.”
Jesu kabiga maboko awe kakale mu mesho e bhofu. Ipapo nlume we bhofu kalinga zubuyanana apodziwa, ngono kabona tjimwe ne tjimwe kwakatjena.
Jesu kati ayende ku ng'umba iye, kapapha kati kunli, “Usitongo ngina mu mizi.”
Jesu ne badiyiwa babe bakapindila ku mizi imu ntuthu we Sizariya Filipi, kukati mu zila Jesu kababhuzwa kati, “Bathu banoti ndimi ani?”
Bakan'dabila beti, “Bamwe banoti ndimwi Johani we N'dubiki, koga bamwe bakati ndimwi Elija, bamwe banoti mu mmwe we balebesambeli.*”
Jesu kati kubali, “Koga imwi moti ndimi ani?”
Pita kadabila kati, “Ndimwi Mesiya.”
Jesu kabadwa kati bashete wabanobudza nge kukwe.

Wakatangisa kubadiya eti, “Iye Nkololo we Nthu wakafanila kudziyidziwa nge zwithu zwinjinji alambiwe nge bakulu* nenge Bapirisiti ne badiyi be nlayo ne kuti wakafanilo bulawa, ngono shule kwe mazhuba matatu, amuke kakale.”
Wakalebeleka akatambunuka ngekwa ikoku. Ndizo Pita kankwebela ntome, ngono kantjemela.
Koga Jesu kati eshanduka elinga ku badiyiwa babe katjemela Pita kati, “Idwa pandili Satani, ngobe aute uli ku lubizho gwe Ndzimu, koga ukuna gwe bathu.”
Ipapo kadana mbunga we bathu kose ne badiyiwa babe, ngono kati kubali, “Iye ungazha kundili ngaazwilandule, asenge tjileyanyo tjitje anditobele.
Iye unoshaka kuzwitjidza, butjilo gugwe gowonlashikila, koga iye unolashikigwa nge butjilo gugwe nge kwangu nenge Ndebo mbuya, unowogutjengeta.
Kobuzilani kuti nthu athuwe shango yose, koga ebe elashikigwa nge butjilo gugwe kene?
Ini nthu tjaangatenganya nge butjilo gugwe kene?

Iye unobhakhwa nge shoni nge kwangu nenge matama angu mu bathu bangwenu basingagagwebgwe, kakale bali batjinyi,* Nkololo we Nthu na iye unowombhatigwa nge shoni, ha ezha nge gudzo* la Tate babe, ana batumwa be kudzimu bakayengemala.”
Ipapo Jesu kabadwa kati, “Ndolebesa ndoti, bayapo bamile ipapa banowobona bushe gwe Ndzimu gozha nge masimba, basathu bakafa.”
Shule kwe mazhuba ali matathatu, Jesu kadana Pita na Jakubo na Johani, katatha nabo dombo lefu lefu pasina nthu, ngono kashanduka mbumbiko mbeli kwabo.
Zwiambalo zwizwe zwikangadzima, zwili zwitjena kwazo, kusina nsuki ungazwitjenesa sa ikoko mu shango.
Elija na Mushe bakazha bakalebeleka na Jesu.
Pita kati kuna Jesu, “N'diyi, kwaka naka kwazo kuti tibe tilipano. Dzene tingabaka mishasha mitatu, mmwe uli wenyu, mmwe uli wa Mushe, mmwe uli wa Elija.”
Wakabe eleba ikoku, ngobe wakabe asingazibe kuti ungalebani, ngoti bakabe bapalukamoyo kwazo.
Kukati ipapo gole likabafukidza, ngono hwi likalebeleka lidwa mu gole liti, “Oyu ndiye Nkololo wangu unodika, munhwilile.”
Tjinyolotjo bakati belinganya, bakasitjabone mmwe anabo, kuzhe kwa Jesu ega.
Kukati bedeluka mu dombo, Jesu kabalaya akasimisa kuti kushete wababudza tjababona, kudzina iye Nkololo we Nthu emusiwa mu bafi.
Ndizo kukasibe ne wababudza, koga bebhuzwana beti, “Kumuka mu bafi kolebani.”
Bakambhuzwa bakati, “Ini Badiyi be nlayo beti Elija wakafanilo zha kutanga?”
Ngono kati kubali, “Elija unozha kutanga kuwolulwamisa* zwithu zose, ngono ini kwakakwagwa ngekwe Nkololo we Nthu kuyi unowodziyidzika kalengudziwa?
Koga ndomudwa nditi, Elija wakazha, ngono bakathama tjimwe ne tjimwe tjabada munli sekwa kwakakwagwa.”
Bakati beswika ku bamwe badiyiwa, bakawana kuna mbunga we bathu ne Badiyi be nlayo benyanyayidzana ne badiyiwa ba Jesu.
Ipapo mbunga wose ukati ubona Jesu ukatjenama kwazo, ndizo ukantizhilila ukan'dumilisa.
Jesu kabhuzwa badiyiwa babe kati, “Molebani nabo?”
Mmwe nthu mu mbunga kanshandula eti, “N'diyi, ndazhisa nkololo wangu kumuli, ngobe una meya inonkonedza lebeleka.
Ha yammukila inonlashila pasi esiza mafulo etafuna meno ne mbili uwe uwomelela wose. Ngono ndakumbila badiyiwa benyu kuti baiduse, koga bakong'wa.”
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Tjizekugwana tjisina kugalamoyo ndimwi, ndowobe namwi tjibaka tjingapani kene? Ndowobe ne moyonlefu namwi kuswikila lini kene? Munzhise kundili.”
Bakayisa mbisana kuna Jesu, ngono meya ikati ibona Jesu ikadzipikanya mbisana iwoyo ikanligila pasi, kabumbuluka esiza mafulo.
Jesu kabhuzwa tate be mbisana kati, “Gwala ikoku kwakantangisa lini?”
Bakanshandula beti, “Kudwila mu butukununu.
Ndikanjinji inligila mu moto nenge mu vula ishaka kumbulaya, koga ha mutubula kuthama tjimwe, mutihwile ngoni mutibhatshe.”
Jesu kati kunli, “Ukati, ha mutubula? Zwithu zose zotubuka mu nthu unogalamoyo.”
Ipapo tate be mbisana bakalebeleka bakati, “Ndogalamoyo, ngono bhatshani kusagalamoyo kwangu.”
Jesu kati ebona bathu bezha bakalabuka bose katjemela meya mbi kati, “Meya we mbebebe ne bhubuzebe ndiwe, bhuda munli, usitongo buya ukabgwilila munli kakale.”
Meya ikatjema ikazunguza mbisana iwoyo kwazo, ikabhuda munli, kasala enga itumbu, bunji gwabo gukati, “Wafa.”
Koga Jesu kambhata nge luboko kammilidza, kamuka kama nge makumbo.
Jesu kangina mu ng'umba, ngono badiyiwa babe bakambhuzwa bali boga beti, “Ini iswi takong'wa kudusa meya iyeyi?”
Ngono kati, “Inonga iyeyi inodusiwa koga nge ntembezelo.”
Kudwa ipapo bakayendila mbeli bakapalama Galili. Jesu wakabe asingashake kuti kuzibgwe kwaayako.
Ngoti wakabe ediya badiyiwa babe eti kubali, “Iye Nkololo we Nthu unowobhakhwa kalongwa mu maboko e bathu, ngono banowombulaya, koga unowoti abulawa, shule kwe mazhuba matatu unowomuka.”
Koga bakabe basingahwisise ndebo iyeyi, ngono bakatja kumbhuzwisisa.
Bakaswika ku Kapenaume, ngono kati ali mu ng'umba kababhuzwa kati, “Mabe mulebeleka ngekweni mu zila?”
Koga bakanyalala, ngoti bakabe bati mu zila bakalebeleka ngekwe kuti, nkulu tjose ndiani?
Ndizo Jesu kagala pasi, kabadana bali gumi lina babili kabadwa kati, “Ha kuli kuti kuna unowobe nkulu, ngaabe iye ntukununu muna bose, kakale abe nlanda wa bose.”
Katola mwana ntukununu kambiga pakati kwabo, ngono kati entola engumbatila nge maboko kabadwa kati,
“Iye unoamutjila mwana unonga iwoyu nge zina langu, unoamutjila imi, ngono na iye unoamutjila imi, aatoamutjila imi koga, ngono unoamutjila iye wakandituma.”
Johani kan'dwa kati, “N'diyi, takabona mmwe nlume edusa meya mibi nge zina lenyu, tikan'dzibila, ngobe wakabe asi mmwe wedu.”
Koga Jesu kati, “Musin'dzibile, ngoti akuna unoshinga nshingo unolakidza simba nge zina langu ungatubula kuti, tjinyolotjo kudwapo kaleba bubi nge kwangu.
Iye usingalambane naswi nge wedu.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, iye unomupa nkombe we vula kuti mung'we, ngobe mudang'wa nge zina la Kirisiti, aangalashikigwe nge mbhayilo uwe.
“Koga iye unothama mmwe wa ibaba batukununu banogalamoyo mundili kuti bathame tjibi, koyita ha angasungiligwa gwiyo gulu mu ntshibha kalashigwa mu gungwa.
Ndizo ha luboko gugo gukuyita kuti utjinye, uguthubule. Koyita ha ungangina mu butjilo gusingapele uli tjilema, pana kuti ube ne maboko wose koga ube ulashigwa mu moto unongunguma.
Gumbo lilo ha likuyita kuti utjinye, ulithubule. Koyita ha ungangina mu butjilo uli tjilema, pana kuti ube una makumbo mabili, ngono uposegwe mu moto usingadzime.
Kakale ha zhisho lilo likuyita kuti utjinye, ulikonyombole uliduse, ngobe koyita ha ungangina mu bushe gwe Ndzimu una zhisho ling'ompela, pana kuti ube ne mesho mabili ulashigwe mu moto usingadzime.
