‘Iko kuna hwonyana dzisingafe ne moto usingadzimwe.’
“Mmwe ne mmwe unowotjenesiwa nge moto, se munyu utjenesa tjibhayilo.
“Munyu wakalulwama, koga ha washuluka, ungathamwa tjini kuti ube ne njo kakale kene?
“Ibeni ne munyu, mube ne mbakiso pakati kwenyu.”
Jesu kadwa ipapo kayenda ku ntuthu we Judiya na seli kwe Jorodani. Mibunga ye bathu ikankubunganila kakale, ndizo nge wolobela kukwe, kabadiya.
Ipapo kukazha kunli Bafarasi beshaka kuti banlike, bakambhuzwa bakati, “Apa kumu nlayo kuti nlume alambe nkadzi uwe kene?”
Jesu kabashandula nge bhuzo eti, “Mushe wakamulaya eyitini?”
Bakanshandula beti, “Mushe wakatidumila eti, ha nlume elamba nkadzi uwe, ampe lukwalo gwe kuthubukana mu ndobolo, anlambe.”
Ndizo Jesu kabadwa kati, “Mushe wakamukwalila nlayo iwoyu eyikhwa nge mimoyo yenyu mikukutu.
Koga kudwila pa kubumbiwa kwe shango, ‘Ndzimu wakababumba we tjilume ne we tjikadzi.’
‘Ndizo wali nlume unowosiya mmeyabe na tate babe kabhatana ne nkadzi uwe,
ngono ibaba babili banowobe mbili nng'ompela.’ Ndizo abatji bathu babili, koga babe mbili nng'ompela.
Ndizo Ndzimu tjawabhatshanya, kushaye nthu watjithubukanya.”
Kukati bali mu ng'umba badiyiwa babe bakambhuzwa kakale ngekwe matama iyawa.
Ngono kati kubali, “Iye unolamba nkadzi uwe elobola mmwe nkadzi, unothamila nkadzi uwe bupombgwe.
Na iyebo nkadzi unolamba nlume uwe kalobogwa nge mmwe nlume, unobe ethama bupombgwe.”
Bathu bakabe bezhisa bana kunli, kuti ndizo ababhate; ngono badiyiwa bakabatjemela.
Jesu kati ebona ikoku kagwadzamoyo, kadwa badiyiwa babe kati, “Letjani bana bazhe kundili, musibadzibile, ngobe bushe gwe Ndzimu nge gwe bakajali.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, iye usingaamutjile bushe gwe Ndzimu se mwana, aatowongina muuli.”
Ndizo kabatola nge maboko awe, kabakombolela nge kubabiga maboko.
Kwakati Jesu etangisa gwendo gugwe, mmwe nlume kanlabukila kathigama mbeli kukwe, kankumbila kati, “N'diyi wakalulwama, ndithameni kuti ndiamutjile butjilo gusingapele?”
Jesu kanshandula eti, “Ini undidana uti ndakalulwama? Akuna wakalulwama kuzhe kwe Ndzimu woga.
Unoziba milayo inoti, ‘Usibulaye, usithame bupombgwe, usikwibe, usipe butendeki* gwe manyepkhwa, usitjebele, kudza tate babo na mmeyabo.’ ”
Ngono kati kunli, “N'diyi, kose ikoku ndakakulondolodza, kudwila mu butjetjana gwangu.”
Jesu kanlinga nge ludo, kati kunli, “Kuna tjithu tjing'ompela tjaunosheta. Yenda unotengesa kose kwaunako, ukobele bashayi, ngono unowobe ne fumwa kudzimu. Kudwa ipapo uzhe unditobele.”
Ngekwa ikoku tjiso tjitje tjikafubala, ngono kayenda ana buyendasi, ngobe wakabe akafuma kwazo.
Jesu kalinga kupoteleka, kati ku badiyiwa babe, “Kwakasima seni kuna ibabo bana fumwa, kuti bangine mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Matama iyawa kakaabadza badiyiwa ba Jesu. Koga Jesu kati kubali kakale, “Bana, kwakasima seni kungina mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.
Kulelu mu kamela kuti ingine mu buli le lunji, pakuti nfumi angine mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Bakakaabala kwazo, ndizo bakati kunli, “Ndiani ngono ungatjidziwa?”
Jesu kabalinga, ngono kati, “Mu nthu akutotubuka, koga akuzojalo mu Ndzimu, ngobe zwithu zose zotubuka mu Ndzimu.”
Pita katangisa kati kunli, “Bonani, takasiya zose tikamutobela.”
Jesu kati, “Ndolebesa ndoti, akuna wakasiya nzi uwe, kene bana ba tate babe, kene mme, kene tate, kene bana, kene minda ngekwe zina langu ne Ndebo mbuya,
usingawoamutjila kwaakasiya kazana mu misi iyeyi, ng'umba ne bana ba tate babe na bomme ne bana ne minda kose ne tshiyilo, ngono mu misi inozha kawana butjilo gusingapele.
Koga banji be kutanga banowobe be bupelo ne be bupelo banowobe be kutanga.”

Bakabe ngwenu babe mu zila betathila ku Jerusalema. Jesu wakabe eyenda ali mbeli kwabo, ngono bakatjenama, ibabo bakabe bakantobela bakatja. Katola bali gumi lina babili kakale, katangisa kubabudza tjinowonshingikalila.
Eti, “Bonani, totathila ku Jerusalema, ngono Nkololo we Nthu unowolongwa mu maboko e Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo, banowontilika nlandu kuti abulawe, banowonlonga mu maboko e Bezwitjaba.*
Banowon'dadila benthwila mate benloba nge rwabha, bakambulaya, koga shule kwe mazhuba matatu unowomuka.”
Ipapo Jakubo na Johani, bakololo ba Zebhedi, bakayenda mbeli kuna Jesu bakankumbila beti, “N'diyi, toshaka kuti utithamile tjimwe ne tjimwe tjatinokukumbila.”
Jesu kababhuzwa kati, “Ini tjamunoshaka kuti ndimuyitile?”
Bakanshandula bakati, “Utipe fanilo ye kuti tigale mmwe ku luboko gugo gwe luji,* mmwe kuna gwe lumeshwe, mu bushe gugo.”
Koga Jesu kabadabila eti, “Amutoziba tjamunokumbila. Apa mungatubula kung'wa nkombe wandinong'wa, nenge kudubikiwa nge kudubikwa kwandinondubikiwa ndiko kene?”
Bakanshandula beti, “Tingakutubula.”
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Nkombe iwoyu wandinong'wa, mowoung'wa ne kudubikwa ikoku kwandinodubikwa ndiko, mowodubikwabo ndiko.
Koga kugala ku luboko gwangu gwe luji kene ku luboko gwangu gwe lumeshwe akutopiwa ndimi, koga ngekwa ibabo bakwakabigigwa.”
Ngono kukati bamwe badiyiwa bali gumi behwa matama iyawa, bakagwadzilamoyo Jakubo na Johani.
Ipapo Jesu kabadanila kunli, ngono kabadwa kati, “Moziba kuti ibaba banoyi ndibo babusi be zwitjaba, banobabusa nge kubadziyidza, ngono balauli ibabo banobalaula nge masimba.
Koga ngakusijalo mumuli. Ha kuli kuti kuna mmwe unoshaka kube nkulu pa bamwe mumuli, ngaabe nshingili wenyu,
na iyebo unoshaka kube mbeli, ngaabe nlanda wa bose.
Nkololo we Nthu naiye aazozha kuwoshingigwa, koga wakazha kuwoshingila ne kufa efila kusungunugwa kwe bathu bali banji.”
Ndizo bakaswika ku Jeriko. Jesu kati ebhuda mu Jeriko ana badiyiwa babe ne mbunga we bathu nkulu, Bhatimeo, nkumbili we bhofu, ali nkololo wa Timeo, kabe ali gele pa hwunde ye zila.
Ngono kati ehwa kuyi ndi Jesu we Nazareta, katangisa kumilidza hwi edana eti, “Jesu Nkololo wa Dafite! Undihwile ngoni!”
Koga banji bakantjemela beti, anyalale, koga kamilidzila hwi pezhugwi kadana eti, “Nkololo wa Dafite undihwile ngoni!”
Jesu kama kati, “Mun'dane.”
Ndizo bakadana nlume we bhofu bakati kunli, “Simisamoyo, umilike, unokudana.”
Kalasha ngubo yaakabe akafuka, kamilika kayenda kuna Jesu.
Jesu kambhuzwa kati, “Unoshaka kuti ndikuyitileni?”
Bhofu likanshandula likati, “N'diyi, ndoshaka kuti ndipofunuke.”
Jesu kati kunli, “Yenda, ngobe kugalamoyo kuko kwakupodza.”
Tjinyolotjo kapofunuka, ngono kasala Jesu shule.
Bakati babe pejo ne Jerusalema, beswika mu Bhetifage ne Bhetani pa Dombo le Mitoba, Jesu katuma badiyiwa babe bali babili.
Kabadwa kati, “Yendani mungine mu nzi iwoyu wamakalingisana nawo, mowoti tjinyolotjo mungina muuli mukawana donkana isina wakatongo itatha, muisunungule muizhise.
Ha kuli kuti kuna ungamudwa eti, ‘Ini muthama muijali?’ mun'dwe muti, ‘She banoyishaka, banowoibuza tjinyolotjo.’ ”
Bakayenda bakanowana donkana yakasungigwa pa nkoba pejo ne zila. Bakasunungula donkana iyeyo.
Koga ibabo bakabe bali mile ipapo bakabadwa bakati, “Moyitani, mosunungulilani donkana iyeyi kene?”
Bakababudza sekwa leba Jesu. Ndizo bakabaletja bakayenda.
Bakazhisa donkana kuna Jesu. Bakawala hazu dzabo pezhugwi kwe donkana, ngono Jesu kaitatha.
Koga banji bakawala hazu dzabo mu zila, bamwe bakawala thabi dzina mazhani manjinji dzabakakwaula ku shango.
Kukati bose bakabe bali mbeli kene shule kwa Jesu bakapululudza beti, “Hosana!
Kwakakombolegwa bushe gwa tate bedu Dafite, gunozha! Hosana, Ndzimu Upezhugwi zhugwi.”
Jesu kangina mu Jerusalema, ndizo kanongina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono kati alinga tjimwe ne tjimwe, se tjibaka tjakabe tjayenda, kabhuda kayenda ne bali gumi lina babili ku Bhetani.
Kwakati tjimuka bedwa ku Bhetani, Jesu kabhakhwa nge zhala.
Kabona nkuyu uli thambgwana wakathinila, kayenda kunobona kuti kene ungawana tjimwe muuli. Kati eswika pauli kasiwane tjimwe, ha kusi mazhani koga, nge kuti kwakabe kusathu kukabe tjibaka tje makuyu.
Ngono kaudwa kati, “Kushaye unowoja mitjelo inodwa mukuli kakale.” Badiyiwa babe bakahwa.

Ndizo bakaswika mu Jerusalema, Jesu kangina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, katata bakabe betengesa ne bakabe betenga mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu. Kapitula tafuli dze bakabe betenganya mari ne bakabe betengesa ngurukuku.
Kukasibe ne waanodumila kupalama Ng'umba ye Ndzimu akasenga thundu.
Ngono kadiya, ebadwa eti, “Apa akuzokwagwa kuyi, ‘Ng'umba yangu inowodang'wa Ng'umba ye Ntembezelo ye njudzi dzose kene?’ Koga imwi makaithama guwu le mbava.”
Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo bakahwa, ngono bakashaka zila yabanganlobesa ndiyo, ngobe bakabe bentja, nge kuti bathu bose bakabe betjenamisiwa nge zwidiyo zwizwe.
Kukati kwabe madekwana, bakabhuda mu nzi nkulu.
Bakati bepinda mangwanana, bakabona nkuyu wakalongwa bhiso ndi Jesu wakawoma kunoti ku midzi.
Pita kaalakana, ngono kadwa Jesu kati, “N'diyi, bonani, nkuyu wamakalonga bhiso wakawoma.”
Jesu kabadabila eti, “Galanimoyo mu Ndzimu.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, iye unowodwa dombo ileli eti, ‘Simuka uwile mu gungwa,’ asingadudumwe mu moyo uwe, egalamoyo kuti tjaanoleba tjowoshingikala, unowotjithamigwa.
Ndizo wali ndomubudza nditi, tjimwe ne tjimwe tjaunokumbila nge ntembezelo, ugalemoyo kuti watjiamutjila, ngono tjowobe tjitjo.
Kakale uti ha uma utembezela, uzwiibhatigwe bana milandu nawe, ndizo tate babo ba kudzimu banowokuzwiibhatigwabo milandu iyo.”
[Koga ha usingazwiibhatigwe bamwe, tate babo ba kudzimu abatowokuzwiibhatigwa milandu iyo.]
Bakazha kakale ku Jerusalema, Jesu kati atjayenda mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo ne bakulu be Bajuta bakazha kunli,
bakan'dwa bakati, “Unoshinga zwithu izwezwi nge simba lipi? Ndiani wakakudumila kuti uzwishinge?”
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Ndowomubhuzwa bhuzo ing'ompela, mundidabile, ngono ndowomubudza kuti i simba lipi landinothama zwithu izwezwi ndilo.
Kudubika kwa Johani kwakabe kudwa kudzimu kene ku bathu? Mundidabile.”
Ngono bakakangazhana tje kwabo, “Ha tingati, ‘Kwakadwa kudzimu,’ unowoti ‘Ini ngono musakan'galamoyo?’
Koga ha tingati, ‘Kwakadwa mu bathu?’ ” Bakabe betja bathu, nge kuti mmwe ne mmwe wakabe eziba kuti Johani nlebesambeli we malebeswa.
Ndizo bakashandula Jesu beti, “Atitoziba.”
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Namibo andingamubudze kuti ndoshinga zwithu izwezwi nge ndaulo ipi.”
Jesu katangisa kulebeleka nabo nge zwifaniso eti, “Mmwe nlume wakati kathama nnda we mizhambi, kaushoshela, katsha gomba linokobolegwa zhambi pakati kwawo, kabaka thungamakole
Kwakati tjabe tjibaka tje zhambi, katuma nlanda uwe kuti anontolela dzimwe zhambi dzadwa mu nnda we mizhambi.
Bakatola nlanda bakanloba, bakanshandusa akalembedza maboko.
Mweni we nnda kapapha katuma mmwe nlanda, ngono na iyebo bakaswika bakamphobola mu nsholo, bakanthama zwithu zwinombhatisa shoni.
Kabuya katumila mmwe nlanda kakale, bakaswika bembulaya, bakathama beijalo mu bamwe banjinji bakatumwa shule kukwe bakabaloba, bamwe bakababulaya.
Ngono wakabe atjisaligwa nge nkololo uwe waakabe eda kwazo. Gwe bupelo katuma iye, ezwidwa eti, ‘Banowoteta nkololo wangu.’
Koga balimi ibabo be nnda bakalebeleka tje kwabo bakati, ‘Oyu ndiye n'gali we thaka, ngatimbulayeni, kuti ndizo thaka ibe yedu.’
Bakambhata, bakambulaya, bakanlashila kuzhe kwe nnda we mizhambi.
“Mweni we nnda unowothama eyitini kene? Unowobuya kawolobesa balimi ibabo, ngono unowosayidza nnda iwoyo we mizhambi kuna bapoga.
Amuzobala matama amu hwalo dze Ndzimu anoti,
‘Bgwe lakalambiwa nge babaki,
ndilo lakabe bgwe linotambunudza mbako;
ikoku kwakayitiwa ndi She,
ngono kotjenamisa mu mesho edu?’ ”
Batungamili be Bajuta bakashaka zila yabangansunga ndiyo, ngobe bakabe babona kuti unodwa ibo, koga bakatja mbunga we bathu. Ndizo bakansiya bakayenda.
Batungamili be Bajuta bakantumila Bafarasi bamwe ne batobeli* ba Herode kuti bambhatshile mu ndebo dzidze.

Bakazha bakan'dwa bakati, “N'diyi, toziba kuti muna malebeswa, amuna hanya kuti nthu ndiani, nge kuti amutolinga mamo e bathu, koga nge malebeswa modiya zila ye Ndzimu. Apa kwakafanila kuti tilipe lukhetho kuna Kaisara kene tisilipe?”
Tigulipe kene tisigulipe? Koga Jesu kaziba butjengedzi gwabo, ngono kabadwa kati, “Apa ini mundilika kene? Zhisani ngeno loso ling'ompela ndibone.”
Ngono bakalizhisa. Kabadwa kati, “Ifano tjaani itjetji ne zina nge laani?” Bakanshandula bakati, “Nge zwa Kaisara.”
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Ipani Kaisara zwithu zwa Kaisara, mupe Ndzimu zwithu zwe Ndzimu.” Bakankaabalila.
Basadusi,* ibo bathu bakabe beti akutomukiwa mu bafi, bakazha kuna Jesu. Ngono bakambhuzwa bakati,
“N'diyi, Mushe wakatikwalila eti, ‘Ha nlume angafa esiya nkadzi asina bana, nnung'una we nfi wakafanila n'galathaka, kuti anthamile bana.’
Kwakabe kuna bamwe balume bakazwagwa bali kutendeka, bali bana be nthu. Hwola katola nkadzi, ngono kafa ensiya asina mwana.
Nnung'una uwe kan'galathaka, ngono na iyebo kafa asina mwana naye ne we butatubo katobela.
Bose bali kutendeka bakasheta mwana wabasiya. Bhelelo nkadzi kafabo.
Mu kumuka kwe bafi, unowobe nkadzi waupi? Nge kuti bose bali kutendeka bakabe bakanlobola.”
Jesu kati kubali, “Apa kusaziba hwalo kene simba le Ndzimu kwenyu ate iko kunomulasha kene?
Nge kuti ha bemuka mu bafi abatolobola, kakale abatolobogwa, koga banowobe benga batumwa be kudzimu.

Koga ngekwe kumuka kwe bafi, apa amuzobala kene mu lukwalo gwa Mushe panolebgwa ngekwe denje, kuti Ndzimu wakadwa Mushe ukati, ‘Ndimi Ndzimu wa Abhurahama, ndimi Ndzimu wa Isaki, ndimi Ndzimu wa Jakubo kene?’
Ate Ndzimu we bafi, koga Ndzimu we batjili. Mose moleyanya.”
Mmwe we Badiyi be nlayo kati esedzela pejo, kabahwa benyanyayidzana, ngono kati ehwa kuti Jesu wadabila zubuyanana, kambhuzwa kati, “Ndiupi nlayo nkulu pa mimwe?”
Jesu kadabila kati, “Nlayo nkulu pa mimwe ndi hwoyu, ‘Hwililani imwi Baiziraela, She Ndzimu wedu, She bang'ompela.
Ida She Ndzimu uwo nge moyo uwo wose nenge meya iyo yose nenge nkumbulo uwo wose nenge masimba awo wose.’
Nlayo nkulu kutobeledza ndihwoyu, ‘Ida mmwe nthu sekwa unozwida.’ Akuna mmwe nlayo unopinda iyeyi.”
N'diyi we nlayo kadwa Jesu kati, “Molebesa tjose, N'diyi. Malebesa kuti Ndzimu nng'ompela, ngono akuna mmwe Ndzimu kuzhe kwa iwo woga.
Ngono kuti tiwude nge moyo wose nenge njalakang'wa dzose nenge masimba wose nenge kuda mmwe nthu sekwa unozwida, ikoku kopinda zwipo zose zwinopisiwa ne zwimwe zwibhayilo.”
Jesu kati ehwa N'diyi we nlayo an'dabila nge butjenjedu, kan'dwa kati, “Aute uli kule kule ne bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Kudwa ipapo akuna mmwe wakatongo shaka kumbhuzwa bhuzo kene ili yakatini.
Jesu kati ediya mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu kati, “Ini badiyi be nlayo beti Mesiya nkololo wa Dafite kene?
Dafite nge kukwe wakati elaugwa nge Meya yakayengemala, kalebeleka kati,
‘She bakati kuna She wangu,
gala ku luboko gwangu gwe luji
kudzina ndibiga zwita zwizo pasi kwe makumbo awo.’
Apa Dafite ungati en'dana eti ‘She,’ ungabe nkololo uwe tjini kene?”
Bunjinji gwe bathu bakabe bakanhwilila gukashathisiwa nge ndebo iye.
Mu zwidiyo zwizwe wakalebeleka eti, “Muzwitjengete mu badiyi be nlayo, banoda kuambala hazu ndefu ndefu ne kulezwiwa ku matengeselo.
Banoda magalo mabuyanana mu ng'umba ye ntembezelo ne kuda bugalo gwe mamo ha kuli mu mizano ye zojiwa.
Banotjebela tjilikadzi, bezwiyedza bathu bakalulwama nge mitembezelo yabo milefu. Shamu yabo inowobe hwulu.”
Jesu kagala kulingisana ne panodusigwa zwipo zwe mari, kalingilila bathu banjinji belonga mari abo panolongwa zwipo mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu. Bafumi banjinji bakalonga mari manjinji.
Kukazha nshayi we tjilikadzi kalonga mari mabili e themba tukununu tjose.
Ipapo Jesu kadana badiyiwa babe kabadwa kati, “Ndolebesa nditi, iyeyi tjilikadzi isina tjayo, yadusa kupinda bose.
Bamwe bawungunula mu fumwa yabo, koga iye nenguba ali nshayi, wadusa kose kwaanako mu butjilo gugwe.”
Jesu kati ebhuda mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, mmwe we badiyiwa babe kan'dwa kati, “Bonani N'diyi, mabgwe anotjenamisa ne mbako dzinotjenamisa seni idzedzi!”
Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Unobona mbako idzedzi ne bukulu gwadzo kene? Akuna ne bgwe ling'ompela linowosala lakatiliyana ne limwe, lisingawoligigwa pasi.”
Kati agala mu Dombo le Mitoba, kulingisana ne Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, kukazha Pita na Jakubo na Johani na Enduru bakambhuzwa pasipo bathu beti,
“Utibudze kuti ikoku kowoshingikala lini, tjilakidzo tjowobe tjipi kulakidza ha zwithu izwezo zose zwabe pejo ngoshingikala?”
Ngono Jesu katangisa kubadwa eti, “Ibeni ne njele kuti kusibe ne mmwe ungamudzimidza.
Banji banowozha bezwidana nge zina langu beti, ‘Ndimi iye,’ ngono banowolasha bathu banjinji.
Koga muti ha muhwa kulebgwa ngekwe ngwa, musitongo lobgwa nge hana, ngobe kwakafanila kuti kushingikale, koga bupelo gwe gowobe gusathu gukaswika.
Ludzi gowomukila gumwe ludzi ne bushe gowomukila gumwe bushe. Kowobe ne kutengenyeka kwe shango mu mituthu yakasiyana, kukabe ne bhamba. Ngono ikoku kowobe kunga kutangisa kwe zwibhayo zwe thumbgwa.
“Koga imwi muzwitjengete, ngobe banowomuyisa ku mabazhe, mowolobgwa mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo, mukasumikilisiwa ndi boshe na boshe bakulu nge kwangu kupa butendeki mbeli kwabo.
Ndebo mbuya yakafanila kuti iswike ku njudzi dzose kutanga.

Muti ha bemusunga bemuzhisa ku lubazhe, bemutilika nlandu, musitongo dziyidzika ngoalakana kuti mowolebeleka muyitini. Koga mulebe itjo tjamunowobe mubudziwa nge tjibaka itjetjo, ngobe akutowobe kulebeleka imwi, koga kowobe kulebeleka Meya yakayengemala.
Hwola inowowongela nnung'una ku lufu, tate be nthu banowon'wongela mu lufu, bana banowomukila bazwadzi babo bakabawongela mu lufu.
Mowobengiwa nge bathu bose ngekwe zina langu. Koga iye unowodzikitadza kunoti ku bupelo, unowotjidziwa.
“Muti mubona mbipo isina gudzo le tjakayengemala ili payisakafanila kubepo (unobala ngaahwisise), ipapo bose bamu Judiya batizhile ku matombo.
Iye upezhugwi kwe ng'umba asideluke kangina mu ng'umba iye kutola tjimwe;
naiye uku minda, asibgwilile kanyi kunotola ngubo.
Yee mme wee! Kowobangalala seni kumuli imwi bakadzi bakazwisenga ne banomwisa mu misi iyeyo!
Tembezelani kuti ikoku kusishingikale mu nsi we mbaba.
Ngoti mu misi iyeyo kowobepo kudziyidzika kukulu kusakatongo bepo kudwila mu kubumbiwa kwe shango nge Ndzimu kuswikila ngwenu, akutowopapha kukabe yapo kakale.
Ngono ha She akabe asatapudza mazhuba iyawo, akuna nthu wabe angatjidziwa. Koga ngekwe bashalugwa babe baakashalula wakathama kuti mazhuba iyawo abe mashomanana.
“Mu tjibaka itjetjo ha mmwe angamudwa kati, ‘Bonani woyu Mesiya kene hwouje,’ musitongo duma.
Kowozha Bomesiya be manyepkhwa ne balebesambeli be manyepkhwa be lakidza zwilakidzilo bethama matjenamiso kulasha bathu, bukulu kwazo ibabo bakashalugwa, ha kwabe kutubuka.
Koga mube ne njele, ngoti ndamubudza tjimwe ne tjimwe kutjikale.”
“Kowoti mu mazhuba iyawo, shule kwe dzimanikano, zhuba lowoti zwititi, ne mwedzi awutowopa tjedza tjawo,
ne nyenyedzi dzowowila pasi ne masimba a pezhugwi anotengenyeka.
Ngono ipapo banowobona Nkololo we Nthu ezha ali mu makole ana masimba makulu ne tjedza.
Ipapo unowotumila batumwa be kudzimu ku mbizho nna dze shango, kukubunganya bashalugwa kudwa mu phelelo dze shango kunoti ku phelelo dze zhuzhugwi.
“Muzwidiye nge nkuyu, ha utangisa uthinila, muzibe kuti tjilimo tjabe pejo.
Ndizo namwibo muti ha mubona zwithu izwezwi zwishingikala, muzibe kuti wabe pejo pejo, upa nkoba.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, tjizekugwana itjetji atjingapinde zwithu izwezwi zose zwisathu zwikashingikala.
Zhuzhugwi na pasi zowopela, koga matama angu anowosala.
“Koga zhuba ilelo kene tjibaka itjetjo, akuna unotjiziba, batumwa be kudzimu kene iye Nkololo, abasi Tate boga.
Ibeni nge njele, mulinde, mutembezele, ngobe amutoziba kuti tjibaka tjowoswika lini.
Konga nthu ha etola gwendo, unoti ha ebhuda kapa balanda babe mishingo, mmwe ne mmwe kalingisana ne uwe. Kadwa ntjengeti we nkoba kati, ugale wakalinda.
Namwibo mugale makalinda, ngobe amutoziba kuti batetshi be nzi banowoswika lini. Pamwe banowoswika madekwana, kene pakati kwe busiku, kene hwuku dzilila kene mangwanana.
Lindani, ndizo basiti bezha makafala, bakamuwana makayizela.
Tjandinomubudza, ndobudza bose, ‘Lindani.’ ”

Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi* ne Nzano we Tjiwunga* tjisina Mbidzo, wakabe wasaligwa nge mazhuba mabili koga. Ngono Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo bakabe beshaka zila ya bangabhata Jesu ngekwa kasumbikala, kuti bambulaye.
Koga bakati, “Kusi nge tjibaka tje nzano, ngobe kungabe ne zhoba pakati kwe bathu.”

Kati ali mu Bhetani, ali gele eja mu ng'umba ya Simoni wakatongobe ne mapele, kukazha nkadzi akasenga iteme tje alabhasita* tje mafuta anonuhwa zwinozipa, e nadi* mbuyanana, ana ntengo upezhugwi kwazo, kazwinunula iteme, kadila mafuta mu nsholo wa Jesu.
Koga bangwe ipapo bakabe belebesana nge bushongola beti, “Apa mafuta iyawa anozanisigwani kene?
Abe angatengesiwa, kukawanika mari anopinda mari e siliva ali mazana matatu (300), kapiwa bashayi.” Ndizo bakantjemela.
Koga Jesu kabadwa kati, “Thubukanani naye. Apa mon'dziyidzilani kene? Kana wandiyitila tjithu tjikulu kulu kwazo.
Bashayi munabo misi yose, mungabayitila bubuya pamada, koga imi amutowobe nami misi yose.
Ihwoyu nkadzi wayita tjaangatubula, wadila mbili wangu mafuta, eululwamisila kubiganyiwa.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, kumwe ne kumwe kunowosumikigwa Ndebo mbuya iyeyi mu shango yose, tjashingwa nge nkadzi ihwoyu tjowolebgwabo, kuti libe gumbuludzo nge kukwe.”
Ipapo Judasi Isikariyoti, mmwe we bali gumi lina babili, kayenda ku Bapirisiti bakulu kuti abawongele Jesu.
Ngono bakati behwa ikoku bakashatha, bakan'gadzabgwe kuti banowompa mari. Kudwa ipapo wakatangisa kushaka tjibaka tjakalulwama tje kutengesa Jesu.

Mu zhuba le kutanga le Nzano we Tjiwunga Tjisina Mbidzo, be bhaya pkhwizana ye tjibhayilo tje kupinda pezhugwi, badiyiwa babe bakati kunli, “Ndi ngayi kwamunoshaka kuti tinomululwamisila kujila Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi?”
Ngono Jesu katuma badiyiwa babe bali babili kati, “Nginani mu nzi nkulu, ngono mowoshangana ne nlume akasenga shabana ye vula, muntobele.
Mudwe mweni we ng'umba yaanowongina muti, ‘N'diyi bakati ng'umba yangu ye bezi yandinowojila Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi ne badiyiwa bangu ndi ipi?’
Unowomulakidza ng'umba hwulu itjapezhugwi kwe imwe, yakalongwa zwigalo ikalulwamisiwa, mutilulwamisile ipapo.”
Badiyiwa ibabo bakamilika bakayenda ku nzi nkulu, bakanowana tjimwe ne tjimwe tjili sekwa aleba, ndizo bakalulwamisa.
Kwakati madekwana Jesu kaswika ne bali gumi lina babili.
Bakati bali pa tafuli beja, Jesu kati kubali, “Ndolebesa ndoti, mmwe wenyu unowondiwonga, iye unoja nami.”
Bakatangisa kungina buyendasi, ngono nge kutobedzana bakati, “Apa ndimi kene?”
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Mmwe we bali gumi lina babili, iye unoseba tjiwunga tjitje mu ndilo nami.
Iye Nkololo we Nthu unowofa sekwa kwakakwagwa nge kukwe, koga wapalala iwoyo nlume unowonga Nkololo we Nthu! Kwabe kungayita ha nlume iwoyo akabe asagala azwagwa.”
Bakati beja, Jesu katola tjiwunga, kaboka Ndzimu, katjipemula kabapa, kati kubali, “Tolani, mbili wangu ihwoyu.”
Katola bhepe le nkumbi we zhambi kati aboka kabapa iwo, bakaung'wa bose.
Kati kubali, “Awa malopa angu anothama tjidumano* tjitshwa, iwo anotebuligwa banji.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, anditowong'wa kakale nkumbi we ntjelo iwoyu we nzhambi kuswikila zhuba landinowoung'wa uli ntshwa mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Bakati bamba lumbo gunokudza Ndzimu, bakabhuda bakayenda ku Dombo le Mitoba.
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Mowondipalala mose, ngobe kwakakwagwa kukayi,
‘Ndowoloba nlisi,
ngono pkhwizi dzowopalala.’
Koga ha ndisinobe ndamusiwa mu bafi, ndowomutungamilila ku Galili.”
Pita kan'dwa kati, “Nenguba bangapalala bose, imi andingamusiye.”
Ngono Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Ndolebesa ndoti, busiku igogu, gukurume lowoti lisathu likalila kabili, unowobe wandizwilandula katatu.”
Pita kan'dabila akasimisa eti, “Imi andingamuzwilandule, bukulu ndingafa namwi.” Bose bakaleba sa ikoko.
Bakayenda pathu panodang'wa Getsemane, kati ku badiyiwa, “Galani ipapa nditjatembezela.”
Katola Pita na Jakubo na Johani, kayenda nabo, kangina buyendasi, kadziyidzika kwazo mu meya,
kati kubali, “Meya yangu izhele buyendasi kukulu kwandingafa. Salani pano makalinda.”
Kayenda thambgwana, kawila pasi katembezela ekumbila kuti, ha kutubuka dzene itjetji tjibaka tjingampinda.
Kati, “Tate bangu, akuna tjinomukona, dusani bhepe ileli le kudziyidzika pandili, nenguba kwakajalo, musiyite kuda kwangu, itani kuda kwenyu.”
Kati ebuya kawana bakayizela, kati kuna Pita, “Simoni, apa wakayizela kene? Nokong'wa kulinda awara ing'ompela koga kene?
Lindani mutembezele kuti ndizo musingine mu kulikiwa. Meya inoda tjose, koga nyama inokong'wa.”
Kabgwilila kanotembezela kakale eleba matama iwo zwawo.
Kabuya kakale ewana bakayizela, ngobe mesho abo akabe elema nge hwope. Ngono bakasizibe kuti bangan'dabila beyitini.
Kabuya gwe butatu, ngono kabadwa kati, “Apa mutjakayizela, munyaluluka zwenyu kene? Kwagala, tjabe tjibaka, Nkololo we Nthu unowongegwa mu maboko e batjinyi.
Mukani, ngatiyendeni, ngobe n'wongi wangu wabe pejo.”
Ipapo koga atjalebeleka, Judasi, iye mmwe we bali gumi lina babili, kazha ana mbunga we bathu bakasenga makanu ne swimbo, bedwa ku Bapirisiti ne badiyi be nlayo ne bakulu.
Ntengesi wakabe abapa tjilakidzo eti, “Iye wandinowoputa, ndiye, munsunge, muyende naye akalisiwa.”
Kati ezha kayenda kunli tjinyolotjo, kati eswika pana Jesu kan'dwa kati, “N'diyi wangu,” kabe emputa.
Bakambhata bakansunga.
Mmwe we bakabe bali ipapo kashomola bukanu gugwe, katema mmwe nlanda we Ntungamili we Bapirisiti, kanthubula zebe.
Ngono Jesu kababhuzwa kati, “Apa mazha kuwogwisa tjigebeng'a kene, kwamunozha makabhata makanu ne swimbo kuwonditola?
Zhuba ne zhuba ndakabe ndi namwi mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ndidiya, ngono amuzotongo ndibhata. Koga matama e hwalo dze Ndzimu ngaazhadzisike.”
Badiyiwa babe bose bakanfupatila bakatizha.
Ngono mmwe nzhuzha kantobela akafuka ngubo yoga, na iye bakambhata,
kasiya ngubo iye katizha ali mbujo.
Bakatola Jesu bakayenda naye ku Ntungamili we Bapirisiti. Bapirisiti bakulu bose ne bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo bakabe bakakubungana.
Pita wakabe akantobela ali thambgwana naye kunoti mu nsha we Ntungamili we Bapirisiti, ngono kagala ne balindi edziya moto.
Nge tjibaka itjetjo, Bapirisiti ne makulukota wose bakashaka butendeki gungasungisa Jesu, kuti abulawe, koga bakasiguwane.
Banji bakadusa butendeki gwe manyepkhwa nge kukwe, koga gwakabe gusingayendidzane.
Bamwe bakamilika bepa butendeki gwe manyepkhwa nge kukwe beti,
“Takahwa eti, ‘Ndowokolomodza ng'umba iyeyi ye Ndzimu yakabumbiwa nge maboko, koga mu mazhuba matatu ndowobaka imwe isakathamiwa nge maboko.’ ”
Nenguba kwakajalo, butendeki gwabo gwakabe gusingawililane.
Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kama pakati kwe bathu, kabhuzwa Jesu eti, “Apa autodabila batendeki ibaba tjabanoleba ngekuko kene?”
Jesu kanyalala, kasidabile tjimwe. Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kambhuzwa kakale kati, “Apa ndiwe Mesiya, Nkololo we Ndzimu unokudziwa kene?”
Jesu kati, “Ndimi. Ngono Nkololo we Nthu mowombona ali gele ku luboko gwe luji* gwe Ndzimu Masimbawose, ezha nge makole e kudzimu.”
Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kapalula zwiambalo zwizwe kati, “Titjashakilani batendeki kene?
Mazwihwigwa iye etuka Ndzimu. Moipedza tjini?”
Ngono bose bakantilika nlandu we kuti wakafanigwa nge lufu.
Bamwe bakatangisa kunthwila mate bakanzwimba mesho benloba, ben'dwa beti, “Leba kuti ndiani wakuloba.” Balindi bakantibulanya.
Pita kati atjigele pasi mu nsha, kukabe kuzha mmwe we balandakadzi be Ntungamili we Bapirisiti;
ngono kati ebona Pita edziya moto, kanlinga kan'dwa kati, “Nawebo wabe una Nnazareta iwoyu,* iye Jesu.”
Pita kalandula kati, “Anditoziba naiko anditohwisisa kuti unoleba ngekweni.” Kamilika kayenda ku nkoba.
Nlandakadzi kambona kakale, kadwa bathu bakabe bali pejo naye kati, “Iwoyu nlume mmwe wabo.”
Pita kalandula kakale.
Kukati shule kwe tjibaka tjifutshwanana, bathu bakabe bali mile ipapo bakati kuna Pita, “Malebeswa, u mmwe wabo, ngobe u N'galili.”
Pita katangisa kutuna ne kuzwilonga bhiso kati, “Iwoyu nlume wamunoleba nge kukwe anditonziba.”
Ipapo gukurume likalila gwe bubili, Pita kakumbula matama akabe alebgwa ndi Jesu eti, “Gukurume lowoti lisathu likalila kabili, unowobe wandizwilandula katatu.” Pita kadila guwo.
Kwakati zhuba liyedza, Bapirisiti bakulu ne bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo bakashangana ne makulukota wose, bakalebesana, ngono bakasunga Jesu nge mitjili bakayenda naye kuna Pilato.
Pilato kaswika kambhuzwa kati, “Ndiwe She nkulu we Bajuta?”
Jesu kanshandula kati, “Waleba.”
Bapirisiti bakatangisa kuntilika milandu minjinji.
Pilato kambhuzwa kakale kati, “Apa auna tjaungaleba kene? Autohwa kuti banokutilika milandu mingapani?”
Koga Jesu kasitongo dwilila nge kubadabila, Pilato katjenama.
Ngwenu bathu bakabe bakawolobela kuti nge Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi Pilato abasunungulile nthu ng'ompela, wabanobe bakumbila.
Ngono nge tjibaka itjetjo, kwakabe kuna mmwe nlume wakabe edang'wa Bharabhasi ali pakati kwe basungwa mu ng'umba ye basungwa nge nlandu we kubulaya mu nsi we kupanduka.
Mbunga we bathu ukazha kuna Pilato kuwonkumbila kuti abathamile sekwa agala ebathamila.
Kabashandula eti, “Moshaka kuti ndimusunungulile She nkulu we Bajuta kene?”
Wakabe abona kuti Bapirisiti bakulu bazhisa Jesu kunli ngobe bana fupa.
Koga Bapirisiti bakulu bakabe bafulila bathu kale kuti, bakumbile Bharabhasi mu bumo gwa Jesu.
Pilato kababhuzwa kakale kati, “Ngono ndithameni ngekwe nlume iwoyu, wamunoti, ‘Ndi She nkulu we Bajuta?’ ”
Bathu bakamimila beti, “Mumbambule.”
Pilato kapapha kabhuzwa eti, “Nge kutini, wathama bubi gupi?”
Koga bunji gukadwilila guti, “Mumbambule.”
Ndizo Pilato kasunungula Bharabhasi, ngobe wakabe eshaka shathisa bathu. Kudwapo kati Jesu alobgwe, shule kwa ikoko kampitshila ku Bajuta kuti bambambule mu tjileyanyo.
Kudwapo Jesu wakatogwa nge babhayani bakangina naye mu ng'umba ye nlauli, bakadanana bose.
Bakatola hazu ye mbala nshaba wakabondelela, bakanfukidza, bakanlukila tjiala* tje mihwa, bakambadza itjo.
Bakatangisa kun'dumilisa beti, “Ngakukudziwe She nkulu we Bajuta.”
Bakanloba mu nsholo nge lushanga, benthwila mate. Bakathigama mbeli kukwe se banonteta.
Bakati bepedza kun'dadila, bakambula hazu shaba bakambadza zwiambalo zwizwe. Bakabe bentungamilila kwabanonombambulila.

Bakati bali mu zila benombambula, bakashangana ne mmwe nlume wakabe edang'wa Simoni we ku shango inoyi Sirene, eswika edwa kwaakabe edwa bakankombeledza kusenga tjileyanyo tja Jesu. Wakabe ali tate ba Alekizanda na Rufu.
Bakayenda bakanoswikisa Jesu pathu panodang'wa Gologota, kunodwa kuti pathu pe ipepe tje nsholo.
Ngono bakampa nkumbi wakashanganyiwa ne nti unodang'wa mira,* koga Jesu kaulamba.
Bakambambula mu tjileyanyo, bekobana zwiambalo zwizwe, bekandila kubona kuti ndiani unotola tjipi.
Bakambambula nge tjibaka tje zhanalume mangwanana.
Nlandu wa Jesu wakabe wakakwagwa kuyi, “SHE NKULU WE BAJUTA.”
Zwigebeng'a zwibili zwakabambugwa naye, mmwe ku luboko gwe luji, mmwe kuna gwe lumeshwe.
Hwalo dzikazhadzisika dzinoti, “Wakabaligwanyiwa ne batjinyi.”
Kwakati ne bakabe bepinda napo bakan'gongobola, bedzungudza misholo bentuka beti, “Iwe unokolomodza ng'umba ye Ndzimu ukabuya ukayibaka kakale mu mazhuba ali matatu,
tjizwitjidza ngono, udeluke mu tjileyanyo!”
Bapirisiti ne badiyi be nlayo bakan'dadilabo beti, “Wakatjidza bamwe, aatotubula kuzwitjidza.
Mesiya, She nkulu we Iziraela ngaadeluke mu tjileyanyo, kuti ndizo tibone, tigalemoyo.”
Ngono na ibabo bakabe bakabambugwa naye bakankayikanya.
Kwakati nge tjibaka tje masikati makulu, kukabe ne zhalima gulu mu shango yose, kukadzina kukanoti nge tjibaka tje butatu mu matewuko.
Ipapo Jesu kamilidza hwi kadana eti, “Eloi, Eloi lama sabakatani?” Kunodwa kuti, “Ndzimu wangu, Ndzimu wangu, mandisiyilani kene?”
Bamwe bathu bakabe bakalingilila bakati behwa eijalo bakati, “Hwililani, unodana Elija.”
Mmwe wabo kalabuka kadubika lungudze mu nkumbi wakatyorowa, kagubhayila mu lukombo kayisa ku nlomo wa Jesu, kati ku bamwe, “Imani tibone kene Elija unowozha kuwontulula.”
Ipapo Jesu kalilila pezhugwi kabe epela.
Nge tjibaka itjetjo tjisitili tje ng'umba ye Ndzimu tjikapaluka pakati, kudwa pezhugwi kunoti pasi.
Nlauli we babhayani bali zana wakabe ali mile akalingisana na Jesu, ebona Jesu epela kati, “Tjoselele iwoyu nlume wabe ali Nkololo we Ndzimu.”
Kwakabe kuna bamwe bakadzi bali mile thambgwana bakalingilila kose ikoku. Bamwe babo bakabe bali Mariya we Magadala na Mariya, mme ba Jakubo ntjetjana na Josefa, bana Salome.
Bakabe bazha na Jesu kudwa ku ntuthu we Galili, bembhatsha. Kwakabe kuna bamwe bakadzi banjinji bakabe bazha na Jesu ku Jerusalema.
Kwakati madekwana eswika, iko kuli Zhuba le Kululwamisila le Sabata, lili zhuba linotobela le Sabata,
Josefa we ku Arimateya ali mmwe bathu bakabe bana mamo mu makulukota wakabe agala abe akalindila bushe gwe Ndzimu, kasimisamoyo kayenda kuna Pilato kunokumbila itumbu tja Jesu.
Ngono Pilato katjenama kuti Jesu wafa kale, kadana nlauli we babhayani bali zana kuti ambhuzwe kene Jesu ungabe afa kale.
Wakati ehwa nge nlauli we babhayani kuti Jesu wafa, kasunungulila itumbu Josefa kuti atjitole.
Josefa kamilika kayenda kanotenga jila, kazha katulula itumbu tja Jesu, katjipetela kanotjibiganya mu ikumbu tjakatshiwa mu shongwe. Kakunguludzila shongwe pa nkoba we ikumbu kuti azhalile.
Mariya we Magadala na Mariya mme ba Josefa bakabona pabiganyiwa Jesu.
Ngono kukati nsi we Sabata wapinda, Mariya we Magadala, na Mariya mme ba Jakubo, na Salome bakatenga mimotsha kuti banozhodza mbili wa Jesu.
Kukati ku tjimangwanana e zhuba le kutanga le tshipi zhuba labhuda, bakayenda ku ikumbu tja Jesu.
Bakati bali mu zila bakabhuzwana beti, “Apa ndiani unowonotikunguludzila shongwe i pa nkoba we ikumbu kene?”
Koga bakati belinga bakabona kuti shongwe iyeyo yakakunguludzigwa ntome. Yakabe ili shongwe hwulu hwulu kwazo.
Ngono bakati bengina mu ikumbu, bakawana kuna nzhuzha ugele tje ku luji gwe pakabe pa kushikiwa Jesu, akaambala zwiambalo zwitjena, bakatjenama kwazo.
Kabadwa kati, “Musitjename, moshaka Jesu we Nazareta, wakabambugwa. Wamuka, aapo ipapa, lingani paakabe akakushikiwa.
Koga, yendani munobudza badiyiwa babe na Pita kuti, ‘Unoyenda ku Galili mbeli kwenyu, mowonombonako sekwa akamubudza.’ ”
Ndizo bakabhuda mu ikumbu ngono bakatizha, betetema bakakaabala, bakayenda kusina wabanobudza tjimwe, ngoti bakabe betja.
Wakati emuka nge zhuba le kutangisa le tshipi, kabong'wa gwe kutanga ndi Mariya we Magadala, iye waakadusa meya mibi ili kutendeka.
Kayenda kanobudza bamwe bose bakabe beyenda na Jesu atjatjila, bakabe batjimu tjililo.
Ngono bakati behwa kuti unotjila ne kuti Mariya we Magadala wambona, bakasigalemoyo tjaanoleba.
Shule kwa ikoku Jesu kabong'wa kakale nge bamwe babili be badiyiwa babe beyenda bali mu shango.
Ngono na ibo bakati bambona bakashanduka, bakanobudza bamwe, koga bakanyanyayidza.
Kukati shule kabong'wa nge bali gumi lina ng'ompela, wakabawana beja, ngono kabakayikanyila kusagalamoyo kwabo ne kube ne moyo nkukutu ngobe basakagalamoyo ibabo bakambona asinomusiwa.
Ndizo kabadwa kati, “Yendani mu shango yose, mudiye dama le Ndzimu mu bathu bose.
Mmwe ne mmwe unowogalamoyo kabuya kadubikiwa, unowotjidziwa, koga usingagalemoyo unowobong'wa nlandu, kalobesiwa.
Ezwi zwilakidzo zowoboneka muna banogalamoyo: nge zina langu banowodusa meya mibi mu bathu, banowolebeleka nge ndimi dzipoga.
Banowobhata nyoka nge maboko, ha bangang'wa tjimwe tjinobulaya, atjitowobati tjimwe, banowopodza bagwele nge kubabiga maboko.”
Ndizo She Jesu kati alebeleka nabo, kamilidzigwa kudzimu, kanogala ku luboko gwe luji gwe Ndzimu.
Ngono badiyiwa babe bakamilika bakayenda besumikila Ndebo mbuya kumwe ne kumwe. She wakabe eshinga nabo elakidza kuti malebeswa nge zwilakidzilo.
[Bakadzi bakayenda kuna Pita ne bazwalani babe ngono bakababudza nge bufupi tjababudziwabo.
Kudwa ipapo Jesu nge kukwe wakadzwala shango yose kudwa ku bhezhuba kunoti ku golombedzo, matama akayengemala e jidzo lisingapele.]
Banji bakazwipa kukwala mbiko ye zwithu zwakashingikala
koga sekwa takazwibudziwa ndi ibabo bakabe balipo kutanga, bali batendeki kakale bali bashingili be dama le Ndzimu.
Ndizo se imi ndakashakisisa nge njele tjimwe ne tjimwe, kutangisa, ndawana kwakandilulwamila kuti ndimukukwalile ndebo yakatambunuka, imwi tate Teofilo,
kuti ndizo muzibe malebeswa ngekwe zwithu zwamakadiyiwa.
Mu misi ya Herode she nkulu we Judiya, kwakabe kuna mpirisiti edang'wa kuyi Zakariya, ali mmwe we goko la Abhiya, ngono wakabe ana nkadzi zina lile lili Elizabeta ali mmwe we zwizekugwana zwa Aroni.
Bubili gwabo, bakabe bali balulwami mu mesho e Ndzimu, basina nlandu belondolodza milayo ya She yose, ne ndaulo dzidze.
Koga bakabe basina bana ngobe Elizabeta wakabe asingathame bana, kakale bakabe bakwegula bose bubili.
Ndizo kukati kuli zolo le goko la Zakariya kubhata nshingo we bupirisiti se kwaakabe ali mpirisiti we Ndzimu,
kashalugwa nge hakata kuyendidzana ne tjilenje tje bupirisiti kungina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu She ne kupisa motsha.
Mu tjibaka itjetjo tje kupisa motsha, gubungano le bathu lakabe litembezela kuzhe. Ng'umba ye Ndzimu
Ipapo ntumwa wa She kazwilakidza kunli, ali mile ku luji gwe tjibeso tje motsha.
Kukati Zakariya embona, kadziyidzika kakale katjenama, ngono katja kwazo.
Koga ntumwa we kudzimu kati kunli, “Usitje Zakariya, ntembezelo uwo wahwika. Nkadzi uwo Elizabeta unowokuwanila mwana we tjilisana, ngono unowon'dana uti Johani.
Unowobe ne kushatha ukapululudza, ne banji banowoshatha mu kuzwagwa kukwe,
ngobe Johani unowobe nkulu mu mesho a She. Aatowong'wa nkumbi we zhambi, kene tjimwe tjing'o tjakabila. Ngobe unowozhadziwa nge Meya yakayengemala kudwila tjose atji mu tjibumbilo tja mmeyabe.
Unowoshandusila bana banji be Iziraela kuna She, Ndzimu wabo.

Kakale unowoyenda mbeli kwa She mu meya ne mu masimba a Elija, eshandusila mimoyo ya botate ku bana babo, ne basingahwe kathama kuti bahwilile Ndzimu bayende mubutjejendu gwe balulwami, elulwamisila bathu kuzha kwa She.”
Ngono Zakariya kabhuzwa ntumwa kati, “Ndingabe ne malebeswa tjini ngekwa ikoku? Ndi nthuntana ne nkadzi wangu wakwegula.”
Ntumwa we kudzimu kan'dabila kati, “Ndimi Gabhariyele, imi ndinoma mbeli kwe Ndzimu misi yose. Ndatumwa kulebeleka nawe ne kukubudza ndebo mbuya iyeyi.
Bona! Unowobe mbebebe ukasilebeleke kuswikila zhuba linowoshingikala zwithu izwezwi, ngobe auzogalamoyo matama angu, anowozhadzisika nge tjibaka tjawo.”
Ipapo bathu bakabe bakalindila Zakariya, ngono bakatjenamisiwa nge kunonoka kukwe mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu.
Ngono kukati ebhuda, kasitubule kulebeleka nabo. Bakaziba ha abona mbono mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu. Wakalebeleka nabo nge maboko koga asingatubule kulebeleka nge nlomo.
Kukati zolo lile lawila le kushinga lapela kabgwilila kanyi.
Shule kwe mazhuba iyawo nkadzi uwe Elizabeta kazwisenga ngono kazwisumbika mwedzi ili mishanu,
eti “She wandishingila ikoku mu mazhuba iyawa, wandilinga nge ngoni dzidze kandidusa shoni pakati kwe bathu.”
Shule kwe mimwedzi ili mitathatu Elizabeta akazwisenga, Ndzimu wakatuma ntumwa wawo Gabhariyele ku Nazareta nzi u mu ntuthu we Galili
ku mmwanadi wakabe akabiganyidzigwa ndobolo ne nlume wakabe eyi Josefa, we nsha wa Dafite. Zina le mmwanadi iwoyo lakabe lili Mariya.
Ntumwa we kudzimu kayenda kunli kati, “Dumila iwe unodika kwazo, She banawe!”
Mariya kadziyidzika kwazo nge matama awe, ngono katjenama kuti hwudumilisa kwakatini ikoku.
Koga ntumwa we kudzimu kati kunli, “Usitje, Mariya, Ndzimu wakuda.
Unowozwisenga, ngono ukawana mwana we tjilisana, unowontumila zina uti Jesu.
Unowobe nkulu, kakale unowodang'wa Nkololo we Ndzimu Upezhugwi zhugwi. She Ndzimu banowompa tjigalo tje bushe gwa batategulu babe Dafite,
ngono unowobusa nge kusingapele mu ng'umba ya Jakubo, bushe gugwe agutowopela.”
Mariya kabhuzwa ntumwa we kudzimu eti, “Ikoku kowoshingikala tjini, se ndili mmwanadi ndisathu aziba nlume kene?”

Ntumwa we kudzimu kashandula eti, “Meya yakayengemala inowozha mukuli ne masimba e Ndzimu Upezhugwi zhugwi anowobe mukuli. Ndizo mwana iwoyo waunowozwala, unowobe N'yengemali, kadang'wa kuyi Nkololo we Ndzimu.
Na Elizabeta gamu* lilo, unowobe ne mwana nenguba akakwegula, iye wakabe ali balumbila umu mwedzi uwe we butathatu.
Akuna tjisingatubuke ku Ndzimu.”
Mariya kashandula eti, “Imi ndi nlanda wa She, ngakushingikale kundili sekwa waleba.” Ipapo ntumwa we kudzimu kansiya.
Kukati mu mazhuba iyawo Mariya kazwilulwamisa, kalibilidza kayenda ku nzi umu ntuthu we matombo, e Judiya,
ngono kaswika kangina mu nzi* wa Zakariya, kadumilisa Elizabeta.
Ndizo kukati Elizabeta ehwa dumiliso ya Mariya, mwana katjuluka mu ntumbu uwe, Elizabeta kazhala Meya yakayengemala.
Kalebelekela pezhugwi kati, “Wakakombolegwa mu bakadzi bose, ndizo wakakombolegwa mwana waunowowana!
Koga ini kwashingikala kuti mme ba She wangu, bazhe kundili?
Ndati koga ndihwa udumilisa, mwana umu ntumbu wangu katjuluka nge kushatha.
Wakakombolegwa ngobe wakagalamoyo kuti matama awakabudziwa ndi She anoshingakala!”
Mariya kati,
“Meya yangu inokudza She.
Meya yangu inoshatha ngekwe Ndzimu Ntjidzi wangu,
ngobe wayitila hanya butukununu gwe nlandakadzi uwe.
Kudwa nasi zwizekugwana zose zondidana wakakombolegwa,
ngobe Ndzimu Masimbawose wandishingila zwikulu,
Zina lawo lakayengemala.
Unohwila zogwadza ibabo banoutja, banouteta
kudwa mu tjizekugwana kunoti mu tjizekugwana.
Wakathama zwikulu nge luboko gwawo;
Ukapaladza ibabo banozwikudza, mumimoyo yabo.
Wakadelusa boshe mu zwigalo zwabo zwe bushe.
Koga ukamilidzila pezhugwi ibabo batukununu.
Wakagutsha bana zhala nge zwithu zwakanaka,
koga bafumi kabashandusa bakalembedza maboko.
Wakabhatsha nlanda uwe Iziraela,
ukumbulukigwa mahwilo zogwadza,
sekwa wakalebeleka na botate bedu, bo Abhurahama
ne zwizekugwana zwabo kusingapele kose.”
Mariya kagala na Elizabeta kungabe mimwedzi mitatu, kudwapo kabgwilila kanyi.
Kwakati tjibaka tjatjizha, tje kuti Elizabeta awane mwana, katshibama mwana we tjilisana.
Ngono babakidzani naye ne makamu awe bakahwa kuti She wakanhwila ngoni kukulu, bakashatha naye.
Ndizo mu zhuba le buzhanakadzi (8) bakazha kuwothumbila
Koga mmeyabe bakalebeleka beti, “Akutowojalo, unowodang'wa kuyi Johani.”
Bakati kunli, “Akuna mmwe pakati kwe makamu awo una zina ilelo.”
Ndizo bakalebeleka nge maboko na tate babe, beshako ziba kuti ibo tate be mwana banoda kuntumila beti ani.
Zakariya kakumbila mbgwe linokwaligwa, ngono kakaabadza mmwe ne mmwe ngokwala eti, “Zina lile ndi Johani.”
Tjinyolotjo kazhula nlomo ne lulimi gugwe gukasununguka, katangisa kulebeleka, elumbidza Ndzimu.
Babakidzani naye bakatjenama kwazo ne mu ntuthu wose we matombo we Judiya, bathu bakabe belebeleka ngekwe zwithu izwezwi zose.
Mmwe ne mmwe wakahwa ikoku ezwibhuzwisisa eti, “Mwana iwoyu ini tjaanowobe itjo ngono?” Ngobe simba la She lakabe lilimunli.
Tate ba Johani Zakariya bakazhala Meya yakayengemala, ngono bakalebelambeli beti,
“Gudzo ngalibe muna She, Ndzimu we Iziraela,
ngobe wazha ku bathu bawo ukabadzutunula.
Watizhisila Ntjidzi una masimba
unodwa mu ng'umba ye nlanda uwe Dafite.
Sekwa wakaleba nge balebesambeli* bao
bakayengemala kudwa ntolo,
kuti takafanila tjidziwa mu zwita zwedu,
ne mu maboko abose bakatibenga.
Wakathama ikoku kulakidza mahwilo zogwadza
akagadziwabgwe bobatategulu bedu,
ne kukumbula tjidumano* tjawo tjakayengemala,
ne kutuna kwawakatuna kuna tate bedu Abhurahama,
kutisunungula mu maboko e zwita zwedu,
kuti titubule kushingila She tisingatje, tjimwe
mu kuyengemala ne kululwama mbeli kukwe,
mu butjilo gwedu gose.
Nawe mwanangu, unowodang'wa
nlebesambeli we Ndzimu Upezhugwi zhugwi,
ngobe unowoyenda mbeli kwa She kunlulwamisila zila
kupa bathu ba She zibo ye kuti jidzo lozha
nge kuzwiibhatigwa kwe zwibi zwabo,
nge mahwilo zogwadza e Ndzimu
kowopenya tjedza mutili tjidwa zhuzhugwi.
Kupa tjedza ibabo
bagele mu zhalima ne bamu ntutshi we lufu,
kutitungamilila mu zila ye kunyalala.”
Ngono mwana kakula kasima mu meya, ndizo kagala mu tjilambanyika kudzina eboneka patjena ku Iziraela.
Kwakati mu misi iyeyo, Kaisara Agusito, kadusa nlayo unoti, mazina e bathu mu shango yose ye Roma akwagwe.
Kukwagwa ikoku, kwakabe kuli kwe kutanga kuthamiwa, Kwiriniyo ali nlauli we Siriya.
Ngono mmwe ne mmwe kayenda kanyi kwabo kunozwikwalisa.
Josefa na iye kabhuda mu Galili mu nzi we Nazareta, kayenda ku Judiya ku nzi* wa Dafite unodang'wa Bhetelehema, ngobe wakabe ali we nsha wa Dafite.
Kayenda ikoko kunozwikwalisa na Mariya waakabe abiganyidzila ndobolo. Mariya wakabe akuligwa.
Kukati batji ikoko, tjibaka tjikazha tjekuti mwana azwagwe,
ngono katshibama mbano iye ye tjilisana. Kampetela nge matyila ngono kankushika mu n'goro, ngobe kusina bugalo mu ng'umba ye bezi.
Kwakabe kuna balisi mu ntuthu iwoyo, begala mu shango bakalisa pkhwizi dzabo busiku.
Ntumwa wa She kaboneka kubali ne tjedza tja She tjikapenya kubapoteleka, ndizo bakatja.
Koga ntumwa we kudzimu kati kubali, “Musitje! Ngobe bonani, ndamuzhisila ndebo mbuya ye kushatha kukulu, kunowozha mu bathu bose.
Nasi mu nzi wa Dafite, mazwaligwa Ntjidzi, Kirisiti ali She.
Tjilakidzo kumuli tjowobe etji, mowowana mwana akapetegwa nge matyila ali lele mu n'goro.”
Tjinyolotjo kwakaboneka ntumwa we kudzimu ana bunji gwe goko le kudzimu bekudza Ndzimu beti,
“Gudzo ngalibe ku Ndzimu Upezhugwi zhugwi kudzimu,
ne mu shango ngakubepo kunyalala mu bathu banoushathisa.”
Kukati batumwa be kudzimu batjibgwilila kudzimu, balisi bakalebesana beti, “Ngatiyendeni ku Bhetelehema tinobona tjithu itjetji tjashingikala, tjatalakidziwa ndi She.”
Ndizo bakalibilidza bakayenda, bakawana Mariya na Josefa ne mwana ali lele mu n'goro.
Bakati bambona, bakaleba sekwa bababudziwa ngekwe mwana iwoyu.
Bose bakahwa bakatjenamila tjalebwa nge balisi.
Koga Mariya kalondolodza zwithu izwezwi zose, kazwikumbula mu moyo uwe.
Balisi bakabgwilila, bekudza Ndzimu beulumbidza mu zwithu zose zwabakabe bahwa ne zwabakabe babona ngobe zwakabe zwili sekwa bakabe babudziwa.
Mu zhuba le buzhanakadzi, kukabe kwabe tjibaka tjekuti athumbigwe, ngono katumigwa zina kuyi Jesu, zina laakapiwa nge ntumwa we kudzimu mmeyabe basathu bakazwisenga.
Kukati tjibaka tje kutjenepadza kuyendidzana nge nlayo wa Mushe* tjazha, Josefa na Mariya bakayisa Jesu ku Jerusalema kumpa She Ndzimu
sekwa kwakakwagwa mu nlayo wa She kuyi, “Mbano imwe ne imwe ye mbisana inowobigigwa ntome kuti ibe mwana wa She,”
kakale bakabe benolondolodza tjimu nlayo wa She nge kudusa tjibhayilo, “Njiba mbili kene ngurukukwana mbili.”

Kwakabe kuna mmwe nlume mu Jerusalema edang'wa kuyi Simiyoni. Wakabe akalulwama mu mesho e Ndzimu akazwipa nge buzhalo. Wakabe akalindila Ndzimu kubhatsha Iziraela ne Meya yakayengemala yakabe ili munli.
Wakabe azumbunuligwa nge Meya akayengemala kuti aangafe asathu kabona Kirisiti* wa She.
Meya yakayengemala ikathama kuti Simiyoni angine mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu. Kukati bazwadzi bazhisa mwana wabo Jesu kuwonthamila tjinoshakwa nge nlayo,
Simiyoni kamfukata nge maboko awe, ngono kakudza Ndzimu eti,
“She, sekwa makagadzabgwe,
ngwenu tjiletjani nlanda wenyu eyizele nge mbakiso.
Ngobe mesho angu abona jidzo lenyu,
lamakathama* mbeli kwe bathu bose.
Tjedza tje zumbunulo kuna be zwitjaba,
ne tjilumbi tje bathu benyu Iziraela.”
Tate na mme be mwana bakatjenamisiwa nge tjinolebgwa nge kukwe.
Ipapo Simiyoni kabakombolela, ngono kati kuna Mariya mmeyabe, “Mwana iwoyu wakabigigwa kuwa ne kumuka kwe banji mu Iziraela ne kube tjilakidzo tjinowonyanyayidziwa.
Ngono unowohwa zogwadza ukanga nthu wabhayiwa nge thumo kuti ndizo Ndzimu uzumbunule tjinokumbugwa ne mmwe ne mmwe.”

Kwakabe kuli yapo nlebesambeli we tjikadzi edang'wa Anna, ali nkololokadzi wa Fanuele, we ludzi gwa Asheri. Wakabe akakwegula kwazo. Wakatjila ne nlume uwe makole ali kutendeka shule kwe ndobolo yabo, nlume uwe kabe efa.
Ngono ipapo kabe tjilikadzi kuswikila ana makole ali makumi ali zhanakadzi ana makole manna. Wakabe asingabhude mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, koga enamata Ndzimu siku ne sikati, ezwinyima zojiwa, etembezela.
Kazha kubali tjibaka itjetjo, kaboka Ndzimu kalebeleka ngekwe mwana kuna bose bakabe bakalindila kusunungugwa kwe Jerusalema.
Kukati Josefa na Mariya bapedza zose zwinoshakwa nge nlayo wa She, bakabgwilila ku nzi wa kanyi kwabo we Nazareta mu ntuthu we Galili.
Ndizo mwana kakula kasima kakale akatjenjela kwazo ne Ndzimu un'da.
Gole ne gole bazwadzi ba Jesu bakabe beyenda ku Jerusalema ku Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi.*
Kukati ana makole ali gumi lina makole mabili, bakayenda ku nshingo se wolobela kwabo.
Kukati nshingo wapela bebgwilila kanyi, mbisana Jesu kasala mu Jerusalema, koga bazwadzi babe bakasizibe ikoku.
Bakayenda gwendo gwe zhuba lose bekumbula kuti umuna ibabo babanoyenda nabo. Bakatangisa kunshaka mu makamu abo ne mu bazwalani babo.
Bakati bansheta bakabgwilila ku Jerusalema kunshaka.
Shule kwe mazhuba matatu bakan'wana mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ali gele pakati kwe badiyi be nlayo, akabahwilila kakale ebabhuzwa dzibhuzo.
Bose bakahwa bakatjenamila kuhwisisa kukwe nenge dabilo dzidze.
Kukati bazwadzi babe bembona bakakaabala. Mmeyabe bakati kunli, “Mwanangu, ini watibhata uyijali! Bona, tabe tikushaka na tate babo, tidziyidzika mu meya.”
Kababhuzwa kati, “Ini mabe mundishaka? Amuzobe muziba kuti ndakafanila kube mu ng'umba ya Tate bangu kene?”
Koga bakasihwisise ndebo yaaleba ebabudza.
Shule kwa ikoko kayenda nabo ku Nazareta, ngono ebateta. Koga mmeyabe bakalondolodza zwithu izwezwi zose mu moyo wabo.
Jesu kakula akatjenjela kwazo, ediwa nge Ndzimu nenge bathu.

Kwakati mu gole le bugumi lina makole mashanu le bushe gwa Tibheriyasi (She nkulu we Roma) misi ya Pontiyo Pilato ali nlauli we Judiya, she Herode wakabe ebusa mu ntuthu we Galili. Nnung'una uwe Filipo, ali she we mituthu ye Itureya ne Tirakonitisi, Lisaniyasi iye ali she we Abhileni,
mu misi iyeyo ya Anasi na Kaifasi bali Batungamili be Bapirisiti, Ndzimu ukalebeleka na Johani nkololo wa Zakariya mu tjilambanyika.
Johani kayenda mu ntuthu wose upejo ne Jorodani, esumikila kuti bathu bashandukile matjinyo abo badubikwe ili tjilakidzo tje kuti bazwiibhatigwa zwibi zwabo.
Sekwa kwakakwagwa mu lukwalo gwa Isaya nlebesambeli kuyi,
“Hwi le unodanilila mu tjilambanyika eti,
‘Lulwamisani zila ya She,
tambunudzani zijana dzidze.
Nkuku mmwe ne mmwe unowovukidziwa,
dombo ne duthu limwe ne limwe lowodusiwa.
Zila dzakakombama
dzowotambunudziwa,
zila dzina mabundo ne makorokoro dzowolobegwa
ne bathu bose banowobona jidzo le Ndzimu.’ ”
Johani kadwa mibunga ye bathu bakabe bezha kuwodubikwa ndiye, “Bana be nyoka ndimwi! Ndiani wamutjenjedza, kuti mutizhe bushongola gunozha kene?

Shingani mishingo inolakidza kuti makashandukila matjinyo enyu. Ngono musitongo tangisa kuzwidwa muti, ‘Iswi ti bana ba Abhurahama.’ Ndomudwa nditi Ndzimu unotubula kuthamila Abhurahama bana nge mabgwe iyawa.
Nangwenu wali, shathu lakabigwa kale pa midzi ye miti, ndizo nti mmwe ne mmwe usingazwale zwizwalo zwakalulwama, unowotemiwa ukalashigwa mu moto.”
Mbunga we bathu ukambhuzwa ukati, “Tishingeni ngono?”
Johani kashandula eti, “Iye una yempe mbili ngaakobane ne usina ne una zojiwa ngaathame sa ikokobo.”
Bakhethisi na ibobo bakazha kuwodubikiwa. Ngono bakabhuzwa beti, “N'diyi, tishingeni?”
Kabashandula eti, “Musitole lukhetho gunopinda kwamalauligwa.”
Ipapo babhayani bakambhuzwa beti, “Ngono iswike, tishingeni?”
Kadabila kati, “Mushete wamatolela mari nge kunkombeledza kene ngotjebela, shathilani ndipo yenyu.”
Se bathu bakabe bakalindila nge kugalabgwe, bezwibhuzwa mu mimoyo yabo kuti kene Johani ungabe ali iye Mesiya.

Koga Johani kabadwa bose kati, “Imi ndomudubika nge vula, koga kowozha iye una masimba kundipinda, wandisakalizana kusunungula mitjili ye khwebana dzidze. Iye unowomudubika nge Meya yakayengemala nenge moto.
Luselo
Ngono Johani kalaya bathu nge zila njinji, esumikila ndebo mbuya kubali.
Koga Johani kati etjemela she Herode ngekwa Herodiyasi nkadzi we nnung'una uwe, mu na zose zwithu zwakabipa zwaakashinga,
Herode kapapha bubi igogu nge kuzhalilila Johani mu ng'umba ye busungwa.
Kukati bathu bose badubikwa, Jesu adubikiwabo. Ngono Jesu kati etembezela, kudzimu kukazhuka,
Meya yakayengemala ikadelukila pezhugwi kukwe ili mu mbumbiko ye njiba. Ngono hwi likadwa kudzimu liti, “Iwe u Nkololo wangu wandinoda, unondishathisa kwazo.”
Kwakati Jesu etangisa nshingo uwe, wakabe ana makole angabe makumi matatu. Kwakabe kuyi nkololo wa Josefa, Josefa ali nkololo wa Heli,
Heli ali nkololo wa Matati, Matati ali nkololo wa Levi, Levi ali nkololo wa Meliki, Meliki ali nkololo wa Janai, Janai ali nkololo wa Josefa,
Josefa ali nkololo wa Matatiyasi, Matatiyasi ali nkololo wa Amosi, Amosi ali nkololo wa Nahumi, Nahumi ali nkololo wa Esili, Esili ali nkololo wa Nagai,
Nagai ali nkololo wa Maati, Maati ali nkololo wa Matatiyasi, Matatiyasi ali nkololo wa Semeini, Semeini ali nkololo wa Joseki, Joseki ali nkololo wa Joda,
Joda ali nkololo wa Jowanani, Jowanani ali nkololo wa Resa, Resa ali nkololo wa Zerubhabheli, Zerubhabheli ali nkololo wa Sheyalitiyele, Sheyalitiyele ali nkololo wa Neri,
Neri ali nkololo wa Meliki, Meliki ali nkololo wa Adi, Adi ali nkololo wa Kosamu, Kosamu ali nkololo wa Elimadamu, Elimadamu ali nkololo wa Eri,
Eri ali nkololo wa Joshuwa, Joshuwa ali nkololo wa Eliyeza, Eliyeza ali nkololo wa Jorimu, Jorimu ali nkololo wa Matati, Matati ali nkololo wa Levi,
Levi ali nkololo wa Simiyoni, Simiyoni ali nkololo wa Juda, Juda ali nkololo wa Josefa, Josefa ali nkololo wa Jonamu, Jonamu ali nkololo wa Eliyakimu,
Eliyakimu ali nkololo wa Meleya, Meleya ali nkololo wa Mena, Mena ali nkololo wa Matata, Matata ali nkololo wa Nathani, Nathani ali nkololo wa Dafite,
Dafite ali nkololo wa Jesi, Jesi ali nkololo wa Obhedi, Obhedi ali nkololo wa Bhoazi, Bhoazi ali nkololo wa Salimoni, Salimoni ali nkololo wa Nashoni,
Nashoni ali nkololo wa Aminadabhu, Aminadabhu ali nkololo wa Adimini, Adimini ali nkololo wa Arini, Arini ali nkololo wa Hezironi, Hezironi ali nkololo wa Perezi, Perezi ali nkololo wa Juda,
Juda ali nkololo wa Jakubo, Jakubo ali nkololo wa Isaki, Isaki ali nkololo wa Abhurahama, Abhurahama ali nkololo wa Tera, Tera ali nkololo wa Nahori,
Nahori ali nkololo wa Serugu, Serugu ali nkololo wa Reu, Reu ali nkololo wa Pelegi, Pelegi ali nkololo wa Ebheri, Ebheri ali nkololo wa Shela,
Shela ali nkololo wa Kainani, Kainani ali nkololo wa Afakisadi, Afakisadi ali nkololo wa Shemu, Shemu ali nkololo wa Nowa, Nowa ali nkololo wa Lameki,
Lameki ali nkololo wa Metusela, Metusela ali nkololo wa Enoki, Enoki ali nkololo wa Jaredi, Jaredi ali nkololo wa Mahalaleli, Mahalaleli ali nkololo wa Kainani,
Kainani ali nkololo wa Enoshi, Enoshi ali nkololo wa Seti, Seti ali nkololo wa Adamu, Adamu ali nkololo we Ndzimu.
Jesu kati ali zhele Meya yakayengemala, kashanduka edwa ku Jorodani Meya ikatungamilila ku tjilambanyika,
kwaakalikwa ndi Nvanganyi mazhuba ali makumi manna. Aazotongoja tjimwe mu mazhuba iyawo, ndizo kubupelo gwawo wakabe ne zhala kwazo.
Nvanganyi kati kunli, “Ha uli Nkololo we Ndzimu, idwa bgwe ileli libe tjiwunga!”
Jesu kashandula kati, “Kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Nthu aatotjila nge tjiwunga tjoga.’ ”
Nvanganyi katatha naye pakatathila, tjinyolotjo kalakidza mituthu yose shango.
Ngono Nvanganyi kati kunli “Ndowokupa fumwa yago ne simba eleli lose, ngobe zwakapiwa imi, ngono ndopa wandada.
Ndizo ha undinamata kose ikoku kowobe kuko.”
Jesu kashandula kati, “Kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Namata She Ndzimu uwo, ushingile iwo woga.’ ”
Nvanganyi kan'yisa ku Jerusalema, kaswika kammisa pa tjilungwane tje Ng'umba ye Ndzimu. Ngono kati, “Ha uli Nkololo we Ndzimu, uzwiposele pasi;
ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Unowodwa batumwa bawo be kudzimu nge kuko, kuti bakulise nge njele.’
Kakale kukayi, ‘Banowokugama nge maboko abo, kuti usilobe gumbo lilo mu bgwe.’ ”
Jesu kanshandula kati, “Kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Usilike She Ndzimu uwo.’ ”
Kukati Nvanganyi apedza kunlika, kansiya kwe tjibaka.
Jesu kabgwilila ku Galili ali mu simba le Meya, ngono tjilumbi nge kukwe tjikaandama mu shango iyeyo yose.
Kadiya mu ng'umba dzabo dze mitembezelo, ndizo bose bakankudza.
Ngono Jesu kayenda ku Nazareta, iko kwaakalegwako, kukati nge zhuba lendzimu lekunyaluluka le Sabata* kayenda ku ng'umba* ye mitembezelo se wolobela kukwe. Kamilika kubala.
Wakapiwa lukwalo gwe nlebesambeli Isaya. Kati eguzhula kawana pakakwagwa kuyi,
“Meya ya She imundili,
ngobe iye wakandishalula kuti ndisumikile ndebo mbuya ku bashayi.
Wandituma kuleba sununguko ku basungwa,
nenge kuti mapofu apofunuke,
nenge kusunungula bakatshambilidziwa
kubika gole She labanowolakidza ndulamo yabo mu bathu.”
Ipapo kazhalila lukwalo kagubgwiliza ku nshingi, kagala pasi. Ngono mesho wose mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo akabe akalinga kunli,
ngono katangisa kubadwa eti, “Nasi matama e lukwalo igogu amahwa ashingikala.”
Bose bakaleba zwakanaka nge kukwe, bakatjenamila matama e ngoni aakaleba. Bakabhuzwana beti, “Apa ate nkololo wa Josefa iwoyu kene?”
Jesu kati kubali, “Malebeswa mowondidwa gungulupeswa linoti, ‘Ng'anga, uzwilape.’ Thama mu nzi wa kanyi kwenyu, tjatakahwa kuyi watjithama mu Kapenaume.”
Kadwilila eti, “Ndolebesa tjose ndoti, akuna nlebesambeli unoamutjigwa mu nzi wa kanyi kwabo.
“Ndolebesa ndoti, kwakabe kuna tjilikadzi njinji mu Iziraela mu misi ya Elija, vula paisakana makole matatu ana mimwedzi ili mitathatu, kukabe bhamba gulu mu shango yose.
Koga Elija aazotumigwa ku tjilikadzi njinji idzedzo, wakatumigwa ku Zarefati mu shango ye Sidoni, ku imwe tjilikadzi.
Kwakabe kuna banji mu Iziraela banogwala mapele akabipa mu misi ya Elisha nlebesambeli, koga akuna ne nng'ompela wakapodziwa, kuzhe kwa Naamani we Siriya.”
Bathu bose bakabe bali mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo bakati behwa ikoku bakazhala bushongola.
Bakamilika bakan'dusila kuzhe kwe nzi, bakankwebela kuliteyanjelele gwe dombo, lakabe nzi iwoyo wakabakwa pezhugwi kwalo, kuti bamposele pasi.
Koga iye wakapalama pakati kwabo kayenda.
Ipapo kayenda ku Kapenaume, nzi umu Galili. Mu zhuba le Sabata, kadiya bathu.
Bakakaabadziwa nge kudiya kukwe, ngobe dama lile lakabe lina simba.
Mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo kwakabe kuna mmwe nlume akasungwa nge meya mbi. Wakamimilila pezhugwi eti,
“Apa unoshaka kuti titini kene, Jesu we Nazareta? Wazha kuwotilobesa kene? Ndoziba kuti uani. U iye N'yengemali we Ndzimu.”
Jesu kantjemela eti, “Nyalala ubhude munli!” Ipapo meya mbi ukalashila nlume iwoyo pasi mbeli kwabo bose, ukabhuda munli usanhwisa zogwadza.
Bathu bose ibabo bakakaabala bakabhuzwana beti, “Hwudiya kupi ikoku! Nge ndaulo nenge simba unotjemela meya mibi ngono ikabhuda!”
Ndizo bathu bakaleba nge kukwe kukaandama mu ntuthu wose.
Jesu kabhuda mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo kayenda ku nzi wa Simoni. Mmezwale ba Simoni bakabe begwala bana luzhazhamo, ndizo Simoni ne bathu baipapo bakakumbila Jesu kuti abhatshe.
Ndizo kama pa n'gwele katjemela luzhazhamo, ngono gukabhuda mubali. N'gwele kapola, kamilika tjinyolotjo katangisa kupa bathu zojiwa.
Kukati zhuba lingina, bathu bakabe bana bagwele banogwala njigwele dzakasiyana siyana, bakabazhisa kunli, ndizo kababiga maboko bose, kabapodza.
Ne meya mibi ikabhuda imimila iti, “Iwe u Nkololo we Ndzimu!”
Koga kaitjemela asingaidumile kulebeleka, ngobe yakabe iziba kuti ndiye Mesiya.
Kukati zhuba liyedza, Jesu kabhudila ku nyelele kusina bathu. Bathu bakabe benshaka, ndizo bakati beswika paayapo bakagwisa kun'dzibila kuti asiyende ebasiya.
Koga kabadwa kati, “Ndakafanila kuti ndisumikile ndebo mbuya ye bushe* gwe Ndzimu ku mimwe mizibo, ngobe nditjo tjandakatumigwa.”
Ngono kadwilila esumikila mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo dze Judiya
Limwe zhuba kukati Jesu ali mile pa gungwa gwe Genezareta, mbunga we bathu ukankubunganila kuhwilila dama le Ndzimu.
Jesu kabona migoro mibili ili pa gungwa, ngono babhati be hwobe bakabe babhuda muili besuka njanga dzabo.
Kangina mu mmwe we migoro iyeyo wakabe uli wa Simoni, ngono kankumbila kuti ausedzedze mu vula kudwa mu phili. Ipapo kagala pasi kadiya mbunga we bathu ali mu n'goro iwoyo.
Kati apedza kulebeleka, kadwa Simoni kati, “Sedzelani tjapakati kwe vula pakangina, ngono mulonge njanga dzenyu mu vula mubhate hwobe.”
Simoni kadabila eti, “She, talalila shinga kwazo busiku gose, koga akuna tjatakabhata. Koga se muijalo, ndowolonga njanga mu vula.”
Bakati bayita sa ikoko bakabhata hwobe njinji, njanga dzikatangisa kupaluka.
Ndizo bakadana bakhwinya babo bamu n'goro mmwe, kuti bazhe bababhatshe. Bakazha, ngono bakazhadza migoro yose, migoro ikatangisa kunyungila.
Kukati Simoni Pita ebona ikoku, kawila pasi pa zwidwi zwa Jesu, kati, “She milikani pandili, ngobe imi ndi ntjinyi!”
Iye ne baakabe anabo, bakatjenamila bunji gwe hwobe dzabakabhata,
kose na Jakubo na Johani bakololo ba Zebhedi, bakhwinya ba Simoni. Ipapo Jesu kati kuna Simoni, “Usitje. Kudwa ngwenu kuyenda mbeli, unowobhata bathu.”
Ndiko bakakwebela migoro yabo mu phili, bakasiya kose, bakantobela.
Kukati Jesu atji mu mmwe we mizi mikulu, kukazha mmwe nlume wakabe egwala mapele. Kati ebona Jesu kawa pasi nge buso gugwe kankumbila, kati, “She, ha muda, munganditjenapadza.”
Jesu katambunudza luboko gugwe, kambhata, kati “Ndoda. Tjenapala!” Tjinyolotjo mapele kabhuda munli.
Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Kushete waunobudza. Koga yenda unozwilakidza ku mpirisiti ngono uduse tjibhayilo tjakalebgwa ndi Mushe tjekutjenapala tjili tjilakidzo ku bathu kuti wapodziwa.”
Thawu ngekwa Jesu dzikaandamila mbeli, ndizo mibunga mikulu ye bathu ikakubungana kuwonteedza ne kupodziwa njigwele dzabo.
Koga Jesu kayenda ku shango kusina bathu kanotembezela.

Zhuba limwe mu mazhuba iyawo Jesu kati atjadiya, Bafarasi* ne badiyi be nlayo* bakabe bazha bedwa mu mizi yose ye Galili ne ye Judiya ne ku Jerusalema, bakabe bali gele ipapo. Simba la She lakabe linaye kupodza bagwele.
Bamwe balume bakazha bakasenga nlume nge thobo wakalobgwa nge gulukadzi, bakagwisa kunlonga mu ng'umba, kumbiga mbeli kwa Jesu.
Bakati bashaya zila ye kuyita ikoku ngekwe mbunga we bathu, bakatatha pezhugwi kwe denga, ngono bakazhula denga bakan'delusila pasi pakati kwe mbunga, mbeli kwa Jesu ali mu thobo iye.
Jesu kati ebona kugalamoyo kwabo kati, “Lumewe, zwibi zwizo zwazwiibhatigwa.”
Bafarasi* ne badiyi be nlayo* bakatangisa kukumbula tjekwabo, bezwibhuzwa beti, “Ndiani iwoyu unotuka Ndzimu? Ndiani ungazwiibhatigwa zwibi ha usi Ndzimu woga kene?”
Jesu kaziba tjabakabe bekumbula, ngono kabhuzwa eti, “Ini mukumbula zwithu izwezwi mu mimoyo yenyu kene?
Ndikupi kulelu, kuti, ‘Zwibi zwizo zwazwiibhatigwa,’ kene kuti, ‘Milika uyende?’
Koga, kuti ndizo muzibe kuti Nkololo we Nthu una simba mu shango le kuzwiibhatigwa zwibi, kati ku nlume wakalobgwa nge gulukadzi, ‘Ndokudwa nditi, milika, tola thobo iyo uyende kanyi.’ ”
Tjinyolotjo kamilika mbeli kwabo, katola tjaabe ali lele mutjili kayenda kanyi, ekudza Ndzimu.
Bose bakakaabala, ngono bakakudza Ndzimu. Bakazhala kutja, beti, “Nasi tabona zwinotjenamisa.”
Shule kwa ikoku Jesu kayenda, ngono kabona nkhethisi unodang'wa Levi ali gele pa bugalo gugwe gwe nkhethisi. Jesu kati kunli “Unditobele.”
Levi kamilika, kasiya tjimwe ne tjimwe ngono kantobela.
Ipapo Levi kathamila Jesu nzano nkulu we zojiwa ku ng'umba iye ne mbunga nkulu we bakhethisi ne bamwe bathu kaja naye.
Koga Bafarasi ne badiyi babo be nlayo bakang'ong'ola ku badiyiwa* babe bebhuzwa beti, “Ini muja mung'wa ne bakhethisi ne batjinyi*!”
Jesu kabadabila, kati, “Ate banomuka zubuyanana banoshaka ng'anga, koga bagwele ndibo banoshaka ng'anga.
Andizozha kuwodana balulwami, koga ndakawodana batjinyi, kushandukila matjinyo abo.”
Bakati kunli, “Badiyiwa ba Johani banozwinyima zojiwa betembezela, kose ne badiyiwa be Bafarasi, koga babo banoja beng'wa.”
Jesu kashandula kati, “Apa mungayita kuti bakokiwa be nkwasha bazwinyime zojiwa atji nabo kene?
Koga mu misi inowozha nkwasha kwaanowodusiwa mubali. Mu misi iyeyo banowozwinyima zojiwa.”

Kababudza tjifaniso* etji, “Akuna ungatjeka tjibata tjitshwa mujila dzwa ekotjithumila mu tjiambalo tjikulukugwi. Ha ethama eijalo, unowobe apalula jila dzwa, ngono tjibata tje jila dzwa ha tjitowodumana ne jila gulukugwi.
Na iko akuna unodila nkumbi ntshwa mu makukhwa makulukugwi. Ha ethama eijalo, nkumbi ntshwa unowobila ukaphutula makukhwa, ngono nkumbi ukatebuka ne makukhwa kabe atjinyika.
Nkumbi ntshwa wakafanilo digwa mu makukhwa matshwa.
Kakale ukuna ungati shule kwe kung'wa nkumbi nkulukugwi kashaka ntshwa, ngobe unowoti, ‘Nkulukugwi unozipa.’ ”

Kwakati mu zhuba limwe le Ndzimu le kunyaluluka le Sabata, Jesu kabe eyenda akapalama minda ye mathunde e korong ana badiyiwa babe, ngono bakatangisa kumwaula zwiyako zwe korong bezwisokosa mu maboko abo beja shanga dzayo.
Bamwe be Bafarasi bakabhuzwa beti, “Ini muyita tjisingadumigwe mu nsi we Sabata?”
Jesu kabashandula eti, “Apa amuthu mukabala tjakathamwa ndi Dafite, paakabe iye ne baakabe anabo bana zhala kene?
Wakangina mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu katola kaja zwiwunga zwakapiwa Ndzimu, zwisingadumigwe kujiwa nge mmwe kuzhe kwe Bapirisiti koga. Wakapabo baakabe anabo kuti baje.”
Ipapo Jesu kati kubali, “Nkololo we Nthu ndi She we Sabata.”
Kukati zhuba limwe le Sabata kakale, kati engina mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo ediya, kukabe kuna nlume wakashweshwana luboko gwe luji.
Bafarasi ne badiyi be nlayo bakabe beshaka tjabangabona Jesu nlandu nditjo, ndizo bakanteya kubona kene ewopodza nge Sabata.
Koga Jesu kaziba tjabakabe bekumbula, ngono kati ku nlume una luboko gwakashweshwana, “Buya ume apa.” Ndizo kamilika kama ipapo.
Jesu kati kubali, “Ndomubhuzwa, ndikupi kumu nlayo nge Sabata, kuyita ndulamo* kene kuyita mbipo, kutjidza kene kubulaya?”
Kabalinga bose ngono ipapo kati ku nlume iwoyu “Tambunudza luboko gugo.” Kathama sa ikoko, ngono luboko gugwe gukapola.
Koga bakazhala bushongola bakatangisa kulebesana tjekwabo kuti Jesu bantini.
Mu mazhuba iyawo, Jesu kabhuda kayenda ku dombo kunotembezela, ngono katembezela Ndzimu busiku gose.
Kukati kwayedza, kadana badiyiwa babe, ngono kashalula bali gumi lina babili, ibo baakadana eti batumwa.
Ibo ndibo Simoni (waakatumila eti Pita) ne nnung'una uwe Enduru na Jakubo, na Johani na Filipo na Bhatolomeo,
na Matewu, na Tomasi na Jakubo nkololo wa Alifeo na Simoni we ngwila sununguko,
na Judasi nkololo wa Jakubo, na Judasi Isikariyoti, iye wakadwa kabe n'wongi wa Jesu.

Kadeluka nabo, ngono kama nabo pathu pakalizalizana. Mbunga nkulu we badiyiwa babe wakabe uli ipapo ne bunji gwe bathu kudwa mu ntuthu we Judiya wose ne mu Jerusalema ne mu tjekelo dze makungwa e Tire ne Sidoni,
bakabe bazha kuwon'hwa ne kupodziwa njigwele dzabo. Ibabo bakabe bedziyidziwa nge meya mibi bakapodziwa.
Mbunga wose we bathu ukagwisa kuti unkuthe, ngobe masimba akabe ebhuda munli, ebapodza bose.
Ngono wakamilidza mesho kalinga badiyiwa babe kati,
“Makakombolegwa imwi bashayi,
ngobe bushe gwe Ndzimu nge gwenyu.
Makakombolegwa imwi muna zhala ngwenu,
ngobe Ndzimu unowomugutsha.
Makakombolegwa imwi banolila ngwenu,
ngobe mowoseka.
“Makakombolegwa imwi ha bathu bemubenga kakale bemushalaula, bemutuka kakale beleba kwakabipa nge kwenyu beti mu babi ngekwe Nkololo we Nthu.
Mupululudze mu zhuba ilelo, mutjuluke nge kushatha, ngobe mbhayilo wenyu nkulu u kudzimu. Ngobe nditjo tjakaitiwa ndi bobabatategulu babo mu balebesambeli.*
Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi bafumi,
ngobe maamutjila kale, nyaladzo yenyu.
Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi banoguta ngwenu,
ngobe mowobe ne zhala.
Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi banoseka ngwenu,
ngobe mowobe ne buyendasi, kakale mowolila.
“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi, munolebgwa bubuya nge kwenyu, ngobe ndiko bobatategulu babo sekwa bakaamutjila balebesambeli be manyepkhwa.”
“Koga ndomubudza imwi banondihwa, idani zwita zwenyu, shingilani banomubenga ndulamo.
Mukombolele banomulonga bhiso, mutembezelele banomubhata zwakabipa.
Ha nthu ekupkhwaula mu lushaya, umpe gumwe. Ha mmwe ekutolela jasi lilo usindzibile kutola ne hempe tjitjo.
Ipa mmwe ne mmwe unokukumbila, ngono ha mmwe etola tjimwe tjitjo, usitjatjishake kuti atjikubgwilize.
Itilani bamwe sekwa munoda bemuyitila.”
“Ha muda banomuda, mobuyigwa ngeni kene? Ne batjinyi* banoda banobada.
Kakale ha mushinga ndulamo kuna ibabo bakamululwamila, mobuyigwa ngeni kene? Batjinyi na ibobo banothama sa ikoko.
Kakale ha muadzima ibabo bamunogalabgwe kuti banowomubuzila, mobuyigwa ngeni? Batjinyi na ibobo banoadzima batjinyi, begalabgwe kuti banowobabuzila nge buzhalo.

Koga idani zwita zwenyu, muzwi shingile ndulamo, kakale mubaadzime musakagalabgwe kubuzigwa. Ipapo mbhayilo wenyu unowobe nkulu, mukabe bana be Upezhugwi zhugwi, ngobe wakalulwamila basingaboke ne babi.
Ibeni ne ngoni koga sa Tate benyu bana ngoni.”
“Musisumikilise, kuti ndizo musisumikilisiwe. Musitilike bamwe nlandu, ndizo amutowotilikwabo nlandu. Muzwiibhatigwe bamwe ndizo mowozwiibhatigwabo.
Ipani ndizo mowopiwabo. Tjilizanyo tjakalulwama, tjakatshambigwa tjikazunguziwa ngono tjitebukana, tjowobigwa pa makumbo awo.” Tjilizanyo tjamunolizanya nditjo mowolizanyigwabo nditjo.
Kakale kababudza tjifaniso etji, “Apa bhofu lingakweba bhofu limwe kene? Apa abangawile bose mu gomba kene?
N'diyiwa aangapinde n'diyi uwe, koga mmwe ne mmwe wadiyiwa kwakapelela unonga n'diyi uwe.”
“Wakalingilani lubatsha gumu zhisho le ikamu* tjitjo koga usingabone guni limu zhisho lilo kene?

Apa ungadwa ikamu tjitjo tjini uti ‘ikamu, ima ndiduse lubatsha gumu zhisho lilo,’ koga iwe nge kuko ukong'wa kubona guni muna lilo zhisho? Ntjengedzi ndiwe! Dusa guni limu zhisho lilo kutanga, kudwa ipapo ndiko kwaunowobona zubuyanana kudusa lubatsha gumu zhisho le ikamu tjitjo.
“Akuna nti mbuya unozwala zwizwalo zwakabipa, kakale nti wakabipa autozwala zwizwalo zwibuya.
Nti mmwe ne mmwe unozibgwa nge zwizwalo zwawo. Bathu abatotjela mpaya mu miti ye mihwa, kene zhambi mu matenjana e mihwa.
Nthu wakalulwama unoshinga zwithu zwakalulwama zwimu moyo uwe ne nthu mbi unoshinga zwithu zwakabipa zwimu moyo uwe, ngobe tjinolebgwa nge nlomo uwe, nditjo tjaanatjo mu moyo uwe.
“Ini mundidana ‘She, She,’ koga musingashinge tjandinoleba?
Ndowomulakidza kuti unongani iye unozha kundili kahwa matama kaalondolodza.
Unonga nthu ebaka ng'umba, unotsha kanginisa, kateya mbako iye pezhugwi kwe lutombo. Kukati nkubila uzha, ukaloba ng'umba iyeyo ngono ukasitongo izunguza, ngobe yakabakiwa zubuyanana.
Koga iye unohwa matama angu, ngono kasialondolodze unonga nthu unobaka ng'umba isina thiwa. Ha nkubila uloba ng'umba iyeyo, inowa tjinyolotjo ne kukolomoka kwayo kukabe kukulu.”
Jesu kati apedza kuleba ikoku kose mu zebe dze bathu, kangina mu nzi we Kapenaume.
Ikoko kwakabe kuna nlanda we nlauli we babhayani be Baroma wakabe ediwa kwazo ndi tetshi uwe, egwala ali pejo ngofa.
Nlauli we babhayani kahwa ngekwa Jesu, ndizo katuma bakulu* be Bajuta kunli, enkumbila kuti azhe awopodza nlanda uwe.
Bakati bezha kuna Jesu, bakankumbila kwazo kuti abhatshe nlume iwoyo beti, “Kofanila kuti uthamile iwoyu nlume sa ikoku,
ngobe unoda itjaba tjedu, kakale wakati bakila ng'umba ye mitembezelo.”
Ndizo Jesu kayenda nabo. Wakati abe pejo ne ng'umba ye nlauli we babhayani nlauli katuma bazwalani babe kunli eti, “She, musizwidziyidze, ngobe andizolizanila kuti mungangina mu ng'umba yangu.
Ndizo, ndagala ndazwibona kuti andizolizana kuzha kumuli. Koga lebani dama, ngono nlanda wangu unowopola.
Ngobe namibo ndi nthu upasi kwe nlayo, ndina babhayani pasi kwangu. Ndoti kuna iwoyu, ‘Yenda,’ kayenda, ati kuna hwouje, ‘Izha,’ kazha. Ndoti ku nlanda wangu, ‘Shinga etji,’ katjishinga.”
Kukati Jesu ehwa ikoku, kantjenamila, katendebuka kalinga mbunga we bathu bakabe bakantobela, kati kubali, “Ndolebesa ndoti, andithu atongo bona kugalamoyo kukulu kungapa ne mu Iziraela dumbu.”
Ipapo bathu bakabe batumwa bakabgwilila ku ng'umba, ngono bakawana nlanda apola.
Tjinyolotjo kudwa ipapo, Jesu kayenda ku nzi unoyi Naini, badiyiwa babe ne mbunga nkulu we bathu bakayenda naye.

Wa kati esedzelela nkoba we nzi iwoyo, kukabe kwakasengegwa kuzhe nthu wakafa wakabe, ali iye ega mwana pana mmeyabe, ngono ibo bali tjilikadzi. Mbunga nkulu we bathu unodwa mu nzi iwoyo, wakabe una tjilikadzi iyeyo.
She kati embona kanhwila zogwadza kati, “Usilile.”
Ipapo kasedzela kabhata ntengate, ngono ibabo bakabe bakasenga bakama. Iye kati, “Nzhuzha, ndoti kukuli, muka!”
Nfi kamuka, katangisa kulebeleka, ngono Jesu kambgwiliza kuna mmeyabe.
Bose bakatjenama kukulu kwazo, bakakudza Ndzimu beti, “Nlebesambeli nkulu wazha pakati kwedu! Ndzimu wazha kubhatsha bathu bawo.”
Thawu idzedzi ngekwa Jesu dzikaandama mu ntuthu we Judiya wose ne mituthu ipejo.
Badiyiwa ba Johani bakabudza Johani ngekwe zwithu zose zwakabe zwiyitiwa ndi Jesu.
Kadana babili babo, kabatuma kuna She kumbhuzwa hwoku, “Ndimwi mabe makalindigwa kuzha, kene tilindile mmwe?”
Kukati balume ibabo bezha kuna Jesu bakati, “Johani we N'dubiki watituma kumuli kumubhuzwa kuti ‘Apa ndimwi mabe makalingiligwa, kene tilingilile mmwe?’ ”
Nge tjibaka itjetjo Jesu kapodza banji bakabe begwala ne bakabe bakasungwa nge meya mibi, kakale kapofunula banjinji bakabe bali mapofu.

Ndizo kashandula batumwa kati, “Bgwililani, mubudze Johani tjamabona ne tjamahwa. Mapofu anopofunugwa, zwilema zoyenda, bathu banogwala mapele banopodziwa ne mabhubuzebe anohwa ne bafi banomusiwa ne ndebo mbuya inosumikigwa ku bashayi.
Wakakombolegwa usingakuthike nge kwangu.”

Batumwa ba Johani bakati bayenda, Jesu katangisa kulebeleka ne mbunga we bathu ngekwa Johani, ebhuzwa eti, “Ini tjamakayendila kunobona ku tjilambanyika? Apa makabe manobona lushanga gunozunguziwa nge phepo kene?

Akusakajalo, ini tjamakabe munobona ngono? Makabe manobona nthu wakaambala zwiambalo zwakanaka kene? Bonani, ibabo banoambala zwiambalo zwe ntengo upezhugwi betjila butjilo gwe ipepkhwe ba mu ng'umba dza boshe.
Ngono ini tjamakayendila kunobona? Makayendila kunobona nlebesambeli kene? Ee, ndomubudza kakale nditi, makabona nkulu pa nlebesambeli.
Oyu ndiye wakakwagwa nge kukwe kuyi,
‘Ndowotuma ntumwa wangu mbeli kuko,
iye unowolulwamisa zila iyo mbeli kuko.’
Ndomudwa nditi, muna ibabo bakazwagwa nge nkadzi, akuna iye nkulu pana Johani; koga iye ntukunu tjose mu bushe gwe Ndzimu nkulu panli.”
Bathu bose ne bakhethisi dumbu, bakati behwa matama a Jesu bakaduma kuti zila ye Ndzimu yakalulwama, ngobe bakabe badubikiwa nge dubiko ya Johani.
Koga Bafarasi ne badiyi be nlayo bakazwilambigwa ndongoloso ye Ndzimu, se bakabe balamba kudubikwa ndiye.
“Jesu kadwilila elebeleka eti ini ngono tjandingafanidzanya bathu ibaba bangwenu? Banongani wali?
Banonga bana bali gele mu thanga, bedanana, belebesana, beti, ‘Tamulidzila nyele, koga mukasizane, tikamumbila lumbo gwe tjililo koga mukasilile.’
Ngobe Johani we N'dubiki wakazha asingaje tjiwunga kene kuli kung'wa nkumbi we zhambi, ngono imwi mukati, ‘Una meya mbi.’
Nkololo we Nthu kazha eja kakale eng'wa, ngono moti, ‘Yeli govu ne tjidakwa, nzwalani we bakhethisi ne batjinyi.’
Koga butjenjedu golakidzika kuti gwakalulwama nge bana bago.”
Mmwe we Bafarasi kadanila Jesu zojiwa, ndizo kayenda ku ng'umba ye Nfarasi iwoyo kagala pasi kaja.
Nkadzi wakabe ali ntjinyi mu nzi iwoyo kati ehwa kuyi Jesu unoja mu ng'umba ye Nfarasi, kazhisa tjilongo tjakathamiwa nge bgwe linoyi alabhasita,* tjina mafuta anonuhwa zwinozipa.
Ngono kati ali mile shule kukwe pa makumbo awe elila, katangisa kunyolodza makumbo a Jesu nge mishodzi iye. Ipapo kaabukusha nge mavudzi awe kaaputa kadila mafuta iyawo.
Nfarasi wakadanila Jesu zojiwa wakati ebona ikoku kati tje mu moyo, “Ha nlume iwoyu abe ali nlebesambeli, unobe eziba kuti ndiani iwoyu unombhata kakale kuti nkadzi iwoyu umbimbi.”
Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Simoni, kuna tjandoshaka kukubudza.”
Simoni kadabila kati, “Ini n'diyi.”
Jesu kati, “Mmwe nkolotisi we mari wakabe ekolotiwa nge balume babili. Mmwe wabo ana nlandu naye we madinari emazana mashanu mmwe ana nlandu naye we madinari emakumi mashanu.
Kwakabe kusina wabo una mari kunlipa, ndizo kabukusha milandu yabo. Ngwenu, ndiupi wabo unowon'da kwazo?”
Simoni kashandula eti, “Ndobona kuti unowodiwa kwazo nge wakabukushigwa nlandu nkulu.”
Jesu kati, “Wabona zubuyanana.”

Ipapo kashanduka kalingisana na iwoyo nkadzi, ngono kati kuna Simoni, “Apa unobona nkandzi iwoyu, kene? Ndazha mu ng'umba iyo, auzondipa vula kuti ndingule makumbo, koga iye wangudza makumbo angu nge mishodzi iye, kaabukusha nge mavudzi awe.
Auzotongoti, undidumilisa ukandiputa koga iwoyu nkadzi, kudwa mu tjibaka tjandangina, aazotongo letja kuputa makumbo angu.
Auzodila nsholo wangu mafuta, koga iye wadila mafuta anonuhwa zwinozipa mu makumbo angu.
Ndizo, ndokubudza nditi, zwibi zwizwe zose zwazwiibhatigwa, ndizo walakidza ludo bukulu. Koga iye wazwiibhatigwa kutukununu, una ludo butukununu.”
Ipapo Jesu kati ku nkadzi iwoyo “Zwibi zwizo zwazwiibhatigwa.”
Ndizo bamwe bakabe beja naye bakatangisa kulebeleka tjekwabo beti, “Ndiani iwoyu unozwiibhatigwa zwibi?”
Jesu kati ku nkadzi iwoyo, “Kugalamoyo kuko kwakutjidza, yenda nge kunyalala!”
Shule kwa ikoku, Jesu kayenda, kangina mizi ne mizana, esumikila ndebo mbuya ye bushe gwe Ndzimu. Badiyiwa bali gumi lina babili bakabe banaye,
ne bamwe bakadzi bakabe badusiwa meya mibi bapodziwa ne njigwele. Mariya we Magadala wakabe adusiwa meya mibi ili kutendeka wakabe aliyapobo,
na Joanna nkadzi wa Kuza, nshingili wa Herode, na Susana ne bamwe banjinji bakabe bebabhatsha nge thundu dzabo.
Kwakati mbunga nkulu we bathu wakubungana ne bathu bedwa ku mizi yakathubukana bezha kuna Jesu, kaleba tjifaniso eti:
“Ndzwali wakabhuda kunodzwala mbewu iye. Kati edzwala mbewu, imwe ikawila mu zijana, ngono ikatshambiwa nge bathu ne nyuni dzikaija.
Imwe yakawila pa lutombo, ikati imela, mmela ukafa, ngobe ushaya doba.
Imwe yakawila pakati kwe mihwa, ngono mihwa ikakula nayo ikaimanikanya.
Imwe mbewu ikawila mu mavu mabuya. Ikamela ikazwala zwizwalo zwinopinda zwakadzwagwa kazana (100).”
Wakati eleba ikoku kamilidza hwi kati, “Iye una zebe dze kuhwa ngaahwe.”
Badiyiwa bakati bembhuzwa kuti tjifaniso itjetji tjodwani,
Jesu kati “zibo ye masazibgwe ye bushe gwe Ndzimu yakapiwa imwi, koga ku bamwe bose ndolebeleka nge zwifaniso kuti ndizo,
‘Ne bebona, basibonesese ne behwa basihwisise.’ ”
“Tjifaniso itjetji tjodwa hwoku: Mbewu i dama le Ndzimu.
Yawila mu zijana kodwiwa bathu banohwa, ngono ipapo Satani kazha katola dama mu mimoyo yabo, kuti ndizo basigalemoyo bakatjidziwa.
Yawila mu lutombo bathu, banoti bahwa, bakaamutjila dama nge kushatha, koga abana midzi. Banogalamoyo tjibaka tjifutshwanana, koga mu misi ye kulikwa bakakong'wa.
Mbewu yakawila pakati kwe mihwa, imilile banoamutjila dama, koga bakati boyenda mu zila ye bugalimoyo bakadzipiwa nge zwinoshakika mu butjilo ne fumwa nenge mizipo, zwizwalo zwabo zwikasikombole.
Koga mbewu imu mavu mabuya, ndi ibabo bana mimoyo yakalulwama, banohwa dama, bakalibhata ngono ngosimisila bakabe ne zwizwalo.”
“Akuna unobhatidza luvone kagutshibikila kene kagubiga kusi kwe bulawo. Koga unogubiga patjena, kuti ndizo ibabo banongina babone tjedza.
“Ngobe akuna tjakasumbikiwa tjisingawodusigwa patjena ne ikowa tjisingawozibgwa kene ikohwa tjisingawozibgwa.
“Ndizo ibeni ne njele mu kuhwilila kwenyu. Ngoti iye una tjaanatjo unowopaphidzigwa, koga iye usina tjaanatjo ne tjaanokumbula eti unatjo tjowotogwa.”
Mme ba Jesu ne banung'una babe bakazha kuwombona, koga nge bunji gwe bathu bakasitubule kusedzela panli.
Kabudziwa kuyi “Mme yabo ne banung'una babo bamile pazhe, banoshaka kukubona.”
Kadabila eti, “Mmeyangu ne banung'una bangu ndi ibabo banohwa dama le Ndzimu ngono bakalilondolodza.”
Limwe zhuba Jesu kadwa badiyiwa babe, kati “Ngatitjulukileni seli kwe gungwa.” Ndizo bakangina mu n'goro bakayenda.
Bakati batjayenda Jesu kayizela. Dutu likazha mu gungwa, kwakati n'goro ukazhala vula, ndizo bakabe mu mbatsha hwulu.
Badiyiwa bakamusa Jesu beti, “N'diyi, N'diyi, tapela!”
Kamuka katjemela phepo ne vula yakabe idzongana, dutu likama, kukabe ne kudzikama kukulu.
Kabhuzwa badiyiwa babe kati, “Kugalamoyo kwenyu kungayi?”
Nge lutjo nenge kukaabala, bakabhuzwana beti, “Ndiani iwoyu? Unolaya kose ne phepo ne vula ngono zwikanteedza”
Bakaswika ku shango ye Gerasa, seli kwe gungwa kulingisana nge Galili.

Jesu kati etshamba phili, kashangamidziwa nge nlume wakasungwa nge meya mbi, edwa mu nzi iwoyu. Kwakabe kwabe tjibaka tjilefu nlume iwoyu asingasungile, kene kuli kugala mu ng'umba, koga egala ku zwikumbu.
Kati ebona Jesu kawila pasi mbeli kukwe kamimilila pezhugwi eti, “Unoshakani mundili kene Jesu, Nkololo we Upezhugwi zhugwi iwo Ndzimu? Ndokukumbila kuti usindihwise zogwadza.”

Jesu wakabe adwa meya mbi kuti ibhude mu nlume iwoyo. Kanjinji meya iyeyo yakabe insunga, nenguba akabe esungwa nge ketani mu maboko ne makumbo egala akalindiwa, wakabe ethubula ketani, meya mbi entakulila ku tjilambanyika.
Jesu kambhuzwa kati, “Zina lilo ndiani?”
Kashandula eti, “Ndimi Mphatho,” ngobe meya mibi minjinji yakabe yangina munli.
Meya ikakumbila Jesu kuti asiyitatile mu gomba* lakangina kusinatjilizanyo.
Hwotji njinji dzakabe dzifula ipapo, muhwunde ye dombo. Meya mibi ikakumbila Jesu kuti ailetje ingine mu hwotji idzedzo, ngono kaidumila.
