Kukati meya mibi ibhuda mu nlume iwoyu ikangina mu hwotji ngono hwotji dzikapadzamuka dzikatizha nge phili yakakunguluka, dzikangina mu gungwa, dzikang'wa nkokhwi dzikafa.
Kukati ibabo bakalisa hwotji bebona tjashingikala, bakatizha bakanoleba ikoku mu nzi ne mu mizana,
ndizo bathu bakamilika bakayenda, kunobona tjashingikala. Bakati beswika pana Jesu, bakawana nlume wakabe meya mibi yabhuda munli, ali gele pana Jesu, akasungila, ali mpezha, ndizo bakatja.
Ibabo bakabona tjakashingikala bakabudza bathu sekwa kapodziwa nlume wakabe akasungwa nge meya mibi.
Ipapo bathu bose be shango ye Bagerasa bakakumbila Jesu kuti ayende, ngobe bakabe bakuligwa ngotja. Ndizo kangina mu n'goro kuti abgwilile shule.
Nlume wakabe meya mibi yabhuda munli, kakumbila kuyenda na Jesu, koga Jesu kandzibisa eti,
“Shanduka uyende kanyi kwenyu, unoleba kuti Ndzimu wakuyitila kungapani.”
Ndizo iwoyo nlume kayenda kaleba mu nzi wose kuti Jesu wanshingila kungapani.
Kwakati Jesu ebuya mbunga we bathu ukaamutjila, ngobe bakabe bakanlindila.
Ipapo koga mmwe nlume unodang'wa kuyi Jairo, ntungamili we ng'umba ye mitembezelo, kazha kathigama pana Jesu, kankumbila kuti azhe ku ng'umba iye,
ngobe wakabe ana nkololokadzi nng'ompela koga, mmwanadi una makole angabe gumi lina mabili, wakabe efa.
Jesu kati eyenda na Jairusi, mbunga we bathu ukammanikanya.
Kwakabe kuna nkadzi ipapo wakabe ana makole ali gumi lina mabili egwala bugwele gwe swazwi. Wakabe ashingisa mari wose mu ndapo, koga kusina iye ungampodza.
Kazha shule kukwe, kabhata lupeto gwe hazu ya Jesu, kukati tjinyolotjo kubhizha malopa kwe nkadzi iwoyo kukama.
Jesu kabhuzwa eti, “Ndiani wandibhata?”
Kukati bose belandula, Pita kati, “She, bathu ndibo banokubungana bekumanikanya.”
Koga Jesu kati, “Mmwe wandibhata; ndohwa kuti kuna simba labhuda mundili.”
Ipapo nkadzi iwoyo kati ebona kuti angashaye zibgwa, kazha etetema ngono kawila mbeli kwa Jesu, mbeli kwe bathu bose kaleba tjaambhatila ne sekwa apodziwa tjinyolotjo.
Ipapo kati ku nkadzi iwoyu “Nkololokadzi kugalamoyo kuko kwakupodza. Yenda nge mbakiso.”
Jesu kati atjalebeleka, mmwe nlume kazha edwa ku ng'umba ya Jairusi, nlauli we ng'umba ye mitembezelo. Kati, “Nkololokadzi uwo wafa, usitjadziyidze n'diyi.”
Jesu kati ehwa ikoku kati kuna Jairusi, “Usitje, galamoyo koga, ngobe unowopola.”
Kati eswika pa ng'umba ya Jairusi, kasidumile mmwe kungina naye kuzhe kwa Pita na Johani na Jakubo na tate na mme be mwana.
Tjibaka itjetjo bathu bose bakabe bekuwa benlilila. Jesu kati, kubali “Letjani kulila aazofa, koga wakayizela.”
Bakaseka Jesu mahanya, beziba kuti mwana wafa.
Koga kambhata nge luboko, kati kunli, “Mwana, muka!”
Meya iye ikabuya, ngono tjinyolotjo kamilika. Ipapo Jesu kabadwa kuti bampe tjimwe aje.
Bazwadzi babe bakakaabala kwazo, koga Jesu kabadwa kati basitongo yita wabanobudza tjashingikala.
Jesu kati akubunganya batumwa bali gumi lina babili, kabapa masimba e kudusa meya mibi ne kupodza njigwele,
ngono kabatuma kunosumikila bushe gwe Ndzimu ne kupodza banogwala.
Kabadwa kati, “Musisenge tjimwe mu gwendo gwenyu, musisenge ludozo kene gobhodo kene tjiwunga kene mari kene zwiambalo.
Nzi wamaswikila muuli galani muuli kudzina mubhuda mu nzi iwoyo.
Ha bathu basingamuamutjile, ha mubhuda mu nzi iwoyo mushashamule hwuluba mu makumbo enyu, kube butendeki nge kwabo kuti bathama kusakalulwama.”
Ndizo bakamilika, bakayenda nzi ne nzana besumikila ndebo mbuya kakale bepodza bathu pamwe ne pamwe.
She Herode kahwa ngekwe tjakabe tjishingikala. Ngono kadziyidzika mu meya, ngobe bamwe bakabe beti Johani wakamusiwa mu bafi,
bamwe beti Elija waboneka, bamwe beti mmwe we balebesambeli ba ntolo wamuka.
Koga Herode kati, “Johani ndakathubula nsholo. Ndiani ngono iwoyu wandinohwa zwithu zwakajali nge kukwe?” Ngono kagwisa kubona Jesu.
Kukati batumwa bebuya, bakabika kuna Jesu tjabakathama. Kudwapo kabatola, kayenda nabo bali boga mu nzi unoyi Bhetisaida,
koga mibunga ye bathu ikaziba nge kwako, ngono bakantobela. Kabaamutjila, kalebeleka nabo ngekwe bushe gwe Ndzimu, kakale kapodza ibabo bakabe begwala.
Kukati zhuba limila, batumwa bali gumi lina babili bakazha kunli bakati, “Paladza mbunga iwoyu, kuti ndizo bayende ku mizi ipejo ne mu mizana, bawane zojiwa ne mayizelo, ngobe pano timu shango koga.”
Kadabila eti, “Mubape tjabangaja.” Bakadabila beti, “Tina zwiwunga zwili zwishanu ne hwobe mbili koga. Ha kuli kuti tojisa bathu ibaba takafanila kunotenga zojiwa.”
Balume bakabe bangabe zwiwulu zwishanu bakabe bali ipapo.
Koga kati ku badiyiwa babe, “Mubagadze pasi nge makupo angabe makumi mashanu.”
Bakathama sekwa badwiwa, bakagadza bathu bose pasi.
Katola zwiwunga izwezo zwishanu ne hwobe mbili, kalinga kudzimu, katembezela ngono kazwipemula, kazwipa badiyiwa kuti bazwipe bathu.
Bose bakaja bakaguta, badiyiwa bakanunga mamburumburu bakazhadza seme dzili gumi lina mbili.
Limwe zhuba kukati Jesu etembezela ali ega ne badiyiwa babe, kababhuzwa kati, “Bathu banoti ndimi ani?”
Bakashandula beti, “Bamwe banoti, u Johani we N'dubiki, bamwe bakati, u Elija, koga bamwe banoti, mmwe we balebesambeli ba ntolo wakamuka.”
Kababhuzwa eti, “Koga imwi moti ndimi ani?”
Pita kashandula kati, “Mesiya we Ndzimu.”
Jesu kabadwa akasimisa kuti kushete wababudza ikoku.

Ngono kati, “Nkololo we Nthu wakafanila kudziyidziwa nge zwinjinji ne kusaamutjigwa nge bakulu* be Bajuta ne Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo, wakafanila kunobulawa, koga mu zhuba le butatu, kamusiwa.”
Kabadwa bose kati, “Ha mmwe endisala shule, asithame kuda kukwe, ngaatole tjileyanyo tjitje zhuba limwe ne limwe, andi tobele.
Ngobe iye unoshaka kutjengeta butjilo gugwe, gowonlashikila, koga iye unolasha butjilo gugwe nge kwangu, gowombuyila.
Kobuzilani kene, kuti nthu athuwe shango yose, koga alashikigwe kene atjinyikigwe nge tjaali itjo?
Iye unobhakhwa nge shoni nge kwangu nenge matama angu, Nkololo we Nthu unowombhatigwabo nge shoni ha ezha nge gudzo* lile ne la Tate babe ne le batumwa be kudzimu bakayengemala.
Ndolebesa nditi, kuna bamwe bamile ipapa banowobona bushe gwe Ndzimu basathu bakafa.”
Kukati Shule kwe mazhuba angabe zhanakadzi Jesu aleba ikoku, katola Pita na Johani na Jakubo katatha dombo kunotembezela.
Kati etembezela, mbumbiko ye buso gugwe ikashanduka ne zwiambalo zwikabe butjena zwingadzima.
Bonani Balume babili, Mushe na Elija,
bakaboneka mu tjedza tjikulu, belebeleka na Jesu. Bakalebeleka ngekwe kufa kukwe kunowoshingikala mu Jerusalema.
Pita ne baakabe anabo bakabe betshung'ayila kwazo, ngono bakati belinga bakabona tjedza tjitje ne balume ibabo babili bali mile naye.

Kukati balume ibabo boyenda, Pita kati kuna Jesu, “N'diyi, kwakalulwama kuti tibe pano. Imani tibake mishasha mitatu, mmwe uli wenyu, mmwe uli wa Mushe, mmwe uli wa Elija.” Wakabe asingazibe tjaanoleba.
Kukati atjalebeleka, gole likaboneka likabafukidza, ngono badiyiwa bakapalukamoyo, bezwibona bengina mu gole ilelo.
Hwi likadwa mu gole ilelo liti, “Oyu Nkololo wangu, wandakashalula, munhwilile.”
Kukati hwi lalebeleka bakawana Jesu abe ega. Badiyiwa bakasumbika ikoku, bakashaya wababudza mu mazhuba iyawo tjabakabona.
Bakati tjimuka, badeluka dombo, mbunga we bathu ukabanshangamidza.
Mmwe nlume pakati kwe mbunga iwoyo kamilidza hwi kati, “N'diyi, ndomukumbila kuti mulinge nkololo wangu, ngobe ndiye mwanangu ega.
Meya inonsunga ngono tjinyolotjo kamimila, inontetemesa kadzina kasiza mafulo. Inonnetesa kakale aitotongo nsiya tjinyolotjo.
Ndakumbila badiyiwa babo kuti baiduse ngono bakong'wa.”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Bathu, ndimwi basingagalemoyo kakale bakapambuka ndimwi. Ndowogala namwi abe ne moyonlefu mumuli tjibaka tjingapani kene? Zhisa nkololo uwo ngeno.”
Kukati mbisana atjazha kunli, meya mbi ikanligila pasi ikanlabhulanya intetemesa. Koga Jesu katjemela meya mbi, kapodza mbisana ngono kampa tate babe.
Ndizo bakakaabadziwa nge bukulu gwe Ndzimu.
Kukati mmwe ne mmwe akakaabalila tjashingwa, Jesu kati ku badiyiwa babe,
“Tjandinowoleba, ngatjingine mu zebe dzenyu. Ngoti Nkololo we Nthu unowobhakhwa kalongwa mu maboko e bathu.”
Koga bakasihwisise ndebeleko iyeyi. Kwakabe kwakasumbikala kubali, ndizo bakasipedzisise, ngono bakatja kumbhuzwa nge kwako.
Nyanyayidzana kukatangisa pakati kwe badiyiwa, kuti ndiani wabo unowobe nkulu mu bamwe.
Jesu kaziba njalakang'wa dzabo, ndizo katola mwana ntukununu kammisa pahwunde naye.
Ipapo kati kubali, “Iye unoamutjila mwana iwoyu nge zina langu unoamutjila imi, na iye unoamutjila imi unoamutjila wakandituma, ngobe iye ntukunu tjose pakati kwenyu, ndiye nkulu tjose.”
Johani kati, “Tetshi, tabona mmwe nlume edusa meya mibi nge zina lenyu, ngono tikagwisa kun'dziba, ngobe asi mmwe wedu.”
Koga Jesu kati, “Musin'dzibe, ngobe iye usinganyanyayidzane nawe, umile nawe.”
Kukati tjibaka tjasedzela tjekuti atolegwe pezhugwi, kudzimu, Jesu kazwimisila kuyenda ku Jerusalema,
ngono katumila batumwa mbeli. Ngono bakangina mu nzi we Basamariya kunlulwamisila.
Koga bathu ba ikoko bakasiamutjile Jesu, ngobe wakabe akazwimisila kuyenda ku Jerusalema.
Kukati badiyiwa babe, Jakubo na Johani bebona ikoku, bakan'dwa bakati, She, moshaka kuti tidane moto kudzimu kubalobesa kene?
Koga Jesu kabatjebuka, kabatjemela.
Bakayenda naye ku mmwe nzi upoga.
Kukati bali mu zila batja yenda, mmwe nlume kadwa Jesu kati, “Ndowokutobela kumwe ne kumwe kwaunoyenda.”
Jesu kan'dabila kati, “Phungubgwe dzina madzete ne nyuni dzina mashaka, koga Nkololo we Nthu aana paangalonga nsholo.”
Kati ku mmwe nlume, “Unditobele.” Koga nlume iwoyo kadabila eti, “She, imani ndinobiganya tate bangu kutanga.”
Koga Jesu kati kunli, “Letja bafi babiganye bafi babo, koga iwe yenda unosumikila ngekwe bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Mmwebo kabe eti, “Ndowomutobela She, koga kutanga, imani ndibgwilile ndinowoneka be nsha wangu.”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Akuna iye unoti akabhata bhadza kulimwa katjebuka shule, wakalizana kungina mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.”

Shule kwa ikoku, She kashalula bamwe bali makumi ali kutendeka ana bathu babili, kabatuma bubili nge bubili kuyenda mbeli kukwe, ku nzi mmwe ne mmwe ne magalo mamwe ne mamwe kwaakabe akafanila kuyenda.
Kabadwa kati, “Kuvuna kukulu, koga bavuni bashomanana. Ndizo, kumbilani mweni we nnda, atumile bashingi mu kuvuna kukwe.
Yendani, ndomutuma se pkhwizana pakati kwe phele.
Musisenge ikwama tje mari, kene gobhodo kene khwebana, kakale musiyite wamunolebesa mu zila.
Ha mungina mu nzi, kutanga muti, ‘Kunyalala ngakubepo mu nzi iwoyo.’
Ha kuli yapo nthu una kunyalala, kunyalala ikoku kowobe munli, koga ha kusina kunyalala ikoku kowobgwilila kumuli.
Mugale mu nzi iwoyo, muja mung'wa tjabanomupa, ngobe nshingi wakafanigwa nge mbhayilo uwe. Musitongo dwa mu nzi mmwe mu yenda ku mmwe.
Ha mu ngina mu nzi, bakamuamutjila, ijani tjamapiwa.
Podzani bagwele baipapo kakale mu babudze muti, ‘bushe gwe Ndzimu gwamusedzelela.’
Koga ha mu ngina mu nzi ngono bakasimuamutjile, yendani mu zila dzawo muti,
‘Ne hwuluba ye nzi iwoyo yanamatila mu makumbo edu toishashamula, guli butendeki gwe kuti amuzotiamutjila. Koga zibani hwoku, bushe gwe Ndzimu gwasedzelela.’
Ndomubudza nditi, mu zhuba ilelo kusumikilisiwa kwe Sodoma kowobe kulelu kupinda kwe nzi iwoyo”

“Yee mme wee! Wapalala iwe nzi we Korazini! Yee mme wee! Wapalala iwe nzi we Bhetisaida! Ha matjenamiso akashingwa mumuli akabe ashingwa mu nzi we Tire ne Sidoni bathu baikoko banobe bakashandukila ku Ndzimu ntolo, bakaambala masaka* bali gele mu nlota.
Koga mu zhuba le kusumikilisiwa kwe bathu be Tire ne Sidoni kowobe kulelu pana kwenyu.
Nawe nzi we Kapenaume, apa unomilidzigwa kudzimu kene? Aa, unowodelusigwa pasi, ku bugalo* gwe bafi.
“Iye unomuhwa unohwa imi, na iye unomulamba unolamba imi, ngono iye unondilamba unolamba iye wakandituma.”
Bali makumi ali kutendeka ana babili bakashanduka nge kushatha, bakati, “She, ne meya mibi inotihwa ha tiyitjemela nge zina lenyu.”
Kadabila eti, “Ndabona Satani ewa se lupenyo gwe vula edwa pezhugwi.
Ndakamupa simba kutshamba nyoka ne makungubudza ne kukunda masimba wose e tjita, akuna tjinowomukubadza.
Koga musishathe ngekwa ikoku, kuti meya inomuhwa koga shathilani kuti mazina enyu akakwagwa kudzimu.”

Mu tjibaka itjetjo, Jesu wakabe akashathiswa nge Meya yakayengemala kabe eti, “Ndomuboka, Tate, She we kudzimu ne shango, ngobe makasumbikila zwithu izwezwi batjenjedu ne banohwisisa, koga mukazwizumbunulila zwitole. Ee, Tate, ngobe oku kwakabe kumushathisa.
“Zwithu zose zwakapiwa imi ndi Tate. Akuna unoziba kuti Nkololo ndiani, kuzhe kwa Tate, kene kuti Tate ndiani kuzhe kwe Nkololo na ibabo Nkololo baada kubazibisa.”
Ipapo katendebukila ku badiyiwa babe, ngono kati kubali asingahwiwe nge bathu, “Bakakombolegwa ibabo banobona tjamunobona!
Ngobe Ndomubudza nditi, balebesambeli banjinji na boshe bakulu bakayemula kubona tjamunobona, koga bakasitjibone ne kuhwa tjamunohwa koga bakasitjihwe.”
Ipapo mmwe n'diyi we nlayo kamilika kulika Jesu, kati, “N'diyi, ini tjandakafanila shinga kubona butjilo gusingapele?”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Ini tjakakwagwa mu nlayo? Iwe unoubala tjini?”
Iyebo kashandula kati, “Kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Ida She Ndzimu uwo nge moyo uwo wose nenge meya iyo yose nenge masimba awo wose nenge nkumbulo uwo wose’ kakale, ‘Ida mbakidzani uwo sekwa unozwida.’ ”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Washandula zubuyanana. Ita ikoku, ndizo unowotjila.”
Koga nge kushaka kuzwilulwamisa, kabhuzwa Jesu kati, “Ngono mbakidzani wangu ndiani?”
Jesu kati, “Mmwe nlume wakabe edwa ku Jerusalema edelukila ku Jeriko, kashangana ne batoleli, bakantolela thundu, bakanloba ngono bakayenda bansiya ali pejo nge lufu.
Kukashingikala kuti mpirisiti mmwe katobela zila iyeyo, ngono kati ebona nlume iwoyu, kanyenyeledza kapinda.
Sa ikokobo, Nlevi kati epinda bo ipapo kambona, kanyenyeledza kapinda.
Koga Nsamariya wakabe ali mu gwendobo, kaswika pakabe pana nlume iwoyu kati embona kanhwila zogwadza,
kayenda kunli, kalapa mabanga awe nge kuadila mafuta ne nkumbi we zhambi, kudwapo kaasunga. Kudwa ipapo katathisa nlume iwoyo mu zomba
Tjimuka kadusa maloso mabili e siliva kaapa ntjengeti we ng'umba ye bezi. Kati kunli, ‘Un'yenge, ngono ndowoti ndibuya akulipa kwaunowobe washingisa pezhugwi kwa ikoku.’ ”
Jesu kawidza eti, “Sekwa unobona, ndiupi waibaba bathu batatu, wakalakidza ana ludo nge malebeswa ku nlume wakabe ashangana ne batoleli?”
N'diyi we nlayo kashandula eti, “Iwoyo wakanhwila zogwadza.” Jesu kati kunli, “Yenda unoyita sa ikokobo.”
Jesu ne badiyiwa babe bakati bali mu zila yabo, bakaswika pamwe nzi bakaamutjigwa nge nkadzi unoyi Mata.
Mata wakabe ana nnung'una uwe edang'wa Mariya, wakatikagala pasi pejo ne makumbo a She kahwilila matama awe.

Koga Mata wakabe elemegwa nge nshingo ne kululwamisa kwakabe kwakafanila thamwa. Kazha kuna Jesu ngono kambhuzwa kati, “She, amuna hanya ha nnung'una wangu endisiya ndishinga nshingo ndoga kene? Mumbudze andibhatshe.”
She kadabila eti, “Mata, Mata, iwe ate uli gedzikane kakale unodziyidzika nge zwithu zwinjinji,
koga tjing'ompela tjithu tjinoshakika, Mariya washalula tjakwako, itjo tjaasingawotolegwa.”
Limwe zhuba Jesu wakabe etembezela mu gumwe bugalo, ngono kati epedza, mmwe we badiyiwa babe kati kunli, “She, mutidiye kutembezela, sa Johani akadiya badiyiwa babe.”
Kati kubali, “Ha mutembezela muti,
‘Tate,
zina lenyu ngaliyengamadziwe,
bushe gwenyu ngaguzhe.
Mutipeni zhuba ne zhuba zojiwa zwedu zwe zhuba.
Mutizwiibhatigwe zwibi zwedu,
ngobe naswibo tobazwiibhatigwa bose banotithamila milandu.
Musitilonge mu kulikwa.’ ”
Ipapo Jesu kati kubali, “Ndiupi wenyu ungayenda ku nzwalani uwe, pakati kwe busiku eswika eti ‘Nzwalani, undiadzime zwiwunga zwitatu,
ngobe nzwalani wangu umu gwendo wazha pandili, koga andina tjandingampa,’
koga ekon'dabila eti, ‘Usinditshonyonge, nkoba wazhaligwa imi ne bana bangu tayizela. Andingamuke akupa tjimwe?’
Ndomubudza nditi, ne asingake kamuka kampa tjiwunga, ngobe ali nzwalani uwe, koga nge moyo nlefu wa iwoyu nlume, unowomuka kampa kose kwaanoshaka.”
“Ndizo ndomubudza nditi, kumbilani mowopiwa; shakani mowowana; kokodzani mowozhuligwa.
Mmwe ne mmwe unokumbila unoamutjila, na iye unoshaka unowana, kakale ne unokokodza, unowozhuligwa.
Ndiupi mumuli imwi botate, ungati mwana uwe ekumbila hwobe, kampa nyoka mu bumo gwe hwobe kene?
Kene ungati ekumbila bumbulu, kampa gugubudza?
Ha imwi babi, muziba kupa bana benyu zwipo zwakanaka, kukulu kungapani Tate benyu ba kudzimu kwabanowopa Meya yakayengemala ibabo banobakumbila!”
Jesu wakabe edusa meya mbi we mbebebe. Kukati meya mbi yabhuda, nlume we mbebebe kalebeleka, ngono bathu bakakaabala.
Koga bamwe babo bakati, “Unodusa meya mibi nge simba la Bheelizebhuli, she we meya mibi.”
Bamwe bakanlika nge kukumbila tjilakidzo tjinodwa kudzimu.
Koga Jesu, ngobe eziba njalakang'wa dzabo kati kubali, “Bushe gumwe ne gumwe gwakazwithubukanya, gowokolomoka ne nsha mmwe ne mmwe wakathubukana, unowopalala.
Ha Satani akathubukanya, bushe gugwe gungasima tjini kene? Hwuti ndoleba saikoku, ngobe mukati, ndodusa meya mibi nge simba la Bheelizebhuli.
Ngono ha ili kuti ndodusa meya mibi nge simba la Bheelizebhuli, bana benyu banoidusa nge simba la ani? Ndizo banowobe basumikilisi benyu.
Koga ha ili kuti ndodusa meya mibi nge simba le Ndzimu, bushe gwe Ndzimu gwatjiswika mumuli.”
“Ha nlume wakasima akabhata zwibhayano, akalisa ng'umba iye ye bushe, thundu iye yakatjengeteka.
Koga ha mmwe wakasima kumpinda angan'nginilila kankunda, unotolela zwibhayano ne zwivikili nlume iwoyu zwaabe ali gelebgwe, ndizo ekokoba tjaatapa.”
“Iye usimile nami unonyanyayidzana nami, na iye usingakubunganye nami, unopaladza.”
“Ha meya mbi ibhuda mu nthu, inopinda mu magalo akawoma ishaka kunyaluluka, koga isingakuwane. Ipapo inoti, ‘Ndowobgwilila ku ng'umba yandakadwa ku ili.’
Ha iswika, inowana ng'umba iyeyo yakatshwayigwa ili mbuyanana kakale yakalulwamisiwa.
Ipapo inoyenda inotola meya mimwe ili kutendeka mibi kuupinda, ngono yose inongina ikagala mukati, ndizo tjimo tje nthu iwoyo tje bupelo tjobipa kupinda tje kutanga.”
Kukati Jesu atjaleba zwithu izwezwi, mmwe nkadzi pakati kwe mbunga we bathu kamilidza hwi kati, “Kwakakombolegwa nkadzi wakakuzwala na iye wawakamwa munli.”
Koga Jesu kadabila eti, “Koga kwakakombolegwa ibaba banohwa dama le Ndzimu bakalilondolodza.”
Kwakati mbunga we bathu ukula, Jesu kati, “Bathu ibaba bangwenu bathu babi. Banoshaka tjilakidzo tjinotjenamisa, koga akuna tjilakidzo tjabanowopiwa, kuzhe kwe tjilakidzo tja Jona.
Sa Jona akabe ali tjilakidzo ku bathu be Ninive, Nkololo we Nthu na iye unowobe tjilakidzo ku bathu ibaba bangwenu.

Nfumakadzi we burwa unowoma ne bathu ibaba bangwenu mu nsi we kusumikilisiwa, ngono unowobabona nlandu, ngobe wakazha edwa ku phelelo dze shango kuwohwa butjenjedu gwa Solomoni, ngono bonani, nkulu pana Solomoni upano.

Balume be Ninive banowoma ne bathu ibaba bangwenu mu nsi we kusumikilisiwa, koga banowobabona nlandu, ngobe bakashandukila ku Ndzimu mu kusumikila kwa Jona, ngono ngwenu bonani, nkulu pana Jona upano.”
“Akuna unobhatidza luvone, ngono kagubiga mu magalo agunowosumbikika, kene kagufumika nge itundu. Koga unogubiga patjena kuti ndizo banongina babone tjedza.
Zhisho lilo ndigo luvone gwe mbili uwo. Ha mesho awo akalulwama, mbili uwo wose uzhele tjedza. Koga ha zhisho lilo lisakalulwama, mbili uwo wose uzhele zhalima.
Ngono ibe ne njele kuti tjedza tjimukuli tjisibe zhalima.
Ndizo, ha mbili uwo wose uli zhele tjedza, kusina ndungululo iyo mu zhalima, unowopenya tjose, se tjedza tje luvone tjikupenyela.”
Jesu kati atjalebeleka, mmwe we Bafarasi kankoka kunoja naye, ndizo kayenda kanoja naye.
Ngono Nfarasi iwoyu katjenama ebona Jesu eja asangula.
Ipapo She kati kunli, “Ngono ngwenu imwi Bafarasi mosuka kuzhe kwe nkombe ne kwe ndilo, koga mukati kwenyu muzhele bugovu ne bubi.
Zwilengwe ndimwi! Apa iye wakathama kuzhe ate iyezwe wakathama mukati kene?
Koga dusani zwimukati kwe ndilo dzenyu, zwili zwipo zwe basheti, ndizo tjimwe ne tjimwe tjowobe tjibuyanana kumuli.
“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi Bafarasi, ngobe mopa Ndzimu tjebugumi* tje nvavani ne ruwe ne milibo yose, koga motjuluka kuthama ndulamo ne ludo gwe Ndzimu. Mobe muyita izwezwi koga musingalashe zwimwe.
“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi Bafarasi, ngobe moda zwigalo zwipezhugwi mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo ne kulezwiwa mu matengeselo.
Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi, ngobe monga zwikumbu zwisakatjwayiwa,
Mmwe we badiyi be nlayo kan'dabila kati, “N'diyi, ha uleba zwithu izwezwi, naswibo unotituka.”
Jesu kadabila kati, “Yee mme wee! Mapalalabo imwi badiyi be nlayo, ngobe mosengesa bathu mitolo inolema, koga imwi nge kwenyu amutoshaka kubabhatsha nenguba kuli kutukununu.
Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi ngobe mobaka zwikumbuludzo pa zwikumbu zwe balebesambeli, bakabulawa ndi bobatategulu benyu.
Ndizo molakidza kuti modumana ne tjakashingwa ndi bobatategulu benyu, bakabulaya balebesambeli, ngono imwi mobaka zwikumbuludzo pa zwikumbu zwabo.
Ndizo, butjenjedu gwe Ndzimu gwakati, ‘Ndowobatumila balebesambeli ne batumwa, ngono bamwe babo banowobabulaya, koga bamwe babo banowobadziyidza.’
Ndizo bathu ibaba ba ngwenu banowodabilila malopa e balebesambeli, iyawa akatebugwa kudwa mu kutangisa kwe shango,
kudwa mu lopa la Abele kunoti mu lopa la Zakariya, wakabulayigwa pakati kwe tjibeso ne bugalo* gwe Ndzimu. Ee, ndomubudza nditi, bathu ibaba bangwenu banowodabilila kose ikoku.
“Yee mme wee! Mapalala imwi badiyi be nlayo, ngobe makatola khiyi ye luzibo, koga mukasingine ngono makadzibila bakabe beshaka ngina.”
Kukati Jesu edwa ipapo, Bafarasi ne badiyi be nlayo bakatangisa kunyanyayidzana naye nge bushongola, bembhuzwa bhuzo,
beshaka kumbhatshila nge ndebo.
Kukati kutjakajalo zwiwulu zwinjinji zwe bathu, zwatjikubungana zotshambana, Jesu katangisa kulebeleka ne badiyiwa babe kutanga eti, “Muyele njele mbidzo* ye Bafarasi butjengedzi.
Akuna tjakazwimbiwa tjisingawozumbunugwa, kene tjakasumbikika tjisingawozibgwa.
Ndizo tjamaleba mu zhalima tjowohwika mu tjedza ne tjamunoleba munyebezela mu ng'umba, tjowoandamiswa.”
“Ndomubudza bazwalani bangu nditi, musitje ibabo banobulaya mbili, koga shule kwa ipapo kusina tjabangadwilila bakatjithama.
Koga ndowomutjenjedza kuti wamakafanilo tja ndiupi. Itjani iye unoti shule kwe kubulaya kabe ne simba lekuposela mu moto usingadzime. Ee, ndomubudza, muntje.
“Apa zhazho shanu adzitotengesiwa nge mapeni mabili kene? Koga akuna ne ing'ompela yadzo inokanganika mbeli kwe Ndzimu.
Nenge mavudzi e misholo yenyu na iwobo akabagwa. Ndizo musitje ngobe themba zhazho inopinda themba ye zhazho njinji.”
“Ndomubudza nditi, iye unoleba kuti unami mbeli kwe bathu, Nkololo we Nthu unoleba kuti unaye mbeli kwe batumwa be Ndzimu.
Koga iye unondizwilandula mbeli kwe bathu unowozwilandugwa mbeli kwe batumwa be Ndzimu.
“Ngono mmwe ne mmwe unoleba dama lakabipa ngekwe Nkololo we Nthu unowozwiibhatigwa, koga iye unoleba kwakabipa ngekwe Meya yakayengemala aatowozwiibhatigwa.
“Ha bemuzhisa kumusekesa mbeli kwe ng'umba dze mitembezelo ne mbeli kwe balauli na mbeli kwa boshe, musidziyidzike ngekwe kuti mowodabila muitini kene kuti mowolebani,
ngobe Meya yakayengemala inowomudiya tjamunowoleba nge tjibaka itjetjo.”
Mmwe nlume mu mbunga kati kuna Jesu, “N'diyi, budzani nkulu wangu akobane nami lukata.”
Koga Jesu kan'dabila eti, “Nlume ndiwe, ndiani wakandipa fanilo dze kusumikilisa kene kukoba lukata pakati kwenyu!”
Ipapo kati kubali, “Lingani! Muzwilise mu bugovu gose, butjilo gwe nthu ate guli mu bunji gwe thundu iye.”
Ngono kababudza tjifaniso kati, “Nnda we mmwe nfumi wakadusa zojiwa zwinjinji.
Nfumi iwoyo kakumbula eti, ‘Ndowothamani kene? Andina pathu pandingabiganya zojiwa zwangu.’
Ipapo kati, ‘Tjandinowothama ndi etji. Ndowokolomola matula angu, ngono abaka makulu, muali ndowobiganya mathunde angu wose ne thundu yangu yose.
Ndizo ndowozwidwa nditi ndina thundu njinji mbuya dzakabigigwa makole manjinji. Anditowodziyidzika, ndowoja ang'wa ashatha.’
Koga Ndzimu ukati kunli, ‘Tjilengwe ndiwe, busiku gwa nasi butjilo gugo gowotogwa. Thundu iyo inowobe yani kene?’
Oku ndiko sekwa kunowobe iko ku mmwe ne mmwe unozwibiganyila thundu koga asakafuma muna zwe Ndzimu.”
Ipapo Jesu kati ku badiyiwa babe, “Ndizo ndomubudza nditi, musidziyidzike ngekwe butjilo gwenyu, kuti mowojani kene ngekwe mibili yenyu, kuti mowoambalani.
Butjilo gopinda zojiwa ne mbili unopinda zwiambalo.
Kumbulani makungubo, aatodzwala kakale aatovuna, aana matula koga Ndzimu unoajisa. Imwi ngono mopinda nyuni kungapani kene!
Ndiani wenyu ungati ngodziyidzika nge moyo, kapaphidza kuli kutukununu bulefu gwe butjilo gugwe kene?
Se musingake mukashinga ikoku kuthu kutukununu, modziyidzikilani ngekwa zose zwimwe kene?
Kumbulani maluba sekwa anokula. Aatoshinga kene kuli luka. Koga ndomubudza kuti, na iye Solomoni mu bubuya gugwe gose, aazobe akaambala se ling'ompela lawo.
Ha kuli iko Ndzimu sekwa unoambadza bushwa gwe shango, guyapo nasi ngono mangwana gulashigwa mu moto, unowomuambadza kukulu kungapani kene, imwi bathu be kugalamoyo kutukununu!
“Ndizo musigale muti mowojani kene mowong'wani kene kuli kudziyidzika mu meya mushaka tjamunowoja ne tjamonowong'wa. Musidziyidzike mu mimoyo ndiko.
Zwitjaba zose zwe shango zotizhilila izwezwi zwakajali, koga Tate benyu banoziba kuti mozwishaka.
Mu bumo gwa ikoku shakani bushe gwabo, ngono zwithu izwezwi zowobe zwenyu naizobo.”
“Musitje, imwi ngubi tukununu ngobe hwuda kwa Tate benyu kumupa bushe.
Tengesani thundu dzenyu, ngono mukobele bashayi. Muzwishakile zwikwama zwisingawoshakala ne fumwa kudzimu isingawopela, pasingasedzele mbava kakale sola paisingaje.
Ipapo pana fumwa yenyu, ndipo panowobe ne mimoyo yenyubo.
“Ambalani mupelele, muzwilulwamisile kushinga ne mavone enyu agale ethuta,
se balanda bakalindila tetshi wabo kudwa ku nzano we bukwe, kuti ndizo ati ezha ekokodza, banzhulile nkoba tjinyolotjo.
Bakakombolegwa balanda ibabo banowowang'wa ndi tetshi wabo ha ebuya bakalinga. Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, unowozwilulwamisa kabapakulila, kabagadza pa tafuli, kabapa zojiwa.
Bakakombolegwa balanda ibabo banowoti tetshi wabo kabawana bakazwilulwamisa, kene angaswika pakati kwe busiku kene mazhokuyedza.
Koga zibani hwoku, ha mweni we ng'umba akabe aziba tjibaka mbava tjainowozha nditjo, unobe asakaletja ng'umba ipkhwanyiwa.
Ndizo namwibo galani makazwilulwamisa, ngobe Nkololo we Nthu unowozha nge tjibaka tjamusakankumbula.”
Pita kabhuzwa kati, “She, apa mobudza iswi koga tjifaniso itjetji, kene mmwe ne mmwe?”
She kashandula eti, “Ndiupi ntjengeti wakatjenjela unogalikabgwe, unoti tetshi kapa simba mu balanda bamwe kubapa gobe labo le zojiwa nge tjibaka tjakalingisana?
Wakakombolegwa nlanda iwoyo unowowang'wa ndi tetshi uwe eshinga sa ikoko.
Ndomubudza malebeswa, nditi, unowompa masimba mu zwithu zose zwaanazo.
Koga ha nlanda iwoyu angazwidwa eti, ‘Tetshi wangu unononoka kuzha,’ ngono ipapo ekowotangisa kuloba balandalume ne balandakadzi, eja eng'wa edakwa,
tetshi we nlanda iwoyo unowozha mu zhuba laasakankumbula nenge tjibaka tjaasingazibe. Unowonloba kunogwadza kan'gadza ne basingagalemoyo.
“Iwoyo nlanda unoziba kuda kwa tetshi uwe koga asingathame tjinoshakwa ndi tetshi uwe, unowolobgwa shamu njinji.

Koga iye usingazibe ngono ethama zwithu zwaakafanila kuzwihwisigwa zogwadza, unowolobgwa shamu shomanana. Muna iye wakapiwa kunji, kowoshakwa kunji, kakale muna iye unotjengeteswa kunji, kunji kwazo kowoshakwa munli.”
“Ndakazhisa moto mu shango, ngono ndoyemula seni kuti ungabe wabhatidziwa kale!
Koga ndina kudubikiwa kwe kudziyidzika kwandakafanila dubikiwa, ndizo ndi mu buyendasi gungapani kuswikila kuwila!
Apa mokumbula kuti ndazhisa mbakiso mu shango kene? Aa, ndomubudza, ndazhisa kuthubukana.
Kudwila ngwenu nsha we bathu bashanu unowothubukana, batatu begwisana ne babili ne babili begwisana ne batatu.

Banowothubukana, tatayi begwisana ne nkololo ne nkololo egwisana na tatayi, mayi begwisana ne nkololokadzi ne nkololokadzi egwisana na mayi, mmezwale begwisana ne nlongo ne nlongo egwisana na mmezwale.”
Kati ku mbunga we bathu, “Moti mubona gole limilika kunomila zhuba, tjinyolotjo mukati, ‘Vula inowona,’ ngono ikana.
Kakale phepo ye Burwa ha ihwuhwudza, moti kowopisa kwazo, ngono kukabe iko.
Batjengedzi ndimwi! Mohwisisa kulingika kwe shango ne nge kwa pezhugwi. Ini musingahwisise kuti misi ino inodwani kene?”
“Ini musingatubule kuzwizibigwa tjakalulwama?

Uti ha ukwebegwa ku nlayo nge wakutilika nlandu, gwisa kwazo kudumana naye mu zila, kuti ungadwa ekukwebela ku nsumikilisi, ngono nsumikilisi kakuyisa ku mbhati, mbhati kakuyisa ku ng'umba ye busungwa.
Ndokubudza malebeswa, autowobhuda mukati kudzina walipa mari wose.”
Kwakabe kulipo bamwe bathu tjibaka itjetjo, bakabudza Jesu ngekwe Bagalili Pilato baakabulaya batjapa Ndzimu zwibhayilo.
Jesu kabadabila eti, “Mokumbula kuti Bagalili ibabo bakabe bali batjinyi bakulu kupinda Bagalili bamwe bose ngobe bakafa sa ikoko kene?
Aa, ndomubudza nditi koga kuzhe kwe kuti mushandukile ku Ndzimu, namwibo mowoloba mose saibo.
Kene ibabo bali gumi lina bali zhanakadzi (18) bakafa, bawigwa nge thungamakole mu Siloame, mokumbula kuti bakabe bana nlandu kupinda bamwe bose bakabe begala mu Jerusalema kene?
Aa, ndomubudza nditi koga kuzhe kwe kuti mushandukile ku Ndzimu namwibo mowoloba mose saibo.”
Ipapo kaleba tjifaniso etji kati, “Mmwe nthu wakabe ana mpaya wakadzwagwa mu nnda uwe we mizhambi, ngono kayenda kunoshola mitjelo muuli, koga kasiwane tjimwe.
Ndizo kati ku ntjengeti we nnda we nzhambi, ‘Bona, kwabe makole matatu ndizha kuwoshola mitjelo mu mpaya iwoyu, koga ndisingawane tjimwe. Uuteme uulige! Unozanisilani mavu?’
Ntjengeti we nnda iwoyo kashandula eti, ‘Tetshi wangu, muuletjedze gole ileli ndiulimile ndiudilonge nthudze.
Ha ungazwala mitjelo gole linozha, kobe kwakalulwama! Ha usingazwale, ipapo muuteme muulige.’ ”
Jesu wakabe ediya mu imwe ng'umba ye mitembezelo nge zhuba le Sabata ngono kukabe kuliyapo
mmwe nkadzi wakabe akalemadziwa nge meya mbi makole ali gumi lina makole ali zhanakadzi. Wakabe akagongonyala, asingatubule kuzwitambunudza.
Ngono Jesu kati embona kan'dana kan'dwa kati, “Nkadzi, wasunungugwa mu bulema gugo.”
Ipapo kambiga maboko tjinyolotjo nkadzi iwoyo katambunuka, kakudza Ndzimu.

Ngono ntungamili we ng'umba ye mitembezelo kazhala bushongola, ngobe Jesu apodza nkadzi nge nsi we Sabata, kati ku bathu, “Kuna mazhuba matathatu e kushinga. Ndizo izhani muwopodziwa mu mazhuba iyawo, kusimu nsi we Sabata.”
She kan'dabila eti, “Batjengedzi ndimwi! Apa mmwe ne mmwe wenyu aatoti mu nsi we Sabata kasunungula ng'ombe iye kene donki iye mu danga kaitakulila kuzhe kanoing'wisa kene?
Ngono apa nkadzi iwoyu, tjizekugwana tja Abhurahama, wetjinga wakasungwa ndi Satani makole ali gumi lina makole ali zhanakadzi, asisunungugwe mu nsi we Sabata muna tjakabe tjakansunga kene?”
Kati eleba ikoku zwita zwizwe zose zwikabhakhwa nge shoni, koga bathu bakashathiswa nge zwithu zose zwinotjenamisa zwaakabe eyita.
Ipapo Jesu kabhuzwa kati, “bushe gwe Ndzimu gongani kene? Ndowogufanidzanya ngeni?
Gonga mbewu tukununu ye lusaba, yakati nthu kaitola kaidzwala mu nnda uwe. Ngono ikakula ikabe denje, ngono nyuni dzinowuluka dzikabaka mashaka mu thabi dzalo.”
Kapapha kati, “Ndowofanidzanya bushe gwe Ndzimu ngeni?
Gonga mbidzo yakatogwa nge nkadzi kaishanganya ne bgwisa bunjinji gwe tjiwunga, bhelelo bgwisa gose gukabila.”
Ipapo Jesu kapalama mizi ne mizana ediya ali mu zila iye eyenda ku Jerusalema.
Mmwe kambhuzwa kati, “She, apa kowotjidziwa bathu bashomanana koga kene?”
Ngono kati kubali,
“Gwisani tjose kungina nge nkoba wakamanikana, ngobe ndomubudza nditi, banji banowogwisa kungina, koga abatowotubula.
Kowoti koga mweni we ng'umba amilika azhalila nkoba, mowoma kuzhe mukokodza muti, ‘She, mutizhulile,’ koga unowodabila eti, ‘Anditoziba kuti modwa ngayi.’
Ipapo mowoti, ‘Takaja tikang'wa namwi, kakale makadiya mu zila dzedu.’
Koga unowodabila eti, ‘Ndomubudza, anditoziba kuti modwa ngayi. Idwani pandili, bashingi be mbipo ndimwi.’
Ipapo mowolila mukalobanya meno nge kugwadziwa kukulu, mubona Abhurahama na Isaki na Jakubo na bose balebesambeli, bali mu bushe gwe Ndzimu koga imwi malashigwa kuzhe.
Bathu banowozha bedwa ku bhezhuba ne ku golombedzo ne ku bunamdzwa ne ku burwa, ngono banowogala pasi bakaja zojiwa mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.
Ngono bonani, bamwe bashule banowobe bambeli ne bamwe bambeli banowobe bashule.”
Nge tjibaka itjetjo, bamwe Bafarasi bakazha kuna Jesu bakati kunli, “Bhuda ipapa uyende ntome ngobe Herode unoshaka kukubulaya.”
Jesu kadabila kati, “Yendani munobudza phungubgwe iyeyije kuti, ‘Ndowodusa meya mibi, apodza bathu nasi na mangwana, ngono mu zhuba le butatu ndowowidza nshingo wangu.’
Nekwakajalo, ndakafanila yenda nasi na mangwana na nn'gwani, ngobe dumbu, akuzofanila kuti nlebesambeli ungafila kuzhe kwe Jerusalema.
“Jerusalema! Jerusalema wee! Iwe unobulaya balebesambeli ukakikithidza nge mabgwe batumiwa kukuli, ndikangana ndiyemula kukubunganya bana babo, se hwuku ibubatila hwukwana, koga ulamba?
Bonani, ng'umba yenyu yabe dongo. Ndomubudza, amutowondibona kakale, kudzina muti, ‘Wakakombolegwa iye unozha nge zina la She!’ ”
Nge mmwe nsi we Sabata, Jesu wakayenda kunoja ku ng'umba ye mmwe nlauli wakabe ali Nfarasi nkulu, ngono bathu bakabe bakanlinga nge njele.
Ipapo mbeli kukwe kwakabe kuna nlume wakabe egwala bugwele gwe kuzwimba makumbo.
Jesu kabhuzwa Bafarasi ne badiyi be nlayo kati, “Apa kumu nlayo kupodza nge nsi we Sabata, kene aa?”
Koga bakanyalala, ndizo katola nlume iwoyo kampodza, kanletja kayenda.
Ipapo kababhuzwa kati, “Ndiupi wenyu ungati ana mwana uwe kene ng'ombe iye yawila mu tshime nge nsi we Sabata, kasiyiduse tjinyolotjo kene?”
Koga bakasinshandule
Kukati Jesu ebona bakokiwa sekwa banotizhilila magalo apezhugwi kababudza tjifaniso, kati,
“Ha mmwe angamukoka ku nzano we bukwe, musitongo tizhilila magalo apezhugwi, pamwe mmwe nkulu pakuli ungabe akokiwabo.
Ha kwakajalo, nkoki iye wakamukoka mose, unowozha kati kukuli, ‘Ipa nlume iwoyu tjigalo tjitjo.’ Ipapo, unowotangisa utola tjigalo tjipasi pasi wakabhakhwa nge shoni.
Koga ha wakokiwa, gala mu tjigalo tjipasi, ndizo kowoti nkoki uwo ezha, unowoti kukuli, ‘Nzwalani, tathila ku tjigalo tjipezhugwi.’ Ipapo, unowokudziwa mu mesho abose banoja nawe.
Nge kuti mmwe ne mmwe unozwikudza unowoyisiwa pasi, koga unozwiyisa pasi unowokudziwa.”

Ipapo Jesu kati ku nkoki uwe, “Ha wathama nzano we zojiwa, kene zwe madekwana, usikoke bazwalani babo, kene bana ba tate babo, kene makamu awo kene babakidzani nawe bakafuma, ha ungathama ikoku, banowokukokabo, ngono ukabe walipiwa.
Koga ha uthama nzano we zojiwa, koka bashayi ne zwilema ne mapofu.
Ndizo unowokombolegwa, ngobe abangatubule kukulipa. Unowolipiwa pa kumuka kwe balulwami.”
Kukati mmwe wa ibabo bakabe beja naye ku nzano be hwa ikoku, kati kuna Jesu, “Wakakombolegwa iye nthu unowoja tjiwunga mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Koga Jesu kan'dabila eti, “Mmwe nlume wakalulwamisila nzano nkulu we zojiwa, ngono kakoka bathu banjinji.
Kukati nge tjibaka tje nzano katuma nlanda uwe kubudza ibabo bakabe bakokiwa kabadwa eti ‘Izhani, ngobe tjimwe ne tjimwe tjatjilulwama.’
Koga bose bakatangisa kukumbila mazwiibhatigo e kuti abangazhe. We kutanga kati, ‘Ndatenga nnda, ngono ndakafanila bhuda ndinoubona. Ndokumbila kuti undizwiibhatigwe.’
Mmwe kati, ‘Ndatenga ngabe dzili gumi, ngono ndimu zila kunodzibona. Ndokumbila kuti undizwiibhatigwe.’
Kakale mmwe kati, ‘Ndalobola nkadzi, ndizo andingazhe!’
“Ndizo nlanda kabuya, kabikila tetshi uwe ikoku. Ipapo mweni we ng'umba kagwadzamoyo katuma nlanda uwe kati, ‘Yenda ulibilidza ku zila ne zijana dze nzi, uzhise ngeno bashayi ne zwilema ne mapofu.’
Nlanda kati abuya kadwa tetshi uwe kati, ‘Tate, tjamaleba tjayitiwa, koga kutjina magalo zwako.’
Ipapo tetshi kadwa nlanda uwe kati, ‘Yenda kuzhe ku zila hwulu ne ku zijana ne mu matjokotjoko uzhise bathu mu ng'umba yangu kuti izhale.
Ndokubudza, akuna mmwe wa ibabo bathu bakakokiwa kutanga unowolabila zojiwa zwe nzano wangu.’ ”
Mibunga minji yakabe iyenda na Jesu, katendebuka kati,
“Ha mmwe ezha kundili, ngono asingandide kupinda tate babe, na mmeyabe ne nkadzi uwe ne bana babe ne azwadzi dzidze kene gugwe butjilo dumbu, aangabe n'diyiwa wangu.
Iye usingasenge tjileyanyo tjitje kanditobela, aangabe n'diyiwa wangu.
“Ndiani wenyu ungati eshaka baka thungamakole, kasigale pasi kutanga kulingisisa themba, kubona kuti kene una mari e kuipedza kene?
Ha angatangisa kuibaka koga kasiyipedze, bose banoibona banowonseka.
Beti, ‘Iwoyu nthu wakatangisa kubaka, koga kasitubule kupedza.’

“Kene ndiupi She nkulu, unonobhayana ne mmwe She nkulu, usingawogala pasi kutanga, kakumbula kuti kene unowotubula, ana babhayani bali zwiwulu zwili gumi (10000), kulingisana ne unonnginilila ana babhayani bali zwiwulu zwili makumi mabili (20000) kene?
Ha asingatubule kuzwigwila, unowotuma bamilili babe ipapo ku tjita tjitje tjitjikule, kakumbila mbakiso.
Sa ikoko, aungabe n'diyiwa wangu, usasiya kose kwaunako.”
“Mwenyu wakalulwama, koga ha ungashuluka ungabgwilizigwa njo wawo tjini kene?
Aungaulonge mu minda, kene kuli kuushanganya ne nthudze. Bathu banoulasha. Iye una zebe dze kuhwa, ngaahwe.”
Bakhethisi ne batjinyi bakabe besedzela bose panli kunhwilila.
Koga Bafarasi ne badiyi be nlayo bakang'ong'ola beti, “Nlume iwoyu unoamutjila batjinyi, kakale kaja nabo.”
Ndizo Jesu kababudza tjifaniso, eti:

“Ndiupi nlume pakati kwenyu, ungati ana pkhwizi dzili zana ling'ompela (100) ebe elashikigwa nge ing'ompela yadzo, kasisiye dzili makumi ali zhanalume ana dzili zhanalume (99) mu shango, kanoshaka pkhwizi iyeyo yalashika kudzina eibona kene?
Ngono ha aibona, unoipika nge kushatha.
Ha eswika kanyi, unodana bazwalani babe ne babakidzani naye, kabakubunganya kati kubali, ‘Shathani nami, ngobe pkhwizana yangu yakabe yamila ndaibona.’

Koga saikoko ndomubudza nditi, kowobe ne kushatha kudzimu, ha ntjinyi ng'ompela eshandukila matjinyo awe, kupinda balulwami bali makumi ali zhanalume ana bali zhanalume (99) basingashetane ngokushanduka.”
“Kene ndiupi nkadzi una maloso e siliva
Ngono ha alibona unodana bazwalani babe be tjikadzi ne babakidzani naye, ebakubunganya eti kubali, ‘Shathani nami, ngobe loso langu le siliva lakabe lamila ndalibona.’
Koga sa ikoko, ndomubudza nditi, batumwa be Ndzimu banoshatha ha ntjinyi nng'ompela eshandukila matjinyo awe.”
Jesu kapapha kati, “Kwakabe kuna mmwe nlume ana bakololo bali babili.
Ntjetjana kati kuna tate babe, ‘Tate, mundipeni langu gobe mu thundu yenyu lakalingisana nami.’ Ndizo tate babo bakabakobanya thundu yabo.
Shule kwe mazhuba mashomanana, nkololo ntjetjana kakubunganya thundu iye yose katola gwendo, kayenda ku shango ikule kule, ngono ikoko kazanisa fumwa iye mu butjilo gusingashathise.
Ndizo kati azanisa kose kwaakabe anako, kukabe ne bhamba gulu mu shango iyeyo, katangisa kudziyila.
Ngono wakamilika kazwiyisa ku mmwe nlume we shango iyeyo, wakantumila ku nnda uwe kunopa ngulube dzidze zojiwa.
Kayemula kuja zojiwa zwinojiwa nge ngulube, koga akuna wakampa tjimwe.
Koga kati ekumbula kati, ‘Bangana balanda ba tate bangu banoja zojiwa zwikasala, koga imi pano ndofa nge zhala!
Ndowomilika ayenda kuna tate bangu, ngono ati kubali, Tate, ndakatjinyila Ndzimu kudzimu kose namwi.
Andizotjakafanila dang'wa nkololo wenyu mundibhate se mmwe we bashingi benyu.’
Ndizo kamilika kayenda kuna tate babe.
“Koga kukati atji thambo, tate babe bakambona, ngono bakanhwila ngoni kwazo. Bakatizhilila nkololo wabo, bakan'gumbatila bakamputa.
Nkololo kati kuna tate babe, ‘Tate, ndakatjinyila kudzimu kose namwi. Andizotjakafanila kudang'wa nkololo wenyu.’
Koga tate babe bakati ku bashingi babo ‘Libilidzani! Zhisani tjiambalo tjakanaka kupinda zose mun'ambadze itjo. Mun'ambadze ring'i ne khwebana.
Zhisani gondolo lakakola mulibhaye. Ngatijeni tishathe.
Ngobe nkololo wangu iwoyu, wakabe afa koga unotjila kakale, wakabe amila koga wabong'wa.’ Ndizo bakatangisa nzano.
“Nge tjibaka itjetjo nkololo hwola wakabe ali ku minda. Kati ezha pejo ne nzi, kahwa kumbiwa kuzang'wa.
Ndizo kadana mmwe we balanda kambhuzwa kuti koshingikalani.
Ngono nlanda kan'dabila eti ‘Nnung'una uwo wabuya, ngono tate babo mbhayila gondolo lakakola, ngobe wabuya etjila kakale ezwihwa.’
“Nkuluwe kagwadzamoyo kalamba ngina mu nzi, ndizo tate babe bakabhuda bakanonteta.

Koga kadabila tate babe eti, ‘Lingani! Makole wose iyawa ndakabe ndimushingila kakale andithu atongo tjuluka milayo yenyu. Koga amuthu mukatongo ndipa kene tjili tjibudzana kuti ndithamile bakhwinya bangu zojiwa.
Koga nkololo wenyu iwoyu wakazanisa thundu yenyu nge fukula dzinozwitengesa unoti eswika mu nzi mukambulayila gondolo lakakola!’
Tate babe bakadabila beti, ‘Nkololo wangu, iwe unami misi yose, na zose zwandinazo nge zwizo.
Ndizo kuzana ne kushatha kofanila, ngobe nnung'una uwo iwoyu, wakabe afa koga wotjila kakale, wakabe amila koga wabong'wa.’ ”
Jesu kabudza badiyiwa babe kati, “Kwakabe kuna mmwe nlume we nfumi ana ntjengeti wakatjetiwa kunli, kuyi unotjinya thundu ya tetshi uwe.
Ndizo kan'dana, kambhuzwa kati, ‘Ini ikoku kwandinohwa nge kuko kene? Undibikile ngekwe butjengeti gugo, ngobe autowodwilila uli ntjengeti.’
Ntjengeti iwoyo kaalakana ali ega eti, ‘Ndowothamani wali? Tetshi wangu unondidusa mu nshingo. Andizosima kwandingatsha kakale ndina shoni dze kukumbila.
Ndoziba tjandinowothama kuti ndizo nditi ndilashikigwa nge nshingo pano, bathu bandiamutjile mu mizi yabo.’
“Ndizo kadana mmwe ne mmwe wakabe ana nlandu kuna tetshi uwe. Kabhuzwa we kutanga kati, ‘Una nlandu ngapani kuna tetshi wangu kene?’
Kadabila eti, ‘Gabha le mafuta anobhika ali zana (100).’ Ntjengeti kan'dwa kati, ‘Tola lukwalo gugo gwe milandu ugale pasi ukwale tjinyolotjo, makumi ali mashanu (50).’

Ipapo kabhuzwa mmwe kati, ‘Ngono iwe una nlandu ungapani?’ Kadabila eti, ‘Hwomo dze mathunde dzili zana ling'ompela (100).’ Kan'dwa kati, ‘Tola lukwalo gugo gwe milandu ukwale makumi ali zhanakadzi (80).’
“Tetshi kakudza ntjengeti usina malebeswa, ngobe ashinga nge butjenjedu. Bathu be shango iyeyi bakatjenjela mu kushingidzana, kupinda bathu be tjedza.”
Ndomubudza nditi, “Muzwithamile zwikamu nge fumwa isakalulwama, kuti ndizo ha yapela mowoamutjigwa mu magalo asingapele.
Iye unogalikabgwe muna zwitukununu unogalikabgwe muna zwikulu, na iye usingagalikebgwe muna zwitukununu, aatogalikabgwe muna zwikulu.
Ndizo ha musakabe mugalikabgwe mu kushingisa fumwa isakalulwama, ndiani unowomugalabgwe mu kushingisa fumwa ye malebeswa kene?
Kakale ha musakabe mugalikabgwe muna zwe bamwe, ndiani unowomupa zwinowobe zwenyu.
“Akuna nlanda ungashingila botetshi babili. Ungadwa ebenga mmwe wabo, kada mmwe wabo, kene kabhatilila mmwe wabo, kalamba mmwe wabo. Aungashingile kose Ndzimu ne fumwa.”
Bafarasi, ibo bakabe beda mari bakahwa kose ikoku, ngono bakaseka Jesu mahanya.
Koga Jesu kati kubali, “Imwi mu ibo banozwilulwamisa mu mesho e bathu, koga Ndzimu unoziba mimoyo yenyu, zwinokudziwa mu bathu zoshimisa mu mesho e Ndzimu.
“Hwalo dze nlayo ne dze balebesambeli dzakashingisiwa kuswikila Johani ezha. Tjinga kwa ipapo, ndebo mbuya ye bushe gwe Ndzimu inosumikigwa, ngono mmwe ne mmwe unogwisa nge masimba kungina muguli.
Kulelu kuti kudzimu ne shango zwipinde, pakuti kulashike shanga ing'ompela ye nlayo, kene ili tukununu kungapani.
“Iye unolamba nkadzi uwe elobola mmwe nkadzi, unothama bupombgwe, na iyebo nlume unolobola nkadzi wakalambiwa, unothama bupombgwe.”
“Kwakabe kuna mmwe nlume we mfumi, akaambala ngubo ye mbala we bushaba gwakabondelela ne jila lakanaka le themba ipezhugwi, ngono ethama mizano ye zojiwa mazhuba wose egala ali mu ipepkhwe.
Pa nkoba we nzi uwe kwakabe kuli lele nshayi unodang'wa Lazaro, ali zhele malonda,
ngono eyemula kuja mamburumburu e zojiwa anowa mu tafuli ye nfumi ne mbgwa dumbu dzakazha dzikanazwa malonda awe.
“Nshayi iwoyo kafa, ngono batumwa be kudzimu bakansengela pa ifuba tja Abhurahama. Nlume wakafuma na iye kafa ngono kabiganyiwa.
Kati ali mu bugalo* gwe bafi, kwaakabe ali mu kudziyila kukulu, kamilidza mesho kabona Abhurahama ali kule kule, ana Lazaro, pa ifuba tjitje.
Ndizo kamba kati, ‘Tate Abhurahama, mundihwile ngoni, mutume Lazaro adubike theswi ye tjinyala tjitje mu vula, atothodze lulimi gwangu, ngobe ndimu kuhwa zogwadza kukulu mu moto iwoyu.’

“Koga Abhurahama kadabila eti, ‘Nkololo wangu, kumbula kuti mu butjilo gugo wakawana zwithu zwizo zwakanaka, koga sa ikoko Lazaro kawana zwakabipa, ndizo ngwenu, unonyaladziwa pano, iwe umu kuhwa zogwadza kukulu kulu.
Pezhugwi kwa ikoku kose, pakati kwedu nawe, kuna gorokoro gulu linodzibila banoshaka zha ikoko bedwa ngeno, kene banoshaka zha kutili bedwa ikoko.’
Kashandula eti, ‘Ngono ndomukumbila tate, kuti mutume Lazaro, ayende ku ng'umba ya tate bangu,
ngobe ndina bakololo ba tate bangu bali bashanu. Ngaanobatjenjedza, kuti ndizo basizhebo ku bugalo igogu gwe kuhwa zogwadza.’
“Koga Abhurahama kadabila kati, ‘Bana Mushe ne balebesambeli ngabahwe ibo.’
Koga kati, ‘Aa, Tate Abhurahama, ha mmwe unodwa mu bafi angayenda kubali, banowoshandukila mu matjinyo abo.’
Abhurahama kati kunli, ‘Ha basingahwilile Mushe ne balebesambeli, abangahwilile kene mmwe angamuka mu bafi.’ ”
Jesu kadwa badiyiwa babe kati, “Miliko ye jinyo yakafanila kuti izhe, koga yee mme wee! Wapalala iye wainozha ndiye.
Kungayita kuti asungiligwe gwiyo mu ntshibha uwe, ekowolashigwa mu gungwa, pana kuti ayite mmwe waibaba batukununu kuti atjinye.”
Ndizo muzwilise, “Ha ikamu tjitjo tjitjinya, utjitjemele, ngono ha tjishandukila matjinyo atjo, utjizwiibhatigwe.
Koga ha tjikuyitila jinyo kanjinji nge zhuba, koga tjizha kukuli katendeka, tjizwibona nlandu tjiti, ‘Ndoshandukila matjinyo angu,’ utjizwiibhatigwe.”
Batumwa bakati kuna She, “Paphidzani kugalamoyo kwedu.”
Ngono She kadabila eti, “Ha mabe muna kugalamoyo kungapa phudzi ye lusaba, mungabe muti ku nti iwoyu we malibheri, ‘Dzikunuka, udzikilike mu gungwa,’ Ngono ukamuhwa.”
“Apa kuna mmwe wenyu ungati ana nlanda unolima kene unolisa pkhwizi, ngono ungati iwoyo nlanda edwa ku minda kan'dwa kati, ‘Izha ngeno tjinyolotjo ugale pasi uje kene?’
Apa bukulu aangati, ‘Undithamile tjilayilo, ube undipakulila ndije nding'we, shule kwaipapo ungajabo ukang'wa?’
Apa unowoboka nlanda uwe, ngobe ashinga tjaadwiwa kuti atjishinge kene?
Ndizo namwibo ha mashinga tjimwe ne tjimwe tjamadwiwa kuti mu tjishinge, muti, ‘Ti balanda basi betjimwe, tashinga iwo nshingo wedu koga.’ ”
Jesu kati ali mu zila eyenda ku Jerusalema, kapinda pakati kwe Samariya ne Galili.
Ngono kati engina mu mmwe nzi, balume bali gumi bakabe begwala mapele bakanshanganidza, bakama thambgwana, ngono
bakamilidzila mahwi abo pezhugwi bakadana beti, “Jesu, Tetshi wedu, mutihwile ngoni!”
Kati ebabona kabadwa kati, “Yendani munozwilakidza ku Bapirisiti.”
Ngono bakati batjayenda bakapola.
Ipapo mmwe wabo kati ebona kuti wapola kashanduka, ekudza Ndzimu nge hwi lipezhugwi.
Kazwilashila pa makumbo a Jesu kamboka. Wakabe ali Nsamariya.
Ngono Jesu kabhuzwa kati, “Apa babe basi gumi bose bapodziwa kene? Bamwe bali zhanalume bangayi?
Akuna ne ng'ompela washandukila shule kukudza Ndzimu, kuzhe kwa iwoyu ntaya kene?”
Ipapo kati kunli, “Milika uyende, kugalamoyo kuko kwakutjidza.”
Jesu kati ebhuzwiwa nge Bafarasi kuti bushe gwe Ndzimu gowozha lini, kadabila eti, “Bushe gwe Ndzimu agutowozha nge zila kene nge zwilakidzo zwinobong'wa,
naiko bathu abatowoti ‘Wogugo kene wogu jee!’ Ngobe bushe gwe kudzimu gu mumuli.”
Ngono kati ku badiyiwa babe, “Misi inowozha yamunowoyemula kubona limwe le mazhuba e Nkololo we Nthu, koga amutowolibona.
Bamwe banowoti kumuli, ‘Wojee!’ Kene ‘Woyoyu!’ Musiyende, musibatobele.
“Se lupenyo gwe vula gunopenya, guvoneka zhuzhugwi gudwa ku lubizho kunoti ku lubizho, Nkololo we Nthu unozha mu zhuba lile
Koga kutanga wakafanila adziyidziwe nge zwithu zwinjinji, kakale alambiwe nge bathu bangwenu.
Sekwa kwakabe kuli iko mu misi ya Nowa, kowobe sa ikoko mu misi ye Nkololo we Nthu.
Bathu bakabe beja beng'wa, belobola kakale belobodziwa kunoti zhuba Nowa laakangina mu ng'umba inoangama mu vula se n'goro, ngono nkubila ukazha ukalobesa bathu bose.
Sa ikoko, konga sekwa kwakabe iko mu misi ya Lote, bathu bakabe beja beng'wa, betenga kakale betengesa, bedzwala kakale bebaka,
koga nsi Lote waakabhuda mu Sodoma, Ndzimu wakanisa moto ne bgwe linonyawuka le salifa* se vula, ngono zwikabalobesa bose.
Kowobe kwakajalo mu zhuba linozumbunugwa Nkololo we Nthu.
“Mu nsi iwoyu upezhugwi kwe denga le ng'umba ana zwija zwizwe mukati, ngaasideluke kuzwitola. Sa ikokobo, umu nnda ngaasishandukile ku nzi.
Kumbulani nkadzi wa Lote.
Iye unogwisa tjengeta butjilo gugwe, gonlashikila, koga unopa Ndzimu kutjengeta butjilo gugwe, gombuyila.
Ndomubudza nditi, mu busiku igogo babili banowobe bali lele mu bulalo gung'ompela, koga mmwe unowotogwa mmwe kasiyiwa.
Bakadzi babili banowobe bekwiya zojiwa bose; mmwe unowotogwa mmwe kasiyiwa.”
Bakabhuzwa bakati, “Ngayi She?”
Kadabila eti, “Pana itumbu magola anokubunganapo.”
Kudwa ipapo Jesu kabudza badiyiwa babe tjifaniso, kubalakidza kuti bakafanila bagale betembezela basinganyalemoyo.
Kati, “Mu mmwe nzi kwakabe kuna nsumikilisi wakabe asingatje Ndzimu, kakale asina hanya ne nthu.
Ngono mu nzi iwoyo, kukabe kuna tjilikadzi yakabe igala izha kunli i kumbila, iti, ‘Hwililani tjililo tjangu, mundigwile mu tjita tjangu.’
Ngono kalamba kwe tjibakana. Koga shule kazwidwa kati, ‘Nenguba ndisingatje Ndzimu, kakale ndisina hanya ne nthu,
koga se tjilikadzi iyeyi igala izha enditshonyonga, ndoyigwila mu tjita tjayo!’ ”
Ngono She kati, “Hwililani tjinolebgwa nge nsumikilisi usakalulwama.
Ngono apa Ndzimu autowogwila bashalugwa bawo banolilila kuuli siku ne sikati kene? Apa ungabanonokela kene?
Ndomubudza nditi, unowobagwila nge kulibilidza. Koga apa Nkololo we nthu ezha, unowowana kugalamoyo kuliyapo mu shango kene?”
Ku bamwe bakabe begalabgwe kuti ibo balulwami, ngono belingila bamwe pasi, Jesu wakaleba tjifaniso etji,
“Balume babili bakatathila ku Ng'umba ye Ndzimu kunotembezela, mmwe wabo ali Nfarasi, mmwe ali nkhethisi.
“Nfarasi kamilika, kazwitembezelela eti, ‘Ndzimu, ndomubokela kuti anditonga bamwe bathu, batoleli ne babi ne phombgwe kene sa iwoyu nkhethisi.
Ndozwinyima zojiwa kabili nge tshipi, apa tjebugumi* muna zose zwandinowana.’
“Nkhethisi kama thambgwana, kasitongo linga na iko pezhugwi, koga kazwibona nladu kati, ‘Ndzimu, mundihwile ngoni imi ntjinyi.’
Ndomubudza kuti iwoyu nlume we nkhethisi wakayenda ku nzi uwe alulwamisiwa nge Ndzimu, isi Nfarasi; ngobe, iye unozwikudza unowoyisiwa pasi, na iye unozwiyisa pasi unowokudziwa.”
Bakabe bezhisa bo bana batukununu kuna Jesu, kuti ababige maboko. Badiyiwa bakati bebona ikoku bakabatjemela.
Koga Jesu kabadananila kunli kati, “Letjani bana bazhe kundili, musibadzibile, ngobe bushe gwe Ndzimu nge gwe bakajali.
Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, iye usingaamutjile bushe gwe Ndzimu se mwana, aatowongina muguli.”
Mmwe nkulu kambhuzwa kati, “N'diyi wakalulwama, ndingashingani kuti ndiwane butjilo gusingapele?”
Jesu kadabila kati, “Ini undidana wakalulwama? Akuna wakalulwama kuzhe kwe Ndzimu woga.
Unoziba milayo inoti, ‘Usithame bupombgwe, usibulaye, usikwibe, usipe butendeki* gwe manyepkhwa, kudza tate babo na mmeyabo.’ ”
Kati, “Kose ikoku ndakakulondolodza kudwila mu butjetjana gwangu.”
Kukati Jesu ehwa ikoku kati kunli, “Utjasheta tjithu tjing'ompela. Tengesa kose kwaunako ukobele bashayi, ndizo unowobe ne fumwa kudzimu. Shule kwa ipapo uzhe unditobele.”
Kati ehwa ikoku kangina buyendasi, ngobe wakabe akafuma kwazo.
Jesu kanlinga ngono kati, “Kwakasima seni, kuti bana fumwa bangine mu bushe gwe Ndzimu!
Kulelu kuti kamela ingine nge buli le lunji, pakuti nfumi angine mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Ibabo bakahwa ikoku, bakabhuzwa beti, “Ndiani ngono ungatjidziwa?”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Tjisingatubuke mu bathu tjotubuka mu Ndzimu.”
Pita kati kunli, “Bonani, takasiya mizi yedu kumutobela.”
Jesu kati kubali, “Ndolebesa nditi, akuna iye wakasiya nzi uwe, kene nkadzi uwe kene bana ba tate babe, kene bazwadzi babe, kene bana babe ngekwe bushe gwe Ndzimu,
usingawoamutjila kunjinji kupinda zwaakasiya, mu tjibaka tjino ne butjilo gusingapele mu misi inozha.”
Jesu katolela ntome bali gumi lina babili kabadwa kati, “Bonani, totathila ku Jerusalema, kunowoti matama wose akalebgwa nge balebesambeli ngekwe Nkololo we Nthu, akashingikala.
Unolongwa mu maboko abe Zwitjaba. Banowon'dadila, bakantuka, bakanthwila mate,
bakanloba, ngono bakambulaya. Mu zhuba le butatu unowomuka kakale.”
Badiyiwa bakasihwisise ikoku kose. Tjeneso yako yakabe yakasumbikika kubali, ndizo bakasizibe tjaakabe eleba nge kwatjo.
Kukati Jesu apejo ne Jeriko, nlume we bhofu kabe ali gele pa hwunde ye zila e kumbila.
Kati ehwa mbunga we bathu upinda, kabhuzwa kuti koshingikalani.
Bakambudza kuti, “Jesu we Nazareta unopinda.”
Kamimila kati, “Jesu, Nkololo wa Dafite, mundihwile ngoni!”
Ibabo bakabe bali mbeli bakantjemela bakati anyalale, koga kamimila kwazo eti, “Nkololo wa Dafite, mundihwile ngoni!”
Jesu kama, kati nlume iwoyo azhisiwe kunli. Kati abe pejo, Jesu kambhuzwa kati,
“Unoshaka kuti ndikuyitileni kene?”
Kadabila eti, “She, ndoshaka kuti ndipofunuke.”
Jesu kati kunli, “Pofunuka! Kugalamoyo kuko kwakupodza.”
Tjinyolotjo kapofunuka, ngono katobela Jesu ekudza Ndzimu. Kukati bathu bose bebona ikoku, na ibobo bakakudza Ndzimu.
Ngono Jesu kangina mu nzi we Jeriko kaupalama.
Ipapo kwakabe kuna nlume unoyi Zakhayosi, ali nkhethisi nkulu, kakale akafuma.
Wakabe eyemula kubona kuti Jesu ndiani, koga nge bufupi gugwe, kasitubule, ngobe esitigwa nge mbunga we bathu wakabe uli ipapo.
Ndizo Zakhayosi kalabukila mbeli, kanotatha nkuyu, kuti abone Jesu ngobe wakabe enopinda ndi ipapo.
Kukati Jesu eswika pa nti iwoyo kalinga pezhugwi ngono kati kuna Zakhayosi, “Zakhayosi, deluka ulibilidza, nasi ndi mwezi uwo.”
Zakhayosi kadeluka elibilidza, kaamutjila Jesu nge kushatha kukulu.
Bathu bakati bebona, bakang'ong'ola beti, “Wayenda kunobe mwezi we ntjinyi.”
Zakhayosi kamilika kati kuna She Jesu, “Bonani She, ndotola ntome kwe thundu yangu ngwenu ndikobela bashayi. Kene kuna wandakatjebela, ndombuzila kanna kwe tjimwe ne tjimwe tjandakantolela.”
Jesu kati kunli, “Nasi jidzo laswika mu nzi iwoyu, ngobe naiyebo, u nkololo wa Abhurahama.
Ngobe Nkololo we Nthu wakazhila kuwoshaka ne kutjidza bakalashika.”
Kukati batjakahwilila zwithu izwezwi, Jesu kadwilila ebabudza tjifaniso, ngobe se akabe ali pejo nge Jerusalema bathu bakabe bekumbula kuti bushe gwe kudzimu gowoswika tjinyolotjo.
Ndizo kati, “Mmwe nlume wakabe ali nkugwana abe pejo ngoyenda ku shango ikule kule kunopiwa bushe ekowobgwilila ku shango ya kanyi kwabo.
Kadana balanda babe bali gumi kabapa maloso e golide
Koga bathu be shango iye bakabe bebenga, ndizo bakatuma bathu shule kukwe beti, ‘Atitoshaka kuti nlume iwoyu atibuse.’
“Kati ebuya asinoamutjila bushe, kadana balanda ibaba baakapa maloso eshaka ziba sekwa bakaazwadza.
We kutanga kazha kati, ‘Tetshi, maloso enyu e golide akazwala mamwe maloso e golide ali gumi.’
She nkulu kati kunli, ‘Kubuyanana, nlanda wakalulwama. Ngobe unogagwabgwe mu zwithu zwitukununu. Unowobe ne simba pezhugwi kwe mizi ili gumi.’
We bubili kazha kati, ‘Tetshi maloso enyu e golide akazwala mamwe maloso e golide ali mashanu.’
She nkulu kati kunli, ‘Nawebo, ibe ne simba pezhugwi kwe mizi ili mishanu.’
“Mmwe nlanda kazha kati, ‘Tetshi, bonani, loso lenyu le golide eli. Ndakalipetela nge jila, ali biganya.
Ngekuti ndakabe nditja imwi, ngobe muli nlume nkukutu. Motola pamusakabiga, mukavuna pamusakadzwala.’
She nkulu uwe kadabila eti, ‘Ndowokusumikilisa nge matama awo, nlanda mbi ndiwe. Wakabe uzibazo kuti ndi nlume nkukutu, ndotola pandisakabiga, avuna pandisakadzwala.
Ini ngono usakabiga maloso angu mu dula le mari, kuti nditi ndibuya ndiatole azwala?’
“Kati kuna ibabo bamile ipapo, ‘Muntolele maloso awe e golide, muape iwoyu una ali gumi.’
Ngono bakati kunli, ‘She, una mamwe ali gumi kale!’
She nkulu kadabila eti, ‘Ndomubudza nditi, iye una tjaanatjo unowopaphidzigwa, koga iye usina ne tjitukununu tjaanatjo unowotjitolegwa.
Koga izwezo zwita zwangu zwakabe zwisingashake kuti ndizwibuse, muzwizhise ngeno muzwibulaye mbeli kwangu.’ ”
Ngono kukati Jesu aleba ikoku, kadwilila mbeli etathila ku Jerusalema.
Kati esedzela ku Bhetifage ne Bhetani pa dombo linodang'wa Dombo le Mitoba, katuma babili be badiyiwa babe eti kubali,
“Yendani ku nzi umbeli kwenyu, mowoti mungina muuli, mowowana donkana yakasungiligwa ipapo, isina wakatongo itatha. Muisunungule muizhise ngeno.
Ha mmwe emubhuzwa eti, ‘Moisunungulilani?’ Mun'dwe muti, ‘She banoishaka.’ ”
Ndizo ibabo bakabe batumwa bakayenda, bakawana kwakajalo sekwa ababudza.
Ngono bakati batjasunungula donkana, beni bayo bakati, “Ini musunungula donkana iyeyi?”
Bakadabila beti, “She banoishaka.”
Bakaizhisa kuna Jesu, bakawala hazu dzabo pezhugwi kwe donkana, bakatathisa Jesu mu donkana.
Kukati eyenda akatatha donkana, bathu bakawala hazu dzabo mu zila.

Kati eswika pejo ne pathu zila painokunguluka mu hwunde ne Dombo le Mitoba, mbunga wose we badiyiwa ukatangisa kupululudza bakashatha ne kukudza Ndzimu nge mahwi apezhugwi ngekwe mishingo yose inotjenamisa yabakabe babona beti,
“Kwakakombolegwa iye she nkulu unozha mu zina la She! Ngakube ne kunyalala kudzimu, gudzo alibe pezhugwi zhugwi!”
Bamwe Bafarasi pakati kwe mbunga bakati kuna Jesu, “N'diyi, tjemela badiyiwa babo!”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Ndomubudza nditi, nenguba banganyalala, mabgwe iwo nge kwawo anowomimila.”
Jesu kati esedzelela nzi we Jerusalema eubona kaulilila,
kabe eti, “Dzene nasi wabe uziba zwithu zwingakuzhisila kunyalala! Koga ngwenu wazwisumbikigwa.
Ngobe misi inowokuzhila inowoti zwita zwizo zwikathama matathilo pa bhakasa lilo zwikupoteleka, kakale zwikukombeledza.
Zowokupkhwanyila pasi, iwe ne bana bamukuli. Akuna bgwe lazwinowosiya lakatiliyana ne limwe mukuli, ngobe auzoziba nsi we kumbiwa kuko.”
Kudwapo kangina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, katangisa kutatila kuzhe bakabe betengesa.
Kabadwa kati, “Kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Ng'umba yangu inowobe ng'umba ye ntembezelo,’ koga imwi maithama guwu le batoleli.”
Wakabe ediya mazhuba wose mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu. Bapirisiti* bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo ne batungamili be bathu bakabe begwisa kumbulaya.
Koga abazowana zila yabangakushinga ndiyo, ngobe bathu bakabe beteedza kwazo matama awe.
Limwe zhuba Jesu kati ediya bathu mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu esumikila ndebo mbuya, Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo ne bakulu be Bajuta bakazha kunli,
bakati, “Utibudze kuti unoshinga zwithu izwezwi nge simba lipi ndiani wakakupa simba ileli?”
Kadabila eti, “Ndowomubhuzwabo bhuzo ing'ompela. Mundibudze,
kudubika kwa Johani kwakadwa kudzimu kene mu bathu?”
Bakalebeleka tje kwabo beti, “Ha tingati, ‘Kwakadwa kudzimu,’ unowoti, ‘Ini musakan'galamoyo munli?’
Koga ha tingati, ‘Kwakadwa mu bathu,’ bathu banowotikikithidza nge mabgwe, ngobe bose banogalamoyo kuti Johani wakabe ali nlebesambeli.”
Ndizo bakashandula beti, abatoziba kwakwakadwa.
Jesu kati kubali, “Namibo andingamubudze kuti zwithu izwezwi ndozwishinga nge simba lipi.”
Jesu katangisa budza bathu tjifaniso etji, eti, “Mmwe nlume wakalima nnda we mizhambi. Kauhirisa ku bamwe balimi, ngono iye kayenda ku imwe shango tjibaka tjilefu.
Kukati tjibaka tje zhambi tjiswika, katuma nlanda ku bahiri* be nnda uwe kuti bampe mimwe mitjelo ye zhambi. Koga bahiri be nnda bakanloba bakantata kayenda akalembedza maboko.
Mweni we nnda katuma nlanda we bubili ngono na iyebo bakanloba bakambhatisa shoni, bakantata kayendabo akalembedza maboko.
Katuma we butatu, na iyebo bakanloba bakandusa mbonje bakanlashila kuzhe.
Ipapo mweni we nnda we mizhambi wakati, ‘Ndowotini kene? Ndowotuma nkololo wangu, wandinoda, pamwe banowonteta.’
Koga kukati bahiri be nnda bembona, bakalangana beti, ‘Oyu ndiye n'gali thaka. Ngatimbulayeni, kuti ndizo thaka ibe yedu!’
Bakamposela kuzhe kwe nnda we mizhambi bakambulaya.
“Ngono mweni we nnda we mizhambi unowobatini kene?
Unowozha kalobesa bahiri ibabo, ngono unowohirisa nnda iwoyo we mizhambi kuna bapoga.”
Kukati bathu behwa ikoku bakati, “Ikoku akungashingikale!”
Jesu kabalingisisa, kababhuzwa kati, “Ngono kodwani ikoku kwakakwagwa kuyi
‘Bgwe lakalambiwa nge babaki
ndilo lakabe bgwe linotambunudza mbako?’
Iye unowila pezhugwi kwe bgwe ilelo, unowovunikana kasala ali zwitibhutibhu, koga ha liwila nthu lowompkhwanya.”
Badiyi be nlayo ne Bapirisiti bakulu bakagwisa kumbhata ipapo, ngobe beziba kuti wabe elebeleka nge kwabo mu tjifaniso itjetji. Koga bakabe betja bathu.
Ndizo bankanlalila ngono bakatuma shodzi dzakabe dzizwithama bathu bana malebeswa. Bakabe bekumbula kuti banowombhatshila muna tjaangaleba, kuti ndizo ban'yise ku nlayo ne mu simba le nlauli.
Ngono shodzi dzakambhuzwa dziti, “N'diyi, toziba kuti moleba kakale mukadiya tjakalulwama amutoshalaula, koga modiya zila ye Ndzimu nge malebeswa.
Apa kumu nlayo kene, kuti tilipe lukhetho kuna Kaisara She nkulu we Roma kene aa?”
Jesu kaziba bupitipiti gwabo ngono kati,
“Mundilakidze loso ling'ompela. Tjifano tjaani itjetji, kakale kwakakwagwa nge kwaani mulili?”
Bakashandula beti, “Nge zwa Kaisara.”
Kati kubali, “Ndizo ipani Kaisara zwithu zwizwe, ngono mupe Ndzimu zwawo.”
Bakasitubule kumbhatshila nge matama pakati kwe bathu. Kakale nge kutjenamisiwa nge dabilo dzidze, bakanyalala.
Ipapo Basadusi* bamwe, ibo banoti akuna kumuka kwe bafi, bakazha kunli nge bhuzo,
beti, “N'diyi, Mushe wakati kwalila eti, ‘Ha nlume efa esiya nkadzi asina bana, nnung'una uwe ngaan'gale thaka, athamile nkulu uwe bana.’
Kwakabe kuna thobeledzani dze balisana dzili kutendeka, ngono hwola yabo ikalobola, koga ikafa isina bana.
Ipapo thobeledzo iye ikan'gala thaka, ngono ikafabo isina bana.
We butatu katolabo tjilikadzi iyeyo ngono nge zila iyeyo, bose bali kutendeka bakafa basina bana.
Bhelelo nkadzi kafabo.
Ndizo ngwenu, mu kumuka kwe bafi, unowobe nkadzi waani muna bose bali kutendeka bakanlobola?”
Jesu kabashandula eti, “Bathu be misi ino banolobola bakalobodziwa.
Koga ibabo banowobe bakalizana kungina mu nsi ihwoyo we kumuka mu bafi, abatowolobola kene kuli kulobodziwa,
Ngoti abangatjafe, ngobe banolizana ne batumwa be kudzimu kakale bana be Ndzimu, ngoti bali bana be kumuka mu bafi.
Mushe na iye unotjenesa mu ndebo ye denje linotshwa, kuti bafi banowomusigwa mu butjilo. Unoleba ngekwa She eti ndibo, ‘Ndzimu wa Abhurahama, Ndzimu wa Isaki ne Ndzimu wa Jakubo.’
Ndizo ate uli Ndzimu we bafi, koga nge we batjili, ngobe bose banoutjilila.”
Bamwe badiyi be nlayo bakadabila beti, “Maleba zubuyanana, n'diyi!”
Ngono bakasitjabhuzwe bhuzo dzimwe kakale.
Ipapo Jesu kati kubali, “Banodwatjini ha beti Mesiya nkololo wa Dafite?
Ngobe Dafite nge kukwe mu lukwalo gwe Njimbo unoti,
‘She bakati kuna She wangu,
Gala ku luboko gwangu gwe luji,
kudzina ndithama zwita zwizo tjigalo tjaunobiga makumbo awo.’
Dafite unondana eti, ‘She.’ Ngono ungabe nkololo uwe tjini kene?”
Kukati bathu bose bakahwilila, Jesu kati ku badiyiwa babe,

“Tjenjelelani badiyi be nlayo. Banoda yenda bakaambala hazu dze makubakuba, beda kudumiliswa pakati kwe bathu ne kugala mu zwigalo zwi pezhugwi mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo ne magalo a hwunde ne nkoki mu mizano ye zojiwa.
Banotjebela tjilikadzi nge kudzitolela thundu dzadzo, bakayita mashungwa ndibong'we nge mitembezelo milefu. Bathu bakajali banowolobgwa shamu inogwadza kwazo.”
Kukati Jesu emilidza mesho, kabona bafumi belonga zwipo zwabo mutjija tje mari e Ng'umba ye Ndzimu.
Kabona tjilikadzi ye nshayi elonga maloso mabili e khopa.
Kati, “Ndolebesa ndoti, tjilikadzi iyeyi ye nshayi yalonga kunopinda kwabo bose.
Bathu bose badusa zwipo zwabo benokola mu fumwa yabo, koga iye mu bushayi gugwe, walonga kose kwaanotjila ndiko.”
Ndizo bamwe be badiyiwa babe bakati belebeleka ngekwe Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, sekwa yakanakisiwa nge mabgwe mabuya nenge zwipo zwe Ndzimu,
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Ngekwe zwithu izwezwi zwamunobona, mazhuba anowozha, kusingowosala bgwe ipapa lakatiliyana ne limwe, lisingowoligigwa pasi.”
Bakambhuzwa beti, “N'diyi, zwithu izwezwi zowoshingikala lini? Kakale tjilakidzo tjekuti zwabe pejo nge kushingikala tjowobeni?”
Ngono kashandula eti, “Ibeni ne njele kuti musidzimidziwe, ngobe banji banowozha nge zina langu beti, ‘Ndimi iye,’ kakale beti, ‘Misi yasedzela.’ Koga musibatobele.
Ha muhwa ngekwe ngwa nenge kupandukilana pakati kwe bathu, musitje. Ngoti zwithu izwezwi zwakafanila shingikala kutanga, koga bupelo agutowoswika ipapo.”
Kadwilila kati, “Itjaba tjowomukila itjaba ne bushe gukamukila bushe.
Kowobe ne kutengenyeka kwe shango kwakabangalala ne bhamba ne njigwele ne zwinoshingikala zwinotjisa ne zwilakidzo zwikulu zwinodwa kudzimu.

Koga ikoku kowoti kusathu kukashingikala, banomusunga bakamudziyidza. Banowomukakatila ku bakulu be ng'umba dze mitembezelo ne mu ng'umba dze busungwa, kakale mowoyisiwa mbeli kwa boshe bakulu ne balauli ngekwe zina langu.
Kobe kwabe tjibaka tjekuti mupe butendeki,
koga simisani mimoyo yenyu, musidziyidzike kuti mowodabila tjini.
Ngobe ndowomupa matama ne butjenjedu gusingawokundiwa kene kunyanyayidziwa nge zwita zwenyu.
Mowosungisiwa nge bazwadzi nenge bana ba tate benyu nenge makamu enyu nenge bazwalani benyu, ngono banowobulaya bamwe benyu.
Bathu bose banowomubenga ngekwe zina langu.
Koga akuna vudzi lingompela mu misholo yenyu linowolashika.
Nge kudzikitadza kwenyu, mowowana butjilo gwenyu.
“Koga ha mubona Jerusalema yakakombiwa nge ngwa, zibani kuti tjibaka tje kupaladziwa kwayo.
Ipapo bamu Judiya ngabatizhile ku matombo, ba mu nzi* nkulu ngababhude ne bamu shango basingine mu nzi nkulu.
Ngobe eyi ndiyo misi ye kubgwilizila kuti matama wose akakwagwa ashingikale.
Yee mme wee! Kowobangalala seni kumuli imwi bakadzi bakazwisenga ne banomwisa mu misi iyeyo! Kowobe ne buyendasi bukulu mu shango ne bushongola mu bathu ibaba.
Banowobulawa nge thumo, ngono bakatapigwa mu zwitjaba zose. Nzi we Jerusalema unowokanyangiwa nge Bezwitjaba,* kuswikila tjibaka tjebe Bezwitjaba tjipela.”
“Kowobe ne zwilakidzo mu zhuba ne mu mwedzi nenge mu nyenyedzi. Mu shango zwitjaba zowodziyidzika, zwishanganyiwa nsholo nge kuwona nenge kumidukana kwe vula ye gungwa.
Bathu betimbamamisiwa ngotja, bedziyidzika nge kuti ini tjinozha mu shango, ngobe masimba apezhugwi anowotengenyeka.
Ngono kudwapo banowobona Nkololo we Nthu ezha ali mu gole, nge masimba nenge kukudziwa.
Ha zwithu izwezwi zwitangisa kushingikala, mumilidze mesho yenyu mulinge pezhugwi, ngobe dzutunugwa kwenyu kowobe kwabe pejo.”
Ipapo kababudza tjifaniso etji, “Mulinge mpaya ne miti yose.
Ha ithinila, mozwibonegwa mukaziba kuti tjilimo tjabe pejo.
Sa ikoko ha mubona zwithu izwezwi zwishingikala, zibani kuti bushe gwe Ndzimu gwabe pejo.
“Ndolebesa ndoti kumuli, zwithu izwezwi zowoshingikala bathu ibaba bangwenu basathu bakapela.
Zhuzhugwi na pasi zowopela, koga matama angu anowosala.”
“Ibeni nenjele kuti ndizo mimoyo yenyu isikuligwe ngoja nenge kulaladza nenge kudziyidzika mu butjilo guno, zhuba ilelo lidwa limubhata se dati makakangang'wa,
ngobe lowozha mu bathu bose mu shango pamwe ne pamwe.
Ibeni nenjele, misi yose mutembezele, kuti mube ne simba le kukunda zwithu zose izwezwi ha zwishingikala ne kuma mbeli kwe Nkololo we Nthu.”
Zhuba ne zhuba Jesu wakabe ediya mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono madekwana mamwe ne mamwe ebhuda enolala ku dombo linoyi Dombo le Mitoba.
Mangwanana bathu bose bakabe bezha kunli kuwunhwilila mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu.
Nzano we Tjiwunga* tjisina mbidzo unodang'wa nzano wekupinda pezhugwi, wakabe watjibo pejo.
Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo bakabe beshaka zila yabangabulaya Jesu ndiyo, ngono betja bathu.
Ipapo Satani kangina muna Judasi, unodang'wa Isikariyoti, mmwe we bali gumi lina babili.
Ndizo Judasi kayenda ku Bapirisiti bakulu ne balauli be balindi be Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, kalangana nabo sekwa angawongela Jesu kubali.
Ngono bakashatha kwazo, ndizo bakaduma kumpa mari
ndizo Judasi kaduma, kashaka tjibaka tjakalingisana tje kuwonga Jesu pasina mbunga.
Zhuba le Tjiwunga tjisina Mbidzo, likazha lekuti pkhwizana ye Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi ibulawe.
Ndizo Jesu katuma Pita na Johani eti, “Yendani munotilulwamisila zojiwa zwe Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi, kuti ndizo tije.”
Bakambhuzwa beti, “Moshaka kuti timululwamisile izo ngayi?”
Kadabila eti, “Mowoti mungina mu nzi, mowoshangana ne nlume akasenga shabana ye vula. Muntobele kunoti mu ng'umba yaanowongina,
ngono muti ku mweni we ng'umba, ‘N'diyi kati kukuli, ng'umba ye bezi ingayi, yandingajila zojiwa zwe nzano wekupinda pezhugwi ne badiyiwa bangu?’
Unowomulakidza ng'umba hwulu hwulu ipezhugwi kwe imwe yakalongwa zwinogagwa. Mululwamise ikoku.”
Bakayenda, bakanowana zwithu zwili sekwa babudziwa ndi Jesu. Ndizo bakalulwamisila zojiwa zwe Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi.
Ngono kukati tjibaka tjaswika, Jesu ne batumwa babe bakagala pasi kuja,
Kabadwa kati, “Ndayemula kwazo kuja namwi tjilayilo tje Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi ikoku ndisathu adziyila.
Ngobe ndomubudza nditi, anditjawotjija kakale kudzina tjatjinoleba tjishingakala mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Kukati aamutjila bhepe le nkumbi we zhambi, kaboka eti, “Tolani ikoku mukobane.
Ndomubudza nditi, anditjawong'wa kakale nkumbi we zhambi, kudzina bushe gwe Ndzimu guzha.”
Katola tjiwunga kati aboka, katjipemula kabapa itjo eti, “Oyu mbili wangu unopigwa imwi. Itani ikoko, kundikumbula.”
Ngekwakajalo katola bhepe le nkumbi we zhambi shule kwe tjilayilo kati, “Bhepe ileli tjidumano tjitshwa tje malopa angu, anotebuligwa imwi.
“Koga bonani, iye unowondiwonga unoja nami mu ndilo.
Nkololo we Nthu unowofa sekwa kwakabigwa nge Ndzimu, koga yee mme wee! Wapalala iye nthu unon'wonga!”
Bakatangisa kubhuzwana tjekwabo kuti ndi upi wabo unowoshinga ikoku.
Ngono kwakabe ne kunyanyayidzana pakati kwabo, kuti ndiani wabo unowobe nkulu tjose.
Jesu kati kubali, “Boshe bakulu be zwitjaba banobusa bathu babo, ngono ibabo bana simba banodang'wa ‘Babhatshi be bathu.’
Koga imwi amuzofanila kube sa ikoko. Nkulu tjose pakati kwenyu ngaange iye ntukunu tjose, ngono mbusi ngaange nlanda.
Nkulu ndiupi, ugele eja kene unopakula? Apa ate ugele eja kene? Koga imi ndi pakati kwenyu se mpakuli.
“Imwi ndimwi makama nami mu ndiko dzangu dzose.
Ndizo ndomupa bushe koga sa Tate bangu bakandipa bushe,
mowoja mukang'wa nami mu bushe gwangu, mukagala mu zwigalo zwe bushe musumikilisa njudzi dzili gumi lina mbili dze Iziraela.”
Jesu kati, “Simoni, Simoni, Satani wakumbila kube nawe kukuzhunga se mathunde.
Koga ndakutembezelela Simoni kuti kugalamoyo kuko kusipele. Uti washanduka usimise zwikamu zwizo.”
Koga kadabila kati, “She, ndakazwimisila kuyenda namwi ku ng'umba ye busungwa ne ku lufu dumbu.”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Ndokubudza Pita, nditi, gukurume lowoti lisathu likalila nasi ukabe wandizwilandula katatu.”
Ipapo Jesu kababhuzwa kati, “Apa ndakati ndimutuma musina ikwama tje mari kene gobhodo kene khwebana, mukasheta tjimwe kene?”
Bakashandula beti, “Akuna tjatakasheta.”
Kati kubali, “koga ngwenu iye una ikwama tje mari, ngaatjitole, kose ne gobhodo, koga iye usina bukanu, atengese hazu iye agutenge.
Ngobe ndomubudza nditi tjakakwagwa kuyi 'wakabaligwa pa nng'ompela ne batjinyi' tjakafanila kuti tji shingikadziwe mundili, ndizoke tjakakwagwa nge kwangu tjoshingikala.”
Badiyiwa bakati, “Bonani She, awa makanu mabili.”
Kadabila eti, “Kwalizana.”
Jesu kabhuda mu nzi* nkulu, kayenda ku Dombo le Mitoba se mazhuba wose, badiyiwa babe bakantobela.
Ngono kati eswika pathu ipapo kati kubali, “Tembezelani kuti musingine mu kulikwa.”
Kadwa pabali thambgwana ingaposiwa bgwe likawilapo, ngono kathigama katembezela eti,
“Tate, ha muda, dusani bhepe ileli le kudziyidziwa pandili, koga kusi nge kuda kwangu, ngakushingwe kuda kwenyu.”
Ngono ntumwa unodwa kudzimu kaboneka kunli, kansimisa.
Nge shungu hwulu, katembezela nge masimba, ndizo dukuta lile likafanana ne madokhwe e malopa edothela pasi.
Kati emilika, apedza tembezela kabgwilila ku badiyiwa babe, kawana bakayizela nge buyendasi.
Kababhuzwa kati, “Ini makayizela? Mukani mutembezele kuti ndizo musingine mu kulikwa.”
Kukati, atjalebeleka, mbunga we bathu ukazha wakatungamigwa ndi Judasi, mmwe we bali gumi lina babili. Kasedzela kuna Jesu kumputa.
Koga Jesu kambhuzwa kati, “Judasi, apa unowonga Nkololo we Nthu nge kumputa kene?”
Kukati bakabe bana Jesu bebona kuti kowoshingikalani bakati, “She, apa tibateme nge makanu edu kene?”
Ndizo mmwe wabo katema nlanda we Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kanthubula zebe ye luji.
Koga Jesu kati, “Kwagala ikoku!” Kabhata zebe ye nlume ihwoyo ngono kampodza.
Ipapo Jesu kati ku Bapirisiti bakulu ne balauli be balindi be Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ne bakulu be Bajuta bakabe bazha kunli, “Apa mazha ku ntjinyi kene, kwamungadzina mukazha nge makanu nenge swimbo kene?
Ndakabe namwi misi yose mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, koga amuzotongo ndibhata. Koga etji nditjo tjibaka tjenyu ne tjibaka tje simba le zhalima.”
Ipapo bakasunga Jesu, bakantola, bakayenda bakangina naye mu ng'umba ye Ntungamili we Bapirisiti. Pita katobela ali thambgwana.
Kukati babesa moto pakati kwe nsha, ngono bagala pasi bose, Pita kagala pasi nabo.
Mmwe nlandakadzi kambona ali gele ipapo pa tjedza tje moto. Kanlingisisa ngono kati, “Ihwoyu wabe anayebo.”
Koga Pita kalandula eti, “Nkadzi, ndiwe anditonziba.”
Shule kwe tjibaka tjifupi mmwe kakale kambona ngono kati, “Iwe umwe wabo.”
Pita kadabila eti, “Lumewe, ate ndili mmwe wabo.”
Shule kwe tjibaka tjingapa awara mmwe kakale kati, “Tjoselele iwoyu nlume wabe anaye, ngobe na iyebo N'galili.”
Koga Pita kadabila eti, “Lumewe, anditoziba kuti unoleba ngekweni!”
Kukati ipapo koga atjalebeleka, gukurume likalila.
She katendebuka kalingisisa Pita. Ipapo Pita kakumbula matama a She akabe andwa eti, “Gukurume lowoti lisathu likalila nasi unowobe wandizwiladula katatu.”
Kabhudila pazhe, ngono kalila kunogwadza.
Balume bakabe bakabhata Jesu bakatangisa kun'dadila kakale benloba.
Bakanzwimba mesho bakati kunli, “U nlebesambeli, leba! Ndiani wakuloba?”
Bakaleba zwimwe zwinjinji bentuka.
Kukati kuyedza makulukota e bakulu be Bajuta ne Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo bakakubungana, Jesu kazhisiwa mbeli kwabo.
Bakati, “Ha uli iye Mesiya utibudze.”
Jesu kadabila eti, “Ne ndingamubudza, amutowogalamoyo,
kakale ha ndingamubhuzwa amutowondishandula.
Koga kudwa ngwenu, iye Nkololo we Nthu unowogala ku luboko gwe luji* gwe Masimbawose e Ndzimu.”
Bose bakabhuzwa bakati, “Apa ndiwe Nkololo we Ndzimu kene?”
Kadabila eti, “Maleba kuti ndi iye.”
Ipapo bakati, “Ini titjashaka butendeki gumwe? Tanzwihwigwa tjaaleba nge nlomo uwe.”
Kudwapo gubungano lose le bathu likamilika likan'yisa kuna Pilato.
Ngono bakatangisa kuntilika nlandu beti, “Tawana nlume iwoyu edzimidza itjaba tjedu, kakale etidzibisa kulipa lukhetho kuna Kaisara, kati ndiye Mesiya ali she nkulu.”
Ndizo Pilato kabhuzwa Jesu kati, “Apa ndiwe she nkulu we Bajuta kene?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Waleba.”
Ngono Pilato kadwa Bapirisiti bakulu ne mbunga we bathu kati, “Anditobona nlume iwoyu nlandu.”
Koga bakasimisa beti, “Unodzonga bathu mu Judiya yose nge kudiya kukwe. Wakatangisa ku Galili, kadzina kawoti muno.”
Kukati Pilato ehwa ikoku, kabhuzwa kuti kene nlume iwoyu ate N'galili.
Kukati ehwa kuti Jesu unodwa mu ntuthu unobusiwa ndi Herode, kantumila kuna Herode, wakabe ali mu Jerusalema mu nsi iyeyo
Herode kati ebona Jesu, kashatha kwazo, ngobe kuli kwetjinga kwaakayemula kumbona. Muna tjaakabe ahwa nge kukwe, wakabe egalabgwe kuti unowombona eyita matjenamiso.
Ndizo kambhuzwa bhuzo njinji kwazo, koga Jesu kasishandule ne ing'ompela yadzo.
Bapirisiti bakulu ne badiyi be nlayo, bakabe bali mile ipapo bentilika nlandu bakasimisa.
Ipapo Herode ne babhayani babe bakanlingila pasi ben'dadila. Bakaambadza hazu yakanaka kwazo, bakambgwiliza kuna Pilato.
Ngono zhuba ilelo Herode na Pilato bakabe bazwalani, ngobe kutanga bakabe bakabengana.
Pilato kakubunganya Bapirisiti bakulu ne batungamili ne bathu,
ngono kati kubali, “Mandizhisila nlume iwoyu muti unodiyila bathu ntome. Ndambhuzwisisa mbeli kwenyu, ngono andizowana ali nlandu muna zose zwamunoleba.
Kose na Herode dumbu aazombona nlandu, ngobe wanshandusila kutili. Akuna tjaakatjinya iwoyu nlume tjaangabulayigwa.
Ndizo, ndowonloba, ansunungula.”
Bathu bose bakamimila beti, “ngaabulawe nlume iwoyu! Mutisunungulile Bharabhasi!”
Bharabhasi wakabe asungigwa kubulaya ne kumusa phandu mu nzi nkulu.
Ngoyemula kusunungula Jesu, Pilato kabakumbila kakale,
koga bakamimilila mbeli beti “Mumbambule! Mumbambule!”
Gwe butatu kati kubali, “Nge kutini? Watjinyani? Andizombona nlandu, waangabulayigwa. Ndizo ndowonloba, ansunungula.”
Koga bakabe besimisa nge mahwi apezhugwi kuti abambugwe, ngono abo mahwi kakunda.
Pilato kabadwa kati kuthamwe sekwa bakabe beshaka.
Kasunungula nlume wakabe asungigwa pandusa bathu ne kubulaya, iye wabakabe beshaka, ngono kabapa Jesu kuyita tjabanoda.
Babhayani bakati beyenda na Jesu bakashangana na Simoni unodwa ku Sirene, wakabe engina edwa kuzhe kwe nzi nkulu, bakampikisa tjileyanyo ali shule kukwe.
Ngono bathu banji bakantobela, kose ne bakadzi bakabe bekuwa benlilila.
Koga Jesu katendebuka, kati kubali, “Bakololokadzi be Jerusalema, musindililile, koga muzwililile, imwi ne bana benyu.
Ngobe misi inowozha bathu yabanowoti, ‘Bakakombolegwa seni bakadzi basingathame bana ne zwibumbilo zwisakatongo senga, kose ne mazhamu asakatongo mwisa!’
Ipapo banowoti ku matombo, ‘Mutiwile,’ bakati ku matuthu ‘Mutivukidzile!’
Ha bathu beyita ikoku mu nti nnyolo, kowoyitikalani ha nti wawoma kene?”
Balume babili be zwigebeng'a, bakatogwabo kang'ompela naye kunobulawa.
Bakati beswika pathu panodang'wa Ipepe tje Nsholo, bakambambula, kose ne zwigebeng'a, tjimwe ku luboko gwe luji tjimwe ku luboko gwe lumeshwe.
Ngono Jesu kati, “Tate, mubazwiibhatigwe, ngobe abatoziba tjabanothama.”
Bakakobana zwiambalo zwizwe nge kukandila.
Bathu bakama bakalingilila, koga bakulu be Bajuta bakankuwelela bakati, “Wakatjidza bamwe, ngaazwitjidze, ha ali Mesiya we Ndzimu, Nshalugwa wawo.”
Babhayani na ibobo ngono bakan'dadila. Bakampa nkumbi wakatyorowa,
ngono bakati, “Ha uli She nkulu we Bajuta, uzwitjidze.”
Kwakabe kuna nkwalo wakakwagwa tjapezhugwi kukwe unoti, “OYU NDI SHE NKULU WE BAJUTA.”
Mmwe we zwigebeng'a zwakabambugwa mu tjileyanyo kantuka, kati, “Apa ate uli Mesiya kene? Uzwitjidze naswi utitjidze bo!”
Koga mmwe kantjemela eti, “Apa autotja Ndzimu se walobgwa shamu inofanana ne yaalobgwabo kene?
Iswi kwakatilulwamila tolobgwa, ngobe towana mbhayilo wakafanila mishingo yedu. Koga nlume iwoyu akuna tjaatjinya.”
Ipapo kati, “Jesu, mundikumbule ha muswika mu bushe gwenyu.”
Jesu kanshandula kati, “Ndolebesa ndoti, nasi unowobe nami mu Paradaisi.*”
Kwakabe kuli tjibaka tje masikati makulu, ngono kukabe zhalima mu shango yose kuswikila tjibaka tje matewuko,
ngobe zhuba lakabe lati zwi. Tjisitili tje Bugalo* gwe Ndzimu tjikapaluka pakati kudwa pezhugwi kunoti pasi.
Jesu kadanilila nge hwi gulu eti, “Tate, ndolonga meya yangu mu maboko enyu.” Kukati aleba ikoku kapela.
Kukati nlauli we babhayani bali zana ebona tjayitikala kakudza Ndzimu eti, “Tjoselele, iwoyu nlume wakabe asina nlandu.”
Kukati bathu bose bakabe bakubunganila kuwobona ikoku bebona tjashingikala, bakazhala buyendasi ngono bakayenda ku mizi yabo bakapuna mimoyo.
Koga bose bakabe benziba kose ne bakadzi bakabe bantobela kudwa ku Galili, bakama thambgwana, bakalingilila zwithu izwezwi.
Ngono ngwenu kukabe kuna mmwe nlume unoyi Josefa wakabe edwa mu nzi we Arimateya, wakabe ali mmwe we makulukota e Bajuta, ngono ali nlume wakalulwama ana malebeswa.
Iye wakabe asadumana nge nkumbulo nenge nshingo wabo. Wakabe akalindila bushe gwe Ndzimu.
Nlume iwoyo wakayenda kuna Pilato ngono kakumbila Itumbu tja Jesu.
Ipapo katjitulula, katjipetela nge jila katjilonga mu ikumbu tjakakopogwa mu shongwe, tjisina wakatongo biganyiwa mutjili.
Lakabe lili Zhuba le Kubiganyidza, ngono Sabata labe lotangisa.
Bakadzi bakabe bazha na Jesu kudwa ku Galili bakatobela ngono bakabona ikumbu tja Jesu kose ne kubiganyiwa kukwe.
Ipapo bakabgwilila kanyi kunolulwamisa motsha ne mafuta anonuhwa zwakanaka.
Koga bakanyaluluka nge Sabata kuyendidzana ne nlayo.
Kukati mu zhuba le kutanga mu tshipi, kutji mangwanana kwazo, bakadzi ibabo bakatola motsha wabakabe balulwamisa, bakayenda ku ikumbu.
Bakawana bgwe lakabe lakazhalila nkoba we ikumbu lakakunguludzigwa kutjena ne ikumbu,
koga bakati bengina mukati, bakasiwane itumbu.
Bakati batjakakaabala ngekwa ikoku, balume babili bakaambala zwiambalo zwinopenya bakama pejo nabo.
Ngotja kwabo, bakakotamisa misholo pasi, ipapo balume ibabo bakati kubali, “Ini mushaka ntjili mu bafi?
Aapo ipapa wamuka. Kumbulani sekwa akamubudza, atji mu Galili eti,
‘Nkololo we Nthu wakafanila alongwe mu maboko e batjinyi, abambugwe, koga mu zhuba le butatu amuke.’ ”
Ipapo bakakumbula matama awe.
Ngono bakati beshanduka bedwa ku ikumbu, bakabudza bali gumi lina ung'ompela ne bamwe bose ikoku kose.
