“Ndobatembezelela; anditotembezelela shango, ndotembezelela ibabo bamakandipa, ngobe nge benyu.
Bose bandinabo nge benyu, na ibo bose bamunabo nge bangu, ngono ndakakudziwa nge kwabo.
Anditjowogala mu shango ino, koga ibo batjasala muili, imi ndozha kumuli Tate bakayengemala, mubavikile nge zina lenyu, ilo zina lamakandipa, kuti ndizo babe bang'ompela saswi tili bang'ompela.

Ndakati nditji nabo, ababakilila nge zina ileli lamakandipa. Ndakabatjengeta ngono, akuna wakalashika kuzhe kwa iye wakabe akalingisanyiwa ne kuti alobe, kuti ndizo matama e hwalo dze Ndzimu asiwile pasi.
Ngono ngwenu ndozha kumuli, koga ndoleba zwithu izwezwi nditjimu shango kuti ndizo babe ne kushatha kwangu mubali nge buzhalo.
Ndakabapa dama lenyu ngono shango ino ikababenga, ngobe ate bali be shango ino, sami ndisi we shango ino.
Anditokumbila kuti mubaduse mu shango, koga ndokumbila kuti mubavikile muna Mbi.
Ate bali be shango ino sami ndisi we shango ino.
Mubayengemadze mu malebeswa, dama lenyu li malebeswa.
Sekwa makandituma mu shango, nami ndakabatumabo mu shango.
Ndozwiyengemadza nge kwabo kuti ndizo na ibobo bayengemadziwe mu malebeswa.
“Anditotembezelela ibaba koga, ndotembezelelabo na ibabo banowogalamoyo mundili nge dama labo.
Ndotembezela kuti bose babe bang'ompela. Samwi Tate, muli mundili, nami ndili mumuli, dzene na ibobo bangabe mutili, kuti ndizo shango igalemoyo kuti makandituma.
Ndakabapa gudzo ilo lamakandipa, kuti ndizo babe bang'ompela, saswi tili bang'ompela,
imi ndili mubali namwi muli mundili, kuti ndizo babe bang'ompela nge buzhalo ne shango izibe kuti makandituma, ngono mobada koga sekwa munondida.
“Tate! Makandipa ibo, ngono ndoshaka kuti babe nami kwandiyako, kuti babone gudzo langu, ilo gudzo lamakandipa, ngobe makandida shango ino isathu ikabumbiwa.
Tate bakalulwama, nenguba shango isingamuzibe, koga imi ndomuziba, na ibaba banoziba kuti makandituma.
Ndakabazibisa zina lenyu, ngono ndowodwilila ndithama kuti lizibgwe, kuti ndizo ludo gwamunondida ndigo gube mubali ne nge kuti nami ndibe mubali.”
Jesu kati apedza tembezela, kayenda ne badiyiwa babe kanotjuluka nkuku we Kidironi. Kwakabe kuna nnda seli kwawo, Jesu ne badiyiwa babe bakangina mu nnda iwoyu.
Ngono Judasi, iye wakawonga Jesu, wakabe euziba, ngobe Jesu wakabe egala eshangana ne badiyiwa babe kuuli.
Ndizo Judasi kayenda ku nnda iwoyo akatungamila babhayani ne balindi be Ng'umba ye Ndzimu banodwa ku Bapirisiti bakulu ne Bafarasi bakasenga mathumo ne mavone.
Jesu se akabe eziba tjimwe ne tjimwe tjakabe tjowonshingikalila, kapindila mbeli kwe badiyiwa babe ngono kabhuzwa babhayani kati, “Ndiani wamunoshaka?”
Bakan'dabila beti, “Toshaka Jesu we Nazareta.”
Jesu kabadwa kati, “Ndimi.”
Judasi n'wongi, wakabe anabo.
Ngono kukati Jesu eti, “Ndimi” bakasedza nge kushule bakawila pasi.
Jesu kababhuzwa kakale kati, “Ndiani wamunoshaka?”
Bakati “Jesu we Nazareta.”
Jesu kati, “Ndamubudza kale kuti ndimi. Ha mushaka imi, letjani balume ibaba bayende.”
Wakaleba ikoku kuti matama aakabe atongo leba kutanga asiwile pasi, anoti; “Tate, andizolashikigwa nenguba ali nng'ompela we bamakandipa.”
Simoni Pita wakabe ana bukanu, kagushomola katema nlanda we Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kanthubula zebe ye luji. Zina la iwoyo nlanda lakabe liyi Maliko.
Ipapo Jesu kati kuna Pita, “Bgwiliza bukanu gugo mu khata. Apa unoalakana kuti anditowong'wa mu bhepe le kudziyidziwa landakapiwa ndi Tate kene?”
Ipapo babhayani be Baroma ne Nkulu wabo ne balindi be Ng'umba ye Ndzimu bakabhata Jesu, bakansunga.
Kutanga bakansa kuna Anasi, nkalabgwa wa Kaifasi, iye wakabe ali Ntungamili we Bapirisiti gole ilelo.
Kaifasi ndiye wakabe atongo kumbuludza Bajuta kuti koyita kuti nthu nng'ompela afe pana kuti kufe bathu bose.
Simoni Pita ne mmwe n'diyiwa bakatobela Jesu. Iwoyo mmwe n'diyiwa kaswika kanginabo tje mukati kwe nsha we Ntungamili we Bapirisiti, ngobe iye wakabe ezibgwa nge Ntungamili we Bapirisiti.
Pita iye kasala kuzhe tje pa nkoba. Ipapo iwoyo n'diyiwa wakabe ezibgwa nge Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kabhuda kanolebeleka ne nlandakadzi unolinda pa nkoba, ngono kangina na Pita mukati.
Mmwanadi iwoyu kadwa Pita kati, “Apa ate uli mmwe we badiyiwa ba iwoyu nlume kene?”
Pita kan'dabila eti, “Ate ndili mmwe wabo.”
Kwakabe kupota, ngono balanda ne balindi bakabe bedziya moto, ngono Pita wakabe anabo edziyabo moto.
Ntungamili we Bapirisiti akabhuzwa Jesu ngekwe badiyiwa babe ne nge kudiya kukwe.
Jesu kan'dabila eti, “Ndagala ndilebeleka ne bathu patjena, ndakadiya mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo ne mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, kunokubungana Bajuta bose. Andina tjandakaleba muzwikohwa.
Ini ngono mundibhuzwa? Bhuzwani bathu bakandihwa. Mubabhuzwe tjandakababudza, banoziba tjandakaleba.”
Jesu kati eleba eijalo mmwe we balindi bakabe bali ipapo kanloba mu lushaya kati, “Unodabila Ntungamili we Bapirisiti tjini kene!”
Jesu kanshandula eti, “Ha ndaleba tjimwe tjakabipa, undilakidze itjo. Koga ha ndilebesa muna tjandaleba, unondilobelani?”
Ipapo Anasi kapitshila Jesu akasungwa kuna Kaifasi Ntungamili we Bapirisiti.
Simoni Pita kati atjimile ipapo edziya moto, bamwe bakambhuzwa bakati, “Apa ate uli mmwe we badiyiwa babe kene?”
Pita kazwilandula kati, “Ate ndili mmwe wabo.”
Mmwe we balanda be Ntungamili we Bapirisiti, wakabe ali gamu* le nlume wakabe athubugwa zebe ndi Pita, kabhuzwa kati, “Apa andizokubona unaye mu nnda kene?”
Kakale Pita kalandula eti, “Aa, ndodwa!” Tjinyolotjo gukurume likalila.

Kwakati ku tjimangwanana bakadusa Jesu mu ng'umba ya Kaifasi bakan'yisa ku ng'umba hwulu ye nlauli we Nroma. Ngono Bajuta bakasingine mu ng'umba ye nlauli, ngobe bakabe beshaka kuti batubule kuja zojiwa zwe Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi bakatjenapala, nge mpanga we Tjijuta.
Ndizo Pilato kabhuda kayenda kubali kababhuzwa kati, “Mukati nlandu uwe ini?”
Bakan'dabila beti, “Tobe tisanlonga mu maboko enyu, ha abe asina bubi gwaathama.”
Pilato kabadwa kati, “Muntole munonsumikilisa nge nlayo wenyu.”
Bakan'dabila beti, “Iswi atina fanilo ye kubulaya nthu.”
Oku kwakashingikala kuti ndizo kuzhadzisike matama a Jesu aakaleba ngekwe lufu gugwe.
Pilato kabgwilila mu ng'umba kadana Jesu. Kambhuzwa kati, “Apa u She nkulu we Bajuta kene?”
Jesu kambhuzwabo kati, “Apa bhuzo iyeyi inodwa mukuli kene bamwe bakubudza nge kwangu?”
Pilato kan'dabila eti, “Imi ate ndili Njuta. Walongwa mu maboko angu nge bathu ba kanyi kuko ne Bapirisiti babo bakulu. Watjinyani?”
Jesu kati, “Bushe gwangu ate guli gwe shango ino, ha bushe gwangu gwabe guli gwe shango ino, balanda bangu banobe bagwa kudzibila Bajuta kundisunga. Aa, bushe gwangu ate guli gwaipapano!”
Ndizo Pilato kati kunli, “Ndizo u she nkulu kene?”
Jesu kan'dabila eti, “Ndiwe unoti ndi she nkulu. Imi ndakazwagwa azha mu shango ino, ndizhila kuwotendeka ngekwe malebeswa. Iye umu malebeswa unondihwilila.”
Pilato kabhuzwa kati, “Malebeswa ini?”
Pilato kati ajalo kabhudila kuzhe kakale ku Bajuta kabadwa kati, “Anditobona tjamunonsekesela.
Koga nge kuyendidzana nge mpanga wenyu, ndagala ndimusunungulila nsungwa nng'ompela mu nsi we Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi. Moshaka kuti ndimusunungulile She nkulu we Bajuta kene?”
Bakan'dabila bemimila beti, “Kusi iwoyu nlume! Koga toshaka Bharabhasi!” Bharabhasi wakabe ali tjigebeng'a.
Ipapo Pilato katola Jesu kati ngaalobgwe.
Babhayani bakaluka tjiala* tje mihwa bakaambadza itjo mu nsholo, bakaambadza hazu ye mbala nshaba wakabondelela;
ngono bakayenda kunli bakati, “Dumilani, She nkulu we Bajuta,” bakampkhwaula mu lushaya.
Pilato kabhudila kuzhe kakale kati ku Bajuta, “Bonani, ndon'dusila kuzhe kumuli kumuzibisa kuti imi anditobona tjimwe tjandingantilika nlandu nditjo.”
Ndizo Jesu kabhudila kuzhe, akaambala tjiala tje mihwa ne hazu ye bushaba gwakabondelela. Pilato kati kubali, “Woyu nthu wenyu!”
Bapirisiti bakulu ne balindi be Ng'umba ye Ndzimu bakati bembona, bakamimila beti, “Mumbambule! Mumbambule!”
Pilato kati kubali, “Muntole imwi mumbambule. Imi anditobona tjimwe tjandingantilika nlandu nditjo.”
Mbunga we Bajuta ukanshandula uti, “Iswi tina nlayo unoti wakafanila kuti afe, ngobe kati Nkololo we Ndzimu.”
Pilato kati ehwa ikoku katja kwazo,
kabgwilila mu ng'umba ye nlauli kabhuzwa Jesu kati, “Unodwa ngayi?”
Koga Jesu kasindabile.
Pilato kati kunli, “Apa autoda kulebeleka nami kene? Autoziba kuti ndina simba le kukusunugula kose ne simba le kukubambula kene?”
Jesu kashandula eti, “Iwe ungabe usina simba mundili, apa wabe usakalipiwa lidwa kudzimu. Ndizo iye wandizhisa kukuli una tjibi tjikulu kupindisa.”

Pilato kati ehwa ikoku, kagwisa kuwana zila yaangasunungula Jesu ndiyo. Koga Bajuta bakamimila beti “Ha unsungunula, unowobe usi nzwalani wa Kaisara! Mmwe ne mmwe unozwithama she nkulu, unonyanyayidza Kaisara!”
Pilato kati ehwa matama iyawa, kadusila Jesu kuzhe, kagala mu tjigalo tje nsumikilisi mu bugalo gunodang'wa kuyi, “Budzilo gwe Mabgwe.” Mu Tjihebheru goyi “Gabhata.”
Kwakabe kuli masikati makulu kululwamisigwa Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi. Pilato kati ku Bajuta, “Woyu She nkulu wenyu!”
Bakamimila beti, “Kutjena naye, kutjena naye mumbambule!”
Pilato kababhuzwa eti, “Apa moshaka kuti ndibambule she nkulu wenyu kene?”
Bapirisiti bakulu bakan'dabila beti, “Atina mmwe she nkulu kuzhe kwa Kaisara!”
Ndizo Pilato kabapa Jesu kuti anobambugwa.
Bakatola Jesu bakayenda naye.
Wakabhuda akasenga tjileyanyo tjitje, kayenda kanoti ku bugalo gunoyi “Ipepe tje Nsholo.” Mu Tjihebheru godang'wa “Gologota.”
Ndiko kwabakanombambulilako ne bamwe balume babili, mmwe ku luboko gwe luji, mmwe kuna gwe lumeshwe, Jesu iye ali pakati kwabo.
Pilato kakwala zibiso kainamatidza mu tjileyanyo tja Jesu. Matama ayo akabe ebalika sa oku, “JESU WE NAZARETA, SHE NKULU WE BAJUTA.”
Bathu banjinji bakaibala, ngobe pathu ipapo pakabambuligwa Jesu pakabe pali pejo ne nzi nkulu. Zibiso iyeyi yakabe yakakwagwa nge lulimi gwe Tjihebheru ne gwe Tjilatini ne gwe Tjigiriki.
Bapirisiti bakulu ne Bajuta bakati kuna Pilato, “Usikwale uti ‘SHE NKULU WE BAJUTA’ kwala uti, ‘Iwoyu nlume kati, Imi ndi she nkulu we Bajuta.’ ”
Pilato wakabadabila eti, “Tjandakwala ndakwala.”

Babhayani bakati babambula Jesu, bakatola zwiambalo zwizwe bakazwikobana nge bunna gwabo, mmwe ne mmwe wabo katola tjing'ompela. Bakatola ne hempe iye, yakabe ili jila ling'ompela lakalukiwa lisina nthumo.
Bakalangana beti, “Tisiipalule, ngatikandileni tibone kuti inowobe ya ani.” Ikoku kwakashingikala kuti matama e Hwalo dze Ndzimu asiwile pasi anoti,
“Bakakobana zwiambalo zwangu
hempe yangu bakailobela hakata.”
Izwezwi ndizo zwakathamwa nge babhayani.
Mme ba Jesu bakabe bali mile pejo ne tjileyanyo tjitje bana mannini babe Mariya, nkadzi wa Kileopasi, na Mariya we Magadala.
Jesu kabona mmeyabe ne n'diyiwa waakabe eda bali mile ipapo, ngono kati kuna mmeyabe, “Nkadzi nkulu, nkololo wenyu hwoyo.”
Kati ku n'diyiwa iwoyu, “Abo mmeyabo.” Kudwila mu tjibaka itjetjo n'diyiwa iwoyo katola Mariya kanogala naye ku nzi uwe.
Jesu kaziba kuti ngwenu kose kwawila, koga kuti matama e Hwalo dze Ndzimu asiwile pasi kati, “Ndina nyota.”
Kwakabe kuna ndilo izhele nkumbi unobaba, ngono bakadubika lungudze muuli, bakagupomba mu lushanga gwe nti unoyi hosapu,* bakayisa ku nlomo uwe.
Jesu kang'wa ngono kalebeleka kati, “Kwapela!”
Kakotamisa nsholo uwe ngono meya ikathubukana nge nyama.

Bajuta bakakumbila Pilato kuti makumbo e balume babambugwa avung'we ne mibili yabo idelusiwe mu zwileyanyo. Bakakumbila beijalo, ngobe kwakabe kuli zhuba le kuzwilulwamisa, basingashake kuti mibili iyeyi ibe ili mu zwileyanyo mu nsi we Sabata.
Ndizo babhayani bakayenda bakanovuna makumbo e nlume we kutanga kudwapo bakavuna e mmwe wakabe abambugwabo na Jesu.
Bakati bezha pana Jesu, bakabona kuti wafa kale, ngono bakasivune makumbo awe.
Mmwe we babhayani, kabhaya Jesu nge thumo mu lubadu, ngono kukatebuka malopa ne vula.
Nlume wakabona ikoku kushingikala wakapa butendeki nge kwako, kuti namwibo mugalemoyo. Butendeki gugwe malebeswa, na iye unoziba kuti unoleba malebeswa.
Oku kwakashingikala kuti matama e Hwalo dze Ndzimu asiwile pasi, anoti, “Akuna fupa lile linowovung'wa.”
Gumwe lukwalo goti, “Banowolinga kunli iye wabakabhaya.”

Shule kwa ikoku, Josefa we Arimateya, kayenda kanokumbila Pilato kuti ampe itumbu tja Jesu. Josefa wakabe ali n'diyiwa wa Jesu wakabe asingazwilakidze, ngobe akabe etja Bajuta. Pilato kan'dumila kuti atole itumbu tja Jesu, ngono kayenda kanotjitola.
Nikodemo, iye wakatongo yenda kunobona Jesu busiku, kayenda na Josefa akasenga mafuta e motsha unodang'wa kuyi mira* unolizana kilogiramu dzili makumi matatu ana thatu, wakashanganyiwa ne gonde.*
Bakatola itumbu tja Jesu bakatjipetela nge jila betjizhodza mafuta e motsha kuyendidzana nge mpanga we Bajuta we kubiganya.
Kwakabe kuna nnda ipapo pakabambuligwa Jesu, ngono muuli kwakabe kuna ikumbu tjitshwa tjisakatongo biganyiwa nthu.
Sekwa kabe kuwomuka kuli Sabata, kakale ikumbu na itjo tjili pejo, bakambiganya mutjili.
Kukati mu zhuba lekutanga le tshipi, Mariya we Magadala kabindukila ku ikumbu tja Jesu, kwakabe kutji zhalima, ngono kawana shongwe yakadusiwa pa nkoba.
Kalabuka kayenda kuna Simoni Pita ne mmwe n'diyiwa wakabe ediwa ndi Jesu, kabadwa kati, “Badusa She mu ikumbu, atitoziba kwabanombiga!”
Pita na iwoyo mmwe n'diyiwa bakayendabo ku ikumbu tja Jesu.
Bakalabuka, koga iwoyo mmwe n'diyiwa kasiya Pita kanontangila ku ikumbu.
Kakotama kashozhela ngono kabona matyila woga, koga kasingine.
Simoni Pita kawoswika shule kukwe, ngono iye kangina mu ikumbu. Kabona matyila akabe akapetela nfi ali ipapo,
ne tukwi yakabe yakapombedziwa mu nsholo wa Jesu isi pathu pang'ompela ne matyila akabe akapetela nfi. Yakabe itjakapetiwa ili poga.
Iwoyo mmwe n'diyiwa, wakabe aswika pa ikumbu kutanga, kanginabo mukati, kabona ngono kaduma.
Bakabe basathu bakahwisisa tjinolebgwa nge Hwalo dze Ndzimu dziti, wakafanila kumuka mu bafi.
Badiyiwa bakabgwilila kanyi.
Koga Mariya kama kuzhe kwe ikumbu kalila. Kati elila, kakotama kashozhela mu ikumbu,
kabona batumwa be kudzimu babili bakaambala zwiambalo zwitjena, bali gele pakabe pakaladzikwa itumbu tja Jesu, mmwe ali ku misholo mmwe ali ku makumbo.
Bakambhuzwa beti, “Nkadzi, unolilani kene?”
Kabadabila kati, “Batola She wangu, anditoziba kwabambigako!”
Wakati adwa paleba eijalo katendebuka ngono kabona Jesu ali mile ipapo, koga kasizibe kuti ndi Jesu.
Jesu kambhuzwa kati, “Nkadzi, unolilani? Unoshaka ani?”
Mariya kazwidwa kati pamwe ntjengeti we nnda, ngono kati kunli, “Tate bangu, ha muli imwi mantola, mundibudze kwamambiga kuti ndiyende ndinontola.”
Jesu kati, “Mariya!”
Ipapo Mariya katendebuka kati nge Tjihebheru, “Rabhoni!” Ikoku kodwa kuti “N'diyi.”
Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Usindibhate, ngobe andithu atathila kuna Tate. Koga yenda ku zwikamu* zwangu uzwibudze kuti ndotathila kuna Tate, ibo Tate benyu kakale bali Ndzimu wangu ne Ndzimu wenyu.”
Mariya we Magadala kayenda kanobudza badiyiwa kuti wabona She, ndizo kababikila tjaadwiwa ndi She.
Kukati madekwana e zhuba lekutanga le tshipi, badiyiwa bakakubungana bakazwizhalilila mu ng'umba, ngobe bakabe betja Bajuta. Jesu kazha kama pakati kwabo kati kubali, “Kunyalala ngakube namwi.”
Kati ajalo, kabalakidza zwiazha zwizwe ne lubadu gugwe. Badiyiwa babe bakashatha kwazo ipapo bebona She.
Jesu kapapha kati kubali, “Kunyalala ngakube namwi. Koga sekwa Tate bakandituma, nami ndomutumabo.”
Kati aleba eijalo kafemela mubali kati, “Amutjilani Meya yakayengemala.
Ha muzwiibhatigwa bathu matjinyo abo, anozwiibhatigwa, koga ha musingabazwiibhatigwe iwo, aatozwiibhatigwa.”
Mmwe we badiyiwa bali gumi lina babili unoyi Tomasi unodang'wa Bili, wakabe asipo ipapo Jesu eswika.
Bamwe badiyiwa bakambudza beti, “Tabona She!”
Tomasi kabashandula eti, “Kudzina ndibona mabanga e zwipikiri mu zwiazha zwizwe ne kulonga tjinyala tjangu mu mabanga e zwipikiri nenge kulonga tjiazha tjangu mu lubadu gugwe, andingadume.”
Shule kwe tshipi ing'ompela, badiyiwa bakashangana kakale mu ng'umba na Tomasi ali yapobo. Nenguba mikoba yakabe yakazhaligwa, Jesu wakazha kama pakati kwabo kati kubali, “Kunyalala ngakube namwi.”
Ipapo kati kuna Tomasi, “Longa tjinyala tjitjo apapa, ulinge zwiazha zwangu, ubuye ulonge tjiazha tjitjo mu lubadu gwangu. Letja kududumwa ugalemoyo!”
Tomasi kanshandula eti, “She wangu! Ndzimu wangu!”
Jesu kati kunli, “Unogalamoyo, ngobe wandibona. Bakakombolegwa ibo banoti basabona ngono bakagalamoyo.”
Jesu wakashinga zwimwe zwilakidzo zwinjinji mbeli kwe badiyiwa babe zwisakakwagwa mu lukwalo igogu.
Koga izwezwi zwakakwaligwa kuti mugalemoyo kuti Jesu ndiye Mesiya, Nkololo we Ndzimu ne nge kuti nge kugalamoyo mube ne butjilo nge zina lile.
Shule kwa ikoku, Jesu kazwilakidza ku badiyiwa babe kakale pa gungwa gwe Tibheriyasi. Wakazwilakidza sa hwoku:
Kwakabe kuli, Simoni Pita wakabe ana Tomasi unodang'wa Bili na Natanaele unodwa ku nzi we Kana mu ntuthu we Galili ne bakololo ba Zebhedi ne bamwe badiyiwa ba Jesu babili; bose bakabe bali yapo.
Simoni Pita kabadwa kati, “Ndonobhata hwobe.”
Bakan'dabila beti, “Naswi toyendabo nawe.” Bakamilika bakayenda bali mu n'goro, ngono bakashaya tjababhata busiku igogo.
Kukati mangwanana, Jesu kama pa phili, koga badiyiwa bakasizibe kuti ndiye.
Kababhuzwa kati, “Bana, apa muna hwobe kene?”
Bakan'dabila beti, “Aa, atina.”
Kabadwa kati, “Poselani gwanga tjeku luji gwe n'goro, mowobhata dzimwe.” Bakaposela gwanga ngono bakakong'wa kugukwebela mu n'goro, ngobe babhata hwobe njinji.
N'diyiwa wakabe ediwa ndi Jesu kati kuna Pita, “Ndi She!” Simoni Pita kati ehwa kuti ndi She kazwipomba nge hazu iye, ngobe wakabe ambula zwiambalo zwizwe, kabe etjulukila mu vula.
Badiyiwa bamwe bakantobela ku phili bali mu n'goro, bekweba gwanga guli zhele hwobe. Bakabe basi kule kwazo ne phili, kwakabe kungabe zana le mitha.
Bakati beswika pa phili, bakabona moto ipapo, kwakagotjiwa hwobe ne tjiwunga muuli.
Jesu kati kubali, “Zhisani dzimwe hwobe dzamabhata ngwenu.”

Simoni Pita kangina mu n'goro kakwebela gwanga mu phili guli zhele hwobe hwulu. Dzose dzakabe dzili zana lina makumi mashanu ana thatu (153). Nenguba dzakabe dzili bunjinji kungapo, adzizopalula gwanga.
Jesu kati kubali, “Izhani muje!” Akuna wabo wakabe nge tjilopa kumbhuzwa kuti, “Ndiwe ani?” ngobe bakabe baziba kuti ndi She.
Jesu kazha katola tjiwunga, kabapa itjo, kabapa ne hwobe.
Oku kwakabe kuli gwe butatu Jesu ezwilakidza ku badiyiwa babe shule kwe kumusiwa kukwe mu bafi.
Kukati bapedza kuja, Jesu kati kuna Simoni Pita, “Simoni nkololo wa Johani, apa unondida kupinda ibaba kene?”
Pita kan'dabila eti, “Ee, She, moziba kuti ndomuda.”
Jesu kati kunli, “Fudza pkhwizana dzangu.”
Jesu kati gwe bubili kuna Simoni, “Simoni, Nkololo wa Johani, apa unondida kene?”
Simoni kadabila eti, “Ee, She, moziba kuti ndomuda.”
Jesu kati kunli “Lisa pkhwizi dzangu.”
Jesu kati gwe butatu, “Simoni nkololo wa Johani, apa unondida kene?”
Pita kahwa zogwadza, ngobe Jesu embhuzwa gwe butatu eti, “Apa unondida kene?” Kanshandula eti, “She, moziba tjimwe ne tjimwe. Moziba kuti ndomuda!”
Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Fudza pkhwizi dzangu.

Ndolebesa tjose nditi, wakati uli ntjetjana wakabe uzwiambadza ukamilika ukayenda kumwe ne kumwe kwaunoda, koga ha wakwegula, unowotambunudza maboko awo ukaambadziwa nge mmwe kabuya kakuyisa kwausingade.”
Jesu wakaleba matama iyawa elakidza kuti Pita unowofa lufu gwakatini kukudza Ndzimu. Ipapo Jesu kan'dwa kati, “Unditobele!”
Pita katjebuka shule, ngono kabona n'diyiwa wakabe ediwa ndi Jesu akabatobela; n'diyiwa iwoyo ndiye wakabe akanayila Jesu pa tjilayilo ekowombhuzwa eti, “She, ndiani unowomuwonga kene?”
Pita kati embona, kabhuzwa Jesu eti, “She, oyu iye kee?”
Jesu kan'dabila eti, “Ha ndida kuti atjile kudzina ndibuya, uneni nako? Unditobele!”
Kudwa ipapo kukaandama makwayi mu badiyiwa ekuti n'diyiwa iwoyo aatowofa. Koga Jesu wakabe asati, “Aatowofa.” Wakabe ati, “Ha ndida kuti atjile kudzina ndibuya, uneni nako?”
N'diyiwa iwoyo ndiye unotendeka ngekwe zwithu izwezwi kakale ndiye wakazwikwala, ngono toziba kuti butendeki gugwe gu malebeswa.
Kuna zwithu zwimwebo zwinjinji zwakashingiwa ndi Jesu. Ha tjimwe ne tjimwe tjazo tjakabe tjakwagwa, ndoduma kuti shango yose yabe isingawotubula kuwanila magalo hwalo dzazwakakwagwa mudzili.
Mu lukwalo gwangu gwe kutanga, Teofilo, ndakakwala ngekwe zwithu zose Jesu zwaakatangisa kuthama kakale kazwidiya,
kuswikila zhuba laakatolegwa pezhugwi kudzimu, asinopa batumwa baakabe ashalula ndayo nge Meya yakayengemala.

Shule kwe kudziyila kukwe wakazwilakidza ku balume ibabo ne butendeki* bunjinji gwe kuti unotjila. Wakabazwilakidza mu tjibaka mazhuba ali makumi manna, ngono kalebeleka nabo ngekwe bushe* gwe Ndzimu.
Ngono wakati anabo, kabadwa kati basibhude mu Jerusalema, koga balindile tjabakagadziwabgwe ndi Tate, sekwa akaleba eti, “Makahwa ndimi,
ngoti Johani wakabe edubika nge vula, koga mu mazhuba mashomanana anozha imwi mowodubikwa nge Meya yakayengemala.”
Ndizo batumwa* bakati bakubungana, bakabhuzwa Jesu bakati, “She, apa mowobgwiliza bushe mu Iziraela mu tjibaka itjetji kene?”
Jesu kati kubali, “Akute kuli kwenyu kuziba misi ne zwibaka zwakabigwa ndi Tate nge simba labo.
Koga moamutjila simba ha Meya yakayengemala izha mumuli, ngono mowobe batendeki bangu mu Jerusalema ne mu Judiya yose ne Samariya ne ku phelelo dze shango.”
Shule kwe kuleba ikoku, wakatolegwa pezhugwi kudzimu bakanlinga, ngono gole likan'dusa mu mesho abo.
Bakati batjakalingisisa pezhugwi ha iye eyenda, tjinyolotjo balume babili bakaambala butjena bakama pabali
bakabe beti, “Balume be Galili mumilileni ipapo makalinga pezhugwi? Jesu iwoyu, watogwa mumuli eyisiwa kudzimu, unowobuya nge zila iyo zwayo yamabona eyenda ku Ndzimu ndiyo.”
Ipapo batumwa bakabgwilila ku Jerusalema bedwa ku Dombo le Mitoba, lipejo ne Jerusalema kungabe gwendo gwe Sabata

Bakaswika bakatathila pezhugwi ku ng'umba yabakabe begala. Kwakabe kuli Pita, na Johani, na Jakubo na Enduru, na Filipo na Tomasi, na Bhatolomeo na Matewu, na Jakubo nkololo wa Alifeo, na Simoni Nzeloti
Bose ibaba bakazwimisila kutembezela bali moyo nng'ompela, kose ne bakadzi babakabe banabo na Mariya mme ba Jesu ne banung'una babe.
Mu mazhuba iyawo Pita kamilika kama pakati kwe bagalimoyo (bakabe bali mbunga unolizana zana lina bali makumi mabili 120)
kabe eti, “Zwikamu zwangu, matama e hwalo* dze Ndzimu akalebgwa nge Meya yakayengemala nge nlomo wa Dafite ngekwa Judasi iye wakabe ali ntungamili wa ibabo bakasunga Jesu akafanila kushingikala.
Judasi wakabe ali mmwe wedu, ngobe wakabe ashalugwa kube ne gobe mu nshingo iwoyu.
Ngono ngwenu Judasi wakatenga shango nge mari iyawa aakawana nge nshingo uwe wakabipa, iko kwaakawila nge nsholo mu kufa kukwe kaphutukana mabula awe wose kabhudila pazhe.
Bathu bose banogala mu Jerusalema bakahwa nge kwako, ndizo nge lulimi gwabo bakadana shango iyeyo Akelidama, kunodwa kuti, ‘Shango ye Malopa.’
“Ngobe kwakakwagwa mu lukwalo gwe Njimbo kuyi,
‘Ng'umba iye ngaibe dongo;
kushete ne unogala muili.’ Kwakakwagwa kakale kuyi,
‘Mmwe ngaatole mamo awe mu nshingo.’
“Ndizo kusheteka kushalula mmwe we balume bakabe banaswi mu tjibaka tjose She Jesu betjila naswi,
kudwa mu tjibaka tjekudubika kwa Johani kuswikila zhuba Jesu laakatolegwa pezhugwi kudzimu edwa mutili, iwoyo wakafanila abe mmwe wedu ali ntendeki we kumuka kwa She Jesu.”
Ndizo bakashalula balume babili, Josefa iye wakabe edang'wa Bhasabhasi, kakale edang'wa Jusito, na Matiyasi.
Ipapo bakatembezela beti, “She, imwi moziba moyo we mmwe ne mmwe, ndizo mutilakidze kuti ndi upi wa ibaba babili wamashalula
kutola nshingo iwoyu we butumwa wakasiyiwa ndi Judasi eyenda kwaakafanila.”
Ipapo bakakandila kubona nshalugwa pakati kwe balume ibabo babili, ngono kukawila Matiyasi, ndizo kapapha bali gumi lina nng'ompela.
Kwakati zhuba le Pentekosite* lazha, bose bakabe bakakubungana pathu pang'ompela.
Tjinyolotjo, nsindo unonga kuhwuhwudza kwe phepo ina masimba ukazha udwa kudzimu, ukazhala ng'umba yose yabakabe bali muili.
Bakabona kunofanana ne ndimi dzinonga nthuto we moto dzakapalalana, ngono dzikazha dzikagala pezhugwi kwe mmwe ne mmwe wabo.
Bose bakazhala Meya yakayengemala, ngono bakatangisa kulebeleka nge ndimi dzipoga sekwa bakapiwa nge Meya.
Mu Jerusalema kwakabe kugala Bajuta, balume banotja Ndzimu, banodwa mu njudzi dzose dze shango.
Bakati behwa nsindo iwoyu, mbunga nkulu ukakubungana nge gaabadzo, ngobe mmwe ne mmwe wabo wakabahwa belebeleka nge lulimi gugwe.
Ngono bakakaabala kwazo, bakabhuzwa beti, “Apa bathu bose ibaba banolebeleka ate Bagalili kene?
Ini ngono mmwe ne mmwe wedu ehwa mmwe ne mmwe wabo ebelebeleka nge lulimi gugwe?
Iswi todwa ku Patiya ne ku Mediya ne ku Elamu ne ku Mesopotamiya ne ku Judiya ne ku Kapadokiya ne ku Ponto ne ku Ezhiya
ne ku Firigiya ne ku Pamufiliya ne ku Egipiti ne mituthu imu Libhiya pejo ne Sirene, ne bezi banodwa ku Roma,
Bajuta kose ne bakabe beshanduligwa mu bugalimoyo gwe Tjijuta ne ku Kirete ne ku Arabhiya tobahwa beleba makaabadzo e Ndzimu nge ndimi dzedu!”
Bakakaabala basingahwisise, ngono bakabhuzwana beti, “Ikoku kodwani?”
Koga bamwe bakabadadila beti, “Bakalaladza.”

Koga Pita kamilika ne bali gumi lina nng'ompela, kamilidza hwi lile, ngono kalebeleka ne mbunga eti, “Bathu be Judiya, namwi mose bamu Jerusalema, imani ndimutjenesele ikoku; hwililani nge njele tjandinoleba.
Bathu ibaba abazolaladza sekwa munokumbula. Kutji tjibaka tje zhanalume mangwanana.
Koga etji nditjo tjakalebgwa nge nlebesambeli Jowele eti,
‘Ndzimu ukati: Kowoti mu mazhuba e bupelo
ndowodila Meya yangu mu bathu bose.
Bakololo ne bakololokadzi benyu banowolebela mbeli
bazhuzha benyu banowobona mbono
ne bathuntana benyu banowowolota.
Kose ne mu balandalume bangu ne mu balandakadzi bangu
ndowodila Meya yangu mu mazhuba iyawo,
ngono banowolebela mbeli.
Ngono ndowothama matjenamiso pezhugwi kudzimu
ne zwilakidzo mu shango, pasi,
kowobe ne malopa ne moto nenge bhulubusi.
Zhuba lowotemapala kukabe zhalima
ngono mwedzi ukashandugwa ukashabapala se malopa
mbeli kwe kuzha kwe zhuba gulu la She.
Ngono kowoshingikala kuti iye unodana
zina la She mu tjibaka itjetjo atjidziwe.’

“Bathu be Iziraela, hwililani hwoku, Jesu we Nazareta nthu wamakalakidziwa nge Ndzimu nge matjenamiso makaabadzo nenge matjenamiso ne zwilakidzo, Ndzimu zwawakathama pakati kwenyu ndiye, sekwa munoziba imwi.
Jesu iwoyu makampiwa nge ndongoloso yakabigwa ye Ndzimu nenge kuziba zwimbeli kwawo; koga imwi makashingisa bathu babi kumbulaya nge kumbambula.
Koga Ndzimu wakammusa; unsunungula mu zogwadza zwe lufu, ngobe kwakabe kusingatubuke kuti lufu gumbhatile tjose.
Dafite wakati nge kukwe,
‘Ndobona She misi yose mbeli kwangu.
Se bali ku luboko gwangu gwe luji, akuna tjingandizunguza.
Ndizo moyo wangu unoshatha
ne lulimi gwangu goshatha
ne mbili wangubo unowotjilila mu kugalabgwe,
ngobe amutowondisiya mu ikumbu
naiko amungaletjedzele N'yengemali wenyu kubola.
Makandilakidza zila ye butjilo,
mowondishathisa nge kubepo kwenyu!’
“Zwikamu, ndomubudza nge malebeswa kuti batategulu Dafite bakafa bakabiganyiwa, ngono ikumbu tjabo tjiyapo na nasi.
Bakabe bali nlebesambeli ngono bakaziba kuti Ndzimu wakabagadzabgwe nge kutuna* kuti unowobiga mmwe we bana babo mu tjigalo tjabo tje bushe.
Bakabona zwimbeli ndizo bakaleba ngekwe kumuka kwe Mesiya kuti,
‘Aazosiyiwa mu ikumbu
ne mbili uwe auzobola.’
Ndzimu wakamusa Jesu ihwoyu, ngono iswi tose ti batendeki bekuti ikoku kwakayitikala.
Kati amilidzigwa ku luboko gwe luji* Ndzimu, aamutjila Meya yakayengemala se kugadzabgwe kwa Tate, ndizo watebulila mutili itjetji tjamunobona ne tjamunohwa.
Ngobe Dafite aazotathila kudzimu, koga iye kati,
‘She bakati kuna She wangu:
Gala ku luboko gwangu gwe luji
kudzina ndithama zwita zwizo tjigalo tje makumbo awo.’
“Ndizo bose be ng'umba ye Iziraela ngabazibe nge malebeswa kuti Ndzimu wakathama Jesu iwoyu wamakabambula kube She ne kube Mesiya!”
Kukati bathu behwa ikoku, bakadziyidzika, ngono bakati kuna Pita ne batumwa bamwe, “Zwikamu, tishingeni ngono?”
Pita kashandula eti, “Shandukilani matjinyo enyu mudubikiwe, mmwe ne mmwe wenyu nge zina la Jesu Kirisiti* kuti ndizo matjinyo enyu muazwiibhatigwe. Ngono mowoamutjila tjipo tje Meya yakayengemala.
Kugadziwabgwe nge kwenyu ne bana benyu na bose bakule kule, mmwe ne mmwe She Ndzimu wedu waunowodana.”
Ngono katendeka nge matama mamwe manjinji kabakulumbidza eti, “Muzwitjidze mu tjizekugwana itjetji tjakabipa.”
Ibabo bakaamutjila ndebo iye bakadubikiwa, ngono ilelo zhuba bakapaphidziwa nge bathu bali zwiwulu zwitatu (3,000).
Bakamusila meya zwidiyo zwe batumwa ba Jesu nenge kushangana nenge kupemula tjiwunga nenge mitembezelo.
Mmwe ne mmwe kazhigwa ngotja, ngono makaabadzo manji ne zwilakidzo zwinotjenamisa zwinji zwakathamiwa nge batumwa ba Jesu.
Bagalimoyo bose bakabe bali tjithu tjing'ompela, bakashanganyila tjimwe ne tjimwe.
Bakatengesa zwithu zwabo, kose ne thundu dzabo, ngono bakapa mmwe ne mmwe kuyendidzana nge kushaya kukwe.
Bakadwilila mazhuba wose beshangana mu Ng'umba* ye Ndzimu. Bakabe bepemula tjiwunga mu mizi yabo beja bose nge moyo yakashatha nenge moyo mitjena,
bekudza Ndzimu kakale beamutjigwa zubuyanana nge bathu bose. Ngono She bakapapha zhuba ne zhuba ibabo bakabe betjidziwa.
Kukati limwe zhuba Pita na Johani bakatathila ku Ng'umba ye Ndzimu nge tjibaka tje butatu mu matewuko, nge tjibaka tje mitembezelo.
Pa nkoba wakabe udang'wa Nkoba Mbuya, kwakabe kuna nlume wakazwagwa ali tjilema. Zhuba limwe ne limwe wakabe esengegwa pa nkoba iwoyo kukumbila mu bathu bakabe bengina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu.
Kati ebona Pita na Johani bengina mukati, kabakumbila kuti bampe tjimwe.
Pita na Johani bakanlingisisa, ngono Pita kati kunli, “Utilinge!”
Ndizo kabalinga, egalabgwe kuti unowowana tjimwe mubali.
Koga Pita kati kunli, “Andina siliva kene golide, koga ndokupa tjandinatjo: Nge zina la Jesu Kirisiti we Nazareta ndokudwa nditi, milika uyende.”
Ipapo kambhata nge luboko gugwe gwe luji kammilidza. Tjinyolotjo makumbo ne zwingoringori zwe nlume iwoyo zwikasima.
Katjulukila pezhugwi, kama nge makumbo, ngono katangisa kuyenda. Ipapo kangina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu nabo, eyenda etjuluka ekudza Ndzimu.
Bathu bose bakambona eyenda ekudza Ndzimu,
ngono bakanziba ali nkumbili wabe egala pa Nkoba Mbuya we Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, bakatjenama bose bakakaabalila tjanshingikalila.
Kukati bathu bebona nlume iwoyu akanamatilana na Pita na Johani mu Ntutshi wa Solomoni, bathu bakakaabala, ngono bakalabukila kubali.

Pita kati ebona bathu bakaabala saikoku, kati kubali, “Bathu be Iziraela, ini mutjenamila ikoku? Ini makatilingisisa zwingapa tikanga tathama nge masimba edu kene nge ndulamo yedu kuti nlume iwoyu ayende?

Ndzimu wa Abhurahama, na Isaki na Jakubo, Ndzimu wa bobatategulu bedu wakakudza Nlanda wawo Jesu. Koga imwi makampa babusi kuti bambulaye, mukanzwilandula mbeli kwa Pilato, paakabe akabe akumbula kunsunungula.
Makanzwilandula N'yengemali ne nlulwami, ngono mu bumo gugwe makakumbila Pilato kumusunungulila mbulayi.
Makabulaya iye unopa butjilo, iye wakamusiwa nge Ndzimu mu bafi, ndizo iswi ti batendeki ba ikoku.
I simba lile lapa nlume iwoyu we tjilema kusima. Tjamunobona kakale mutjiziba tjishingwa nge kugalamoyo mu zina lile; hwugalamoyo muna Jesu kwampodza, sekwa munobona mose.
“Ndizo ngwenu zwikamu, ndoziba kuti tjamakathama kuna Jesu imwi ne batungamili benyu kwakabe kuyikhwa nge kusaziba.
Koga Ndzimu tjawakaleba nge balebesambeli* bose ntolo kuti Mesiya unowodziyila, wakathama kuti kuzhadzisike nge zila iyeyi.
Shandukani mubgwilile ku Ndzimu, ndizo matjinyo enyu abukushiwe, kuti ndizo umupe kunyaluluka mbeli kwa She,
nenge kuti utume Mesiya wamakashaluligwa, iye Jesu.
Wakafanila gala kudzimu kudzina nsi uzha we kuti zwithu zose zwibuzigwe mu mbumbiko yazo yakale sekwa kaleba Ndzimu nge balebesambeli bawo bakayengemala ba ntolo.
Mushe wakati, ‘She Ndzimu wenyu banowomuzhisila nlebesambeli, koga sekwa bakandizhisa, ngono unowodwa mu ludzi gwenyu. Muteedze tjimwe ne tjimwe tjaanowomubudza.
Mmwe ne mmwe usingahwe nlebesambeli iwoyu unowothubugwa muna bakanyi kwabo.’
Balebesambeli bose bakalebelambeli kudwa muna Samuele na ibabo bakazha shule kukwe bakalebelambelibo ngekwe mazhuba ano.
Mu bakololo be balebesambeli nebe tjidumano* Ndzimu tjawakathama na bobatategulu benyu, udwa Abhurahama uti, ‘Njudzi dzose dze shango dzowokombolegwa nge mbewu iyo.’
Ngono Ndzimu wakashalula Nlanda wawo ukantuma kumuli kutanga, kumukombolela nge kushandusa mmwe ne mmwe wenyu mu bubi.”
Pita na Johani bakati batjalebeleka ne bathu Bapirisiti ne nlauli we ng'umba ye Ndzimu ne Basadusi bakazha kubali.
Bakazha bakadzongeka ngoti batumwa bakabe bediya bathu beleba ngekwe kumusiwa kwe bafi ndi Jesu.
Bakabhata Pita na Johani, ngobe kwakabe kuli madekwana bakabalonga mu ng'umba ye busungwa kuswikila tjimuka.
Koga banjinji bakahwa dama bakagalamoyo, ngono palo ye balume yakakula ikalizana zwiwulu zwili zwishanu.
Tjimuka balauli babo ne batungamili ne Badiyi be nlayo* bakakubungana mu Jerusalema,
Anasi mpirisiti* nkulu na Kaifasi na Johani na Alekizanda na bose be ng'umba ye bupirisiti.
Bakati Pita na Johani bezhisiwa mbeli kwabo bakatangisa kubabhuzwa beti, “Makashinga ikoku nge simba lipi kene nge zina laani?”
Ipapo Pita, ali zhele Meya yakayengemala kati kubali, “Balauli ne bakulu* be bathu!
Ha ili kuti todang'wa nasi kuwodabilila nshingo mbuya wathamigwa tjilema ngono tibhuzwiwa kuti tjapodziwa tjini,

ndizo zibani hwoku mose imwi ne bathu bose be Iziraela, takashinga ikoku nge zina la Jesu Kirisiti we Nazareta iye wamakabambula, iye Ndzimu wawakamusa mu bafi, nge kukwe nlume iwoyu umile mbeli kwenyu apola kwakapelela.
Ndiye
‘Bgwe lamakalamba imwi babaki,
koga ndilo lakabe bgwe linotambunudza mbako.’
Jidzo ali towang'wa mu mmwe kakale, ngobe akuna limwe zina kakale mu shango lakapiwa bathu latingatjidziwa ndilo.”
Bakati bebona kube nge tjilopa kwa Pita na Johani, ngono beziba kuti abazodiyika, bathu koga, bakatjenama ndizo bakapedzisisa kuti bathu ibaba bakabe bana Jesu.
Koga ngobe bebona nlume wakabe apodziwa ali mile ipapo nabo, kwakabe kusina tjabangaleba benyanyayidza.
Koga bakabadwa bakati babhudile kuzhe kwe lubazhe, ngono bakalebeleka bali boga.
Bakabhuzwa beti, “Ini tjatinowoshinga nge balume ibaba kene? Mmwe ne mmwe mu Jerusalema unoziba kuti bashinga jenamiso gulu, ngono atingalandule ikoko.
Koga kumisa tjithu itjetji kuandama mu bathu, ngatitjemeleni balume ibaba kuti basitjayite wabanolebeleka naye nge zina ileli.”
Ipapo bakabakowomesedza kuti basibe batjabe belebeleka kene bediya nge zina la Jesu.
Koga Pita na Johani bakashandula beti, “Muzwithubukanyile imwi kuti apa kwakalulwama mu mesho e Ndzimu kuhwa imwi kene Ndzimu.
Ngobe atingatubule kuletja kulebeleka ngekwe tjatakabona ne tjatakahwa.”
Bakati basinobatjemela bakabaletja bakayenda. Abazoziba kuti bangabapa shamu tjini ngekwe bathu, ngobe bathu bose bakabe bekudza Ndzimu ngekwe tjakabe tjashingikala.
Nlume iwoyu wakapodziwa nge kunotjenamisa, wakabe ana makole anopinda makumi manna.
Bakati basinobe basunungugwa Pita na Johani bakabgwilila ku bakhwinya babo ngono bakababikila kose kwakabe kwalebgwa nge Bapirisiti bakulu ne bawola.
Bakati behwa ikoku, bakamilidzila mahwi abo bose ku Ndzimu betembezela beti, “She una masimba, imwi makathama kudzimu ne shango ne gungwa naizo zose zwimu magalo iyawa.
Makaleba nge Meya yakayengemala nge nlomo we nlanda wenyu, tate bedu Dafite muti,
‘Ini zwitjaba zwizhala bushongola,
ne bathu belanganila suli?
Boshe bakulu be shango bakazwilulwamisa,
ne balauli bakakubungana kumukila ne Ndzimu She ne Mesiya uwe.’
Nge malebeswa Herode na Pontiyo Pilato ne Bezwitjaba* ne bathu be Iziraela mu nzi iwoyu bakashangana kulangana ngekwe Nlanda wenyu wakayengemala Jesu iye wamakashalula.
Bakashinga tjakabe tjabigwa kale nge simba nenge kuda kwenyu kuti tjowoshingikala.
Ngwenu She, bonani kutjisa kwabo, ngono muyite kuti balanda benyu batubule kuleba dama lenyu nge kusimamoyo kukulu.
Tambunudzani luboko gwenyu kupodza ne kuthama zwilakidzo ne matjenamiso nge zina le nlanda wenyu wakayengemala iye Jesu.”
Shule kwe batembezela, pathu pabakabe bakakubunganilapo pakazunguzika. Ngono bose bakazhala Meya yakayengemala bakaleba dama le Ndzimu nge kusimamoyo.
Bagalimoyo bose bakabe bana moyo ng'ompela ne nkumbulo ng'ompela. Akuna wakabe eti tjithu tjaanatjo nge tjitje, koga bakabe bekobana tjimwe ne tjimwe tjabanatjo.
Ngono, nge simba gulu batumwa bakadwilila mbeli bepa butendeki ngekwe kumuka kwa She Jesu, ngono ngoni hwulu dzinodwa ku Ndzimu dzakabe dzili mubali.
Kwakabe kusina nshayi pakati kwabo. Ibabo bakabe bana minda kene ng'umba bakabe betengesa, bezhisa mari edwa mu kutengesa
beayisa ku batumwa, ngono ekokobanyiwa mmwe ne mmwe kulizana nge kusheta kukwe.
Josefa, wakabe ali Nlevi we Sipuro, iye batumwa wabakadana beti Bhanabhasi, kunodwa kuti “Nkololo we Gulumbidzo,”
wakatengesa nnda wakabe uli uwe, ngono kazhisa mari kaayisa ku batumwa.
Koga mmwe nlume wakabe edang'wa Ananiyasi ana nkadzi uwe Safira, bakatengesa imwe thundu yabo.
Ngono kasumbika mamwe mari adumana ne nkadzi uwe, mari asala kaayisa ku batumwa ba Jesu.
Koga Pita kambhuzwa eti, “Ananiyasi, ini Satani azhala moyo uwo kuti unyepele Meya yakayengemala usumbike mamwe mari awawana watengesa nnda?

Wakati usathu ukatengesiwa apa wakabe usi uwo kene? Ne usinokuwutengesa, apa mari akabe asi awo kuashingisa sekwa unobona kene? Ini wakumbula kuthama tjithu tjakajali? Auzonyepela bathu, koga wanyepela Ndzimu!”
Kukati Ananiyasi ehwa ikoku koga, kawila pasi kafa; ngono bose bakahwa nge kwako bakatja kwazo.
Bazhuzha bakamilika, bakapetela mbili uwe, bakansengela kuzhe, ngono bakambiganya.
Shule kwe awara dzingabe thatu nkadzi uwe kangina, asingazibe tjashingikala.
Pita kambhuzwa kati, “Undibudze, kuti kene makatengesa nnda nge themba iyeyi?”
Kadabila eti, “Ee, ndiyo themba.”
Ndizo Pita kati kunli, “Iwe ne nlume uwo ini makumbula kulika Meya ya She? Bona, makumbo e bathu banobiganya nlume uwo apa nkoba, ngono banowokusengabo!”
Ipapo kawila pasi pa makumbo a Pita kafa. Bazhuzha bakangina bakabona kuti wafa, ndizo bakansengela kuzhe bakanombiganya kubapa ne nlume uwe.
Gubungano lose ne bamwe bose bakahwa ngekwa ikoku bakatja.
Batumwa ba Jesu bakashinga zwilakidzo zwinjinji ne matjenamiso manjinji pakati kwe bathu. Bagalimoyo bose bakabe beshanganila pa ntutshi wa Solomoni.
Mu bamwe kwakabe kusina ndodwa ne nng'ompela wakabe ana tjilopa tje kuzwibhatshanya nabo nenguba bathu bakabe bebakudza kwazo.
Koga bagalimoyo muna She bakapaphidzika, mibunga ye balume ne bakadzi bakagalamoyo.
Bathu bakati bebona tjakabe tjishingikala bakasenga bagwele bakabaladzika mu malawo nemu dzithobo pa dzizila kuti ntutshi wa Pita uwile bamwe babo ha epinda ipapo.
Ngono mibunga ye bathu ikazha idwa mu mizi yakapoteleka Jerusalema, bezhisa ibabo bakabe begwala ne bakabe bana meya mibi; ngono bose bakapodziwa.
Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kamilika ne baakabe anabo bose, be bhiko le Basadusi,* bakabe ne fupa,
ndizo bakasunga batumwa ba Jesu, ngono bakabalonga mu ng'umba ye busungwa ye bathu bose.
Koga busiku igogo ntumwa wa She kazhula mikoba ye ng'umba ye busungwa, kabadusa, ngono kati kubali,
“Yendani munoma mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono mubudze bathu bose ngekwe matama e butjilo igogu butshwa.”
Batumwa ba Jesu bakati behwa ikoku bakangina mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu mangwanana bakatangisa kudiya.
Ntungamili we Bapirisiti ne baakabe anabo bakati beswika bakadana lubazhe ne Gulukota le Iziraela ngono bakatuma bathu kuti banotola batumwa ba Jesu mu ng'umba ye busungwa babazhise mbeli kwabo.
Koga bashingi bakati beswika, bakasiwane batumwa mu ng'umba ye busungwa, ndizo bakabgwilila bakanobika beti,
“Tawana ng'umba ye busungwa yakakhiyiwa ne balindi bose bakalinda pa mikoba; koga tikati tizhula mikoba tikasheta watawana mukati!”
Nlauli we balindi be Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ne Bapirisiti bakulu bakati behwa ikoku, bakatjenamila kuti kwashingikalani ku batumwa ba Jesu.
Ipapo mmwe kangina kati kubali, “Hwililani! Balume bamakalonga mu ng'umba ye busungwa bamu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu banodiya bathu!”
Ndizo nlauli kayenda ne adzasha dzidze kanotola batumwa. Abazoshingisa simba, ngobe betja kikithidziwa nge bathu nge mabgwe.
Bakazhisa batumwa ba Jesu, bakathama kuti bame mbeli kwe Makulukota, ngono Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kababhuzwa,
kati, “Takamulaya takasimisa kuti musidiye nge zina ileli, koga ngwenu mazhadza Jerusalema nge zwidiyo zwenyu, ngono moshaka kutipa nlandu we lufu gugwe!”
Pita ne bamwe batumwa ba Jesu bakashandula beti, “Takafanila hwa Ndzimu, kusi bathu.
Ndzimu wa bobatategulu bedu wakamusa Jesu mu bafi, iye wamakabulaya nge kunlembeledza mu tjileyanyo
Ndzimu wakammilidzila ku luboko gwawo gwe luji kube Ntungamili ne Ntjidzi, kuti Baiziraela bashandukile matjinyo abo kakale bazwiibhatigwe zwibi.
Ti batendeki be zwithu izwezwi, iswi ne Meya yakayengemala, iyo tjipo tje Ndzimu kuna ibabo banouhwilila.”
Bakati behwa ikoku, bakagwadzamoyo, ngono bakayemula kubabulaya.

Koga mmwe wabo, ali Nfarasi edang'wa kuyi Gamaliyele, wakabe ali n'diyi we nlayo, iye wakabe etetiwa kwazo nge bathu bose, kamilika kama mu lubazhe. Kadusa ndayilo kuti batumwa ba Jesu badusigwe kuzhe kwe tjibakana,
ngono ipapo kati ku lubazhe, “Balume be Iziraela, ibeni nge njele muna tjamunothama balume ibaba.
Mu misi yakapinda Teudasi wakaboneka ezwidana mmwe nkulu, ngono bathu bangabe mazana manna (400) bakabhatana naye. Koga wakabulawa, bose batobeli babe bakapalala kukasala kusina tjimwe.
Shule kwa ipapo, Judasi we Galili wakaboneka mu nsi we kubagwa kwe bathu kakwebela mbunga kunli, koga na iye wakabulawabo ngono batobeli babe bose bakapalala.
Ndizo ngwenu ndoti kumuli, idwani mu balume ibaba. Mubasunungule! Ha tjabakalangana kene nshingo wabo udwa mu bathu unowopela,
koga ha udwa ku Ndzimu, amungabakunde. Mungazwiwana munyanyayidza Ndzimu!”
Makulukota katobela gumbuludzo la Gamaliyele.
Bakadanila batumwa ba Jesu mukati, bakati babaloba bakabadwa bakati basitjabe batjalebeleka nge zina la Jesu kakale, ipapo bakabasunungula.
Batumwa ba Jesu bakadwa mu lubazhe bakashatha, ngobe Ndzimu wakawana bakafanila dziyidzigwa zina la Jesu.
Ngono mazhuba wose bakadwilila bediya be sumikila mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ne mu mizi ye bathu, besumikila ndebo mbuya inoti Jesu ndiye Mesiya.
Mu mazhuba iyawo badiyiwa ba Jesu bakabe bewanda, Bajuta banoleba Tjigiriki bakanenela ibabo banoleba Tjihebheru, ngobe tjilikadzi idzedzo dzakabe dzishayigwa hanya mu makobe e zhuba ne zhuba.

Ndizo batumwa ba Jesu bali gumi lina babili bakakubunganya badiyiwa bose pathu pang'ompela bakati, “Akuzolulwama kuti tiletje kusumikila dama le Ndzimu kuti ndizo tishinge nshingo wekukoba zwinoshetiwa nge tjilikadzi.
Zwikamu, shalulani pakati kwenyu balume bali kutendeka banozibgwa bakatambunuka bali zhele Meya yakayengemala ne butjenjedu, batingapa nshingo iwoyu.
Koga iswi towozwimisila nshingo we kutembezela ne kuyendisa dama.”

Tjabakaleba tjakashathisa mbunga wose. Bakashalula Sitifani, nlume wakabe ali zhele kugalamoyo ne Meya yakayengemala. Bakashalula na Filipo na Purokoro na Nikanori na Timoni na Pamenasi na Nikolasi unodwa ku Antiyoki wakabe ashandukila mu bugalimoyo gwe Tjijuta.
Bakayisa balume ibabo ku batumwa ba Jesu, bakatembezela bakababiga maboko.
Ndizo dama le Ndzimu likaandama. Badiyiwa bakawanda kwazo mu Jerusalema ngono Bapirisiti banjinji bakashanduka bakagalamoyo muna Jesu.
Sitifani, nlume wakabe ali zhele ngoni dze Ndzimu ne masimba, kashinga makaabadzo makulu ne zwilakidzo zwinotjenamisa pakati kwe bathu.

Ipapo bamwe be bathu be Ng'umba* ye mitembezelo ye Balume bakasununguka (sekwa yakabe idang'wa) ne Bajuta be Sirene ne be Alekizanda, bose ne Bajuta be mituthu ye Silisiya ne Ezhiya bakatangisa kukakabadzana na Sitifani.
Koga bakabe basingatubule kumidzana ne butjenjedu kene Meya yaakabe elebeleka ndiyo.
Ipapo nge kwakasumbikala bakakulumbidza bamwe bathu kuti bati, “Tahwa eleba matama anotuka Mushe ne anotuka Ndzimu.”
Ndizo bakadzonga bathu ne batungamili babo kose ne badiyi be nlayo.* Bakabhata Sitifani bakanzhisa mbeli kwe lubazhe.
Bakazhisa batendeki be manyepkhwa bakapa butendeki beti, “Nlume iwoyu aatotongo misa kuleba kusakalulwama ngekwe pathu ipapa pakayengemala nenge nlayo.
Takahwa eti Jesu iwoyu we Nazareta unowokolomodza bugalo igogu kakale kashandula mipanga Mushe yaakatipa.”
Bose bakabe bali gele mu lubazhe bakalingisisa Sitifani, ngono bakabona buso gugwe gunga buso gwe ntumwa we kudzimu.
Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kabhuzwa Sitifani kati, “Apa zwithu izwezwi malebeswa kene?”
Sitifani kadabila kati, “Zwikamu na botate, mundihwilile! Ndzimu we gudzo* wakaboneka kuna bobatategulu bedu Abhurahama batjiku Mesopotamiya, basathu bakanogala ku Harani,
ngono Ndzimu ukabadwa ukati, ‘Bhuda mu shango ya kanyi kwenyu ne muna bakanyi kwenyu, ngono uyende ku shango yandinowokulakidza imi.’
Ndizo bakabhuda mu shango ya kanyi kwabo ye ba Kalideya bakanogala ku Harani. Shule kwe lufu gwa tate ba Abhurahama Ndzimu wakabadusa ikoko ukabazhisa mu shango iyeyi yamugele muili.
Ndzimu ipapo auzopa Abhurahama pamwe payo se pape ndodwa ne paangabiga gumbopo, koga Ndzimu wakagadzabgwe kumpa iyo ne kuti inowobe iye ne bana babe. Nenguba Abhurahama akabe asina mwana.
Ndzimu tjawakaleba kunli etji, ‘Ludzi gugo gowogala mu shango ye bamwe, kwabanowobe balanda, ngono banowobhakhwa zwakabipa makole ali mazana manna.
Koga ndowosumikilisa itjaba itjetjo tjabanowoshingila, ngono shule banowobhuda mu shango iyeyo, ngono banowondinamata mu bugalo igogu.’

Ipapo Ndzimu ukapa Abhurahama tjidumano tje kuthumbigwa.* Abhurahama kazwala Isaki, ngono kanthumbila nge zhuba le buzhanakadzi shule kwe azwagwa. Isaki kazwala Jakubo, Jakubo kazwala bobatategulu bedu bali gumi lina babili.
“Bobatategulu bakathamila fupa nnung'una wabo Josefa ngono bakantengesa kube nlanda mu Egipiti. Koga Ndzimu wakabe unaye.
Wakansunungula mu tshiyilo dzidze dzose. Ndzimu wakathama kuti adiwe ndi Faro, ukampa butjenjedu mu mesho awe. Ndizo Faro She nkulu we Egipiti kanthama nlauli we Egipiti newe nsha uwe wose.
Ipapo kukabe ne bhamba mu Egipiti yose ne mu Kanana lakazhisa kudziyila kukulu. Bobatategulu bedu bakasheta zojiwa.
Jakubo kati ehwa kuti kuna mathunde ku Egipiti, katuma bobatategulu bedu kutanga.
Ngono gwe bubili Josefa kazwizibisa bakulu babe, ndizo Faro kaziba ngekwe nsha wa kanyi kwa Josefa.
Ipapo Josefa kadana tate babe Jakubo, kose ne nsha wose, bathu bali makumi ali kutendeka ana bashanu, kuti bazhe ku Egipiti.
Ipapo Jakubo kayenda ku Egipiti, iko kwaakafila na bobatategulu bedu.
Mibili yabo yakasengegwa ku Shekemu, kwayakabiganyiwa mu ikumbu tjakatengwa ndi Abhurahama nge themba ye mari e siliva mu bana ba Hamori mu Shekemu.
“Kukati tjibaka tjakagadziwabgwe Abhurahama nge Ndzimu tjabe pejo, palo ye bathu bedu ikakula bakawanda mu Egipiti.
Ngono kukabepo she nkulu mu Egipiti usingazibe tjimwe ngekwa Josefa.
Katjebela bobatategulu bedu, ngono kabadziyidza, ebakombeledza kuti balashe shabana dzabo, kuti ndizo dzife.
Nditjo tjibaka tjakazwagwa Mushe ali mwana wakanaka mbeli kwe Ndzimu. Wakalelegwa mu nzi* wa tate babe mimwedzi ili mitatu,
ngono kati adusiwa mu nzi uwe, nkololokadzi wa Faro kantola kanlela se mwana uwe.
Ngono Mushe kadiyiwa butjenjedu gose gwe Baegipiti, ngono kabe akasima mu ndebeleko ne mu mishingo.
“Kati ana makole ali makumi manna, kakumbula kukumba bakanyi kukwe, bakololo Baiziraela.
Wakati ebona mmwe wa kanyi kukwe edziyidziwa kamila nlume iwoyo unotshambilidziwa ngono kambuzuludzila nge kubulaya N'egipiti.
Wakabe ekumbula kuti bathu ba kanyi kukwe banowohwisisa kuti Ndzimu wakabe uwonshingisa kubasunungula, koga ibo bakasihwisise.
Tjimuka kawana Baiziraela babili begwa, ngono kagwisa kubagadzanya. Kati kubali, ‘Balume mu bana be nthu ini muthamilana bubi?’
Koga nlume iwoyu wakabe edziyidza mmwe katshindikila Mushe ntome. Kabhuzwa eti, ‘Ndiani wakakuthama nlauli ne nsumikilisi mutili kene?’
‘Unoshaka kundibulaya sekwa wakabulaya N'egipiti madekwe?’
Mushe kati ehwa ikoku, katizha mu Egipiti kayenda kanogala mu shango ye Midiya. Kabe ne bakololo babili ikoko.
“Shule kwe makole ali makumi manna, ntumwa we kudzimu kaboneka kuna Mushe mu tjilambanyika tje dombo le Sinai mu nthuto we moto mu denjana.
Mushe katjenamisiwa nge tjaakabona, ngono kasedzela pejo ne denjana kuti abone zubuyanana. Koga kahwa hwi la She liti,
‘Ndimi Ndzimu wa bobatategulu babo, Ndzimu wa Abhurahama, na Isaki na Jakubo.’ Mushe katetema ngotja, ngono kasilinge.
She bakati kunli, ‘Mbula khwebana dzidzo, ngobe pathu paumile pathu pakayengemala.
Ndabona kudziyidziwa kwe bathu bangu mu Egipiti. Ndahwa kulila kwabo, ndizo ndadeluka kuwobasunungula. Izha ngwenu; ndowokutuma ku Egipiti.’

“Mushe iwoyu ndiye zwe wabakalamba beti, ‘Ndiani wakakuthama nlauli ne nsumikilisi mutili kene?’ Ndzimu wakantuma kunolaula bathu ne kubasunungula nge bhatsho ye ntumwa we kudzimu iwoyu wakaboneka kunli mu denjana lakabe lithuta moto.
Wakatungamilila bathu kubhuda mu Egipiti athama matjenamiso ne zwilakidzo mu Egipiti ne ku Gungwa Shaba ne mu tjilambanyika makole ali makumi manna.
Mushe ndiye wakati ku bathu be Iziraela, ‘Ndzimu wenyu unowomuzhisila nlebesambeli, koga sekwa wakandizhisa, ngono unowodwa mu ludzi gwenyu.’

Ndiye wakabe ana gubungano mu tjilambanyika, ndiye wakabe ali mile pakati kwa bobatategulu bedu ne ntumwa we kudzimu, iwoyu wakalebeleka naye ali pezhugwi kwe Dombo le Sinai ngono Mushe kaamutjila matama e Ndzimu anotjila kutipa iwo.
“Koga bobatategulu bedu bakalamba kunhwa, bakansundila ntome, ngono bakayemula kubgwilila ku Egipiti.
Ndizo bakati kuna Aroni, ‘Utithamile midzimu* inowotitungamila. Atitoziba kuti kwashingikalani kuna Mushe, iye wakatidusa mu Egipiti.’
Nditjo tjibaka tjabakathama ndzimu we ifano tje phulu, bakatjipa zwipo ngono bakabe ne nzano unokudza itjo tjabathama ibo.
Ndizo Ndzimu ukabafupatila, ngono ukabayisa mu kunamata nyenyedzi dze kudzimu, sekwa kwakakwagwa mu hwalo dze balebesambeli* kuyi,
‘Ng'umba ye Iziraela.
Apa makandipa zwibhayilo zwe phuka dzakabulawa
nenge zwipo makole ali makumi manna mu tjilambanyika kene?
Makasenga tente ya Moleki,
ne nyenyedzi ye ndzimu wenyu Refani,
zwifano zwamakathama* kuzwinamata.
Ndizo wali ndowomudusa amuyisa mbeli kwe Bhabhiloni.’
“Bobatategulu bedu bakabe bana tente* ye butendeki mu tjilambanyika. Yakabe yakathamiwa sekwakabe kwalebgwa nge wakabudza Mushe kuti ithamiwe tjini.
Bobatategulu bedu bakati bakazha nayo bana Joshuwa pabakatolela tjaba shango, idzo Ndzimu dzawakatata mbeli kwa botate bedu. Ngono kwakagala kwakajalo kuswikila misi ya Dafite,
iye wakaamutjigwa nge Ndzimu, ngono kakumbila Ndzimu kun'dumila kubakila Ndzimu wa Jakubo bugalo.
Koga Solomoni ndiye wakabakila Ndzimu ng'umba.
“Ndzimu upezhugwi zhugwi autogala mu ng'umba dzakabakwa nge bathu, se kunoleba nlebesambeli eti,
‘She bakati, kudzimu tjigalo tjangu tje bushe,
shango tjigalo tje makumbo angu.
I ng'umba yakatini yaungandibakila kene?
Ndiapi magalo andinganyaluluka muali kene?
Apa andizothama zwithu izwezwi zose nge luboko gwangu kene?’
“Bathu ndimwi bana mitshibha yakawomelela, bana mimoyo mikukutu ne zebe dzisingashako hwa lebeswa. Molamba Meya yakayengemala misi yose, tjakathamwa ndi bobatategulu benyu namwibo motjithama.
Apa wakatongo bepo nlebesambeli bobatategulu benyu wabasakadziyidza kene? Bakabulaya na ibabo bakalebelambeli nge kuzha kwa iye Wakalulwama, iye wamakati ngwenu mukawonga mukambulaya.
Imwi makaamutjila nlayo wakazhisiwa nge batumwa be kudzimu, koga mukasiulondolodze!”
Bakati behwa ikoku bakan'gwadzilamoyo kwazo.
Koga Sitifani ali zhele Meya yakayengemala, kalinga kudzimu kabona tjedza* tje Ndzimu na Jesu ali mile ku luboko gwe luji gwe Ndzimu.
Kati, “Bonani! Ndobona kudzimu kwakazhuka ne Nkololo we Nthu ali mile ku luboko luji gwe Ndzimu!”
Ngono bakamimila bakazwina zebe dzabo ngono bakalabukila kunli bakan'wila bose.
Bakankwebela kuzhe kwe nzi, ngono bakankikithidza nge mabgwe. Batendeki bakabiga zwiambalo zwabo pa makumbo e nzhuzha wakabe eyi Saulo.
Bakatibekikithidza Sitifani ngono iye katembezela kati, “She Jesu, amutjilani meya yangu!”
Kathigama pasi kamilidza hwi kati “She! Musibabone nlandu we jinyo ileli!” Wakati aleba ikoku kafa.
Ngono Saulo kadumila kubulawa kwa Sitifani.
Mu zhuba ilelo gubungano limu Jerusalema likatangisa kube ne kudziyidziwa kwakabipa. Bose bakabe bepalala betizhila ku mituthu ye Judiya ne Samariya kuzhe kwe batumwa ba Jesu.
Balume banotja Ndzimu, bakabiganya Sitifani, bakanlilila nge tjililo tjikulu.
Koga Saulo kapaladza gubungano, engina ng'umba ne ng'umba ekwebela kuzhe bagalimoyo, balume kose ne bakadzi ebalonga mu ng'umba ye busungwa.
Bagalimoyo ibabo bakapalala bakayenda kumwe ne kumwe, besumikila dama.
Filipo kayenda ku nzi nkulu Samariya, ngono kasumikila ngekwa Mesiya kubali.
Mibunga ikahwilila tjakabe tjilebgwa ndi Filipo nge moyo nng'ompela nenge njele, benhwilila bebona zwilakidzo zwaakabe eshinga.
Meya mibi yakabe ibhuda mu bathu banjinji imimila ne banjinji bakalobgwa nge gulukadzi ne zwilema bakapodziwa.
Ndizo kwakabe ne kushatha kukulu mu nzi iwoyo.
Kwakabe kuna nlume unodang'wa Simoni wakabe abe ne tjibaka ethama masalamusi mu nzi ngono akadziyanya itjaba tje Samariya ezwikudza eti iye nge kukwe mmwe nkulu kulu.
Bose bakabe benhwilila kudwa mu ntukununu kunoti mu nkulu tjose beti, “Nlume iwoyu ndiye masimba e Ndzimu anodang'wa kuyi masimba makulu.”
Bakabe benhwilila, ngobe kwakabe kwabe tjibaka ebadziyanya nge masalamusi awe.
Koga bakati begalamoyo Filipo esumikila ndebo mbuya ye bushe gwe Ndzimu nenge zina la Jesu Kirisiti, bakadubikwa, bose balume ne bakadzi.
Simoni na iyebo kagalamoyo, ngono shule kwe adubikwa, kabhatana na Filipo. Ngono kati ebona zwilakidzo ne makaabadzo makulu eshingwa katjenama.
Batumwa ba Jesu mu Jerusalema bakati behwa kuti bathu mu Samariya bakaamutjila dama le Ndzimu, bakatuma Pita na Johani kubali.
Bakati beswika, bakabatembezelela kuti baamutjile Meya yakayengemala.
Ngobe Meya yakayengemala yakabe isathu ikadelukila mubali, koga bakabe badubikiwa nge zina la She Jesu koga.
Ipapo Pita na Johani bakababiga maboko, ngono bakaamutjila Meya yakayengemala.
Simoni kati ebona kuti Meya yapiwa bagalimoyo ha batumwa ba Jesu bebabiga maboko, kapa Pita na Johani mari,
eti kubali, “Mundipebo simba ileli, kuti mmwe ne mmwe wandinobiga maboko aamutjile Meya yakayengemala.”
Koga Pita kan'dabila kati, “Mari awo ngaalobe nawe, ngobe wakumbula kuti tjipo tje Ndzimu tjingatengwa nge mari!
Auna bugalo kene gobe muna ikoku, ngobe moyo uwo auzolulwama mu mesho e Ndzimu.
Shanduka mu bubi gugo igogu, utembezele She, kuti, ha kutubuka bakuzwiibhatigwe mazwimisilo e moyo uwo.
Ngobe ndobona kuti uzhele ndandala kakale u nsungwa we jinyo.”
Simoni kati kuna Pita na Johani, “Ndomukumbila munditembezelele kuna She, kuti kusibe ne tjimwe tje zwithu izwezwi zwamaleba tjinowondishingikalila.”
Shule kwe bapa butendeki, basumikila dama la She, Pita na Johani bakabgwilila ku Jerusalema, besumikila ndebo mbuya mu mizi minjinji ye Basamariya.*
Ntumwa wa She kati kuna Filipo, “Milika uyende ku ndzibo we ku burwa ku zila inodeluka idwa ku Jerusalema iyenda ku Gaza.” I zila inopalama tjilambanyika.

Ndizo Filipo kamilika kayenda, kashangana ne nlume we ngomwa* we ku Itopiya wakabe ali nkadzasha nkulu ali mbhati we fumwa ya Kandake shekadzi we Itopiya, wakabe abe azha ku Jerusalema kunamata Ndzimu.
Ndizo wakabe wobgwilila kanyi akatatha koloyi iye ebala lukwalo gwe nlebesambeli Isaya.
Meya ikati kuna Filipo, “Yenda ku koloyi iyeyije uyende nayo.”
Filipo kalabukilako, ngono kanhwa ebala mu lukwalo gwe nlebesambeli Isaya. Kambhuzwa kati, “Apa unohwisisa tjaunobala kene?”
Nlandalume kashandula eti, “Ndingahwisisa tjini kusina unonditjenesela kene?” Ndizo kakumbila kuti Filipo atathe agale naye mu koloyi.
Paakabe ebala mu lukwalo ndiapa,
“Se pkhwizi inokwebegwa ku mbulayi,
kene pkhwizana inyelele mbeli kwe nteseli wayo,
ndizo aazozhula nlomo.
Kalengudziwa kalambigwa ndulamo.
Ndiani kene ungaleba ngekwe ludzi gugwe?
Ngoti butjilo gugwe gwapela mu shango.”
Nlanda kabhuzwa Filipo kati, “Mundibudze kuti, nlebesambeli unoleba ikoku ngekwa ani? Unoleba nge kukwe kene ngekwe mmwe upoga?”
Ipapo Filipo kadwa nlomo, ngono katangisa nge lukwalo igogu, kambudza ndebo mbuya ngekwa Jesu.
Bakati beyenda mu zila, bakaswika pathu pakabe pana vula, ngono nlanda kati, “Bona, eyi vula. Ini tjingandidzibila kudubikwa kene?”
[Filipo kati kunli, “Ungadubikwa ha ugalamoyo nge moyo uwo wose.” Kadabila eti, “Ndogalamoyo, kuti Jesu Kirisiti Nkololo we Ndzimu.”]
Nlanda kamisa koloyi, ngono bose Filipo ne nlanda bakangina mu vula, ngono Filipo kan'dubika.
Bakati bebhuda mu vula, Meya ya She ikatola Filipo. Nlanda aazotjambona kakale, koga kadwilila mu zila iye akashatha kwazo.
Filipo kaboneka mu Azotu; ngono kayendila mbeli esumikila ndebo mbuya ku mizi yose, kudzina eswika ku Sizariya.
Mu tjibaka itjetji Saulo wakabe atjizhelilane eshaka bulaya badiyiwa ba She. Kayenda ku Ntungamili we Bapirisiti ngono
kankumbila hwalo dzinoyenda ku ng'umba dze mitembezelo ku Damasiko kuti ha angawana bamwe ikoko be Zila iyeyo bali balume kene bakadzi abatole abayise ku Jerusalema bali basungwa.
Kati ali mu gwendo gugwe abe pejo ne Damasiko, tjinyolotjo tjedza tjinodwa kudzimu tjikapenya kumpoteleka.
Kawila pasi, ngono kahwa hwi liti kunli, “Saulo, Saulo, apa unondidziyidzilani kene?”
Iye kati, “Ndimwi ani She?” Hwi likati, “Ndimi Jesu, iye waunodziyidza.
Ngwenu, milika ungine mu nzi, ngono unowobudziwa kuti uthameni.”
Balume bakabe beyenda na Saulo bakama ipapo basingalebeleke; behwa hwi koga basina wabanobona.
Saulo kamuka pasi, koga kati ezhula mesho awe, kasibone tjimwe. Ndizo bakankwebela mu Damasiko nge luboko.
Wakabe bhofu mazhuba matatu, ngono kasije kene kuli kung'wa tjimwe.
Mu Damasiko kwakabe kuna n'diyiwa unodang'wa kuyi Ananiyasi. She bakan'dana mu mbono beti, “Ananiyasi!” Iye kadabila eti, “Ndipano She.”
She kambudza kati, “Milika uyende ku ng'umba ya Judasi mu zila inodang'wa kuyi, Yakatambunuka ubhuzwe ngekwe nlume unodwa ku Taso unoyi Saulo, ngobe unotembezela.
Wabona mu mbono nlume unoyi Ananiyasi ezha embiga maboko kumpofunula.”
Ananiyasi kadabila kati, “She, ndakahwa nge bathu banjinji ngekwe nlume iwoyu nenge kuti wakathama bubi gungapani ku bayengemali* benyu mu Jerusalema.
Wakazha muno nge simba linodwa ku Bapirisiti bakulu kusunga bose banodana zina lenyu.”
Koga She bakati kuna Ananiyasi, “Yenda! Nlume iwoyu tjija tjangu tjandakashalula kuyisa zina langu kuna Bezwitjaba na boshe bakulu babo kose neku bana be Iziraela.
Ndowonlakidza kuti wakafanila dziyila kungapani ngekwe zina langu.”

Ipapo Ananiyasi kayenda ku ng'umba iyeyo, ngono kangina muyili. Kati ebiga Saulo maboko etembezelela kati, “Ikamu tjangu Saulo, She Jesu iye wakaboneka kukuli mu zila yawakazha ndiyo, wandituma kuti ubone kakale ne kuti uzhale Meya yakayengemala.”
Tjinyolotjo zwithu zwinonga makwapa zwikawa mu mesho a Saulo ngono kabona kakale. Kamilika, ngono kadubikiwa,
ngono kati aja, kazhigwa kakale nge matatabuko awe.
Saulo wakagala mazhuba ne bagalimoyo mu Damasiko.
Tjinyolotjo katangisa kusumikila ngekwa Jesu mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo eti, “Jesu Nkololo we Ndzimu.”
Ngono bose bakanhwa bakatjenama, ngono bakabhuzwa beti, “Apa ate iye nlume wakabe ebulaya banodana zina la Jesu mu Jerusalema kene? Kakale aazozhila kuti abasunge abayise ku Bapirisiti bakulu kene?”
Koga Saulo kasimila mbeli, ngono kashanganya Bajuta banogala mu Damasiko misholo nge kubalakidza kuti Jesu ndiye Mesiya.
Kwakati shule kwe mazhuba manjinji Bajuta bakalangana kumbulaya,
koga kaziba ngekwe nlangano wabo. Bakabe belinda nkoba we nzi siku ne sikati kuti bambulaye.
Koga badiyiwa babe bakantola busiku bakan'delusila kuzhe bentjuludza guma ali mu itundu.
Wakati eswika mu Jerusalema kagwisa kuzwishanganya ne badiyiwa, koga bose bakabe bentja basingagalemoyo kuti n'diyiwa.

Koga Bhanabhasi kantola, ngono kanzhisa ku batumwa. Kababudza sekwa Saulo akabona She mu gwendo gugwe, ngono She kalebeleka naye, kababudza sekwa Saulo akasumikila ana tjilopa mu Damasiko nge zina la Jesu.
Ndizo Saulo kagala nabo kayenda akasununguka mu Jerusalema elebeleka akasimisamoyo nge zina la Jesu.
Wakabe esumikila ana tjilopa enyanyayidzana ne Bajuta banoleba Tjigiriki, koga ibo bakagwisa kumbulaya.
Kukati zwikamu zwaziba ngekwa ikoku zwikantolela ku Sizariya ngono zwikantumila ku Taso.
Ipapo gubungano lose mu Judiya ne limu Galili ne limu Samariya likabe ne mbakiso, likasimisiwa, likanyaladziwa nge Meya yakayengemala, likakula litjilila mu kutja She.
Pita kati etendeleka nge shango kayenda kunokumbabo bayengemali ku Lida.
Ikoko kawana nlume unoyi Aneasi wakabe atjibe nge makole ali zhanakadzi ali lele akalobgwa nge gulukadzi.
Pita kati kunli, “Aneasi, Jesu Kirisiti unokupodza. Milika uwalule.” Tjinyolotjo Eneasi kamilika.
Bose bagali be Lida ne Sharoni bakambona ndizo bakashandukila kuna She.
Mu Jopa kwakabe kuna n'diyiwa unodang'wa Tabhita. Zina lile mu Tjigiriki loyi Dokasi. Iye wakabe misi yose ethama mishingo mibuya ebhatsha bashayi.
Mazhuba iyawo kagwala ngono kafa, ngono bakati banngudza bakanladzika mu ng'umba ipezhugwi kwe imwe.
Nzi we Lida wakabe uli pejo ne Jopa. Ndizo badiyiwa bakati behwa kuti Pita umu Lida bakatuma balume babili kunli ngono bakankumbila beti, “Izha kutili ngwenu usinonoke.”

Pita kamilika kayenda nabo, ngono kati eswika bakantathisila pezhugwi ku ng'umba iyeyo. Tjilikadzi dzose dzikama kumpoteleka dzilila dzinlakidza hazu ne zwiambalo zwimwe Dokasi zwaakabe athama atji nabo.

Pita kabadusila bose kuzhe kwe ng'umba; ipapo kathigama ngono katembezela, ngono kati etendebukila ku itumbu kati, “Tabhita, milika.” Tabhita kazhula mesho awe, ngono kati ebona Pita kamuka, ngono kagala.
Pita kambhata nge luboko, ngono kambatsha kuma nge makumbo. Ipapo kadana bayengemali ne tjilikadzi, ngono kabapa iye etjila.
Oku kwakazibgwa mu Jopa yose, ngono bathu banjinji bakagalamoyo muna She.
Pita kagala mu Jopa mazhuba manjinji, egala na Simoni nsuki we makukuta.
Kwakabe kuna mmwe nlume mu Sizariya edang'wa Koneliyo, wakabe ali nlauli we babhayani be Baroma bali zana mu gupo lakabe lidang'wa “Gupo le Italiya.”
Wakabe ali nlume unotja Ndzimu nge lebeswa iye ne nsha uwe wose, wakabe epa basheti zwipo akasununguka etembezela Ndzimu misi yose.
Kabona mbono limwe zhuba mu matewuko nge tjibaka tje butatu, muili wakabona zubuyanana ntumwa we kudzimu engina kunli eti, “Koneliyo!”
Kalingisisa ntumwa ngotja, ngono kati, “Ini she?”
Ntumwa kadabila eti, “Ndzimu unoshathisiwa nge mitembezelo iyo nenge mishingo iyo ye kupa bashayi ngono unokudabila.
Ndizo ngwenu tuma balume ku Jopa kunodana nlume unodang'wa Simoni Pita.
Unogala mu ng'umba ye nsuki we makukuta unoyi Simoni we nzi upejo ne gungwa.”
Ntumwa we kudzimu wakalebeleka naye kati atjiyenda, Koneliyo kadana babili be balanda babe ne mbhayani wakazwipa kudwa muna ibabo bakabe benshinga.
Ndizo kati ababudza tjimwe ne tjimwe tjashingikala, kabatuma ku Jopa.
Tjimuka bakati bali mu zila yabo babepejo ne Jopa, Pita katathila pezhugwi kwe ng'umba nge tjibaka tje masikati kunotembezela.
Kabhakhwa nge zhala, ngono kayemula kuja, koga zojiwa zwakati zwitjalulwamisiwa, kabona mbono.
Kabona kudzimu kwakazhuka, ngono tjimwe tjideluka tjilingika se jila gulu gulu lidelusigwa pasi nge midzibo yalo minna.
Mulili kwakabe kuna njudzi dzose dze phuka ne zwinosoba pasi ne nyuni dzinowuluka.
Hwi likati kunli, “Milika, Pita, ubhaye uje!”
Koga Pita kati, “She, nge malebeswa andingake! Andithu aja tjimwe tjakatemapala kene tjisi tjibuyanana.”
Hwi likalebeleka naye kakale gwe bubili liti, “Ndzimu tjawakatjenapadza usitjidane tjisi tjibuyanana.”
Ikoku kwakashingikala katatu, ngono ipapo jila ilelo likabe libgwilila pezhugwi.
Pita kati atjakaabadziwa nge kuti mbono yaabona ingabe idwani, bonani balume bakabe batumwa ndi Koneliyo bakati babhuzwa kuti ng'umba ya Simoni iponi bakabe babe mile pa nkoba.
Bakapindisa bakabhuzwa kene, “Simoni unodang'wa Pita egala ipapo?”
Pita kati atjakumbula ngekwe mbono, Meya ikati, “Kuna balume batatu banokushaka.
Ndizo milika udeluke, ngono usizeyeze kuyenda nabo, ngobe ndabatuma.”
Ndizo Pita kadeluka kati ku balume ibabo, “Ndimi wamunoshaka ini tjamuzhisa pano.”

Bakadabila beti, “Nlauli we babhayani bali zana, Koneliyo, watituma. Nlume we nlulwami unonamata Ndzimu unotetiwa kwazo nge Bajuta bose. Ntumwa we kudzimu wakayengemala wakambudza kuti akukokele ku ng'umba iye, kuti ndizo ahwe tjaunoleba.”
Pita kadanila balume ibabo mu ng'umba bakabe bezi babe.
Tjimuka kamilika kayenda nabo; ngono zwimwe zwikamu mu Jopa zwikayenda naye.
Tjimuka bakaswika mu Sizariya, kwaakabe akalindigwa ndi Koneliyo ne makamu ne bazwalani baanoda baakabe akoka.
Pita kati engina Koneliyo kanshangamidza, kawila pa makumbo awe ennamata.
Koga Pita kammilidza. Kati kunli, “Milika, namibo ndi nthu koga.”
Pita kadwilila elebeleka na Koneliyo, ngono kangina mu ng'umba kwaakawana bathu banjinji bakakubungana.

Kati kubali, “Imwi nge kwenyu moziba kuti ate kuli mu nlayo kuti Njuta ashangashangane, kene akumbe mmwe we itjaba tjipoga. Koga Ndzimu wakandilakidza kuti ndisitole mmwe nthu se wakatemapala kene se usi mbuyanana.
Ndizo wakati unditumila bathu iwe Koneliyo, azha ndikasilambe. Ndizo ngwenu ndobhuzwa tjawandidanila.”

Koneliyo kati, “Kwakabe kuli nge tjibaka itjetji mazhuba matatu akapinda, ndikabetembezela mu ng'umba yangu mu tjibaka tje awara ye butatu mu matewuko. Tjinyolotjo nlume wakaambala zwiambalo zwinopenya kama mbeli kwangu.
Ngono kati, ‘Koneliyo, Ndzimu wahwa ntembezelo uwo, ne zwipo zwizo ku bashayi wazwikumbula.
Tuma nthu ku Jopa, ku nlume unodang'wa Simoni Pita. Ugele mu nzi wa Simoni, nsuki we makukuta, unogala pejo ne gungwa!’
Abe ndokutumila bathu tjinyolotjo, ngono wathama buthu ukazha. Ngwenu tipano tose mbeli kwe Ndzimu, takalindila kuhwa tjimwe ne tjimwe She tjabakudwa kuti utjilebe.”
Pita kadwa nlomo kati, “Ngwenu ndohwisisa kuti malebeswa Ndzimu autoshalaula.
Koga mu njudzi dzose, mmwe ne mmwe unotja Ndzimu ethama tjakalulwama, Ndzimu unon'amutjila.
Unoziba dama Ndzimu lawakatumila ku Iziraela, hwusumikila ndebo mbuya ye kunyalala ndi Jesu Kirisiti, iye ndi She wa bose.
Ndilo dama lakasumikigwa mu shango yose ye Judiya, kutangisa mu Galili shule kwe kudubikwa kwakadiyiwa ndi Johani;

Ndzimu sekwa wakashalula Jesu we Nazareta nge Meya yakayengemala nenge simba; sekwa akayenda kumwe ne kumwe eshinga ndulamo,* epodza bose bakabe bakatshambilidziwa ne Nvanganyi, ngobe Ndzimu wakabe unaye.
Iswi ti batendeki be tjimwe ne tjimwe tjaakathama mu shango ye Bajuta ne mu Jerusalema. Bakambulaya nge kunlembeledza mu nti.
Koga Ndzimu wakammusa mu bafi nge zhuba le butatu, ngono ukathama kuti aboneke,
kusi ku bathu bose, koga kutili iswi takashalugwa nge Ndzimu tili batendeki, iswi bakaja naye tikang'wa naye shule kwe amuka mu bafi.
Ngono wakatilaya kuti tisumikile ndebo mbuya ku bathu ne kuti titendeke kuti ndiye wakabigwa nge Ndzimu kube nsumikilisi we batjili ne bafi.
Balebesambeli bose banopa butendeki kuti, mmwe ne mmwe unogalamoyo muna Jesu unowozwiibhatigwa zwibi zwizwe nge simba le zina lile.”
Pita kati atjaleba ikoku, Meya yakayengemala ikadelukila pezhugwi kwa bose bahwa dama.
Bagalimoyo bakathumbigwa bakabe bazha na Pita bedwa ku Jopa bakatjenamila kuti Ndzimu wadila tjipo tjawo tje Meya yakayengemala muna Bezwitjaba,
ngobe bakabahwa belebeleka nge ndimi dzipoga be kudza Ndzimu. Pita kalebeleka kati,
“Ibaba bathu baamutjila Meya yakayengemala, koga saswi. Apa uyapo kene ungadzibila kuti badubikwe nge vula?”
Ndizo kalaya kuti badubikiwe nge zina la Jesu Kirisiti. Ipapo bakankumbila kuti atongo gala nabo mazhuba mashomanana.
Batumwa ba Jesu ne zwikamu mu Judiya bakahwa kuti Bezwitjaba na ibobo bakaamutjila dama le Ndzimu.
Ndizo Pita wakati etathila ku Jerusalema ibabo bakabe beda buthumbi bakan'gongobola
beti, “Ini wangina mu ng'umba dze bathu basakathumbigwa* ukaja nabo?”
Pita katangisa kutjenesa tjimwe ne tjimwe kubali nge buzhalo sekwa kwakashingikala eti:
“Ndakabe ndili mu nzi we Jopa nditembezela, abona mbono. Ndakabona tjimwe tjinonga jila gulu gulu tjidelusiwa kudwa kudzimu nge midzibo yatjo minna, ngono tjikazha pasi pandakabe ndilipo.
Ndakalinga mukati nge njele, abona phuka ne zwibandana ne zwibumbiwa zwinosoba na pasi ne nyuni dzinowuluka.
Ipapo ahwa hwi lindidwa liti, ‘Milika Pita, bhaya uje!’
Koga ashandula nditi, ‘She nge malebeswa andingaje! Akuna tjimwe tjina shambgwa kene tjakatemapala tjakatongo ngina mu nlomo wangu!’
Koga hwi likalebeleka kakale gwe bubili lidwa kudzimu liti ‘Ndzimu tjawakatjenapadza usitjidane uti ate tjili tjibuyanana.’
Ikoku kwakashingikala katatu, ngono kose kukadwa kukwebegwa kudzimu kakale.
Ipapo balume batatu bakabe batumwa kundili bedwa ku Sizariya bakaswika pa ng'umba yatakabe tili muili.
Meya ikandibudza kuti ndisitje kuyenda nabo. Zwikamu izwezwi zwitathatu na izo zwikayenda nami, ngono tikangina mu ng'umba ye nlume iwoyo.
Ngono katibudza sekwa akabona ntumwa we kudzimu ali mile mu ng'umba iye, ngono eti, ‘Tumila nthu ku Jopa kuna Simoni unodang'wa kuyi Pita.
Unowomuzhisila matama anowoti iwe ne nzi uwo mukatjidziwa.’
Ati nditangisa kulebeleka Meya yakayengemala ikadelukila mubali sekwa yakadelukila mutili mu kutangisa.
Ipapo ndakaalakana She tjabakaleba beti, ‘Johani wakadubika nge vula koga imwi mowodubikiwa nge Meya yakayengemala.’
Ndizo ha kuli kuti Ndzimu wakabapa tjipo itjo zwatjo tjawakatipa iswi takagalamoyo muna She Jesu Kirisiti, ndakabe ndili ani imi kukumbula kunyanyayidza Ndzimu kene?”
Bakati behwa ikoku bakanyalala. Bakakudza Ndzimu beti, “Bezwitjaba naibobo Ndzimu wabapa kushandukila kuuli kubapa butjilo.”
Koga ibabo bakabe bapaladziwa nge kudziyidziwa kwakakula pakukikithidziwa kwa Sitifani bakayenda kunoti ku Fenikiya ne Sipuro ne Antiyoki besumikila dama ku Bajuta boga.
Koga bamwe babo, balume banodwa ku Sipuro ne Sirene bakayenda ku Antiyoki bakatangisa kusumikilabo ku Bagiriki ngekwa She Jesu.
Luboko gwa She gwakabe gunabo, ngono bathu banjinji kwazo bakagalamoyo bakashandukila kuna She.
Thawu ngekwa ikoko dzikaswika mu zebe dze gubungano liku Jerusalema ngono bakatuma Bhanabhasi ku Antiyoki.
Wakati eswika ebona ngoni dze Ndzimu kashatha kabakulumbidza bose kudwilila begalamoyo muna She nge mazwimisilo asingazunguzike.
Wakabe ali nlume wakalulwama ali zhele Meya yakayengemala nenge kugalamoyo, ngono bathu banjinji bakapaphidzika muna She.
Ipapo Bhanabhasi kayenda ku Taso kunoshaka Saulo,
ngono kati an'wana kazha naye ku Antiyoki. Ndizo gole lose Bhanabhasi na Saulo bakabe beshangana ne gubungano, ngono bakadiya bathu banjinji. Bagalimoyo bakatangisa kudang'wa Bakirisiti ku Antiyoki.
Mu tjibaka itjetjo balebesambeli bamwe bakadwa ku Jerusalema beyenda ku Antiyoki.
Mmwe wabo unodang'wa kuyi Agabho, kamilika, ngono nge Meya kaleba kuti bhamba gulu lowozhala mu shango yose. Oku kwakashingikala nge tjibaka tje bushe gwa Kilaudiyo.
Badiyiwa bakazwimisila kuti mmwe ne mmwe wabo unowotumilila tjaangatubula kubhatsha zwikamu zwakabe zwigala mu Judiya.
Oku bakakuthama, ngono bakabhatisa Bhanabhasi na Saulo zwipo zwabo zwinoyenda ku bakulu* be gubungano.
Mu tjibaka itjetjo She nkulu Herode katangisa kudziyidza bamwe be gubungano.
Ngono kabulaya Jakubo nkulu wa Johani nge bukanu.
Kati ebona kuti ikoku kwashathisa Bajuta, kadwilila kabhata Pita. Ikoku kwakashingikala mu tjibaka tje Nzano we Tjiwunga* tjisina mbidzo.*

Herode kati asunga Pita kanlonga mu ng'umba ye busungwa, kwaakayisiwa kulindiwa nge makoko manna enlinda nge kulabadzana, limwe ne limwe layo lina balume banna. Wakabe akazwimisila kuti unowonsumikilisa mbeli kwe bathu shule kwe Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi.*
Ndizo Pita kagadziwa mu ng'umba ye busungwa, koga gubungano likantembezelela nge masimba ku Ndzimu.
Mu busiku gwakabe Herode ewomuka enzhisa mbeli kwe bathu, Pita wakabe ali lele pakati kwe balindi babili akasungwa nge ketani mbili, ngono kwakabe kuna balindi pa nkoba we ng'umba ye busungwa.
Tjinyolotjo ntumwa wa She kaboneka, tjedza tjikapenya mu ng'umba ye busungwa ina Pita ngono ntumwa iwoyo kazunguza Pita mu lubadu kati, “Muka ulibilidza.” Ipapo ketani dzikawa mu maboko a Pita.
Ntumwa we kudzimu kati, “Ambala zwiambalo uambale khwebana dzidzo.” Pita kathama sa ikoko, ngono ntumwa we kudzimu kati, “Ambala hazu dzidzo unditobele.”
Pita kantobela kabhuda mu ng'umba ye busungwa, koga asingazibe kuti kene tjakabe tjishingwa nge ntumwa we kudzimu tjakabe tjili tjakwako; wakabe ekumbula kuti unobona mbono.

Bakapinda balindi be kutanga ne be bubili bakaswika ku nkoba we zhalilo lakathamwa nge tshipi unobhudila ku nzi. Nkoba ukazwizhula, ngono bakabhuda. Bakatobela zila bakanowila mu imwe zila kakale, ngono tjinyolotjo ntumwa kasiya Pita.
Ipapo Pita kadzimunuka ngono kati, “Ngwenu ndoziba nge malebeswa kuti She batuma ntumwa wabo kundiangulila mu maboko a Herode ne mu tjimwe ne tjimwe tjabe tjiyi tjowoshingikala nge Bajuta.”
Kati abona ikoku, kayenda ku nzi wa Mariya, mme ba Johani wakabe limwe zina lile lili Mako, kwakabe kwakakubungana bathu banjinji betembezela.
Pita kakokodza pa nkoba utjakuzhe, ngono nlandakadzi unoyi Roda kazha kudabila.
Kaziba hwi la Pita, ngono kashatha kwazo kwaakalabukila shule mukati asingazhule nkoba, ngono kaleba kuti Pita umile kuzhe.
Bakati kunli, “Unopenga!” Koga katshambilidza kuti malebeswa. Ndizo bakadabila beti, “Ntumwa uwe.”
Pita iye kadwilila nge kukokodza. Gwe bupelo bakazhula nkoba, ngono bakati bembona bakatjenama.
Kabanyaladza nge luboko, ngono katjenesa sekwa adusiwa mu ng'umba ye busungwa ndi She. Kabe eti kubali, “Ikoku mukubudze Jakubo ne zwikamu zose.” Ipapo kamilika kayenda ku gumwe bugalo.
Kukati kuyedza kukabepo kushangana misholo kukulu pakati kwe balindi ngekwe kuti Pita uponi.
Herode kalaya kuti ashakwe, ngono bakasimbone. Ndizo kabhuzwisisa balindi, ngono kalaya kuti babulawe.
Shule kwa ikoku, Herode kabhuda mu Judiya kayenda ku Sizariya kapitsha mazhubako.

Herode kagwadzilamoyo bathu be Tire ne Sidoni kwazo, ndizo bakayenda kunli bali mbunga. Tje kutanga bakazwihwananya na Bhulasito, nlume wakabe ali iye nlingi we nzi wa She nkulu kuti ababhatshe. Ipapo bakayenda kuna Herode bakankumbila mbakiso, ngobe shango yabo yakabe iwana zojiwa zwayo mu shango ya She nkulu.
Mu zhuba lakabigwa Herode kaambala hazu dzidze dze bushe, kagala pa tjigalo tjitje tje bushe kalebeleka ne bathu.
Bathu bakamimila beti, “Ate hwi le nthu koga ngele ndzimu!”
Tjinyolotjo ntumwa wa She kaloba Herode, ngobe asingalumbidze Ndzimu. Kajiwa nge wonyana kafa.
Koga dama le Ndzimu likadwilila ngokula ne andama.
Bhanabhasi na Saulo bakapedza nshingo wabo, ngono bakashanduka mu Jerusalema, bakatola Johani wakabe kakale edang'wa kuyi Mako.
Ku gubungano liku Antiyoki kwakabe kuna balebesambeli ne badiyi, Bhanabhasi, na Simiyoni wakabe edang'wa Ntema na Lukiyo edwa ku Sirene, na Manaeni iye wakakula na Herode nlauli, na Saulo.
Bakati batjanamata She kakale bezwinyima zojiwa, Meya yakayengemala ikati kubali, “Mundishalulile Bhanabhasi na Saulo kushinga nshingo wandakabadanila.”
Bakati bazwinyima zojiwa kakale batembezela, bakababiga maboko ngono bakati bayende.
Ndizo bakati batumwa nge Meya yakayengemala, Bhanabhasi na Saulo bakadelukila ku Selusiya, ngono bakayenda nge gungwa kudwa ikoko kunoti ku Sipuro.
Bakati beswika ku Salamisi, bakasumikila dama le Ndzimu mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo dze Bajuta. Bakabe bana Johani kubabhatsha mu nshingo.
Bakayenda bakapalama tjigwizi bakanoti ku Pafosi kwabakashangana ne nlume we ng'anga* wakabe eyi Bharijesu, ali Njuta wakabe ali nlebesambeli we manyepkhwa,
wakabe ali mbhatshi we nlauli we tjigwizi itjetjo unoyi Segiyo Paulo, wakabe ali nlume wakatjenjela. Wakadana Bhanabhasi na Saulo, ngobe eshaka kuhwa dama le Ndzimu.
Koga Elimasi we ng'anga (ngobe zina lile lotjenesiwa sa ikoko), kanyanyayidzana nabo eshaka pambusa nlauli mu bugalimoyo.
Koga Saulo unodang'wabo kuyi Paulo, wakati ali zhele Meya yakayengemala, kanlingisisa,
ngono kati, “Iwe nkololo we Nvanganyi, iwe tjita tje ndulamo yose. Uzhele kutjebela ne bubi, apa aungaletje kukombamisa zila dza She dzakatambunuka kene?
She banowokuloba, unowobe bhofu, ngono autowobona tjedza tje zhuba kwe tjibaka.”
Tjinyolotjo fulele ne zhalima zwikazwimba mesho awe, ngono kayenda yenda eshaka bangankweba nge luboko.
Nlauli kati ebona tjashingikala, kagalamoyo, ngobe wakabe atjenamila kwazo kudiya ngekwa She.
Ndizo Paulo ne baakabe anabo bakayenda nge gungwa kudwa mu Pafosi kunoti mu Pega, nzi umu Pamufiliya, Johani wakabasiya kabgwilila ku Jerusalema.
Bakabhuda mu Pega bakanoswika ku Antiyoki mu Pisidiya, ngono nge nsi we Sabata bakangina mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo bakagala pasi.
Shule kwe kubagwa kwe nlayo ne hwalo dze balebesambeli, balauli be ng'umba ye mitembezelo bakayisa dama kubali linoti “Zwikamu, amuna dama le gulumbidzo ku bathu mulilebe.”
Paulo kamilika, kalakidza nge luboko gugwe, ngono katangisa kulebeleka eti:
“Balume be Iziraela namwi banotja Ndzimu bhulutanani.

Ndzimu we bathu ibaba be Iziraela wakashalula bobatategulu bedu ngono ukabathama itjaba tjikulu kulu mu tjibaka tjabakabe bali gele mu shango ye Egipiti. Ndzimu wakabadusa mu Egipiti nge simba lawo gulu,
ngono mu makole angabe makumi manna wakabe ne moyonlefu nabo mu tjilambanyika.
Wakalobesa tjaba dzili kutendeka mu shango ye Kanana, ngono ukapa bathu bawo shango iyeyo se thaka.
Kose ikoku kwakatola makole ali mazana manna ana makole ali makumi mashanu (450).
“Shule kwa ikoku ukabapa basumikilisi kunoti mu tjibaka tja Samuele nlebesambeli.
Ndizo bakakumbila kupiwa she nkulu ngono Ndzimu ukabapa Saulo nkololo wa Kishi we ludzi gwa Bhenjamini, kabe she nkulu wabo makole ali makumi manna.

Shule kwe wan'dusa, Ndzimu ukabiga Dafite kube she nkulu wabo. Etji nditjo Ndzimu tjawakaleba nge kukwe uti, ‘Ndawana Dafite nkololo wa Jesi ali iye nthu upa moyo wangu, iye unowoshinga kose kuda kwangu.’
Kudwa mu ludzi gwa Dafite, Ndzimu wakathama Jesu Ntjidzi we bathu be Iziraela sekwa wakagadzabgwe.
Jesu wakati asathu kazha, Johani kasumikila ku bathu bose be Iziraela kuti bashandukile mu matjinyo abo badubikwe.
Johani kati wowidza nshingo uwe, kati ku bathu, ‘Mokumbula kuti ndiani kene? Ate ndili iye wamakalindila. Koga shule kwangu kuna unowozha wandisakalizana kusunungula mitjili ye khwebana dzidze.’
“Zwikamu, bana be nsha wa Abhurahama, na bose pakati kwenyu banotja Ndzimu, thumo ye jidzo ileli yakatumigwa kutili!

Ngobe bathu banogala mu Jerusalema ne balauli babo abazoziba kuti iye Ntjidzi, kene kuli kuhwisisa matama e balebesambeli iyawa anobagwa Sabata limwe ne limwe. Koga bakazhadzisa matama e balebesambeli nge kulasha Jesu.
Nenguba bakasheta tjabangansumikilisila lufu, bakakumbila Pilato kuti ambulaye.
Bakati bazhadzisa tjimwe ne tjimwe tjakakwagwa nge kukwe bakantulula mu nti bakanlonga mu ikumbu.
Koga Ndzimu wakammusa mu bafi,
ngono mu mazhuba manjinji wakaboneka kuna ibabo bakabe bayenda naye kudwa ku Galili kunoti ku Jerusalema. Ndibo ngwenu batendeki babe ku bathu.
Ndizo tomuzhisila ndebo mbuya kumuli inoti, Ndzimu tjawakagadzabgwe bobatategulu bedu kuti unowotjithama,
wakatjithamila iswi ngwenu, iswi bana babo, nge kumusa Jesu. Sekwa kwakakwagwa mu lukwalo gwe bubili gwe Njimbo kuyi,
‘U Nkololo wangu,
nasi ndabe tate babo.’
Oku ndiko Ndzimu kwaunoleba nge kummusa mu bafi, kuti aatjowobgwilila mu kubola uti,
‘Ndowomupa makombolelo akayengemala e malebeswa
andakagadzabgwe Dafite.’
Ndizo mu gumwe Lumbo nkwali eti,
‘Amutowoletja N'yengemali wenyu ebola.’
Nge kuti Dafite wakashinga tjakabe tjalongolosiwa nge Ndzimu mu tjibaka tjitje kafa, kabiganyiwa na bobatategulu babe, ngono kabola.
Koga iye wakamusiwa nge Ndzimu mu bafi aazobola.
Ndizo zibani zwikamu kuti ndebo ye kuzwiibhatigwa zwibi inosumikigwa kumuli ndi Jesu
kakale munli mmwe ne mmwe unogalamoyo unosunungugwa mu tjimwe ne tjimwe tjaakabe asingake kasunungugwa mutjili nge nlayo wa Mushe.
Ndizo ibeni ne njele, kuti tjakalebgwa nge balebesambeli tjisimushingikalile,
‘Bonani, imwi badadi! Kaabalani mufe!
Ngobe ndoshinga nshingo mu misi yenyu,
nshingo wamusingawogalamoyo muuli,
ha mmwe emubudza iwo!’ ”
Paulo na Bhanabhasi bakati bedwa mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo, bathu bakabakumbila kuti zwithu izwezwi bazwibudziwe kakale mu Sabata linobuya.

Bathu bakati bapalala pa nshangano, Paulo na Bhanabhasi bakatobegwa nge Bajuta banjinji nenge bathu bakasima mu bugalimoyo gwe Tjijuta. Bakalebeleka nabo bakabakulumbidza kutjilila mu ngoni dze Ndzimu.
Sabata linotobela nzi wose kuzhe kwe bathu basibangana bakazha kuhwilila dama la She.
Bajuta bakati bebona bunji gwe bathu bakabe ne ndandala, bakanyanyayidza tjakabe tjilebgwa ndi Paulo, kakale bakan'gongobola.
