Koga Paulo na Bhanabhasi bakaleba ngosimamoyo beti, “Kwakabe kwakafanila kuti dama le Ndzimu lilebgwe kumuli kutanga. Koga se makalilamba muzwibona musakafanigwa nge butjilo gusingapele, bonani tolinga kuna Bezwitjaba.
Ngobe She wakatidwa eti,
‘Ndamuthama tjedza tje Bezwitjaba,
kuti muyise jidzo ku bupelo gwe shango.’ ”
Bezwitjaba bakati behwa ikoku, bakashatha bakakudza dama le Ndzimu ngono ibabo bakashaluligwa butjilo gusingapele bakabe bagalimoyo.
Dama la She likaandama mu ntuthu wose.

Koga Bajuta bakadzonga bakadzi bakashandukila mu bugalimoyo gwe Tjijuta kakale banokudziwa kose ne balume bana mamo mu nzi bakadzonga bathu kudziyidza Paulo na Bhanabhasi, ngono bakabatata mu ntuthu wabo.
Batumwa bakashashamula hwuluba mu makumbo abo kubalamba, ngono bakayenda ku Ikoniyo.
Bagalimoyo bakazhala kushatha nenge Meya yakayengemala.
Ku Ikoniyo Paulo na Bhanabhasi bakangina mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo ye Bajuta. Ikoko bakalebeleka nge zila yakati bathu banjinji be Tjijuta ne Bezwitjaba bakagalamoyo.
Koga ibabo Bajuta bakalamba kugalamoyo bakadzonga Bezwitjaba bakathama kuti bashandukile zwikamu.
Ndizo Paulo na Bhanabhasi bakapitsha tjibaka tjilefu ikoko, belebelekela She bakasimamoyo, iye wakalakidza dama lile le ngoni nge kuthama zwilakidzo ne makaabadzo ndibo.
Bathu be nzi bakabe bakathubukana, bamwe bakama ne Bajuta bamwe ne batumwa ba Jesu.
Kwakabe kuna kulangana pakati kwe Bajuta nenge Bezwitjaba kang'ompela ne batungamili babo, kubadziyidza nenge kubakikithidza nge mabgwe.
Koga bakaziba nge kwako ndizo bakatizhila ku mizi ye Lisitira ne Debhe mu Likaoniya ne mituthu yakapoteleka ipapo.
Ikoko bakasumikila Ndebo mbuya.
Mu Lisitira, kwakabe kuna mmwe nlume wakabe ali gele pasi asingatubule shingisa makumbo awe. Wakabe azwagwa ali tjilema kakale kasitongo yenda.
Wakahwilila Paulo elebeleka. Paulo kanlingisisa, kabona kuti una kugalamoyo kupodziwa,
ngono kadanila pezhugwi, kati, “Ima nge makumbo.” Kamadzuka ngono kayenda.
Mbunga ukati ubona Paulo tjaathama, ukamimila nge lulimi gwe Tjilikaoniya uti, “Midzimu yadelukila kutili ili mu mbumbiko ye bathu!”
Bhanabhasi bakantumila beti Zeusi,* ngono Paulo bakantumila beti Hemesi,* ngobe ali iye tjilebeleki tjikulu.
Mpirisiti wa Zeusi, we ng'umba yaanonamatigwa muili iyo yakabe ili kuzhe kwe nzi, kazhisa mikono ne maluba ku mikoba ye nzi, ngobe iye ne mbunga bakabe beshaka kubabhayila zwibhayilo.
Koga kukati batumwa, Bhanabhasi na Paulo behwa ikoku, bakapalula zwiambalo zwabo, ngono bakatizhila ku mbunga bemimila beti;

“Bathu, ini muthama ikoku? Naswi ti bathu banonga imwi. Tomuzhisila ndebo mbuya, timubudza kuti shandukani mu midzimu ye manyepkhwa, mushandukile ku Ndzimu unotjila iwo wakathama kudzimu ne shango ne gungwa na kose ku muali magalo iyawa.
Mu misi yakapinda wakaletja tjaba dzose kuthama tjakabe tjibashathisa.
Koga auzozwisiya usina butendeki. Wakalakidza nzhazho nge kumupa vula kudwa kudzimu ne zwijo mu misi yazo, unogutsha mimoyo yenyu nge zojiwa ne shatho.”
Ne baleba matama iyawa zwabo bakasimigwa nge kumisa mbunga kubabhayila zwibhayilo.
Bajuta bakazha ikoko bedwa ku Antiyoki ne ku Ikoniyo, ngono bakayita kuti bathu badumane nabo. Bakakikithidza Paulo nge mabgwe, ngono bakankakatila kuzhe kwe nzi bekumbula kuti wafa.
Koga kukati shule kwe bagalimoyo bankubunganila, kamuka, ngono kabgwilila mu nzi. Tjimuka iye na Bhanabhasi bakayenda ku Debhe.
Bakati basumikila ndebo mbuya mu nzi iwoyo, bakashandula bathu banjinji kube badiyiwa. Ipapo bakabgwilila ku Lisitira ne ku Ikoniyo ne ku Antiyoki
besimisa zwilopa bagalimoyo bebakulumbidza kudwilila mu kugalamoyo, beti, “Ngodziyidziwa kanjinji towongina mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.”
Paulo na Bhanabhasi bakabashalulila bakulu* mu gubungano limwe ne limwe, ngono bakatembezela bazwinyima* zojiwa, ndizo bakalonga mu maboko a She iye wabakagalamoyo munli.
Bakayenda bakapalama Pisidiya bakangina mu Pamufiliya.
Kukati basumikila dama mu Pega bakadelukila ku Ataliya.
Kudwa mu Ataliya bakabgwilila ku Antiyoki nge gungwa, iko kwabakabe babigiwa mu ngoni dze Ndzimu ngekwe nshingo wabakabe bapedza.
Bakati beswika ikoko, bakakubunganya gubungano, ngono bakabika kose Ndzimu kwawakabe washinga ndibo nenge sekwa wakazhulila Bezwitjaba nkoba we kugalamoyo.
Ngono bakagala tjibaka tjilefu ikoko ne badiyiwa.
Bamwe balume bakazha bedwa ku Judiya, ngono bakatangisa kudiya zwikamu beti, “Amungatjidziwe ha musakathumbigwa kuyendidzana ne mpanga wa Mushe.”
Paulo na Bhanabhasi bakanyanyayidzana nabo kwazo ngekwa ikoku, ndizo kukathamwa kuti Paulo na Bhanabhasi ne bamwe bayende ku Jerusalema banobona batumwa ne bakulu* ngekwa ikoku.
Bakalongwa mu zila nge gubungano; ngono bakati bepinda ne mu Fenikiya ne Samariya, bakabika ngekwe kushandugwa kwe Bezwitjaba, ngono bakashathisa zwikamu zose kwazo.
Bakati beswika mu Jerusalema bakaamutjigwa nge gubungano ne batumwa ne bakulu, ngono bakababudza kose Ndzimu kwawakashinga ndibo.
Koga bamwe be bagalimoyo bakabe bali be bhiko le Bafarasi* bakamilika bakati, “Bezwitjaba bakafanila thumbigwa kakale babudziwe kulondolodza nlayo wa Mushe.”
Batumwa ba Jesu ne bakulu bakashangana kukanuka ndebo iyeyi.

Shule kwe kunyanyayidzana nge tjibaka tjilefu Pita kamilika, ngono kati “Zwikamu zwangu, moziba kuti Ndzimu wakandishalula mu kutangisa pakati kwenyu kusumikila ndebo mbuya kuna Bezwitjaba kuti bahwe, bagalemoyo.
Koga Ndzimu iwo unoziba moyo we nthu wakabatendekela nge kupa Meya yakayengemala koga sekwa wakathama kutili.
Auzothubukanya pakati kwedu na ibo, wakasuka mimoyo yabo nge kugalamoyo.
Ngono ngwenu ini mulika Ndzimu nge kubiga jokwi* mu mitshibha ye badiyiwa, ilo lisakatubugwa kusengwa ndi bobatategulu bedu kene ndiswi?
Koga iswi takagalamoyo kuti towotjidziwa nge ngoni dza She Jesu, koga sa ibo.”
Gubungano lose lakanyalala lihwa Bhanabhasi na Paulo beleba zwilakidzo ne matjenamiso Ndzimu zwawakashinga ndibo pakati kwe Bezwitjaba.
Bakati bepedza kulebeleka, Jakubo kalebeleka eti, “Mundibhulutane, zwikamu!
Simoni watjenesa Ndzimu sekwa wakazha muna Bezwitjaba gwe kutanga kutola bathu pakati kwabo kuti babe bawo.
Matama e balebesambeli anodumana nge buzhalo na ikoku, sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi,
‘Shule kwa ikoku ndowobuya,
ngono ndowomusa bugalo gwa Dafite igo gwakakolomoka.
Ndowomusa matongo ago,
ngono agumusa kakale,
kuti ndizo bathu bose bashake She
na bose Bezwitjaba banodang'wa nge zina langu.
Kojalo She ibo bakathama ikoku
kuti kuzibgwe kudwa ntolo.’ ”
Jakubo kadwilila eti, “Bona kwangu hwuti tisidziyidzeni Bezwitjaba banoshandukila ku Ndzimu.
Koga ngatibakwalileni, kuti basije zojiwa zwisizwibuyanana, ngobe zwakapigwa midzimu, bazwidzibe mu bupombgwe ne mu kuja phuka yabulawa ngosiniwa nenge kuja malopa.
Kudwila ntolo nlayo wa Mushe wakabe ubagwa mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo dzose, Sabata limwe ne limwe ne mahwi awe anosumikigwa mu mizi yose.”

Ndizo batumwa ne bakulu ne gubungano lose bakawana kwakalulwama kushalula balume kudwa mubali kuti babatume ku Antiyoki bana Paulo na Bhanabhasi. Bakashalula balume babili bakabe bali bakulu mu zwikamu, Judasi wakabe edang'wa Bhasabhasi na Silasi,
ngono bakatumila lukwalo ogu nabo,
“Iswi, batumwa ne bakulu be gubungano, tili zwikamu zwenyu, tomudumilisa imwi zwikamu zwedu zwe Bezwitjaba zwinogala mu Antiyoki, Siriya ne Silisiya.
Takahwa kuti bamwe balume bakadwa mutili bakamudziyidza nge matama, betjinya mikumbulo yenyu, nenguba iswi tisakabatuma.
Ndizo takawana kwakalulwama shule kwe tadumana kushalula bathu tibatuma kumuli bana badiwa bedu Bhanabhasi na Paulo,
ibo bakalonga matjilo abo mu mbhatsha ngekwe nshingo wa She wedu Jesu Kirisiti.
Ndizo tatumila Judasi na Silasi, ibo banowomubudza nge nlomo izwezwi zwithu zwatakwala.
Meya yakayengemala naswi takabona kwakafanila kuti tisibige ntolo pezhugwi kwenyu kuzhe kwe zwithu izwezwi zwakafanila:
musije zojiwa zwakapiwa midzimu, musije malopa, musije phuka yakabulawa ngosiniwa, muzwidzibe mu bupombgwe. Mowotjila zubuyanana amuzwidziba muna izwezwi. Salani zubuyanana.”
Bakati batjidusiwa bakadelukila ku Antiyoki ngono bakati bakubunganya gubungano bakayisa lukwalo.
Bathu bakati begubala bakashathisiwa nge gulumbidzo lago.
Judasi na Silasi ibo bakabe nge kwabo bali balebesambeli bakakulumbidza zwikamu nge matama manjinji bakabasimisa.
Bakati bapitsha tjibaka, bakabgwilila shule kuna bakabe babatuma, bakadusiwa nge kunyalala.
Koga Silasi kabona kwakafanila kusala ikoko.
Paulo na Bhanabhasi bakasala mu Antiyoki bediya kakale besumikila dama la She bana bamwebo banjinji.
Shule kwe mazhuba Paulo kati kuna Bhanabhasi, “Ngatibgwilile shule kukumba zwikamu zwedu mu nzi mmwe ne mmwe kwatakasumikila dama la She, tibone kuti batjani.”
Bhanabhasi wakabe eshaka kuti batole Johani wakabe edang'wa Mako bayende naye.
Koga Paulo wakabe ekumbula ha kusakalulwama kuntola, ngobe aazodwilila nabo mu nshingo wabo, koga wakashanduka kabasiya mu Pamufiliya.
Kwakabe ne kunyanyayidzana kwakasima, ngono bakathubukana. Bhanabhasi katola Mako, ngono kayenda nge gungwa ku Sipuro,
Paulo iye kashalula Silasi, ngono kayenda, ebigwa mu ngoni dza She nge zwikamu.
Wakapalama Siriya ne Silisiya, esimisa makubungano.
Paulo kayenda ku Debhe ne ku Lisitira, kwakabe kugala n'diyiwa wakabe eyi Timoti. Mme yabe bakabe na ibo bali n'galimoyo, bakabe bali Njuta, koga tate babe bakabe bali N'giriki.
Zwikamu zose mu Lisitira ne Ikoniyo zwakabe zwileba zwakanaka ngekwa Timoti.
Paulo kada kuyenda na Timoti, ndizo kantola kanthumbila. Wakathama sa ikoko, kushathisa Bajuta bakabe begala mu magalo iyawo, ngobe bakabe beziba kuti tate ba Timoti bakabe bali N'giriki.
Bakati beyenda nge mizi, bakapa bagalimoyo milayo yakabe yabigwa nge batumwa ne bakulu mu Jerusalema, bakababudza kulondolodza milayo iyeyo.
Ndizo makubungano kasimisiwa mu kugalamoyo ngono kawanda zhuba ne zhuba.
Bakapinda ne mu ntuthu we Firigiya ne Galatiya, ngobe Meya yakayengemala yakabe yabadzibisa kusumikila dama mu Ezhiya.
Bakati beswika pa n'gathu we Misiya, bakagwisa kungina mu ntuthu we Bhitiniya, koga Meya ya Jesu ikasibadumile.
Ndizo bakapinda ne mu Misiya bedelukila ku Tiroasi.
Mu busiku igogo Paulo kabona mbono, muili wakabona nthu we Makedoniya ali mile enkumbila eti, “Izha ngeno ku Makedoniya utibhatshe!”
Kwakati Paulo asino bona mbono iyeyo tikalulwamisila kuyenda ku Makedoniya, ngobe tigalamoyo kuti Ndzimu wakatidana kusumikila ndebo mbuya ku bathu ikoko.
Takayenda nge ikepe kudwa mu Tiroasi tikatambunuka nge gungwa titjulukila ku Samotiraki, tjimuka tikayenda ku Neapoli.
Kudwa ipapo takayenda ku Filipi, nzi nkulu mu ntuthu we Makedoniya kwakabe kubusa Baroma. Takapitsha mazhuba ikoko.
Nge Sabata tikabhuda mu nzi tikayenda pejo nge gwizi kwatakakumbula kuti kungabe kuna pathu panotembezelegwa. Tikagala pasi tikalebeleka ne bakadzi bakabe bakubungana ikoko.

Mmwe wa ibabo wakatihwilila wakabe ali Lidiya edwa ku Tiyatira, wakabe etengesa matyila mashaba e themba ipezhugwi. Wakabe ali nkadzi wakabe enamata Ndzimu, ngono She wakazhula nkumbulo uwe kuhwilila nge njele tjakabe tjilebgwa ndi Paulo.
Shule kwe adubikwa ne be nsha uwe, katikoka kati, “Izhani mugale mu nzi wangu ha mabona kuti ndi n'galimoyo muna She.” Ngono katitshindilidza kuyenda.

Limwe zhuba titjayenda ku bugalo gwe ntembezelo, takashanganidziwa nge tjanana tje nlandakadzi tjakabe tjina meya* mbi wakabe utjithama kuti tjilebe zwimbeli. Tjakabe tjiwanila botetshi batjo mari manjinji ngoleba zwinozha.
Katobelela Paulo naswi, emimila eti, “Balume ibaba balanda be Ndzimu upezhugwi zhugwi! Banomubudza zila ye jidzo!”
Wakathama ikoku mazhuba manjinji, kudzina Paulo esilingika, katendebuka, ngono kati ku meya, “Nge zina la Jesu Kirisiti, ndokulaya kubhuda munli!” Meya ukabhuda munli nge tjibaka itjetjo.
Botetshi babe bakati bebona kuti kuthama mari ndiye akutjipo, bakabhata Paulo na Silasi bakabakwebela ku basumikilisi ku lubazhe.
Bakabayisa mbeli kwe basumikilisi bakulu be Roma, ngono bakati, “Balume ibaba Bajuta, ngono banodzonga nzi wedu nkulu.
Banodiya mipanga inonyanyayidzana ne milayo yedu; iswi Baroma, atingaamutjile mipanga iyeyi nenguba kuli kuishingisa.”
Ngono mbunga ukama nabo mu kuthasela Paulo na Silasi.
Basumikilisi bakulu be Roma bakapalula hazu dza Paulo na Silasi bakalaya kuti balobgwe.
Shule kwe kulobgwa kwakabipa, bakalongwa mu ng'umba ye busungwa, ngono nlindi we ng'umba ye busungwa kalayiwa kuti ailise nge njele.
Nlindi we ng'umba ye busungwa kati aamutjila ndayo iyeyi, kabalonga mu ng'umba i tje mukati kasungilila makumbo abo pakati kwe mapango anolema.
Koga pakati kwe busiku Paulo na Silasi bakabe betembezela bembila Ndzimu njimbo, ngono basungwa bamwe bakabahwilila.
Tjinyolotjo kukabe ne kutengenyeka kwe shango kukulu, kwakazunguza ng'umba ye busungwa nenge thiwa dzayo. Kang'ompela mikoba yose ikazhuka, ketani dzikasununguka mu basungwa bose.
Nlindi we ng'umba ye busungwa kamuka, ngono kati ebona mikoba ye ng'umba ye busungwa yakazhuka, kakumbula kuti basungwa batizha, ndizo kashomola bukanu gugwe, eti unozwibulaya.
Koga Paulo kamilidza hwi kati, “Usizwikubadze! Tiyapo tose!”
Nlindi kadana kuti kuzhisiwe mavone, kalabukila mukati, kawila pa makumbo a Paulo na Silasi etetema etja.
Ipapo kabadusila kuzhe, ngono kakumbila eti, “Botate, ndakafanila thamani kuti nditjidziwe?”
Bakadabila beti, “Galamoyo muna She Jesu, ndizo unowotjidziwa, iwe ne nsha uwo.”
Ipapo bakasumikila dama la She kunli ne ku bamwe bose mu ng'umba iye.
Nge tjibaka itjetjo tje busiku nlisi we ng'umba ye busungwa kabatola kangudza mabanga abo; ngono iye ne be nsha uwe bose bakadubikwa tjinyolotjo.
Ipapo katola Paulo na Silasi kabayisa ku ng'umba iye ngono kabapa zojiwa kuti baje. Iye ne be nsha uwe bakazhala kushatha, ngobe agalamoyo mu Ndzimu.
Koga tjimuka mangwanana basumikilisi bakulu be Roma bakatuma maphorisa abo nge ndayo inoti, “Letjani balume ibabo bayende.”
Ndizo Nlindi we ng'umba ye busungwa kabudza Paulo kati, “Basumikilisi bakulu be Roma bazhisa ndayo nge kuko na Silasi kuti musunungugwe. Mungayenda zwenyu ndizo bhudani muyende, nge kunyalala.”

Koga Paulo kati kubali, “Bakatiloba mmwe ne mmwe akalinga koga tisawang'wa nlandu nenguba tili Baroma kakale bakatilashila mu ng'umba ye busungwa. Apa ngwenu banotidusa nge kwakasumbikala kene? Aa, ngabazhe tje kwabo batiduse.”
Maphorisa akaleba matama iyawa ku basumikilisi bakulu be Roma; ngono bakati behwa kuti Paulo na Silasi Baroma, bakatja.
Ndizo bakayenda bakabakumbila mazwiibhatigo; ipapo bakabadusa mu ng'umba ye busungwa bakabakumbila kuti babhude mu nzi.
Paulo na Silasi bakabhuda mu ng'umba ye busungwa bakakumba Lidiya. Bakashangana ne zwikamu bakabapa matama e gulumbidzo ngono kudwapo bakayenda.
Paulo na Silasi bakayenda bakapinda ne mu Amfipoli ne Apoloniya bakaswika ku Tesalonika, iko kwakabe kuna ng'umba ye mitembezelo ye Bajuta.
Se wolobela kukwe Paulo kayenda ku ng'umba ye mitembezelo. Kagala tshipi thatu enyanyayidzana nabo ngekwe hwalo, ebala
etjenesa Hwalo dze Ndzimu elakidza mudzili kuti Mesiya wakabe akafanila kudziyila ne kumuka mu bafi. Paulo kati, “Jesu iwoyu wandinoleba nge kukwe kumuli ndiye Mesiya.”
Bamwe babo bakahwisisa, ndizo bakama na Paulo na Silasi; ne bafumakadzi bana mamo banjinji ne Bagiriki banjinji bakabe benamata Ndzimu.

Koga Bajuta bakabe ne ndandala, ngono bakakubunganya bamwe bathu basibe tjimwe mu dzizila bakabumba mbunga. Bakadzonga nzi wose, ngono bakangina mu nzi we nlume wakabe edang'wa Jasoni, beti banowowana Paulo na Silasi kuti babazhise ku bathu.
Koga bakati babasheta, bakazuzuta Jasoni ne zwimwe zwikamu bakabayisa mbeli kwe babusi be nzi bemimila beti, “Ibaba balume bakadzonga pamwe ne pamwe! Ngwenu batjizhabo ngeno,
ngono Jasoni wakabagadza mu ng'umba iye. Bose banotjuluka milayo ya Kaisara, beti kuna mmwe she nkulu, unoyi Jesu.”
Bathu ne balauli be nzi bakadzongeka ha behwa ikoku.
Balauli bakalipisa Jasoni na ibabo bamwe, themba ye mari inoshakika kuti basunungugwe, ndizo bakabaletja bakayenda.
Kukati kube busiku, zwikamu zwikanyelusila Paulo na Silasi ku Bhereya. Bakati beswika bakayenda ku ng'umba ye mitembezelo ye Tjijuta.

Bathu baikoko bakabe bakashaladuka kupinda Batesalonika. Bakaamutjila dama nge mazwihwo abo wose, ngono mazhuba wose bakabe belingisisa mu Hwalo dze Ndzimu kubona kene tjadiyiwa ndi Paulo tjili malebeswa.
Bunji mubali bakagalamoyo; ne bakadzi be Tjigiriki banjinji bana mamo ne balume banjinji be Tjigiriki na ibo bakagalamoyo.
Koga Bajuta mu Tesalonika bakati behwa kuti Paulo wakasumikilabo dama le Ndzimu mu Bhereya, bakazha ikoko bakatangisa kudzonga bathu.
Tjinyolotjo zwikamu zwikadusa Paulo kayenda ku gungwa; koga Silasi na Timoti bakasala mu Bhereya.
Balume bakabe bepelekedza Paulo bakayenda naye kunoti mu Atene ipapo bakashandukila ku Bhereya ne ndayilo inodwa muna Paulo kuti Silasi na Timoti bantobele tjinyolotjo.
Paulo kati atjakamilila Silasi na Timoti mu Atene meya iye ikakodzongeka mukati kukwe ha ebona nzi sekwa uli zhele midzimu.
Ndizo kalebesana ne Bajuta ne Bezwitjaba banonamata Ndzimu mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo ne mu lubazhe mazhuba wose elebeleka ne bathu banopinda zwabo.
Badiyi bamwe be zwidiyo zwe Tjiepikuri* ne be zwidiyo zwe Tjisitoiki* bakanyanyayidzana naye. Bamwe babo bakabhuzwa beti, “Nlebanyi iwoyu katini?”
Bamwe bakadabila beti, “Unonga unoleba ngekwe midzimu ipoga.” Bakaleba ikoku, ngobe Paulo wakabe esumikila ngekwa Jesu nenge kumuka mu bafi.
Ndizo bakatola Paulo bakanzhisa pa lubazhe gwe nzi iwoyo gunoyi Areopago,* ngono bakati, “Toshaka kuziba kudiya ikoku kutshwa kwaunoleba nge kwako.
Zwithu zwatinohwa uzwileba zwitshwa mutili, ngono toshaka kuziba kuti zodwani.”
Bathu bose be Atene ne bataya bakabe begala ikoko bakapitsha tjibaka tjabo beleba kene behwilila tjimwe tjitshwa.
Paulo kama pakati kwe lubazhe gwe Areopago kati, “Ndobona kuti mu zila dzose imwi Baatene mu banamati.

Ngobe ndati ndipalama nzi wenyu ndilinga magalo amunonamata, ndawana tjibeso tjakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Ku Ndzimu usingazibgwe.’ Itjetjo tjamunonamata, nenguba musingatjizibe, nditjo tjandinoleba kumuli nge kwatjo ngwenu.
Ndzimu iwo wakathama shango ne tjimwe ne tjimwe tjimuili, ndi She we kudzimu ne shango, ngono autogala mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo dzakathamwa nge nthu,
kene kuli kushaka tjimwe tjatingaunamata nge kuushingila, se uli iwo unopa butjilo ne meya inofemiwa ne tjimwe ne tjimwe ku mmwe ne mmwe.
Wakathama zwitjaba zose kudwa mu nthu nng'ompela kuti bagale mu shango yose. Iwo nge kwawo wakabiga kale misi ne migathu ye magalo kwabanowogala.
Wakathama ikoku kuti ndizo baushake, kuti pamwe bangaambamba bakauwana. Nenguba Ndzimu usi kule kule ne mmwe ne mmwe wedu ngoti;
‘Muuli totjila tikayenda tikabepo.’
Koga sekwa kalebgwa nge batetembeli bamwe benyu beti, ‘Nge malebeswa ti bana bawo.’
Se tili bana be Ndzimu, tisikumbule kuti mbumbiko yawo inonga ye tjifano tjakathamwa nge golide kene siliva kene bgwe, tjithamwa nge bunyambi ne njalakang'wa dze nthu.
Misi ye kusaziba Ndzimu wakailinga ukaitjuludza mesho, koga ngwenu unolaya bose kumwe ne kumwe kuti bashandukile matjinyo abo.
Ngobe wakabiga zhuba launowosumikilisa shango yose nge ndulamo nge nlume wawakashalula. Wakalakidza malebeswa a ikoku ku mmwe ne mmwe nge kumusa nlume iwoyo mu bafi!”
Bakati behwa Paulo eleba ngekwe kumusiwa kwe bafi, bamwe babo bakanseka mahanya, koga bamwe bakati, “Toshaka kukuhwa ulebeleka ngekwa ikoku kakale.”
Ndizo Paulo kadwa mubali.
Koga bamwe balume bakabhatana naye, ngono bakagalamoyo, pakati kwabo kwakabe kuna Diyonisiyo we N'areopago;* ne mmwe nkadzi edang'wa Damarisi ne bamwe.
Shule kwa ikoku, Paulo kabhuda mu Atene, ngono kayenda ku Korinta.

Ikoko kashangana ne Njuta unodang'wa kuyi Akhwila wakabe ezwagwa ku Ponto. Wakabe atjamboswika edwa ku Italiya ne nkadzi uwe Purisila, ngobe Kilaudiyo wakabe adwa Bajuta bose kuti babhude mu Roma. Paulo wakayenda kunobabona,
ngobe wakabe ali nthumi we dzitente sa ibo, wakagala kashinga nabo.
Sabata limwe ne limwe wakalebeleka mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo, egwisa kugadzamoyo Bajuta ne Bagiriki.
Kukati Silasi na Timoti bezha bedwa ku Makedoniya, Paulo wakabe akasimisila esumikila, epa butendeki ku Bajuta kuti Mesiya ndi Jesu.

Koga Bajuta bakati benyanyayidza Paulo ben'gongobola, kashashamula zwiambalo zwizwe kulakidza kusadumana nabo, ngono kati kubali, “Butjilo gwenyu ngagube mu maboko enyu! Imi andina nlandu. Kudwa ngwenu ndowoyenda kuna Bezwitjaba.”
Paulo kadwa ipapo kayenda ku nzi we nlume unodang'wa Tito Jusito nnamati we Ndzimu. Nzi uwe wakabe uli pejo ne ng'umba ye mitembezelo.
Kirisipo, ntungamili we ng'umba ye mitembezelo wakagalamoyo muna She kose ne nsha uwe ngono Bakorinta banjinji bakati behwa Paulo bakagalamoyo.
Gumwe busiku She kalebeleka na Paulo mu mbono eti, “Usitje koga lebeleka, usinyalale.
Ngobe ndinawe, ngono akuna unowokumukila kakukubadza, ngobe ndina bathu banjinji mu nzi iwoyu nkulu.”
Ndizo Paulo kagala ikoko gole lina gaswa ebadiya dama le Ndzimu.
Galiyo kati ali nlauli we Akaiya, Bajuta bakashangana bakamukila Paulo, ngono bakanzhisa ku lubazhe.
Bakati, “Nlume iwoyu unotshindilidza bathu kunamata Ndzimu nge zila dzisingayendidzane nge nlayo.”
Koga kukati Paulo ali pejo ngolebeleka, Galiyo kati ku Bajuta, “Ikoku ha kwabe kuli ngekwe tjakabipa kene nlandu nkulu, kwabe kungahwika kuti ndimuhwilile Bajuta.”
Ngono se kuli ngekwe matama ne mazina nenge nlayo wenyu, pedzani ndebo imwi. Ndolamba kube nsumikilisi we zwithu zwakajali.
Ndizo kabatata mu lubazhe.
Ipapo bose bakashandukila Sositenesi ntungamili we ng'umba ye mitembezelo bakanloba mbeli kwe lubazhe. Koga Galiyo kasibe ne hanya.
Shule kwa ikoko Paulo kagala ikoko mazhuba manjinji. Ipapo kasiya zwikamu kayenda ku Siriya nge gungwa ana Purisila na Akhwila. Wakatesela mavudzi ku Kenikiriya, ngobe wakabe atuna.
Bakaswika ku Efeso Paulo kwaakasiya Purisila na Akhwila. Iye nge kukwe kangina mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo, ngono kalebeleka ne Bajuta.
Bakati benkumbila kuti agale nabo tjibakana kalamba.
Koga wakati eyenda, kagadzabgwe kati, “Ndowobuya akuli kuda kwe Ndzimu.” Ipapo kayenda nge gungwa kudwa ku Efeso.
Kati edeluka ku Sizariya, kanodumilisa gubungano kudwapo kadelukila ku Antiyoki.
Kukati Paulo agala tjibaka tjilefu mu Antiyoki, kamilika kudwa ipapo, ngono kayenda edwa mu bugalo gumwe engina mu gumwe mu ntuthu wose we Galatiya ne Firigiya esimisa badiyiwa bose.
Ipapo, Njuta unodang'wa Apolosi n'gali we Alekizanda, kazha ku Efeso. Wakabe ali nlume wakadiyika ana zibo hwulu ye hwalo.
Wakabe adiyiwa mu zila ya She, ngono kalebeleka akalonga meya ediya zubuyanana ngekwa Jesu nenguba akabe eziba kudubika kwa Johani koga.
Wakatangisa kulebeleka mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo akasimamoyo. Kukati Purisila na Akhwila benhwa, bakantola ngono bakantjenesela zila ye Ndzimu zubuyanana.
Apolosi kati eshako yenda ku Akaiya, zwikamu zwikankulumbidza zwikakwalila badiyiwa ikoko kun'amutjila. Kati eswika, kabe ne bhatsho hwulu kuna ibabo bakabe bakagalamoyo nge ngoni dze Ndzimu.
Wakanyanyayidza Bajuta kwakabangalala elebeleka mbeli kwe bathu, elakidza mu hwalo dze Ndzimu kuti Mesiya ndi Jesu.
Apolosi kati atjimu Korinta, Paulo kayenda ali tje mukati kwe ntuthu, ngono kaswika mu Efeso. Ikoku kawana bamwe badiyiwa,
ngono kababhuzwa kati, “Apa makaamutjila Meya yakayengemala pamakabe bagalimoyo kene?”
Bakadabila beti, “Aa, atithu tikahwa na iko kuti kuna Meya yakayengemala.”
Paulo kabhuzwa kati, “Ngono makaamutjila kudubikwa kwakatini?”
Bakadabila beti, “Kudubikwa kwa Johani.”
Paulo kati, “Kudubika kwa Johani kwakabe kuli kwe kushandukila matjinyo; ngono wakabudza bathu kugalamoyo muna iye wakabe ewozha shule kukwe, iye Jesu.”
Bakati behwa ikoku, bakadubikwa nge zina la She Jesu.
Paulo kabiga maboko awe pezhugwi kwabo, ngono Meya yakayengemala ikadelukila mubali; bakalebeleka nge ndimi kakale bakalebabo dama le Ndzimu.
Bose bakabe bangabe balume bali gumi lina babili.
Paulo kangina mu ng'umba ye mitembezelo, ngono mu mimwedzi ili mitatu kalebeleka ngosimamoyo ne bathu, elebeleka nabo egwisa kubagadzamoyo mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.

Koga kwakabe kuti bamwe bakakukutala, bakasigalemoyo, bakaleba zwakabipa ngekwe Zila ya She mbeli kwe gubungano. Ndizo Paulo kabasiya, katola ibabo bakabe begalamoyo, ngono mazhuba wose elebeleka mu ng'umba ye zwidiyo ya Tirano kudwa mu lubaka gwe gumi lina ling'ompela.
Ikoku kukadwilila makole mabili, ndizo bathu bose bakabe begala mu ntuthu we Ezhiya, Bajuta ne Bezwitjaba bakahwa dama la She.
Ndzimu wakabe ushinga ndi Paulo makaabadzo asakawolobegwa.
Tukwana ne khiba dzaakashingisa dzakabe dziyisiwa ku bagwele, ngono magwele abo ebhuda mubali ne meya yakabipa ibhuda mubali.
Bamwe Bajuta bakabe beyenda bedusa meya yakabipa bakagwisa kushingisa zina la She Jesu kuthama ikoku. Bakati ku meya yakabipa, “Ndokulaya nge zina la Jesu, iye Paulo waanosumikila.”
Bakololo bali kutendeka ba Sikeva Ntungamili we Bapirisiti we Tjijuta bakabe bethama ikoku.
Koga meya mbi ikati kubali, “Jesu ndonziba, na Paulo ndonziba koga imwi, muboani?”
Nlume iwoyo wakabe ana meya mbi kabatjulukila kagwanabo kabakulila nge masimba. Bakatizha bakabhuda mu ng'umba iye basakasungila kakale bana mbonje.
Ikoku kukazibgwa nge bagali bose be Efeso ne Bajuta kose ne Bezwitjaba bakazhala kutja, ngono zina la She Jesu likakudziwa.
Bunji gwa ibabo bakabe batjibe bagalimoyo bakazha, bezwileba matjinyo abo kakale bedusila patjena mishingo yabo mibi yabakabe bethama.

Bunji gwa ibabo bakabe beshingisa malipa bakakubunganya hwalo dzabo, ngono bakadzipisa mbeli kwe bathu. Bakashanganya themba ye hwalo idzedzo, ngono yose yakabe zwiwulu zwili makumi mashanu (50 000) e maloso e siliva.
Dama la She likakula likawanda nge masimba.
Shule kwe zwithu izwezwi zwashingikala, Paulo kakumbula kuyenda epalama Makedoniya ne Akaiya eyenda ku Jerusalema, eti, “Kudwa ikoko ndakafanila kuyenda ku Roma.”
Ndizo katuma Timoti na Erasito, babili be babhatshi babe mu Makedoniya iye esala kwe tjibakana mu Ezhiya.
Kwakabe kuna kudzongeka kukulu mu Efeso mu tjibaka itjetjo ngekwe Zila ya She.
Mmwe nthuli we siliva wakabe eyi Demetiriyo wakabe ethama zwifano zwe siliva zwe ng'umba ye ndzimukadzi Aritemisi,* ngono nshingo uwe wakabe ubuzila bashingi kwazo.
Ndizo kabadana bose ne bamwe bakabe bana nshingo unoyendidzana ne wabo, kati kubali, “Balume, moziba kuti fumwa yedu inodwa mu nshingo iwoyu.

Ngwenu, mobona mukazwihwigwa tjinoshingwa nge nthu iwoyu Paulo. Kati midzimu yakabezhiwa nge bathu ate ili midzimu dumbu, ndizo wakatubula kugadzamoyo bathu banjinji kabatungamilila ntome kose muno mu Efeso ne mu ntuthu wose we Ezhiya.

Ndizo kuna mbhatsha dze kuti nshingo wedu iwoyu ube ne zina lakabipa. Ate ikoku koga, kuna mbatshabo dze kuti ng'umba ye ndzimukadzi nkulu Aritemisi inowolengudzika nge kuti unowodelusiwa mu bukulu gwawo, ndzimukadzi unonamatiwa nge mmwe ne mmwe mu Ezhiya ne mu shango yose!”
Bakati behwa matama iyawa, bakazhala bushongola bakatangisa kumimila beti, “Nkulu Aritemisi we Baefeso!”
Zhoba ikayenda nge nzi wose. Mbunga wose ukalabuka ukangina mu ng'umba ye mizano ukazuzuta Gayo na Arisitako be Makedoniya ibo bakabe beyenda na Paulo mu njendo dzidze.
Paulo nge kukwe wakabe eshaka kungina pakati kwe mbunga, koga badiyiwa bakasin'dumile.
Bamwe be babusi be Ezhiya, bakabe bali bazwalani babe, bakayisa thumo kunli benkumbila kuti asitongo zwilakidza mu ng'umba ye mizano.
Mu tjibaka itjetjo gubungano lose lakabe lili mu phipiti, bamwe bathu bakabe bemimila beleba tjabanoleba, bamwe bemimila beleba tjipoga, ngono bunji gwabo gwakabe gusingazibe kuti bakubunganilani.

Bamwe be bathu ipapo bakatola kuti Alekizanda wakabe ali iye u nlandu, se Bajuta bakanthama kuti ayende mbeli. Ipapo Alekizanda kalakidza nge luboko kuti bathu banyalale, ngono kagwisa kulebeleka ezwimila.
Koga bakati beziba kuti Njuta, bakamimila bose beleba tjithu tjing'ompela mu awara mbili beti, “Aritemisi we Efeso ndiye nkulu!”

Ku bupelo nkwalili we nzi katubula kudzikamisa mbunga. Kati, “Bakanyi kwedu Baefeso! Mmwe ne mmwe unoziba kuti nzi we Efeso nlondolodzi we ng'umba ya Aritemisi nkulu nenge bgwe lakayengemala lakawa lidwa kudzimu.
Aapo ungalandula zwithu izwezwi. Ndizo makafanila dzikama, musithame tjimwe nge phupu.
Mazhisa balume ibaba ngeno nenguba basatolela ng'umba dze midzimu yedu kene kuli kuleba tjakabipa ngekwe ndzimukadzi wedu.
Ha Demetiriyo ne bashingi babe bana nlandu wabanopa mmwe, mabazhe akazhuka ne balauli bayapo ndizo ngabatjetane.
Koga ha kuna tjimwe kakale tjamunoshaka, pana itjetji tjowolulwamisiwa mu gubungano le babaki bamuno kuyendidzana nge nlayo.
Ngobe ngekwe tjashingikala nasi, kuna mbatsha dze kuti tingatjetegwa phipiti. Akuna dama latingaleba labanga zhoba iyeyi.”
Kati aleba ikoku kapaladza nshangano.
Shule kwe zhoba yapela, Paulo kadana badiyiwa ngono kabawoneka nge matama ano kulumbidza. Ipapo kamilika kayenda ku Makedoniya.
Kapalama mituthu iyeyo, ngono kakulumbidza bathu nge matama manjinji. Ipapo kaswika ku Giriki.
Kapitsha mwedzi ili mitatu ikoko. Kukati Bajuta belangana nge kukwe, iye kabe abe pejo nge kuyenda nge ikepe ku Siriya akazwimisila kupinda nge Makedoniya.
Sopata we Bhereya ali nkololo wa Piro, kayenda naye; na Arisitako na Sekundo bedwa ku Tesalonika; na Gayo, edwa ku Debhe; Tikikasi na Tirofimo, bedwa ku ntuthu we Ezhiya na Timoti.
Bakayendila mbeli bakanotimilila mu Tiroasi.
Takayenda nge gungwa kudwa mu Filipi shule kwe Nshingo we tjiwunga tjisina mbidzo, ngono shule kwe mazhuba mashanu tikabhatana nabo mu Tiroasi, iko kwatakapitsha mazhuba ali kutendeka.
Ngono nge zhuba le kutanga mu tshipi madekwana tikakubunganila kukobana zojiwa. Paulo kalebeleka nge bathu ngono kadwilila kuswikila pakati kwe busiku, se akabe emuka eyenda.
Mavone manjinji akabe ethuta mu ng'umba ipezhugwi kwatakabe tashanganila.

Mmwe nzhuzha wakabe edang'wa Yutiko wakabe ali gele pa fesitere katshumwayila, shule kabhakhwa nge hwope Paulo atjakadwilila ngolebeleka nge bulefu, kakuligwa nge hwope ngono kawila pasi edwa ku ng'umba ye butatu pezhugwi. Bakati bennunga, kabe afa.
Koga Paulo kadeluka kakotama ngono kan'gumbatila. Kati, “Musidziyidzike unotjila!”
Paulo kati abgwilila pezhugwi, kapemula tjiwunga kaja, ngono kalebeleka nabo tjibaka tjilefu kudzina zhuba libhuda, ndizo kayenda.
Bakayenda ne nzhuzha kanyi etjila, ngono bakanyaladzika kwazo.
Takayendila mbeli ku ikepe ngono tikayenda nge gungwa ku Asosi, kwatakabe tinotathisa Paulo. Wakabe alongolosa sa ikoko, ngobe iye nge kukwe wakabe akazwimisila kuyenda nge makumbo.
Kati eshangana naswi mu Asosi tikantathisa ngono tikayenda ku Mitilene.
Tikayenda nge gungwa kudwa ipapo, ngono tikaswika kwakalingisana ne Kiyosi tjimuka. Shule kwe zhuba ling'ompela tikaswika ku Samosi, ngono tjimuka tikaswika ku Mileto.

Paulo wakabe akumbula kuyenda nge gungwa epinda nge mu Efeso, kuti asilashe tjibaka mu ntuthu we Ezhiya ngoti wakabe elibilidzila kube yapo mu Jerusalema nge zhuba le Pentekosite, ha kwakabe kutubuka.
Kudwa mu Mileto Paulo kayisa thumo ku Efeso, kudana bakulu be gubungano kuti bazhe kunli.
Bakati baswika kati kubali, “Imwi nge kwenyu moziba sekwa ndakatjila pakati kwenyu kudwa mu zhuba le kutanga nditshamba mu Ezhiya.
Ndakashingila She nge kuzwiyisa pasi kose nenge mishodzi nenge ndiko dzakazha kundili nge milangano ye Bajuta.
Moziba kuti akuna tjandakasumbika tjakabe tjina bhatsho mumuli se ndakabe ndisumikila ndidiya patjena ne kudwa mu ng'umba ndiyenda kuyimwe.
Ndakalebeleka ne Bajuta ne Bezwitjaba ngekwe kushandukila ku Ndzimu nenge kugalamoyo muna She wedu Jesu.
Ngono ngwenu, mu kuhwa Meya, ndoyenda ku Jerusalema, ndisingazibe tjinowonondishingikalalila ikoko,
kuzhe kwe kuti Meya yakayengemala inolebeleka nami kuti mu nzi mmwe ne mmwe busungwa nenge kudziyidziwa zwakandilinda.
Koga anditotola butjilo gwangu guna themba kene gudika kundili, ndoshaka koga kuwidza thumo yangu ne kupedza nshingo She Jesu wabakandipa kuushinga. Iwo, kuleba ndebo mbuya ngekwe ngoni dze Ndzimu.
“Bonani ndoziba kuti imwi mose bandakayenda pakati kwenyu ndisumikila ngekwe bushe gwe Ndzimu amutjowobona tjiso tjangu.
Ndizo ndomubudza ndisimisa mu zhuba lino nditi, ha mmwe wenyu angalashika, andina nlandu.
Ngobe andizotongo sumbika kumubudza ngekwe kuda kose kwe Ndzimu.
Ndizo muzwilise, mulise pkhwizi dzose dzamakalisisiwa nge Meya yakayengemala, kutjengeta gubungano le Ndzimu, lawakathama nge malopa e Nkololo wawo.
Ndoziba kuti shule kwe ndayenda, phele dzinotjisa dzowozha pakati kwenyu, ngono adzitowotjidza pkhwizi.
Tjibaka tjowozha tjinowoti balume bamwe banodwa mumuli bakaleba manyepkhwa kupambusila bagalimoyo kubali.
Ndizo, ibeni nge njele, mualakane kuti mu makole matatu, andizoletja kutjemela siku ne sikati mmwe ne mmwe wenyu ndilila.
“Ngono ngwenu ndomuyisa mu kutjengeta kwe Ndzimu ne mu dama le ngoni dzawo, ilo linotubula kumubumba likamupa thaka Ndzimu yaunayo kupa bayengemadziwa bawo.
Andizotongo yemula siliva kene golide kene zwiambalo zwemmwe.
Imwi nge kwenyu moziba kuti ndakashinga ndi iyawa maboko angu kuwana tjimwe ne tjimwe tjakabe tjishakwa nge bakhwinya bangu kose nami.
Ndakamulakidza mu zwithu zose kuti ngoshinga kwazo mu zila iyeyi takafanilo bhatsha basakasima tikumbula matama akalegwa ndi She Jesu eti, ‘Kupa kwakakombolegwa pana kupiwa!’ ”
Paulo kati epedza, kathigama pasi katembezela nabo bose.
Bakalila bose ben'gumbatila bemputa.
Bakabe bali mu buyendasi kwazo, ngobe wakabe ati abatjowombona kakale. Ndizo bakampeleka ku ikepe.
Tikati tathubukana nabo, tikayenda nge gungwa takatambunukila ku Kosi, tjimuka tikanoti ku Rodesi, kudwa ipapo tikayenda ku Patara.
Takawana ikepe tjitjulukila ku Fenikiya tikatatha ngono tikayenda nge gungwa.
Tikapinda nzi we Sipuro tili ku burwa tiwubonela kujana ngono tikadwilila tiyenda nge gungwa ku Siriya. Takadeluka ku Tire ikepe tjedu kwatjakabe tjakafanilo tula thundu yatjoko.
Tikati tiwana badiyiwa ikoko, tikagala nabo mazhuba ali kutendeka. Nge Meya, bakakumbila Paulo kuti asipindile ku Jerusalema.
Koga kukati mazhuba edu ikoko awila, tikadwilila mu zila yedu. Bagalimoyo bose ne bakadzi babo ne bana babo bakatidusa mu nzi, ngono ipapo mu phili dze gungwa tikatembezela tikawonekana.
Kudwapo tikatatha ikepe, ngono ibo bakabgwilila kanyi.
Takati tawidza gwendo gwedu kudwa ku Tire tikaswika ku Pitolemeo ngono takadumilisa zwikamu tikagala nabo zhuba ling'ompela.
Takapinda tjimuka tikanoti ku Sizariya ngono tikaswika ku ng'umba ya Filipo nsumikili mmwe we bali kutendeka tikagala naye.
Wakabe ana bakololokadzi bali banna basakalobogwa bakabe belebesambeli.
Tikati tagala ikoko mazhuba mashomanana, nlebesambeli unodang'wa Agabho kaswika edwa ku Judiya.

Kazha kutili, ngono katola mmwandabula wa Paulo kazwisunga ndiwo maboko ne makumbo, ngono kati, “Meya yakayengemala ikati, ‘Nge zila iyeyi Bajuta be Jerusalema banowosunga mweni we mmwandabula iwoyu, ngono banowompa Bezwitjaba.’ ”
Tikati tihwa ikoku, iswi ne bathu bakabe bali ipapo tikakumbila Paulo kuti asiyende ku Jerusalema.
Ipapo Paulo kadabila eti, “Apa ini mulila muhwisa moyo wangu zogwadza kene? Andizozwilulwamisila kusungwa koga, koga ne kufila ku Jerusalema ndakaguzwilulwamisila ndifila zina la She Jesu.”
Kukati Paulo asingadumane naswi tikatoboka ngono tikati, “Kuda kwa She ngakuyitiwe.”
Shule kwe mazhuba iyawa takazwilulwamisa, ngono tikatathila ku Jerusalema.
Bamwe batobeli be ku Sizariya bakayenda naswi bakatiyisa ku nzi wa Munasoni kwatakabe takafanila gala. Wakabe ali nlume unodwa ku Sipuro kakale ali mmwe we badiyiwa be kutanga.
Takati tiswika ku Jerusalema, zwikamu zwikatiamutjila zubuyanana.
Tjimuka, Paulo kayenda naswi kunobona Jakubo, ngono bakulu bose bakabe bali yapo.
Paulo kabadumilisa, ngono kabika nge buzhalo kuti Ndzimu wakathamani pakati kwe Bezwitjaba nge kuushingila kukwe.
Bakati behwa ikoku, bakakudza Ndzimu. Ipapo bakati kuna Paulo, “Ikamu* Paulo unobona kuti zwiwulu zwingapani zwe bathu pakati kwe Bajuta zwagalamoyo? Ngono bose bakatukutilila kulondolodza nlayo.
Bakabudziwa nge kuko kuti unodiya Bajuta bose banogala ne Bezwitjaba kufupatila Mushe, ubabudza kuti basithumbile bana babo kene kulondolodza tjilenje.
Towothamani? Nge malebeswa banowohwa kuti wazha,
ndizo shinga tjatinokubudza. Tina balume banna bakatuna.

Tola balume ibaba uzwitjenapadze kang'ompela nabo ulipe tjinyikilo dzabo kuti misholo yabo itesegwe. Ipapo mmwe ne mmwe unowoziba kuti akuna malebeswa mu ndebo dzinolebgwa nge kuko ne kuti iwe unotjilila mu kuhwa nlayo.

Koga ngekwe Bezwitjaba bakabe bagalimoyo takabatumila lukwalo tibabudza kuti takalebeleka tikapedza titi basitongo ja zojiwa zwakapiwa midzimu kene malopa kene phuka yakasiniwa nenge kuti bazwidzibe mu bupombgwe.”

Tjimuka Paulo katola balume ibabo ngono kazwitjenapadza nabo. Ipapo kayenda ku Ng'umba ye Ndzimu kupa zibiso ye kuti mazhuba ekutjenapadziwa anowowila lini nenge kuti tjibhayilo tjithamigwe mmwe ne mmwe wabo.
Kukati mazhuba ali kutendeka abe pejo ngopela, bamwe Bajuta banodwa ku Ezhiya bakabe babona Paulo ku Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, bakadzonga mbunga wose, kakale bakambhata

bemimila beti, “Balume be Iziraela, mutibhatshe! Oyu ndiye nlume unodiyila bathu bose ntome ngekwe bathu bedu ne nlayo wedu nenge bugalo igogu. Pezhugwi kwa ikoko, wakazhisa Bagiriki kabalonga mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono bakatemapadza bugalo igogu gwakayengemala.”
Bakabe batongo bona Tirofimo N'efeso ali mu nzi ana Paulo, ngono bakaalakana kuti Paulo wakabe anzhisa ku Ng'umba ye Ndzimu.
Nzi nkulu wose ukadzongeka, ngono bathu bakazha bose bakalabuka. Bakabhata Paulo ngono bakankakatila kuzhe kwe Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ngono tjinyolotjo mikoba ikazhaligwa.
Bakati batjagwisa kumbulaya, matama ekuti nzi wose we Jerusalema wapanduka kaswika ku Nkulu we babhayani be Roma.
Tjinyolotjo katola babhayani ne balauli be babhayani bali zana ngono bakalabukila ku mbunga. Kukati bapanduki bebona Nkulu ne babhayani bakamisa kuloba Paulo.
Nkulu we babhayani kazha kansunga, ngono kati asungwe nge ketani mbili. Ipapo kabhuzwa kuti ndiani nenge kuti watjinyani.
Bamwe mu mbunga bakamimila beleba tjimwe, koga bamwe belebabo tjipoga, ngono Nkulu we babhayani kasitubule kuhwa malebeswa nge zhoba, kalaya kuti Paulo ayisiwe ku nzi we babhayani.
Paulo kati eswika pa datho kudzongeka kwe mbunga kwakabe kuli kukulu kwaakadzina kasengwa nge babhayani.
Mbunga wakatobela ukadwilila mbeli umimila uti, “Mumbulaye!”
Kukati babhayani babe pejo ngolonga Paulo mu nzi we babhayani, kabhuzwa Nkulu we babhayani kati, “Apa ndingaleba tjimwe nawe?”
Kadabila eti, “Unoziba Tjigiriki kene?
Apa ate iwe N'egipiti wakatangisa bupanduki, ngono kabe ntungamili we bapanduki be babulayi bali zwiwulu zwili zwinna (4 000) ku tjilambanyika mazhuba akapinda kene?”
Paulo kadabila kati, “Imi ndi Njuta, unodwa ku Taso mu Silisiya, ndili n'gali we nzi wakalumba. Ndokumbila kuti mundiletje ndilebeleke ne bathu.”
Paulo kati adumigwa nge Nkulu we babhayani kama mu datho ngono kanyaladza bose nge maboko awe, kukati kwabe ne kunyalala kukulu kati kubali nge Tjihebheru:
“Zwikamu na botate, mundihwilile andizwimila ngwenu mbeli kwenyu!”
Bakati behwa elebeleka nabo nge Tjihebheru bakanyalala kwazo; ngono Paulo kadwilila kati:

“Imi ndi Njuta ndakazwaligwa mu Taso mu Silisiya, koga alegwa mu nzi iwowuno ndili pasi kwa Gamaliyele. Ndakaamutjila ndayo yakasima mu nlayo wa bobatategulu bedu ngono ndakabe ndakatukutilila Ndzimu samwi mose nasi.
Ndakadziyidza kunoti mu lufu, bathu bakabe betobela zila iyeyi. Ndakabhata balume ne bakadzi ha balashila mu ng'umba ye busungwa.

Ntungamili we Bapirisiti ne Gulukota lose bangatendeka kuti ndoleba malebeswa. Ndakaamutjila mubali hwalo dzakwaligwa zwikamu mu Damasiko, ndizo ayenda ikoko kubhata bathu ibaba ne kubazhisa ngeno ku Jerusalema bakasungwa kuti balobgwe.
“Ndakati nditjayenda ndiabilila Damasiko, kungabe pakati kwe masikati tjinyolotjo tjedza tjikulu tjidwa kudzimu tjakandipoteleka.
Ndakawila pasi, ngono ahwa hwi liti kundili, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Apa unondidziyidzilani kene?’
Adabila ndibhuzwa nditi, ‘Ndimwi ani She?’ Iye kadabila eti kundili, ‘Ndimi Jesu we Nazareta, iye waunodziyidza.’
Balume bakabe banami bakabona tjedza, koga abazohwa hwi lakabe lilebeleka nami.
Abhuzwa ati, ‘Ndishingeni ngono She?’ Ngono She kati kundili, ‘Milika ungine mu Damasiko, ngono ikweno unowobudziwa tjimwe ne tjimwe tjawakashaluligwa kutjishinga!’
Ndakabe bhofu ngekwe tjedza tjinopenya, ndizo bandakabe ndinabo bakandikweba nge luboko bakanditungamilila mu Damasiko.
“Mu nzi iwowuje kwakabe kuna nlume edang'wa kuyi Ananiyasi, nlume wakabe enamata kunoyendidzana ne nlayo, etetiwa kwazo nge Bajuta bose bakabe begala ikoko.
Kazha kundili, kama pandili, ngono kati, ‘Ikamu Saulo, pofunuka!’ Nge tjibaka itjetjo apofunuka, ngono ambona.
Kati, ‘Ndzimu wa bobatategulu bedu wakushalulila kuziba kuda kwawo, kubona Nlulwami ne kuhwa hwi linodwa mu nlomo uwe.
Ngobe unowobe ntendeki ku bathu bose ngekwe tjawakabona nenge tjawakahwa.
Ndizo ngwenu, utjigelileni? Milika, udubikiwe ungule jinyo lilo udana zina lile.’
“Ndakazha ku Jerusalema, ngono ati nditjatembezela mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, abe ne mbono,
yandakabona She muili beti kundili, ‘Libilidza ubhude mu Jerusalema tjinyolotjo, ngobe bathu muno abatowoamutjila butendeki gugo nge kwangu.’
Adabila nditi, ‘She, bathu banoziba zubuyanana kuti ndakayenda ku ng'umba dze mitembezelo kulonga mu ng'umba ye busungwa ne kuloba ibabo bakabe begalamoyo mumuli.
Kwakati lopa le ntendeki wenyu Sitifani litebugwa, imi ndakabe ndili ipapo ndidumana ne kubulawa kukwe ndakalinda zwiambalo zwe babulayi babe.’
She bakati kundili, ‘Yenda, ngobe ndowokutuma kule kule kuna Bezwitjaba.’ ”
Bathu bakahwilila Paulo kudzina eleba ikoku, koga ipapo bakatangisa mimilila pezhugwi beti, “Dusani nthu wakajali mu shango! Mumbulaye! Aazofanilo tjila!”
Bakabe bemimila belashanya zwiambalo zwabo, bepukula hwuluba.
Nkulu we babhayani kalaya kuti Paulo ayisiwe mu ng'umba ye babhayani, kabadwa kati banlobe nge rwabha kuti babone kuti ini Bajuta bemmimila sa ikoku.
Koga bakati bansunga kuti banlobe Paulo kati ku nlauli we babhayani bali zana wakabe ali mile ipapo, “Apa ku mu nlayo kuti ulobe n'gali we Roma asatongo sumikilisigwa mmwe nlandu kene?”
Nlauli we babhayani kati ehwa ikoku, kayenda ku Nkulu we babhayani, ngono kambhuzwa kati, “Moshaka thamani kene? Nlume iwoyu Nroma!”
Ndizo Nkulu we babhayani kayenda kuna Paulo kambhuzwa eti, “Undibudze, apa un'gali we Roma kene?”
Paulo kadabila eti, “Ee.”
Nkulu we babhayani kati, “Ndakabe Nroma ngolipa themba hwulu ye mari.”
Paulo kashandula eti, “Koga imi ndakazwagwa ndili Nroma.”
Tjinyolotjo balume bakabe bewombhuzwa bakabuyila shule bedwa panli; Nkulu we babhayani kapalukamoyo asinoziba kuti Paulo Nroma nenge kuti wansunga nge dziketani.

Nkulu we babhayani kada kuziba malebeswa kuti Bajuta bakabe bebona Paulo nlandu weni; ndizo tjimuka kasunungula Paulo kalaya Bapirisiti bakulu ne Gulukota lose kushangana. Ipapo katola Paulo kammisa mbeli kwabo.
Paulo kalingisisa Gulukota, ngono kati, “Zwikamu zwangu, hana yangu i mbuyanana ngekwe zila yandakatjila ndiyo mbeli kwe Ndzimu kuswikila zhuba lino.”
Ngekwa ikoku Ntungamili we Bapirisiti Ananiyasi kadwa bakabe bali mile pejo na Paulo kuti anlobe mu nlomo.
Ipapo Paulo kati kunli, “Ndzimu unowoloba iwe, iwe guma lakadzulugwa butjena ndiwe! Apa ugele ipapo undisumikilisa nge nlayo, koga iwe nge kuko utjuluka nlayo nge kuti ndilobgwe!”
Ibabo bakabe bali mile pejo na Paulo bakati, “Apa unotuka Ntungamili we Bapirisiti we Ndzimu kene?”
Paulo kati, “Zwikamu, ndabe ndisingazibe kuti ndiye Ntungamili we Bapirisiti; ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi, ‘Usilebe bubi ngekwe nlauli we bathu ba kanyi kuko.’ ”

Paulo kati ebona kuti bamwe babo Basadusi koga bamwe Bafarasi* kamilidzila hwi pezhugwi mu Gulukota kati, “Zwikamu, imi ndi Nfarasi, nkololo we Bafarasi. Ndosekesegwa kugalabgwe nenge kumuka kwe bafi!”
Kati aleba ikoku kukabe ne zhoba pakati kwe Basadusi ne Bafarasi, ngono gubungano likabe ne kuthubukana pakati.
Basadusi banoti akuna kumuka mu bafi ne kuti akuna batumwa be Ndzimu kene Meya, koga Bafarasi banoti zwithu zose izwezwi zwiyapo.

Kwakabe ne zhoba hwulu, ngono bamwe be badiyi be nlayo bakabe bali Bafarasi bakamilika, ngono bakakakabala kwazo beti, “Iswi atitobona nlandu mu nlume iwoyu. Meya kene ntumwa we kudzimu ha alebeleka nayeke?”
Kukakabadzana kwakabe kwakabangalala kwakati Nkulu we babhayani katja kuti banowopalula Paulo. Kadwa babhayani kuti badeluke bankombeledze banzhise mu nzi we babhayani.
Busiku igogo She bakama hwunde na Paulo, ngono bakati, “Ibe nge tjilopa! Sekwa wakapa butendeki nge kwangu mu Jerusalema wakafanila kunopabo butendeki ku Roma.”
Mangwanana etjimuka Bajuta bakathama nlangano ngono bakazwisunga nge kutuna kuti basije kene kuli kung'wa kudzina bebulaya Paulo.
Balume banopinda makumi manna bakabe bali mu nlangano iwoyo.
Bakayenda ku Bapirisiti bakulu neku bakulu, ngono bakati, “Tatuna takalonga meya kusaja tjimwe kudzina tibulaye Paulo.
Ndizoke ngwenu, imwi ne Gulukota, kumbilani Nkulu we babhayani kunzhisa mbeli kwenyu muti moshaka matama mamwe e malebeswa ngekwe ndebo iye. Takazwilulwamisila kumbulaya asathu kaswika ipapa.”
Koga kukati nzekulu wa Paulo we tjiyisana ehwa ngekwe nlangano iwoyo kangina mu nzi we babhayani, ngono kabudza Paulo.
Ipapo Paulo kadana mmwe we balauli be babhayani bali zana kati, “Yisa mbisana iwoyu ku Nkulu we babhayani; una tjaanoshaka kumbudza.”
Ndizo kansa ku Nkulu we babhayani ebe eti, “Paulo we nsungwa wandidana, ngono kandikumbila kuti ndizhise mbisana iwoyu kumuli, ngobe una tjaanoshaka kumubudza.”
Nkulu we babhayani kabhata mbisana nge luboko, kamila naye ntome ngono kambhuzwa bali boga kati, “Ini tjaunoshaka kundibudza?”
Kati, “Bajuta badumana kuti bamukumbile kuzhisa Paulo mbeli kwe Gulukota mangwana beti banoshaka matama mamwe e malebeswa nge kukwe.

Musibadumile, ngobe balume banopinda makumi manna babo bakanlalila mu zila. Batuna kuti abatowoja kene kuli kung'wa kudzina bambulaya. Bakazwilulwamisa ngwenu bamilile kuti mubadumile mu kukumbila kwabo.”
Nkulu we babhayani kadwa nzhuzha kati ayende, ngono kantjemela eti, “Usibudze mmwe kuti wandibudza ikoku.”

Ipapo kadana babili be balauli be babhayani bali zana, kabadwa kati, “Lulwamisani goko le babhayani bali mazana mabili ne balume bali makumi ali kutendeka bakatatha mbizi ne balume bali mazana mabili bakabhata mathumo, kuyenda ku Sizariya nge tjibaka tje buzhanalume busiku guno.
Muwanile Paulo mbizi kuti atathe, kuti ndizo anoswika zubuyanana ku mbusi Felikisi.”
Ngono kakwala lukwalo eti,
“Ndimi Kilaudiyo Lisiyasi, ndikwalila mbilimangenje Mbusi Felikisi, Dumiliso.
Nlume iwoyu wakabhakhwa nge Bajuta, ngono bakabe bali pejo nge kumbulaya koga azha ne babhayani bangu an'gwila, ngobe ndakabe ndahwa kuti n'gali we Roma.
Ndakabe ndishako ziba kuti ini bempa nlandu ndizo anzhisa ku Gulukota labo.
Ndakawana ili kuti nlandu waanobong'wa wakalingisana nge nlayo wabo, koga kwakabe kusina nlandu wakalizana kuti afe kene alongwe mu ng'umba ye busungwa.
Ndakati ndabudziwa ngekwe nlangano unoyitiwa ngekwe nlume iwoyu, antumila kukuli tjinyolotjo. Kakale ndakadwa banombona nlandu kuti bamubudze nlandu uwe.”
Ndizo babhayani, ngolondolodza ndayo, bakayenda na Paulo busiku, ngono bakanzhisa ku Antipatirisi.
Tjimuka babhayani banoyenda nge makumbo bakabgwilila ku nzi we babhayani, ngono bakaletja babhayani be mbizi kuyenda naye.
Kukati babhayani banoyenda nge mbizi beswika mu Sizariya bakayisa lukwalo ku mbusi, na Paulo bakansa kunli.
Mbusi kabala lukwalo, ngono kabhuzwa kuti unodwa ku ntuthu upi. Wakati ehwa kuti unodwa ku Silisiya
kati, “Ndowokuhwilila ha banokubona nlandu baswika.” Ipapo kalaya kuti Paulo alisiwe ali mu ng'umba ya Herode ye bushe.
Shule kwe mazhuba mashanu Ntungamili we Bapirisiti Ananiyasi kayenda ku Sizariya ana bamwe bakulu ne mmilili wakabe eyi Tetulo. Bakabudza mbusi milandu yabanotilika Paulo.
Ipapo Paulo kadanigwa mukati, ngono Tetulo katangisa kutjeta sahwoku:
“Nge kwenyu totjilila mu mbakiso kakale nge butjenjedu gwenyu mbilimangenje Felikisi, dwililo mbeli yakazhisiwa mu itjaba itjetji.
Nge zila dzose kakale pamwe ne pamwe, ikoku tokuamutjila nge mboko.
Anditoshaka kutjinya tjibaka tjenyu, ndizo ndomukumbila kuti mube ne nzhazho kuhwilila mbiko yedu fupi.
Iswi takawana nlume iwoyu ali mbatsha; unomusa phipiti pakati kwe Bajuta bose mu shango yose kakale ntungamili we bhiko le Banazareta.
Wakagwisa kulonga shambgwa Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, koga tikambhata. Iswi takalangana kunsumikilisa nge nlayo wedu.
Koga Lisiyasi Nkulu we babhayani kazha, ngono nge masimba makulu kantola mutili.
Ipapo Lisiyasi kalaya kuti basumikilisi babe bazhe mbeli kwenyu.
Bajuta bakadumabo kuti zwithu izwezo malebeswa.
Mbusi kadwa Paulo kuti alebeleke, ngono Paulo kati:
“Ndoziba kuti makabe nsumikilisi we itjaba itjetji makole manjinji, ndizo ndakashatha kuzwimila mbeli kwenyu.
Sekwa mungaziba nge kwenyu, ate mazhuba anopinda gumi lina mabili ndakayenda ku Jerusalema kunonamata Ndzimu.
Bajuta abazondiwana ndinyanyayidzana ne mmwe mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu kene kuli kundiwana ndidzonga bathu, mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu kene mu ng'umba dze mitembezelo kene kumwe mu nzi.
Na iko abangape butendeki guzhele gwe milandu yabanondipa.
Tjandinoduma etji: Ndonamata Ndzimu wa bobatategulu bedu kuyendidzana nge Zila ye Ndzimu ibo yabanoti manyepkhwa. Koga ndogalamoyo tjimwe ne tjimwe tjakakwagwa mu nlayo ne mu hwalo dze balebesambeli.
Ndina kugalabgwe iko kwabanako ibaba nge kwabo mu Ndzimu, kuti bathu bose, bakalulwama ne babi banowomuka mu lufu.
Ndizo ndoshinga ne matatabuko angu wose misi yose kube ne hana mbuyanana mbeli kwe Ndzimu na mbeli kwe bathu.
“Ndakabuya ku Jerusalema shule kwe makole manjinji ndowopa itjaba tja kanyi kwedu zwipo zwe bashayi ne zwibhayilo.
Ndakati nditjashinga ikoku bakandiwana mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ndapedza nshingo we kuzwitjenapadza. Kwakabe kusina mbunga wakabe unami, kusina phipiti.
Koga bamwe Bajuta bakabe bedwa ku ntuthu we Ezhiya bakabe bali ipapo; ibo nge kwabo bakafanila kuzha mbeli kwenyu balebe milandu yangu ha banayo.
Kene letja balume ibaba balebe jinyo labakandibona nlandu ndilo pandakama mbeli kwe Gulukota,
kuzhe kwe tjithu tjing'ompela tjandakaleba pandakama mbeli kwabo nditi, ‘Ndimile mbeli kwenyu nasi ndisumikilisigwa kumuka kwe bafi.’ ”
Ipapo Felikisi, iye wakabe ana zibo hwulu ngekwe Zila ye Ndzimu kamisa ndebo. Kabadwa kati, “Kowoti Lisiyasi Nkulu we babhayani azha ndowopedza ndebo yenyu.”
Kalaya nlauli wakalinda Paulo kun'gadza akalindiwa, koga abe ne sununguko ne kuti kakale aletje bazwalani babe kumpa zwaanosheta.
Shule kwe mazhuba Felikisi kazha ne nkadzi uwe Durusila, wakabe ali Njuta. Kadanigwa Paulo ngono kanhwilila elebeleka ngekwe kugalamoyo muna Kirisiti Jesu.
Paulo kati edwilila eleba ngekwe ndulamo nenge kuzwidziba ne zhuba linozha le kusumikilisiwa, Felikisi katja ngono kati, “Ungayendazo ngwenu. Ndowokudana kakale ha ndawana tjibaka.”
Wakabe eyemula kuti Paulo ampe mari; ngono ndi ikoku kan'danigwa kanjinji, ngono kalebeleka naye.
Shule kwe makole mabili, Porokiyo Fesito katola mamo a Felikisi. Felikisi kashaka kuti athamile Bajuta tjabanoda ndizo kaletja Paulo ali mu ng'umba ye busungwa.
Kukati shule kwe mazhuba matatu Fesito aswika mu ntuthu uwe, katathila ku Jerusalema edwa ku Sizariya.
Bapirisiti bakulu ne batungamili be Bajuta bakambudza milandu yabanotilika Paulo.
Tjinyolotjo bakakumbila Fesito, kuti ababhatshe koga, kuti athame kuti Paulo ayisiwe ku Jerusalema, ngobe bakabe belulwamisila kuti alaligwe abulawe mu zila.
Fesito kadabila eti, “Paulo umu ng'umba ye busungwa ku Sizariya, ngono imi nge kwangu ndowoyendako tjinyolotjo.
Bamwe batungamili benyu ngabayende nami, ha kuli kuti kuna tjimwe tjibi nge kukwe, baswike bampe nlandu.”
Kukati agala mazhuba ali zhanakadzi kene gumi nabo kadelukila ku Sizariya, ngono tjimuka kadana lubazhe kalaya kuti Paulo azhisiwe mbeli kukwe.
Paulo kati ezha, Bajuta bakabe badeluka badwa ku Jerusalema bakama kumpoteleka beleba milandu yakabangalala nge kukwe, koga basingatubule kuitjenesa nge buzhalo.
Ipapo Paulo kazwilebelekegwa eti, “Andizothama tjimwe tjakabipa ku nlayo we Bajuta kene Ng'umba ye Ndzimu kene kuna Kaisara.”
Fesito kayemula kushathisa Bajuta kati kuna Paulo, “Unoshaka kuyenda ku Jerusalema kunosumikilisigwa milandu iyeyi mbeli kwangu kene?”
Paulo kadabila eti, “Ndimile mbeli kwe lubazhe gwa Kaisara, pandakafanila kusumikilisiwapo. Akuna tjandakatjinya ku Bajuta, sekwa munoziba zubuyanana.

Koga ha ili kuti ndi nlandu we kuthama tjimwe tjandakafanilo fila, anditolambo fa, ngono ha ili kuti milandu yandinobong'wa ne Bajuta ate ili malebeswa, akuna una simba le kundiyisa kubali. Ndozwimimila kuna Kaisara!”
Kukati Fesito alebeleka ne Gulukota lile kati, “Iwe wazwimimila kuna Kaisara, yenda kuna Kaisara!”
Shule kwe mazhuba mashomanana she nkulu Agiripa na Bherinisi bakaswika ku Sizariya kuamutjila Fesito.
Se bakagala mazhuba manjinji ikoko, Fesito kalebeleka ndebo ya Paulo na she nkulu. Kati, “Kuna nlume ipapa wakasiyiwa ndi Felikisi ali nsungwa.
Ndakati ndili ku Jerusalema, Bapirisiti bakulu ne bakulu be Bajuta bakazhisa milandu nge kukwe ngono bakakumbila kuti abong'we nlandu.
Ndakababudza kuti ate kuli mpanga we Tjiroma kusunga nthu kene ali ani asathu kalingisana ne banombona nlandu ngono kawana tjibaka tje kuzwilebelekegwa ngekwe milandu yabanompa.
Bakati bezha ngeno nami, andizotongo nonoka ngekwe ndebo koga ndakadana lubazhe tjimuka, alaya kuti nlume iwoyu azhisiwe.
Batjeti babe bakati bemilika kulebeleka, bakasintjete nge kutjinya kwandakabe ndakakumbula.
Koga, bakabe bana zwabasingadumane naye muzwili ngekwe kunamata kwabo, kakale ngekwe nlume wakafa unoyi Jesu wakabe Paulo esimisa eti unotjila.
Ndakabe ndakadzimila ndisingazibe kuti ndingashakisisa tjini zwithu zwakajali; ndizo ndakambhuzwa kuti kene ungada kuyenda ku Jerusalema kunosumikilisigwa milandu iyeyi ikoko.
Kukati Paulo ekumbila kuti atjengetegwe kuhwiwa ndi she nkulu, alaya kuti atjengetiwe kudzina ndintumila kuna Kaisara.”
Ipapo Agiripa kati kuna Fesito, “Ndoshaka kuzwihwigwa nlume iwoyu imi.”
Kadabila eti, “Unowonhwa mangwana.”
Tjimuka Agiripa na Bherinisi bakazha nge mazwikudzo ngono bakangina mu ng'umba ye bushanganilo bana bakulu be babhayani ne batungamili be nzi. Ndizo nge kulaya kwa Fesito Paulo kazhisiwa.
Fesito kati, “She nkulu Agiripa na bose banaswi, mobona nlume iwoyu! Itjaba tjose tje Bajuta tjakandikumbila nge kukwe mu Jerusalema na muno mu Sizariya bemimila beti aazotjafanilo tjila.
Ndakawana kuli kuti aazotjinya tjimwe tjakalizana lufu, ngobe wakazwimimila kuna Kaisara, ndakabona kuti ndintumile ku Roma.

Koga akuna itjo tje malebeswa tjandingakwalila she wangu nge kukwe. Ndizo ndanzhisa mbeli kwenyu mose, kwazo kwazo mbeli kwenyu, imwi She nkulu Agiripa, nditi pamwe shule kwe kumbhuzwisisa ndingawana tjandingakwala.
Ngobe ndobona kusakafanila kupitshila nsungwa mbeli kusingatjenesiwe milandu iye.”
Agiripa kati kuna Paulo, “Una ndetjedzelo kuzwilebelekegwa.” Paulo katambunudza luboko gugwe kazwimila sahwoku:
“She nkulu Agiripa! Ndozwikumbula ndina phazha kuti nasi ndizwimile mbeli kuko mu zwithu zose Bajuta zwabanonditjeta ndizo,
ngobe uziba zubuyanana milenje ne ndebo dze Bajuta dzabanonyanyayidzana mudzili. Ndizo ndomukumbila kuti mundihwilile nge moyonlefu.
“Bose Bajuta banoziba sekwa ndakatjila kudwila ndili ntukununu. Banoziba sekwa ndakapitsha butjilo gwangu gose, kutanga mu shango ya kanyi kwedu nenge ku Jerusalema.
Kwabe ntolo beziba, ha beda kutendeka kuti kudwa mu kutangisa ndakatjila ndili ndungululo ye bhiko le milayo yakasima kwazo ye kunamata kwedu, le Bafarasi.
Ngono ngwenu ndimile pano ndisumikilisiwa ngekwe kugalabgwe kwandinako mu kugadziwabgwe kwa bobatategulu nge Ndzimu,

itjo tjithu njudzi dza kanyi kwedu dzili gumi lina mbili tjadzinogalabgwe kuamutjila, dzinamata Ndzimu siku ne sikati dzakalongamoyo. Ngono ngekwa ikoku kugalabgwe, She nkulu, Bajuta banonditilika nlandu!
Ini muwana kwakasima kuduma kuti Ndzimu unomusa bafi?
“Imi nge kwangu ndakawana kwakafanila kuti ndithame zwithu zwinjinji kunyanyayidza zina la Jesu we Nazareta.
Itjetjo nditjo tjandakashinga mu Jerusalema. Ndakaamutjila simba mu Bapirisiti bakulu, ngono alonga bunjinji gwe bagalimoyo mu ng'umba ye busungwa; bakati besumikilisigwa lufu, namibo adumana nako.
Ndakabadziyidza kanjinji mu ng'umba dzose dze mitembezelo, ngono agwisa kubathama kuti batuke Ndzimu wabo. Nge kubagwadzilamoyo kukulu, ndakabadziyidza ne ku mizi ye zwitjaba zwipoga.
“Nditjo tjandakabendayendila ku Damasiko nge simba nenge ndayo dzinodwa mu Bapirisiti bakulu.
She nkulu, kwakabe kuli pakati kwe masikati, ndili mu zila ha ndibona tjedza tjinopenya kupinda zhuba, tjidwa pezhugwi ngono tjikapenya kundipoteleka na ibabo bakabe bayenda nami.
Takati tawila pasi tose, ahwa hwi liti kundili mu Tjihebheru, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Apa unondidziyidzilani kene? Unozwikubadza nge kuthula theswi dze mbambo.’
Abhuzwa ati, ‘Ndimwi ani She?’ Ngono She bakadabila beti, ‘Ndimi Jesu, waunodziyidza.
Koga milika ume nge makumbo. Ndakuzwilakidza ngekwa ikoku, kukushalula kuti ushinge kakale ube ntendeki mu zwithu zwawandibona muzwili ne muna izwezo zwandinowokuzwilakidza.
Ndowokuangulila mu bathu be Iziraela ne muna Bezwitjaba ibo bandinokutuma kubali,

kuzhula mesho abo, kuti ndizo bashandukile zhalima babe tjedza. Bashandukila simba la Satani bazhe ku simba le Ndzimu, kuti ndizo nge kugalamoyo kwabo mundili baamutjile kuzwiibhatigwa zwibi zwabo, ngono bawane bugalo pakati kwe bayengemali.’
“Ngono ndizo, She nkulu Agiripa, andizonyanyayidza mbono yandakabona kudwa kudzimu.
Ndakatanga ku Damasiko, kudwapo ati ku Jerusalema ne Judiya ne kuna Bezwetjaba, ndisumikila kuti bashandukile matjinyo abo bazhe ku Ndzimu kakale bashinge mishingo inolakidza aba shanduka.
Ngekwa ikoku Bajuta bakandibhata ndili mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ngono bakagwisa kundibulaya.

Koga kuswikila zhuba lino ndabe ndibhatshiwa nge Ndzimu, ndizo ndimile pano kupa butendeki gwangu kuna bose, ku batukununu ne bakulukulu nge kunofanana. Tjandinoleba nditjozwatjo balebesambeli na Mushe tjabakati tjowoshingikala,
kuti Mesiya wakadziyila, ngono nge kube we kutanga kumuka mu bafi, kuleba tjedza tje jidzo ku Bajuta ne kuna Bezwitjaba.”
Kukati Paulo ezwimila nge zila iyeyi, Fesito kamilidza hwi kati “Iwe unopenga Paulo! Kuzwidiya kuko kukulu kokupengesa!”
Paulo kadabila eti, “Anditopenga Mbilimangenje Fesito! Ndoleba matama ana malebeswa asina bupengo.
She nkulu banoziba ngekwe zwithu izwezwi, ndizo kubali ndolebeleka ndakasununguka, ngoti ndogala moyo kuti zwithu izwezwi azwizobalashikila ngoti azwizoshingila mu ikotjo.
She nkulu Agiripa, apa mogalamoyo balebesambeli kene? Ndoziba kuti mobagalamoyo!”
Agiripa kati kuna Paulo, “Apa unokumbula kuti mu tjibaka itjetji tjifutshwanana unowondithama Nkirisiti kene?”
Paulo kadabila eti, “Kene tjibaka tjifutshwana kene tjilefu, ntembezelo wangu ku Ndzimu hwuti kusibe imwi koga nanga na bose makandihwilila nasi, mube tjandili itjo, kuzhe kwe ketani idzedzi!”
Ipapo she nkulu ne mbusi na Bherinisi ne bakabe bali gele nabo bakamilika,
ngono bakati badwa ipapo, bakalebesana beti, “Nlume iwoyu aazothama tjimwe tjaangafila kene kuli kulongwa mu ng'umba ye busungwa.”
Ngono Agiripa kati kuna Fesito, “Nlume iwoyu unobe asunungugwa ha asakabe asapitshila ndebo kuna Kaisara.”
Kwakati kwapedzisisiwa kuti toyenda nge gungwa ku Italiya, bakayisa Paulo ne bamwe basungwa ku nlauli we babhayani bali zana “We goko la Agusito, iye edang'wa Juliyo.”

Tikatatha ikepe tjakabe tjidwa ku Adiramitiumi, tjakabe tjakalulwamisigwa kuyenda ku mizi ye ntuthu we Ezhiya imu manginilo e gungwa, ngono tikayenda nge gungwa. Arisitako we Makedoniya wakabe edwa ku Tesalonika wakabe anaswi.
Tjimuka tikaswika ku Sidoni. Juliyo wakabe ana buthu kuna Paulo kanletja kayenda kunobona bazwalani babe, kupiwa tjaanosheta.
Tikadwilila kudwa ipapo, se phepo yakabe itutudza yakalingisana naswi, takayenda nge gungwa tili ku ndzibo wakasitilika we tjigwizi tje Sipuro.
Tikatjuluka gungwa gwe Silisiya ne Pamufiliya ngono tikaswika ku Mira mu Lisiya.
Ikoko nlauli kawana ikepe tje Alekizanda tjakabe tjiyenda ku Italiya, ndizo katitathisa.

Tikayenda nge gungwa nge bunono mazhuba, ngono nge bukukutu bukulu bhelelo tikanoswika kwakalingisana ne nzi we Kinido. Phepo ikasitidumile kuyendila mbeli mu ndzibo iwoyo, ndizo tikayenda nge gungwa mu ndzibo wakasitilika we tjigwizi tje Kirete, tipinda ne pa Salimone.
Takayenda nge bukukutu bukulu takasupha nge phili tikanoswika ku bugalo gunoyi Mamilo asina Mbatsha, pejo ne nzi we Laseya.
Takapitsha tjibaka tjilefu ikoko, kudzina kube mbatsha kudwilidza gwendo nge gungwa, ngobe ngwenu zhuba le kuzwinyima zojiwa lakabe lapinda. Ndizo Paulo kabakumbuludza eti,
“Balume, ndobona kuti gwendo gwedu gowobe ne hwubadzi ne kutjinyikigwa kukulu kusi kwe thundu ne ikepe koga, koga nenge matjilo edu.”
Koga nlauli we babhayani bali zana kagadziwamoyo nge tjakalebgwa nge ntakuli ne mweni we ikepe, koga, kasihwilile tjakalebgwa ndi Paulo.

Mamilo e zwikepe akabe asi akalulwama kupitshila mbaba muali; ndizo bunji gwe balume ibabo gukada kuyenda nge gungwa ne kugwisa kuswika ku Fenikiya, akutubuka kupitshila mbaba ikoko. Fenikiya mamilo, amu Kirete akalingisana ne pakati kwe burwa guku bhezhuba ne bunamdzwa guku bhezhuba.
Phepo ndelu ndelu inodwa ku burwa ikatangisa kuhwuhwudza, ndizo balume ibabo bakakumbula kuti bangadwilidza mano abo, ndizo bakasunungula zwibhati zwe ikepe bakayenda nge gungwa bakasupha ne Kirete.
Koga tjinyolotjo dutu linodang'wa “Bunamdzwa-Bhezhuba” likatutudza lideluka mu tjigwizi.
Ikaloba ikepe, ngono sekwa kabe kusingatubuke kuti ikepe tjilingisane ne phepo, tikaletja kugwisa, ngono tikatjiletja tjitakugwa nge phepo.
Takawana mbakililo ha tipinda ku burwa nge tjigwizi tjitukununu tjinoyi Kauda. Ikoko nge bukukutu, tikatubula kutjidza n'goro we ikepe.

Bakaukwebela mukati, kakale ipapo bakasungilila misungo besimisa kupoteleka ikepe. Bakabe betja kuti pamwe banowowila mu nsetje vula paili shomanana kwakadziba ku Libhiya, ndizo bakadelusa saile bakaletja ikepe tjitakugwa nge phepo.
Dutu lina masimba likadwilila, ndizo tjimuka bakatangisa kulashila thundu ye ikepe kuzhe,
ngono mu zhuba le butatu bakaposela kuzhe zwishingiswa zwimwe zwe ikepe.
Mu mazhuba manjinji takabe tisingabone zhuba kene nyenyedzi, ngono phepo ikadwilila ngotutudza kwazo. Ipapo tikapelegwa nge kugalabgwe kwe kutjidziwa.
Shule kwe tjibaka tjilefu balume basingaje, Paulo kama mbeli kwabo kati, “Balume, mobe makandihwilila ngono mukasibhude mu Kirete; ipapo tobe takaleya tjinyikilo ne ndashikilo dzose idzedzi.
Koga ngwenu ndomukumbila, Simisani moyo! Akuna ne nng'ompela wenyu unowolashikigwa nge butjilo gugwe; ikepe nditjo tjoga tjinowolashikigwa.
Ngobe busiku gwapinda ntumwa we kudzimu wandili wawo, iwo wandinonamata wakazha kundili
kati, ‘Usitje Paulo! Wakafanilo ma mbeli kwa Kaisara. Ndzimu watjidza bose banoyenda nawe mu gungwa.’
Ndizo simisani moyo, balume! Ndogalabgwe Ndzimu kuti kowobe koga sekwa ndakabudziwa.
Koga towotakuligwa mu tjimwe tjigwizi.”

Gwakabe guli busiku gwe bugumi lina kunna, ngono takabe titakugwatakugwa nge dutu mu gungwa gwe Adiriya. Nge tjibaka tjingabe tje pakati kwe busiku bayendisi be ikepe bakakumbulila kuti takabe tisedzela pejo ne shango.

Ndizo bakalashila nsungo mu vula wakasungiligwa tjithu tjinolema, ngono bakawana vula yakangina kungapa mitha dzili makumi manna; shule kwe tjibaka tjitukununu bakathama sa ikoko kakale, ngono bakawana ili makumi matatu e thambo kungina.
Bakatja kuti ikepe tjingathulana ne shongwe, ndizo bakadelusa zwibhati zwinna shule kwe ikepe, ngono bakatembezela kuti kuyedze.
Ipapo bayendisi be ikepe bakagwisa kutizha bebhuda mu ikepe, bakadelusila n'goro we ikepe mu vula bethama se banonodelusa zwibhati zwimwe mbeli kwe ikepe.
Koga Paulo kati ku nlauli we babhayani ne ku babhayani, “Ha bayendisi be ikepe basingagale mu ikepe, amungatjidziwe.”
Ndizo babhayani bakathubula nsungo wakabhata n'goro ne ikepe bakauletja ukayenda.
Kukati kuyendila kuyedza, Paulo kabakumbila bose kuja zojiwa eti, “Magala mazhuba ali gumi lina manna ngwenu, ngono tjibaka tjose itjetjo amuzoja tjimwe.
Ndomukumbila, ijani zojiwa; zowomupa masimba, ngoti akuna tjinowomulashikila.”
Shule kwe kuleba ikoku, Paulo katola zojiwa, kaboka Ndzimu mbeli kwabo bose, kapemula katangisa kuja.
Bakakulumbidzika, ngono mmwe ne mmwe wabo kajabo zojiwa.
[Tose takabe tili mazana mabili ana makumi ali kutendeka ne bathu bali kutathatu (276) mu ikepe.]
Shule kwe mmwe ne mmwe aja kwakalizanila, bakalelusa ikepe ngolashila mathunde wose mu gungwa.
Kukati kuyedza, bayendisi be ikepe bakasizibe shango iyeyo, koga bakabona bunginilo guna nsetje, ngono bakakumbula kuti, akutubuka balonge ikepe ipapo.

Ndizo bakathubula zwibhati bakazwiletja zwinyungila mu gungwa, ngono bakasunungula misungo yakabe yakabhata migoti inolaula ikepe. Ipapo bakamilidza saile limbeli kwe ikepe kuti ndizo phepo isundile ikepe mbeli, ngono tikayenda mbeli ku phili.
Koga ikepe tjikathula duluthulu le nsetje ngono tjikama pasi; ngono tjikabhaya pasi tjikasitubule kuyenda, ku bhato latjo kukavunanyiwa zwitibhutibhu nge mapundu e vula.
Babhayani bakaluka mano e kubulaya basungwa bose, kubadzibila kulobela bhamu ku phili beti bangatizha.
Koga nlauli we babhayani kashaka kutjidza Paulo, ndizo kabadzibila kuthama ikoku. Koga kalaya bose balume bangaloba bhamu kudzatila mu vula kutanga babhudile ku phili;
bakasala bekotobela, bakabhatilila mu mapulanka ne mu zwitibhutibhu zwavunika zwe ikepe. Oku ndiko sekwa takabhudila tose mu phili titjila.
Tikati tatjila tabe mu phili tikaziba kuti tjigwizi itjetjo tjodang'wa kuyi Malita.
Bathu banogala mutjili bakabe ne buthu mutili gusakawolobeleka. Bakabesa moto, ngono bakatiamutjila, ngobe vula yakabe ina, ngono kupota.
Paulo kakubunganya fukatigwa le hwunyana, ngono kati edzilonga mu moto nyoka ikabhuda mudzili ngopisa kwe moto, ikazwipombedza mu luboko gugwe.
Kukati bagali be tjigwizi bebona nyoka yakalembeleka mu luboko gugwe, bakalebeleka tje kwabo beti, “Nlume iwoyu wakafanila ali mbulayi; ngobe nenguba atjila mu gungwa, ndulamo aitoduma kuti atjile.”
Koga Paulo kashashamulila nyoka mu moto ikabe isanhwisa zogwadza.
Bathu bakabe beti pamwe unowozwimba kene kawa kafa, koga kukati balinda tjibaka tjilefu bakabona kusina tjimwe tjipoga tjanshingikalila, bakashandula mikumbulo yabo, ngono bakati ndzimu!
Kwakabe kuna minda pejo ili ya Pabhuliyo, nkulu we tjigwizi. Wakatiamutjila katibhata nge buthu mazhuba matatu.
Tate babe bakabe begwala bali lele begwala bugwele gwe luzhazhamo ne ntumbu we mashaba. Paulo kangina kubabona ngono kati atembezela kabiga maboko pezhugwi kwabo kabapodza.
Kukati ikoku kwashingikala bose be bagwele mu tjigwizi bakazha, ngono bakapodziwa.
Bakatikudza nge zila njinji, ngono tikati tazwilulwamisila kuyenda nge gungwa, bakatipa zwatinosheta.
Shule kwe mimwedzi mitatu tikayenda nge gungwa tili mu ikepe tjakabe tjapitshila mbaba mu tjigwizi itjetjo. Tjakabe tjili ikepe tje Alekizanda tjina ifano tje midzimu ye “Mabili Kasito na Polukisi.”
Takama pa Sirakusi tikagalapo mazhuba matatu.
Kudwa ikoko tikayenda nge ikepe, ngono tikanoswika ku Regiyo. Tjimuka phepo ye burwa ikazha, mu zhuba linotobela tikaswika ku Puteoli.
Ikoko takawana zwimwe zwikamu zwakatikumbila kupitsha tshipi ing'ompela nazo. Ipapoke tikayenda ku Roma.
Zwikamu ikoko zwakahwa kuti tozha. Ndizo zwakayenda kunoti ku Lubazhe gwe Apiyo ne ku Ng'umba thatu dze Bayendi. Ndizo Paulo kati ebona zwikamu kakulumbidzika kaboka Ndzimu.
Takati tiswika ku Roma, Paulo kadumigwa kugala ega, ana mbhayani kuntjengeta.

Shule kwe mazhuba matatu kakubunganya batungamili be Bajuta. Bakati bakubungana Paulo kati kubali, “Zwikamu zwangu, nenguba kusina tjandakatjinya ku bathu ba kanyi kwedu kene kunyanyayidzana ne mipanga yabo batategulu bedu, ndakasungwa mu Jerusalema ayisiwa ku Baroma.
Bakati bandibhuzwisisa, ngono bakayemula kundisunungula, ngobe ndakabe ndisina nlandu wakalizana lufu.
Koga Bajuta bakati belamba, akombeledzeka kuti ndipindile kuna Kaisara kusi kuti ndina tjimwe tjandinotjeta bathu ba kanyi kwangu nditjo.
Ngekwa ikoku ndakumbila kumubona kulebeleka namwi. Ndakasungwa nge ketani iyeyi ngekwe kugalabgwe kwe Iziraela.”
Bakadabila beti, “Atizowana hwalo dzinodwa ku Judiya nge kuko kakale akuna ikamu* tjakadwa ikoko tjakabika kene tjikaleba tjimwe tjakabipa nge kuko.
Koga toshaka kuhwa kuti nkumbulo uwo ini, ngobe toziba kuti bathu kumwe ne kumwe banolebeleka kunyanyayidzana ne bhiko ileli.”

Bakati babigila Paulo zhuba bakazha bali banji ku bugalo gwaakabe egala. Kudwa mangwanana kunoti madekwana, wakatjenesa kaleba kubali bushe gwe Ndzimu, ngono kagwisa kubagadzamoyo ngekwa Jesu kudwa mu nlayo wa Mushe ne mu hwalo dze balebesambeli.
Bamwe bakagalamoyo tjaanoleba koga bamwe bakasigalemoyo.
Bakanyanyayidzana tje kwabo, ngono bakatangisa kuyenda Paulo asinoleba ndebo inoti: “Meya yakayengemala yakaleba malebeswa kuna bobatategulu benyu payakati ndi Isaya nlebesambeli,
‘Yenda ku bathu ibaba uti:
Nge lebeswa mowohwa koga mukasihwisise,
kakale nge lebeswa mowobona koga mukasibonesese,
ngobe moyo ye bathu ibaba mikukutu;
zebe dzabo dzakati tshi,
mesho abo akavululata.
Bangadwa bebona nge mesho abo,
bakahwa nge zebe dzabo
bakapedzisisa nge mimoyo yabo
bakashanduka
ndizo abapodza.’ ”
“Ndizo zibani kuti jidzo ileli le Ndzimu lakazhisigwa Bezwitjaba, ngono banowohwilila!”
[Kukati aleba ikoku, Bajuta bakayenda bekakabadzana tje kwabo.]
Makole mabili wose azhele Paulo kagala ipapo mu ng'umba yaakabe ezwilipila, kaamutjila bose bakabe bezha kuwombona,
esumikila bushe gwe Ndzimu kakale ediya ngekwa She Jesu Kirisiti akashaladuka kusina tjinondzibilidza.
Ndimi Paulo, nlanda wa Kirisiti Jesu ndakadang'wa kube ntumwa ndikashaluligwa ndebo mbuya ye Ndzimu,
yawakagadzabgwe ntolo nge balebesambeli* ne mu hwalo dzakayengemala,
ili ndebo mbuya ngekwe Nkololo wawo, wakazwagwa ali tjizekugwana tja Dafite.
Wakalakidziwa kuti nkololo we Ndzimu nge Meya yakayengemala ha emusiwa nge simba mu bafi, iye Jesu Kirisiti She wedu,
watakaamutjila ngoni ne butumwa ndiye, kuti ndizo Bezwitjaba bose baamutjile bugalimoyo ngekwe zina lile,
kudwiwa namwibo banodang'wa kuti mube ba Jesu Kirisiti.
Ndokwalila bose Ndzimu bawunoda mu nzi we Roma bakadang'wa kube bayengemali* nditi:
Ngoni ne kunyalala kunodwa ku Ndzimu Tate bedu na She Jesu Kirisiti kube namwi.
Tjekutanga ndoboka Ndzimu wangu nge zina la Jesu Kirisiti nge kwenyu mose, ngobe kugalamoyo kwenyu kolebgwa shango yose.
Ngobe Ndzimu wandinoshingila nge moyo wangu wose ndisumikila ndebo mbuya ye Nkololo wawo, ntendeki wangu unoziba sekwa ndinomukumbula
misi yose ha nditembezela, ndikumbila kuti nge imwe zila ngeda kwe Ndzimu nditubule kuzha kumuli.
Ngobe ndoyemula kumubona, kuti ndimukobele tjipo tje tjimeya kumusimisa,
kuti ndizo tikulumbidzane nge kugalamoyo kwedu, imi nge kwenyu, namwi ngekwangu.
Ndoshaka kuti muzibe etji zwikamu, ndikanjinji* nditi ndozha kumuli koga kuna zwinomanikanya kuti ndivune zwizwalo, mumuli ne muna bose Bezwitjaba.
Ndakasungika kusumikila ndebo mbuya, ku Bagiriki ne kubamwe basi Bagiriki, kuna bakatjenjela ne kuna basakatjenjela.
Ndizo, ndina nyota ye kusumikila ndebo mbuya kumulibo imwi baku Roma.
Anditobhatisiwa shoni nge ndebo mbuya, ngobe i simba le Ndzimu kutjidza mmwe ne mmwe unogalamoyo, ku Bajuta kutanga kunoti ne kuna Bezwitjaba.
Ngobe mu ndebo iyeyi ndulamo ye Ndzimu inozumbunugwa nge kugalamoyo, sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi, “Iye wakalulwamisiwa nge kugalamoyo unowotjila.”
Bushongola gwe Ndzimu gozumbunugwa gudwa kudzimu gudelukila bose babi nenge mbipo ye bathu banodzibila malebeswa nge mbipo yabo.
Ngobe tjingazibgwa ngekwe Ndzimu tjipatjena kubali, ngoti Ndzimu wakabalakidza itjo.

Tjinga Ndzimu kwawakabumba shango, mbumbiko yawo isingaboneke, ne simba lawo lisingapele ne budzimu gwawo zose izwezwi zwakatjeneseka zubuyanana mu zwithu zwakabumbiwa. Ndizo bathu abana tjabangabhatila patjili.
Ngoti nenguba bakabe beziba Ndzimu abazoukudza se Ndzimu kene kuli kuuboka, koga zose zwabanoalakana azwina nshingo, bakafa meya mikumbulo yabo izhalima.
Nenguba bezwidwa beti bakatjenjela, koga bazwilengwe,
mu bumo gwekuti bakudze Ndzimu usingalobe, banokudza zwifano zwakathamiwa se nthu unoloba kene se nyuni kene se phuka kene zwitjili* zwinosoba na pasi.
Ndizo Ndzimu wakaletja bathu ibabo kushinga zwithu zose zwe shambgwa zwinoyemugwa nge mimoyo yabo, ngono banothamana zwinobhatisa shoni nge mibili yabo.
Ngoti banotenganya malebeswa ngekwe Ndzimu nge manyepkhwa, bakanamata kakale bakashingila tjibumbiwa mu bumo gwe Mbumbi iye wakafanila kudziwa nge kusingapele! Ngakujalo.*
Ngekwa ikoku, Ndzimu wakabaletjedzela mu njemulo dzabo dzinobhatisa shoni. Ne bakadzi babo bakashandulila yendiso yakawolobeleka ye kuwalilana kuna isakawolobeleka.

Ne balumebo bakaletja zila yakawolobeleka yekuwalilana ne bakadzi ngono bakawalilana tjekwabo. Balume banothama mishingo inobhatisa shoni ne bamwe balume. Ngekwa ikoku banoamutjila mbhayilo we shamu wakabafanila.
Ngono ngekuti abazowana kwakafanila kuti bazibe Ndzimu, wakabaletja bali mu mikumbulo yabo yakabola, kuti bashinge zwithu izwezo zwabasakafanila shinga.
Bazhele zila dzose dze bubi, ne kusalulwama ne bugovu ne bubi, bazhele fupa ne kubulaya ne kugwa ne kutjebela ne sudze. Bana bung'wa,
ngono banolebelana bubi, banobenga Ndzimu, bana masapa, banozwida, bezwikudza, banokumbula zila njinji dze kushinga bubi abatohwa bazwadzi babo.
Abana mikumbulo kakale abatogalikabgwe, abatolakidza buthu kene kuhwila bamwe zogwadza.
Nenguba beziba nlayo we Ndzimu, kuti banothama zwakajali bakafanigwa nge lufu, abatothama izo koga, koga banolumbidza bamwe kuzwishingabo.
Ndizo iwe unosumikilisa bamwe, auna tjaungabhatila patjili, kene uli ani; ngobe ha usumikilisa bamwe, ngono ube uthama izwezobo zwabanothama unozwisumikilisa.
Toziba kuti kusumikilisa kwe Ndzimu kwakalulwamila ibabo banothama zwithu zwakajalo ngobe kumalebeswa.
Ngono iwe, nthu koga unosumikilisa bamwe koga uzwithamabo. Apa unokumbula kuti unowodzeta kusumikilisa kwe Ndzimu kene?
Kene unolingila pasi nzhazho wawo nkulukulu ne moyo wawo nyolo ne moyo wawo nlefu? Apa autoziba kuti nzhazho we Ndzimu wakathamigwa kukutungamilila mu kushandukila matjinyo awo?
Koga ngekwe bukomba gugo nenge moyo uwo nkukutu kushanduka, unozwibiganyidzila shamu mu zhuba linowoti bushongola gwe Ndzimu ne kusumikilisa kwawo kwakalingisana kukazumbunuka.
Ngobe Ndzimu unowopa mmwe ne mmwe mbhayilo kuyendidzana ne mishingo iye.
Ibabo banodwilila nge moyonlefu beshinga ndulamo* ngono beshaka kukudziwa ne kutetiwa ne kusafa, ibo Ndzimu unowobapa butjilo gusingapele.
Koga ibabo banozwialakana boga, ngono basingawe malebeswa, koga betobela bubi, Ndzimu unowobagwadzilamoyo ukabe ne bushongola mu bali.
Kowobepo kudziyila ne kuhwazogwadza mu bali bose ibabo banoshinga bubi, kutanga ne Bajuta kukoti kuna Bezwitjaba.
Koga kowobe ne kukudziwa ne kutetiwa ne kunyalala kubali bose banoshinga ndulamo, kutangisa nge Bajuta kukoti Bezwitjaba,
ngobe Ndzimu auna shalaulo.
Bose bakatjinya kusina nlayo, banowoloba kuzhe kwe nlayo, koga bose banotjinya bali pasi kwe nlayo banowosumikilisiwa nge nlayo.
Ngobe ate kuli banohwa nlayo, banobe balulwami mbeli kwe Ndzimu, koga nge banolondolodza nlayo ndibo banolulwamisiwa.
Ha Bezwitjaba ibo basina nlayo beshinga nge kwabo zwabo tjinoshakwa nge nlayo, ba nlayo nge kwabo, nenguba basakapiwa nlayo.
Banolakidza kuti tjinoshakwa nge nlayo tjakakwagwa mu mimoyo yabo, ha hana dzabo dzipabo butendeki ne njalakang'wa dzabo tjimwe tjibaka dzibatilika nlandu koga tjimwe tjibaka dzibamila,
mu zhuba Ndzimu usumikilisa nthu uzumbunula zwakasumbikala ndi Kirisiti Jesu, sekwa kuli iko mu ndebo mbuya yangu.
Koga ha uzwidana Njuta wakabiga mu nlayo, uzwikudza ngekwe buzwalani gugo ne Ndzimu
kakale uziba Ndzimu tjaunoshaka wakadiyiwa mu nlayo tjakalulwama,
ngono ha una malebeswa kuti u nkwebi we mapofu, u tjedza tje bamu zhalima,
u nlayi we zwilengwe ne n'diyi we batjetjana, ngobe una nlayo unoziba tjimwe ne tjimwe nge buzhalo kakale tjaunoleba malebeswa.
Iwe ngono unodiya bamwe autozwidiya kene? Iwe unodiya bamwe uti basikwibe, apa iwe unokwiba kene?
Iwe unoti bathu basithame bupombgwe, apa unothama bupombgwe kene? Unoshima midzimu* yakabezhiwa, koga apa unokwiba mu ng'umba dze midzimu yakabezhiwa kene?
Iwe unozwikudza ngekwe nlayo, apa unolengudza Ndzimu ngokutjuluka nlayo kene?
Ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi, “Zina le Ndzimu losapugwa nge Bezwitjaba nge kwenyu.”
Kuthumbigwa* kuna nshingo ha ulondolodza nlayo, koga ha usingalondolodze nlayo kuthumbigwa kuko kowobe kusi kuthumbigwa.
Ndizo ha nthu usakathumbigwa elondolodza nlayo, apa kusathumbigwa kukwe akutowotogwa se thumbigwa kene?
Ngono ibabo basakathumbigwa koga belondolodza nlayo banowokubona nlandu iwe una nlayo wakakwagwa kakale wakathumba koga usingalondolodze nlayo.
Njuta wakwako ate Njuta tjakuzhe koga ne buthumbi gwe malebeswa ate gwakuzhe koga kakale guli gwe mbili.
Njuta wakwako Njuta tja mukati ne buthumbi gwe malebeswa ngegwe moyo, gwe Meya ate gwakakwagwa koga mu nlayo. Nthu wakajalo unokudziwa nge Ndzimu, kusi nge bathu.
Apa ngono Bajuta banoyita pabamwe ngeni kene? Kakale apa nshingo we buthumbi ini kene?
Kobhatsha kwazo, nge zila dzose! Tje kutanga, Ndzimu wakabathama batjengeti be matama awo.
Koga ha bamwe babo basakabe ne bugalimoyo kee? Apa kusagalamoyo ikoku kokolomodza bugalimoyo gwe Ndzimu kene?
Ndodwa! Ndzimu una malebeswa misi yose, nenguba bathu bose bali banyepi, sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Kuti ndizo mululwamisiwe nge matama enyu,
kakale mushayiwe nlandu ha musumikilisiwa.”
Koga ha bubi gwedu gulakidza ndulamo ye Ndzimu tingatini wali? Apa tingati Ndzimu mbi ha utithamila bushongola kene? Ndoleba se kunoleba bathu.
Ndodwa! Ha kwabe kwakajalo Ndzimu ungasumikilisa shango tjini kene?
Koga ha manyepkhwa angu ezhisa kukudziwa kwe Ndzimu ngothama malebeswa e Ndzimu kuti aboneke nge buzhalo, ndi tja bongwa nlandu ntjini kene?
Ini ngono tisingathame mbipo, kuti ndizo kunaka kuzhe? Bamwe bathu banotitjinya mazina beti tojalo. Kubong'wa nlandu kwabo kwakabafanila.
Ngono ngwenu kee? Apa iswi Bajuta toyita pa bamwe kene? Ndodwa ne kutukununu! Ndakaleba kale kuti Bajuta kose ne Bezwitjaba tipasi kwe simba le tjibi,
sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Akuna iye wakalulwama,
ndodwa ne nng'ompela.
Akuna unohwisisa,
akuna unoshaka Ndzimu.
Bose bakafupatila Ndzimu,
bose bakatjinya.
Akuna unothama ndulamo,
ndodwa ne nng'ompela.
Wulo dzabo dzonga zwikumbu zwakaashama
banotjengedza nge ndimi dzabo
bana bushungu gunonga gwe nyoka mu milomo yabo,
milomo yabo izhele bhiso ne bushongola.
Banolibilidzila kutebula lopa,
pabapinda matongo ne buyendasi,
zila ye mbakiso abatoiziba.
Akuna kutja Ndzimu mubali.”
Ngwenu toziba kuti tjimwe ne tjimwe nlayo tjaunoleba, unotjileba kuna ibabo bapasi kwe nlayo, kuti milomo yose inyaladziwe ne shango yose ibe ne kuzwidabilila ku Ndzimu,
ngobe akuna nthu ungalulwamisiwa ngoshinga tjinoshakwa nge nlayo, nge kuti zibo ye tjibi inozha nge nlayo.
Koga ngwenu zila ye Ndzimu ye kululwamisa bathu yakazumbunugwa kuzhe kwe nlayo, nenguba nlayo ne balebesambeli* bepa butendeki nge kwayo.
Ndzimu unolulwamisa bathu nge kugalamoyo kwabo muna Jesu Kirisiti. Ngoti akuna shalaulo,
se bathu bose bakatjinya bakathayela gudzo le Ndzimu.
Koga banolulwamisiwa nge ngoni dze Ndzimu dzili tjipo nge kudzutunugwa kumuna Kirisiti Jesu,

Ndzimu wakadusa Nkololo wawo ili tjibhayilo kuti nge lopa lile tiamutjigwe nge kugalamoyo. Ikoku Ndzimu wakabe ulakidza kuti mu misi yakapinda wakabe ne moyo nlefu ukasibe ne hanya nge zwibi zwe bathu, koga ngwenu una hanya nazo kuti ndizo alakidze ndulamo yawo. Ikoku ekuthama ngoamutjila bathu bose bana kugalamoyo muna Jesu.
Tingazwikudza ngeni ngono? Akuna. Ini tisingazwikudze? Apa tingazwikudza nge mishingo kene? Aa, nge kugalamoyo koga.
Topedza titi, nthu unolulwamisiwa nge kugalamoyo, kusi nge kulondolodza nlayo.
Apa Ndzimu nge we Bajuta koga kene? Apa ate uli Ndzimu we Bezwitjababo kene? Ee, nge we Bezwitjababo.
Se Ndzimu uli nng'ompela unolulwamisa bakathumbigwa nge kugalamoyo kwabo ne basakathumbigwa nge kugalamoyo kwabobo.
Apa ikoku kodwa kuti nge kugalamoyo ikoku tolasha nlayo kene? Ndodwa! Tosimisa nlayo.
Tingatini ngono ngekwa batategulu bedu, Abhurahama?
Ngobe ha Abhurahama akalulwamisiwa nge mishingo, ungabe ana tjimwe tjaangazwikudza nditjo, koga kusi mbeli kwe Ndzimu.
Hwalo dzikatini? “Abhurahama wakagalamoyo Ndzimu, ngono kugalamoyo kukwe kukatogwa ili ndulamo.”
Kuna iye unoshinga, ndipo iye aitotogwa ili tjipo, koga inotogwa ili fanilo.
Kuna iye usingashinge koga egalabgwe Ndzimu, kuti ndiwo unolulwamisa babi, kugalamoyo kukwe kotogwa ili ndulamo.
