Ndizo Dafite naiye bo unoleba ngekwe kukombolegwa kwe nthu unoyi wakakombolegwa nge Ndzimu kuzhe kwe mishingo eti,
“Bakakombolegwa ibabo bakazwiibhatigwa matjinyo abo,
nebana zwibi zwakabukushiwa.
Kwakakombolegwa nthu She waasingobalila zwibi zwizwe.”
Apa iko makombolelo iyawa nge ebakathumbigwa koga, kene nge ebasakathumbigwabo? Se tati, “Kugalamoyo kwa Abhurahama kwakatogwa ili ndulamo.”
Kwakashingikala tjini kuti kutogwe nge zila iyeyo? Wakabe atjithumbigwa kene asathu kathumbigwa? Kwakashingikala asathu kathumbigwa.
Wakaamutjila kuthumbigwa kuli lutjwayo gwe ndulamo yaakabe nayo nge kugalamoyo kukwe asathu kathumbigwa. Ili kunthama tate ba bose bakagalamoyo basakathumbigwa ngono kukatogwa ili ndulamo kubali.
Sa ikoko ndi tatebo be bakathumbigwa, kusi kuti hwuthumbigwa koga, kuli kuti banogalamoyo mu Ndzimu sa Abhurahama tate bedu, basathu bakathumbigwa.
Kugadziwabgwe kwa Abhurahama ne bana babe kuti bathuwe shango, akuzozha ngobe Abhurahama akabe elondolodza nlayo, koga kwakazha nge ndulamo yaakawana nge kugalamoyo.
Ha kuli kuti balondolodzi be nlayo ndibo banowobe bagalithaka, kowobe kudwa kuti kugalamoyo akutodwa tjimwe kakale kugadziwabgwe akuna nshingo.
Nge kuti nlayo unozhisa bushongola gwe Ndzimu, koga pasina nlayo apana tjibi.

Ndizo kugadziwabgwe kwakateyiwa pezhugwi kwe kugalamoyo kuti bose bana ba Abhurahama babe ne gobe mu kugadziwabgwe kumu ngoni dze Ndzimu, kusi ibabo banolondolodza nlayo boga, koga na ibabo banogalamoyo sa Abhurahama. Abhurahama ndi tate bedu tose.
Sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi, “Ndakakuthama tate be zwitjaba zwi njinji.” Mbeli kwe Ndzimu iwo wakagalamoyo, iwo unopa bafi butjilo, unoti ukathama zwithu zwisakatongobe yapo zwikabe yapo.
Mu kugalabgwe, Abhurahama wakagalabgwe nenguba kwakabe kusingagalikebgwe, ndizo kabe “tate be zwitjaba zwinjinji” sekwa akabe adwiwa, kuyi “Bana babo banowobe banjinji sa ikoku.”
Aazonyala meya mu kugalamoyo kukwe ha ekumbula mbili uwe, iwo wakabe ungafanidzanyiwa ne wakafa nge kuti wakabe ana makole angabhata zana, kene ekumbula kusawana bana kwa Sara.
Aazodudumwa kene kuli sagalabgwe kugadzabgwe kwe Ndzimu, koga wakasima mu kugalamoyo, ekudza Ndzimu,
egalamoyo nge bushalo kuti Ndzimu unotubula kushinga tjawakagadzabgwe.
Ndizo wali nge kugalamoyo kukwe, “Ndzimu wakalulwamisa.”
Matama anoti, “kugalamoyo kwakatogwa ili ndulamo,” aazokwaligwa iye ega.
Akakwaligwa naswibo. Iswi tinogalamoyo kugalamoyo kwedu kotogwa ili ndulamo muuli iwo wakamusa Jesu She wedu mu bafi.
Iye wakabulayigwa zwibi zwedu kamusigwa ndulamo yedu.
Ndizo se takalulwamisiwa nge kugalamoyo tina kunyalala ne Ndzimu ndi Jesu Kirisiti, She wedu.
Ngekukwe takawana zila ye kungina mu ngoni dze Ndzimu, dzatili mudzili, ngono nge kugalamoyo toshatha nge kugalabgwe kuti towobe ne gobe mu gudzo* le Ndzimu!
Tjikulu toshatha mu kudziyila kwedu, ngobe toziba kuti kudziyila kozhisa kusimisila.
Kusimisila kozhisa mbumbiko yakasima inozhisa kugalabgwe.
Ngono kugalabgwe akutotibhatisa shoni ngoti ludo gwe Ndzimu gwakadigwa mu mimoyo yedu nge Meya yakayengemala iyo yatakapiwa.
Takati tisina sekwa tingazwibhatsha, Kirisiti kafila babi nge tjibaka tjakalingisana.
Kwakasima kuti nthu afile nlulwami, nenguba pamwe kungathamika kuti mmwe afile nthu una nzhazho.
Koga Ndzimu unolakidza ludo gwawo mutili nge kuti takati titji batjinyi* Kirisiti katifila!
Ndizo se ngwenu takalulwamisiwa nge malopa a Jesu, kukulu kwazo towotjidziwa mu bushongola gwe Ndzimu!
Ha kuli kuti takati tili zwita zwe Ndzimu, tikagadzanyiwa ne Ndzimu nge lufu gwe Nkololo wawo, kutjidziwa kwedu ndiye kukulu.
Kusi ikoko koga, iswi toshatha mu Ndzimu ndi She Jesu Kirisiti, iye wakatigadzanya nge Ndzimu.
Ndizoke, se tjibi tjakazha mu shango nge nthu nng'ompela, lufu gukazhisiwa nge tjibi, lufu gwakaandama nge bathu, ngobe bose bakathama tjibi.
Tjibi tjakabe yapo mu shango nlayo usathu ukabigwa, koga pasina nlayo tjibi atjitobagwa.
Koga lufu gwakabusa kudwa mu nsi wa Adamu kunoti muna wa Mushe ne muna ibabo bakabe basatjinya sa Adamu, iye wakabe ali ifano tje wakabe ewozha, iye Jesu.
Koga tjipo tje Ndzimu atjitonga tjibi. Ha bathu banjinji bakafa nge tjibi tje nthu nng'ompela. Ngoni dze Ndzimu iwulu seni dzinodelukila banji dzinozha nge nthu nng'ompela Jesu Kirisiti.

Tjipo tjoleyana ne tjibi tje nthu iwoyo nng'ompela: Ngobe kusumikilisiwa kwakazha nge jinyo ling'ompela, kwakazwala kubong'wa nlandu, koga tjipo tjinozha shule kwe matjinyo manji, tjozhisa kushayiwa nlandu.
Ha ngekwe jinyo le nthu nng'ompela lufu gwakabusa nge nthu iwoyo, ibabo banoamutjila ngoni dzakawanda ne tjipo tje ndulamo, banowobusa kukulu seni mu butjilo nge nthu nng'ompela iye Jesu Kirisiti.
Ngono se jinyo le nthu nng'ompela lakazhisa kubong'wa nlandu kwe bathu bose, kwakajalobo nshingo we ndulamo we nthu nng'ompela wakazhisila bathu bose kusabong'wa nlandu nenge kubapa bose butjilo.
Ngobe se bathu banji bakabe batjinyi nge kusahwa kwe nthu nng'ompela, sa ikokobo, nge kuhwa kwe nthu nng'ompela, bathu bose banowolulwamisiwa.
Nlayo wakazha kuwandisa jinyo, koga tjibi patja kawanda, ngoni dze Ndzimu dzakawanda kupinda.
Ndizo se tjibi tjakabusa mu lufu, ngoni dze Ndzimu dzobusa nge ndulamo dzititungamilila ku butjilo gusingapele ndi Jesu Kirisiti She wedu.
Towotini ngono? Tidwilile mu tjibi, kuti ndizo ngoni dze Ndzimu dziwande kene?
Ndodwa! Tingati iswi takafa ku tjibi, tikadwilila mutjili tjini wali?
Apa amutoziba kuti iswi tose bakadubikiwa muna Kirisiti Jesu, takadubikiwa mu lufu gugwe kene?
Nge kudubikiwa kwedu, takabiganyiwa naye ne kufa naye mu dubiko. Ndizo se Kirisiti akamusiwa mu lufu nge gudzo* la Tate, sa ikoko naswibo titjile butjilo butshwa.
Ha kuli kuti takabhatshanyiwa naye mu lufu gunonga gugwe, towobhatshanyiwa naye mu kumuka kunonga kukwe.
Toziba kuti mbumbiko yedu yantolo yakabambugwa na Kirisiti, kuti mbumbiko mbi ilobesiwe, ndizo tisitongobe titji balanda be tjibi,
ngobe iye wakafa, wakasunungugwa mu tjibi.
Koga ha takafa na Kirisiti, togalamoyo kuti towotjilabo naye,
ngobe toziba kuti Kirisiti wakamusiwa mu bafi, ngono aangatjafe kakale, lufu agutjina simba munli.
Lufu gwaakafa, wakafa ku tjibi kang'ompela. Koga butjilo gwaanotjila unotjilila Ndzimu.
Ndizo namwibo makafanila kuzwitola muli bakafa ku tjibi, koga motjila ku Ndzimu muna Kirisiti Jesu.
Musitjaletjedzele tjibi tjikalaula mibili yenyu inofa tjimuthama kuti muhwilile njemulo dzatjo.

Musitongo pa ndungululo dze mibili yenyu tjibi, se zwishingisiwa zwe bubi, koga muzwipe Ndzimu se bathu bakamusiwa mu lufu bakayisiwa mu butjilo ne ndungululo dzenyu mudziyise ku Ndzimu, dzili zwishingisiwa zwinoshinga zwe ndulamo.
Ngoti tjibi atjitjowobe ne simba mumuli, se musitjipasi kwe nlayo koga mabe pasi kwe ngoni.
Ngonoke? Apa titjinye, ngobe tisi pasi kwe nlayo koga tili pasi kwe ngoni kene? Ndodwa!
Apa amutoziba kuti ha muzwipa ku mmwe se balanda munhwa, mu balanda be wamunohwa, kene be tjibi tjinoyisa ku lufu, kene be kuhwa kunoyisa ku ndulamo?
Koga ngakubokwe Ndzimu, kuti imwi makatongobe muli balanda be tjibi, motjihwa nge mimoyo yenyu yose zwidiyo zwamakapiwa.
Ngono semakatjisunungugwa mu tjibi matjibe balanda be ndulamo.

Ndoleba ngoleba kwe bathu, ngobe mbumbiko yenyu inasatubula kuhwisisa. Koga sekwa makabe mupa ndungululo dze mibili yenyu mu kutemapala* ne mu bubi gusibushoma, ngwenu ipani ndungululo dze mibili yenyu ndulamo ndizo muyengemadziwe.
Makati muli balanda be tjibi, makabe makasununguka mu ndulamo.
Koga ngwenu makabuyigwa ngeni mu kushinga zwithu zwamunobhatigwa nge shoni kene? Bhelelo le zwithu izwezo lufu!
Koga ngwenu se matjisunungugwa mu tjibi, ngono matjibe balanda be Ndzimu, mbhayilo wamunowana buyengemali, ne bhelelo lago butjilo gusingapele.
Ngobe mbhayilo we tjibi lufu, koga tjipo tje Ndzimu butjilo gusingapele mu na Kirisiti Jesu She wedu.
Apa amutoziba kene zwikamu kuti nlayo unolaula nthu ha atjatjila koga? Ndolebeleka ne bathu banoziba nlayo.
Kongasawoku nkadzi wakalobogwa wakasungwa nge nlayo ku nlume uwe ha nlume atjatjila, koga ha nlume uwe atjifa nkadzi wasununguka mu nlayo we ndobolo.
Ndizo ha elobogwa nge mmwe nlume koga nlume uwe atjatjila, unowodang'wa phombgwekadzi. Koga ha nlume uwe afa, wasununguka mu nlayo iwoyu, ndizo ha elobogwa nge mmwe ate ali phombgwekadzi.
Saikoko zwikamu zwangu makafa ku nlayo, ndi Kirisiti, kuti ndizo ngwenu mube be upoga ba iye wakamusiwa mu bafi, kuti ndizo mube nge zwizwalo mu Ndzimu.
Takati titjatjilila tjinyama njemulo dzedu mbi dzinosasayidzigwa nge nlayo dzakabe dzishinga mu mibili yedu, dzakasima kuti dzizwale mitjelo ye lufu.
Koga ngwenu takasunungugwa mu nlayo, ngoti takafa kuna itjo tjakatongobe tjakatisunga. Ndizo atitoshinga tili pasi kwe nlayo nkulukugwi wakabe wakakwagwa, timu butjilo butshwa gwe Meya.
Towotini ngono? Towoti nlayo tjibi kene? Ndodwa! Koga ha nlayo wakabe usipo ndobe ndisakaziba tjibi. Ha nlayo wakabe usati, “Usitjibe” ndobe ndisakaziba kuti tjiba ini.
Koga ngekwe nlayo tjibi tjakawana tjibaka tje kuthama zila dzose dze tjiba mundili. Kuzhe kwe nlayo tjibi tjakafa.
Ndakatongobe ndili mpenyu kuzhe kwe nlayo, koga nlayo wakati uzha, tjibi tjikamuka, ngono afa.
Ngono nlayo iwo wakabe wakafanila kuzhisa butjilo, ku ndili wakazhisa lufu.
Ngobe tjibi ngowana tjibaka tjakatubula mu nlayo tjikanditjebela, nge kwawo tjikandibulaya.
Ndizo nlayo wakayengemala ne ndayo yakayengemala kakale yakalulwama imbuya.

Apa ikoku kodwa kuti tjakalulwama tjakandizhisila lufu kene? Ndodwa! Tjibi nditjo tjakazhisa lufu ngoshingisa tjakalulwama, kuti ndizo tjibi tjiboneke kuti tjibi. Ngono ndizo nge nlayo tjibi tjolakidziwa tjakabipa kupindisa.
Toziba kuti nlayo u tjimeya, koga imi ndi tjinyama, ndakatengesiwa kube nlanda we tjibi.
Anditohwisisa mishingo yangu, ngobe anditoshinga tjandinoda koga ndoshinga itjo tjandisingashake.
Ndizo ha ndishinga tjandisingashake ndoduma kuti nlayo wakalulwama.
Ndizo akutji imi ndinotjithama koga i tjibi tjigele mundili.
Ngobe ndoziba kuti akuna tjakalulwama tjinogala mundili, ndodwa kuti mu mbumbiko yangu ye tjinyama. Ndingayemula kushinga tjakalulwama koga asitubule kutjishinga;
ngobe tjandinoshinga ate tjakanaka tjandinoshaka shinga, koga, mbipo yandisingashake shinga ndiyo yandinoshinga.
Koga ngwenu andishinga tjandisingashake shinga, akutji imi ndinotjishinga koga tjibi tjinogala mundili.
Ndizo ndotjiwana kwabe nlayo kuti ha ndishaka kushinga tjakalulwama, mbipo ipejo nami.
Ngobe mukati kwangu ndoshathila nlayo we Ndzimu,
koga ndobona nlayo upoga ushinga mu ndungululo dze mbili wangu, ugwa ne nlayo we nkumbulo wangu, ngono undithama nsungwa we nlayo we tjibi unogala mu ndungululo dze mbili wangu.
Ndodziyila seni! Apa ndiani unowondiangulila mu mbili iwoyu we lufu kene?
Ngakubokiwe Ndzimu, iwo unoshinga ikoku ndi She wedu Jesu Kirisiti!
Ndizo ngwenu imi nge kwangu mu nkumbulo wangu ndolondolodza nlayo we Ndzimu, koga mu tjinyama ndolondolodza nlayo we tjibi.
Ndizo ngwenu akutjina unowobong'wa nlandu muna ibabo banotjilila muna Kirisiti Jesu,
ngobe nlayo we Meya ye butjilo muna Kirisiti Jesu wakandisunungula mu nlayo we tjibi ne lufu.
Ngoti Ndzimu wakathama tjakakona nlayo wakabe walelusiwa nge mbumbiko mbi ye tjinyama, ngotumila Nkololo wawo ezha ali mu mbumbiko mbi ye nthu ali tjibhayilo tjinodusa tjibi.
Ndzimu wakathama ikoku, kuti ndizo ndulamo inoshakwa nge nlayo ishinge mutili, iswi banotjila kuyendidzana nge Meya, kusi kuyendidzana nge tjinyama.
Ibabo banotjila tjinyama, mikumbulo yabo imu tjinyama, koga ibabo banotjilila mu Meya, mikumbulo yabo imu zwithu zwe Meya.
Kutjilila mu mikumbulo ye zwe tjinyama kozhisa lufu, kutjilila mu mikumbulo ye zwe Meya kozhisa butjilo ne kunyalala.
Nge kuti nkumbulo we tjinyama tjita ku Ndzimu, autohwilila nlayo we Ndzimu, ngobe dumbu usingatubule.
Ibabo bamu tjinyama abangashathise Ndzimu.
Koga imwi amute muli mu tjinyama, mumu Tjimeya ha kuli kuti dumbu Meya ye Ndzimu igele mumuli. Iye usina Meya ya Kirisiti ate ali nthu wa Kirisiti.
Koga ha Kirisiti ali mumuli, nenguba mibili yenyu yakabulawa nge tjibi, meya yenyu inotjila ngekwe ndulamo.
Ha Meya ya iye wakamusa Jesu mu bafi igala mumuli, iye wakamusa Kirisiti Jesu mu bafi unowopabo mibili yenyu bupenyu, nge Meya iye inogala mumuli.
Ndizo wali zwikamu akutotikombeledza kulaugwa nge tjinyama kene kuli kutjila tjinyama,
ngobe ha mutjila kunoyendidzana nge tjinyama, mowofa. Koga ha mubulaya mishingo isakalulwama ye mbili nge Meya, mowotjila.
Ngobe bose bakatungamigwa nge Meya ye Ndzimu, bana be Ndzimu.
Ngobe amuzoamutjila meya ye bulanda kumubgwiliza mu lutjo, koga makaamutjila Meya inomuthama bana be Ndzimu, yatinoti ndiyo tikalila titi “Abha*, Tate.”
Meya nge kwayo inopa butendeki ne meya yedubo inopa butendeki kuti ti bana be Ndzimu.
Ha tili bana bawo, tibagalithaka be bushe* gwe Ndzimu, ti bagalithaka be Ndzimu tose na Kirisiti; ha kuli kuti todziyila naye, kuti ndizo tikudziwe naye.
Ndobona kuti kudziyila kwe misi ino akuzolizana kufanidzanyiwa nge gudzo latinowozumbunuligwa.
Ngekuti lubumbo gwakalindila nge kushuba kukulu kuzumbunugwa kwe bana be Ndzimu.
Ngobe lubumbo gwakalashisiwa mazwimisilo ago, kusi nge kuda kwago, koga kuli nge kuda kwa iye wakagulashisa ne kugalabgwe kuti gowosunungugwa.
Lubumbo nge kwago gowosunungugwa mu busungwa gwago gwe kubola, gukazhisiwa mu gudzo le kusununguka kwe bana be Ndzimu.
Toziba kuti lubumbo gose gwagala guli mubuyendasi ngothumbgwa kuswikila ngwenu.
Ngono ate lubumbo goga gumubuyendasi, naswibo iswi tina mitjelo ye kutanga ye Meya timubuyendasibo tje mukati setakalindila kuti tithamiwe bana, nge kudzutunugwa kwe mibili yedu.
Ngobe mukugalabgwe ikoku takatjidziwa. Koga kugalabgwe muna tjinoboneka ate kugalabgwe. Ndiani ungagalabgwe tjaanobona kene?
Koga ha tigalabgwe tjatisingabone, totjilindila nge moyo nlefu.
Saikokobo Meya inotibhatsha, mu kusasima kwedu, ngobe atitoziba kutembezela sekwa takafanila; koga Meya nge kwayo inotilebelekela nge kugomela kusingake kukatjenesiwa nge matama.
Ngono Ndzimu iwo unoshakisisa mimoyo ye bathu, unoziba nkumbulo we Meya, ngobe Meya inolebelekela bayengamali kuyendidzana ne kuda kwe Ndzimu.
Toziba kuti mu zwithu zose Ndzimu unoshingila bubuya ibabo banouda, ibabo bakadang'wa kuyendidzana nge ndongoloso yawo.
Ibabo Ndzimu bawakaziba kale wakababigila ntomebo kuti bashandugwe bafanane ne Nkololo wawo, kuti abe mbano pakati kwe thobeledzani njinji.
Ngono ibabo Ndzimu bawakabigila ntome, wakabadana, ibabo bakadang'wa wakabalulwamisa, ngono ibabo bawakalulwamisa wakabakudza.
Towotini ngono ngekwa ikoku? Ha Ndzimu uli mile naswi, ndiani unganyanyayidzana naswi?
Apa iwo usakatjiba Nkololo wawo koga wakanthama tjibhayilo nge kwedu tose, apa autowotipa bo zwithu zose naye kene?
Ndiani unowobona bashalugwa be Ndzimu nlandu kene? Ndzimu ndiwo unolulwamisa bathu.
Ndiani ngono unowobona nlandu? Apa ndi Kirisiti Jesu, iye wakafa, ee, iye wakamusiwa mu bafi uku luboko gwe luji* gwe Ndzimu unotilebelekela kene?
Ndiani ungatithubukanya ne ludo gwa Kirisiti? Apa i manikano, kene kuhwazogwadza kukulukulu, kene kudziyidziwa, kene zhala, kene kuyenda mbujo, kene mbatsha, kene thumo linobulaya?
Sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Nge kwenyu tobulawa zhuba lose,
tobhakhwa se pkhwizi dzinonobhayiwa.”
Aa, mu zwithu zose izwezwi topinda bakundi munli iye wakatida.
Ndina malebeswa ekuti akuna tjingatithubukanya ne ludo gugwe, lufu kene butjilo, batumwa be kudzimu kene meya mibi kene zwithu zwiyapo, kene zwithu zwinozha, kene masimba e babi,
kene pezhugwi, kene pasi akuna tjimwe mu lubumbo gose tjingatubula kutithubukanya ne ludo gwe Ndzimu igo gwatinowana ndi Kirisiti Jesu She wedu.
Ndoleba malebeswa muna Kirisiti, anditonyepa. Hana yangu inonditendekela mu Meya yakayengemala,
kuti ndina buyendasi bukulu ne kuhwa zogwadza mu moyo wangu kusingapele.
Ngobe ndoyemula kuti imi nge kwangu ndingabe ndakalongwa bhiso athubukanyiwa na Kirisiti kuyitila makamu angu, ibabo be ludzi gwangu
ibo bathu be Iziraela. Tjabo bakashalugwa kube bana, i gudzo le Ndzimu ne zwidumano ne kupiwa nlayo ne kunamata ne kugadziwabgwe.
Bobatategulu babo ludzi gwa Kirisiti panyama, Ndzimu iwo upezhugwi kwa bose, ngaukudziwe nge kusingapele! Ngakujalo.
Akutodwa kuti dama le Ndzimu lakakong'wa, ngobe ate kuli kuti bose bana be Iziraela, Baiziraela.
Kakale akutodwa kuti bose bana ba Abhurahama, ngobe bali be ludzi gwa Abhurahama. Koga Ndzimu wakati kuna Abhurahama, “Bana babo banowodang'wa nge zina la Isaki.”
Nge imwe zila kodwa kuti bana bakazwagwa ngekwe nyama ate ibo bana be Ndzimu, be kugadziwabgwe ndibo bana be Ndzimu bakwako;
ngobe kugadzabgwe kwakalebgwa sahwoku, “Nge tjibaka tjakabigwa ndowobuya ngono Sara unowowana nkololo.”
Kusi ikoko koga, Rebheka wakati awana bana ne nlume nng'ompela, ibo tate bedu Isaki,
nenguba kwakati basathu bakazwagwa kakale basathu bakathama tjimwe tjakanaka kene tjakabipa, kuti ndizo kushalula kwe Ndzimu kudwilile, kusi nge mishingo, kuli nge kushalula kwawo,
Rebheka wakadwiwa kukayi, “Hwola inowoshingila ntjetjana.”
Sekwa kwakakwagwa, kuyi “Jakubo ndakan'da, koga Esau ndakambenga.”
Towotini ngono? Apa tingati Ndzimu autosumikilisa nge ndingisanyo kene? Ndodwa!
Ngobe ukati kuna Mushe,
“Ndowohwila ngoni iye wandinohwila ngoni,
ngono ndowohwila zogwadza iye wandinoda kuhwila zogwadza.”
Ndizo akutodwa mu kuda kene mu matatabuko e nthu koga kodwa mu ngoni dze Ndzimu.
Hwalo dze Ndzimu dzoti kuna Faro we Egipiti, “Ndakamusila ikoku, kuti ndilakidze simba langu mukuli kakale kuti zina langu lilebgwe mu shango yose.”
Ndizo Ndzimu unohwila ngoni iye waunoda kuhwila ngoni, koga unokukutadza moyo iye waunoda kukukutadza.
Mmwe wenyu ungati kundili, “Ngono ini Ndzimu utjatibona nlandu? Ndiani unganyanyayidzana ne kuda kwawo?”
Koga uani iwe ungadabidzana ne Ndzimu? Apa tjakabumbiwa tjingati kuna wakatjibumba, “Ini wakandibumba uijali kene?”
Apa mbumbi we hali aana simba mu ntapkhwi kubumba hali dze mishingo ipezhugwi ne dze mishingo ipasi nge ntapkhwi iwo zwawo kene?
Kungayingwi ha Ndzimu wakabe ushaka kulakidza bushongola gwawo ne kuyita kuti simba lawo lizibgwe, koga ukabe ne moyonlefu kuna bawakagwadzilamoyo, ibo bakabe bakafanila kuloba,
kuti ndizo ulakidze fumwa ye gudzo lawo kuna bawakahwila zogwadza ibo bawakagala washalulila gudzo,
naswibo takadangwa, kusi Bajuta koga, ne Bezwitjababo.
Sekwa unoleba mu lukwalo gwa Hosea uti,
“Ibabo bakabe basi bathu bangu,
ndowobadana ‘Bathu bangu,’
na iye wandakabe ndisingade,
ndowon'dana ‘N'diwa wangu.’
Ne mu bugalo kwakayi kubali,
‘Ate muli bathu bangu,’
banowodang'wa ‘Bakololo be Ndzimu unotjila.’ ”
Isaya unomimila ngekwe Iziraela eti,
“Nenguba bunji gwe Baiziraela gunga nsetje we gungwa,
kowotjidziwa malimbelimbe koga.
Ngobe She banowoshinga ngolibilidza
kakale ne buzhalo kusumikilisa kwabo mu shango.”
Kakale se kwakalebegwa mbeli ndi Isaya eti,
“She bana masimba ha babe basakatisiyila bana,
tobe takanga Sodoma, tikathamiwa se Gomora.”
Towotini ngono? Towoti Bezwitjaba bakabe basingashake ndulamo, ngono bakayiwana iyo ndulamo nge kugalamoyo,
koga Iziraela, iyo yakatemelela mu ndulamo inozha nge nlayo aizotubula kushingikadza nlayo.
Nge kutini? Nge kuti abazobe beshaka nge kugalamoyo, koga bakabe beshaka ndulamo nge mishingo. Bakakuthiwa nge bgwe linokutha,
sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Bonani, ndobiga mu Ziyoni*
bgwe linowokutha bathu,
shongwe inowobaliga,
iye unogalamoyo munli
aatowobhatisiwa shoni.”
Zwikamu, kuyemula kwe moyo wangu ne ntembezelo wangu ku Ndzimu hwuti Baiziraela batjidziwe.
Ndopa butendeki ngekwabo kuti banoshingayilila Ndzimu, koga kushingayila kwabo akuna luzibo.
Nge kushaya luzibo ngekwe ndulamo inodwa mu Ndzimu, ne kushaka kuzwithamila kwabo, abazozwipa mu ndulamo ye Ndzimu.
Ngobe Kirisiti ndiye bhelelo le nlayo, kuti mmwe ne mmwe unakugalamoyo alulwamisiwe.
Mushe wakakwala eti, “Iye unolondolodza ndulamo inolebgwa nge nlayo unowotjila ndiyo.”
Koga ndulamo yakatemelela mu kugalamoyo ikati, “Usitongo zwibhuzwa mu moyo uti ndiani, unowotathila kudzimu?” Kodwa kuti kudelusila Kirisiti pasi.
Kene “Ndiani unowodelukila mu gomba?*” Kodwa kumusa Kirisiti mu bafi.
Koga dama le Ndzimu likatini kene? “Dama lipejo nawe, limu nlomo ne mu moyo uwo.” Ndilo dama le kugalamoyo, latinosumikila.
Ngekuti ha uleba nge nlomo uwo uti Jesu ndi She uduma mu moyo uwo kuti Ndzimu wakammusa mu bafi, unowotjidziwa.
Ngekuti nthu unoduma nge moyo uwe, ndizo kalulwamisiwa, kaleba nge nlomo uwe, katjidziwa.
Hwalo dzoti, “Akuna iye unogalamoyo munli unowobhatisiwa shoni.”
Akuna kuthubukana pakati kwe Njuta ne N'giriki, ngobe She iyezwe ndiye She wa bose, ngono unokombolela bose banon'dana.
Ngekuti, “Mmwe ne mmwe unodana zina la She unowotjidziwa.”
Koga bathu bangan'dana tjini iye wabasakagalamoyo? Ngono bangagalamoyo tjini muna wabasakahwa nge kukwe? Kakale banowohwa tjini kusina nsumikili.
Ngono bathu banowosumikila tjini basatumwa? Sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi “Kwakanaka seni ha basumikili be zhisa ndebo mbuya!”
Koga ate bose bakaamutjila ndebo mbuya. Isaya wakati, “She, ndiani wakagalamoyo tjaakahwa naswi?”
Ndizo wali, kugalamoyo kodwa muna tjawahwa, tjawahwa tjodwa mukusumikigwa kwa Kirisiti.
Koga ndobhuzwa nditi: Apa abazohwa kene? Tjose bakahwa!
“Mahwi e basumikili akazhala shango yose,
matama abo kaswika ku phelelo dze shango.”
Ndobhuzwa kakale nditi: Apa bathu be Iziraela abazohwisisa kene? Mushe kutanga wakati,
“Ndowokuthama kuti uthamile fupa basi itjaba,
kuti ndizo mube ne fupa
nge itjaba tjisakatjenjela
ndowokugwadzisamoyo.”
Ngono Isaya unoleba akasima eti,
“Ndakawang'wa ndi ibabo bakabe basingandishake,
ndakazwilakidza kuna ibabo bakabe basingabhuzwe nge kwangu.”
Koga ngekwe Iziraela kati,
“Zhuba lose ndakatjinga nge maboko angu,
nditjingila bathu basingahwe kakale banonyanyayidza.”
Ndobhuzwa ngono kuti, apa Ndzimu wakalamba bathu bawo kene? Ndodwa! Imi nge kwangu ndi N'iziraela, tjizekugwana tja Abhurahama ndili we nsha wa Bhenjamini.
Ndzimu auzolamba bathu bawo, bawakaziba kuli kale. Apa amutoziba kuti Hwalo dzotini ngekwa Elija, se kwaanokumbila Ndzimu kuti ubone Iziraela nlandu?
Kati, “She, Baiziraela bakabulaya balebesambeli benyu, bakapkhwanya zwibeso zwenyu zwe zwibhayilo, ndimi ndoga ndasala, ngono banoshaka ku ndibulaya.”
Koga Ndzimu wakan'dabila uitini kene? Wakati, “Ndakazwibiganyidzila balume bali zwiwulu zwili kutendeka basakatongothigamila Bhaale.”
Ndizo kwakajalo nangwenu, kuna malimbelimbe Ndzimu awakashalula nge ngoni dzawo.
Koga ha akashalugwa kwakabigwa mu ngoni dzawo, kodwa kuti kushalula akuzotemelela mu mishingo, ha kwabe kwakajalo, ngoni dzawo dzingabe dzisitji ngoni.
Ngono kee? Bathu be Iziraela bakakong'wa kuwana tjabakabe beshaka. Bashalugwa bakatjiwana, koga bakasala bose bakakukutala.
Sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Ndzimu wakabapa meya ye wope,
kuti mesho asibone ne zebe dzisihwe,
kuswikila zhuba lino.”
Ngono Dafite kati,
“Dzene butjilo gwabo gungabe dati ne bhuzhu,
ne tjinobakutha ne kulobgwa kwabo.
Mesho abo ngaapofupadziwe, kuti ndizo basibone;
bagogonyale mu nge kusingapele.”
Ndizo ndobhuzwa, apa bakakuthiwa, kuti ndizo bawe kene? Ndodwa! Koga ngotjinya kwabo, jidzo lakazha kuna Bezwitjaba, kuti ndizo Baiziraela babe ne fupa.
Ngono ha kutjinya kwabo kufumisa shango, ne kukong'wa kwabo kufumisa Bezwitjaba. Kutjidziwa kwe Baiziraela kowopapha fumwa inopinda iyeyi kanjinji seni!
Ngwenu ndolebeleka namwi Bezwitjaba. Se ndili ntumwa kuna Bezwitjaba, ndokudza nshingo wangu,
kuti ndizo Bajuta, ibo be ludzi gwangu babe ne fupa, kuti ndizo bamwe babo batjidziwe.
Ngobe ha kulambiwa kwabo kudwa kugadzanyiwa kwe shango, kuamutjigwa kwabo kowobeni ha isi kutjila kwe bafi koga?
Ha ipemu tje tjiwunga tjidusiwa se tjipo tje kutanga, tjakayengemala, tjiwunga tjose tjobe tjakayengemala, ngono ha ndzi we nti wakayengemala ne thabi dzawo dzakayengemala.
Koga ha thabi dzimwe dze ntoba wakadzwagwa dzakathubugwa, imwi lutabi gwe ntoba we shango mukamedzekiwa muuli, mu magalo abo kuti mube ne gobe mu nti we ntoba,
musitongo zwikudza se munopinda thabi. Ha muzwikudza, mualakane kuti imwi ate imwi makabhata ndzi koga ndzi ndiwo wakabhata imwi.
Koga mowoti, “Thabi dzakathubugwa kuti timedzekiwe.”
Ikoku malebeswa. Bakathubugwa nge kusagalamoyo kwabo, koga imwi musime nge kugalamoyo. Ndizo musizwikudze, koga mube ne kutja.
Ha Ndzimu usakatjiba thabi dze wakadzwagwa, namwibo autowomutjiba.
Bonani nzhazho ne bushongola gwe Ndzimu. Una bushongola kuna ibabo bakawa, koga una nzhazho kumuli ha mudwilila mu nzhazho wawo. Koga kuzhe kwa ikoku, namwibo mowothubugwa.
Ngono ne bamwebo abasadwilila mu kusagalamoyo banowomedzekiwa kakale, ngobe Ndzimu una simba le kubamedzeka kakale.

Ngono ha imwi makathubugwa mu ntoba we shango nge mbumbiko, mube mu medzekiwa kusingayendidzane ne mbumbiko, mu ntoba wakadzwagwa, ngono kowobe kulelu kungapani kumedzeka kakale thabi idzedzi dzakathubugwa muna mayi badzo kene?
Kuti musizwipe butjenjedu gwa musinago, zwikamu, ndoshaka kuti muhwisise masazibgwe iyawa. Kukukutala kwakangina mu bamwe ba Iziraela, kuswikila Bezwitjaba betjidziwa nge buzhalo.
Ndizo Iziraela yose inowotjidziwa, sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Nsununguli unowodwa ku Ziyoni,
unowodusa bubi gose mu ludzi gwa Jakubo.
Ngono etji nditjo tjinowobe tjidumano* tjangu nabo,
ha ndidusa zwibi zwabo.”
Nge kwe ndebo mbuya Baiziraela zwita zwe Ndzimu nge kwenyu, ngoshalugwa Baiziraela banodiwa ngekwa bobatategulu babo;
ngobe zwipo zwe Ndzimu ne kudana kwawo azwitoshanduka.
Sekwa makatongobe musingahwe Ndzimu, ngono ngwenu makahwigwa zogwadza nge kusahwa kwabo,
ndizo naibo bakashaya kuhwa kuti se kwamakahwigwa zogwadza, na ibobo bahwigwe zogwadza.
Ndzimu wakathama bathu bose basungwa be kusahwa kwabo, kuti ndizo ubahwile ngoni bose.
Bathu bedu! Fumwa ye butjenjedu ne luzibo gwe Ndzimu zwikulu seni! Kusumikilisa kwawo akuna ungakutjenesa, ndiani ungalonda zila dzawo kene?
“Ndiani wakaziba nkumbulo wa She?
Ndiani wakabe nkumbuludzi wabo?
Kene ndiani wakatongoupa tjipo
kuti ekotjibuzigwa?”
Zwithu zose zwakabumbiwa ndiwo, zwithu zose zwiyapo ndiwo, kakale zwili zwawo. Ndzimu ngaukudziwe nge kusingapele kose! Ngakujalo.
Ndizoke, zwikamu, ngekwe ngoni dze Ndzimu ndomukumbila kuti mupe Ndzimu mibili yenyu ili tjibhayilo tjinotjila, tjakayengemala tjinoamutjilika ku Ndzimu, kuli iko kunamata kwenyu kwe Tjimeya.

Musizwifananye ne shango ino, koga shandugwani ngobumbiwa butshwa, ngobumbiwa butshwa kwe mikumbulo yenyu, kuti ndizo mulakidze tjingabe tjili kuda kwe Ndzimu ne tjakalulwama tjingaamutjilika kakale ne tjakapelela.
Ngono nge ngoni dzandapiwa ndoti ku mmwe ne mmwe wenyu, asizwikumbule kupinda sekwa akafanila kuzwikumbula. Koga azwikumbule kulizana nge kugalamoyo kwawakapiwa nge Ndzimu.
Koga se mu mbili nng'ompela tina ndungululo njinji ngono ndungululo idzedzi dzose dzina mishingo yakasiyana.
Ndizo nenguba tili banjinji, ti mbili nng'ompela muna Kirisiti, koga mmwe ne mmwe i ndungululo ye mmwe.
Setina zwipo zwakakasiyana kuyendidzana ne ngoni dzatakapiwa ngatizwishingeseni. Ha tjipo tje nthu ili kulebesambeli ngaakushingise kulizana nge kugalamoyo kukwe,
ha kuli kushinga, ngaashinge; ha kuli kudiya, ngaadiye;
ha kuli kukulumbidza bamwe, ngaakulumbidze; ha kuli kupa ngaape akasununguka; iye unobhatsha, ngaabhatshe akalonga meya; ha kuli mahwilozogwadza ngaakushinge nge kushatha.
Ludo ngagube gwakwako. Bengani tjakabipa, mubhate makasimisa muna tjakalulwama.
Danani nge ludo gwe zwikamu, pindanani mu kukudzana.
Shingani kwazo musibe simbe. Meya ngaimulonge nyota, shingayililani She.
Shathani mu kugalabgwe kwenyu, ibeni ne moyonlefu mu kudziyidziwa, mutembezele misi yose.
Ipani bagalimoyo zwabanosheta, muzwiwolobedze kuamutjile bezi mu mizi yenyu.
Kombolelani banomudziyidza, mubakombolele musibalonge bhiso.
Shathani ne bakashatha, lilani ne banolila.
Gadzanani; musizwikudze, koga muzwishanganye ne be tjimo tjipasi mu butjilo, musitongo zwitola kuti makatjenjela moga.
Musibgwilizile nge tjakabipa. Ibeni ne njele kushinga tjakafanila mu mesho e mmwe ne mmwe.
Ha kutubuka muna sekwa munobona, tjilani nge kunyalala ne mmwe ne mmwe.
Badiyiwa bangu musitongo bgwilizila, koga letjani bushongola gwe Ndzimu gushinge; ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi, “Kubgwilizila nge kwangu, ndowobgwilizila, kojalo She.”
Kwakakwagwa muhwalo kuti, “Tjita tjitjo ha tjina zhala, utjipe zojiwa; ha tjina nyota, utjipe vula tjing'we; ngobe ngothama ikoku unowobe ubutitika masimbe anothuta mu nsholo uwe.”
Musikuligwe nge bubi, koga kundani bubi nge ndulamo.
Mmwe ne mmwe ngaazwiyise pasi kwe babusi, ngobe akuna bushe guyapo aagusi gunodwa ku Ndzimu, bushe guyapo gwakabigwa nge Ndzimu.
Ndizo iye unopandukila bushe gopandukila tjakalaugwa nge Ndzimu, ngono ibabo banothama sa ikoko banowozwizhisila kusumikilisiwa.
Ngobe balauli abatotjisa kuna banoshinga ndulamo, koga banotjisa kuna banothama tjisakalulwama. Apa unoshaka kuti usitje unobusa kene? Ndizo thama tjakalulwama unowodumana nawe,
ngobe balauli balanda be Ndzimu, kuti ndizo mululwamigwe. Koga ha ushinga tjakabipa, ipapo untje, ngobe aazosengela bukanu suli. Nlanda we Ndzimu unoshingikadza shamu ye Ndzimu kuna unoshinga mbipo.
Ndizo ngekwa ikoku nthu wakafanila kuzwiyisa pasi kwe balauli kusi kuyitila shamu ye Ndzimu koga, ne kuyitila hana.
Ndizo wali molipa lukhetho, ngobe babusi banoshingila Ndzimu abe shinga mishingo yabo nge buzhalo.
Ndizo lipani bose bamunokolota, mulipe lukhetho kuna bakafanila gulipiwa, mulipe mari kuna bakafanila lipiwa, tetani bakafanila tetiwa mukudze bakafanila kudziwa.
Musibe ne wamuna nlandu naye, koga danani, ngobe iye unoda mmwe walondolodza nlayo.
Milayo inoti, “Usithame bupombgwe, usibulaye, usikwibe, usitjibe.” Milayo iyeyi ne mimwe yose, yakapetegwa mu nlayo nng'ompela unoti, “Ida mmwe nthu sekwa unozwida.”
Ludo agutothamila mbakidzani mbipo ndizo wali, kuda hwulondolodza nlayo wose.
Kuzhe kwa ikoku moziba kuti tjibaka ndi tjipi, moziba kuti tjazha nge buzhalo kuti mumuke mu hwope dzenyu, ngobe jidzo lipejo naswi ngwenu kupinda patakatangisa kugalamoyo.
Busiku gwapinda ntolo kwabe masikati. Ngatilashileni kutjena mishingo ye zhalima, ngono ngatiambaleni zwiambalo zwe ngwa zwe tjedza.
Ngatizwibhateni zubuyanana se bathu banotjila mu masikati, kusina kusazwibhata kene kulaladza, kusina bupombgwe kene kusazwidziba, kusina ngwa kene fupa.
Koga muzwiambadze She Jesu Kirisiti, ngono musikudze kugutsha mbumbiko dzenyu dze bubi.
Amutjilani nthu usakasima mu kugalamoyo, koga musikakabadzane naye ngekwe mikumbulo iye.
Nthu mmwe ungabe ne kugalamoyo kukulu kulu kwaanotubula kuja tjimwe ne tjimwe, koga nthu usakasima mu kugalamoyo unoja milibo koga.
Nthu unoja tjimwe ne tjimwe ngaasilingile pasi usingaje, usingaje asibone nlandu unoja tjimwe ne tjimwe, ngobe Ndzimu wakan'amutjila.
Uani iwe kubona nlandu nlanda we mmwe? Tetshi uwe ndiye unowobona kuti kene unopundula kene unokong'wa. Ngono unowopundula, ngobe Ndzimu uwe unotubula kunthama kuti apundule.
Nthu unotola limwe zhuba se lakayengemala kupinda limwe, koga mmwe etola kuti mazhuba wose anofanana. Mmwe ne mmwe wakafanila kube ne malebeswa azhele mu nkumbulo uwe.

Iye unokudza zhuba limwe unoshinga eijalo kukudza She, iye unoja tjimwe ne tjimwe unokushinga kukudza Ndzimu, ngobe unobokela Ndzimu zojiwa. Iye usingaje zwimwe zwithu unokushinga kukudza She, ngono unoboka Ndzimu.
Akuna wedu unozwitjilila, akuna wedu unozwifila.
Ha titjila totjilila She, ha tifa tofila She. Ndizo kene titjila kene tifa, ti ba She.
Ngobe nangwenu Kirisiti wakafa, ngono kabgwilila mu butjilo kuti abe She we banotjila ne bakafa.
Ini usumikilisa ikamu tjitjo kene? Kene ini ulingila ikamu tjitjo pasi kene? Tose towoma mbeli kwe Ndzimu kusumikilisiwa ndiwo.
Ngobe kwakakwagwa kukayi,
“Nge malebeswa ha nditjila, kojalo She,
mmwe ne mmwe unowondithigamila,
ne mmwe ne mmwe unowoleba kuti ndi Ndzimu.”
Mmwe ne mmwe wedu unowozwidabiligwa ku Ndzimu.
Ndizo ngatimiseni kusumikilisa, koga tisitongo zwimisila kubiga mu zila ye ikamu* tjedu tjimwe tjingatjikutha kene tjingandzinganyidza.
Ndoziba nge buzhalo muna She Jesu kuti akuna zojiwa zwakatemapala nge kwazo, koga zwakatemapalila nthu unobe ekumbula kuti zwakatemapala.
Ha uhwisa zogwadza ikamu tjitjo nge tjaunoja, ipapo autjashingila mu ludo. Usiti nge kuja kuko ukabulaya ikamu tjitjo itjo Kirisiti tjaakafila.
Usiletje kululwama kuko kukalebgwa bubi,
ngobe bushe gwe Ndzimu ate guli kuja ne kung'wa, koga nge gwe ndulamo ne kunyalala ne kushatha mu Meya yakayengemala.
Ndizo iye unoshingila Kirisiti nge zila yakajali, unoshathisa Ndzimu kakale unokudziwa nge bathu.
Ngatitjisalani shule tjimwe ne tjimwe tjinothama kunyalala ne kubhatshana mu kusimisana.
Musikolomodze nshingo we Ndzimu nge zila ye zojiwa. Zojiwa zose zwibuyanana, koga kwakabipa kuja tjimwe tjinowothama mmwe kawila mu tjibi.
Akuzolulwama kuti uje nyama kene ung'we nkumbi kene uthame tjimwe koga tjingaliga ikamu tjitjo, kugalamoyo.
Kugalamoyo kwaunako ngakube pakati kuko ne Ndzimu. Kowoshatha iye usingazwisumikilise muna tjaanothama.
Koga ha edudumwa ngekwe tjaanoja, Ndzimu unombona nlandu ha etjija, ngobe tjaanothama atjizodwa mu kugalamoyo, ngono tjimwe ne tjimwe tjisingadwe mu kugalamoyo tjibi.
Iswi bakasima takafanila kubhatsha basakasima mu kundambarika kwabo, kusi kuzwishathisa.
Mmwe ne mmwe wedu ngaashathise waagele naye, anthamile bubuya kuti ansimise.
Ngoti Kirisiti aazozwishathisa. Koga sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi, “Masapa a ibabo bakamutuka akawila pezhugwi kwangu.”
Tjimwe ne tjimwe tjakakwagwa mu misi yakapinda, tjakakwaligwa kutidiya, kuti ndizo tizwibhatilile nenge kukulumbidziwa nge hwalo kuti tibe ne kugalabgwe.
Dzene Ndzimu, iwo unopa kubhatilila ne gulumbidzo, ungamupa kutjidzana nge hwanano sekunoshakwa ndi Kirisiti Jesu,
kuti ndizo mukudze Ndzimu, ibo Tate ba She wedu Jesu Kirisiti, nge hwi ling'ompela.
Ndizo amutjilanani, sekwamakaamutjigwa ndi Kirisiti ngekwe gudzo le Ndzimu.
Ngobe ndomubudza kuti Kirisiti wakabe nlanda we bakathumbigwa kulakidza malebeswa e Ndzimu kuti azhadzise kugadzabgwe kwakagadziwabgwe bobatategulu babo,
kuti ndizo Bezwitjaba bakudze Ndzimu ngekwe mahwilo zogwadza awo. Sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Ndizo ndowomukudza pakati kwe Bezwitjaba,
ndowomumbila njimbo dzinokudza!”
Ngono kakale kukayi,
“Shathani ne bathu be Ndzimu imwi Bezwitjaba!”
Zwako kakale kukayi,
“Kudzani She mose Bezwitjaba,
ngono bathu bose ngabankudze!”
Ngono kakale Isaya kati,
“We ludzi gwa Jesi unowozha;
iye unomilika kabusa Bezwitjaba,
munli Bezwitjaba banowogalabgwe.”
Dzene Ndzimu, iwo unopa kugalabgwe, ungamupa kushatha kose ne kunyalala mu kugalamoyo kwenyu, kuti ndizo nge simba le Meya yakayengemala kugalabgwe kuwande mumuli.
Zwikamu zwangu, nge kwangu ndogutshika kuti muzhele ndulamo ne kuti muna zibo yose ne kuti imwi motubula kudiyana.
Koga muzwimwe ndamukwalila ndakasimisamoyo ili kumukumbuludza, ndiyikhwa nge ngoni dzakapiwa ne Ndzimu,
kube nshingi wa Kirisiti Jesu kuna Bezwitjaba. Ndoshinga se mpirisiti mu kusumikila ndebo mbuya ye Ndzimu, kuti ndizo tjibhayilo tje Bezwitjaba tjiamutjigwe nge Meya yakayengemala.
Muna Kirisiti Jesu, ndinako kuti ndizwikudzile nshingo wangu ku Ndzimu wangu.
Ngono ndowosimamoyo, ngono aleba ngekwe tjakashingwa ndi Kirisiti endishingisa kutungamila Bezwitjaba mu kuhwa, nge dama ne mishingo,
nenge simba le zwilakidzo ne matjenamiso ne simba le Meya yakayengemala. Kuti ndizo kudwa mu Jerusalema kuyenda tjose kupoteleka kunoti ku Ilirikumu ndakasumikila ndebo mbuya ya Kirisiti nge buzhalo.
Njemulo dzangu mutjibaka tjose dzagala kuli kusumikila ndebo mbuya muna basingazibe Kirisiti, kuti ndisidwe ndibaka muthiwa dzakabakwa nge upoga.
Koga sekwa kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Ibabo basakabudziwa nge kukwe banowobona,
kakale banowohwisisa basakahwa nge kukwe.”
Ndizo ndakabe ndimanikana kanjinji kuzha kumuli.
Koga ngwenu, ngoti ndapedza nshingo wangu mu mituthu iyeyi ne kuti tjingakwandakayemula makole manjinji kuzha kumuli,
ndogalabgwe kuti ndowomubona ha ndipindila ku Sipeini nenge kuti mowondibhatsha mu gwendo gwangu, shule kwe kushathilana mu kumukumba nge bufupi.
Mu tjibaka itjetji wali ndoyenda ku Jerusalema kuyisa bhatsho ku bayengemali.
Ngoti be Makedoniya ne Akaiya bakabe ne kushatha mu kudusa bakashangana bedusila bayengemali be Jerusalema.

Bakashathila kuthama saikoko, ngono nge malebeswa kwakalingisana kuti bababhatshe. Se Bajuta bakakobana makombolelo abo e tjimeya ne Bezwitjaba, Bezwitjaba bakafanila kushingisa zwithu zwabo zwe tjinyama kubhatsha Bajuta.
Ngono ndowoti ndapedza nshingo iwoyu, ndabapa zwipo zose izwezwi zwabakakubunganyigwa, ndowopinda ne kumuli ndiyenda ku Sipeini.
Koga ndoziba kuti ndowoti ndizha kumuli, ndowozha nge buzhalo gwe makombolelo a Kirisiti.
Ndomukulumbidza zwikamu, nge zina la She wedu Jesu Kirisiti nenge ludo gwe Meya kuti mu bhatane nami mu kunditembezelela kwazo ku Ndzimu,
kuti ndivikiligwe muna basingagalemoyo mu Judiya ne kuti nshingo wangu ku Jerusalema uamutjilike ku bayengemali.
Kuti ndizo, nge kuda kwe Ndzimu, ndizhe kumuli nge kushatha kakale ndinyatutusiwe nge kube namwi.
Ndzimu we kunyalala ngaube namwi mose. Ngakujalo.
Ndomuzibisa hazwadzi yedu Febhe, ntiyakoni* mu gubungano le Kenikiriya,
mun'amutjile muna She nge kwakafanila bayengemali kakale mumpe bhatsho imwe ne imwe yaangashaka mumuli, ngobe wakabe mbatshi we bathu banjinji kose nami dumbu wakandibhatsha.
Dumilisani Purisila na Akhwila, bashingi nami muna Kirisiti Jesu.
Bakalonga matjilo abo mu mbhatsha nge kwangu. Kusi imi koga, ne gubungano lose le Bezwitjaba lobatenda.
Dumilisanibo gubungano linoshanganila ku nzi* wabo.
Dumilisani Epeneto wandinoda, wakabe iye we kutanga kushanduligwa muna Kirisiti mu ntuthu we Ezhiya.
Dumilisani Mariya iye wakamushingila kwazo.
Dumilisani makamu angu Andironiko na Juniyasi busungwa nami. Banozibgwa kwazo pakati kwe batumwa kakale bakaamutjila Kirisiti imi ndisathu.
Dumilisani Ampiliyato wandinoda muna She.
Dumilisani Ubhanosi nshingi naswi muna Kirisiti ne n'diwa wangu Sitakisi.
Dumilisani Apelesi wakagagwabgwe muna Kirisiti. Dumilisani ibabo be nsha wa Arisitobhulo.
Dumilisani Herodiyoni gamu langu. Dumilisani ibabo be nsha wa Narikiso ba muna She.
Dumilisani Tirifina na Tirifosa, bakadzi ibabo banoshinga kwazo muna She. Dumilisani n'diwa wangu Pesisi iye mmwe nkadzi wakashinga kwazo muna She.
Dumilisani Rufu, iye unozibgwa kwazo muna She, na mmeyabe, ibo bakabe mme kundilibo.
Dumilisani Asinikirito, Fulegoni, Hemesi, Patirobhasi, Hemasi ne zwikamu zwabanazo.
Dumilisani Filologo, Juliya, Nereusi ne hazwadzi iye na Olimpasi kose ne bayengemali babanabo.
Dumilisanani ne kubutjilana kwakayengemala. Makubungano wose a Kirisiti anomudumilisa.
Ndomukumbila zwikamu, kube ne njele muna ibabo banozhisa kuthubukana kakale bebiga zwinopinganyidza mu zila dzenyu zwinonyanyayidzana ne kudiya kwamakawana. Thubukanani nabo.
Ngoti bathu bakajalo abatoshingila She wedu Kirisiti, koga banoshingila njemulo dzabo. Banotjebela bathu basingazibe tjimwe nge matama abo akanaka kakale anokudza kwe manyepkhwa.
Mmwe ne mmwe wakaziba ngekwe kuhwa kwenyu, ndizo ndizhele kushatha nge kwenyu, koga ndoshaka kuti mutjenjele muna tjakalulwama kakale mube basina nlandu muna tjakabipa.
Ndzimu unotipa kunyalala unowotjimbidza wakanyanga Satani kusi kwe makumbo enyu.
Ngoni dza She wedu Jesu Kirisiti ngadzibe namwi.
Timoti, nshingi nami, unomudumilisa, kose na Lukiyo, Jasoni na Sosipata bashingi nami.
Imi Tetiyo, nkwalili we lukwalo igogu, ndomudumilisa muna She.
Gayo, iye n'amutjili wangu ne bathu be gubungano mu nzi uwe unodumilisa. Erasito, iye mbhati we mari e nzi nkulu ne ikamu tjedu Kwato banomudumilisa.
[Ngoni dza She wedu Jesu Kirisiti dzingabe namwi mose. Ngakujalo.]

Ngatikudzeni Ndzimu, iwo unotubula kumusimisa mu kugalamoyo kwenyu mu Ndebo mbuya yandinosumikila ngekwa Jesu Kirisiti kakale kuyendidzana nge zumbunuko ye malebeswa akabe akasumbikiwa tjibaka tjilefu.
Koga ngwenu, malebeswa iyawa akalebgwa edusigwa patjena nge hwalo dze balebesambeli, ezibisiwa zwitjaba zose, se Ndzimu usingapele wakalaula, kuti kuzhe kuhwa kwe kugalamoyo.
Ngakukudziwe ndi Jesu Kirisiti Ndzimu wakatjenjela mu zwithu zose nge kusingapele kose. Ngakujalo.
Ndimi Paulo, iye wakadang'wa nge kuda kwe Ndzimu kube ntumwa wa Kirisiti* Jesu, ndina ikamu* tjedu Sositenesi.

Ku gubungano le Ndzimu limu Korinta, kuna ibabo bakayengemadziwa muna Kirisiti Jesu, bakadang'wa kube bayengemali,* naibo bose kumwe ne kumwe banodana zina la She wedu Jesu Kirisiti, iye She wabo ne wedu nditi:
Ngoni ne kunyalala kunodwa ku Ndzimu Tate bedu na She Jesu Kirisiti ngakube namwi.
Ndoboka Ndzimu misi yose nge kwenyu ngekwe ngoni dze Ndzimu dzamakapiwa muna Kirisiti Jesu,
mu tjimwe ne tjimwe mu kufumisiwa mu nli mu zwithu zose, mu ndebeleko yenyu yose ne luzibo gwenyu gose.
Koga se butendeki* gwedu ngekwa Kirisiti gwakazhadzisika mumuli,
kuti musishete kene tjili tjipi tjipo tje meya, ha mutjakalindila nge nyota ne moyo unopisa kuboneka kwa She wedu Jesu Kirisiti.
Ndiye unowomusimisa kunoti ku bupelo, kuti musibe ne nlandu mu zhuba la She wedu Jesu Kirisiti.
Ndzimu unogalikabgwe ndiwo wakamudana kube ne shangano ne Nkololo wawo Jesu Kirisiti, She wedu.
Nge zina la She wedu Jesu Kirisiti ndomukumbila mose zwikamu, kuti mube ne kudumana muna tjamunoleba kuti kusibe ne kuthubukana, mushangane mu nkumbulo mube ne moyo nng'ompela.
Ngobe ndakabikigwa ne bensha waka Kilowe kuti kuna zhoba pakati kwenyu.
Ndodwa kuti, mmwe ne mmwe unoti “Imi ndiwa Paulo,” kene “Imi ndiwa Apolosi,” kene “Imi ndiwa Kefasi,” kene “Imi ndiwa Kirisiti.”
Apa Kirisiti wakathubukana kene? Apa Paulo ndiye wakabambuligwa imwi kene? Kene makadubikiwa mu zina la Paulo?
Ndoboka kuti akuna wenyu wandakadubika kuzhe kwa Kirisipo na Gayo.
Ndizo akuna ungati makadubikiwa mu zina langu,
bamwe kakale bandakadubika nge be nsha wa Sitifani. Kuzhe kwabo, anditoziba kuti kene kuna wandakadubika.
Ngobe Kirisiti aazondituma kudubika, koga wakandituma kusumikila ndebo mbuya. Anditolebeleka se ntjenjedu, ngobe tjileyanyo tja Kirisiti tjingadwa tjishayisiwa masimba atjo.
Ndebo ye tjileyanyo bulengwe kuna ibabo banoloba, koga kutili iswi banotjidziwa i simba le Ndzimu.
Ngobe kwakakwagwa kukayi,
“Ndowolobesa butjenjedu gwe bakatjenjela,
ne luzibo gwe banoziba ndowogulasha.”
Apa ungayi ntjenjedu kene? Apa ungayi n'diyi we nlayo*? Apa ungayi nyanyayidzi we misi ino kene? Apa Ndzimu auzothama kuti butjenjedu gwe shango ino gube bulengwe kene?
Ngobe mu butjenjedu gwe Ndzimu, shango aizoziba Ndzimu nge butjenjedu gwayo, ndizo Ndzimu wakada kuti utjidze ibabo banogalamoyo nge bulengwe gwe tjatinosumikila.
Bajuta banoshaka zwilakidzo, Bagiriki ibo banoshaka butjenjedu.
Koga iswi tosumikila Kirisiti wakabambugwa, tjikuthi ku Bajuta kakale bulengwe kuna Bezwitjaba,*
Koga kuna ibabo bakadang'wa, Bajuta kene Bagiriki, Kirisiti ndiye simba le Ndzimu ne butjenjedu gwe Ndzimu.
Ngobe bulengwe gwe Ndzimu gopinda butjenjedu gwe nthu ne kushaya masimba kwe Ndzimu kopinda matatabuko e nthu.

Zwikamu, kumbulani tjamakabe muli itjo ha mudang'wa, ate bali banjinji benyu bakabe bebong'wa nge shango bali bathu bakatjenjela, ate banjinji bakabe bana masimba, ate banjinji bakabe bazwaligwa mu misha ipezhugwi.
Koga Ndzimu wakashalula tjinotogwa kuti bulengwe mu shango kubhatisa batjenjedu shoni nditjo, Ndzimu wakashalula zwisakasima kubhatisa shoni bana matatabuko.
Ndzimu wakashalula zwithu zwipasi, zwinolingigwa pasi nge shango ne zwithu zwinoyi ate zwe tjimwe kutobosa zwithu zwiyapo.
Oku kwakathamigwa kuti kushete nthu unozwiloba ifuba mbeli kwe Ndzimu.
Ndzimu wakamuthama bang'ompela na Kirisiti Jesu, iye Ndzimu wawakathama kube butjenjedu gwedu, ukanthama kube ndulamo yedu ne buyengemali gwedu ne sununguko yedu.
Ndizo wali kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Iye unozwiloba ifuba
ngaazwilobe ifuba ngekwa She.”
Pandakazha kumuli zwikamu, andizozha ndisumikila masazibgwe
ngobe andizoda kuziba tjimwe pakati kwenyu kuzhe kwa Jesu Kirisiti, iye wakabambugwa.
Ndakabe ndi namwi ndisakasima kakale ndina kutja nditetema,
ne ndebeleko yangu ne kudiya kwangu azwizobe zwili nge matama e butjenjedu anolobegwa phande koga zwakabe zwilakidza simba le Meya yakayengemala,
kuti ndizo kugalamoyo kwenyu kusigale mu butjenjedu gwe bathu koga kugale mu simba le Ndzimu.
Koga kuna ibabo bakakula tjimeya toleba butjenjedu nenguba gusi butjenjedu gwe bathu bangwenu kene gwe babusi bangwenu ibabo be masimba anopela.
Koga toleba butjenjedu gwe Ndzimu gwe masazibgwe gwakasumbikala, igo Ndzimu gwawakashaka kuti tikudziwe ndigo shango isathu ikathamwa.
Akuna mmwe we babusi bangwenu wakahwisisa ikoku, ngobe abakabe behwisisa banobe basakabulaya She we gudzo.
Koga, se kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Tjisakatongo bongwa, kene tjikahwika nge zebe,
tjisakatongoti mmwe katjikumbula,
nditjo Ndzimu tjawakalulwamisila ibabo banouda.”
Ndzimu wakatilakidza zwithu izwezwi nge Meya yawo. Ngobe Meya inoshakisisa tjimwe ne tjimwe, nenge zwithu zwimukatikati zwe Ndzimu.
Apa ndiani unoziba tjimu moyo we nthu kuzhe kwe meya ye nthu, iyo imukati kukwe kene? Ndizo akuna unohwisisa zwithu zwimukatikati kwe Ndzimu kuzhe kwe Meya ye Ndzimu.
Ngwenu atizoamutjila meya ye shango, koga takaamutjila meya inodwa ku Ndzimu kuti ndizo tizibisise zwipo zwatinopiwa nge Ndzimu.
Ndizo atitolebeleka nge matama atakadiyiwa nge butjenjedu gwe nthu, koga nge matama atakadiyiwa nge Meya, titjenesa malebeswa e Meya ye Ndzimu kuna ibabo bana Meya ye Ndzimu.
Nthu tjinyama aatoamutjila zwipo zwe Meya ye Ndzimu, ngobe bulengwe kunli, kakale aatozwihwisisa, ngobe zwakafanila lingisisiwa zwikazibgwa nge bhatsho ye Meya.
Nthu tjimeya unotubula kulingisisa kaziba zwithu zose, koga iye aana unotubula kunlingisisa kanziba,
ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi,
“Ndiani unoziba nkumbulo wa She
kwaangadzina kadiya She?” Koga iswi, tina nkumbulo wa Kirisiti.
Koga imi zwikamu, ndakabe ndisingake alebeleka namwi se ndinolebeleka ne bathu tjimeya, koga ndabe ndingalebeleka namwi se bathu tjinyama kene se bana muna Kirisiti.
Ndakamupa nkaka, kusi zojiwa zwakabhata, ngobe zwakabe zwisathu zwikamulizana, ngono nangwenu azwithu zwikamulizana,
ngobe mu bathu tjinyama. Ngoti se kutjina ndandala ne zhoba pakati kwenyu, apa ate muli bathu tjinyama kakale muzwibhata se bathu koga kene?
Ha mmwe eti, “Imi ndiwa Paulo,” ngono mmwe eti, “Imi ndiwa Apolosi” ate muli bathu koga kene?
Apa Apolosi ini? Na Paulo ini? Balanda koga bamakagalamoyo ndibo. Sekwabakapiwa nshingo ndi She.
Imi ndakadzwala, ngono Apolosi wakadilidzila, koga Ndzimu ndiwo wakakudza.
Ndizo unodzwala ne unodilidzila ate bali tjimwe, koga Ndzimu iwo unokudza ndiwotjimwe.
Iye unodzwala ne unodilidzila bakalizana, ngono mmwe ne mmwe wabo unowopiwa mbhayilo kuyendidzana ne nshingo waakashinga.
Ngobe iswi toshinga tose tishingila Ndzimu, ngono imwi mu nnda we Ndzimu. Kakale mu mbako ye Ndzimu.

Kuyendidzana nge ngoni dzandakapiwa nge Ndzimu, ndakateya ng'umba se nyambi ye mbaki, ngono mmwe upoga unobaka pezhugwi kwe thiwa iyeyi. Mmwe ne mmwe nthu ngaabe ne njele kuti unobaka tjini pezhugwi kwayo.
Ngobe akuna ungateya thiwa imwe kuzhe kwe yakateyiwa kale, iyo ili Jesu Kirisiti.
Ha bamwe be baka mu thiwa iyeyi nge golide bamwe nge siliva bamwe nge mabgwe e themba ipezhugwi, bamwe nge mapango bamwe nge bushwa bamwe nge mashanga,
nshingo we nthu mmwe ne mmwe unowoboneka, ngobe zhuba la Kirisiti lowolakidza, ngobe inowolikiwa nge moto, ngono unowolakidza kuti mmwe ne mmwe nthu wakashinga nshingo wakatini.
Ha tjakabakwa tjingakona moto, mbaki mmwe ne mmwe unowowana mbhayilo.
Ha nshingo we mmwe ungatshwa, unowolashikigwa ngono iye nge kukwe unowotjidziwa, koga ebhugwa mu moto.
Apa amutoziba kuti imwi mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu nenge kuti Meya ye Ndzimu inogala mumuli kene?
Iye unokolomola ng'umba ye Ndzimu, Ndzimu unowonkolomola, ngobe ng'umba ye Ndzimu yakayengemala, ngono imwi nge kwenyu mu ng'umba iyeyo.
Kusibe ne unozwitjengedza. Ha mmwe wenyu ekumbula kuti wakatjenjela mu mazhuba ano, ngaabe tjilengwe, kuti ndizo abe ntjenjedu.
Ngobe butjenjedu gwe shango ino bulengwe mu mesho e Ndzimu, nge kuti kwakakwagwa kuyi, “Ndzimu unobhatshila batjenjedu mu butjakwani gwabo.”
Kakale kukayi, “She banoziba kuti mikumbulo ye batjenjedu madatha.”
Ndizo ngakusibe ne unozwiloba ifuba nge mmwe nthu, ngobe zwithu zose nge zwenyu,
Paulo, kene Apolosi kene Pita kene shango, kene butjilo kene lufu, kene misi ino kene misi inozha, kose ikoku nge kwenyu,
ngono imwi mu bathu Bakirisiti, ngono Kirisiti nge we Ndzimu.
Ndizo bathu bakafanila kutitola tili balanda ba Kirisiti kakale tili batjengeti be masazibgwe e Ndzimu.
Tjikulu hwuti batjengeti koshakika kuti bagalikebgwe.
Kundili tjithu tjitukununu kwazo kusumikilisiwa ndimwi kene mu mabazhe e bathu. Naiko anditozwisumikilisa.
Nenguba ndisingazwibone nlandu, akutodwa kuti andina nlandu. Imi ndosumikilisiwa ndi She.

Ndizo musisumikilise tjibaka tjisathu tjikaswika, She basathu bakazha, ndibo banowodusila mu tjedza zwakasumbikala mu zhalima bakadusila patjena mazwimisilo e moyo. Ipapo mmwe ne mmwe unowoamutjila ku Ndzimu kukudziwa kwakanlizana.

Ndaleba zwithu izwezwi zose ndizwilingisanya nami na Apolosi kubhatsha imwi zwikamu kuti muzwidiye ndiswi sahwoku “Mushinge tjakakwagwa koga,” kuti kushete mmwe wenyu unozwikudza ema nge mmwe nthu koga elingila mmwe pasi.
Ndiyani unobona tjakathubukana mumuli kene? Ini tjamunatjo tjamusakapiwa? Ha makatjipiwa mungazwikudza tjini, se munonga musakatjipiwa?
Makaguta kale! Makafuma kale! Mabe boshe bakulu kale kuzhe kwe bhatsho yedu. Ndoyemula seni kuti dzene mabe boshe bakulu dumbu kuti ndizo naswi tibe boshe bakulu namwi!
Imi ndobona kuli kuti Ndzimu wakapa iswi batumwa mamo apasi pasi se balume basumikilisigwa kubulawa mu mesho e mmwe ne mmwe, ngobe tolingiligwa nge shango yose, nge batumwa be kudzimu ne bathu.
Iswi ti zwilengwe ngekwa Kirisiti, koga imwi makatjenjela muna Kirisiti! Iswi atizosima koga imwi makasima! Imwi molumbidziwa koga iswi tolengudziwa.
Kuswikila tjibaka tina zhala ne nyota, takaambala makandana, tolobgwa ne mizi atina,
kakale toshinga tishinga nge maboko edu. Ha tigongobogwa tokombolela, ha tidziyidziwa todzikitadza,
ha titjinyiwa mazina togwisa kugadzana. Tofanana ne malala e shango ino, tishambgwa mu zwithu zose!
Anditomukwalila ikoku kumubhatisa shoni koga kumutjemela se bana bangu banodika.
Nenguba muna babhabi banjinji muna Kirisiti, amuna botate banjinji, ngobe ndakabe tate benyu muna Kirisiti Jesu nge kumuzhisila ndebo mbuya.
Ndomukulumbidza, ibeni bayedzi bangu.
Ngekwa ikoku ndakatuma Timoti kumuli, mwanangu unodika kakale unogalikabgwe muna She, kuti amukumbuludze zila dzangu muna Kirisiti nenge sekwa ndinodiya pamwe ne pamwe mu gubungano limwe ne limwe.
Bamwe benyu banozwikudza bekumbula kuti anditowomukumba.
Koga ndowozha kumuli tjinyolotjo ha She beda, ngono ipapo anditowobe ndizhila kuwohwa ndebeleko dze bathu ibabo banozwikudza koga ndowobe ndizhila kuwobona simba labo.
Ngobe bushe* gwe Ndzimu ate matama koga, gumu simba.
Apa moyemulani? Apa ndizhe kumuli ne shamu, kene ne ludo gwe moyo nnyolo kene?
Tjoselele kolebgwa kuti kuna kuwalilana thobo pakati kwenyu kusingawang'we nemu bathu basinganamate Ndzimu dumbu, ngoti nlume unowalilana thobo ne nkadzi wa tate babe.
Ngono mozwikudza seni! Apa amuzofanila lila kene? Iye wakathama sa ikoko ngaadusiwe mumuli.

Ngono nenguba ndisipo pamuli ndi namwi mu meya, ndizo ndasumikilisa kale se ndiyapo nge zina la She Jesu ngekwe nlume wakathama tjithu tjakajalo. Ha makakubungana meya yangu i pakati kwenyu nge simba la She Jesu,
mupe iwoyo nlume Satani kuti mbili uwe ukolomogwe koga meya iye itjidziwe mu zhuba la She Jesu.
Kuzwikudza kwenyu akuzolulwama. Apa amutoziba kuti, “Mbidzo* tukununu inobidza bgwisa gose gwavangwa kene?”
Dusani mbidzo ya ntolo, ndizo mube bgwisa butshwa, se muli igo bgwisa gusina mbidzo. Ngobe Kirisiti, i pkhwizana yedu ye Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi,* wakathamiwa tjibhayilo.
Ndizo ngatitini tilondolodza Nzano we Kupinda pezhugwi, kusibe ne mbidzo ya ntolo, mbidzo ye mbengano ne bubi, koga kube ne tjiwunga tjisina mbidzo, tjiwunga tje bubuya ne malebeswa.
Ndakamukwalila mu lukwalo gwangu nditi musishingidzane ne nthu unowalilana thobo kusakalingisana.
Ndakabe ndisingadwe nthu unowalilana kusakalingisana we shango ino, ndisingadwe iyawo magovu ne batoleli kene banothigamila midzimu*, ngobe oko kungadwa kuti mufuluke mu shango ino.

Koga ndakamukwalila kuti musizwizwadzanye ne ikamu tjina nlandu we kuwalilana kusi iko, kene bugovu, kene unothigamila midzimu kene etjinya bamwe mazina kene ali tjilaladzi kene ntoleli, musitongo kuma kuja ne nthu wakajalo.
Apa nshingo wangu kene, kusumikilisa bakuzhe? Ate ibo bamukati kwe gubungano bamakafanila sumikilisa kene?
Ndzimu unosumikilisa bakuzhe. Hwalo* dze Ndzimu dzoti “Tatani nthu mbi pakati kwenyu.”
Ha mmwe wenyu ana ndebo ne mmwe, apa ungayiisa mbeli kwe basingazibe Ndzimu mu bumo gwe kuti ayiise mbeli kwe bayengemali kene?
Apa amutoziba kuti bayengemali banowosumikilisa shango kene? Ngono ha shango yosumikiliswa ndimwi apa amuzolizana kusumikilisa mu zwithu zwitukununu kene?
Apa amutoziba kuti towosumikilisa batumwa be kudzimu kene? Ndizo totubula kusumikilisa zwithu zwe butjilo guno.
Ndizo ha muna ndebo dzakajalo, ini mudzibiga mbeli kwe bathu basingatolegwe pezhugwi nge gubungano?
Ndoleba ikoku kumubhatisa shoni. Apa kungabe kusina pakati kwenyu nthu wakatjenjela kubakisanya zwikamu?
Koga ikamu tjoyisa tjimwe ikamu ku nlayo, ngono ikoku kushingikala mbeli kwe bathu basina kugalamoyo.
Kube ne ndebo pakati kwenyu dzinoyenda ku nlayo kolakidza kuti makakong'wa. Apa akutoyita kuti udzikitadzile kukombeledzwa nlandu usiuwo kene? Apa akutoyita kuti utolegwe kene?
Koga imwi nge kwenyu mokombeledza mukatolela naizo zwikamu dumbu.

Apa amutoziba kuti bathu basakalulwama habatongina mu bushe gwe Ndzimu kene? Musitjengedzeke, banowalilana kuzhe kwe ndobolo kene banothigamila midzimu kene phombgwe kene nlume unowalilana ne mmwe nlume kene nkadzi unowalilana ne mmwe nkadzi
kene mbava kene magovu kene zwilaladzi kene, banotjinya bamwe mazina kene banotjebela, akuna wabo unowongina mu bushe gwe Ndzimu.
Bamwe benyu bakatongobe bakajalo. Koga makangudziwa, makayengemadziwa, makashayisiwa nlandu mu zina la She Jesu Kirisiti nemu Meya ye Ndzimu.
“Zwithu zose zodumiligwa mundili,” koga ate zwithu zose zwinobhatsha, “Zwithu zose zodumiligwa mundili,” koga anditowoduma kuti kube ne tjinowondithama nlanda watjo.
“Zojiwa zwakathamigwa ntumbu ne ntumbu wakathamigwa zojiwa.” Koga Ndzimu unowozwilobesa zose. Mbili auzothamigwa bupombgwe koga wakathamigwa She, na She bakathamigwa mbili.
Ndzimu wakamusa She mu lufu, ngono naswibo unowotimusa mu lufu nge simba lawo.
Apa amutoziba kuti mibili yenyu i ndungululo dza Kirisiti kene? Apa ndingatola ndungululo dza Kirisiti ndikadzithama ndungululo dze fukula kene? Ndodwa!
Apa amutoziba kene kuti iye unozwibhatshanya ne fukula unobe mbili nng'ompela nayo? Ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi, “Babili banowobe mbili nng'ompela.”
Koga iye wabhatana na She unobe meya ing'ompela nabo.
Thubukanani ne bupombgwe. Jinyo limwe ne limwe nthu laanothama li kuzhe kwe mbili uwe koga phombgwe inotjinyila mbili wayo.
Apa amutoziba kuti mibili yenyu bugalo gwe Meya yakayengemala, imumuli yamakapiwa nge Ndzimu kene? Mibili iyeyo ate yenyu.
Makatengwa nge themba. Ndizo shingisani mibili yenyu nge zila inoshathisa Ndzimu.
Ngwenu, ndoleba ngekwe zwithu zwamakakwala nge kwazo.
Kwakalulwama kuti nlume asitongowalilana thobo ne nkadzi.
Koga ngobe bupombgwe gowonga bathu banjinji, nlume mmwe ne mmwe ngaabe ne nkadzi uwe ne nkadzi mmwe ne mmwe abe ne nlume uwe.
Nlume ngaape nkadzi uwe fanilo dzidze dze ndobolo ne nkadzi ngaape nlume uwe fanilo dzidze dze ndobolo.
Nkadzi aatolaula mbili uwe, koga unolaugwa nge nlume, ne nlume aatolaula mbili uwe koga unolaugwa nge nkadzi.
Musinyimane kuwalilana kuzhe kwe madumana kwe tjibaka tjifutshwanana kuti muzwipe mu kutembezela, koga kudwapo shanganani kakale kuti ndizo Satani asimuwonge nge kong'wa kuzwidziba.
Ndomubudza ikoku nge ndetjedzelo koga kusi ndayo.
Ndoyemula kuti dzene bathu bose babe benga imi, koga mmwe ne mmwe una tjipo tjitje tjinodwa ku Ndzimu, mmwe una etji mmwe una etjije.
Kuna ibabo basakalobola ne basakalobogwa ne tjilikadzi ndikati kwakanaka kuti bagale boga sami.
Koga ha bekong'wa kuzwibhata ngabalobole, ngobe koyita kulobola pa kupisika nge njemulo.
Kuna bakalobola, ndopa ndayo, kusi imi koga kuli She kuti nkadzi ngaasithubukane ne nlume uwe,
koga ha ethubukana ne nlume, ngaagale asakalobogwa kene abgwililane ne nlume uwe, nlume na iyebo asilambe nkadzi uwe.
Ku bamwe bose, imi kusi She, ati, ha ikamu tjina nkadzi usin'galimoyo ngono iwoyu nkadzi eduma kugala naye, ngaasinlambe.
Ha nkadzi ana nlume usi n'galimoyo koga eduma kugala naye ngaasinlambe.

Ngobe nlume usingagalemoyo unoyengemadziwa nge nkadzi uwe, usingagalemoyo unoamutjigwa nge Ndzimu nge zila ye nlume uwe unogalamoyo. Kuzhe kwa ikoku bana benyu banobe bakatemapala, koga sekwa kuli iko bakayengemala.
Koga ha nkhwinya usingagalemoyo eyemula kuti kuthubukaniwe ngakube sa ikoko. Pakajalo n'galimoyo we tjilume kene we tjikadzi wakasununguka. Ndzimu wakamudana kutjilila mu kunyalala.
Nkadzi, unoziba tjini? Pamwe ungatjidza nlume uwo. Iwe nlume unoziba tjini? Pamwe ungatjidza nkadzi uwo.
Tjing'ompela wuti mmwe ne mmwe atjile butjilo gwaakapiwa ndi She, igo gwaakadang'wa kutjilila muguli nge Ndzimu. Oyu nlayo wandinobigila makubungano wose.
Apa kuna wakabe akathumbigwa kale mu lubaka gwaakadang'wa? Ngaasiduse tjwayo dze kuthumbigwa* kukwe. Apa kuna wakabe asakathumbigwa mu tjibaka tjaakadang'wa kene? Ngaasishake kuti athumbigwe.
Kuthumbigwa akutodwa tjimwe ne kusathumbigwa akutodwa tjimwe. Tjinodwa tjimwe ulondolodza milayo ye Ndzimu.
Mmwe ne mmwe ngaagale mu tjimo tjaakadang'wa ali mutjili nge Ndzimu.
Apa wakabe uli nlanda pawakadang'wa kene? Kusikudziyidze ikoku. Koga ha uwana tjibaka tje kusununguka, sununguka!
Ngobe nthu wakadang'wa ndi She ali mu bulanda watjibe nthu wa She wakasununguka. Kakale na iye wakadang'wa ali mu sununguko watjibe nlanda wa Kirisiti.
Makatengwa nge themba, ndizo musibe balanda be bathu.
Ndizo zwikamu, tjimo kene tjili tjipi nthu tjaakadang'wa ali mutjili, ngaabe mutjili ne Ndzimu.
Ngwenu ngekwe basakalobogwa nenge basakalobola, imi andina nlayo unodwa kuna She, koga ndopa nkumbulo wangu se nthu unogalikabgwe kuli nge ngoni dza She.
Ndobona kuti ngekwe dziyidzika kwe misi ino, koyita, kuti nlume agale sekwa ali iko.
Ha wakalobola, usigwise kulamba nkadzi. Ha usakalobola, usishake ndobolo.
Koga ha ulobola autotjinya, ne mmwanadi ha elobogwa aatotjinya. Koga ibabo banolobola, bana mang'oni mu butjilo igogu, ngono ndoyemula kumubakilila muna ikoku.
Ndodwa kuti zwikamu, tjibaka tjakabigwa tjatjibe tjifutshwanana. Kudwa nasi kuyenda mbeli, ibabo bana bakadzi ngabatjile se basinabo,
ne bamu tjililo se basimu tjililo ne bakashatha se bakashoba ne banotenga ngabange basina thundu,
ne banoshingidzana ne shango ngabatjile se basingashingidzane nayo; ngobe shango iyeyi sekwa ili iko ngwenu ino pinda.
Ndoshaka kuti musidziyidzike. Nlume usakalobola unolongamoyo mu nshingo wa She, ngobe eshaka kushathisa She.
Koga nlume wakalobola unolongamoyo muna zwe shango, ngobe eshaka kushathisa nkadzi uwe,

ne mikumbulo iye mibili. Nkadzi kene mmwanadi usakalobogwa unolongamoyo mu mishingo ya She ne kuti ungayengemala mu mbili ne mu meya tjini, koga nkadzi wakalobogwa unolongamoyo muna zwe shango kuti ungashathisa nlume uwe tjini.
Ndoleba ikoku kubhatsha imwi, ndisingamudzibise, koga ndoshaka kuti mutjile nge zila yakalulwama muzwipe kwakapelela kuna She musina mimoyo mibili.
Ha mmwe ekumbula kuti aatozwibhata ku mmwanadi waakabigilidza, ebona kuti unokong'wa kuzwidziba, kobe kwatjifanila kuti anlobole, ndizo ngaanlobole sekwa anoyemula, ate tjibi.
Koga iye wakapedza tjose mu moyo uwe, asina tjinommanikanya koga elaula njemulo dzidze, ngono akazwimisila ikoku mu moyo uwe kugala akambiganyidza, unothama zubuyanana.
Ndizo iye unolobola mmwanadi iwoyu unothama zubuyanana, koga iye usingalobole unopinda unolobola.
Nkadzi wakasungwa nge tjidumano* tjaakathama tje ndobolo butjilo gwe nlume uwe gose. Ha nlume efa, nkadzi watjisunuguka kulobogwa nge waanoyemula kulobogwa ndiye, koga wakafanila kube ali Nkirisiti.
Ngono ungashatha kugala sekwa ali iko kupinda akalobogwa. Imi ndiko sekwa ndinobona, ngono ndoduma kuti ndina Meya ye Ndzimu.
Ngwenu, ngekwe zojiwa zwakapiwa midzimu toziba kuti, “Tose tina zibo.” Zibo inoshiyisa nthu, koga ludo gosimisa nthu.
Iye unokumbula kuti unoziba tjimwe, aathukaziba sekwa akafanila atjizibe.
Koga ha nthu eda Ndzimu unozibgwa nge Ndzimu.
Ndizo, ngekwe kuja zojiwa zwakapiwa midzimu, toziba kuti midzimu ate ili tjimwe tjinotjila nge kuti akuna Ndzimu kuzhe kwe nng'ompela.
Nenguba kungabe kuna banodang'wa “midzimu,” kudzimu kene mu shango, dumbu nenguba ili yapo “midzimu” na “boshe” banjinji,
kutili kuna Ndzimu nng'ompela, ibo Tate, zwithu zose zodwa kubali kakale totjila nge kwabo, kakale kuna She nng'ompela iye Jesu Kirisiti. Zwithu zose zwiyapo ndiye, naswibo tiyapo ndiye.
Koga ate mmwe ne mmwe unoziba ikoku. Bamwe bathu nge kuwolobela midzimu koti ha beja zojiwa zwakajali banokumbula nge kwazo se zwakapiwa midzimu, ngono se hana dzabo dzisakasima dzotemapala.
Zojiwa azwingatisedzedze ku Ndzimu. Ate tili babi kupindisa atisingaje kakale atitoyita atija.
Koga yelani njele kuti kusununguka kwenyu kusibe tjikuthi kuna basakasima.
Ha mmwe una hana isakasima ekubona iwe una zibo iyeyi uja mu ng'umba ye midzimu, apa angakulumbidzike kuja zwakapiwa midzimu kene?
Ndizo nge zibo iyo, ikamu itjetji tjisakasima, Kirisiti tjaakafila, tjalobesiwa.
Ha utjinyila zwikamu zwizo ukubadza hana dzabo dzisakasima, unotjinyila Kirisiti.
Ndizo ha zojiwa zwithama kuti ikamu tjangu tjiwe, anditjowoja nyama, ngobe ndingadwa ndithama kuti ikamu tjangu tjiwe.
Apa andizosununguka kene? Apa ate ndili ntumwa wa Jesu kene? Andizobona Jesu She wedu kene? Apa ate muli mbhayilo we nshingo wangu muna She kene?
Ha kuli kuti ku bamwe andite ndili ntumwa wa Jesu, iko ndi iye kumuli, ngobe imwi ndimwi lutjwayo gwe kuti ndi ntumwa wa She.
Ndowozwidabilila muna ibabo banowondibhuzwa nditi;
Apa atina fanilo kupiwa zojiwa ne zwinong'wiwa kene?
Apa atina fanilo dze kuyenda ne nkadzi wakalobogwa we Nkirisiti mu njendo se bamwe batumwa ne banung'una ba She na Pita kene?
Kene ndimi na Bhanabhasi koga basina fanilo dze kuletjedza kushingila kuzwitjidza kene?
Ndiupi unoshinga nshingo we bubhayani, ngono ezwilipa kene? Ndiani unoti alima nzhambi mu nnda kasije ntjelo wawo kene? Ndiupi unothuwa zwithuwo kasing'we nkaka wazo kene?
Apa ndoleba ikoku nge ndaulo ye bathu kene? Nlayo autoleba itjo zwatjo kene?
Ngobe kwakakwagwa mu nlayo wa Mushe kuyi, “Usisunge nlomo ng'ombe inoshokola mathunde.”
Apa autoleba nge kwedu kene? Kwakakwaligwa iswi, ngobe ha nlimi elima ne nshokoli ha eshokola, bakafanila thama ikoku nge kugalabgwe kose kuti banowobe ne gobe muna tjavung'wa.
Ha tadzwala mbewu ye tjimeya mumuli, apa akuzofanila kuti tiwane zwe tjinyama zwatinotjila ndizo mumuli kene?
Ha bamwe bana fanilo iyeyi ye kutjidziwa mumuli, apa iswi atizofanila kube ne hwulu kupinda yabo kene?
Koga atizoishingisa fanilo iyeyi, kakale todzikitadzila tjimwe ne tjimwe pana kuti tidzinganyidze ndebo mbuya ngekwa Kirisiti.
Apa amutoziba kuti ibabo banoshinga mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu, banowana zojiwa zwabo mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu kene, na ibabo banopila zwibhayilo mu tjibeso bana gobe mu tjibhayilo kene?
Nge kunofanana, She bakalaula kuti ibabo banosumikila ndebo mbuya bawane tjabanotjila nditjo nge ndebo mbuya.
Nenguba kwakajalo andizotongo shingisa imwe ye fanilo idzedzi, kakale anditokwala ikoku kuti mutjitangisa kundipa. Bukulu ndingafa pana kuti ndiletje mmwe anditolele tjandinozwikudza nditjo.
Ha ndisumikila ndebo mbuya andingazwikudze, ngoti ndakafanila kuisumikila. Yee mme wee ndapalala, ha ndisingasumikile ndebo mbuya.
Ha ndithama ikoku ngoda kwangu, ndingalingilila mbhayilo. Ha ndisingathame ngoda kwangu, koga ndokuthama uli nshingo wandakapiwa,
ngono mbhayilo wangu ini? Ndiwoyu: ndosumikila ndebo mbuya kuzhe kwe ndipo, ndisingashingise fanilo dzangu nge buzhalo se nsumikili.
Nenguba imi ndakasununguka ndisina wakandithuwa ndakazwithama nlanda wa bose kuti ndizo ndiwane banji.
Ku Bajuta ndakabe Njuta, kuti ndiwane Bajuta. Kuna ibabo bapasi kwe nlayo ndakabe nthu upasi kwe nlayo, nenguba imi ndisi pasi kwe nlayo, kuti ndizo ndiwane bapasi kwe nlayo.
Kuna ibabo bakuzhe kwe nlayo ndakanga nthu u kuzhe kwe nlayo kuwana ibabo bakuzhe kwe nlayo. Oku akutodwa kuti anditolondolodza nlayo we Ndzimu, ngobe ndi pasi kwe nlayo wa Kirisiti.
Ha ndili pakati kwe basakasima ndobe usakasimabo, kuti ndiwane basakasima. Ndabe zwithu zose ku bathu bose, kuti ha kutubuka nditjidze bamwe babo nge zila imwe ne imwe.
Ndothama ikoku ndithamila ndebo mbuya, kuti ndibe ne gobe mu makombolelo ayo.
Apa amutoziba kuti mu kutangidzana nge lubilo balabuki banolabuka bose, koga nng'ompela kawana tjiala* kene? Ndizo labukani nge zila yamunowowana tjiala.
Mmwe ne mmwe nlabuki unozwibhata mu zwithu zose. Banokuthama kuwana tjiala tjinoshakala, koga iswi tothama kuwana tjisingashakale.
Imi anditolabuka koga, anditoloba veyisi se nthu unoloba phepo koga,
ngono ndoloba mbili wangu aulaula, kuti ndisiti shule kwe ndasumikila ku bamwe, imi nge kwangu ndibe ndiwang'wa ndakafanilo lashiwa.
Ndoshaka kuti mualakane zwikamu kuti bobatategulu bedu bose bakabe bali kusi kwe gole nenge kuti bose bakatjuluka gungwa.
Bose bakadubikwa kube batobeli ba Mushe mu gole ne mu gungwa.
Kakale bose bakaja zojiwa zwe tjimeya
kakale bose bakang'wa tjing'o tje tjimeya. Ngobe bakang'wa mu shongwe ye kudzimu, iyeyo yakabe yakabatobela, ngono shongwe iyeyo ndi Kirisiti.
Bunji gwabo abazoshathisa Ndzimu, ndizo bakabulawa mu tjilambanyika.
Zwithu izwezwi zwakashingikala kutjenjedza iswi kuti tisiyemule bubi sa ibo.
Musibe bathigamili be midzimu se kwakathama bamwe babo, ngobe kwakakwagwa kuyi, “Bathu bakagala pasi kuja ne kung'wa, kakale bakamilika bakazana.”
Tisithameni bupombgwe se kwakathama bamwe babo, ngono zwiwulu zwili makumi mabili ana kutatu (23000) zwikafa zhuba ling'ompela.
Tisilikeni She, se kwakathama bamwe babo, ngono bakalobesiwa nge nyoka,
kene kuli kung'ong'ola se kwakathama bamwe babo, ngono bakalobesiwa nge nlobesi.
Zwithu izwezwi zwakabashingikalila kuli kutjenjedza, ngono zwakakwagwa kudiya iswi banotjila mu misi ye bupelo.
Ndizo iye unokumbula kuti umile wakasima ngaabe nge njele kuti asiwe.
Akuna ndiko yakamuwila isakatongo wila nthu. Ndzimu unogalikabgwe ndizo aungakuletjedzele kuti ulikiwe kunopinda matatabuko awo, koga ne ndiko Ndzimu unozhisa zila yaungabhuda ndiyo, kuti usimisile.
Ndizo badiwa bangu, mu zwikupe tjose mu kunamata midzimu.
Ndolebeleka ne bathu bakatjenjela, muzwibonegwe kene tjandinoleba malebeswa.
Bhepe le makombolelo latinopa latinokombolela, apa ate kukobana mu malopa a Kirisiti kene? Tjiwunga tjatinokwamula, apa ate kukobana mbili wa Kirisiti kene?
Sekuna tjiwunga tjing'ompela, iswi banjinji ti mbili nng'ompela, ngobe iswi tose tokobana tjiwunga itjetjo tjing'ompela.
Kumbulani bathu be Iziraela, apa ibaba banoja zwibhayilo abana gobe mu tjibeso tje zwibhayilo kene?
Apa ndodwani kene? Apa ndodwa kuti zojiwa zwakapiwa midzimu zwi tjimwe kene, kene iyo midzimu i tjimwe?
Aa! Ndodwa kuti basinganamate Ndzimu banopa zwibhayilo meya mibi. Anditoshaka kuti mube ne buzwalani ne meya mibi.
Amungang'we mu bhepe la She ne bhepe le meya mibi. Amungaje mu ndilo ya She ne mu ndilo ye meya mibi.
Apa toshaka yita kuti She babe ne fupa kene? Apa takasima kubapinda kene?
“Zwithu zose zodumiligwa,” koga ate zwithu zose zwinobhatsha, “Zwithu zose zodumiligwa,” koga ate zwithu zose zwinobumba.
Ngakushete unozwishakila bubuya, koga ngaagushakile bamwe.
Ijani tjinotengesiwa mu matengeselo e nyama musingabhuzwe muyitila hana.
Ngobe “Shango nge ya She ne tjimwe ne tjimwe tjimuili.”
Ha mmwe we basingagalemoyo ekudanila zojiwa ha ushaka kuyenda, yenda, uje kene ilini tjawapiwa, usinabhuzo.
Koga aangati kukuli, “Zojiwa izwezwi zwapiwa midzimu,” ipapo usije zojiwa izwezo uthamila iwoyo wakubudza kakale uthamila hana,
Anditodwa hana iyo, ndodwa iye.
Kusununguka kwangu kungalaugwa nge hana ye mmwe nthu tjini?
Ha ndija nge kuboka, ini ndingongobolegwa itjetjo tjandinobokela?
Ndizo kene unoja kene ung'wa, kene unothamani koga, thama kose kukudza Ndzimu.
Usigwadzisemoyo kene ali Njuta kene N'giriki kene gubungano le Ndzimu,
sekwa ndinogwisa kushathisa bathu bose mu tjimwe ne tjimwe tjandinothama, ndisingazwishakigwe mbuzilo koga ndikudza bose kuti ndizo batjidziwe.
Ibeni bayedzi bangu, sami ndili n'yedzi wa Kirisiti.
Ndomukudza, ngobe mondikumbula mu tjimwe ne tjimwe, ngono mukabhata zwidiyo koga sekwa ndakamudiya izo.
Koga ndoshaka kuti muhwisise kuti nsholo we nlume mmwe ne mmwe ndi Kirisiti, nsholo we nkadzi nlume ne nsholo wa Kirisiti Ndzimu.
Nlume mmwe ne mmwe unotembezela kene unoleba dama le Ndzimu akaambala tjimwe mu nsholo unolengudza nsholo uwe,
koga nkadzi unotembezela kene unoleba dama le Ndzimu asakaambala tjimwe mu nsholo uwe, kofanana ne angabe akatesegwa nsholo.
Ha nkadzi asingaambale tjimwe mu nsholo uwe ngaatesele mavudzi awe; koga ha kubhatisa shoni kuti nkadzi atesegwe, ngaambale tjimwe mu nsholo uwe.
Nlume aazofanila ambala tjimwe mu nsholo uwe, se ali ifano ne gudzo* le Ndzimu. Koga nkadzi i gudzo le nlume.
Ngobe nlume aazodwa mu nkadzi, koga nkadzi wakadwa mu nlume.
Kakale nlume aazobumbigwa nkadzi, koga nkadzi wakabumbigwa nlume.
Ndizo nkadzi wakafanila ambala tjimwe mu nsholo uwe tjinolakidza simba ngekwe batungwa be kudzimu, kukudza batumwa be kudzimu.
Nenguba kwakajalo muna She, nkadzi ate ali tjimwe kuzhe kwe nlume, ne nlume ate ali tjimwe kuzhe kwe nkadzi,
ngobe nenguba nkadzi akathamwa kudwa mu nlume, ngwenu nlume wozwagwa nge nkadzi. Ngono zwithu zose zodwa ku Ndzimu.
Muzwibonegwe, apa kwakalingisana kene kuti nkadzi atembezele Ndzimu asakafukidza nsholo?
Apa mbumbiko ye zwithu nge kwayo aitomudiya kuti mavudzi malefu mu nlume anobhatisa shoni?
Koga ha nkadzi ana mavudzi malefu, bubuya gugwe, ngobe mavudzi awe wakaapiwa kube tjifukidzi.
Ha mmwe asingadumane na ikoku, akuna mmwe nlenje watinawo ne makubungano e Ndzimu aana mmwe nlenje.
Koga mu zwidiyo zwinotobela, anditomukudza, ngobe ha mushangana amutoshanganila bubuya koga moshanganila bubi.
Tjekutanga ndohwa kuyi, ha mushangana mu gubungano kuna kusahwanana pakati kwenyu, ngono ndoduma kungadwa kuna lebeswa muna itjetji,
ngobe kwakafanila kube ne kuthubukana pakati kwenyu kuti ndizo ibabo bana malebeswa pakati kwenyu baboneke.
Ha mushangana, ate tjilayilo tja She tjamunoja,
ngobe ha muja, mmwe ne mmwe unodwilila ngoja asingamilile kene ani, ngono kube kuthama kuti bamwe babe ne zhala koga bamwe balaladze.

Ini ikoku, apa amuna mizi yamungajila muili mukang'wila muili kene? Kene molingila pasi gubungano le Ndzimu mukabhatisa shoni ibabo basina tjabo? Ndimudwe nditini kene? Apa ndimukudze muna ikoku kene? Aa, andingamukudze.
Ngobe imi ndakaamutjila muna She itjetjo tjandakapitshila kumuli. She Jesu bakati mu busiku gwabakawongiwa bakatola tjiwunga,
bakati baboka bakatjipemula, ndizo bakati, “Oyu mbili wangu unopigwa imwi. Muthame ikoku tjili ikumbuludzo tjangu.”
Nge zila iyeyo zwayo, shule kwe tjilayilo, She bakatola bhepe le nkumbi we zhambi ngono bakati, “Bhepe ileli Tjidumano tjitshwa mu malopa angu. Muthame ikoku misi yose mung'we kundikumbula.”
Tjibaka tjimwe ne tjimwe itjetji ha muja tjiwunga mung'wa mu bhepe le nkumbi we zhambi, moleba lufu gwa She kudzina bezha.
Ndizo wali ani naani unoja tjiwunga kene eng'wa mu bhepe la She nge zila isingakudze She una nlandu we kulonga mbili ne malopa a She shambgwa.
Mmwe ne mmwe ngaazwishakisise kutanga ekotjiti eja tjiwunga ne kung'wa mu bhepe.
Ngobe iye unoja ebe eng'wa asingazibe mbili wa She unozwidanila kusumikilisiwa.
Ndizo wali bunjinji gwenyu muli zwiworoworo mugwala ne bamwe benyu bakafa.
Ha tabe tingazwishakisisa kutanga, tabe tisingawosumikilisiwa.
Koga ha tisumikilisiwa ndi She, totjemegwa kuti ndizo tisilashiwe kang'ompela ne shango.
Ndizoke zwikamu, ha mukubungana muja, mililanani.
Ha mmwe ana zhala, ngaaje ku nzi* kuti musikubunganile kubong'wa nlandu. Ngekwe zwimwe zwithu ndowopa milayo ndazha.
Ngwenu ngekwe zwipo zwe tjimeya, zwikamu, anditoshaka kuti musizibe nge kwazo.
Moziba kuti makati musathu mukaziba Ndzimu makabe muwongiwa kakale mudzimidziwa kutobela midzimu isingalebeleke.
Ndizo ndoti muzibe kuti akuna ungati elebeleka nge Meya ye Ndzimu kati, “Jesu ngaabe ne bhiso,” kakale akuna ungati, “Jesu ndi She,” asingalebesiwe nge Meya yakayengemala.
Kuna zwipo zwakasiyana, koga Meya ili iyo zwayo.
Kuna kushingila kwakasiyana, koga kushingigwa She iyezwe.
Kuna mishingo yakasiyana, koga Ndzimu ndiwo zwawo unoizhisa mu mmwe ne mmwe.
Mmwe ne mmwe unopiwa kuzwilakidza kwe Meya yakayengemala munli kubhatsha bose.
Mmwe unopiwa matama e butjenjedu, mmwe kapiwa matama e luzibo ne Meya iyo zwayo.
Mmwe unopiwa kugalamoyo nge Meya iyo zwayo, mmwe kapiwa nge Meya iyeyobo zwipo zwe kupodza,
koga mmwe kapiwa kushinga masazibgwe, ngono mmwe kapiwa bulebesambeli, mmwe unopiwa kuthubukanya pakati kwe meya, mmwe kapiwa tjipo tje ndimi dzipoga, koga mmwe kapiwa simba le kutjenesa ndimi.
Kose ikoku kopiwa nge Meya iyo zwayo, iyo inokobela mmwe ne mmwe sekwa yada.
Se mbili uli nng'ompela una ndungululo njinji, kakale ndungululo dzose dze mbili, nenguba dzili njinji, dzi mbili nng'ompela, kwakajalobo na Kirisiti.
Ngobe takadubikiwa nge Meya ing'ompela tose mu mbili nng'ompela, Bajuta kene Bezwitjaba, kene balanda kene bathu bakasunuguka, kakale tose takang'wa Meya ing'ompela.
Kwakajalo mbili auna ndungululo ing'ompela koga una ndungululo njinji.
Ha gumbo lingati, “Ngobe ndisi luboko, andite ndili ndungululo ye mbili,” ikoku akungalithame likasibe ndungululo ye mbili.
Ne zebe ha ingati, “Ngobe ndisi zhisho, andite ndili ndungululo ye mbili.” Ikoku akungaithame ikasibe ndungululo ye mbili.
Ha mbili wose wabe uli zhisho, kuhwa kobe kuli ngayi? Ha mbili wose wabe uli zebe, kunuhwidza kobe kuli ngayi?
Koga sekwa kuli iko, Ndzimu wakalongolosa ndungululo mu mbili, imwe ne imwe sekwa unoda.
Ha kose kwabe kuli ndungululo ing'ompela, mbili unobe uli ngayi?
Sekwa kuli iko, kuna ndungululo njinji, koga mbili nng'ompela.
Ndizo ngwenu zhisho alingati ku luboko, “Imi andina nshingo nawe,” Ne nsholo aungati ku makumbo, “Imi andina nshingo nawe.”
Koga na idzo ndungululo dze mbili dzinolingika dzisina nshingo nkulu atingatjile tisinadzo.
Ndungululo dze mibili yedu dzatinotola se dzi pasi ndidzo dzatinokudza kwazo ne ndungululo dze mbili dzisingadusigwe patjena dzobhakwa nge njele hwulu kupinda
ndungululo dzinodusigwa patjena. Koga ndiko Ndzimu sekwa akabumba mbili ngokudza ndungululo dzi pasi,
kuti ndizo kusibe ne kusahwanana mu mbili, koga kuti ndungululo dzitjengetane kwakafanana.
Ha ndungululo ing'ompela idziyila, dzose dzodziyila, koga ha ndungululo ing'ompela ikudziwa, dzose dzoshatha nayo.
Imwi mu mbili wa Kirisiti, ngono mmwe ne mmwe i ndungululo yawo.

Mu gubungano Ndzimu wakabiga ndungululo dzose nge kutobedzana, kutanga batumwa, gwe bubili balebesambeli,* gwe butatu badiyi, betobegwa nge bashingi be masazibgwe, kutobela bapodzi, babhatshi, kukowoti bayendisi be mishingo, kudwapo kuti balebi be ndimi dzipoga.
Apa bose batumwa kene? Apa bose balebesambeli kene? Apa bose badiyi kene? Apa bose banoshinga masazibgwe kene?
Apa bose bana zwipo zwe kupodza kene? Apa bose banolebeleka nge ndimi dzipoga kene? Apa bose banotjenesa ndimi dzipoga kene?
Koga imwi yemulani nge malebeswa zwipo zwipezhugwi.
Ndowomulakidza zila inopinda dzimwe dzose.
Ha ndilebeleka nge ndimi dze bathu nenge dze batumwa be kudzimu, koga ndisina ludo, ndonga tshipi inolidziwa ilonga zhoba, kene tiloko inolobana.
Ngono ha ndina simba le bulebesambeli ndihwisisa masazibgwe wose, ndina zibo yose, kakale ha ndina kugalamoyo kose kunomilidza matombo, koga ndisina ludo, ate ndili tjimwe.
Ha ndikoba kose kwandinako nenguba ndingapa mbili wangu kuti upisiwe, koga ndisina ludo, anditobuyigwa nge tjimwe.
Ludo guna moyonlefu, guna nzhazho, ludo aguna fupa kene kuzwikudza kene kuzwida,
agutoshaya mazwibhato. Ludo agutozwishakila; agutogwadzisiwamoyo kene kuli kubhata mmwe nge moyo;
agutoshathila mbipo, koga goshathila ndulamo.*
Ludo agutonyalamoyo mu zwithu zose, gogalamoyo zwithu zose, gogalabgwe zwithu zose, gosimisila mu zwithu zose.
Ludo agutopela, ha kuli kusumikila kowopinda ne ndimi dzowoma, ha guli luzibo gowopinda.
Nge kuti zibo yedu ne kusumikila dama le Ndzimu azwizopelela,
koga panowozha tjakapelela, tjisakapelela tjowopinda.
Pandakabe nditji mwana, ndakabe ndilebeleka se mwana, ndialakana se mwana ndishingisa mikumbulo ye bumwana; ndakati ndabe nlume athubukana ne zwithu zwe bumwana.
Nge kuti ngwenu tobona mu iponi kusingaboneseseke, koga ipapo towobe takalingisana nge mesho. Ngwenu ndoziba ntome koga, koga ipapo ndowobe ndihwisisa nge buzhalo sekwa ndakahwisisiwa.
Ndizo ngwenu zwithu zwitatu ezwi: kugalamoyo ne kugalabgwe ne ludo azwitoyenda kumwe, koga tjikulu muna izwezwi ludo.
Thamani kuti ludo gube mazwimisilo enyu, muyemule nge malebeswa kube ne zwipo zwe tjimeya, kwazo kwazo tjipo tje kusumikila dama nge bulebesambeli!
Ngobe iye unolebeleka nge lulimi gupoga aatolebeleka ne bathu, koga unolebeleka ne Ndzimu, ngobe akuna unonhwisisa. Unoleba masazibgwe e malebeswa nge simba le Meya.
Koga iye unosumikila dama le bulebesambeli unolebeleka ne bathu kubasimisa ne kubakulumbidza ne kubanyaladza.
Iye unolebeleka ne lulimi gupoga unozwisimisa, koga iye unosumikila dama le bulebesambeli unobhatsha gubungano.

Ndoshaka kuti mose mulebeleke nge ndimi dzipoga; koga tjikulu dzene mungabe ne tjipo tje kusumikila dama le bulebesambeli. Iye unosumikila dama le bulebesambeli nkulu pana unolebeleka nge ndimi dzipoga, kuzhe kwe kungabe kuna mmwe unotjenesa, kuti gubungano libhatshike.
Ndizo wali, zwikamu, ha ndizha kumuli ndilebeleka nge ndimi dzipoga, apa ndingamubuzila tjimwe kuzhe kwe ndingamuzhisila zumbunulo imwe kene zibo kene dama le bulebesambeli kene tjidiyo?
Ne zwilidzo zwisingatjile, zwinonga nyele kene dende, ha zwithama nlidzo usingahwisisike, nthu ungaziba tjini kuti kolidziwani?
Ne lunyanga ha gosingathame nlidzo unohwisisika ndiani ungazwilulwamisila ngwa kene?
Ndizo kwakajalobo nge kwenyu, ha imwi nge ndimi dzipoga muleba ndebo isingahwisisike, mmwe nthu ungaziba tjini tjinolebgwa? Ngobe molebelekela mu phepo koga.
Kuna ndimi dzili njinji dzakasiyana mu shango, ngono akuna gumwe gwadzo gusina tjagunodwa.
Koga andisingazibe tjeneso ye lulimi, ndowobe ntaya ku nlebeleki ne nlebeleki kabe ntaya kundili.
Se imwi makazwimisila kube ne zwipo zwinopiwa nge Meya, makafanila kuti mugwise kuzwishingisa kwazo kubaka gubungano.
Ndizo iye unolebeleka nge ndimi dzipoga ngaatembezelele simba le kutjenesa tjaanoleba.
Ngobe ha nditembezela nge ndimi dzipoga, meya yangu inotembezela, koga nkumbulo wangu auna tjinoubuyila.
Ndingashingani ngono? Ndowotembezela nge Meya yangu atembezela nenge nkumbulo wangubo, ndowomba nge meya amba nenge nkumbulo.
Ha ukudza Ndzimu mu meya iyo, nthu upakati kwa ibabo basingahwisise ungati “Ngakujalo*” tjini mu kuboka kuko ngono asingazibe tjaunoleba?
Ungabe uboka Ndzimu nge buzhalo, koga mmwe nthu aatobhatshika.
Ndobokela Ndzimu kuti ndolebeleka nge ndimi kumupinda mose.
Koga mu gubungano bukulu ndingaleba matama mashanu anohwika kudiya bamwe pana kuti ndilebe matama ali zwiwulu zwili gumi mu lulimi gupoga.
Zwikamu, letjani kukumbula se bana; ibeni ngawana mu bubi, koga mu kukumbula ibeni bahwola.
Kwakakwagwa mu nlayo kuyi,
“Nge bathu be ndimi dzipoga
nenge milomo ye bataya
ndowolebeleka ne bathu ibaba
ngono na ipapo abatowondihwilila,” kojalo She.
Ndizo wali ndimi dzipoga tjilakidzo kuna basingagalemoyo kusi kuna banogalamoyo, koga bulebesambeli tjilakidzo kuna banogalamoyo kusi basingagalemoyo.
Ndizo ha gubungano lose lakakubungana, ngono mmwe ne mmwe elebeleka nge ndimi dzipoga, kube kuti bamwe basingahwisise kene basingagalemoyo bebe bengina, apa abangati mopenga kene?

Koga bose ha besumikila dama le bulebesambeli, ngono usingagalemoyo kene nthu koga ebe engina, ungatjemegwa nge dama le Ndzimu linodwa mu gubungano lose kuti ntjinyi ngono mahwi wose aanohwa anowonsumikilisa,
ngono zwakasumbikala zwe moyo uwe zowodusigwa patjena. Ndizo unowowila pasi kanamata Ndzimu, kaleba eti, “Ndzimu upakati kwenyu dumbu.”

Towotini ngono zwikamu? Ha mukubungana kunamata Ndzimu, mmwe ana lumbo kumba, mmwe ana tjidiyo kudiya, mmwe ana tjaazumbunuligwa nge Ndzimu kutjileba, mmwe ana tjaangaleba nge ndimi dzipoga, mmwe etjenesa tjalebgwa. Izwezwi zose ngazwithamwe kusimisa gubungano.
