Ndizo ha ili kuti kuna kukulumbidza muna Kirisiti, ne nyaladzo mu ludo gugwe, ne kukobana ne Meya, ne moyo nyolo ne kuhwila zogwadza,
zhadzisani kushatha kwangu nge bung'ompela mu nkumbulo, muna ludo gung'ompela ne meya ing'ompela ne nkumbulo nng'ompela.
Musishinge tjimwe nge kuzwikumbulila koga kene kuzwikudza, koga mu kuzwiyisa pasi, tolani kuti bamwe banoyita pamuli.
Mmwe ne mmwe wenyu ngaasilinge zwinonshathisa koga, koga ngaalinge ne zwinoshathisa bamwe.
Ibeni ne njalakang'wa edzi mumuli, idzo dzamunadzo muna Kirisiti Jesu:
Iye wakati ali Ndzimu,
kasitole kulizana ne Ndzimu,
ili tjimwe tjingagala tjakanamatigwa
koga wakasiya kose kukwe,
kangina mu bulanda
kabe mutjifano tje bathu.
Ngono kati awanika ali mu tjifano tje nthu kazwiyisa pasi,
kabe unohwa kudzina engina mu lufu,
igo lufu mu tjileyanyo dumbu.
Ndizo Ndzimu wakammilidzila pezhugwi kwazo,
ukampa zina lipezhugwi,
zina linopinda limwe ne limwe,
kuti ndizo nge zina la Jesu
zwidwi zose zwithigame,
kudzimu ne mu shango na pasi,
ne lulimi gumwe ne gumwe gulebe,
kuti Jesu Kirisiti ndi She,
kukudza Ndzimu Tate.
Ndizo badiwa bangu, sekwa magala mundihwa, kusi ndili yapo koga ne mu busipo gwangu mundihwe kupinda, mushingile tjidziwa kwenyu nge kutja nenge kutetema,
ngobe Ndzimu unoshinga mumuli, kuthama kuti mutubule kushingila ne kushaka kushathisa iwo.
Shingani tjimwe ne tjimwe musingang'ong'ole kene kuli kukakabadzana,
kuti ndizo musibe ne nlandu, mube babuyanana, muli bana be Ndzimu basina itoyi pakati kwe tjizekugwana tjakakombama tjakabipa kwazo. Mopenya pakati kwabo, muli tjedza mu shango,
makabhatisisa dama le butjilo, kuti ndizo mu zhuba la Kirisiti ndizwikudze kuti, andizolabukila suli kene kushingila suli.
Nenguba malopa angu angadigwa pezhugwi kwe tjibhayilo tje kugalamoyo kwenyu, ndakashatha, ndopululudza namwi mose.
Sa ikoko namwibo makafanila mushathe, mupululudze nami.
Ndogalabgwe muna She Jesu, kuti ndowotuma Timoti kumuli tjinyolotjo, kuti ndizo ndikulumbidziwe nge thawu nge kwenyu.
Andina mmwe unonga iye, ungabe ne hanya namwi nge malebeswa.
Akuna wandinaye unonga iye, bose banogwisila njemulo dzabo koga, dzisi dza Jesu Kirisiti.
Koga moziba sekwa akazwilakidza tjaali itjo. Wakashinga nami mu ndebo mbuya, se nthu ne nkololo uwe.
Ndizo ndogalabgwe kuntuma tjinyolotjo ha ndabona kuti tjimo ini nge kwangu.
Ndogalamoyo muna She kuti nami ndowozha ikoko tjinyolotjo.
Ndakakumbula kuti kwakafanila kutuma Epafurodito ikamu* tjangu, kakale ali nshingi nami. Ti babhayani tose, iye ntumwa wenyu wakandibhatsha muna zwandinosheta.
Wakabe akamushuba mose, ngono ali mu buyendasi, ngobe makahwa kuti wakabe egwala.
Dumbu wakagwala, kashoko fa kabuya patukununu, koga Ndzimu wakanhwila zogwadza. Kusi iye koga, namibo kuti buyendasi gusi tathikane ne gumwe buyendasi.
Ndakatukutilila kuntuma, kuti mushathile kumbona kakale nenge kuti pamwe ndisidziyidzike kwazo.
Ndizo mun'amutjile muna She nge kushatha kose, mutete bathu bakajali,
ngobe wakashoko be afa, efila nshingo wa Kirisiti, elonga butjilo gugwe mu mbatsha, kuwidza nshingo wenyu kundili.
Tje bupelo zwikamu zwangu, shathani muna She. Ate ali mang'oni ku ndili, kumukwalila zwithu izozwazo kakale akuna mbatsha kumuli.
Muzwitjengete mu mbgwa, muzwitjengete mu bashingi be bubi, muzwitjengete muna banopalulanya mbili.
Ngobe ndiswi buthumbi gwe malebeswa, iswi tinothigamila Ndzimu nge Meya yawo, tizwiloba ifuba muna Kirisiti Jesu. Atitogalabgwe mu mishingo ye tjinyama;
nenguba imi nge kwangu ndina tjandingagalabgwe mutjili tje tjinyama. Ha kuli kuti kuna unatjaangagalabgwe mutjili tje tjinyama, imi ndingagalabgwe kupinda.
Ndakathumbigwa mu zhuba le buzhanakadzi le kuzwagwa kwangu. Ndi N'iziraela ngozwagwa, we ludzi gwa Bhenjamini, Nhebheru, wakazwagwa nge Bahebheru;* ngekwe kulondolodza nlayo, ndi Nfarasi;*
ngekwe kutukutilila, ndakabe ndatukutilila kudziyidza bagalimoyo; ngekwe kuwana ndulamo kwe Ndzimu mu kulondolodza nlayo, andina nlandu.
Koga mbuzilo kene ili ipi yandakabe ndinayo, ndoyitola ili ndashikilo ngekwa Kirisiti.

Nge malebeswa ndotola tjimwe ne tjimwe ili ndashikilo, ngobe luzibo gwandinago ngekwa Kirisiti Jesu She wangu gopinda zwithu zose. Nge kukwe ndakalashikigwa nge zwithu zose, ngono azwitola zwili malala, kuti ndizo Kirisiti abe mbuzilo kundili,
kuti kakale ndiwang'we munli, ndisina ndulamo nge kwangu yakatemelela mu nlayo, koga ndibe ne ndulamo ye Ndzimu nge kugalamoyo muna Kirisiti. Iko kudumila kunodwa ku Ndzimu, kunoshaka kugalamoyo,
kuti ndizo ndizibe Kirisiti ne masimba e kumuka kukwe ne kudziyidzika mu kubhatana naye, ndifanana naye mu lufu gugwe,
kuti, ha kutubuka, ndimusiwe mu bafi.
Anditodwa kuti ndakatubula kale kene kuti ndakatjilulwama. Ndodwilila ndigwisa kuwana mbhayilo, ngobe Kirisiti Jesu wakandithama abe uwe.
Zwikamu, anditokumbula kuti imi ndauwana kale; koga tjing'ompela tjandinothama, hwukangang'wa tjishule kwangu ndibe ndigwisila kuswika kuna tji mbeli.
Ndodwilila ndigwisila kunowidza lubilo, kuti ndiwane mbhayilo wandakadanigwa kudzimu nge Ndzimu muna Kirisiti Jesu.
Tose bakakula tjimeya ngatibeni nge nkumbulo wakajalo. Koga ha mukumbula nge zila ipoga ngekwa ikoku, Ndzimu unowomuzumbunulila ikokubo.
Koga ngatitjilileni mu malebeswa atakawana.
Zwikamu, dwililani mube bayedzi bangu, mulingilile ibabo banolondolodza tjilakidzilo tjatakamupa.
Ngobe banjinji bandakamubudza nge kwabo kanjinji, ngono na ngwenu nditjamubudza ngekwabo nge mishodzi, banotjila se zwita zwe tjileyanyo tja Kirisiti.
Bhelelo labo hwuloba, Ndzimu wabo ntumbu wabo, ngono banozwikudza nge tjabakafanila kubhatigwa nge shoni. Mikumbulo yabo imu zwithu zwe shango.
Koga bugalo gwedu gu kudzimu, kakale takalindila Ntjidzi kudwako, iye She Jesu Kirisiti,
iye unowoshandula mibili yedu isakasima kuti inge mbili uwe we kukudziwa, nge simba linontubulisa kuyisa zwithu zose pasi kukwe.
Ndizo ngwenu zwikamu zwangu, imwi bandinoda kakale bandakashuba, imwi kushatha ne kuzwikudza kwangu, bhatisani musimise muna She badiwa bangu.
Ndokumbila ndakasimisila Yuwodiya na Sintike kuhwanana muna She.

Ndokukumbilabo iwe unoshinga nami nge malebeswa, kuti mubhatshe bakadzi ibabo, ngobe bagala beshinga nami bakasimisila mu nshingo we ndebo mbuya na Kilementi ne bashingi bamwe bose be mazina amu lukwalo gwe butjilo.
Shathani muna She misi yose. Ndowoleba kakale nditi, shathani.
Buthu gwenyu ngagube patjena, gubong'we nge bathu bose. She babe pejo pejo.
Musidziyidzike nge tjimwe, koga kumbilani tjimwe ne tjimwe mu Ndzimu nge mitembezelo nenge kuboka.
Ngono kunyalala kwe Ndzimu kopinda hwisiso yose, inowotjengeta mimoyo ne mikumbulo yenyu muna Kirisiti Jesu.

Tje bupelo, zwikamu, mualakane kwazo ngekwe tjimwe ne tjimwe tje malebeswa, tjimwe ne tjimwe tjingakudziwa, tjimwe ne tjimwe tjakalulwama, tjimwe ne tjimwe tjibuyanana, tjimwe ne tjimwe tjinoshathisa, tjimwe ne tjimwe tjinolingika, ha kuli kuti kuna tjimwe tjina ndulamo, tjakalizana kudziwa, kumbulani ngekwe zwithu zwakajalo!
Tjamakazwidiya ne tjamakaamutjila ne tjamakahwa ne tjamakabona mundili mutjithame, ngono Ndzimu we kunyalala unowobe namwi.
Ndoshatha kwazo muna She, kuti gwa shule molakidza kuti mutjakumbula nge kwangu. Malebeswa hwuti, magala mukumbula nge kwangu, koga musheta tjibaka tje kuzwilakidza.
Ate kuli kuti ndong'ong'ola ngekwe zwandinosheta, ngobe ndakazwidiya kuti, mu tjimo tjimwe ne tjimwe tjandili mutjili, ndiwile zwilopa.
Ndoziba kuti sheta kwakatini, kakale ndoziba kuti kube ne kunjinji kwakatini. Mu tjimo tjimwe ne tjimwe ndakazwidiya butjenjedu gwakasumbikala gwe kuguta ne zhala, gwe kube nge fumwa.
Ndingashinga tjimwe ne tjimwe nge simba lile, iye unondisimisa.
Koga makathama buthu kushanganyila nami manikano dzangu.
Ngono imwi Bafilipi nge kwenyu moziba kuti mu kutangisa kwe ndebo mbuya, pandakadwa ku Makedoniya, akuna gubungano lakabhatana nami mu kupa ne mu kuamutjila, amusi imwi moga,
ngobe ne ndili ku Tesalonika, makanditumilila bhatsho mupaphulula ha ndi ishaka.
Ate kuli kuti ndoshaka tjipo tjenyu; koga ndoshaka kuti mbuzilo ipaphiwe muna zwamakabiganya.

Ndakalipiwa ndipo izhele, kakale inopinda, ndina kose kwandinoshaka se ndakaamutjila muna Epafurodito zwipo zwamakatumilila, zwipo zwinonuhwa kunozipa, tjibhayilo tjinoamutjilika, tjinoshathisa Ndzimu.
Ngono Ndzimu wangu unowomupa zose zwamunosheta, kuyendidzana ne fumwa yawo hwulu muna Kirisiti Jesu.
Ku Ndzimu, Tate bedu ngakube ne gudzo nge kusingapele kose. Ngakujalo.*
Dumilisani bayengemali bose muna Kirisiti Jesu. Zwikamu zwinami zomudumilisa.
Bayengemali bose banomudumilisa, kwazo be nsha wa Kaisara.
Ngoni dza She Jesu Kirisiti ngadzibe mu meya yenyu. Ngakujalo.
Ndimi Paulo ntumwa wa Kirisiti Jesu nge kuda kwe Ndzimu. Ndina Timoti ikamu* tjedu.
Ku bayengemali,* ibo zwikamu zwinogalamoyo muna Kirisiti, zwimu nzi we Kolosi.
Ngoni ne kunyalala kunodwa ku Ndzimu Tate bedu ngazwibe namwi.
Misi yose ha timutembezelela, toboka Ndzimu ibo Tate ba She wedu Jesu Kirisiti,
ngobe takahwa ngekwe kugalamoyo kwenyu muna Kirisiti Jesu nenge ludo gwamunago mu bayengemali bose.
Oku koikhwa nge kugalabgwe kwamakabigigwa kudzimu. Makahwa kale ngekwe kugalabgwe ikoku mu dama le malebeswa, iyo ndebo mbuya,
yakazha mu shango yose, inozwala zwizwalo kakale ikula sekwa yakayita pakati kwenyu kudwila zhuba lamakaihwa mukahwisisa ngoni dze Ndzimu mu malebeswa.
Sekwa makahwa na Epafurasi, nlanda naswi unodika, unoshingila Kirisiti nge malebeswa mu bumo gwedu.
Wakatibudza ngekwe ludo gwamakapiwa nge Meya.

Ngekwa ikoku, kudwa tjose mu zhuba latakahwa nge kwako, atizotongo letja kumutembezelela ne kukumbila Ndzimu kuti umuzhadze nge luzibo gwe kuda kwawo mu butjenjedu gose ne kuhwisisa kunozhisiwa nge Meya yawo,
kuti ndizo mutjile butjilo gwakalulwamila She, gunonshathisa nge buzhalo, makadwilila nge mishingo yenyu yakalulwama inozwala zwizwalo nenge sekwa luzibo gwenyu ngekwe Ndzimu gupaphidzika.
Dzene mungasimisiwa nge kusima kose kunodwa mu simba lawo gulu. Kuti ndizo mutubule kube ne kusimisila kukulu ne moyonlefu, nekushatha,
nekuboka Tate, ibo bakatithama
Wakatidusa mu simba le zhalima ukatiyisa ku bushe gwe Nkololo wawo unodika,
iye watinowana kudzutunungwa ne mazwiibhatigo e zwibi.
Kirisiti tjifano tje Ndzimu usingaboneke,
ndiye mbano ye lubumbo gose.
Zwithu zose zwakabumbigwa munli,
zwithu zwi kudzimu ne zwimu shango,
zwinoboneka ne zwisingaboneke,
zwigalo zwe bushe kene mibuso
kene babusi kene balauli.
Ndzimu wakathama zwithu zose ndiye
uzwithamila iye.
Wakabe yapo zwithu zose
zwisathu zwikabe yapo,
munli tjimwe ne tjimwe tjimu magalo atjo.
Ndiye nsholo we mbili, ilo gubungano.
Ndiye kutangisa,
kakale ndiye we kutanga emusiwa mu bafi,
kuti ndizo abe pezhugwi mu tjimwe ne tjimwe.
Kwakashathisa Ndzimu kuti mbumbiko yawo yose igale munli.
Ndzimu wakagadzanya zwithu zose nawo ndiye, mu shango ne kudzimu, uthama mbakiso nge malopa e tjileyanyo tjitje.
Ngono imwi makatongobe makathubukana ne Ndzimu, muli zwita zwawo mu mikumbulo yenyu mushinga zwa zwakabipa,
koga ngwenu, nge lufu gwe nkololo wawo Ndzimu wakamugadzanya, kuti ndizo umubone mbeli kwawo makayengemala musina nlandu kakale musinga soleke.

Kodwa koga mu kuti modwilila mu kugalamoyo, makagadzikana makasimisila musingatsheduke mu kugalabgwe mu ndebo mbuya yamakahwa yakasumikiligwa itjili tjimwe ne tjimwe tjimu shango, iyo imi Paulo yandakabe nshingi wayo.
Ngwenu, ndoshatha mu kuhwisiwa zogwadza kwangu nge kwenyu, ngono mu nyama yangu ndopeleledza tjakasala mu kuhwisiwa zogwadza kwe mbili wa Kirisiti, ilo gubungano.
Ndakabe nshingi we gubungano nge nshingo wandakapiwa nge kwenyu, kuti dama le Ndzimu lizibgwe nge buzhalo,
lili masazibgwe akasumbikala makole manjinji mu zwizekugwana zwinjinji, koga ngwenu akazibisiwa bayengemali bawo.
Kubali Ndzimu wakashalula kuti bazibe kuti bukulu gwe fumwa ye gudzo le masazibgwe iyawa gungapani mu njudzi dzose, masazibgwe iyawa ndikuti Kirisiti unogala mumuli, iye kugalabgwe kwe gudzo.
Ndizo Kirisiti ndiye watinosumikila, titjemela kakale tidiya mmwe ne mmwe butjenjedu gose, kuti ndizo tizhise mmwe ne mmwe akapelela muna Kirisiti.
Kuti ikoku kutubuke, ndoshinga ndigwisa nge simba la Kirisiti linondisimisa lishinga lili mundili.
Ndoshaka kuti muzibe kuti ndomushingila kuli kungapani, kose neba ku Laodikeya na bose basathu bakabona tjiso tjangu,
kuti mimoyo yabo ikulumbidzike se bakabhatana mu ludo, kuti ndizo babe ne fumwa ye kuhwisisa nge buzhalo kakale babe ne luzibo gwe masazibgwe e Ndzimu, Kirisiti nge kukwe,
munli kwakasumbikwa matula e butjenjedu ne luzibo.
Ndomubudza ikoku kuti ndizo kushaye wamutjengela nge ndebeleko ye bupitipiti.
Ngobe nenguba ndisipo pamuli nge kwangu, ndi namwi mu meya, ngono ndoshatha kubona sekwa muli gedzikane kakale ne nge kugalamoyo kwenyu kwakasima muna Kirisiti.
Ndizoke, sekwa makaamutjila Kirisiti Jesu ali She, tjililani munli,
makadzikigwa munli kakale makabakwa munli, mukasimisiwa mu kugalamoyo sekwa makadiyiwa, muboka nge buzhalo.
Muyele njele kuti kushete wamutapa nge ndebeleko dze butjenjedu gwe bathu guzhele butjengedzi, gunodwa mu zwilenje zwe bathu, zwinodwa mu meya inolaula lubumbo igogu, ngono zwisingadwe muna Kirisiti.
Mbumbiko yose ye Ndzimu nge buzhalo igele mu mbili wa Kirisiti.
Ndizo mu kubhatana na Kirisiti makapiwa butjilo nge buzhalo, iye nsholo we ndaulo yose ne simba lose.
Munli makathumbigwa kusi nge buthumbi gunothamiwa nge bathu, koga nge buthumbi gunothamiwa ndi Kirisiti, gunodwa kusunungugwa kwenyu mu mbumbiko ye nyama.
Mu kudubikiwa makabiganyiwa na Kirisiti kakale mukamusiwa naye nge kugalamoyo kwamunako mu simba le Ndzimu, iwo wakammusa mu bafi.
Ngono imwi makatongobe makafa nge matjinyo enyu ne mukusathumbigwa kwe mibili yenyu.
Wakabukusha nkwalo we milandu yedu ne milayo inosunga kaidusa tjose nge kuikothomela mu tjileyanyo.
Ndzimu wakakunda babusi ne balauli, wakabadusila patjena nge kubakunda muna Kirisiti.
Ndizo musidumile ani kene ani kuti amutilike nlandu ngekwe zojiwa ne zwing'o ne misi ye mizano kose ne Nzano we Mwedzi* ntshwa kene zhuba le Sabata.*
Ezwi mitutshi ye zwithu zwinozha, ngono koga lebeswa lowang'wa muna Kirisiti.

Musitongo letjedzela ani kene ani kamuthama kuti mudume zwidiyo zwe manyepkhwa zwe kunamata batumwa be kudzimu ngoti kungathama kuti musiwane mbhayilo wenyu. Nthu unodiya saikoku wakabiga masimba awe kudiya nge zwaanobona zwe manyepkhwa, unozwikudza nge mikumbulo iyeyo yaanozwibumbila, koga nge lebeswa aana tjaangazwikudza natjo,
asakabhatilila muna Kirisiti, iye nsholo iwo unobhatshanya mbili nge tshinga kakale mbili unotjidziwa nge nsholo, ndizo mbili unokula nge kukula kunodwa ku Ndzimu.
Ha makafa na Kirisiti, ku meya ye lubumbo, ini mutjila se ungati mutji bathu be shango kene? Ini mulondolodza milayo yayo inoti,
“Usibhate etji! Usilabile hwoku! Usikuthe hwokuje?”
Milayo yose iyeyi yakalingisana nge zwithu zwinotjimbidza kupela ha zwishingisiwa; milayo inothamiwa nge bathu kakale ikadiyiwa nge bathu.

Milayo iyeyi inolingika se butjenjedu nge kuzwibigila milawana ye bululwami kuzwiyisa pasi kunozwithamigwa ne nge kuhwisa mbili zogwadza kwakapindilila ili zila ye kunamata Ndzimu; ngono azwitobhatsha nthu mu njemulo mbi dzakapindilila dze mbili.
Se makamusiwa na Kirisiti, lingisani mimoyo yenyu ku zwithu zwe kudzimu, Kirisiti kwaageleko ku luboko gwe luji* gwe Ndzimu.
Lingisani mikumbulo yenyu ku zwithu zwe kudzimu kusi mu zwithu zwe shango.
Ngobe makafa, ngwenu butjilo gwenyu gwakasumbikiwa na Kirisiti mu Ndzimu.
Ha Kirisiti, iye butjilo gwenyu,

Ngono misani tjoselele zose zwe mbumbiko yenyu ye tjinyama: kuwalilana thobo kusakalingisana, kuwalilana thobo kunobhatisa shoni, njemulo dzakabipa dze kuwalilana ne bugovu, ngobe bugovu gonga kuthigamila midzimu.
Ngekuti ngekwa izwezwi, bushongola gwe Ndzimu gwaswika.
Imwi nge kwenyu makatongobe mutjila nge zila yakajalo.
Ngono ngwenu lashani zwithu zwinonga ezwi: kugwadzamoyo ne bushongola ne kugwadzisa bamwe mimoyo ne kulebela bamwe manyepkhwa kene ili kushingisa masapa mu milomo yenyu.
Musinyepelane, ngobe makaambula mbumbiko yenyu hwulukugwe ne mipanga yayo,
kakale makaambala mbumbiko tshwa inothamiwa tshwa nge luzibo mu tjifano tje mbumbi wayo.

Ngekwa ikoku akutjina thubukano pakati kwe N'giriki ne Njuta, pakati kwe nthu wakathumbigwa ne usakathumbigwa, pakati kwe bathu basingalebe Tjigiriki ne Bapanduki bakasalila shule, nlanda kene nsununguki, koga Kirisiti ndiye nshongoshongo wakabhata mbadu kakale Kirisiti umuna bose.
Ndizo se bathu bakazwishaluligwa nge Ndzimu, bayengemali, kakale ukamuda kwazo, ibeni ne ngoni ne buthu ne kuzwiyisa pasi ne moyon'nyolo nenge moyonlefu.
Yitilanani moyonlefu muzwiibhatilane muna tjamunonenelana ngekwatjo. Muzwiibhatilane koga sa She sekwa bakamuzwiibhatigwa.
Pezhugwi kwa zose izwezwi zwakalulwama, ibeni ne ludo igo gunoshanganya kose ne hwanano yakapelela.
Kunyalala ya Kirisiti ngaibuse mu mimoyo yenyu, ngobe se mbili nng'ompela makadanigwa ku kunyalala ikoku. Ndizo ibeni ne kuboka.
Dama la Kirisiti ngaligale mumuli nge buzhalo. Diyanani mulayane nge butjenjedu gose. Imbani Njimbo*, imbani njimbo dzinokudza Ndzimu nenge njimbo dze tjimeya ne kuboka mu mimoyo yenyu.
Ngono tjimwe ne tjimwe tjamunothama kene tjamunoleba, mutjithame nge zina la She Jesu muboka Ndzimu Tate ndiye.
Bakadzi bakalobogwa, tetani balume benyu, ngobe kwakafanila muna She.
Balume bakalobola, idani bakadzi benyu musingabakaikanye.
Bana, ihwani bazwadzi benyu mu tjimwe ne tjimwe, ngobe ikoku koshathisa She.
Botate musitange bana benyu, ngobe bangadwa benyalamoyo.
Balanda, ihwani botetshi benyu be shango mu tjimwe ne tjimwe; musingabahwe ngobabona mushaka kubashathisa, koga mu bahwe nge moyo nng'ompela nenge kutja She.
Tjimwe ne tjimwe tjamunothama, mutjithame nge moyo yenyu yose, koga se munoshingila She kusi bathu.
Moziba kuti mowowana thaka muna She, uli iwo mbhayilo wenyu; moshingila She Kirisiti.
Iye unoyita kusi iko unowowana mbhayilo wakalingisana nge kuyita kusi iko, ngono akuna shalaulo.
Botetshi, bhatani balanda benyu nge zila yakalulwama kakale nge kulizalizana, ngobe moziba kuti namwibo muna Tetshi kudzimu.
Dwililani makasimisila mu ntembezelo, mumuse moyo ha mutembezela, muboka Ndzimu.
Mutitembezelelebo kuti Ndzimu batipe tjibaka tje kuti tilebe masazibgwe a Kirisiti, ngobe ndiwo andakasungigwa.
Tembezelani kuti ndialebe nge kunohwisisika sekwandakafanila leba.
Muzwibhate nge zila inolakidza butjenjedu kuna ibabo basi bagalimoyo ngono mushingisa zubuyanana tjibaka tjimwe ne tjimwe kulebeleka nabo.
Ndebo dzenyu ngadzibe nge buthu, mube ne lulimi gunozipa, kakale makafanila kuziba shandula mmwe ne mmwe zubuyanana.
Tikikasi unowomubudza thawu dzose nge kwangu. Iye ikamu tjinodika, nshingi unogalikabgwe, kakale nlanda naswi muna She.
Tjandinontumila kumuli ndi etji, kuti muzibe tjimo tjedu ne kuti mukulumbidzike mu mimoyo yenyu.
Unowozha na Onesimasi ikamu tjedu tjinogalikabgwe kakale tjinodika. Iye mmwe wenyu. Banowomubudza tjimwe ne tjimwe tjinoshingikala ngeno.
Nsungwa nami Arisitako, unomudumilisa kose na Mako ikamu tja Bhanabhasi. Makabudziwa nge kukwe kale; ndizo ha kuli kuti ungazha kumuli, mun'amutjile.
Jesu, unodang'wa Jusito, unomudumilisabo. Ndibo koga Bajuta mu bagalimoyo muna Kirisiti banoshinga nami, tishingila bushe* gwe Ndzimu ngono bakandinyaladza kwazo.
Epafurasi mmwe wenyu kakale ali nlanda wa Kirisiti Jesu unomudumilisabo. Unogala emutembezelela nge moyo uwe wose kuti ndizo musimisile nge luzibo guzhele musingadudumwe mu kuda kwe Ndzimu kose.
Ndopa butendeki* nge kukwe gwe kuti wakamushingila akasimisa ne ba ku Laodikeya ne ba ku Hiyerapolisi.
N'diwa wedu Luke we ng'anga na Demasi, banomudumilisa.
Dumilisani zwikamu zwimu Laodikeya, na Nimfa ne gubungano linoshanganila mu nzi* uwe.
Ha mabaligwa lukwalo igogu, thamani kuti gubagwebo mu gubungano le Balaodikeya, imwibo mubale lukwalo gunodwa ku Laodikeya.
Muti kuna Akipo, “Ubone kuti unopedza nshingo wawakapiwa mu kushingila She.”
Imi Paulo, ndokwala dumiliso iyeyi nge gwangu luboko. Kumbulani busungwa gwangu.
Ngoni dze Ndzimu ngadzibe namwi.
Ndimi Paulo, ndina Silivano,
Ku gubungano le Batesalonika mu Ndzimu Tate na She Jesu Kirisiti:*
Ngoni ne kunyalala ngakube namwi.
Toboka Ndzimu misi yose nge kwenyu mose, timutembezelela mu mitembezelo yedu.

Togala tikumbula mbeli kwe Ndzimu Tate bedu, nshingo wenyu unozwagwa nge bugalimoyo, kushinga kwenyu kukulu kunozwagwa nge ludo nenge kusimisila kwenyu kunozwagwa nge kugalabgwe muna She wedu Jesu Kirisiti.
Zwikamu* zwinodiwa nge Ndzimu, toziba kuti wakamushalula,
ngobe ndebo mbuya yedu aizozha kumuli nge matama koga, yakazha nge masimba nge Meya yakayengemala nenge kuduma kwakapelela. Moziba sekwa takabe tizwiibhata tili gele pakati kwenyu tithamila imwi.
Makabe bayedzi bedu ne ba She; nenguba makabe ne kudziyila kukulu, makaamutjila dama nge kushatha kunodwa mu Meya yakayengemala.
Ndizo makabe tjilakidzilo ku bagalimoyo bose be Makedoniya ne Akaiya.

Ngobe dama ngekwa She alizoti kubhuda mumuli, likazibgwa mu Makedoniya ne Akaiya koga, lakazibgwa kumwe ne kumwe nenge zila yamakabe mu kugalamoyo ndiyo mu Ndzimu. Ndizo akutjina tjatingaleba nge kwako,
ngobe ibo nge kwabo banoleba nge sekwa makatiamutjila nenge sekwa makaletjedza thigamila midzimu, ngono motjithigamila Ndzimu unotjila, wakwako,
nenge kulindila kuzha kwe Nkololo wawo edwa kudzimu, iye wawakamusa mu bafi. Jesu iye unotiangulila mu bushongola gonozha.
Koga imwi zwikamu moziba kuti, kumu kumba kwedu akuzobe kuli madatha.

Koga nenguba muziba kuti takabe tadziyila kale, tikabhakhwa kunobhatisa shoni ku Filipi, koga nge bhatsho ye Ndzimu wedu takasimisamoyo kumubudza ndebo mbuya yawo patjena, nenguba kwakabe kuna kunyanyayidziwa kukulu.
Tjatinomukumbila atjitodwa mu kulashika kene mu mikumbulo isi mibuyanana, kakale atitogwisa kumulasha.
Koga tolebeleka tili bakaamutjigwa nge Ndzimu, kuti ndebo mbuya ingabigwa mu maboko edu. Atitogwisa kushathisa bathu, koga togwisa kushathisa Ndzimu, iwo unolika mimoyo yedu.
Moziba kuti atizotongo zha kumuli tizipisa ndebo, kakale atizotongo leba ndebo inosumbika bugovu. Ndzimu ntendeki wedu.
Takabe tisingashake kukudziwa nge bathu, imwi kene mmwe koga,
Se batumwa ba Kirisiti tobetakabe ntolo kumuli, koga takabe banyolo pakati kwenyu, tinga mayi belela bana babo batukununu.
Takabe timuda kwatakashathila kushanganyila namwi kusi ndebo mbuya yoga ye Ndzimu ne matjilo edubo, ngobe makabe mudika kwazo.
Ngobe moalakana, kushinga nenge kudziyidzika kwazo kwedu zwikamu, takashinga siku ne sikati, kuti tisibe ntolo mumuli ha timusumikilila ndebo mbuya ye Ndzimu kumuli.
Mu batendeki, kose ne Ndzimu ntendeki, kuti takabe tili bakayengemala tjini, tili balulwami kakale tisina nlandu, tili pakati kwenyu imwi banogalamoyo.
Moziba kuti takabhata mmwe ne mmwe wenyu koga sa tate bebhata bana babo,
timusimisa, timunyaladza, timukulumbidza, kuti mutjile butjilo gwakafanila Ndzimu, iwo unomudanila mu gudzo* le bushe* gwawo.

Kakale togala tiboka Ndzimu, ngobe makati muamutjila dama le Ndzimu, ilo lamakahwa ndiswi, makaliamutjila kusi se dama le nthu, koga se dama le Ndzimu sekwa lili ilo, ilo linoshinga mumuli imwi banogalamoyo.
Imwi zwikamu, makabe bayedzi be makubungano e Ndzimu mu Judiya iwo amuna Kirisiti Jesu, ngobe makadziyidziwa nge bakanyi kwenyu, koga saibo bakadziyidziwa nge Bajuta,
ibo bakabulaya She Jesu ne balebesambeli,* kakale bakatidziyidza. Abatoshathisa Ndzimu, kakale banonyanyayidza bathu bose
ne kutidzibisa kulebeleka ne Bezwitjaba, kuti ndizo Bezwitjaba batjidziwe. Nge zila iyeyi, bezhadza tjilizanyo tje zwibi zwabo misi yose. Koga bushongola gwe Ndzimu gwadzina gukabazhila kubupelo.
Koga zwikamu, kwakati takathubukana namwi tjibaka tjifupi, takabe tili tose mu mikumbulo. Mu kumushuba kwedu kukulu, takagwisa kwazo kuti tizhe timubone nge mesho.
Ngobe takabe tishaka zha kumuli, imi Paulo, ndakagwisa kanjinji koga Satani katima mbeli.
Dumbu kugalabgwe kwedu ne kushatha kwedu kene tjiala tje kukunda kungabeni, ha tima mbeli kwa She wedu Jesu Kirisiti ha ezha? Kungabeni ha isi imwi kene?
Ndimwi kuzwikudza ne kushatha kwedu.
Ndizo takati tibona tikong'wa, tikayemula kuti tisale toga mu Atene.
Takatuma Timoti ikamu tjedu, nshingili we Ndzimu naswi mu kusumikila ndebo mbuya ya Kirisiti, kumusimisa nenge kumukulumbidza mu bugalimoyo gwenyu,
kuti ndizo kushaye unosagadzinyiwa nge ndiko idzedzi. Moziba zubuyanana kuti ikoku kwakatilingisana.
Nge malebeswa takati tinamwi, takabe timubudza lubaka gutjipo kuti towodziyidziwa; ngono sekwa munoziba, nditjo tjakashingikala.

Ndizo ngekwa ikoku ndakati ndibona kuti andingatjatubule kudzikitadza, ndakatumila nthu ndida ziba sekwa munotjila mu bugalimoyo gwenyu. Ndidziyidzika mu meya ndialakana kuti pamwe nliki wakamulika, ngono nshingo wedu ukasibe ne mbhayilo.

Koga se Timoti akatjibuya edwa kumuli ngono katizhisila thawu dzakanaka ngekwe bugalimoyo nenge ludo gwenyu. Wakatibudza kuti tjibaka tjose motikumbula nge kwakanaka nenge kuti makashuba kutibona, se naswibo takamushuba.
Ndizo ngwenu zwikamu, mu buyendasi gwedu ne kudziyidziwa, takakulumbidzika nge kwe bugalimoyo gwenyu.
Ngobe ngwenu tozwihwa titjila dumbu, ngoti mumile makasima muna She.
Apa tingaboka Ndzimu kungapani nge kwenyu, ngekwe kushatha kose kwatinako nge kwenyu mbeli kwe Ndzimu wedu kene?
Siku ne sikati totembezela nge kugalamoyo, kuti titubule kumubona kakale kuti ndizo timupe tjamunosheta mu kugalamoyo kwenyu.
Tshene Ndzimu wedu, ibo Tate nge kwabo na She wedu Jesu bangatizhulila zila kuti tizhe kumuli.
Tshene She bangayita kuti, ludo gwenyu gupaphidzike, kuswikila mudana kwazo, kakale mudzine mude bathu bose sekwa tinomuda iswi.
Tshene bangasimisa mimoyo yenyu mu buyengemali, kuti ha She Jesu ezha ne bayengemali
Tjebupelo zwikamu, tomukumbila kakale timukulumbidza muna She Jesu, kuti sekwa makazwidiya mutili kutjila ne kushathisa Ndzimu, tomukulumbidza kuti sekwa munothama, mudwilile kunopinda ikoku.
Ngobe moziba ndayo dzatakamupa nge simba la She Jesu.
Kuda kwe Ndzimu hwuti mube bayengemali,* muletje kuwalilana thobo kuzhe kwe ndobolo,
mmwe ne mmwe wenyu, wakafanila kuziba kutjila ne nkadzi uwe
kusi nge njemulo dzakabipa dze kuwalilana, sekwa kunoyita basingagalemoyo, basingazibe Ndzimu.
Ngakushaye unotjinyila kene katjebela ikamu tjitje ngekwe zwithu zwakajalo. She banowoloba bathu ngekwe matjinyo wose akajalo, sekwa takamubudza tikamutjemela kale.
Ngobe Ndzimu auzotidanila kuti tibe ne shambgwa, koga kuti titjile butjilo gwakayengemala.
Ndizo iye unolamba ndayo idzedzi, aatolamba nthu, koga unolamba Ndzimu, iwo unomupa Meya yawo yakayengemala.
Ngwenu ngekwe ludo pakati kwe zwikamu, akutosheteka kuti tingamukwalila, ngobe imwi nge kwenyu, makadiyiwa nge Ndzimu kudana.
Nge malebeswa, moda zwikamu zose mu Makedoniya. Koga tomukulumbidza zwikamu mudane kunopinda ikoku.
Muzwimisile kutjila butjilo gwe kunyalala, ne kushinga mishingo yenyu, mushinga nge maboko enyu koga sekwa takamubudza,
kuti ndizo mutetiwe nge basi badumili, ngekuti musitongo tjila ngopiwa nge bamwe zwamunosheta.
Zwikamu, atitoshaka kuti mugale muli mu zhalima ngekwe banofa, kene kuzhala buyendasi se bathu basina kugalabgwe.
Se tigalamoyo kuti Jesu wakafa kakale kamuka, togalamoyo kuti Ndzimu unoti uzhisa Jesu ukazhisilanya naibabo bakafa begalamoyo munli.
Ngekwa ikoku tomubudza ngekwe tjinolebgwa nge dama la She, kuti iswi batjatjila, batinowobe tasala kuswikila kuzha kwa She, nge malebeswa atitowotangila ibabo bakafa.
Ngobe She nge kwabo banowodeluka kudzimu nge hwi gulu le ndaulo nenge hwi le ntumwa nkulu we Ndzimu nenge nlidzo we lunyanga gwe Ndzimu. Ngono bafi bakafila muna Kirisiti banowomuka kutanga.
Shule kwa ikoko, iswi batjatjila bakasala, towoshangana nabo mu makole kushanganidza She mu phepo. Ngono, towogalila tjose na She.
Ndizo nyaladzanani nge matama iyawa.
Ndizo ngwenu zwikamu, akutosheteka kuti timukwalile ngekwe zwibaka nenge misi,
ngobe imwi nge kwenyu moziba kuti zhuba la She lowozha se mbava busiku.
Bathu banowoti batjati, “Kuna mbakililo ne kunyalala,” kukolomoka kowobawila se zwibhayo zwe nkadzi wakazwisenga, kakale abana kwabangatizhila.
Koga imwi zwikamu, ate muli mu zhalima, kwamungatjenamisiwa nge zhuba ilelo se mungatjenamisiwa nge mbava.
Mose mu bana be tjedza, kakale mu bana be masikati. Ate tili be busiku, kene be zhalima.
Ndizo ngatisifananeni ne bamwe, bakabhakhwa nge hwope, koga ngatizwitjengeteni tibe ne kuzwibhata.
Ngobe ibabo banoyizela, banoyizela busiku ne banolaladza, banolaladza busiku.
Koga se iswi tili be masikati, ngatibeni nge kuzwibhata, tiambale kugalamoyo ne ludo, zwili tjivikili tje zwifuba zwedu ne kugalabgwe kwe kutjidziwa, kuli tjivikili tje misholo yedu.
Ngobe Ndzimu auzotishalulila kuti tihwe zogwadza zwe bushongola koga wakatishalulila kuti tiamutjile jidzo muna She wedu Jesu Kirisiti.
Wakatifila kuti ndizo kene takalinga kene takayizela,
Ndizo kulumbidzanani kakale mubakane sekwa munothama ngwenu.
Ngwenu tomukumbila zwikamu, kuteta banoshinga bakasima pakati kwenyu, bakamutungamila muna She, kakale bemulaya.
Mubakudze kwazo mu ludo ngekwe nshingo wabo. Ngakube nge mbakiso pakati kwenyu.
Tomukulumbidza zwikamu, titi tjemelani ibabo basingashake shinga, simisani magwala, mubhatshe basingatubule, mube ne moyonlefu mu mmwe ne mmwe.
Muthame kuti kusibe nge kubgwilizilana bubi nge bubi, koga ibeni nge buthu mu bamwe namwi ne muna bose.
Shathani misi yose.
Mugale mutembezela,
bokani mutjimwe ne tjimwe, ngobe oku ndiko kuda kwe Ndzimu muna Kirisiti Jesu nge kwenyu.
Musidzime moto we Meya.
Musilingile pasi bulebesambeli.
Koga shakisisani tjimwe ne tjimwe kubona kuti kene nditjo. Bhatililani muna kwakalulwama.
Leyani bubi gumwe ne gumwe.
Dzene tshene Ndzimu we kunyalala nge kwawo ungamuyengemadza nge buzhalo. Dzene tshene meya yenyu ne mibili yenyu ingagala isina nlandu kuzha kwa She wedu Jesu Kirisiti.
Iye unomudana, unogalikamoyo, kakale unowokuthama.
Zwikamu mutitembezelele.
Dumilisani zwikamu zose nge kubutjilana kwakayengemala.
Ndomudwa mbeli kwa She kuti, muyite kuti lukwalo igogu gubaligwe zwikamu zose.
Ngoni dza She wedu Jesu Kirisiti ngadzibe namwi.
Ndimi Paulo, ndina Silasi na Timoti.
Ku gubungano le Batesalonika mu Ndzimu Tate bedu na She Jesu Kirisiti:*
Ngoni ne kunyalala kunodwa ku Ndzimu Tate bedu na She Jesu Kirisiti ngakube namwi.
Takafanila kuboka Ndzimu misi yose nge kwenyu zwikamu,* kwakafanila, ngobe kugalamoyo kwenyu kokula kuyenda mbeli ne ludo gwamunodana ndigo gokula.
Ndizo pakati kwe makubungano e Ndzimu, tozwiloba ifuba ngekwe kusimisila kwenyu ne kugalamoyo kwenyu mu kudziyidziwa kose ne kuhwisiwa zogwadza kwamunodzikitadzila.
Kose ikoku kolakidza kuti kusumikilisa kwe Ndzimu kwakalulwama, ngono ngekwa ikoko mowothang'wa bakafanila bushe gwe Ndzimu, iwo wamunodziyilila.
Ndzimu wakalulwama, unowodziyidza ibabo banomudziyidza,
koga, ukamunyalulusa, imwi banodziyidziwa, kose naswibo. Oku kowoshingikala She Jesu ezumbunuka kudwa kudzimu ne batumwa babe be kudzimu bana masimba,
ali mu moto unothuta ehwisa zogwadza ibabo banolamba Ndzimu kakale basina hanya ne ndebo mbuya ya She wedu Jesu.
Banowolobgwa shamu ye golomodzo lisingapele, bakatatigwa kule na She ne bukulu gwe simba lile
mu zhuba laanowozha kukudziwa mu bathu babe bakayengemala ne kulumbidziwa ndi bose bakagalamoyo. Namwibo mowobe munabo, ngobe makagalamoyo butendeki* gwedu kumuli.

Ha tikumbula ikoku, tomutembezelela misi yose kuti dzene tshene Ndzimu ungamuthama kuti mufanigwe ngodanigwa kwenyu kuuli, kakale kuti nge simba lawo ungazhadzisa mazwimisilo enyu wose ekushinga ndulamo,* ne mishingo yenyu ye bugalimoyo,
kuti ndizo zina la She wedu Jesu likudziwe nge kwenyu, namwibo mukudziwe nge kukwe kuyendidzana ne ngoni dze Ndzimu wedu ne dza She wedu Jesu Kirisiti.
Ngekwe kuzha kwa She wedu Jesu Kirisiti ne kukubungana kwedu kuti tishangane naye, tomukumbila zwikamu
kuti musitongo shangana misholo kene mukapalukamoyo, muyitiwa nge bulebesambeli kene mbiko kene lukwalo, zwinoyi zwakadwa kutili guti zhuba la She lakatjizha kale.
Kushaye unomutjebela nge imwe zila, ngobe zhuba ilelo alitowozha kudzina kupanduka kuzha, na iye mbimbi ezumbunugwa, iye wakabigigwa kuloba.
Unowonyanyayidza, kazwibiga pezhugwi kwe tjimwe ne tjimwe tjinodang'wa kuyi ndzimu kene tjinothigamigwa, na iko unowozwibiga pezhugwi mu Ng'umba* ye Ndzimu, ezwidana eti Ndzimu.
Apa amutoalakana kene kuti ndakati ndi namwi ndakabe ndimubudza zwithu izwezwi?
Ngono ngwenu moziba kuti wakabhakhwa ngeni. Moziba kuti wakabhatigwa kuti akowozumbunugwa nge tjibaka tjakalingisana.
Ngobe simba gulu biibi lakasumbikala loshinga kale, koga lowozumbunugwa ha iwoyo wakalibhata adusiwa mu zila.
Ngono mbimbi unowozumbunugwa, ngono She Jesu unowombulaya nge meya ye nlomo uwe, kanlobesa ngekwe kuzha kukwe.
Kuzha kwe mbimbi kowobe kuli kushinga kwa Satani, iye uno shingisa masimba akasiyana siyana nenge zwilakidzo ne matjenamiso e manyepkhwa,
nenge bubi gose gwakasiyana siyana gwe butjakwani gunotjebela ibabo banowoloba, ngobe bakalamba kuda malebeswa kuti ndizo batjidziwe.
Ngekwa ikoku Ndzimu unobatumila tjidzimilabgwe tjikulu kuti ndizo bagalemoyo mu manyepkhwa,
kuti ndizo basakagalamoyo mu malebeswa koga bakazipigwa nge mbipo, bose babong'we nlandu.

Koga takafanila kuboka Ndzimu misi yose nge kwenyu zwikamu zwinodiwa ndi She, ngobe kudwa tjose mu kutangisa, Ndzimu wakamushalulila kutjidziwa nge nshingo we Meya inoyengemadza nenge kugalamoyo kwenyu mu malebeswa.
Wakamudanila ikoku nge ndebo mbuya yedu kuti namwibo mube ne gobe mu gudzo la She wedu Jesu Kirisiti.
Ndizo, zwikamu, imani makasima kakale mubhatilile mu zwidiyo zwatakapitshila kumuli ne nlomo kene nge lukwalo.
Dzene tshene She wedu Jesu Kirisiti nge kukwe ne Ndzimu Tate bedu, ibo bakatida, kakale bakatipa nyaladzo isingapele ne kugalabgwe kwakalulwama nge ngoni dzabo,
dzene bangadwilila bakasimisa mimoyo yenyu, mu nshingo mmwe ne mmwe wakanaka nenge dama lakanaka.
Tjebupelo zwikamu, mutitembezelele kuti dzene tshene dama la She lingaandama tjinyolotjo, likakunda, sekwa lakathama mumuli.
Kakale mutembezele kuti dzene tingasunungugwa mu bathu bakabipa ne babi, ngobe ate mmwe ne mmwe unogalamoyo.
Koga She banogalikabgwe, ndizo banowomusimisa bakamubakilila mu bubi.
Todwilila tigalabgwe mumuli muna She, kuti mowodwilila muthama zwithu zwatinomutuma.
Dzene tshene She bangalingisa mimoyo yenyu ku ludo gwe Ndzimu ne mukudzikitadza kwa Kirisiti.
Muzina la She wedu Jesu Kirisiti, tomulaya zwikamu, kuzwidusa mu ikamu* tjimwe ne tjimwe tje simbe kakale tjisingatjile kuyendidzana nge kudiya kwamakaamutjila mutili.
Ngobe imwi nge kwenyu moziba kutobela tjilakidzilo tjedu. Takabe tisisimbe ti namwi,
kakale akuna watajila zojiwa zwizwe tisazwipa. Koga takashinga siku ne sikati, tishinga titukutila kuti ndizo tisibe ntolo kummwe wenyu.
Takathama ikoku kusi kuti atina fanilo mu bhatsho iyeyi, koga takabe tizwithama tjilakidzilo kumuli tjamungatobela.
Ngobe ne ti namwi, takamupa ndayo iyeyi, “Ha nthu asingashinge aatowoja.”
Tohwa kuyi bamwe pakati kwenyu ndi bomashwaushingani, abatoshinga; tjabanoziba koga hwunginikana nge zwithu zwe bamwe.
Bathu bakajalo tobalaya kakale tobakulumbidza muna She Jesu Kirisiti kuti badzikame bashingile zojiwa zwabanoja.
Ngono imwi, zwikamu, musitongo nyadziwa ngoshinga tjakalulwama.
Ha mmwe asingahwe ndayo yedu mu lukwalo igogu, munlonge zhisho. Musishingidzane naye, kuti ndizo abhakhwe nge shoni.
Musintole se tjita koga muntjemele se ikamu.
Ngwenu dzene tshene She we mbakiso nge kukwe angamupa mbakiso mu zwibaka zose nenge mu zila dzose. She ngababe namwi mose.
Imi Paulo ndozwikwalila nge luboko gwangu dumiliso iyeyi, ngono ikoku ndigo lutjwayo gwe lukwalo gwangu gumwe ne gumwe. Ndiko sekwa ndinokwala.
Dzene tshene ngoni dza She wedu Jesu Kirisiti dzingabe namwi mose.
Ndimi Paulo ntumwa* wa Kirisiti* Jesu nge ndayo ye Ndzimu Ntjidzi wedu na Kirisiti Jesu, iye kugalabgwe kwedu.
Kuna Timoti nkololo wangu tjose mu bugalimoyo:
Ngoni ne mahwilo zogwadza ne kunyalala kunodwa ku Ndzimu Tate na Kirisiti Jesu She wedu ngakube nawe.
Sekwa ndakakukulumbidza ndiyenda ku Makedoniya, gala ku Efeso, kuti ndizo udwe bamwe bathu kuti basidiye zwidiyo zwipoga,
kene kuzwipa mu ngano ne mazina e lutshinga gwa bobatategulu asingapele. Oku kozhisa kunyanyayidzana mu bumo gwe nshingo we Ndzimu, iwo unozha nge kugalamoyo.
Mazwimisilo e ndayo* iyeyi ludo, igo gunodwa mu moyo mbuyanana ne njalakang'wa mbuyanana ne kugalamoyo kwe malebeswa.
Bamwe bakabhuda muna izwezwi, ngono bakalashika nge kushandukila ku ndebo dzisina nshingo.
Banoyemula kube badiyi be nlayo koga abatoziba tjabanoleba nanga naizo zwabanoti i lebeswa dumbu.
Toziba kuti nlayo wakanaka, ha nthu eushingisa zubuyanana,

eziba kakale kuti nlayo auzothamigwa bathu bakalulwama, koga wakathamigwa basingaulondolodze ne basingahwe, basingazibe Ndzimu ne batjinyi, basakayengemala ne basinganamate Ndzimu, ibo banobulaya botate kene bomme yabo, babulayi,
phombgwe ne betjilume banowalilana thobo ne banotenga betengesa balanda ne banyepi ne banopa butendeki* gwe manyepkhwa ne tjimwe ne tjimwe tjinonyanyayidzana ne zwidiyo zwakatambunuka,
zwinodumana ne ndebo mbuya yandakapiwa, ye Ndzimu una gudzo kakale una makombolelo.
Ndoboka Kirisiti Jesu She wedu, iye wakandipa matatabuko, ngobe wakandibona ndili unogalikabgwe, ngekundishalulila nshingo uwe.
Nenguba ndakatongo ntuka, ndikandziyidza ndikansapula, koga ndakahwigwa ngoni ngobe ndakashinga sa ikoko nge kusaziba nenge kusagalamoyo.
Ngono She wakadila ngoni dzidze dzikazhala tupu mundili nge kugalamoyo ne ludo zwimuna Kirisiti Jesu.
Ndebo ye lebeswa dumbu yakwako, yakafanila amutjigwa nge buzhalo ndi eyi, Kirisiti Jesu wakazha mu shango kutjidza batjinyi*, ibo bandinopinda bose mu butjinyi.
Koga ndakahwigwa ngoni, kuti ndizo mundili, imi ntjinyi unopinda bose, Jesu Kirisiti alakidze bumoyonlefu gugwe, tjili tjilakidzilo tja ibabo banowogalamoyo munli, ngono bakawana butjilo gusingapele.
Ngwenu ngakube ne kuteta gudzo nge kusingapele kose kuna She nkulu tjose, usingafe kakale usingaboneke. Ngakujalo.*
Timoti nkololo wangu, ndokupa ndayo iyeyi kuyendidzana nge kulebesambeli, kwakalebgwa nge kuko kuti ndizo mukusima kuko mukutobela bulebesambeli igogu, ungagwa ngwa yakanaka,
wakabhatilila mu kugalamoyo ne hana mbuyanana. Bamwe bakalamba kuhwilila hana dzabo, ndizo bakatjinya kugalamoyo kwabo,
mubali ili Himeneo na Alekizanda, ibo bandakapa Satani kuti bazwidiye kusatuka Ndzimu.
Ngwenu, tjekutanga ndokukulumbidza kuti kukumbila ne mitembezelo ne kutembezelela bamwe ne kutenda kuyitigwe bathu bose,
kuyitigwe boshe bakulu na ibabo bana masimba, kuti ndizo titjile butjilo gwe kunyalala ne mbakiso mu kunamata Ndzimu nge zila dzose.
Oku kwakanaka kakale koshathisa Ndzimu Ntjidzi wedu,
iye unoshaka kuti bathu bose batjidziwe kakale bazhe mu luzibo gwe malebeswa.
Ngobe kuna Ndzimu nng'ompela kakale kuna n'gadzanyi nng'ompela pakati kwe Ndzimu ne bathu, iye Kirisiti Jesu, ali nthu.
Iye wakazwipa se nlipilili we bathu bose, sa ikoko butendeki gwakapiwa nge tjibaka tjago tjakafanila.
Ngekwa ikoko, ndakashalugwa kube nsumikili ne ntumwa wa Jesu, kudiya Bezwitjaba* bugalimoyo ne malebeswa, ndolebesa anditonyepa.
Ndoshaka kuti balume kumwe ne kumwe batembezele nge njalakang'wa dzakatjena, basakagwadzamoyo kakale basingakangazhane.

Kakale ndoshaka kuti bakadzi baambale zubuyanana, kwakafanila, kakale kwakalulwama, kusi nge mavudzi akalukiwa kanakisiwa nge golide kene nge mabgwe mabuya anothama ndalama kene zwiambalo zwe ntengo upezhugwi,
koga nge mishingo yakanaka, yakafanila bakadzi banolakidza kutja Ndzimu.
Nkadzi wakafanila kuzwidiya akanyalala ne kuzwiyisa pasi kwakapelela.
Anditodumila nkadzi kudiya kene kube nge simba pezhugwi kwe nlume, wakafanila nyalala.
Ngobe Adamu wakabumbiwa kutanga, kukoti Efa.
Kakale Adamu aazotjebegwa, koga nkadzi ndiye wakatjebegwa, ndizo kasilondolodze nlayo we Ndzimu.
Koga nkadzi unowotjidziwa ngokutshibama, ha badwilila mu kugalamoyo nenge ludo nenge kuyengemala nenge kudzikama.
Ndebo iyeyi malebeswa: Ha mmwe eyemula kube nlingi we gubungano
Ngono nlingi we gubungano wakafanila kube akatambunuka, ali nlume we nkadzi nng'ompela, akadzikama, akatitja, ana ntutshi, ana buthu, etubula diya,
asingalaladze, asina ngwa, koga ana moyo nnyolo, asina zhoba, asingade mari.
Wakafanila tubula kuyendisa nsha uwe zubuyanana, ediya bana babe kunhwa, benteta kwakafanila.
Ha nlume asingazibe kuyendisa nsha uwe, apa ungatjengeta gubungano le Ndzimu tjini kene?
Azofanila kube ali nthu wakashanduka ngwenu, ngobe ungadwa ezwikudza ndizo kasumikilisiwa sekwa Nvanganyi akasumikilisiwa.
Wakafanila kube ana zina buyanana muna bakuzhe, kuti ndizo asitobokiwe kawila mu dati le Nvanganyi.
Batiyakoni* na ibobo bakafanila kube balume banofanigwa nge kutetiwa, bana malebeswa, basingagale ngolaladza kakale basina bugovu gwe fumwa.
Bakafanila bhatilila mu malebeswa e kugalamoyo bana hana mbuyanana.
Bakafanila lingisisiwa kutanga, ngono ha kusina tjimwe tjisakalingisana nge kwabo, ngabashinge bali batiyakoni.
Sa ikoko, bakadzi
Ntiyakoni wakafanila kube nlume we nkadzi nng'ompela, kakale wakafanila kulela bana babe ne nsha uwe zubuyanana.
Ibabo banoshinga zubuyanana banowana tjimo tjakanaka nenge ganyo mu bugalimoyo gwabo muna Kirisiti Jesu.
Nenguba ndigalabgwe kuzha kukuli tjinyolotjo, ndokukwalila milayo iyeyi kuti ndizo
ha ndinonoka, unowoziba bathu sekwa bakafanila kuzwibhata mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu, ilo gubungano le Ndzimu unotjila, phanda ne luswingo gwe malebeswa.
Nge malebeswa akuna ungalamba masazibgwe e bugalimoyo gwedu:
Wakazha ali nthu,
Meya ikalakidza kuti unolebesa,
kabong'wa nge batumwa be kudzimu.
Kasumikigwa pakati kwe zwitjaba,
kukagagwamoyo munli mu shango yose
katolegwa kudzimu mu gudzo.
Meya inoleba kulipatjena kuti, mu zwibaka zwe bupelo bamwe banowosiya kugalamoyo, ngono bakatobela meya inotjebela ne zwidiyo zwinodiyiwa nge meya mibi.
Zwidiyo izwezo zozha nge batjebeli be banyepi, be hana dzakadingindila dzonga dzakababugwa.
Banodzibila bathu kulobola, bebadziba kuti basije zwimwe zojiwa zwakathamiwa nge Ndzimu kuti zwiamutjigwe nge kutenda ndi ibabo banogalamoyo ne banoziba malebeswa.
Ngobe tjimwe ne tjimwe tjakathamiwa nge Ndzimu tjakanaka, kakale akuna tjakafanila lambiwa ha ili kuti tjoamutjigwa nge kutenda,
ngobe tjayengemadziwa nge dama le Ndzimu ne ntembezelo.
Ha ubudza zwikamu* zwithu izwezwi, unowobe nshingi wakalulwama wa Kirisiti Jesu, wakakudzigwa mu malebeswa e kugalamoyo ne kudiya kwakalulwama kwamakatobela.
Koga thubukanani ne ngano,* ne dumilo dze manyepkhwa dzisi mu Ndzimu, uzwiwolobedze kutjila butjilo gwe kunamata Ndzimu.
Kusimisa mbili kwakalulwama, koga kunamata Ndzimu kwakalulwamila zwithu zose, ngobe kogadzabgwe mu butjilo guno ne butjilo gunozha.
Ndebo ye malebeswa inoshaka kuamutjigwa nge buzhalo ndi eyi:
Ngoti toshinga kwazo ngekuti takabiga kugalabgwe kwedu mu Ndzimu unotjila, iwo Ntjidzi we bathu bose, kwazo ibabo banogalamoyo.
Laya, udiye zwithu izwezwi.
Kushaye unokudeyelela ngobe uli ntjetjana, koga bigila bagalimoyo tjilakidzilo nge tjaunoleba nenge mu mazwiibhato awo mu ludo, mu kugalamoyo ne mu bubuyanana.
Kuswikila ndizha ugale ubalila bathu hwalo dze Ndzimu, ne kubalaya, ne kubadiya.
Usishayile hanya tjipo tjitjo tjawakapiwa nge kubigiwa maboko nge Gulukota le bakulu,* ili thumo ye bulebesambeli.
Shinga zwithu izwezwi, uzwipe muzwili nge buzhalo, kuti ndizo mmwe ne mmwe abone kudwilila mbeli kuko.
Utjengete butjilo gugo kwazo ne tjaunodiya, uzwibhatilile mutjili, ngobe ha uijalo unowozwitjidza iwe kose ne bahwilili babo.
Usitjemele nthuntana nge bushongola, koga unkulumbidze se unokulumbidza tate babo, ubhate balume batjetjana pakuli se banung'una babo,
bakadzi bahwola ubatole sa bomme yabo, bakadzi batjetjana pakuli, ibo se hazwadzi dzidzo nge bubuyanana gwakapelela.
Teta nge kwakafanila tjilikadzi dzinosheta dumbu.
Koga ha tjilikadzi ina bana kene bana be bana, bakafanila kuti bazwidiye kutanga kuti balakidze bakanyi kwabo zila yekunamata ne kutenda bazwadzi babo, ngobe ikoku koshathisa Ndzimu.
Tjilikadzi inodziyila dumbu ngono ili yoga koga, inogalabgwe mu Ndzimu, idwilila mbeli siku ne sikati kutembezela ne kukumbila bhatsho ku Ndzimu;
Koga tjilikadzi inotjilila nzipo yakafa nenguba itjila.
Ubabudze ikoku, kuti kusibe ne wabo unobong'wa nlandu.
Ha mmwe asingatjengete hama dzidze, kwazo kwazo be nsha uwe, wazwilandula kugalamoyo kakale mbimbi kupinda nthu usingagalemoyo.
Kushete tjilikadzi yakwalisiwa kuzhe kwe ina makole anopinda makumi matathatu nenge kuti ibe yakalobogwa kang'ompela,

kakale izibgwa zubuyanana nge mishingo iye yakalulwama, inonga kulela bana nge fanilo ne kuamutjila bezi, kakale yakazwimisila kuzwiyisa pasi kungudza makumbo e bayengemali, ba mu manikano ne kuzwipa mu mishingo yose yakanaka.
Usitongo kwalisa tjilikadzi tjetjana, ngobe njemulo dzadzo dzingadzikulila mu kuzwipa kwabo muna Kirisiti, dzikashaka kulobogwa,
ndizo dzikazwiwanisa nlandu dzikalobgwa nge Ndzimu, ngobe dzisalondolodza tjadzakazwimisila itjo kutanga.
Kuzhe kwa ikoko dzozwiwolobedza kutjinya tjibaka nge kutendeleka mu mizi ngono adzitobe dzitjinya tjibaka koga, dzoyenda dzileba shaya dzakanginikana ne zwisi zwadzo dzileba zwadzisakafanila leba.
Ndizo ndokulumbidza tjilikadzi tjetjana kuti dzilobogwe, dzibe ne bana, dziyendise misha yadzo ne kusapa tjita tjibaka kuti tjinya mazina.
Ngobe dzimwe dzakalashika dzikatobela Satani.
Ha mmwe nkadzi unobe ali n'galimoyo ana makamu e tjilikadzi mu nzi uwe, wakafanila kubabhatsha asingaletje gubungano kulemegwa ndibo kuti ndizo gubungano libhatshe ibabo banodziyila kupinda.
Bakulu* banotungamila gubungano zubuyanana, bakafanigwa nge kulipiwa kabili, kwazo kwazo ibabo banoshinga kwazo mu kusumikila nenge kudiya.
Ngobe hwalo* dzoti, “Usisunge ng'ombe nlomo ha ishokola mathunde.” Kakale “Nshingi wakafanigwa nge ndipo iye.”
Usiamutjile kubong'wa nlandu kwe nkulu we gubungano kuzhe kwekwazhisiwa batendeki babili kene batatu.
Ibabo banodwilila ngotjinya ubatjemele mbeli kwe bathu, kuti ndizo bamwebo batjenjele.
Ndokulaya mbeli kwe Ndzimu na Kirisiti Jesu ne batumwa be kudzimu bakayengemala kulondolodza milayo iyeyi kuzhe kwe kumila mmwe, kakale kusathama tjimwe nge kushalaula.
Usilibilidzile kubiga bathu maboko kene kube ne gobe mu tjibi tjemmwe. Gala uli mbuyanana.
Using'we vula koga, ung'webo nkumbi we zhambi ntukununu kubhatsha kushinga kwe ntumbu uwo se ugala ugwala koga wali.
Zwibi zwe bamwe bathu zwipatjena, kakale zotungamilila kunosumikilisiwa kubatangila, koga zwibi zwe bamwe bathu zobong'wa shule.
Sa ikoko mishingo mibuya ipatjena, na iyeyo isipatjena aingagale yakasumbikala.
Bose bamu jokwi* le bulanda bakafanila linga botetshi bali bathu banofanigwa nge kutetiwa kwakapelela, kuti ndizo zina le Ndzimu ne zwidiyo zwisitjinyiwe.
Ibabo bana botetshi banogalamoyo abazofanila kubashayila mazwibhato ngobe bali zwikamu. Koga bakafanila kubashingila kupinda, ngobe ibabo banobuyigwa mu nshingo wabo bagalimoyo kakale bali badiwa.
Ezwi ndizo zwithu zwawakafanila kubadiya ne kubalaya.
Ha mmwe ediya zwidiyo zwipoga, asingadumane ne zwidiyo zwe malebeswa zwa She wedu Jesu Kirisiti ne zwidiyo zwinoyendidzana ngotja Ndzimu,
unozwida kakale akuna tjaanoziba. Unohwanana nge kunyanyayidzana nenge kukakabadzana ngekwe matama kunozhisa ndandala ne kutukana ne ndebo dzinotjinya bamwe mazina, kukumbulila kwakabipa
nenge kusayendidzana kusingapele pakati kwe bathu be mikumbulo yakaleleka bakalashikigwa nge malebeswa, kakale banokumbula kuti kunamata Ndzimu ndiyo zila ye kuwana fumwa ye mari.
Koga kunamata Ndzimu, i mbuyilo hwulu, ina kugutshika nge tjaunatjo.
Ngobe akuna tjatakazhisa mu shango, akuna tjatinowotola mu shango iyeyi.
Koga ha kuli kuti tina zojiwa ne zwiambalo, takafanila kugutshiwa ndi ikoko.
Koga ibabo banoshaka kufuma, banowowila mu kulikwa ne mu dati le njemulo njinji dze bulengwe dzinokubadza, kakale dzinolashila nthu mu kuloba ne kukolomoka.
Ngobe ludo gwe mari ndigo ndzi we bubi gose, bamwe bathu, ngoda mari, bakabhuda mu kugalamoyo, ngono bakazwihwisa zogwadza kunjinji.
Koga iwe, nthu we Ndzimu, tizha ikoku kose, uzwimisile ndulamo,* ne kutja Ndzimu ne kugalamoyo ne ludo ne kudzikitadza nenge moyon'nyolo.
Igwa ngwa mbuyanana ye bugalimoyo. Uwane butjilo gusingapele gwawakadanigwa pawakazwileba bugalimoyo gugo kwakatambunuka mbeli kwe batendeki banjinji.
Mu mesho e Ndzimu iwo unopa tjimwe ne tjimwe butjilo ne mu mesho a Kirisiti Jesu iye wakati epa butendeki mbeli kwa Pontiyo Pilato kazwileba kwakatambunuka, ndokulaya kuti
ulondolodze ndayo iyeyi kusina itoyi kene nlandu kuswikila kuboneka kwa She wedu Jesu Kirisiti,
iko Ndzimu kwaunowozhisa nge tjibaka tjawo, Ndzimu iwo una makombolelo, iwo Mbusi ali yega. Iye She nkulu wa boshe bakulu, kakale She wa boshe,
iwo woga usingafe, kakale unogala mu tjedza tjisingasedzegwe kutjili, usina wakatongo ubona kene ungaubona. Ngakubepo gudzo ne simba lisingapele kuuli. Ngakujalo.

Idwa ibabo bakafuma fumwa ye shango iyeyi, kuti basishiye kene kubiga kugalabgwe kwabo mu fumwa dzisina malebeswa, koga bagalebgwe mu Ndzimu, iwo unotipa nge buzhalo tjimwe ne tjimwe tje kushatha kwedu.
Bakafanila kuthama zwakalulwama, babe ne fumwa mu mishingo yakalulwama ne kupana nenge kuzwimisila kukobana ne bamwe.
Nge zila iyeyi, banowozwibigila thiwa yakalulwama ye mangwana, kuti ndizo bawane butjilo gwe malebeswa.
Timoti, lisa tjawakapiwa mu maboko awo. Thubukana ne ndebo dzisina bundzimu nenge kukakabadzana kwe bulengwe iko kunodang'wa “Luzibo,”
bamwe gwabakati banago ngono nge zila iyeyi bakabhuda mu kugalamoyo.
Ngoni dze Ndzimu dzibe namwi.
Ndimi Paulo ntumwa* wa Kirisiti* Jesu nge kuda kwe Ndzimu, kuyendidzana nge kugadzabgwe kwe butjilo gumuna Kirisiti Jesu.
Kuna Timoti nkololo wangu unodika.
Ngoni ne mahwilo zogwadza ne kunyalala kunodwa ku Ndzimu Tate na Kirisiti Jesu She wedu ngakube nawe.
Ndotenda Ndzimu, iwo wandinoshingila nge hana mbuyanana sa bobatategulu bangu bakabe beushingila, ndimukumbula misi yose mu mitembezelo yangu.
Ha ndikumbula mishodzi iyo, ndoyemula siku ne sikati kukubona kuti ndizo ndizhale kushatha.
Ndoalakana kugalamoyo kuko kwakwako, kugalamoyo kwakabe kuli muna kuku babo Loisi kutanga, na mmeyabo Yunisi, koga ngwenu ndina malebeswa ekuti kwabe mukuli.
Ndizo ngekwa ikoku ndikualakanisa kuti uthutidze tjipo tje Ndzimu tjimukuli nge kukubiga maboko kwangu.
Ngobe Ndzimu auzotipa meya ye bugwala koga wakatipa meya ye simba neye ludo neye kuzwiibhata.
Ndizo usibhakhwe nge shoni kuleba ngekwa She wedu, kene nge kwangu imi nsungwa ngekukwe. Koga bhatana nami mu kudziyilila ndebo mbuya, nge simba la She,
ibo bakatitjidza bakatidanila ku butjilo gwakayengemala, kusi ngekwe tjimwe tjatakashinga koga ngekwe mazwimisilo awo ne ngoni dzawakatipa muna Kirisiti Jesu ntolo tjose,
koga ngwenu kwakazumbunugwa nge kuzha kwe Ntjidzi wedu, Kirisiti Jesu, iye wakakolomola simba le lufu ngono kazhisa butjilo nenge kusafa pa tjedza nge ndebo mbuya.
Ngekwe ndebo mbuya iyeyi ndakashalugwa kube nsumikili ne kube ntumwa nenge kube n'diyi.
Ndizo ndidziyila sekwa ndinodziyila. Koga anditobhakhwa nge shoni, ngobe ndoziba wandakagalamoyo munli, ngoti ndina lebeswa lekuti unotubula kulisa tjandakapiwa mu maboko angu
Tjawakahwa ndimi, utjibhate tjili tjilakidzilo tje kudiya kwakwako, mu kugalamoyo kose ne mu ludo zwimuna Kirisiti Jesu.
Tjengeta lebeswa lawakapiwa nge Meya yakayengemala inogala mutili.
Unoziba kuti bose bamu ntuthu we Ezhiya bakandifupatila, ngono mubali kuli Figelo na Hemogenesi.
Dzene She angahwila zogwadza be nsha wa Onesiforo, ngobe kanjinji wakandisimisa kakale aazobhatisiwa shoni nge ketani dzakandisunga,
koga wakati eswika ku Roma, kandishaka kwazo kadzina kandiwana.
Dzene She banganhwila zogwadza mu Zhuba ilelo! Kakale unoziba zubuyanana kuti wakabhatsha kungapani ku Efeso.
Ndizo iwe nkololo wangu, sima mu ngoni dzimuna Kirisiti Jesu,
ne muna zwawakandihwa ndileba mbeli kwe batendeki banjinji, uzwipe balume banogalikabgwe banowotubula kudiya bamwe.
Dzikitadzila kudziyila se mbhayani wakalulwama wa Kirisiti Jesu.
Aakuna mbhayani umu nshingo unonginikana nge zwithu zwe bathu basi babhayani, ngekuti mazwimisilo awe hwushathisa iye wan'danila ngwa.
Tjilabuki atjitoambadziwa tjiala* kuzhe kwe tjapedza labuka kuyendidzana nge milayo ye labuka.
Nlimi unoshinga kwazo ndiye wakafanila wana kutanga gobe le zwijo.
Ukumbule kwazo tjandinoleba, ngobe She banowokupa hwisiso ye tjimwe ne tjimwe.
Alakana Jesu Kirisiti, kuti wakamuka mu bafi, iye tjezekugwana tja Dafite sekwa ndinosumikila mu ndebo mbuya yangu,
ndebo mbuya yandinodziyilila kwandinodzina asungwa nge ketani se tjigebeng'a. Koga dama le Ndzimu alizosungwa nge ketani.
Ndizo ndodzikitadzila tjimwe ne tjimwe ngekwe bashalugwa kuti ndizo na ibobo bawane jidzo li muna Kirisiti Jesu ne gudzo lalo lisingapele.
Eyi ndebo malebeswa,
“Ha takafa naye,
towotjilabo naye.
Ha tidzikitadza,
towobusabo naye.
Ha tinzwilandula,
unowotizwilandulabo.
Ha tisina kugalikabgwe,
iye unowobe ne kugalikabgwe koga,
ngobe aangazwilandule.”
Ubakumbuludze zwithu izwezwi. Ubatjemelele mbeli kwe Ndzimu kukangazhana ngekwe matama, akuna nshingo, koga kobulaya ibabo bakahwilila.
Gwisa kwazo kuzwilakidza mbeli kwe Ndzimu se wakaamutjigwa, uli nshingi usingawoti kabhakhwa nge shoni, unobhata zubuyanana dama le malebeswa.
Uzwiduse mu ndebgwana dzisina bundzimu, ngobe dzowokwebela bathu kule ne Ndzimu.
Kudiya kwabo kowonyikishila se londa lisingapole, mubali kuli Himeneo na Fileto
ibo bakapambuka mu malebeswa ngobhatilila mukuti kumuka kwe bafi kwakapinda kale, ngono banobulaya kugalamoyo kwe bamwe.
Koga, thiwa ye Ndzimu yakasima aitozunguzika, muili kwakakwagwa matama awa, “She banoziba bathu babo,” ngono, “Iye unodana zina la She wakafanila kufupatila bubi.”
Mu ng'umba hwulu kuna zwithu zwisi zwe golide ne siliva koga, kuna zwakathamwa nge lukuni ne ntapkhwi, zwimwe zwakathamigwa mishingo inokudziwa zwimwe isingakudziwe.

Ha nthu ezwitjenapadzila mishingo isingakudziwe, unowobe tjishingisiwa tje mishingo inokudziwa, eyengemadziwa, ana bhatsho kuna botetshi be ng'umba, kakale akalulwamila kushingisigwa nshingo wakalulwama.
Utjile kule njemulo mbi dze buzhuzha koga uzwimisile ndulamo* ne kugalamoyo ne ludo ne kunyalala kang'ompela na ibabo banonamata She nge moyo wakatjena.
Ube kutjena ne kukangazhana kwe bulengwe gwe kushaya luzibo, ngobe unoziba kuti kozhisa zhoba.
Nlanda wa She aazofanila kube nthu we zhoba, koga wakafanila kube ne buthu ku mmwe ne mmwe, etubula kudiya ana moyonlefu,
etjemela banonnyanyayidza ngebunyolo, pamwe swiyo Ndzimu ungabapa kushandukila matjinyo abo bakapelela baziba malebeswa,
ndizo bakapudzumuka mu dati le Nvanganyi iye wakabathama basungwa mu kulondolodza kuda kukwe.
Koga uhwisise hwoku, kowobe nge misi yakabangalala mu mazhuba e bupelo.
Ngobe bathu banowobe nge kuzwida ne kuda mari ne kuzwiloba ifuba ne kuzwikudza ne kutukana ne kusahwa bazwadzi babo ne kusatenda ne kusayengemala
ne kusabe nge ludo ne kusazwiibhatigwana ne kutjinya bamwe mazina ne kusazwiibhata ne kube ne bushongola ne kusada bubuya ne kube
mapitipiti ne kube matjapa ne kuzwibona ne kuda mizipo pana kuda Ndzimu,
belingika bana kunamata kunonga kwedu, koga belandula simba lako. Ibe kutjena ne bathu bakajalo.
Ngekuti mu bathu bakajalo kuna banongina mu mizi ngono bakatola bakadzi basakasima banolemegwa kale nge zwibi kakale banodengadengesiwa nge njemulo dzakasiyana siyana,
banodiyiwa misi yose koga basingatongo tubula kuziba malebeswa.
Koga sa Janesi na Jambhuresi bakanyanyayidza Mushe, balume ibaba banonyanyayidza malebeswa, bathu be mikumbulo yakabola, yakathama kuti kugalamoyo kwabo kwakaleleka kulambiwe.
Koga abatowonoti ngayi, sa ibabo balume babili, bulengwe gwabo gowodwila patjena ku mmwe ne mmwe.
Koga iwe wakalondolodza zwidiyo zwangu ne mazwiibhato angu ne mazwimisilo angu ne kugalamoyo kwangu ne bumoyonlefu gwangu ne ludo gwangu ne kudzikitadza kwangu

ne kuhwisiwa zogwadza kwangu ne kudziyidzika kwangu, zwithu zwakandishingikalila ku Antiyoki ne ku Ikoniyo ne ku Lisitira ne kuhwisiwa zogwadza kwangu kwandakasimisilamoyo. Koga She bakandiangulila mukuli kose.
Dumbu nge lebeswa bose banoyemula kutjila butjilo gwe kunamata muna Kirisiti Jesu banowohwisiwa zogwadza
koga bathu babi ne batjebeli banowopandukila mbeli mu kutjebela na ibo betjebegwabo.
Koga iwe dwilila muna tjawakazwidiya ne tjaunogalamoyo mutjili wakasimisila, ukumbula wakakudiya,
ne sekwa wakaziba hwalo* dzakayengemala utji ntjetjana, idzo dzinotubula kukudiya ngekwe jidzo nge kugalamoyo muna Kirisiti Jesu.
Hwalo dze Ndzimu dzose dzakayengemala dzakafemegwa nge Ndzimu ngono dzakalulwamila kudiya, kutjemela, kululwamisa nenge kudiya kutjilila mu ndulamo,
kuti ndizo nthu we Ndzimu abe wakapelela, akazwilulwamisila nshingo mmwe ne mmwe wakanaka
Ndokulaya mbeli kwe Ndzimu na Kirisiti Jesu, iye unowosumikilisa batjili ne bafi nenge kuboneka kukwe ne bushe gugwe nditi,
sumikila dama, ugale wakazwilulwamisa misi ili iyo kene isi iyo, shandula, tjemela, ukulumbidze, ube ne moyonlefu kwazo, udiya nge njele.

Ngobe tjibaka tjowozha panowoti bathu bakasimililane ne zwidiyo zwakalulwama. Koga, kugutsha njemulo dzabo, banowokubunganya bezwipoteledza nge badiyi banjinji banodiya tjabanoshaka zebe dzabo dzitjihwa.
Banowozwina zebe dzabo mukuhwa malebeswa ngono bakahwilila ngano* dze manyepkhwa.
Koga iwe, uzwiibhate mu zwibaka zose, simisila mu kudziyila, dzwala ndebo mbuya, shinga nshingo we Ndzimu nge buzhalo.
Ngobe imi ndatjibe mu tjimo tje kuthamiwa tjibhayilo ne tjibaka tje kuyenda kwangu tjazha.
Ndakagwa ngwa yakalulwama, ndakapedza kulabuka, ndakabhatilila bugalimoyo.
Ngwenu ndakabiganyidzigwa tjiala tje ndulamo, itjo She, Nsumikilisi wakalulwama, tjaanowondipa mu zhuba ilelo, kusi imi ndoga, koga na ibo bose bakalinda nge ludo kuboneka kukwe.
Gwisa kwazo kuzha kundili tjinyolotjo,
ngobe Demasi, nge kuda shango iyeyi kukwe, wakandifupatila kayenda ku Tesalonika. Kiresikensi wakayenda ku Galatiya ngono Tito kayenda ku Dalimatiya.
Luke ndiye yega unami. Shaka Mako ubuye naye, ngobe unondibhatsha kwazo mu nshingo wangu.
Ndakatumila Tikikasi ku Efeso.
Ha uzha uzhe ne hazu yandakasiya kuna Karipo ku Tiroasi nenge hwalo dzangu, kwazo kwazo dze ganda.
Alekizanda nthuli we tshipi, wakandihwisa zogwadza kwazo. She banowompa mbhayilo we tjaakathama.
Nawe uzwilise munli, ngobe wakanyanyayidza thumo yedu kwazo.
Ndakati ndizwimilila mu ndebo gwe kutanga akuna wakama nami, koga bose bakandifupatila. Dzene bangasabong'wa nlandu ngekwa ikoku!
Koga She bakama nami bakandipa masimba kuti ndizo bandishingise kuleba dama nge buzhalo, kuti ne Bezwitjaba* bose balihwe. Ngono ndakaanguligwa mu nlomo we shumba.
She banowondiangulila mu bubi gose bakanditjidzila bushe gwe kudzimu. Ngakube nge gudzo kubali, nge kusingapele kose. Ngakujalo*.
Dumilisa Purisila na Akhwila ne be nsha wa Onesiforo.
Erasito wakasala mu Korinta, ngono ndakasiya Tirofimo mu Mileto egwala.
Gwisa kuti uzhe ngeno kusathu kukabe mu mbaba.
Yebhulosi unokudumilisa na Pudenisi, na Lino, na Kilaudiya ne zwikamu zose zomudumilisabo.
Dzene She bangabe nawe.
Ngoni ngadzibe namwi.
Ndimi Paulo nlanda we Ndzimu kakale ndili ntumwa* wa Jesu Kirisiti* kudwilidza bugalimoyo mu bashalugwa be Ndzimu nenge kudwilidza mubali luzibo gwe bundzimu gwe malebeswa,
gwe kugalabgwe kwe butjilo gusingapele kwatakapiwa ntolo ntolo nge Ndzimu usingatongo nyepa,
ngono kukati mu tjibaka tjakafanila kugadziwabgwe ikoku kukadwila patjena mu dama lawo, nshingo we kudiya wandakapiwa nge ndaulo ye Ndzimu, Ntjidzi wedu.
Kuna Tito, mwana wangu mu bugalimoyo gwatinago tose:
Ngoni ne kunyalala kunodwa ku Ndzimu Tate na Kirisiti Jesu Ntjidzi wedu ngadzibe nawe.
Etji nditjo tjakathama kuti ndi kusiye ku Kirete, kuti upedzise zwakabe zwisapela, kakale ushalule bakulu mu makubungano, mu mizi yose sekwa ndakakudwa.
Washalugwa kube nkulu wakafanila abe ali nlume usina nlandu waangatilikiwa, ali nlume we nkadzi nng'ompela ana bana banoteedza bazwadzi kakale basingazwilashilile.
Ngekwe ntungamili we gubungano
koga wakafanila kube ne nzhazho, kakale ade zwakanaka, azwilise, abe nthu wakatambunuka, akayengemala kakale ezwibhata.
Wakafanila dwilila akasimisila mu dama le malebeswa sekwa akalidiyiwa, kuti ndizo atubule kulidiya nge zila yakalingisana, kuti ndizo akunde banyanyayidzi babe.
Nge kuti kuna balume banjinji be bapanduki, banoleba ndebo dzisina tjadzinodwa kakale bali batjengedzi,
Bakafanila kunyaladziwa mu zwithu zwabanoleba, nge kuti banodzonga misha yakabakwa, nge kudiyila mbuzilo ye mari isina nshingo bediya ngekwe zwithu zwa basaka fanila kudiya nge kwazo.
Mmwe wabo, we nlebesambeli, wakati, “Bakirete banyepi misi yose, bazwibandana zwibiibi, basimbe dze magovu.”
Butendeki igogu malebeswa, ndizo ubatjemele wakasima, kuti ndizo babe nge bugalimoyo gwakasima,
mu bumo gwe kuteedza zwilebo zwe tjilenje tje Bajuta, kene milayo ye bathu banolasha malebeswa.
Ku bathu babuyanana zwithu zose zwibuyanana, koga kuna ibabo babi kakale basingagalemoyo, akuna tjibuyanana. Njalakang'wa dzabo ne hana dzabo imbimbi.
Banoleba kuti banoziba Ndzimu, koga banoulandula nge mishingo yabo, banoshimisa, kakale abatohwa, akuna tjakalulwama tjabakalizanila kutjishinga.
Koga iwe udiye tjinodumana ne zwidiyo zwe malebeswa.
Udwe balume bahwola kuti badzikame, babe nge njalakang'wa dzakalulwama bazwibhate, babe ne bugalimoyo ne ludo ne kusimisila.
Udwe bakadzi bahwola kuti na ibo bathame sa ikokobo, kuti babe ne mazwiibhato anoyemulika, basi banyepi kene balanda be zwing'o. Bakafanila kudiya tjakalulwama,
kuti ndizo badiye bakadzi batjetjana kuda balume babo ne bana babo,
kuti bazwibhate, babe babuyanana bashinge mishingo yabo ye mu nzi,* babe ne buthu, kakale bazwiyise pasi mu balume babo, kuti ndizo dama le Ndzimu lisilingigwe pasi.
Sa ikoko ukulumbidze bazhuzha kuzwibhata.
Uthame kuti mu tjimwe ne tjimwe tjaunothama ube tjilakidzo tje mishingo yakalulwama, udiye zwidiyo zwinogalikabgwe, nge zila ina ntutshi,
kakale udiye zwidiyo zwakatambunuka zwisingasolese, kuti ndizo banokunyanyayidza babhakhwe nge shoni, bashaye bubi gwaangaleba nge kwedu.
Udwe balanda bazwiyise pasi muna botetshi babo ne kubashathisa nge zila dzose, basingashandudzane nabo,
abazofanila kubakwibila, bagalikebgwe mu tjimwe ne tjimwe kuti bubuya gwe zwidiyo zwe Ndzimu Ntjidzi wedu guzwilakidze mubali.
Nge kuti ngoni dze Ndzimu dzakazumbunukila kutjidziwa kwe mmwe ne mmwe,
dzitidiya kuthubukana ne kushaya bugalimoyo nenge nyota ye zwithu zwe shango ino, kuti tigadzikane, titambunuke, nge kutjila butjilo gunolakidza bundzimu mu shango iyeyi,
takalindila kugalabgwe kwaka kombolegwa, ne kuzha kwe gudzo le Ndzimu wedu nkulu ne Ntjidzi wedu Jesu Kirisiti,
iye wakazwipa kutidzutunula mu bubi gose ne kutizwitjenapadzila etithama tjaba iye mbuyanana ina ludo bukulu gwe kuthama mishingo mibuyanana.
Ulebe zwithu izwezwi. Usimise gubungano kakale utjemele nge masimba. Kushaye wakulingila pasi.
Ukumbuludze bathu kuhwilila balauli ne batungamili, bahwe, bagale bakalindila kushinga mishingo mimwe ne mimwe, yakalulwama.
Kushaye wabanoleba bubi nge kukwe, bazwiduse mu lilebo, babe nge buthu nenge kuthamila bathu bose mazwiibhato.

Nge kuti naswi dumbu takatongobe zwilengwe nge mimwe misi, tisingahwe, takatjengeleka tiyendila ntome tida zwithu zwe shango ino kwakapindilila, tipitsha mazhuba edu. Tithamila bamwe bubi mwaza ne ndandala ne kuyemula kusakalulwama, tibengwa nge bathu, naswibo tibengana.
Koga kwakati Ndzimu, Ntjidzi wedu uzumbunula buthu ne ludo gwakanaka,
ukatitjidza, usinga titjidze nge mishingo yakanaka yatakashinga, koga nge kwe mahwilo zogwadza awo, nge kusukiwa nge kuzwagwa kakale ne kuthamwa batshwa nge Meya yakayengemala,
yawakalonga nge buzhalo mutili ndi Jesu Kirisiti Ntjidzi wedu,
kuti ndizo tisibong'we nlandu nge ngoni dzawo, tibe be bagali thaka mu kugalabgwe mu butjilo gusingapele.
Ndebo iyeyi inogalikabgwe.
Ndoshaka kuti ulebe wakasima mu zwithu izwezwi, kuti ndizo ibabo bakagalamoyo mu Ndzimu babe nge njele, bashinge mishingo mibuyanana, mishingo yakajali mibuyanana kakale inobuzila.
Koga uzwiduse mu kukakabadzana kwe bulengwe nenge kulondolodza bukamu ne zhoba ne kukwebakwebana ngekwe nlayo*. Ngobe zwithu zwakajalo azwitobuzila, kakale azwina nshingo.
Ha makumbuludza nthu we mpaladzi kabili kose asingateedze, muthubukane naye.
Muzibe kuti nthu wakajalo una njalakang'wa dzakakombama kakale ntjinyi. Wakazwisumikilisa kale.
Ha ndituma Aritemasi kene Tikikasi kumuli, ugwise nge buzhalo kuzha kundili ku Nikopoli, nge kuti ndoshaka kuti ndipitshe nsi we mbaba ko.
Ugwise kwazo kulibilidzisa Zenasi we nlebelekeli we zwe milayo na Apolosi mu gwendo gwabo. Basishete tjimwe.
Bathu ba kanyi kwedu ngabazwidiye kushinga mishingo yakanaka, kuti ndizo babhatshe muna zwinobe zwishaka thamiwa tjinyolotjo, kuti basibe basina mitjelo.
Bose banami banokudumilisa. Udumilise bose banotida mu kugalamoyo.
Ngoni dze Ndzimu ngadzibe namwi mose.
Ndimi Paulo, nsungwa ngekwa Kirisiti* Jesu, ndina Timoti ikamu* tjedu.
Ku nshingi naswi unodika Filimoni
na Afiya, hazwadzi yedu, na Akipo mbhayani naswi ne gubungano linoshanganila mu nzi* uwo.
Ngoni ne kunyalala kunodwa ku Ndzimu Tate bedu na She Jesu Kirisiti ngakube namwi.
Tjibaka tjimwe ne tjimwe ndoboka Ndzimu wangu ha ndikukumbula mu mitembezelo yangu,
ngobe ndohwa ngekwe ludo gugo mu bathu bose be Ndzimu ne kugalamoyo kwaunako muna She Jesu.
Ndotembezela kuti usime mukukobana bugalimoyo kuko kuti ndizo ube ne kuhwisisa kuzhele nge tjimwe ne tjimwe tjatinatjo muna Kirisiti.
Ikamu tjangu, ndina kushatha ne kukulumbidzika kukulu kunodwa mu ludo gugo! Wakashathisa mimoyo ye bathu be Ndzimu bose.
Ngekwa ikoku, nenguba ndina shaladuko tjose muna Kirisiti, kukulaya kushinga tjakafanila kushingiwa,
koga ngobe ndokuda, mu bumo gwekuti ndikulaye ndokukumbila. Imi Paulo nthuntana, nsungwa ngekwa Kirisiti Jesu,
ndokukumbila ngekwa Onesimasi nkololo wangu muna Kirisiti, wandakabe tate babe ndili mu busungwa.
Wakatongobe asina nshingo kukuli, koga ngwenu watjibe ne nshingo kukuli ne kundili.
Ndombgwiliza kukuli ngwenu, ndin'da kwazo nge ludo gwangu gose.
Ndabe ndingada kugala naye ngeno nditjimu busungwa ngekwe Ndebo mbuya kuti andibhatshe mu bumo gugo.
Koga anditoyemula kutola thambo imwe kuzhe kwe ndingaziba iwe sekwa unoalakana, kuti ndulamo* iyo isitongobe nge kukombeledzwa, koga kube iwe unothama ngosununguka.
Pamwe wakathubukanyiwa nawe kwe tjibaka tjifupi kuti ndizo uzhe ube naye kwatjose,
asitji nlanda koga, ngono abe nthu unopinda nlanda atjibe ikamu tjinodika muna Kirisiti. Ndon'da seni! Ngono iwe wakafanila kun'da kupinda, se nlanda kakale ikamu tjitjo muna She!
Ndizo ha ndili nkhwinya uwo, un'amutjile sekwa ungandiamutjila.
Ha akakutjinyila kene ekukolota tjimwe, utjikwale mu nlandu wangu.
Imi Paulo, ndokwala ikoku nge luboko gwangu nditi, “Ndowokulipa.” Andinako, kakale andizofanila kube nako kukukumbuludza, kuti unondikolota butjilo gugo.
Ndoyemula ikamu tjangu, kuti ndibe ne bhatsho inodwa mukuli, muna She. Nyatutusa moyo wangu muna Kirisiti.
Ngobe ndogalabgwe kuhwa kuko, ndokukwalila ndiziba kuti unowoshinga ne kunopinda tjandinokumbila.
Kakale undilulwamisile buyizelo, ngobe ndogalabgwe kuti Ndzimu unodabila mitembezelo yenyu mose, ukathama kuti ndizhe kumuli.
Epafurasi nsungwa ngekwa Kirisiti Jesu sami, unokudumilisa,
na Mako, na Arisitako, na Demasi, na Luke, bashingi nami banodumilisabo.
Ngoni dza She Jesu Kirisiti ngadzibe namwi.
Ntolo, Ndzimu wakalebeleka na bobatategulu bedu nge zila njinji dzakasiyana ushingisa balebesambeli,*
koga mu mazhuba ano e bupelo wakalebeleka naswi nge Nkololo wawo, iye wawakabumba lubumbo ndiye ukabuya ukambiga kube n'gali thaka we zwithu zose.
Ndiye tjilakidzo tje gudzo ne ifano tje mbumbiko yawo. Wakabhata lubumbo nge dama lile lina masimba. Wakati asinothama tjenapadzo ye zwibi kagala ku luboko gwe luji* gwe Ndzimu Masimbawose.
Nkololo kabe nkulu pa batumwa be kudzimu, se zina laakamutjila lili gulu pana abo,
ngobe Ndzimu auzotongo dwa mmwe we batumwa bawo be kudzimu ukati,
“U nkololo wangu,
nasi ndabe Tate babo.”
Kakale Ndzimu auzotongo dwa mmwe we batumwa be kudzimu ukati,
“Ndowobe Tate babe,
iye unowobe Nkololo wangu.”
Koga Ndzimu wakati uzhisa Nkololo wawo we mbano mu shango, ukati,
“Batumwa be Ndzimu bose ngabannamate.”
Ngekwe batumwa be kudzimu, wakalebeleka ukati,
“Unothama batumwa bawo be kudzimu bakabe phepo,
ne balanda bawo unobathama bakabe nthuto we moto.”
Koga ngekwe Nkololo wawo wakalebeleka uti,
“Tjigalo tjenyu tje bushe, Ndzimu,
tjowobepo nge kusingapele
ne ludozo gwe ndulamo ludozo gwe bushe gwenyu.*
Makada ndulamo mukabenga bubi;
ndizo Ndzimu, iwo Ndzimu wenyu,
wakamuzhodza mafuta e kushatha
kunopinda kwe bakhwinya benyu.”
Kakale wakati,
“Imwi, She, mu kutangisa makabumba shango,
ne zhuzhugwi nshingo we maboko enyu.
Zose zowoloba, koga imwi mukagalila tjose,
zowoshakala zose se tjiambalo.
Se ngubo mowozwipeta
zwikashandugwa.
Koga imwi mowogalila tjose,
ne butjilo gwenyu agutowopela.”
Koga ndi upi ntumwa* we kudzimu wakatongo dwiwa nge Ndzimu uti,
“Gala ku luboko gwangu gwe luji
kudzina ndithama zwita zwizo tjigalo tje makumbo awo.”
Apa batumwa be kudzimu bose ate bali meya inoshinga, yakatumwa kushingila ibabo banowoamutjila jidzo kene?
Ndizo takafanila kube ne njele hwulu kwazo muna tjatakahwa, kuti tisitongodwa tibhuda muzila.
Ha kuli kuti dama lakalebgwa nge batumwa be kudzimu lakabe lili malebeswa, ngono mmwe ne mmwe usakalilondolodza kene kulihwa kaamutjila shamu yakafanila,
apa towodzeta tjini ha tisina hanya ngekwe jidzo ileli gulu zwingapa? Lakalebgwa ndi She kutanga, likakowobedzegwa mu zebe dzedu ndi ibabo bakanhwa,
ha Ndzimu naiwo upa butendeki* nge zwilakidzo ne matjenamiso ne masazibgwe akasiyana siyana nenge zwipo zwe Meya yakayengemala, zwakakobiwa kuyendidzana nge kuda kwawo.
Ndzimu auzopa batumwa be kudzimu ndaulo mu shango inozha, yatinolebeleka nge kwayo.
Kwakalebgwa pamwe pathu kuyi,
“Nthu ini kene tjamungashwa mukumbula,
nkololo we nthu ini kene tjamungatjengeta?
Makanthama ali ntukunu pa batumwa be kudzimu kwe tjibakana,
makammbadza gudzo* ne tjilumbi,
mukabiga tjimwe ne tjimwe tjamakabumba pasi kukwe.”
Mukubiga tjimwe ne tjimwe pasi kwe nthu, Ndzimu auzosiya tjimwe kuzhe kwe ndaulo iye. Sekwa kuli iko ngwenu atitobona nthu ebusa zwithu zose.

Koga tobona Jesu, wakabe athamiwa ntukunu pa batumwa be kudzimu kwe tjibakana atjimbadziwa, gudzo ne tjilumbi, ngobe wakadziyidziwa mu lufu, kuti ndizo nge ngoni dze Ndzimu alabilile mmwe ne mmwe lufu.
Ngobe kwakabe kwakalingisana kuti Ndzimu iwo wakathama zwithu zose, kakale iwo unozwitjengeta, mukuzhisa kwawo bana banjinji ku gudzo, uthame ntangisi we jidzo labe lipelele nge kudziyila.
Ngobe iye unoyengemadza ne banoyengemadziwa banodwa pang'ompela. Ngekwa ikoku, Jesu aatobhakhwa nge shoni kubadana banung'una babe,
eti,
“Ndowoleba zina lenyu ku banung'una bangu,
pakati kwe gubungano ndowomukudza.”
Kakale,
“Ndowobiga mu Ndzimu.” Kakale,
“Ndipano ne bana bandakapiwa nge Ndzimu.”
Se bana bakashanganyila mbumbiko ye mbili ne malopa, Jesu nge kukwe wakazwishanganyila nabo. Eyitila kuti nge lufu gugwe akolomole una simba le kubulaya, iye Nvanganyi,
ngono asunungule ibabo bakatjila butjilo gwabo gose betjila mu bulanda gwe kutja lufu.
Ngoti malebeswa hwuti, aatobhatsha batumwa be kudzimu, koga iye unobhatsha ludzi gwa Abhurahama.

Ndizo wakabe efanila kuti ange banung'una babe nge mbumbiko yose kuti ndizo abe Ntungamili we Bapirisiti una ngoni unogalikabgwe mu kushingila Ndzimu, kuzwipa ali tjibhayilo tjinodusa matjinyo e bathu.
Ngoti iye nge kukwe wakadziyila kakale kalikwa, ngwenu unotubula kubhatsha banolikwa.
Ndizo wali zwikamu zwangu zwakayengemala, imwi makadang'wabo nge Ndzimu, kumbulani Jesu, iye ntumwa kakale ali Ntungamili we Bapirisiti we kugalamoyo kwedu.
Wakabe egagwabgwe nge wakambiga mu mamo iyawa, koga sa Mushe akabe eshinga nshingo uwe mu ng'umba* ye Ndzimu nge kugalikabgwe.
Ngobe Jesu wakawanika efanigwa nge gudzo gulu kupinda Mushe koga se mbumbi we ng'umba ana gudzo kupinda ng'umba yaakabumba. Ndizo Jesu wakawanika akalizana kulumbidziwa kupinda Mushe.
Ngobe ng'umba imwe ne imwe ina wakaibumba, koga mbumbi we zwithu zose Ndzimu.
Mushe wakabe egalikabgwe mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu ali nlanda, kutendeka ngekwe zwithu zwakabe zwitjowolebgwa shule.
Koga Kirisiti* se ali Nkololo wakabe egalikabgwe mu ng'umba yose. Iswi ng'umba iye ha tibhata tisimisa kukulumbidzika kwedu tizwiloba ifuba mu kugalabgwe kwedu.
Ndizo wali, se Meya yakayengemala iti,
“Nasi ha muhwa hwi lawo,
musikukutadze mimoyo yenyu, se pa bupanduki,
mu zhuba le kulikiwa mu tjilambanyika,
pakati bobatategulu benyu bakandilika,
ngono bakabona mishingo yangu makole ali makumi manna.
Ngekwa ikoko ndakagwadzilamoyo tjizekugwana itjetjo ngono ati,
‘Banogala bepambuka mu mimoyo yabo.
Abathu bakaziba zila yangu.’
Sekwandakatuna mu kugwadzamoyo kwangu nditi,
‘Abatowongina mu kunyaluluka kwangu!’ ”
Yelani njele zwikamu* kuti kusidwe kukabe kuna mbipo mu mmwe wenyu, asingagale moyo, emutungamilila mu zila inomudusa mu Ndzimu unotjila.
Koga kulumbidzanani mazhuba wose akutjayi “Nasi” kuyita kuti kusibe ne wenyu unokukutadziwa nge butjengedzi gwe jinyo.
Ngobe tina gobe muna Kirisiti ha tibhata tisimisa kunoti kubupelo mu bugalimoyo gwedu gwatakabe nago kutanga.
Sekwa kwaka palebgwa kuyi,
“Nasi ha muhwa hwi lawo,
musikukutadze mimoyo yenyu se pa bupanduki.”
Apa ndiboani bakahwa ngono bakaupandukila kene? Apa ate ibabo bose bakadwa mu Egipiti bakatungamigwa ndi Mushe kene?
Apa ndiboani Ndzimu bawakagwadzilamoyo makole ali makumi manna kene? Ate ibabo bakatjinya bakaloba mu tjilambanyika kene?
Ndzimu wakatunila boani kuti abatowongina mu kunyaluluka kwawo, ha isi ibabo basakauhwa kene?
Ndizo tobona kuti abazotubula ngina mu kunyaluluka, ngobe bakabe basagalamoyo.
Ndizo ngakuti kugadziwabgwe mukungina mu kunyaluluka kutjiyapo, tiyeleni njele, kuti kusibe ne mmwe wenyu unowowang'wa akong'wa kunoswika mu kunyaluluka ikoko.
Ngobe ndebo mbuya yakazhabo kutili koga se kubali, koga dama labakahwa alizobabhatsha nge tjimwe, ngobe lakasheta kugalamoyo mu bahwi balo.
Ndizo iswi takagalamoyo tongina mu kunyaluluka ikoko sekwa wakati,
“Sekwa ndakatuna mu kugwadzamoyo,
‘Abatowongina mu kunyaluluka kwangu,’ ” nenguba mishingo yawo yakafidziwa pa kubumbiwa kwe shango.
Ngobe una pawakaleba ngekwe zhuba le kutendeka uti, “Ndzimu wakanyaluluka mu zhuba le butendeka mu mishingo yawo yose.”
Kakale ipapa ukati, “Abatowongina mu kunyaluluka kwangu.”
Ndizo kutjina bakasalila kungina mu kunyaluluka ikoku zwako, nebakahwa ndebo mbuya kutanga abazotubula kungina, kuli nge kusahwa,
ndizo Ndzimu unobiga limwe zhuba, linoyi “Nasi.” Wakalileba shule kwe makole manjinji etuma Dafite sekwa kwakalebgwa kuyi,
“Nasi, ha muhwa hwi lawo,
musikukutadze mimoyo yenyu.”
Ngobe Joshuwa ha akabe abapa kunyaluluka, Ndzimu unobe usakati shule ukaleba ngekwe limwe zhuba.
Ndizo wali kunyaluluka nge Sabata* kutjakasalila bathu be Ndzimu;
ngobe iye unowongina mu kunyaluluka kwe Ndzimu, unowobe enyaluluka mu mishingo iye, se Ndzimu wakanyalulukabo muna yawo.
Ngatigwiseni tjose kuti tingine mu kunyaluluka ikoko, kuti kusibe ne mmwe wedu unowokonedziwa nge zila yakajalo ye kusahwa.

Ngobe dama le Ndzimu lotjila, kakale loshinga, lopitsha kupinda bukanu guna ntha dzinotema mbili, lobhaya likathubukanya meya ne butjilo, mongo ne malunganilo. Losumikilisa njemulo ne mikumbulo ye moyo we nthu.
Akuna tjakasumbikala ku Ndzimu, tjimwe ne tjimwe mu lubumbo gose tjakaambuka, tjipatjena mu mesho awo, iwo watakafanila kuzwileba mbeli kwawo.
Ndizo setina mpirisiti nkuku kwazo wakapinda epalama zhuzhugwi, iye Jesu Nkololo we Ndzimu, ngatibhatilileni mu kugalamoyo kwatinoleba titi tinako.
Ngobe atina Ntungamili we Bapirisiti usingatubule kuhwisisa kusasima kwedu, koga tina wakalikiwabo saswi, koga kabe usina tjibi.
Ngatisedzeleni ngono ku tjigalo tje bushe gwe ngoni, nge kugalamoyo kuti tiamutjile mahwilozogwadza ne ngoni mu tjibaka tjatinowobe tishaka bhatsho.
Ntungamili we Bapirisiti mmwe ne mmwe unoshalugwa mu bathu unopiwa nshingo we kuzwadzanya bathu ne Ndzimu, eyisa zwipo ne zwibhayilo zwe zwibi.
Unotubula kubhata zubuyanana ibabo banotjinya ngosheta zibo, se naiye ekuligwa ngokong'wa.
Ndizo wali akafanila kudusa tjibhayilo tje zwibi zwizwe ne zwe bathubo.
Akuna unozwipa mamo ekube Ntungamili we Bapirisiti, koga wakafanila kudang'wa nge Ndzimu sekwa kwakadang'wa Aroni.
Ndizo sayikoko Kirisiti aazozwipa mamo ekube Ntungamili we Bapirisiti, koga wakapiwa nge Ndzimu iwo wakati kunli,
“U Nkololo wangu,
nasi ndabe Tate babo.”
Sekwa wakaleba pamwe pathu uti,
“Unowobe mpirisiti nge kusingapele,
mu ndongoloso ya Melikizedeki.”
Mu butjilo gugwe muno mu shango, Jesu wakabe etembezela nge tjililo ekumbila nge mishodzi, ku Ndzimu iwo wakabe ungantjidza mu lufu. Ngono Ndzimu ukan'hwa ngoteta kukwe.
Nenguba akabe ali Nkololo, wakazwidiya kuhwa nge kudziyila kwaakadziyila ndiko.
Wakati ahwa nge buzhalo, kabe nsenya we kutjidziwa kwabo bose banonhwa kusingapele.
Ndzimu ukan'dana Ntungamili we Bapirisiti kuyendidzana ne ndongoloso ya Melikizedeki.
Nge kwaikoku kunjinji kwatingaleba, koga kwakasima kutjenesa, ngobe makazwina zebe.
Ngoti nenguba mu tjibaka tjino makafanila kube badiyi, mutjashaka mmwe kumudiya kakale zwidiyo zwe kutanga zwe dama le Ndzimu. Moshaka nkaka pana kuti mushake zojiwa zwakabhata.
Ngobe iye unotjila nge nkaka utjimwana, aana luzibo gwe dama le ndulamo.
Zojiwa zwakabhata nge zwe bakulukulu, nge zwe bana njalakang'wa dzakawolobeleka ngoshingisiwa kuthubukanya tjakalulwama ne tjisakalulwama.
Ndizo ngwenu ngatisiyeni zwidiyo zwe kutanga ngekwa Kirisiti tidwilile nge zwe buhwola. Tisiteye kakale thiwa ye zwidiyo ngekwe kushanduka mu mishingo isina bhatsho ne kugalamoyo mu Ndzimu,
zwidiyo zwe kudubikiwa
Towothama woku ha Ndzimu uduma.
Ngobe akutotubuka kushandula kakale ibabo bakabe bawana tjedza bakalabila tjipo tje kudzimu, bakabe ne gobe le Meya yakayengemala,
kakale bakalabila zipa kwe dama le Ndzimu ne masimba e misi inozha,
ha befupatila kushanduka kwabo, banobambula Nkololo we Ndzimu kakale, benlengudza.
Ngobe nnda unong'wa vula inona kukudza mitjelo una bhatsho muna ibabo baunolimigwa, unokombolegwa nge Ndzimu.
Koga ha umela mihwa ne zwishosho auna nshingo, umu mbatsha dze kulongwa bhiso, bhelelo lawo hwupisiwa.
Nenguba tilebeleka sa ikoku nge kwenyu badiwa, togalabgwe kuti mowowana makombolelo anozhisa jidzo.
Ngobe Ndzimu ate kuli kuti auzolulwama kwawungashayila hanya nshingo wenyu ne ludo gwamakalakidza nge kwawo mu bhatsha bayengemali* sekwa mutja thama nangwenu.
Toyemula kuti mmwe ne mmwe wenyu alakidze kumuse meya mu kuhwisisa malebeswa e kugalabgwe kuswikila ku bupelo.
Kuti ndizo musibe simbe, koga mube bayedzi baibabo bakati nge kugalamoyo nenge moyonlefu bakaamutjila kugadziwabgwe.
Ngobe Ndzimu wakati uthama tjidumano na Abhurahama, ukatuna nge zina lawo sekwakabe kusina mmwe nkulu pawuli wawakabe ukatuna naye.
Wakatuna uti, “Nge malebeswa ndowokukombolela kakale athama kuti uwande.”
Abhurahama kati alindila nge moyonlefu, kaamutjila tjaakabe agadziwabgwe.
Bathu banotuna nge mmwe nkulu pabali, ngono mu kusawililana kwabo kose, kutuna* ndiko kunoligila ndebo.
Ndzimu wakati ushaka kulakidza bagalithaka mbumbiko isingashanduke ye kugadzabgwe kwawo kwawakabapa nge zila inogadzamoyo, ukatuna,
kuyita kuti nge zwithu zwibili zwisingashanduke zwausingake ukabona Ndzimu nlandu muzwili, iswi takatizha tishaka dizhilo tikulumbidzike kwazo kubhatisa kugalabgwe kwakabigiwa mbeli kwedu.
Tina kugalabgwe ikoku se midzi ye butjilo gwedu, kugalabgwe kunginila tjemukati mu ng'umbana itja mukati shule kwe tjisitilo,
ndiko Jesu kwaakangina ali ntangidzi alimilile iswi, kabe Ntungamili we Bapirisiti nge kusingapele kuyendidzana nge ndongoloso ya Melikizedeki.
Melikizedeki iwoyu wakabe ali She we Salema,

ipapo Abhurahama kan'dusila tjebugumi* muna kose kwaakabe anako. Tje kutanga shandulidzo ye zina la Melikizedeki lodwa kuti, “She we ndulamo;” kakale wakabe ali she we Salema, kudwiwa kuti, “She we kunyalala.”
Melikizedeki aana tate kene mme kene ludzi, aana panotangisa butjilo gugwe kene pagunopelela, unonga Nkololo we Ndzimu, bupirisiti gugwe godwilila nge kusingapele.
Bonani ngono kuti nkulu kungapani! Na Abhurahama batategulu bedu wakan'dusila tjebugumi muna kose kwabakabe batapa mu ngwa.
Bana ba Levi bakapiwa bupirisiti bana ndayilo mu nlayo* inoti batole tjebugumi mu bathu, betjitola mu bana batate babo, nenguba bali bakololo ba Abhurahama naibobo.
Koga nlume iwoyu usi we ludzi gwabo, wakapiwa tjebugumi ndi Abhurahama, ngono Abhurahama iye wakaamutjila kugadzabgwe kwe Ndzimu, kakombolegwa Melikizedeki.
