Ndakabe mu Meya nge zhuba la She, ngono ahwa hwi gulu linonga nsindo we lunyanga gunolidziwa shule kwangu,
liti, “Kwala mu lukwalo tjaunobona, ngono ugutumilile ku makubungano ali kutendeka, mu nzi we Efeso newe Simirina newe Pegamo newe Tiyatira newe Sadisi newe Filadelifiya newe Laodikeya.”
Ipapo atendebuka alinga shule kuti ndibone unolebeleka nami, ngono abona zwigadziko zwe mavone ali kutendeka zwakathamiwa nge golide,
ngono pakati kwazo kwakabe kuna mmwe unonga Nkololo we Nthu, akaambala hazu ndefu, akazwisunga pa ifuba nge mmwandabula we golide.
Nsholo uwe ne mavudzi awe akabe ali matjena se lungudze, ali matjena enga makaa e vula, ngono mesho awe enga nthuto we moto,
makumbo awe epenya se tshipi inoyi bhurasi yakapholitjiwa, yakapisiwa mu vutho ikakuyungiwa, ngono hwi lile lakabe linga nsindo we vula njinji.
Wakabe akabhata nyenyedzi dzili kutendeka mu luboko gugwe gwe luji, ngono mu nlomo uwe kukabhuda bukanu gunopitsha guna mahali mabili. Buso gugwe gwakabe gupenya se zhuba linopenya nge masimba wose.
Ndakati ndimbona awila pasi mbeli kwe makumbo awe ndinga ndafa, wakabiga luboko gugwe gwe luji pezhugwi kwangu, ebe eti, “Usitje, ndimi we kutanga kakale we bupelo.
Ndimi unotjila, ndakabe ndafa, ngono bona ndotjila nge kusingapele kose. Ndina simba pezhugwi kwe lufu ne bugalo gwe bafi.
Ndizo kwala zwithu zwaunobona, zwithu zose zwiyapo sangwenu ne zwithu zwinowoshingikala shule kwa ipapa.

Akuli ngekwe masazibgwe e nyenyedzi dzili kutendeka dzawabona mu luboko gwangu gwe luji ne zwigadziko zwe mavone zwe golide zwili kutendeka, nyenyedzi idzedzi dzili kutendeka batumwa be kudzimu mu makubungano ali kutendeka. Zwigadziko zwe mavone zwe golide zwili kutendeka makubungano ali kutendeka.”
“Kwalila ntumwa* we kudzimu we gubungano limu Efeso sahwoku:
“Eyi i ndayidzo inodwa kuna iye wakabhata nyenyedzi dzili kutendeka mu luboko gugwe gwe luji, iye unoyenda yenda pakati kwe zwigadziko zwe mavone zwakathamwa nge golide zwili kutendeka.

Ndoziba mishingo yenyu, kushinga zwakasima kwenyu ne moyonlefu mu kudzikitadza, nenge sekwa musingake mukaletjedzela bathu babi, makalika ibabo banozwidana beti batumwa ba Jesu koga basi ibo, ngoti makawana bali be manyepkhwa.
Ndoziba kuti modzikitadza nge moyonlefu, makasimisilila zina langu musinganyale.
Koga tjandisingashake mumuli ndi etji, makaletja ludo gwamakabe nago mu kutanga.
Kumbulani pa makawa, mu shandukile matjinyo enyu, ngono mushinge mishingo yamakabe mushinga kutanga. Ha musingashanduke, ndowodusa tjigadziko tjenyu tje luvone mu bugalo gwatjo.
Koga tjamunatjo ndiyetji, moshima mishingo ye bathu banoyi Banikolaita, iyo yandinoshimabo.
“Iye una zebe ngaahwe tjinolebgwa nge Meya ku makubungano.
“Kuna ibabo banowokunda, ndowobapa fanilo ye kuti baje ntjelo we nti we butjilo, umu nnda we Ndzimu.
“Kwalila ntumwa we kudzimu we gubungano limu Simirina sahwoku:
“Awa matama anodwa kuna iye we kutanga kakale we bupelo, wakafa kabuya katjila.
Ndoziba kudziyidziwa kwenyu ne bushayi gwenyu, koga dumbu makafuma. Ndoziba ndebo mbimbi dzinolebgwa nge kwenyu ndi ibabo banozwidana beti ndibo Bajuta, koga basi ibo, bali gubungano la Satani.

Musitje ikoku kwabe pejo nge kumuwila. Bonani, Satani wabe pejo nge kulonga bamwe benyu mu ng'umba ye busungwa, kuti mulikwe, ngono mowodziyidziwa mazhuba ali gumi. Mugalemoyo kuswikila lufu, ngono ndowomupa tjiala* tje butjilo.
“Iye una zebe ngaahwe tjinolebgwa nge Meya ku makubungano.
“Iye unokunda aatowohwisiwa zogwadza nge lufu gwe bubili.
“Kwalila ntumwa we kudzimu we gubungano limu Pegamo sahwoku:
“Awa matama anodwa kuna iye una bukanu gunopitsha lina mahali mabili.

Ndoziba kwamunogala, iko kuna tjigalo tja Satani tje bushe. Mukabhatilila mu zina langu ne bugalimoyo gwangu amuzozwigulandula nenge mu misi ya Antipasi,* iye ntendeki wangu, n'galimoyo wangu wakabulawa pakati kwenyu, iko kunogala Satani.

Koga ndina zwithu zwishomanana zwandisingade mumuli, kuna bamwe pakati kwenyu banotobelela kudiya kwa Bhalamu, wakadiya Bhalaki kudzimidza itjaba tje Iziraela nge kuyita kuti baje zojiwa zwakapiwa midzimu* yakabezhiwa nenge kusazwidziba kuwalilana thobo kuzhe kwe ndobolo.
Kakale muna bathu pakati kwenyu banotobelela zwidiyo zwe Banikolaita”
Ngono ngwenu shandukilani matjinyo enyu, ha musingashaduke, ndowozha kumuli tjinyolotjo, ngono ndowogwa ne bathu ibabo nge bukanu gwe nlomo wangu.
“Iye una zebe, ngaahwe tjinolebgwa nge Meya ku makubungano.
“Iye unowokunda ndowompa imwe ye mana yakasumbikala. Kakale ndowompa bgwe jena lakakwagwa zina dzwa lisina unoliziba kuzhe kwe unoamutjila.
“Kwalila ntumwa we kudzimu we gubungano limu Tiyatira sahwoku:
“Awa matama anodwa ku Nkololo we Ndzimu, iye una mesho anonga nthuto we moto, una makumbo anongadzima se tshipi inoyi bhurasi yakapholitjiwa.
Ndoziba mishingo yenyu, ndoziba ludo gwenyu nenge kugalamoyo kwenyu, kushingila bamwe kwenyu ne moyonlefu wenyu ne kudzikitadza kwenyu. Ndoziba mishingo yenyu ya shule inopinda ye kutanga.

Koga tjandisingade mumuli, hwuti moamutjila nkadzi iwoyu unoyi Jezebhele, iwoyu unozwidana nlebesambeli etjengela balanda bangu nge zwidiyo zwibiibi zwe kuwalilana thobo kuzhe kwe ndobolo nenge kuja zojiwa zwakapiwa midzimu* ye zwifano.
Ndakampa tjibaka tje kuti ashanduke, koga unolamba kushandukila mishingo iye mibi ye kuwalilana kuzhe kwe ndobolo.
Ndizo ndowomposela mu thobo dzinopisa, na ibabo banoshinga mishingo ye bupombgwe naye, ndowobalonga mu kudziyila kukulu, ha basingowoshandukila mishingo yabo.
Ndowobulaya bana babe. Ndizo makubungano wose anowoziba kuti ndimi ndinoshakisisa njalakang'wa nenge moyo, ngono ndowopa mmwe ne mmwe wenyu kwakalingisana nge mishingo iye.

“Koga kubamwe benyu bose mu Tiyatira basakatobela zwidiyo zwakajalo, basakatongozwidiya zwithu zwinodang'wa kuyi zwikowa zwakasumbikala zwa Satani, kumuli ndoti, andina mmwe ntolo wanditjawomusengesa.
Koga bhatililani itjetjo tjamunatjo kudzina ndizha.
Iye unokunda kakale kashinga mishingo yangu kuswikila nsi we bupelo, ndowompa simba le kulaula zwitjaba,
ngono unowobalaula nge ludozo gwe tshipi, unowobapkhwanya bakasala benga zwiyenga zwe hali ye ntapkhwi, unowowana simba ileli koga sami ndakaliwana kuna Tate.
Pezhugwi kwa ikoko ndowompa Masasi.
“Iye una zebe, ngaahwe tjinolebgwa nge Meya ku makubungano.
“Kwalila ntumwa we kudzimu we gubungano limu Sadisi sawoku:
“Awa matama a iye una meya ili kutendeka ye Ndzimu ne nyenyedzi dzili kutendeka. Ndoziba mishingo iyo, unodang'wa kuyi unotjila, ngono wakafa,
ndizo muka, ngono usimise tjaunatjo na itjo tjabe pejo ngofa, nge kuti andizowana mishingo iyo ili yakapelela mu mesho e Ndzimu wangu.
Ndizo, alakana zwidiyo zwawakadiyiwa. Bhatilila mu zwili utjile, ushandukile matjinyo awo. Ha usingamuke, ndowozha kukuli se mbava, ngono autowoziba tjibaka tjandinowozha nditjo.
Koga kutjina basibangana mu Sadisi basakazhadza zwiambalo zwabo shambgwa, ngono banowoyenda nami bakaambala zwiambalo zwitjena, ngoti kwakabafanila.
Iye unokunda unowombadziwa sa ikoko, zwiambalo zwitjena, ngono anditowobukusha zina lile mu lukwalo gwe butjilo. Ndowoleba zina lile pana Tate nepa batumwa babo.
“Iye una zebe, ngaahwe tjinolebgwa nge Meya ku makubungano.
“Kwalila ntumwa we kudzimu we gubungano limu Filadelifiya sawoku:
“Awa matama e wakayengemala, una malebeswa, una khiyi ya Dafite, unozhula kukashaya ungazhalila, unozhalila kukashaya ungazhula.
Ndoziba mishingo iyo. Bonani, ndazhula nkoba mbeli kuko, iwo usina unotubula kuuzhalila. Ndoziba kuti muna masimba matukununu, koga makalondolodza dama langu kakale amuzondizwilandula.
Bona, ndowothama ibabo be ng'umba ya Satani, banozwidwa beti Bajuta, ngono basi ibo koga be nyepa, bonani, ndowothama kuti bazhe banamate pa makumbo enyu, bazibe kuti ndakamuda.
Nge kuti makalondolodza ndayo yangu nge kudzikitadza nge moyo nlefu, ndowomulondolodza mu nsi we ndiko inozha mu shango yose, kulika ibabo bagele mu shango.
Ndozha tjinyolotjo, bhatisisani tjamunatjo, kuti ndizo kusitongobe ne mmwe ungamutolela tjiala tjenyu.

Iye unokunda ndowonthama phanda mu Ng'umba* ye Ndzimu wangu. Aangatjafe abhuda muili. Ndowokwala munli zina le Ndzimu wangu ne zina le nzi* nkulu we Ndzimu wangu, Jerusalema ntshwa, unodeluka udwa ku Ndzimu wangu kudzimu. Kakale ndowokwala zina langu dzwa munli.
“Iye una zebe ngaahwe tjinolebgwa nge Meya ku makubungano.
“Kwalila ntumwa we kudzimu we gubungano limu Laodikeya sahwoku:
“Awa matama anodwa kuna Ngakujalo, ntendeki unogagwabgwe we malebeswa, budwilo gwe lubumbo gwe Ndzimu.
Ndoziba mishingo yenyu, amutotothola kakale amutopisa. Kwabe kungayita ha mabe mutothola kene mupisa!
Ndizo, se mudziya, musingatothole kakale musingapise, ndowomuthwa amudusa mu nlomo wangu.
Ukati, ‘Ndakafuma, ndimile zubuyanana, andina tjandinosheta.’ Koga autoziba kuti umu buyendasi, unohwisa ngoni! U nshayi, u mbujo kakale u bhofu.

Ndizo, ndokukumbuludza kuti utenge golide mundili yakatjenesiwa ngopisiwa mu moto kuti ufume, ne zwiambalo zwitjena ufuke uzwimbe mbujo iyo inobhatisa shoni kuti isibong'we, utenge ne mafuta aungazhodza mu mesho awo kuti ubone.
Ibabo bandinoda ndobatjemela abalaya. Ndizo, simisila ushandukile matjinyo awo.
Bonani, ndimile pa nkoba ndokokodza, ha mmwe angahwa hwi langu kazhula nkoba, ndowongina aja naye, ngono na iye unowoja nami.
Iye unokunda ndowompa ndetjedzelo kugala nami mu tjigalo tje bushe gwangu koga sekwa ndakakunda, ndigele na Tate mu tjigalo tje bushe gwabo.
“Iye una zebe ngaahwe tjinolebgwa nge Meya ku makubungano.”

Shule kwa ikoko alinga, ngono abona nkoba wakazhuka kudzimu! Ngono hwi lakabe lina nlidzo unonga we lunyanga gunolidziwa lakabe lalebeleka nami kutanga, likati, “Tathila ngeno, ngono ndowokulakidza tjakafanila shingikala shule kwa ikoku.”
Tjinyolotjo Meya yakayengemala ikadelukila mundili, ngono abona, tjigalo tje bushe tjikudzimu, kuna mmwe ugele mu tjigalo itjetjo!
Iwoyo wakabe ali gele ipapo wakabe epenya se mabgwe anoyi jasipa* ne kaneliyeni,* ngono kupoteleka tjigalo itjetjo kwakabe kuna nlalabungu una mbala we nkwakwa.

Kupoteleka tjigalo tje bushe kwakabe kuna zwigalo zwili makumi mabili ana mido minna, muzwili kuli gele bakulu* bali makumi mabili ana bathu bali banna, bakaambala butjena, mu misholo yabo bakaambala zwiala zwe golide.
Mu tjigalo tje bushe kwaka be kubhuda lupenyo gwe vula ne mahwi ne kudadamula. Kwabe kuna mavone ali kutendeka mbeli kwe tjigalo tje bushe, mavone meya ye Ndzimu ili kutendeka.
Kakale mbeli kwe tjigalo tje bushe kwakabe kuna tjithu tjinolingikala se gungwa gwe halasi gwakatjenapala gunonga deemani.
Kupoteleka tjigalo tje bushe, mu midzibo yatjo minna kuna zwitjili* zwinna, zwizhele mesho mbeli na shule.
Itjili tje kutanga tjakabe tjinga shumba, tje bubili tjakabe tjinga ngabe, tje butatu tjina buso gunonga gwe nthu, tje bunna tjinga dzu lakawuluka.
Zwitjili izwezwi zose nge bunna gwazo, tjimwe ne tjimwe tjazo tjina mapapiro matathatu, zwilizhele mesho pamwe ne pamwe na mukati na kuzhe kwe mapapiro. Siku ne sikati azwitomisa kumba zwiti,
“Wakayengemala, wakayengemala, wakayengemala, iye She Ndzimu Masimbawose
wakabe uli yapo, uyapo kakale utjawozha.”
Tjibaka tjimwe ne tjimwe zwitjili izwezwi tjazwinokudza zwilumbidza kakale zwiboka iye ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe, iye unotjila nge kusingapele kose,

bakulu ibaba bali makumi mabili ana bathu banna, banowila pasi mbeli kwe ugele tjigalo tje bushe, ngono bennamata iye unotjila nge kusingapele kose. Beposela zwiala zwabo pa tjigalo tje bushe bemba beti,
“She wedu kakale Ndzimu wedu,
makafanila amutjila gudzo* ne ndumbidzo ne masimba,
ngobe makabumba zwithu zose,
nge kuda kwenyu zwakabe yapo zwikabumbika.”
Ndakabona mu luboko gwe luji* gwa iye ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe, lukwalo gwakakwagwa mukati na kuzhe, gwakapetiwa gwakazhaligwa nge zwizhalilo zwili kutendeka.
Abona ntumwa we kudzimu wakasima elebeleka nge hwi lipezhugwi eti, “Ndiani wakalizanila kuzhula lukwalo igogu?”
Koga kwakabe kusina ne nng'ompela kudzimu kene mu shango kene kusi kwe shango wakabe etubula kuzhula lukwalo ne kulinga zwimukati.
Ndakalila kwazo, ngobe kwakabe kusina wawang'wa akalizanila kuzhula lukwalo kene kubala zwimukati.
Ipapo mmwe we bakulu* kabe eti kundili, “Usilile, bona, Shumba ye ludzi gwa Juda, we ludzi gwa Dafite, wakunda, kodwa kuti ungazhula zwizhalilo izwezwi zwili kutendeka kazhula lukwalo.”

Ndakabona Pkhwizana yakabe ilingika seyakabe yatongobulawa ili mile pa tjigalo tje bushe ne zwibumbiwa zwinna zwinotjila, yakabe ina nyanga dzili kutendeka ne mesho ali kutendeka ali meya ye Ndzimu ili kutendeka yakabe yatumwa mu shango yose.
Pkhwizana ikayenda ikanotola lukwalo mu luboko gwe luji gwe ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe.

Yakati yatola lukwalo, zwitjili zwinna ne bakulu bakabe bali makumi mabili ana bathu banna, bakawila pasi mbeli kwe Pkhwizana, mmwe ne mmwe wakabe ana dende ne ndilo dze golide dzili zhele motsha* zwili milile mitembezelo ye bayengemali.*
Bakamba lumbo butshwa, beti,
“Wakalizana kutola lukwalo
ne kuzhula zwizhalilo zwago,
ngoti wakabulawa ngono nge malopa awo wakadzutunulila Ndzimu bathu
kudwa mu ludzi gumwe ne gumwe
ne mu lulimi gumwe ne gumwe
ne mu bathu bamwe ne bamwe
ne mu tjaba dzose.
Wakabathama itjaba tje bushe, Bapirisiti banoshingila Ndzimu wedu,
ngono banowobusa mu shango.”
Ipapo alinga, ngono ahwa hwi le batumwa be kudzimu banjinji, bali zwiwulu wulu kupoteleka tjigalo tje bushe ne kupoteleka zwibumbiwa zwinotjila ne bakulu.
Bakamba nge hwi lipezhugwi beti,
“Pkhwizana yakabe yabulawa yakalizana
kuamutjila bushe ne fumwa ne butjenjedu ne simba,
ne gudzo ne ndumbidzo ne kukombolegwa.”
Ngono ndakahwa tjibumbiwa tjimwe ne tjimwe kudzimu ne mu shango na kusi kwe shango ne mu gungwa na zose zwimba zwiti,
“Kunli ugele pezhugwi kwe tjigalo tje bushe ne ku Pkhwizana
ngakube ne kukombolegwa ne gudzo
ne tjedza ne simba nge kusingapele kose.”
Zwibumbiwa zwinotjila zwinna zwakashandula zwiti, “Ngakujalo.” Ngono bakulu bakawila pasi, bakanamata Ndzimu.
Ngono ndakabona Pkhwizana izhula tjizhalilo tje kutanga mu zwizhalilo zwili kutendeka, ngono ndakahwa tjimwe tje zwibumbiwa zwinotjila zwinna tjilebeleka nge hwi linonga nsindo we gole tjiti, “Izha!”
Ndakalinga, ngono abona mbizi tjena, ntathi wayo wakabe akabhata dati, ngono kapiwa tjiala tje bushe. Kayenda ali nkundi kunokunda.
Pkhwizana ikati izhula tjizhalilo tje bubili, ngono ahwa tjibumbiwa tjinotjila tje bubili tjiti, “Izha!”
Kukabhuda imwe mbizi kakale, ili shaba kwakabondelela. Ntathi wayo wakapiwa masimba kudusa mbakiso mu shango, kuti ndizo bathu babulayane. Ngono kapiwa thumo gulugulu.
Pkhwizana ikati izhula tjizhalilo tje butatu, ahwa tjibumbiwa tje butatu tjiti, “Izha!” Ndakalinga, ngono abona mbizi thema. Ntathi wayo wakabe akabhata ikale mu luboko gugwe.
Ndakahwa nsindo unonga hwi udwa pakati kwe zwibumbiwa zwinna liti, “Lithara ye korong i ndipo ye zhuba, lithara dzili thatu dze bhali* i ndipo ye zhuba. Koga musitjinye mafuta ne nkumbi.”
Ikati izhula tjizhalilo tje bunna ahwa tjibumbiwa tje bunna tjiti, “Izha!”

Alinga, ngono abona mbizi ye mbala we dundubadzi. Ntathi wayo wakabe edang'wa kuyi Lufu, ngono bugalo gwe bafi gwakansala shule, ngono bapiwa simba pezhugwi kwe lubabi gwe bunna gwe shango, kubulaya nge thumo nenge bhamba nenge njigwele dzisina ndapo nenge kushingisa phuka dze shango.
Pkhwizana ikati izhula tjizhalilo tje bushanu, abona kusi kwe tjibeso meya ye bathu bakabulayigwa dama le Ndzimu ne butendeki gwabakapa.

Bakabe bedana nge hwi lipezhugwi beti, “She Masimbawose, wakayengemala, una malebeswa, kowotola lubaka gungapani, musathu mukasumikilisa bathu ba muno mu shango, ne kubgwilizila malopa edu abakatebula?”

Mmwe ne mmwe wabo wakapiwa zwiambalo zwitjena. Ngono bakadwiwa kukayi banyaluluke kwe tjibaka tjilefana, kudzina balanda sa ibo ne zwikamu zwabo, zwibulawebo ngobe zwabe pejo ngobulawa, sa ibo bakabulawa, kuti palo iswike.
Ngono ikati izhula tjizhalilo tje butathatu, alinga abona kutengenyeka kwe shango kukulu, zhuba likashanduka likabe dema se jila dema le tjililo ne mwedzi ukashanduka ukanga malopa.
Nyenyedzi dzikawila pasi se ntjelo usakabidwa, ushashamuka mu nti ha phepo ina masimba iwuzunguza.
Zhuzhugwi kukanyelela se lukwalo gupetiwa, dombo limwe ne limwe ne tjigwizi tjimwe ne tjimwe tjikadusiwa mu magalo atjo.
Ipapo boshe bakulu be shango ino ne babusi ne balauli be babhayani ne bafumi ne bana masimba ne bathu bose, balanda ne bakasungunuka bakabgwata mu makuhwu ne kusi kwe shongwe mu matombo.
Bakadana matombo ne shongwe nge hwi lipezhugwi beti, “Mutiwile, mutisumbikile buso gwa iye ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe ne bushongola gwe Pkhwizana!
Zhuba gulu le bushongola gwabo latjizha, ngono ndiani ungalimilila?”
Shule kwa ikoku, ndakabona batumwa be kudzimu bali banna bali mile ku mbizho nna dze shango, bedzibila phepo kuti isitutudze mu shango kene mu gungwa kene kuzunguza nti ne ng'ompela wose.

Ipapo abona ntumwa mmwe we kudzimu edwa ku bhezhuba akabhata lutjwayo gwe Ndzimu unotjila, edana nge hwi lipezhugwi, edana batumwa be kudzimu banna bakapiwa simba nge Ndzimu kutjinya shango ne gungwa.
Ntumwa iwoyo we kudzimu wakalebeleka eti, “Musitongo kolomola shango, kene gungwa kene miti kuswikila tatjwaya balanda be Ndzimu wedu mu phazha dzabo.”
Ngono ndakahwa kuti palo ye bathu bakatjwayiwa yakabe ili 144000. Bakabe bedwa mu njudzi dzili gumi lina mbili dze Iziraela,
zwiwulu zwili gumi lina zwibili (12000) zwidwa mu ludzi gwa Juda, zwili (12000) muna gwa Rubheni, zwili (12000) zwidwa muna gwa Gadi;
zwiwulu zwili gumi lina zwibili (12000) zwidwa mu ludzi gwa Asheri, zwili (12000) muna gwa Nafutali, zwili (12000) muna gwa Manase;
zwiwulu zwili gumi lina zwibili (12000) mu ludzi gwa Simiyoni, zwili (12000) muna gwa Levi, zwili (12000) muna gwa Isakari;
zwiwulu zwili gumi lina zwibili (12000) mu ludzi gwa Zebhuloni, zwili (12000) mu ludzi gwa Josefa ne zwili (12000) muna gwa Bhenjamini.

Shule kwa ikoku ndakalinga, ngono abona mbunga we bathu nkulu, kwakabe kusina ungabala bathu bose ibaba bakabe bedwa mu itjaba tjimwe ne tjimwe ne mu njudzi dzose ne mu bathu bose ne mu ndimi dzose bali mile mbeli kwe tjigalo tje bushe na mbeli kwe Pkhwizana, bakaambala hazu tjena ndefu dzinoma ku zwinyala bakabhata thabi dze milala
Bakalebeleka nge hwi lipezhugwi beti, “Jidzo lodwa ku Ndzimu wedu ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe ne ku Pkhwizana.”
Batumwa be kudzimu bose bakama bakakombeledza tjigalo tje bushe belonga mukati bakulu ne zwibumbiwa zwinotjila zwinna. Bakawila pasi ne njiso dzabo mbeli kwe tjigalo tje bushe be namata Ndzimu
beti, “Ngakujalo! Ndumbidzo ne gudzo ne butjenjedu ne mboko ne gudzo ne bushe ne masimba kube kwe Ndzimu nge kusingapele kose! Ngakujalo.”
Ndizo mmwe we bakulu wakandibhuzwa kati, “Ndiboani bathu ibaba bakaambala hazu tjena, banodwa ngayi?”
Ashandula nditi, “Ndimwi mungaziba she wangu.”
Kati kundili, “Ibaba ndibo bakadwa mu ndiko hwulu kwazo; bakasuka hazu dzabo mu malopa e Pkhwizana dzikabe tjena.
Ndizo bali mile mbeli kwe tjigalo tje bushe gwe Ndzimu, bewunamata siku ne sikati mu Ng'umba yawo. Ndizo iwo ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe unowobabakilila nge kube yapo kwawo.
Abatjawotongo bhakhwa nge zhala kene nge nyota kakale; zhuba alitowotongo tjabapisa kene kuli phepo inopisa.
Pkhwizana iyo pakati kwe tjigalo tje bushe inowobe nlisi wabo kakale inowobatungamilila ku misenya ye vula inopa butjilo. Ngono Ndzimu unowobukusha nshodzi mmwe ne mmwe mu mesho abo.”
Pkhwizana yakati izhula tjizhalilo tje butendeka, kukabe ne kunyalala kudzimu, tjibaka tjingaswika gaswa le awara.
Shule kwa ipapo abona batumwa be kudzimu bali kutendeka, ibo banoma mbeli kwe Ndzimu, ngono bakapiwa nyanga dzinolidziwa dzili kutendeka.

Mmwe ntumwa we kudzimu kazha kama pa tjibeso tje zwibhayilo akabhata tjija tje golide tjinopisigwa motsha. Ngono kapiwa motsha uli nnjinji kwazo kupa Ndzimu pang'ompela ne mitembezelo ye bayengemali bose mu tjibeso tje golide mbeli kwe tjigalo tje bushe.
Busi gwe motsha gukamilika guyenda pezhugwi ne mitembezelo ye bayengemali kudwa mu luboko gwe ntumwa we kudzimu wakabe ali mile mbeli kwe Ndzimu.

Shule kwaipapo ntumwa katola tjija tjinopisigwa motsha katjizhadza moto unodwa mu tjibeso tje zwibhayilo ebe etjiposela mu shango, kukabe ne kudadamula ne mahwi ne kupenya kwe vula ne kutengenyeka kwe shango.
Kudwa ipapo batumwa be kudzimu bali kutendeka bakabe bana nyanga dzinolidziwa dzili kutendeka bakazwilulwamisila kudzilidza.

Ntumwa we kutanga kalidza lunyanga gugwe, tjivulamabgwe ne moto zwakashanganyiwa ne malopa zwikawila mu shango, ngono ikwamu tje butatu tje shango tjikatshwa, ngabo ye butatu ye miti ikatshwa ne bushwa butshwa gose gu bgwelele gukatshwa.
Ntumwa we kudzimu we bubili kati elidza lunyanga gugwe, tjimwe tjinonga dombo gulu gulu linothuta moto tjikaposegwa mu gungwa,
ngono lubabi gwe butatu gwe gungwa gukashanduka gukabe malopa, ngabo ye butatu ye zwibumbiwa zwinotjila mu gungwa zwikafa ne ngabo ye butatu ye zwikepe ikakolomodzwa.
Ntumwa we kudzimu we butatu kalidza lunyanga gugwe, nyenyedzi hwulu yakabe ithuta se luvone ikawa idwa pezhugwi, ikawila mu ngabo thatu dze njizi ne dze misenya ye vula.
Nyenyedzi iyeyo zina layo inoyi “Kubabakwendulu.” Lubabi gwe butatu gwe vula gukashanduka kukababa se ndulu, ngono bathu banjinji bakabulawa ngong'wa vula iyeyo, ngobe yashanduka ikababa.

Ntumwa we kudzimu we bunna kalidza gugwe lunyanga, lubabi gwe butatu gwe zhuba gukakatshiwa, ne gwe mwedzi ne gwe nyenyedzi gukakatshiwabo, ndizo butatu gwe mbabi dze tjedza tjazo tjikabe zhalima, lubabi gwe butatu gwe masikati gukasibe ne tjedza, ne lubabi gwe butatu gwe busiku.

Shule kwa ipapo alinga, ngono ahwa dzu lilila nge hwi gulu, lakawuluka pezhugwi, liti, “Ye mme wee! Yee mme wee! Yee mme wee! Kwapalala ibabo bagele mu shango ha nlidzo uzha udwa mu nyanga dzilidziwa tjinyolotjo nge batumwa be kudzimu batatu basala.”
Ntumwa we kudzimu we bushanu kalidza lunyanga gugwe, ndakabona nyenyedzi yakawila pasi mu shango. Nyenyedzi iyeyo ikapiwa tjizhulo tje gomba* lakangina kusina tjilizanyo.
Nyenyedzi ikazhula gomba, ngono busi gukatutunyuka mulili se busi gunobhuda mu bibi le moto, zhuba na pezhugwi kukati zwititi nge busi gunodwa mu gomba.
Kukadwa phashu mu busi igogu dzikadelukila mu shango ngono dzikapiwa masimba anofanana ne masimba e gungubudza.

Dzakabudziwa kuti dzisitongo hwisa zogwadza bushwa kene miti kene tjimwe ne tjimwe tje mbala we bgwelelo tjinomela mu shango, koga dzihwise zogwadza bathu ibabo basina lutjwayo gwe Ndzimu mu phazha dzabo.
Dzakapiwa ndetjedzelo kubahwisa zogwadza mimwedzi ili mishanu, koga dzisibabulaye, gwadza ikoko kwakabe kunga kwe nthu walumwa nge gungubudza.
Mu mazhuba iyawo banowoshaka lufu, ngono abatowogubona. Ndizo banowoshaka kufa koga kufa kowobatizha!
Phashu idzedzo dzakabe dzilingika se mbizi dzalulwamisigwa ngwa; mu misholo yadzo kwakabe kuna zwithu zwinolingika se zwiala zwakathamiwa nge golide, ngono njiso dzadzo dzinga njiso dze bathu.
Mavudzi adzo enga mavudzi e bakadzi, meno adzo enga meno e shumba.
Dzakabe dzina makwapa anonga zwivikili zwe ngwa zwinombagwa mu ifuba, ngono zhoba ye mapapiro adzo yakabe inga zhoba ye kara njinji dze ngwa dzakakwebiwa nge mbizi dzakalabukila ku ngwa.
Dzina mimwise inonga ye gungubudza lina bushungu, simba ladzo le kuhwisa bathu zogwadza mwedzi mishanu lakabe lili mu mimwise yadzo.
Dzina She nkulu unodzibusa, ntumwa we gomba lakangina kusina tjilizanyidzo. Zina lile nge Tjihebheru ndi Abhadoni, nge Tjigiriki zina lile ndi Apoliyoni.
Zogwadza zwe kutanga zwapinda. Bonani, zogwadza zwe mbumbiko mbili zwitjazha.
Ntumwa we kudzimu we butathatu kalidza lunyanga gugwe ngono ahwa hwi lidwa mu nyanga nna dze tjibeso tje golide mbeli kwe Ndzimu.
Hwi lakati ku ntumwa we kudzimu we butathatu “Sunungula batumwa be kudzimu banna bakasungwa ku gwizi bukulu gwe Yufuratesi!”
Batumwa ibabo banna be kudzimu bakasunungugwa, bakabe bakalulwamisigwa zhuba ilelo ne mwedzi iwoyo ne gole ilelo, ku bulaya ngabo ye butatu ye bathu.
Palo ye babhayani bakatatha mbizi yakabe ili miliyoni dzili mazana mabili, palo yabo ndakaihwa.

Ngono tjandakabona mu mbono yangu ndiyetji; batathi badzo bakabe bana matale akabakilila zwifuba zwabo ali mashaba se moto, ana mbala unonga we makole, kakale kuli mbala we ditima, misholo ye mbizi yakabe inga misholo ye shumba, ngono mu milomo yadzo kubhuda moto ne busi ne salifa.*
Ngabo ye butatu ye bathu yakabulawa nge shamu idzedzo thatu, bakabulawa nge moto ne busi ne salifa zwidwa mu milomo ye mbizi idzedzo,
ngobe masimba e mbizi idzedzo amu milomo yadzo ne mu mimwise yadzo. Mimwise yadzo inonga nyoka* ina misholo, ngono dzoishingisa kukubadza.

Bathu bose bakabe basala, ibabo bakabe basabulawa nge shamu idzedzi, abazotongo lasha mishingo ye maboko abo mibi, kene kuli kuletja kunamata meya mibi kene midzimu ye golide ne siliva ne buronzi ne mabgwe nenge zwikuni, iyo isingake ikabona kene kuli kuhwa kene kuyenda.
Abazotongo shanduka mu mbulayo dzabo dze bathu, kene mu buloyi gwabo kene mu bupombgwe kene mu bubava gwabo.

Shule kwaikoku ndakabona mmwe ntumwa we kudzimu una simba edeluka edwa kudzimu, akapombedzwa nge gole, ana nlalabungu pezhugwi kwe nsholo uwe, ngono buso gugwe gwakabe gunga zhuba, makumbo awe enga phanda dze moto.
Wakabe akabhata lukwalo gutukununu gwakazhuka mu luboko gugwe. Akatshamba nge gumbo lile le luji mu gungwa, nge le lumeshwe akatshamba mu shango,
ngono kadana nge hwi gulu se shumba inokuma, kati edana, midadamulo ili kutendeka ikadadamula.
Kwakati midadamulo ili kutendeka yadadamula, abe ndili pejo ngokwala, koga ahwa hwi lidwa kudzimu liti, “Zhalila tjalebgwa nge midadamulo ili kutendeka usitongo tjikwala.”
Ngono ntumwa we kudzimu wandakabona ali mile mu gungwa ne mu shango, kamilidza luboko gugwe gwe luji, kagulingisa kudzimu.
Katuna nge zina laiye unotjila nge kusingapele, iye wakabumba kudzimu na zose zwi kudzimu, ne shango na zose zwimuili, ne gungwa ne tjimwe ne tjimwe tjimulili. Katuna eti, “Kusitjabe ne kunonoka,
kuti mu nsi unolidziwa lunyanga nge ntumwa we kudzimu we butendeka, masazibgwe e Ndzimu sekwa wakabudza balanda bawo, balebesambeli anowoshingikala.*”
Ipapo hwi landakabe ndahwa lilebeleka lidwa kudzimu likalebeleka nami kakale likati, “Yenda unotola lukwalo gwakazhuka gumu luboko gwe ntumwa we kudzimu umile mu gungwa ne mu shango.”
Ndakayenda ku ntumwa we kudzimu, ngono ankumbila kuti andipe lukwalo igogo gutukununu, ngono iye kati kundili, “Ugutole uguje, gowobaba mu ntumbu uwo, koga gowozipa se butji gwe nyutji mu nlomo uwo.”
Ndakatola lukwalo igogo gutukununu mu luboko gugwe aguja, gukazipa se butji gwe nyutji mu nlomo wangu. Ndakati ndaguja gukababa mu ntumbu wangu.
Ngono adwiwa kukayi “Wakafanila kulebelambeli kakale ngekwe bathu banjinji ne kwe zwitjaba ne kwe ndimi nenge kwa boshe bakulu.”
Ndakati shule apiwa lukombo gwakabe gulingika se lukuni gunolizanya, ngono adwiwa kukayi, “Yenda unolizanya Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ne tjibeso, ubale bathu banonamata Ndzimu mukati.
Koga usitongo lizanya tjibata tjikuzhe tjakabakiligwa nge bhakasa, ngoti tjakapiwa bathu basibagalimoyo, banowokanyanga nzi nkulu wakayengemala mimwedzi ili makumi manna ana mimwedzi mibili.
Ndowotumila batendeki bangu babili bakaambala zwiambalo zwe tjililo, ngono banowolebela mbeli mazhuba ali tjiwulu tjina mazana mabili ana makumi matathatu (1260).”
Batendeki ibabo babili miti ye mitoba mibili ne mavone mabili amile mbeli kwa She we shango.
Ha mmwe angagwisa kubakubadza, moto unowobhuda mu milomo yabo, ngono unowobulaya zwita zwabo, ha mmwe angagwisa kubakubadza, unowobulawa nge zila yakajalo.

Bana mazimba ekuzhalila zhuzhugwi kuti kusitongobe ne vula inona mu tjibaka tjabanowobe belebelambeli. Bana masimba e kushandula vula ikabe malopa kakale bana masimba e kuloba shango kanjinji sekwa bada nge shamu imwe ne imwe yabada.
Ha bepedza kulebelambeli, tjibandana tjinodwa mu gomba lakangina kusina tjilizanyo tjowogwa nabo, tjikabakunda tjikababulaya.
Ngono zwitumbu zwabo wila mu zila ye nzi nkulu unodang'wa ngopesa kuyi Sodoma ne Egipiti kwakabambuligwa She wabo.
Bathu banowodwa mu njudzi dzose ne mu ndimi dzose ne mu zwitjaba zose banowolinga zwitumbu zwabo mazhuba ali matatu ana gaswa, ngono banowolamba kuti zwibiganyiwe.
Bagele mu shango banoshathila lufu gwe batendeki ibabo. Banowothama mizano, ngono banowopana zwipo, ngobe balebesambeli* ibabo babili bakabe bedziyidza bagali be shango.
Koga shule kwe mazhuba ali matatu ana gaswa, meya ye butjilo yakadwa ku Ndzimu, ngono ikangina mu zwitumbu. Zwikamilika zwikama nge makumbo, bose bakazwibona bakapalukamoyo kwazo
Ndizo balebesambeli ibabo babili bakahwa hwi gulu linodwa kudzimu liti kubali, “Tathilani ngeno!” Bakayenda kudzimu bali mu gole, zwita zwabo zwakabalinga.

Ngono nge tjibaka itjetjo kukabe nge kutengenyeka kwe shango kukulu, lubabi gwe bugumi gwe nzi nkulu gukawa, ngono bathu bali zwiwulu zwili kutendeka (7000) bakabulawa nge kutengenyeka kwe shango, bakasala bakapalukamoyo, ndizo bakakudza Ndzimu we kudzimu.
Zogwadza zwe bubili zwapinda, bonani, zogwadza zwe butatu zozha tjinyolotjo.

Ipapo ntumwa we kudzimu we butendeka kalidza lunyanga gugwe, ngono kukabe ne mahwi anolebelekela pezhugwi, kudzimu eti, “Bushe gwe shango gwatjibe bushe gwa She wedu na Kirisiti uwe, ngono unowobusa nge kusingapele kose.”
Ngono bakulu bali makumi mabili ana bathu banna banogala mu zwigalo zwabo zwe bushe mbeli kwe Ndzimu, bakawila pasi nge njiso dzabo ngono bakanamata Ndzimu
beti,
“Tomuboka She Ndzimu we Masimbawose,
muyapo kakale makabe yapo ntolo.
Tomuboka kuti matola masimba enyu makulu,
ngono matangisa kubusa.
Njudzi dzakagwadzamoyo, koga
bushongola gwenyu gukazha,
ne tjibaka tje kuti bafi basumilikisiwe.
Tjibaka tjazha tje kuti mupe balanda balebesambeli mbhayilo,
ne bayengemali, na ibabo banolumbidza zina lenyu,
bose batukunu ne bakulu.
Tjibaka tjatjiswika tje kulobesa ibabo banolobesa shango.”

Ipapo Ng'umba ye Ndzimu kudzimu ikazhugwa, ngono bhokisi* le Tjidumano* likabong'wa mu ng'umba yawo. Shule kukabe ne kupenya kwe vula ne mahwi ne kudadamula ne kutengenyeka kwe shango ne tjivulamabgwe tjikulu.

Ngono kukaboneka tjilakidzo tjikulu pezhugwi. Kukaboneka nkadzi, akaambala zhuba, mwedzi uli kusi kwe makumbo awe, mu nsholo uwe kuna tjiala tje bushe tjina nyenyedzi dzili gumi lina nyenyedzi dzili mbili.
Wakabe akazwisenga, ngono kalila ali mu thumbgwa, ngobe wakabe atjibe pejo ngotshibama.
Tjimwe tjilakidzo tjikaboneka kudzimu; kwakaboneka bhophona* gulu shaba, lina misholo ili kutendeka ne nyanga dzili gumi, ngono pezhugwi kwe misholo yalo kuna zwialana zwili kutendeka.
Mwise walo ukakwebela pasi ngabo ye butatu ye nyenyedzi ukadziligila mu shango. Ngono bhophona lika ma mbeli kwe nkadzi wakabe ali pejo ngotshibama, kuti ndizo lije mwana uwe tjinyolotjo ha ezwagwa.
Nkadzi katshibama mwana we tjilisana unowobusa zwitjaba zose nge ikombo tje tshipi, koga mwana wakadzamugwa katolegwa ku Ndzimu ku tjigalo tjitje tje bushe.
Nkadzi wakatizhila ku tjilambanyika ku bugalo gwaakabikanyidzigwa nge Ndzimu kwaanotjengetiwa mu mazhuba ali tjiwulu tjina mazana mabili ana makumi matathatu (1260).
Ngwa ikamuka kudzimu. Mikaele ne batumwa babe bakagwa ne bhophona, bhophona likagwabo nabo lina batumwa balo,
koga bakakundiwa, ngono bakabe basitjina bugalo kudzimu.
Ngono bhophona ilelo gulu likalashigwa pasi, ilo nyoka ya ntolo, inodang'wa Nvanganyi kakale kuyi Satani, ntjengeli we shango yose lakalashigwa pasi mu shango ne batumwa balo bose.

Ngono ndakahwa hwi gulu kudzimu liti, “Ngwenu jidzo ne masimba ne bushe* gwe Ndzimu wedu ne ndaulo ya Kirisiti zwatjizha, ngobe iye unotilika zwikamu zwedu nlandu walashigwa pasi, iye unobatilika nlandu siku ne sikati mbeli kwe Ndzimu wedu.
Zwikamu zwedu zwakunda bhophona nge malopa e Pkhwizana ne butendeki gwabo, ngobe abazogumbatila matjilo abo, koga bakabe bakazwimisila lufu.

Ndizo shathani imwi mu kudzimu, ndodwa imwi mose banogala ikoko, koga shango yapalala ne gungwa gwapalala! Ngoti Nvanganyi wazha pasi kumuli alizhele bushongola, ngoti unoziba kuti wasaligwa nge tjibaka tjifutshwanana!”
Bhophona lakati libona kuti laposegwa pasi mu shango, likatobela nkadzi iwoyo wakabe azwala mwana we tjilisana.
Koga nkadzi kapiwa mapapiro ali mabili e dzu gulu kuti atizhe bhophona awulukile ku tjilambanyika, kwaanowotjengetegwako makole ali matatu ana gaswa.
Nyoka iyeyo ikathwa vula inonga gwizi guli zhele, kuti itole nkadzi iwoyo,
Koga shango ikabhatsha nkadzi iwoyo ikazhula nlomo wayo, ikamidza vula iyeyo yakabe yathwiwa nge bhophona.
Ipapo bhophona likagwadzila moyo nkadzi iwoyo, liyenda kunogwa ne bakasala be bana babe, ibabo banolondolodza milayo ye Ndzimu, kakale betendeka ngekwa Jesu.
Bhophona likama mu nsetje umu phili ye gungwa.

Ngono abona tjibandana tjibhuda mu gungwa tjina nyanga dzili gumi ne misholo ili kutendeka, pezhugwi kwe lunyanga gumwe ne gumwe kuna tjialana tje bushe, ngono pezhugwi kwe nsholo mmwe ne mmwe kuna zina linotuka Ndzimu.
Tjibandana itjetjo tjandakabona tjakabe tjinga n'gwe, matshambo atjo enga e bira,* nlomo watjo unga we shumba. Ngono bhophona likatjipa masimba alo ne bushe gwalo ne ndaulo hwulu.
Mmwe we misholo yatjo wakabe unabanga lingabulaya, koga banga ilelo likapola. Koga shango yose ikasala shule tjibandana itjetjo yakatjenama.
Bathu bakanama bhophona ngoti lakabe lapa tjibandana bushe gwalo. Bakanamata tjibandana beti, “Ndiani unonga tjibandana itjetji? Ne ungagwa natjo ndiani?”
Tjibandana tjakapiwa nlomo we kuzwikudza ne kutuka Ndzimu, tjiletjedzegwa kube nge ndaulo mimwedzi ili makumi manna ana mimwedzi mibili.
Tjikatangisa kutuka Ndzimu ne zina lawo ne magalo awo ne banobagala kudzimu.

Tjikapiwa ndetjedzelo kubhayana ne bayengemali ne kubakunda, kakale tjakabe tjapiwa ndaulo pezhugwi kwe ludzi gumwe ne gumwe ne bathu bamwe ne bamwe ne lulimi gumwe ne gumwe ne itjaba tjimwe ne tjimwe.
Ngono bose banogala mu shango banowotjinamata, bose be mazina asakakwagwa kudwa mu kuteyiwa kwe shango, mu lukwalo gwe butjilo gwe Pkhwizana yakabulawa.
Ha mmwe ana zebe, ngaahwe.
“Ha ili kuti kuna wakalingisana ngosungwa, unowosungwa, wakalingisana nge kubulawa nge thumo, unowobulawabo nge thumo. Oku koshaka kudzikitadza ne kugalamoyo kwe bayengemali.”
Ipapo abona tjimwe tjibandana tjibhuda mu shango, tjina nyanga dzili mbili dzifanana ne nyanga dze Pkhwizana, ngono tjikalebeleka se bhophona.
Tjoshinga nge ndaulo yose ye tjibandana tje kutanga se mmilili watjo. Tjokombeledza shango na bose banogala muili kuti banamate tjibandana tje kutanga, tje banga linotjisa lakapola.
Tjibandana itjetji tje bubili tjothama zwilakidzo zwikulu, tjothama moto ukadwa kudzimu ukazha pasi mu shango mu mesho e bathu bose.

Ndizo tjotjebela bathu banogala mu shango nge zwilakidzo zwatjinoletjedziwa kuthama mbeli kwe tjibandana tje kutanga tjibadwa tjiti bathame ifano tje tjibandana tjakabe tjakubadziwa nge thumo ngono tjikatjila.
Tjakapiwa simba kufemela meya mu ifano tje tjibandana tje kutanga kuti ifano tje tjibandana tjilebeleke ne kuthama kuti ibabo basinganamate ifano tje tjibandana babulawe.
Tjokombeledza bathu bose batukununu ne bakulukulu, bafumi ne bashayi, bakasununguka ne balanda kutjwayiwa mu maboko abo e luji kene mu phazha dzabo,
kuyita kuti kusibe ne ungatengesa asina lutjwayo igogo. Kodwa kuti zina le tjibandana kene palo ye zina latjo.
Ikoku koshaka butjenjedu. Iye wakatjenjela ngaazibe tjimiligwe nge palo ye tjibandana
Ipapo alinga, ngono abona Pkhwizana ilimile pezhugwi kwe dombo le Ziyoni,* bakabe banayo bakabe bali 144000, ibabo bakakwagwa zina layo ne zina la tate bayo mu phazha dzabo.
Ngono ndakahwa hwi lidwa kudzimu lihwika linga nsindo we vula njinji. Kakale linga dadamula kwe vula. Ndakahwa hwi linonga le bathu banolidza zwitinkani zwabo.
Banomba lumbo butshwa mbeli kwe tjigalo tje bushe, na mbeli kwe zwibumbiwa zwinotjila zwinna ne bakulu. Akuna wakabe angazwidiya lumbo igogo kuzhe kwe bali 144000, ibo bakabe badzutunugwa mu shango.
Ndibo basakazwitemapadza nge bakadzi, ndizo babuyanana; ndibo bakasala shule Pkhwizana pamwe ne pamwe painoyenda. Bakadzutunugwa pakati kwe bathu, bali mitjelo ye kutanga ye Ndzimu ne Pkhwizana.
Akuna manyepkhwa akawang'wa mu milomo yabo ngoti basina nlandu.

Ngono abona mmwe ntumwa we kudzimu ewuluka pezhugwi, akasenga ndebo mbuya isingapele, kuisumikilila bagali be shango mu itjaba tjimwe ne tjimwe ne mu ludzi gumwe ne gumwe ne mu lulimi gumwe ne gumwe ne mu bathu bamwe ne bamwe.
Wakati nge hwi lipezhugwi, “Kulumbidzani Ndzimu, muukudze, ngobe tjibaka tje kuti usumikilise bathu tjatjiswika! Muunamate iwo wakathama kudzimu ne shango ne gungwa ne misenya ye vula!”
Mmwe ntumwa we kudzimu we bubili wakatobela we kutanga eti, “Wawa, wawa Bhabhiloni nkulu, iye wakathama zwitjaba zose kung'wa nkumbi we bupombgwe gugwe.”
Ntumwa we kudzimu we butatu kabasala shule eti nge hwi lipezhugwi, “Iye unonamata tjibandana ne ifano tjatjo, kakale kaamutjila lutjwayo gwatjo mu phazha kene mu tjiazha,

kakale unowong'wa nkumbi we bushongola gwe Ndzimu wawapiphila usakadzimugwa mu tjing'wilo tje bushongola gwawo! Banowohwisiwa zogwadza mu moto ne salifa inopisa, mbeli kwe batumwa be kudzimu bakayengemala ne mbeli kwe Pkhwizana.

Busi gwe moto we kuhwisiwa zogwadza kwabo gomilikila pezhugwi nge kusingapele. Abana kunyaluluka masikati kene busiku ibabo banonamata tjibandana ne ifano tjatjo ne mmwe ne mmwe una lutjwayo gwe zina latjo.”
Ikoku koshaka dzikitadza mu bayengemali, ibabo banolondolodza milayo ye Ndzimu begalamoyo muna Jesu.
Kudwa ipapo ahwa hwi lidwa kudzimu liti, “Kwala ikoku, ‘Kwakakombolegwa bafi banofila muna She kudwila ngwenu kuyenda mbeli.’ ”
Meya ikati, “Bakakombolegwa dumbu kuti banyaluluke mu mishingo yabo inolema ngobe mija yabo inobatobela.”

Ngono ndakati shule alinga, ndikabona gole jena, ngono pezhugwi kwalo kuli gele mmwe unolingika se Nkololo we Nthu, ana tjiala tje bushe tje golide mu nsholo uwe, akabhata sikili inopitsha mu luboko gugwe.

Ngono mmwe ntumwa we kudzimu kabhuda mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu, kadana iwoyo ugele pezhugwi kwe gole nge hwi lipezhugwi eti, “Tola sikili iyo uvune, ngoti tjibaka tje kuvuna tjaswika; shango yabidwa nge buzhalo kuvung'wa.”
Ndizo iwoyo ugele pezhugwi kwe gole, kabe ebuzila sikili iyo mu shango, ngono shango ikavungwa.
Ngono ndakabona mmwe ntumwa we kudzimu ebhuda mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu kudzimu, ngono na iyebo kabe akabhata sikili inopitsha.

Mmwe ntumwa we kudzimu kadwa pa tjibeso tje zwibhayilo, iye wakabe elaula moto, ngono kamilidza hwi kadana ntumwa wakabhata sikili inopitsha kati, “Tola sikili iyo uthubule zhambi mu nnda we mizhambi we shango nge kuti zhambi dzakabidwa.”
Ndizo ntumwa we kudzimu kabuzila sikili iyo mu shango, kathubula zhambi mu nzhambi kadziposela mu dolo lisishoma le bushongola gwe Ndzimu.

Zhambi dzakakobogwa mu dolo kuzhe kwe nzi nkulu, kukabhuda malopa mu duni, kukabe gwizi gwe malopa gwe bulefu gwe khilomitha dzili mazana matatu (300), ngono malopa iyawo akabe angama nthu pa mathudzi.
Shule abona tjilakidzilo tjimwe kudzimu, tjikulu tjinotjenamisa, batumwa be kudzimu bali kutendeka bana shamu dzili kutendeka dze bupelo, ngobe bushongola gwe Ndzimu gopeleledziwa ndidzo.

Ngono ndakabona tjimwe tjakabe tjilingika tjinga gungwa gwe halasi lakashanganyiwa ne moto. Ibabo bakunda ngwa ye tjibandana ne tjifano tjatjo ne palo ye zina latjo, bali mile pa hwunde ne gungwa gwe halasi bakabhata zwitinkani zwe Ndzimu
Bakamba lumbo gwa Mushe nlanda we Ndzimu ne lumbo gwe Pkhwizana, beti,
“She, Ndzimu Masimbawose!
Mikulu kakale inotjenamisa seni mishingo yenyu.
She nkulu we misi!
Zila dzenyu dzakalulwama kakale dzi malebeswa.
She, ndiani usingawotja ngono kakudza zina lenyu?
Kana imwi moga ndimwi makayengemala?
Zwitjaba zose zowozha zwikawomunamata,
ngobe mishingo yenyu yakalulwama yakazumbunugwa.”
Shule kwa ikoku ndakalinga abona ng'umba* ye nshasha we butendeki kudzimu yakabe yakazhugwa.

Batumwa be kudzimu bali kutendeka bakabe bakabhata shamu dzili kutendeka, bakabhuda mu ng'umba bakaambala zwiambalo zwibuyanana zwe jila lakanaka linopenya, ngono zwifuba zwabo zwakasungwa nge mimwandabula ye golide.
Ngono kukati mmwe we zwibumbiwa zwinna zwinotjila, kapa batumwa bali kutendeka ndilo dzili kutendeka dzakathamwa nge golide dzili zhele bushongola gwe Ndzimu unotjila nge kusingapele kose.

Ngono ng'umba ye Ndzimu ikazhala busi gwe gudzo ne gwe simba le Ndzimu, ngono kwakabe kusina ungangina mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu kudzina shamu dzili kutendeka dze batumwa be kudzimu bali kutendeka dzapelela.
Ndizo ndakahwa hwi lilebelekela pezhugwi lidwa mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu lidwa batumwa be kudzimu bali kutendeka liti, “Yendani munotebulila bushongola gwe Ndzimu gumu ndilo dzili kutendeka mu shango.”

Ndizo ntumwa we kudzimu we kutanga kayenda, kaswika katebulila kumu ndilo iye mu shango. Malonda anotjisa, anogwadza kabhuda muna ibabo bakabe bana lutjwayo gwe tjibandana kakale benamata ifano tjatjo.
Ntumwa we kudzimu we bubili katebulila kumu ndilo iye mu gungwa, vula ikashanduka ikanga malopa e nthu wakafa, itjili tjimwe ne tjimwe mu gungwa tjikafa.
Ntumwa we kudzimu we butatu katebulila kumu ndilo iye mu njizi ne mu misenya ye vula, dzikashanduka dzikabe malopa.
Ndakahwa ntumwa we kudzimu we vula eti, “Makalulwama ngoshingisa shamu dzenyu idzedzi. Muyapo, imwi magala muli yapo, Makayengemala.
Bathu bakatebula malopa e bayengemali ne e balebesambeli, ndizo mabapa malopa kuti baang'we. Ikoku kwakabafanila.”
Ndakahwa tjibeso tjiti, “Ee, She Ndzimu Masimbawose, kusumikilisa kwenyu ku malebeswa kakale kwakalulwama.”
Ntumwa we kudzimu we bunna katebulila ndilo iye mu zhuba, ngono likaletjiwa kuti lipise bathu nge moto.
Bathu bakapisiwa ngopisa kukulu, ngono bakatuka zina le Ndzimu, iwo una masimba mu shamu idzedzi, koga abazoshanduka bakaukudza.
Ntumwa we bushanu katebulila kumu ndilo iye mu tjigalo tje bushe tje tjibandana, bushe gwatjo gukabe mu zhalima. Bathu bakazwiluma ndimi ngekuhwa zogwadza,
ngono bakatuka Ndzimu we kudzimu beutukila zogwadza ne malonda amubali, koga abazoshandukila mishingo yabo.
Ntumwa we kudzimu we butathatu katebulila zwi mu ndilo iye mu gwizi gwe Yufuratesi, vula yago yakapkhwa kuzhulila zila boshe bakulu banozha bedwa ku Bhezhuba.
Ngono shule abona meya mitatu mibi inolingika se mazhula, ibhuda mu nlomo we bhophona ne mu nlomo we tjibandana ne mu nlomo we nlebesambeli we manyepkhwa.
Meya iyeyo mibi inoshinga zwilakidzo, inoyenda kuna boshe bakulu be shango yose kunobakubunganyila ngwa mu zhuba gulu le Ndzimu Masimbawose.
“Bonani ndozha se mbava! Kwakakombolegwa iye unogala akalinga, akalulwamisa zwiambalo zwizwe kuti asiyende ali mbujo kubonegwa nge bathu.”
Ndizo meya yakakubunganya boshe bakulu pathu panodang'wa nge lulimi gwe Tjihebheru kuyi Amagedoni.
Ntumwa we kudzimu we butendeka katebulila zwi mu ndilo iye mu phepo, hwi lipezhugwi likadwa mu tjigalo tje bushe mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu liti, “Kwapela.”
Kukabe ne kudadamula ne mahwi ne matutu ne midumo ye makole ne kutengenyeka kwe shango kukulu kusakatongobe yapo mu shango, tjinga bathu kwabakabumbiwa.
Nzi nkulu ukapaluka mbabi thatu, ngono mizi mikulu ye njudzi ikawa. Ndzimu ukaalakana nzi nkulu we Bhabhiloni, ngono ukawukombeledza kung'wa mu tjing'wilo tjawo tje bushongola gwawo.
Zwigwizi zose zwikalobesiwa ne matombo kasiwanike.

Mabgwe makulu kulu e tjivulamabgwe, limwe ne limwe lina ikale tjinolizana ne kilogiramu dzili makumi mashanu, akawa edwa pezhugwi, ewila pezhugwi kwe bathu. Bakatuka Ndzimu, ngobe wakazhisa shamu inotjisa.
Ipapo mmwe we batumwa be kudzimu bali kutendeka bakabe bana ndilo dzili kutendeka, kazha kundili kati, “Izha ngeno ndiwokulakidza kusumikilisiwa kwe fukula iyeyi igele mu vula njinji.
Boshe bakulu bakashinga bupombgwe naye, ngono bagali be shango bakalaladzisiwa ngong'wa nkumbi we bufukula gugwe.”

Ntumwa we kudzimu kandisengela ku tjilambanyika ndili mu Meya. Ikoko ndakabona nkadzi ali gele pezhugwi kwe tjibandana tjishaba, tjili zhele mazina anotuka Ndzimu; tjibandana itjetjo tjakabe tjina misholo ili kutendeka ne nyanga dzili gumi.

Nkadzi iwoyo wakabe akaambala zwiambalo zwe mbala we bushaba gwakabondelela ne nshaba, zwakanakisiwa nge golide nenge mabgwe akanaka anopenya ne ndalama. Mu luboko gugwe wakabe akabhata tjing'wilo tjakathamiwa nge golide, tjili zhele zwithu zwinoshimisa ne shambgwa ye bufukula gugwe.
Mu phazha iye kwakabe kwakakwagwa zina le masazibgwe, “Bhabhiloni nkulu, mme be fukula dzose ne mishingo yose inoshimisa mu shango.”
Ngono ndakabona kuti nkadzi iwoyo wakabe akalaladza nge malopa e bayengemali nenge malopa e bakafila kutendekela Jesu.
Ndakati ndimbona, akaabala kwazo.
Koga ntumwa we Kudzimu kandibhuzwa kati, “Ini wakakaabala? Ndowokutjenesela ngekwe masazibgwe e nkadzi iwoyu ne tjibandana tjaakatatha tjina misholo ili kutendeka ne nyanga dzili gumi.

Tjibandana itjetjije tjawabona tjakatongobe yapo ngono ngwenu atjitjipo, tjowobhuda mu gomba lisina palinoma, ngono tjowoyenda kunoloba. Bagali be shango, bana mazina asakakwagwa mu lukwalo gwe butjilo kudwa mu kuteyiwa kwe shango banowotjenamila kutjibona, ngobe tjakabe tjili yapo, ngono ngwenu tjisitjipo koga ngono tjitjowobe yapo.
“Ikoku koshaka una butjenjedu. Misholo ili kutendeka matombo ali kutendeka agegwe pezhugwi nge nkadzi iwoyo.
Kuna boshe bakulubo bali kutendeka. Bashanu babo bakawa, ng'ompela uyapo, mmwe aathu kazha; ha ezha unowobepo lubaka gushomanana koga.
Ngono tjibandana itjetjo tjakatongo bepo, koga ngwenu tjisipo ndi she nkulu we buzhanakadzi. Mmwe we bali kutendeka, koga unoyenda kunolobesiwa.
“Manyanga ali gumi awabona ndi boshe bakulu bali gumi basathu bakaamutjila bushe, ngono banowoamutjila masimba kubusa awara i nng'ompela ne tjibandana itjetjo.
Ibaba nge bugumi gwabo, bana mazwimisilo mang'ompela, banopa tjibandana simba labo ne bushe gwabo.
Banowogwa ne Pkhwizana, koga Pkhwizana inowobakunda, ngobe ndi She wa boshe, ndi She nkulu wa boshe bakulu, baanabo nge bakadang'wa bakashalugwa, banogagwabgwe.”
Ntumwa we kudzimu kati kundili, “Vula dzawabona dzigegwe ne fukula, zwitjaba ne mibunga ye bathu nenge ndimi.
Nyanga dzili gumi dzawabona ne tjibandana dzowobenga fukula iyeyo, dzowotola tjimwe ne tjimwe tjainatjo, ngono dzikaisiya ili mbujo, dzowoja nyama ye mbili wayo, dzikampisa nge moto,
Ndzimu wakalonga mu mimoyo yabo kuda kwawo kuti kushingikale mazwimisilo awo ngoshinga bedumana, beyisa mibuso yabo pasi kwe tjibandana kudzina kose kumu dama le Ndzimu kushingikale.
“Nkadzi wawabona, nzi iwowuje nkulu unobusa boshe bakulu be shango.”
Shule kwa ikoku ndakabona mmwe ntumwa we kudzimu edeluka edwa kudzimu ana masimba makulu, ngono tjedza tjitje tjakapenyesa shango yose.
Kalebeleka nge hwi lina masimba eti, “Wawa, wawa nzi nkulu Bhabhiloni! Wabe bugalo gwe meya mibi, yabe makotokelo e meya mmwe ne mmwe wakabipa. Nyuni dzose mbimbi dzinoshimika dzokotokela muuli.

Ngoti zwitjaba zose zwakang'wa nkumbi we shambgwa ye bufukula gugwe. Boshe bakulu be shango bakathama bupombgwe naye, balume banoshaba be shango bakafumiswa nge nyota iye ye kube ne tjimwe ne tjimwe isingalaugwe.”
Ipapo ahwa limwe hwi lidwa kudzimu liti,
“Bhudani munli bathu bangu,
musitongo dwa mushanganyila zwibi naye,
mungadwa mushanganyila shamu naye.
Ngoti zwibi zwizwe akabutitikwa kanoswika kudzimu,
ndizo Ndzimu auzokangang'wa matjinyo awe.
Munthamile koga sekwa akamuthamila.
Munlipe kabili muna kose kwaakathama.
Muzhadze tjing'wilo tjitje nge tjing'o
tjakabila kabili kupinda tjing'o tjaakamuthamila.
Munhwise zogwadza ne buyendasi gunolizana
kuzwikudza kukwe nenge kuja eng'wa fumwa yaakazwipa.
Se ezwidwa mu moyo uwe eti,
‘Ndigele ipapa ndili shekadzi!
Ate ndili tjilikadzi,
tjililo andingatjibone.’
Ndizo shamu dzidze dzowozha mu zhuba ling'ompela,
Lufu ne tjililo ne zhala.
Ngono unowopisiwa nge moto,
ngoti She Ndzimu una masimba unowonsumikilisa.”
Boshe bakulu be shango bakashinga bupombgwe naye beshanganyila kuja ne kung'wa, banowolila bakakuwa nge kukwe ha bebona busi gwe kutshwa kukwe.
Banowomila kule kule, betjisiwa nge kuhwisiwa zogwadza kukwe, ngono banowoti, “Yee mme wee! Yee mme wee! Wapalala iwe nzi nkulu, usinshoma Bhabhiloni! Wasumikilisiwa mu awara i nng'ompela.”
Batengesi be thundu be shango banowonlilila ngobe akutjina unowotenga thundu dzabo kakale.

Thundu ye golide ne siliva ne maseka akanaka ne mabgwe ne ndalama ne matyila akanaka ne jila le mbala we bushaba gwakabondelela ne jila linotedzemuka ne jila shaba le themba ipezhugwi ne zwizholo ne zwinonuhwisa zwinozipa milenje lenje ye hwuni dze themba ipezhugwi ne nyanga dze zhowu ne bhurasi ne dzitshipi ne mabgwe matjena anopenya;
ne sinamoni ne motsha ne mafuta anonuhwa zwinozipa ne nkumbi ne mafuta e ntjelo we ntoba, bgwisa gwe tjiwunga, mbewu, ng'ombe, pkhwizi, mbizi, koloyi, balanda kudwa kuti bathu.
Zwithu zose zwakalulwama zwawakabe uyemula kube nazo zwakulashikila, ngono nenge fumwa iyo yose ne bubuya gugo kwayenda, ngono autowofa wazwibona kakale.
Batengesi bakawana fumwa ngotengesa mu nli banowomila kule kule, ngoti banotja kuhwisiwa zogwadza kukwe. Banowolila bekuwila pezhugwi.

Ngono banoti “Yee mme wee! Yee mme wee! Wapalala nzi iwoyu nkulu wakabe wakaambala ntjeka wakanaka ne jila le mbala we bushaba gwakabondelela ne jila shaba le themba ipezhugwi, ngono ezwinakisa nge golide ne mabgwe anopenya ne ndalama!
Ngono walashikigwa nge fumwa iye yose mu awara i nng'ompela koga.”
Bayendisi bose be zwikepe ne balauli babo ne batengesi banoyenda nge zwikepe, na ibabo banoseyenya nge zwikepe mu gungwa bakamila kule kule,
ngono bakalila ha bebona busi gwe kutshwa kukwe beti, “Ndiupi nzi nkulu wakatongonga iwoyu nzi nkulu kene?”

Bakadila hwuluba mu misholo yabo, bakalila, bakangina mu buyendasi beti, “Yee mme wee! Yee mme wee! Wapalala nzi nkulu! Iwo wakati bose bana zwikepe zwinotendeleka mu gungwa bakazwifumisa nge fumwa yawo. Mu awara i nng'ompela walashikigwa nge tjimwe ne tjimwe.”
Shathani nge kwawo ba kudzimu. Shathani bayengemali ne batumwa* ba Jesu ne balebesambeli, ngoti Ndzimu wamusumikilisila iye.

Ngono shule ntumwa we kudzimu, una masimba kanunga bgwe linonga gwiyo gulu, ngono kaliposela mu gungwa eti, “Eyi ndiyo zila inowoti nzi nkulu una masimba Bhabhiloni, ukaposegwa pasi nge masimba, ngono autowofa wabong'wa kakale.

Zwitinkani ne kumba kwe bathu ne balidzi be nyele ne lunyanga, akutjowobuya kukahwika mukuli kakale, akuna nshingi upi kene upi utjowofa abong'wa mukuli kakale, ngono ne zhoba ye gwiyo aitjowopapha ikahwika kakale.

Akutjowobuya kukaboneka kakale tjedza tje luvone mukati kuko. Akutjowobuya kukahwika kakale mahwi e balongo ne e baloboli mukuli. Batengesi babo be thundu bakabe bali ibo bakulu mu shango yose, ngono nge butjenjedu gwenyu gwe malipa, makatjebela zwitjaba zose zwe shango.”
Mu Bhabhiloni kwakawanika malopa e balebesambeli ne e bayengemali ne e bathu bose bakabulawa mu shango.
Shule kwa ikoku ndakahwa kunonga mahwi apezhugwi e bathu banjinji kudzimu epululudza eti, “Haleluya! Jidzo ne gudzo ne masimba nge zwe Ndzimu wedu.
Kusumikilisa kwawo kuna lebeswa ne ndulamo.* Wakasumikilisa fukula yakabe itjinya shango nge bufukula gwayo, Ndzimu wakambgwilizila ngekwe malopa e balanda bawo.”
Bakapululudza kakale beti “Haleluya! Busi gunodwa munli goyenda pezhugwi nge kusingapele.”
Bakulu bali makumi mabili ana bathu banna ne zwibumbiwa zwinna bakawila pasi bakanamata Ndzimu, ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe, bakati, “Ngakujalo. Haleluya!”
Kukadwa hwi mu tjigalo tje bushe lipululudza liti, “Kudzani Ndzimu wedu imwi balanda bawo bose ne bathu bose banoulumbidza, bose batukununu ne bakulukulu.”
Ipapo ahwa kwakabe kunga mahwi e bathu banjinji, ehwika enga kuwona kwe vula njinji kakale enga vula inodadamula kwazo, epululudza eti “Haleluya! Ngoti She Ndzimu wedu Masimbawose unobusa.
Ngatishatheni tipululudze tiukudzeni, ngobe tjabe tjibaka tje ndobolo ye Pkhwizana, ndizo nlongo uwe wazwilulwamisila iyo.
Wapiwa zwiambalo zwibuyanana zwe jila lakanaka linopenya.” Jila ileli mishingo mibuyanana ye bayengemali.

Ntumwa we kudzimu kandidwa kati, “Ukwale tjandinokubudza, ‘Bakakombolegwa ibabo bakakokiwa ku zojiwa zwe madekwana zwe nzano we ndobolo ye Pkhwizana.’ ” Kati kakale kundili, “Awa matama e malebeswa e Ndzimu.”

Ndakawila pasi mbeli kwe makumbo awe kuti ndinnamate, ngono kati kundili, “Usitongo thama ikoku! Imi ndi nlanda sawe ne zwikamu zwizo zwina butendeki gwa Jesu. Namata Ndzimu.” Ngobe butendeki gwa Jesu meya ye bulebesambeli.
Abe ndibona kudzimu kuzhuka, ngono kukaboneka mbizi tjena ntathi wayo unodang'wa N'galikabgwe, kakale eyi Malebeswa. Unosumikilisa nge ndulamo kakale ebe egwa.
Mesho awe anonga nthuto we moto, ngono wakabe akaambala zwialana zwe bushe zwinjinji mu nsholo uwe, una zina lakakwagwa munli lisina unoliziba ha isi iye koga.
Wakaambala hazu yakadubikiwa mu malopa, ngono zina laanodang'wa ndilo koyi “Dama le Ndzimu.”
Babhayani be kudzimu bakaambala zwiambalo zwitjena zwibuyanana, bakantobela bakatatha mbizi tjena.
Mu nlomo uwe kobhuda bukanu gunopitsha gwaanotema zwitjaba ndigo, ngono unowobabusa nge ikombo tje tshipi, unowokobola zhambi mu dolo le bushongola gunotjisa gwe Ndzimu Masimbawose.
Mu hazu iye, pezhugwi kwe tjidzwa, kwakakwagwa zina linobalika sahwoku, “She nkulu wa boshe bakulu kakale She wa boshe.”
Ipapo abona ntumwa we kudzimu ali mile mu zhuba. Ngono kamilidza hwi kadana nyuni dzose dzinowuluka pezhugwi eti, “Izhani mukubunganile zojiwa zwe madekwana zwe Ndzimu.
Muje zwitumbu zwa boshe bakulu ne bakulu be dzingwa ne zwe balume bakasima. Zwitumbu zwe mbizi ne zwe batathi badzo ne zwe bathu bose, balanda ne basununguki, bakulu ne batukununu.”
Abona tjibandana na boshe bakulu be shango ne babhayani babo, bakubungana kugwa na iwoyo wakatatha mbizi ne babhayani babe.

Ngono tjibandana tjakabhakhwa kang'ompela ne nlebesambeli we manyepkhwa, iwoyo wakabe ethama zwilakidzo mu mesho atjo akatjebela ibabo bakaamutjila lutjwayo gwe tjibandana, na ibabo bakabe benamata ifano tjatjo. Nlebesambeli iwoyo ne tjibandana itjetjo bakaposegwa betjila mu gakhwa le moto unothutidziwa nge mabgwe anodang'wa salifa.
Bamwe bose basala bakabulawa nge bukanu gwa iye wakatatha mbizi, bukanu gunobhuda mu nlomo uwe. Nyuni dzakaja zwitumbu zwabo dzikaguta kwadzakazwimbigwa.
Kudwa ipapo abona ntumwa we kudzimu edeluka edwa kudzimu akabhata tjizhulo tje gomba lakangina kusina tjilizanyo mu luboko gugwe ne ketani hwulu hwulu.
Kabe ebhata bhophona, nyoka yakale, inodang'wa Nvanganyi, Satani, kailonga mu busungwa nge kwe makole ali tjiwulu tjing'ompela (1000).

Kaiposela mu gomba, ngono kalizhalila kalikhiya, kuti ndizo lisitjatubule kutjebela bathu, kakale kudzina makole ali tjiwulu tjing'ompela apinda. Shule kwa ipapo lakafanila kusunungugwa kwe tjibaka tjifupi.

Ipapo abona zwigalo zwe bushe, ngono zwiligegwe nge bakapiwa masimba e kusumikilisa. Ndakabonabo meya ya ibabo bakabe bathubugwa mitshibha, bebulayigwa butendeki gwa Jesu ne dama le Ndzimu, ibo basakatongonamata tjibandana kene ifano tjatjo, kene iko kuamutjila lutjwayo gwatjo mu phazha dzabo kene mu maboko abo. Bakamuka mu bafi bakabusa na Kirisiti makole ali tjiwulu tjing'ompela (1000).
Bafi bakasala abazomusiwa kuswikila makole ali tjiwulu tjing'ompela apinda. Ikoku ndiko kumuka kwe bafi kwe kutanga.

Wakakombolegwa kakale wakayengemala iwoyo unowobe mu kumusiwa kwe bafi kwe kutanga. Lufu gwe bubili aguna masimba muna ibabo, banowobe Bapirisiti be Ndzimu na Kirisiti, ngono banowobusa naye makole ali tjiwulu tjing'ompela.
Shule kwe makole ali tjiwulu tjing'ompela Satani unowosunungugwa mu ng'umba iye ye busungwa.
Ngono unowoyenda kanotjebela zwitjaba zwimu mbizho nna dze shango, kudwa kuti Gogo na Magogo, ku bakubunganyila ngwa. Bunji gwabo gonga nsetje we gungwa.
Bakathubulanya nge shango yose, ngono bakakomba bugalo gwe bayengemali ne nzi nkulu unodika. Koga moto wakadeluka udwa kudzimu ukabapisa.
Ngono Nvanganyi iye wakabatjebela kalashigwa mu gakhwa le moto ne salifa, kuna tjibandana ne nlebesambeli we manyepkhwa, banowohwisiwa zogwadza siku ne sikati nge kusingapele.
Ipapo abona tjigalo tje bushe tjitjena tjikulu, na iye ugele pezhugwi kwatjo. Shango ne zhuzhugwi zwikantizha ngono zwikasitjabong'we kakale.

Ngono abona bafi bakulukulu ne batukununu, bali mile mbeli kwe tjigalo tje bushe, ngono hwalo dzikazhugwa. Lukwalo naigobo gukazhugwabo, guli lukwalo gwe butjilo. Bafi bakasumikilisiwa kuyendidzana nge mishingo yabo sekwa kwakabe kwakakwagwa mu hwalo idzedzo.
Gungwa likadusa bafi bakabe bali mulili, Lufu ne Ikumbu zwikadusa bafi bakabe bali muzwili ngono bose bakasumikilisiwa kuyendidzana ne mishingo yabo.
Ipapo Lufu ne Ikumbu zwikaposegwa mu gakhwa le moto, ogu ndigo lufu gwe bubili, gungwa gwe moto.
Mmwe ne mmwe usakakwagwa zina mu lukwalo gwe butjilo wakaposegwa mu gungwa gwe moto.
Kudwa ipapo abona kudzimu kutshwa ne shango tshwa, ngobe kudzimu kwe kutanga ne shango ye kutanga zwakabe zwapinda, ne gungwa lisitjipo.
Ngono ndakabona nzi nkulu wakayengemala, Jerusalema tshwa, ideluka idwa kudzimu ku Ndzimu yakalulwamisiwa se nlongo wakanakisigwa nlume uwe.

Ndakahwa hwi lilebelekela pezhugwi libhuda mu tjigalo tje bushe liti, “Bona, bugalo gwe Ndzimu gwabe mu bathu. Unowogala nabo, ngono banowobe bathu bawo. Ndzimu nge kwawo unowobe nabo, ukabe Ndzimu wabo.
Unowobukusha mishodzi yose mu mesho abo, akutjawobe ne lufu kakale, akutjawobe ne buyendasi kene tjililo kene tjibhayo, ngoti zwe kutanga azwitjipo.”
Ngono iwoyo ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe kalebeleka eti, “Bona, ndothama zwithu zose butshwa.” Kandidwa kakale kati, “Kwala ikoku, ngoti matama iyawa anogalikabgwe, malebeswa.”
Ngono kati “Kwashingwa kwawila. Ndimi we kutanga newe bupelo, budwilo ne bhelelo. Mmwe ne mmwe una nyota ndowompa ndetjedzelo ye kung'wa mu nsenya we vula ye butjilo kuzhe kwe thengo.
Iye unokunda, unowoamutjila ikoku, ndowobe Ndzimu uwe, ngono iye unowobe mwanangu.

Koga magwala ne basingagalemoyo ne bana shambgwa ne babulayi be bathu ne phombgwe ne banothama malipa* ne banonamata midzimu ne banyepi, mbhayilo wabo unowobe mu gakhwa lina moto ne salifa, ogu ndigo lufu gwe bubili.”
Ndizo kukazha mmwe we batumwa be kudzimu bali kutendeka bakabe bana ndilo dzizhele shamu dze bupelo dzili kutendeka, kalebeleka nami eti, “Izha, ndowokulakidza nlongo, nkadzi we Pkhwizana.”
Kandisenga ndili mu Meya kandiyisa pezhugwi kwe dombo lefu lefu kandilakidza nzi nkulu wakayengemala, Jerusalema udeluka udwa kudzimu ku Ndzimu,
una gudzo le Ndzimu. Tjedza tjawo tjipenya se bgwe le themba ipezhugwi, se jasipa,* tjibonengela se deemani.

Wakabe una guma gulu gulu lefu lefu lina mikoba ili gumi lina mibili, kuna batumwa be kudzimu bali gumi lina babili pa mikoba iyeyi. Mu zwizhalilo kwakakwagwa mazina e njudzi gumi lina mbili dze bana be Iziraela.
Kwakabe kuna mikoba ili mitatu ku Bhezhuba; mikoba ili mitatu ku Bunandzwa; mikoba ili mitatu ku Burwa; mikoba ili mitatu ku Golombedzo.
Guma le nzi nkulu iwoyo lakabe lakabakigwa pezhugwi kwe thiwa dzili gumi lina mbili, pezhugwi kwadzo kwakakwagwa mazina e batumwa be Pkhwizana bali gumi lina babili, ibo batumwa ba Jesu.
Ntumwa we kudzimu wakalebeleka nami wakabe ana lukombo gwakathamiwa nge golide kulizanya nzi nkulu ne mikoba yayo ne guma layo.

Nzi nkulu unolizana bupabi ne bulefu, ngono kalizanya nzi nkulu nge lukombo gugwe, khilomitha dzili zwiwulu zwibili ne mazana manna (2400) bulefu. Bulefu ne bupabi ne bulefu kuyenda pezhugwi kolizana.
Guma nailo kalilizanya, ngono lakabe lili mitha dzili makumi ali kutathatu kuyenda pezhugwi, kudumilana ne tjilizanyo tje bathu, kodwa tje ntumwa we kudzimu.
Guma lakabe lakathamwa nge jasipa, koga nzi nkulu ngekwawo wakabe wakabumbiwa nge golide mbuyanana, inobonengela se halasi.
Thiwa dze guma le nzi nkulu dzakabe dzakanakisiwa nge milenje yose ye mabgwe e themba ipezhugwi akanaka. Thiwa ye kutanga lakabe lili bgwe le jasipa, le bubili lili safaya,* le butatu lili agate

le bushanu lili onikisi,* le butathatu lili kaneliyeni, le kutendeka lili kirisoliti, le zhanakadzi lili bherili,* le zhanalume lili topazi,* le bugumi lili kalisedoni,* le bugumi lina kung'ompela lili tukoisi,

Mikoba ili gumi lina mibili mabgwe mabuya anothama ndalama ali gumi lina mabili; nkoba ng'ompela wakathamiwa nge bgwe buya ling'ompela. Zila i mu nzi nkulu nge ye golide mbuyanana inobonengela se halasi.
Andizobona ng'umba ye Ndzimu mu nzi nkulu, ngoti ng'umba yawo ye Ndzimu ndi She Ndzimu Masimbawose ne Pkhwizana.
Nzi nkulu autosheta kube ne zhuba mu uli kene mwedzi kupenya mu uli, ngobe gudzo le Ndzimu lopenya mu uli, Pkhwizana iyo luvone gwayo.
Zwitjaba zwe shango zowoyenda nge tjedza tjawo ngono boshe bakulu be shango banowozhisa fumwa dzabo mu uli.
Mikoba ye nzi nkulu aitowozhaligwa masikati, kakale akutowobe ne busiku ikweno.
Gudzo ne dendo gudzo le zwitjaba zwe shango yose zowozhisiwa mu nzi nkulu.
Koga akuna tjakatemapala tjinowongina mu nzi nkulu, kene ali ani unoshinga zwithu zwinobhatisa shoni kene unoleba manyepkhwa, koga kowongina be mazina akakwagwa mu lukwalo gwe Pkhwizana gwe butjilo.
Ntumwa wakandilakidzabo gwizi gwe vula ye butjilo, ingadzima se deemani, idwa mu tjigalo tje bushe tje Ndzimu ne tje Pkhwizana,

guwunga na pakati kwe zila imu nzi nkulu, mu phili dzago dzose seli eyi na eyija kwakamela nti we butjilo, unozwala mitjelo kagumi lina kabili nge gole kang'ompela nge mwedzi, ngono mazhani awo anopodza zwitjaba.
Akutjawobe ne bhiso kakale.
Tjigalo tje bushe tje Ndzimu ne Pkhwizana tjowobe tjili muuli, ngono balanda bawo banowounamata.
Banowobona buso gwawo, ngono ne zina lawo lowobe lakakwagwa mu phazha dzabo.
Akutjawobe ne busiku kakale, ngono abatjowoshaka mavone kene tjedza tje zhuba, ngobe She Ndzimu unowobe ali tjedza tjabo, ngono banowobusa nge kusingapele kose.

Ntumwa we kudzimu kandidwa kati, “Matama iyawa anogalikabgwe, malebeswa. Ngono She, Ndzimu we meya ye balebesambeli watuma ntumwa uwe we kudzimu kuwolakidza balanda babe tjakafanila shingikala mu misi ipejo pejo.”
“Koga bonani, ndozha tjinyolotjo. Kwakakombolegwa iye unolondolodza matama e ndebelombeli imu lukwalo igogu.”
Imi Johani, ndimi ndakabona ahwa zwithu izwezwi. Ngono ndakati ndizwihwa ne kuzwibona awila pasi kunamata pa makumbo e ntumwa we kudzimu wakandilakidza izwezwi zwithu,
koga kandidwa kati, “Usikushinge, ndi nlanda sawe ne zwikamu zwizo, ibo balebesambeli, koga sa bose banolondolodza matama a mu lukwalo igogu. Namata Ndzimu.”
Ngono wakati kundili, “Usitongo zhalila matama e ndebelombeli e lukwalo igogu ngoti tjibaka tjabe pejo.
Iye usakalulwama, ngaadwilile asakalulwama; iye una shambgwa ngaadwilile ana shambgwa, na iye wakalulwama ngaadwilile ethama zwakalulwama na iye wakayengemala ngaadwilile akayengemala.”
“Bonani, ndaswika tjinyolotjo, ndozha ne mbhayilo wangu kulipa mmwe ne mmwe sekwa akashinga.
Ndimi wekutanga ne we bupelo, ndimi kutangisa ne bupelo.”
Kwakakombolegwa ibabo banosuka hazu dzabo, kuti ndizo babe ne fanilo dze kuja ntjelo we nti we butjilo nenge kuti bangine mu nzi nkulu nge mikoba.
Ngono kuzhe kuna mbgwa ne malipa ne phombgwe ne babulayi be bathu ne banonamata midzimu ne banoda kunyepa.
“Imi Jesu ndatuma ntumwa wangu we kudzimu kukuli nge butendeki kugupa makubungano. Ndimi we lutshinga gwa Dafite, kakale ndi nyenyedzi inopenya ye Masasi.”
Meya ne Nlongo banoti, “Izha.”
Ngakuti iye unohwa ati, “Izha.”
Iye una nyota ngaazhe. Iye unoshaka ngaatole vula ye butjilo kuzhe kwe thengo.
Imi Johani, ndotjenjedza mmwe ne mmwe, unohwa matama iyawa e ndebelombeli ye lukwalo igogu; ha mmwe angaapaphidza, Ndzimu unowompaphidzila shamu dzalebgwa mu lukwalo igogu.

Koga ha mmwe angadusa tjimwe mu matama e ndebelombeli iyeyi ye lukwalo igogu, Ndzimu unowontolela gobe lile le ntjelo we nti we butjilo ne le nzi nkulu wakayengemala, izo zwinolegwa nge kwazo mu lukwalo igogu.
Iye unopa butendeki ngekwe zwithu izwezwi kati “Ee, tjose ndozha tjinyolotjo.”
Ngakujalo. Izhani, She Jesu.
Ngoni dza She Jesu ngadzibe ne bayengemali bose. Ngakujalo.
Kwakakombolegwa iye nthu
usingatobele gumbuludzo le babi
kene kuli kuyenda mu zila ye batjinyi,
kene kuli kushanganyila ne badadi.
Koga shatho imu nlayo wa Yahwe,
ngono unokumbula nlayo
wa Yahwe siku ne sikati.
Unonga nti wakadzwagwa mu wunde
ye hwobana dzinowunga vula,
unozwala mitjelo yawo mu nsi wakalingisana,
ne mazhani awo aatobuna.
Tjimwe ne tjimwe tjaanothama tjodwilila.
Babi abate bali saikoko,
koga banonga bunye gunowulusiwa nge phepo.
Ndizo babi abatowomilana ne sumikiliso,
batjinyi abangame mu gubungano le bayengemali,
Ngobe Yahwe banotjengeta zila dze bayengemali,
koga zila dze babi dzowoloba.
Ini zwitjaba zwilangana,
ne bathu banolukilani tjishwe suli?
Boshe bakulu be shango bakazwimisa zubuyanana,
ne babusi banokumbuludzana,
kumukila Yahwe ne Nzhodziwa wabo beti,
“Ngatithubuleni mitjili yabo,
tiduse misungo yabo mu tili.”
Iye ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe
kudzimu unoseka;
Yahwe banobaseka maanya.
Ndizo banowolebeleka nabo
mu bushongola gwabo,
bakabatjisa mu kugwadzamoyo kwabo,
beti, “Ndakabiga she nkulu wangu
pezhugwi kwe Ziyoni,
dombo langu lakayengemala.”
Ndowoleba patjena tjakalebgwa ndi Yahwe,
bakati kundili, “Unkololo wangu,
nasi ndabe tate babo.
Undikumbile, ndowokupa
zwitjaba zose zwikabe thaka iyo,
ne mbizho dze shango
dzowobe dzidzo.
Unowobapkhwanya nge swimbo ye tshipi,
ukabapkhwanya se zwiyenga zwe jegwa.”
Ndizo ngwenu, imwi boshe bakulu, tjenjelani;
Ndomuluma zebe, imwi balauli be shango.
Shingilani Yahwe nge kutja,
nge kuzwiyisa pasi.
Iwani nge zwidwi mu namate Nkololo,
asidwe egwadzamoyo,
mube mulobesiwa mu zila dzenyu.
Bakashatha bose banotizhila mu nli.
Yahwe, zwita zwangu zwinjinji seni!
Banji banondimukila;
Banji banoleba ngekwangu beti,
“Akuna bhatsho yaangawana mu Ndzimu.”
Koga imwi, Yahwe,
mu tjivikili tjakandipoteleka,
ndimwi gudzo langu, nsimisi wangu.
Ndomilidza hwi ndidana Yahwe,
ngono banondidabila
bali mu dombo labo lakayengemala.
Ndolala ayizela wope,
amuka kakale ngobe
Yahwe banondibhatsha.
Anditotja bathu
bali zwiwulu zwili gumi (10 000)
bakandipoteleka bendigwisa.
Milikani Yahwe!
Mundigwile Ndzimu wangu!
Mupkhwaule zwita zwangu zose,
mu lushaya muvune meno e babi.
Jidzo nge la Yahwe;
Makombolelo enyu
ngaabe mu bathu benyu!
Mundidabile, andimudana
Ndzimu we ndulamo yangu.
Makandinyaladza mu kudziyidzika
kwangu mundihwile ngoni,
mu amutjile ntembezelo wangu.
Imwi bathu, kowodzina kukabe lini,
tetiwa kwangu kulengudziwa kene?
Mowoda matama asina nshingo kuswikila lini,
kakale mutatana ne manyepkhwa?
Koga zibani kuti Yahwe
bakazwishalulila balulwami;
Yahwe banowohwa andibadana.
Gwadzanimoyo, koga musithame tjibi;
muti mulilele mukumbule,
tje mu mimoyo yenyu koga munyalale.
Dusani zwibhayilo zwakalulwama,
mugalebgwe muna Yahwe.
Kuna banjinji banoti,
“Ndiani ungatilakidza tjimwe tjakanaka kene?
Yahwe tjedza tje buso gwenyu ngatjitipenyele!”
Makandipa kushatha kukulu mu moyo wangu
kunopinda kwabanako ha mathunde
abo ne mikumbi yabo zwilizhele.
Ndowolala pasi ayizela nge kunyalala;
ngobe imwi moga Yahwe,
ndimwi makanditjengeta!
Bhulutanani mahwi angu Yahwe,
muhweni tjililo tjangu.
Hwililani tjililo tjangu, She nkulu wangu,
kakale muli Ndzimu wangu,
ngobe ndolingisa mitembezelo yangu kumuli.
Yahwe, mangwanana mohwa hwi langu,
mu mangwanana ndoyisa mitembezelo
yangu ku muli, ngono ndibe ndilindila.
Amute muli Ndzimu unoda mbipo;
bubi agungagale namwi.
Banozwikudza habangame pa mesho enyu.
Mobenga babi bose.
Molobesa ibabo banonyepa
Yahwe banoshima bathu
banotebula lopa ne banotjebela.
Koga imi nge ludo gwenyu bukulu,
ndowongina mu ng'umba yenyu,
ndowonamata ndimuteta
ndakalinga ku ng'umba yenyu,
Yahwe, munditungamile mu ndulamo yenyu,
ngekwe zwita zwangu.
Tambunudzani zila yenyu mbeli kwangu.
Ngobe akuna lebeswa
linodwa mu milomo yabo,
mimoyo yabo igolomodzo.
Hwulo dzabo zwikumbu zwakaashama,
banotjebela nge ndimi dzabo.
Thamani kuti basengane
ne matjinyo abo Ndzimu.
Ngabaligwe nge milangano yabo,
mubatatile kutjena ngekwe matjinyo
abo manji, ngoti bakamupandukila.
Koga bose banotizhila ku muli
ngababe ne kushatha,
ngabambe misi yose nge kushatha.
Mutalabudze mbakililo yenyu mubali,
kuti ndizo ibabo banoda
zina lenyu bakudziwe mu muli.
Ngoti mokombolela balulwami Yahwe;
mobavikila se tjivikili.
Yahwe, musinditjemele makagwadzamoyo,
kene kundiloba muli zhele bushongola.
Mundihwile ngoni Yahwe,
ndapelegwa nge matatabuko;
Yahwe mundipodze,
ngobe mafupa angu anotetema ngotja.
Meya yangu inodziyidzika.
Koga imwi Yahwe, kowobelini?
Shandukani Yahwe, munditjidze,
mundisunungule ngekwe
ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike.
Ngobe akuna ungaalakana nge kwenyu afa,
mu bugalo gwe bafi ndiani ungamukudza kene?
Ndanyadziwa nge kulila kwangu;
busiku gumwe ne gumwe,
ndonyolodza bulalo gwangu nge mishodzi;
Ndozhadza nsazamilo wangu nge mishodzi.
Mesho angu aatjabona
nge zila ye kuhwazogwadza;
anopelegwa nge simba,
ngekwe zwita zwangu zose.
Idwani pandili, imwi bashingi be mbipo,
ngobe Yahwe bahwa tjililo tjangu.
Yahwe bahwa tjililo tjangu.
Yahwe banoamutjila mitembezelo yangu.
Zwita zwangu zose
zowobhakhwa nge shoni zwikadziyidzika.
Banowoshanduka bakabhakhwa nge shoni.
Yahwe Ndzimu wangu,
ndotizhila kumuli.
Munditjidze mundigwile
muna bakandisala shule,
kusajalo banowondipalulanya
se shumba, bendikwebakwebanya,
kusina unondigwila.
Yahwe Ndzimu wangu,
ha kuli kuti ndakathama ikoku,
ha kuli kuti kuna nlandu mu ndili,
ha kuli kuti ndakabgwilizila
una mbakiso nami nge mbipo,
kene kuli kuti ndakatapila tjita
tjangu ndisayi tjimwe,
ha kwakajalo, tjita tjangu ngatjitatane nami,
tjindibhate tjitshambile butjilo gwangu
pasi nge makumbo tjindiladzike mu hwuluba.
Milikani Yahwe,
mu kugwadzamoyo kwenyu!
Milikani mugwe ne bushongola
gwe zwita zwangu!
Milikani, Ndzimu wangu,
ngobe makabiga zhuba le sumikiliso.
Gubungano le bathu bose,
ngalikubungane kumupoteleka;
Mubalaule muli mu tjigalo tjenyu.
Yahwe ndibo nsumikilisi we bathu bose,
mundisumikilise kunoyendidzana
ne ndulamo yangu Yahwe
nenge kuyendidzana
ne kusheta nlandu kwangu!
Thamani kuti bubi gwe babi gupele,
koga musimise balulwami,
imwe munoshakisisa mikumbulo ne mimoyo,
imwi Ndzimu wakalulwama.
Ndzimu ndiwo tjivikili tjangu
iwo unotjidza bana mimoyo
yakatambunuka.
Ndzimu nsumikilisi wakalulwama,
Ndzimu unolakidza bushongola
gwawo mazhuba wose.
Ha nthu asingashanduke,
Ndzimu unowokuswa thumo lawo,
ukapeta dati le misebe.
Wakalulwamisa mathumo
awo anobulaya,
unolulwamisa misebe ikanga moto.
Bonani njalakang'wa dze bathu babi
sekwa dzizhele mbipo,
Bakazwisenga bubi,
bakazwala manyepkhwa,
banotsha gomba bakalivukula,
ngono bakawila mu gomba labatsha ibo.
Sahwa kwabo kohwisa ibo zogwadza,
da gwa kwabo kowodelukila mu misholo yabo.
Ndowoboka Yahwe ngekwe ndulamo yabo,
ndowomba ndikudza zina la Yahwe,
ibo bapezhugwi pezhugwi.
Yahwe, She wedu,
zina lenyu lakanaka seni mu shango yose!
Makabiga gudzo lenyu pezhugwi
kwe mazhuzhugwi!
Nge milomo ye zwitole ne ngawana,
makathama kuti mukudziwe.
Makazwivikilila mu zwita zwenyu.
Mozhalila nlomo we tjita newe mbgwilizili.
Ha ndilinga mazhuzhugwi enyu,
amakathama nge maboko enyu,
mwedzi ne nyenyedzi
dzamakagadza nge magalo adzo;
nthu ini kene wamungashwa mukumbula,
mwana we nthu ini kene
wamungashwa makatjengeta?
Makanthama kabe pasi
kwe batumwa be kudzimu kuli kutukununu,
makammbadza gudzo ne dendo.
Makampa ndaulo mu tjimwe ne tjimwe
tjamakabumba nge maboko enyu,
mukabiga tjimwe ne tjimwe pasi kukwe:
kose pkhwizi ne ng'ombe
nenge phuka dze shango,
nyuni dzinowuluka ne hwobe dze gungwa,
ne zwitjili zose zwinobhukutja mu gungwa.
Yahwe She wedu zina lenyu
ligulu seni mu shango yose!
Ndowokudza Yahwe nge moyo wangu wose
ndowoleba ngekwe mishingo
yenyu yose inotjenamisa!
Ndowoshatha apembela nge kwenyu,
Ndowomba njimbo dzinokudza
zina lenyu imwi mu Pezhugwi zhugwi.
Zwita zwangu zowoti zwishanduka,
zwikakuthiwa zwikaloba mbeli kwenyu.
Ngoti malakidza kutambunuka kwangu,
mukagala tjigalo tjenyu tje bushe
mukasumikilisa nge ndulamo.
Makatjemela zwitjaba,
mukalobesa babi,
mukabukusha mazina abo tjose.
Zwita azwitjipo,
makakolomodza mizi yazo yabe matongo,
abatowotjaalakang'wa kakale.
Koga Yahwe banobusa nge kusingapele,
bakalulwamisila tjigalo tjabo
tje bushe kusumikilisa.
Banosumikilisa shango nge ndulamo,
banolaula njudzi nge ndulamo.
Yahwe i dizhilo le bakatshambilidziwa,
i dizhilo lakasima mu misi ye manikano.
Ibabo banoziba zina lenyu
banogalabgwe mu muli.
Ngobe Yahwe,
amutolasha banomushaka!
Mbilani Yahwe njimbo dzinokudza,
ibo banobusa mu Ziyoni,
budzani njudzi mishingo yabo.
Ngoti Ndzimu unobgwilizila lopa
latebugwa unobakumbula,
abatokangang'wa tjililo tje banodziyidziwa.
Ibeni nge ngoni mu ndili Yahwe!
Bonani sekwandinodziyidziwa nge bakandibenga,
imwi munondimilidza kudwa mu mikoba ye lufu,
kuti ndizo ndilebe ngekwe gudzo lenyu
pa mikoba ye Nkololokadzi we Ziyoni,
ndishathe mu jidzo lenyu.
Zwitjaba zwakawila mu gomba lazwakatsha.
Makumbo abo akabhakhwa nge gwanga
gwabakateya ibo zwabo!
Yahwe banozibika
nge kusumikilisa kwabo nge ndulamo.
Babi bakabhatshigwa
nge mishingo ye maboko abo.
Bhelelo le babi bugalo gwe bafi,
zose zwitjaba zwinokangang'wa Ndzimu.
Basheti abatowokanganika misi yose,
ne kugalabgwe kwe bashayi
akungabalashikile tjose.
Milikani Yahwe!
Musiletje bathu bakamukunda,
zwitjaba ngazwisumikilisiwe mbeli kwenyu!
Mubatjise Yahwe,
zibisani zwitjaba kuti zwibathu koga!
Ini mulimilile kule Yahwe?
Ini muzwisumbika mu misi ye manikano.
Nge kuzwikudza babi banodziyidza bashayi,
ngababhakhwe nge matati abakateya ibo.
Babi banozwikudza ngekwe
yemula dzabo dzakabipa.
Magovu anotuka akabuya
akazwilandula Yahwe.
Mu kuzwida kwabo,
babi abatoshaka Ndzimu.
Mikumbulo yabo inoti “Akuna Ndzimu.”
Mishingo yabo inodwilila misi yose.
Kusumikilisa kwenyu kupezhugwi,
abatokubona zwita zwabo banozwidadila.
Banozwidwa mu mimoyo yabo beti,
“Akuna tjingatizunguza.”
Mu zwizekugwana zose zwinowozha
akuna tjingatiwila tjibibi.
Milomo yabo izhele bhiso
ne bupitipiti ne kutshambilidza,
ndimi dzabo dzizhele kutjinya ne bubi.
Unolalila bathu mu zwikotjo zwe mizi;
Mu magalo akasumbikala
unobulaya bathu basina nlandu.
Unobgwatilila se shumba.
Unobgwatilila kubhata bashayi.
Unobhata bashayi
ebakweba nge gwanga gugwe.
Unokotama kazwilulwamisila kumadzuka,
basina masimba banoligwa nge masimba awe.
Unozwidwa eti, “Ndzimu wakangang'wa,
wazwimba buso gwawo awungandibone.”
Milikani Yahwe!
Milidzani luboko gwenyu Ndzimu.
Musikangang'we bamukuhwisiwa zogwadza.
Ini mbi eleba kusakalulwama ngekwe Ndzimu,
ebe ezwidwa eti mu moyo uwe,
“Amungandiyitile nlandu.”
Koga mobona! Nge malebeswa wose
moyela njele, bakamanikana
bedziyidzika, kuti mubhatshe.
Badziyili banogalabgwe mumuli.
Mobhatsha siyang'wa.
Pedzani masimba e mbi
ne nshingi we mbipo.
Thamani kuti kutjinya kukwe kupele.
Yahwe ndibo She nkulu nge kusingapele,
tjaba dzowoloba mu shango yabo.
Yahwe, imwi mohwa yemula
dze bana moyo minyolo,
mowobasimisa, mukahwilila tjililo tjabo,
kushingila ndulamo siyang'wa
bakatshambilidziwa.
Kuti ndizo nthu we shango ino
asitjazhise kutjisa kakale!
Muna Yahwe ndina dizhilo;
ini mundidwa muti,
“Tizhila ku matombo se nyuni;
ngekuti bonani,
babi banopeta matati abo.
Banolonga misebe mu matati,
kuposa balulwami mu zhalima.
Ha miteyo yakolomogwa,
balulwami bangashingani kene?”
Yahwe bamu Ng'umba
yabo yakayengemala.
Tjigalo tje bushe tja Yahwe tji kudzimu.
Mesho abo akalinga bathu,
kulinga kwabo koshola bathu.
Yahwe banoshola balulwami ne babi,
babi ne banoda phipiti unobabenga
nge moyo uwe wose.
Mu babi, unowonisila masimbe
e moto anothuta ne sibabuli.
Ngoti Yahwe bakalulwama,
banoda mishingo yakalulwama,
bakatambunuka banowobona buso gwabo.
Mutibhatshe Yahwe,
ngobe akutjina iye wakalulwama,
ngobe bagalimoyo bakapela
pakati kwe bathu.
Mmwe ne mmwe
unonyepela mbakidzani uwe.
Banotjebelana nge
kufalaidzana nge milomo yabo.
Yahwe ngabanyaladze
milomo yose inofalaidza,
ne lulimi gumwe ne gumwe
gunozwikudza guti,
“Nge ndimi dzedu towotubula,
towoleba tjimwe ne tjimwe tjatinoshaka
ndiyani ungatimisa.”
“Ngekuti bashayi banodziyidziwa,
banosheta banogomela,
ngwenu ndowomilika, koleba Yahwe,
ndowobabiga pakabakililika,
ipo pabakashuba.”
Kugadzabgwe kose kwa Yahwe kwakatjena,
konga siliva yakapisiwa kutjenesiwa,
ikatjenesiwa katendeka.
Mutivikilile Yahwe,
mutitjengete mu bathu
bakajali nge kusingapele!
Babi banoyenda kumwe ne kumwe
ha tjakabipa tjikudziwa pakati kwe bathu.
Kowobe kwe tjibaka tjingapani Yahwe?
Apa mowondikangang'wila tjose kene?
Mowondisumbikila buso
gwenyu kuswikila lini kene?
Ndowodzikitadzila zogwadza
kuswikila lini kene?
Apa ndowobe ne buyendasi
mu moyo wangu zhuba lose kene?
Kowobe kwe tjibaka tjingapani
zwita zwangu zwindikulila kene?
Mundilinge Yahwe Ndzimu wangu, mundidabile.
Mundisimise kuti ndisiyizele hwope dze lufu.
Tjita tjangu tjingadwa tjiti, “Ndankunda,”
zwita zwangu zwingashatha kwazo kuti ndakundiwa.
Koga ndogalabgwe mu ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike;
moyo wangu unowoshatha mu jidzo lenyu.
Ndowombila Yahwe,
ngoti bakandithamila kwakalulwama.
Tjilengwe tjoti mu moyo watjo,
“Akuna Ndzimu.”
Bose bakabola mikumbulo,
Banothama zwithu zwinoshimisa.
Akuna ne nng'opela unothama tjakalulwama.
Yahwe banolinga pasi ku bathu bali kudzimu,
kubona kuti kene kuna bamwe
banohwisisa, banoshaka Ndzimu.
Bose bakapambuka,
banofanana koga bose ngobola mikumbulo.
Akuna wabo unothama tjakalulwama,
ndodwa ne nng'ompela dumbu.
Apa abana zibo kene, bose bashingi be bubi,
ibo banoja bathu bangu sebanoja tjiwunga,
kakale basinganamate Yahwe kene?
Ipapo banowozhigwa nge kutja kukulu,
ngoti Ndzimu una tjizekugwana tjakalulwama.
Imwi babi mopinganyidza ndongoloso ye nshayi,
koga Yahwe ndibo dizhilo labo.
Dzene jidzo le Iziraela lingazha lidwa mu Ziyoni!
Kowoti Yahwe bebuza bathu babo kutapiwa,
Jakubo unowopululudza, Iziraela unowoshatha.
Yahwe, ndiyani unowogala
mu nshasha wenyu kene?
Ndiyani ungagala
mu dombo lenyu lakayengemala?
Iye unoyenda mu zila yakalulwama,
eshinga tjakalulwama,
eleba malebeswa kudwa mu moyo uwe,
asingalebe shaya nge lulimi gugwe,
kakale asingathamile nzwalani
uwe tjimwe tjakabipa,
asingalengudze mbakidzani naye,
unoshima babi,
koga ekudza ibabo banotja Yahwe.
Usingashandukile kutuna kukwe
nenguba kungazhisa zogwadza,
usingati a adzima mmwe mari,
kati a abuze ana mmwiso,
asingatengwe kupa butendeki gusi igo
ngekwe nthu usina nlandu.
Iye unothama zwithu izwezwi
akuna tjingantshedula.
Mundibakilile Ndzimu, ngoti ndotizhila kumuli.
Ndoti kuna Yahwe, “Ndimwi She wangu;
Andina tjimwe tjakanaka kuzhe kwenyu.”
Koga ha kuli ngekwe bayengemali bamu shango,
banokudziwa, banondishathisa kwazo.
Ibabo banotobela ndzimu upoga
banozwipaphidzila buyendasi,
andingatebule tjipo tjabo tje tjing'o tje malopa
kene kuli kudana mazina abo.
Yahwe ndibo gobe langu ne thaka yangu,
ndimwi makabhata gobe langu.
N'gathu wandiyendila zwakanaka
mu magalo akanaka,
ndina thaka yakanaka seni!
Ndowokudza Yahwe ibo banondilaya,
mu busiku nkumbulo wangu unonditjenjedza.
Ndoziba kuti Yahwe banami misi yose,
bapejopejo, ndizo akuna tjingandizunguza.
Ndizo moyo wangu wakashatha,
ne meya yangu yakashatha,
mbili wangu unonyaluluka wakatjengeteka.
Ngobe amungandiletje ndingina mu bugalo gwe bafi,
kene kuli kuletja N'yengemali wenyu ebola.
Mondilakidza zila ye butjilo.
Ha muliyapo ndizhele kushatha,
ku luji* gwenyu kushatha kusingapele.
Ihwani kukumbila kwakatambunuka Yahwe,
teedzani tjililo tjangu, hwililani ntembezelo
unodwa mu nlomo usina bupitipiti.
Kusheta nlandu kwangu ngakulakidziwe ndimwi,
mesho enyu ngaabone tjakalulwama.
Ha mungashola moyo wangu,
ha mungandikumba busiku,
ha mungandilika,
mowowana kusina bubi mundili,
nlomo wangu awutotjuluka nlayo.
Ngekwe mishingo ye bathu,
nge dama lenyu ndakaleya zila dze bakukutu.
Makumbo angu anolambila mu zila yenyu,
andithu atongopambuka muili.
Ndodana imwi Ndzimu ngoti imwi mowondidabila,
munditeedze, muhwe matama angu.
Lakidzani ludo gwenyu gunotjenamisa,
Imwi ntjidzi wa ibabo banoshaka dizhilo,
betizha zwita zwabo.
Munditjengete se shanga ye zhisho;
mundisumbike mu ntutshi we mapapiro enyu,
mundisumbikile babi banondigwisa,
zwita zwangu zwisingatje kubulaya zwandipoteleka.
Banokukutadza mimoyo yabo kuti basibe ne ngoni;
Milomo yabo inolebeleka nge kuzwikudza.
Banondilonda, bakandipoteleka sangwenu;
banoshaka sekwa bangandiligila pasi.
Banonga shumba inoshaka kuzandabula tjainobhata,
se shumbana ilelile mu ishakana.
Milikani Yahwe, igwani ne zwita zwangu muzwikunde.
Mundiangule nge thumo mu babi.
Yahwe mundiangule mu bathu be shango ino,
mbhailo wabo i shango ino.
Mubalobe nge shamu yamakababiganyidzila,
bana babo bawane inopinda tjilizanyo,
basiyile bana babo.
Koga imi nge kwangu, ndowobona tjiso tjenyu mu ndulamo;
Ndowoti ndimuka ndowoshathila kuti muyapo.
Ndomuda Yahwe, imwi masimba angu.
Yahwe ndibo simba langu,
ndibo dizhilo langu.
Ndzimu wangu,
