ndibo dizhilo langu landinotizhila kulili,
tjivikili tjangu, simba le jidzo langu, bhakasa langu.
Ndodana Yahwe, ibo bakafanigwa ngokudziwa,
ngono ndatjidziwa mu zwita zwangu.
Misungo ye lufu yakandipomba,
maphatjaphatja e golomodzo akandikulila.
Mitjili ye ikumbu yakandipomba,
mapuzhu e lufu ambeli kwangu.
Mu kudziyidzika kwangu ndakadana Yahwe;
Ndakalilila ku Ndzimu wangu kuti undibhatshe.
Mu Ng'umba yawo kahwa hwi langu.
Tjililo tjangu tjikaswika mu zebe dzidze.
Ndizo shango yakazunguzika ikatengenyeka,
thiwabo dze matombo dzikazunguzika,
ngoti Ndzimu wakabe wagwadzamoyo.
Busi gukathungayila mu zwimilo zwawo,
moto unopisa ukadwa mu nlomo wawo,
masimbe anothuta kadwa mu uli.
Ukapalula zhuzhugwi ukadelukila pasi,
makole matema alikusi kwe makumbo awo.
Ukatatha dzitjerubhimu ukawuluka,
ukazha nge lubilo mu mapapiro e phepo.
Ukazwizwimba nge zhalima;
makole matema e vula
akamandana akaupoteleka.
Mu lupenyo gwakabe guli mbeli kwawo,
tjivulamabgwe ne masimbe
e moto zwikapubulidza makole.
Yahwe kakale bakadadamula bali kuzhuzhugwi,
Upezhugwi zhugwi kadusa hwi lile
ne tjivulamabgwe ne moto.
Bakaposa misebe yabo bakapaladza zwita zwabo,
bakapenyesa lupenyo gwe vula bakazwipaladza.
Ludondo gwe gungwa gukaboneka,
ne thiwa dze shango dzikabe patjena,
Yahwe ha mutjemela,
nge bushongola gwenyu.
Bakaabilila kudwa zhuzhugwi bakanditola,
bakandidubula mu vula yakangina.
Bakandiangula mu tjita tjangu tjakasima,
ne muna ibabo banondibenga,
ngoti bakabe bakandikunda.
Ndakati ndakasimigwa, bakandigwisa,
koga Yahwe bakandiangula.
Bakandiyisa mu magalo akatalabuka,
bakandiangula ngoti bakandishathila.
Yahwe banondipa mbhayilo
kuyendidzana nge ndulamo yangu,
banondibuzila kuyendidzana nge mishingo yangu.
Ndakalondolodza zila dza Yahwe,
andizothama mbipo ngofupatila Ndzimu.
Ndayo dzabo dzose dzakanditungamila,
ne ndaulo dzabo andizodzikupila kutjena.
Ndakasibe ne nlandu mbeli kwabo,
ndakazwidziba mu jinyo.
Yahwe bakandipa mbhayilo
kuyendidzana nge ndulamo yangu
kuyendidzana ngekusabe nge nlandu kwangu.
Kuna banogalikabgwe molakidza kugalikabgwe,
kuna basina nlandu molakidza kusheta nlandu,
kuna bakatjenapala mozwilakidza makatjenapala,
kuna bakakombama muna bushongola.
Motjidza banozwiyisa pasi,
koga banozwikudza mobabhatisa shoni.
Imwi Yahwe ndimwi munothutisa luvone gwangu.
Ndzimu wangu unoshandula zhalima langu kube tjedza.
Nge simba lenyu ndothasela babhayani,
ha ndina Ndzimu wangu ndotjuluka guma.
Ndzimu iwoyu zila dzawo dzakalulwama seni,
kugadzabgwe kwa Yahwe ku malebeswa,
tjivikili tja bose banotizhila ku bali.
Ndzimu ndiyani ha isi Yahwe?
Shongwe ndiyani ha isi Ndzimu wedu.
Ndzimu ndiwo unondipa masimba,
ndiwo unothama zila yangu ikasibe ne mbatsha.
Wakathama makumbo angu kanga makumbo e zilawa,
wakandibiga pakagadzikana pezhugwi.
Unodiya zwiazha zwangu kugwa,
kuti ndizo maboko angu angapeta dati le khoto.
Mondipa tjivikili tje jidzo lenyu,
ne luboko gwenyu gwe luji gwakanditjengeta,
bhatsho yenyu yakandithama nkulu.
Makatalabudza pamile makumbo angu,
kuti ndizo makumbo angu asitongosodzoloka.
Ndakatatana ne zwita zwangu azwibhata;
Andizoshanduka kuswikila zwapela.
Ndakabatemela pasi bakasitjatubule kumuka,
bakawila pasi kwe makumbo angu.
Makandipa masimba e kugwa,
mukathama kuti zwita zwangu zwindithigamile.
Mothama kuti zwita zwangu zwinditizhe,
na ibabo banondibenga ndobalobesa.
Bakalila beshaka bhatsho,
koga akuna wakababhatsha.
Bakanodana Yahwe koga abazobadabila.
Ndobakwiya bakasala benga hwuluba
inowulusiwa nge phepo.
Ndobatebula se dope le zila.
Makandigwila mu bathu be bapanduki.
Makandithama ntungamili we zwitjaba;
bathu bandakabe ndisingazibe banondishingila.
Tjinyolotjo ha ndilebeleka banondihwa.
Bataya banondithigamila.
Bataya bakatemeka mafupa,
banozha betetema bebhuda mu matizhilo abo.
Yahwe banotjila! Ngakukudziwe shongwe yangu,
ngakulumbidziwe Ndzimu we jidzo langu,
iwo Ndzimu wakandibgwilizilila
ukaisa tjaba pasi kwangu,
ukandigwila mu zwita zwangu.
Wakandikudza kupinda zwita zwangu,
ukandidusa mu phipiti
ukandiangula mu bathu banoda phipiti.
Ndizo wali ndowomukudza
pakati kwe zwitjaba imwi Yahwe,
amba njimbo dzinokudza zina lenyu.
Yahwe unopa she nkulu uwe kukunda,
bakalakidza nzhodziwa wabo ludo gusingapele,
iye Dafite ne ludzi gugwe.
Mazhuzhugwi anoleba bukulu gwe Ndzimu,
zhiyendakuyenda lolakidza mishingo ye maboko awo.
Zhuba lolebeleka libudza limwe,
busiku golakidza gumwe zibo.
Akuna ndebeleko kene matama,
akuna pasingahwike nsindo wazo.
Nsindo wazo unobhudila mu shango yose,
matama awo anohwika ku phelelo dze shango.
Ndzimu wakabakila zhuba nshasha mu ali,
ilo linobhuda se nkwasha ebhuda mu ng'umba iye,
lolabuka mu zila yalo lakashatha se nlume wakasima.
Lobhuda mu lubizho gumwe gwe shango,
likayenda likanomilila ku gumwe.
Akuna tjakabgwatila kupisa kwalo.
Nlayo wa Yahwe uzhele,
unomusidzila meya.
Ndaulo dza Yahwe dzogalikabgwe,
dzotjenjedza basakatjenjela.
Milayo ya Yahwe ina malebeswa,
inoshathisa moyo.
Ndaulo ya Yahwe yakatjena,
inozhula mesho.
Kutja Ndzimu kubuyanana,
kugele nge kusingapele.
Milayo ya Yahwe yakatambunuka,
yakalulwama.
Inodika kupinda golide,
Inozipa kupinda butji gwe
nyutji gudotha mu mape.
Nlanda wenyu unotjenjedziwa ndiyo,
kuyilondolodza kuna mbuzilo hwulu.
Koga apa ndiyani ungabona milandu iye kene?
Mundizwiibhatigwe milandu yakasumbikika.
Mundidzibe mu matjinyo e mwaza,
musialetje akandilaula.
Ndizo ndowolulwama tjose,
ndowobe ndasununguka mu kutjuluka nlayo.
Matama angu nenge njalakang'wa
dzangu ngadziamutjilike kumuli,
imwi Yahwe dizhilo langu, Ndzutunuli wangu.
Yahwe ngabakudabile mu nsi we kudziyidzika!
Zina le Ndzimu wa Jakubo likubakilile!
Ngabakutumile bhatsho
kudwa mu bugalo gwabo
gwakayengemala,
bakuazhe bali mu Ziyoni.
Dzene bangakumbula
zwipo zose zwawakabadusila,
baamutjile zwibhayilo zwizo zwinopisiwa.
Ngabakupe tjinoyemugwa nge moyo uwo,
bashingikadze ndongoloso dzidzo dzose.
Towopululudza nge kushatha ngoti wakunda
towomilidza fulaha dzedu mu zina le Ndzimu wedu!
Dzene Yahwe bangakushingila zose zwaunokumbila.
Ngwenu ndoziba kuti Yahwe
banobhatsha nzhodziwa wabo,
banon'dabila kudwa kudzimu
kwabo kwakayengemala
nge kukunda kwabo kukulu.
Bamwe banozwikudza
ngekwe koloyi dzabo dze ngwa.
Bamwe banozwikudza
ngekwe mbizi dzabo.
Koga iswi tozwikudza
ngekwe zina la Yahwe Ndzimu wedu.
Banowodzunguluka bakawila pasi,
koga iswi towomilika tikama takashongoloka.
Yahwe thamani kuti she nkulu bakunde,
muti dabile ha tidana.
She nkulu banoshathila masimba enyu Yahwe
banoshatha kwazo nge bhatsho yenyu!
Makabapa yemula dze moyo wabo,
amuzolamba nge tjabakakumbila nge nlomo wabo.
Mobaamutjila nge makombolelo anodika,
mobiga tjiala tje golide yakatjena mu nsholo wabo.
Bakakumbila butjilo mukabapa igo,
mukabapa mazhuba manjinji nge kusingapele.
Bhatsho yamakabapa yakabazhisila gudzo gulu,
makabapa bubuya ne tjilumbi.
Ee, ndimwi makathama kuti
bakombolegwe nge kusingapele,
mobashathisa nge kubeyapo kwenyu misi yose.
She nkulu banogalabgwe muna Yahwe,
nge ludo gusingazunguzike
gwe Upezhugwi zhugwi abangazunguziwe.
Tjiazha tjenyu tjowobhata zwita zwenyu zose,
tjiazha tjenyu tje luji tjowobawana banomubenga.
Mowobathama bibi le moto,
nsi wabanowoboneka.
Yahwe banowobalobesa nge bushongola gwabo,
ngono moto unowobaja.
Mowolobesa ludzi gwabo mu shango,
ne bana babo mowobalobesa
pakati kwe bakololo be bathu.
Ha belangana tjakabipa nge kwenyu,
ha be bumba nkumbulo wakabipa, abatowotubula.
Banowomutizha,
ha mubatendeka nge misebe enyu.
Kudziwani Yahwe nge masimba enyu!
Towomba tikakudza masimba enyu.
Ndzimu wangu, Ndzimu wangu, mandilashilani?
Ini muli kule zwingapa nge kundibhatsha
mu kuhwazogwadza kwangu kene?
Ndzimu wangu, ndolila masikati,
koga amutondidabila.
Ndolila nenge busiku,
anditonyaluluka.
Koga makayengemala,
tjigalo tjenyu tje bushe i gudzo le Iziraela.
Bobatategulu bedu bakagalabgwe mumuli,
bakagalabgwe mukabaangula.
Bakalilila kumuli ngono bakatjidziwa,
bakagalabgwe mumuli,
ngono bakasibhakhwe nge shoni.
Koga imi ndi gonye andite ndili nthu,
ndolengudziwa nge bathu,
ndosekiwa nge mmwe ne mmwe.
Bose banondibona banondidadila,
banondihwong'ola, bedzungudza misholo,
beti, “Wakabiga muna Yahwe,
Yahwe ngaban'gwile, ngaban'angulile,
ngoti unoshathisiwa ndibo!”
Koga ndimwi makandidusa mu ntumbu.
Makanditjengeta nditji
mu zhamu la mme yangu.
Ndakamupiwa kudwa
mu kuzwagwa kwangu.
Makabe Ndzimu wangu
kudwa pa kuzwagwa kwangu.
Musibe kule nami,
ngoti mbatsha dzipejo,
ngono akuna ungabhatsha.
Mikono minjinji yakandikomba,
mikono yakasima ye
Bhashani yakandikombeledza.
Inondiashamila yakazhula
milomo yayo se shumbalume
inobomba ikazandabula.
Ndotebugwa se vula,
mafupa angu wose akalungunuka;
moyo wangu unonga phola,
unonyawuka mukati kwe ifuba tjangu.
Simba langu lapela,
lulimi gwangu gonamatila mu bgwasha.
Makandiladzika mu hwuluba ye lufu.
Mbgwa dzakandikomba,
goko le babi lakandikombeledza,
bakabhaya maboko angu ne makumbo angu.
Ndingabala mafupa angu wose.
Bathu banondilingisisa bendinyenya.
Banokobana zwiambalo zwangu tjekwabo
bekandila kubona kuti upi unotola tjipi.
Koga imwi Yahwe, musibe kule!
Imwi bhatsho yangu,
libilidzani kundiangulila!
Mundivikile thumo;
gwilani butjilo gwangu mu simba le mbgwa.
Mundiangulile mu shumba.
Munditjidze mu nyanga dze nyati.
Ndowozibisa bakanyi kwangu zina lenyu,
ndowomukudza pakati kwe gubungano.
Imwi banotja Yahwe!
Mubakudze mose imwi bana ba Jakubo!
Mubalumbidze mose imwi bana ba Iziraela!
Abazolingila pasi kene bakashinyata
kudziyila kwe bakahwisiwa zogwadza,
abazobasumbikila buso gwabo,
koga bakahwa kukumbila bhatsho kwabo.
Kumukudza kwangu mu
gubungano gulu kodwa mumuli.
Ndowoshingikadza kutuna kwangu
mu mesho aibabo banomutja.
Bashayi banowoja bakaguta,
ibabo banoshaka Yahwe banowobakudza.
Dzene bangatjila nge kusingapele!
Midzibo yose ye shango
inowokumbula ikashandukila kuna Yahwe,
ne njudzi dzose dzowobanamata.
Ngoti bushe ngegwa Yahwe,
ngono banobusa zwitjaba.
Bose bafumi be shango
banowothigama benamata.
Bose be nyama ne lopa
banowothigama mbeli kwabo.
Zwizekugwana zwinozha zowobashingila,
Bathu banowoleba ngekwa She,
bebudza zwizekugwana zwinowozha.
Banowoleba ngekwe ndulamo ya She,
ku zwizekungwana zwinowozwagwa
ngobe She bakaithama.
Yahwe nlisi wangu,
andina tjandinosheta.
Banothama kuti ndibuthe
mu mafulo e bgwelele.
Banonditungamilila ku
vula dzakayengemala.
Banomusa meya yangu.
Banonditungamilila mu zila
dze ndulamo, ngekwe zina labo.
Nenguba ndiyenda mu nkuku
we ntutshi we lufu, akuna bubi
gwandinotja, ngoti munami.
Ludozo gwenyu ne
swimbo yenyu zondinyaladza.
Mondilulwamisila zojiwa
mu mesho e zwita zwangu.
Mozhodza nsholo wangu mafuta,
bhepe langu lozhala likatebukana.
Tjoselele ndulamo ne ludo zowobe nami
misi yose ye butjilo gwangu.
Ngono ndowogala mu Ng'umba
ya Yahwe nge kusingapele.
Shango ngeya Yahwe naiko kose ku muili,
lubumbo na bose bagele muguli,
ngoti bakagubamba pezhugwi kwe makungwa,
bakathama thiwa dzago pezhugwi kwe njizi.
Ndiyani ungatatha dombo la Yahwe?
Ndiyani unowoma mu bugalo
gwabo gwakayengemala?
Ndi ibabo bana maboko
mabuyanana ne mimoyo yakatjena.
Basinganginikane nge ndzimu we manyepkhwa,
basingatune kwe bupitipiti.
Banowoamutjila makombolelo kuna Yahwe,
kusabe ne nlandu kwabo
kowotendekwa nge Ndzimu we jidzo labo.
Bakajali nge be gupo linoushaka,
ibo banoshaka buso gwe Ndzimu wa Jakubo.
Milidzani misholo yenyu imwi mikoba!
Zhukani imwi zwizhalilo zwa ntolo
kuti ndizo She nkulu be tjedza bangine.
She nkulu be masimba ndiyani?
Ndi Yahwe bakasima bana masimba,
ndi Yahwe bakasima mu ngwa.
Milidzani misholo yenyu imwi mikoba!
Zhukani imwi zwizhalilo zwa ntolo,
kuti ndizo She nkulu we masimba bangine.
She nkulu be tjedza ndiyani?
Ndi Yahwe be Mibunga,
ndibo She nkulu be tjedza.
Ndomilidzila meya yangu kumuli Yahwe.
Ndzimu wangu, ndogalabgwe mumuli,
musindiletje abhakhwa nge shoni.
Musiletje zwita zwangu
zwikazwikudza pezhugwi kwangu.
Musiletjedze ibabo banogalabgwe
mumuli bakabhakhwa nge shoni.
Letjani ibabo bana yemula
dze kutjebela ba bhakhwe nge shoni.
Mundithame ndizibe zila dzenyu Yahwe,
mundidiye zila dzenyu.
Munditungamile mu malebeswa enyu, mundidiye,
ngoti ndimwi Ndzimu we jidzo langu;
Ndogalamoyo mumuli zhuba lose.
Kumbulani ngoni dzenyu Yahwe,
nenge ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike,
ngoti zwodwa kule zwili yapo.
Musikumbule tjibi tje butjetjana gwangu,
kene kutjuluka nlayo kwangu.
Mundikumbule kuyendidzana
nge ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike,
muthamila ndulamo yenyu Yahwe!
Yahwe bakalulwama kakale bakatambunuka;
ndizo banodiya batjinyi zila yabo.
Banotungamila banozwiyisa
pasi muna tjakalulwama.
Banodiya banozwiyisa pasi
kutobela zila yabo.
Dzose zila dza Yahwe ludo ne kugalikabgwe,
kuna banotobela tjidumano ne milayo yabo.
Ngekwe zina lenyu Yahwe,
mundizwiibhatigwe kutjinya kwangu,
ngoti kutjinya kwangu kukulu.
Ndiani kene nthu unotja Yahwe?
Banowon'diya zila yaakafanila shalula.
Iye unowobhudilila mu butjilo,
ne bana babe banowothuwa shango.
Buzwalani gwa Yahwe gumuna banobatja
ngono banobathama kuti bazibe tjidumano tjabo.
Mesho angu anogala akalinga kuna Yahwe,
ngoti banowodusa makumbo angu mu gwanga.
Shandukilani ku ndili mundihwile ngoni,
ngoti ndimu bushoma kakale ndadziyidzika.
Kudziyidzika kwangu kwakula,
mundiduse mu kuhwazogwadza kwangu.
Lingani kudziyila kwangu ne kudziyidzika kwangu,
ndizo mundizwiibhatigwe jinyo langu lose.
Bonani kuti zwita zwangu zwingapani,
nenge kuti bakandibenga kungapani.
Tjengetani butjilo gwangu, mundiangule,
musindiletje abhatisiwa shoni,
ngoti ndotizhila kumuli.
Dzene malebeswa ne kutambunuka
zwinganditjengeta, ngoti ndakalinga imwi.
Ndzimu, dzutunulani Iziraela,
mu kudziyidzika kwayo kose.
Yahwe, lakidzani kuti andina nlandu
ngoti ndakatjila butjilo gusina nlandu.
Kakale ndakagalabgwe
muna Yahwe ndisingazunguzike.
Yahwe, mundishole kakale mundilike,
likani moyo wangu ne njalakang'wa dzangu.
Ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike,
gumu mesho angu,
kakale ndogalikabgwe kumuli.
Anditogala ntutshi ne bathu basibe tjimwe,
kene kuyendidzana ne batjengedzi.
Ndobenga goko le bashingi be bubi,
ndizo andingagale ne babi.
Ndongula maboko angu kulakidza kusabe ne nlandu,
ndibe ndipoteleka tjibeso tjenyu Yahwe,
ndimbila pezhugwi lumbo gwe kuboka,
ndileba mishingo yenyu yose inotjenamisa.
Yahwe, ndoda ng'umba yamunogala mu ili,
ne panogala tjedza tjenyu.
Musinditshwayilile kuzhe ne batjinyi,
kene butjilo gwangu ne bana nyota ye kubulaya,
bathu be maboko azhele bubi,
maboko abo e luji azhele tjizwimba nlomo.
Koga nge kwangu, ndakatambunuka,
mundidzutunule, mube ne ngoni nami.
Makumbo angu amile pakalulwama,
mu gubungano gulu, ndowokudza Yahwe.
Yahwe ndibo tjedza tjangu ne jidzo langu,
ndiyani wandingatja kene?
Yahwe ndibo dizhilo langu,
ndingatja ani kene?
Ha babi bendinginilila
kuti bandibulaye,
babengi bangu ne zwita zwangu,
banowokuthiwa bakawa.
Kene ndingakombiwa ne ngwa,
anditowotja,
kene ngwa ingandiwila,
koga ndowobe ne kugalabgwe.
Tjing'ompela tjithu tjandakakumbila kuna Yahwe,
nditjo tjandinowovima.
Wuti ndigale mu ng'umba ya Yahwe,
mazhuba wose e butjilo gwangu,
kubona bubuya gwa Yahwe
ne kuzwidiya mu ng'umba yabo.
Ngoti banowondisumbika mu bugalo gwabo
mu zhuba le kudziyidzika,
banowondisumbika mu tente yabo,
banowondigadza pezhugwi kwe shongwe.
Ndizo ndowomilidzika kupinda
zwita zwangu zose kundipoteleka.
Ndowodusa zwipo nge mpululu mu tente ya Yahwe.
Ndowomba nge nlidzo wakanaka ndimbila Yahwe.
Ihwani Yahwe ha ndimudana,
mundihwile ngoni mundidabile!
Moyo wangu nge kwenyu ukati, “Shaka buso gwabo!”
Buso gwenyu Yahwe, ndigo gwandinoshaka.
Musindisumbikile buso gwenyu.
Musigwadzemoyo mukatata nlanda wenyu,
imwi magala muli bhatsho yangu.
Musindilashe, musindifupatile,
imwi Ndzimu we jidzo langu.
Kene tate na mme bangandilasha,
Yahwe banowondiamutjila.
Mundidiye zila yenyu Yahwe,
munditungamile mu zila yakatambunuka
ngekwe zwita zwangu.
Musiletje zwita zwangu zwikandithama kuda kwazo
batendeki be manyepkhwa bakandimukila,
mafemo abo anolakidza mbatsha kundili.
Ndogalamoyo kuti ndowobona
bubuya gwa Yahwe mu shango ye batjili.
Galabgwe muna Yahwe
sima, ukulumbidzike,
galamoyo muna Yahwe.
Ndodana imwi Yahwe, shongwe yangu,
musilambe kundihwa.
Ha mungandinyalalila,
ndowonga ibabo banongina mu gomba.
Ihwani tjililo tjangu,
ndililila kumuli ndishaka bhatsho,
ndimilidzila maboko
ku bugalo gwenyu gwakayengemala.
Musindikakatile kuzhe ne babi,
na ibabo bashingi be bubi,
banoleba kunyalala ne babakidzani babo,
koga mu mimoyo yabo kuna busada.
Mubalipe kuyendidzana ne mishingo yabo,
kuyendidzane ne mbipo ye mishingo yabo.
Mubalipe kuyendidzana ne mishingo ye maboko abo.
Mubape mbhayilo wakabalingisana.
Ngobe abana hanya nge mishingo ya Yahwe,
kene mishingo ye maboko abo,
banowobalobesa bakasitjababumbe kakale.
Yahwe ngabakudziwe,
ngobe bakahwa kukumbila kwangu.
Yahwe ndibo simba langu ne tjivikili tjangu,
moyo wangu unogalabgwe mu bali.
Ndizo ndobhatshiwa ne moyo wangu wakashatha,
ndobakudza nge lumbo gwangu gwe kuboka.
Yahwe ndibo simba le bathu babo,
ndilo dizhilo linotjidza nzhodziwa wabo.
Tjidzani bathu benyu,
kombolelani thaka yenyu.
Ibeni nlisi wabo, mubabhabhe nge kusingapele.
Ipani Yahwe imwi batjili be kudzimu,
ipani Yahwe gudzo ne masimba.
Ipani Yahwe gudzo le zina labo,
namatani Yahwe mu bubuya gwe kuyengemala.
Hwi la Yahwe lipezhugwi kwe vula.
Ndzimu we gudzo unodadamula se vula,
ibo Yahwe bapezhugwi kwe vula njinji.
Hwi la Yahwe lina masimba,
hwi la Yahwe lokulila kose.
Hwi la Yahwe lovuna miti mikulu ye misida,
Yahwe banovuna miti ye misida ye Lebhanoni.
Banothama matombo e Lebhanoni katjuluka se phulu,
ne dombo le Heremoni likatjuluka se nkong'wana unopenga.
Hwi la Yahwe lobhuda nthuto we moto.
Hwi la Yahwe lozunguza tjilambanyika,
Yahwe banozunguza tjilambanyika tje Kadeshi.
Hwi la Yahwe loporodzisa tshepe
lothukudza ishakana kukasala kuli lubala,
mu ng'umba yabo bose banoti, “Tjedza!”
Yahwe bagele mu tjigalo
tje bushe pezhugwi kwe nkubila.
Yahwe bagele mu tjigalo
tje bushe bali she nkulu nge kusingapele.
Dzene Yahwe bangapa bathu babo masimba!
Dzene Yahwe bangakombolela bathu babo nge kunyalala!
Ndowomukudza Yahwe ngobe makandimilidza,
amuzoletja zwita zwangu zwikandikuwelela.
Yahwe Ndzimu wangu
ndakamulilila ndishaka bhatsho yenyu,
ngono makandipodza.
Yahwe makadusa meya yangu mu bugalo gwe bafi,
munditjidze kudwa muna ibabo bakangina mu gomba.
Mbilani Yahwe njimbo dzinobakudza
imwi bayengemali babo,
mukudze zina labo lakayengemala.
Ngoti bushongola gwabo gotola tjibaka tjitukununu,
koga moyontjena wabo awutopela.
Tjililo tjingabe tje busiku,
koga shatha kozha ne mangwanana.
Nge kwangu mukubhudilila kwangu ndakati,
“Andingatongotshedugwa.”
Nge kundimila, Yahwe,
makandidzikila se dombo lakasima.
Koga makati musumbika buso gwenyu,
adziyidzika.
Ndakalilila imwi Yahwe,
ndakakumbila ku muli Yahwe.
“Mowobuyigwa ngeni mu lufu gwangu,
ha ndinginila pasi mu gomba?
Apa hwuluba inowomukudza kene?
Apa inowoleba ngekwe kugalikabgwe kwenyu?
Mundihwe Yahwe, mube nge ngoni nami!
Yahwe, ibeni mbhatshi wangu!”
Makashandula tjililo tjangu tjikabe nzano.
Makandimbula tjiambalo tjangu tje saka,
ngono mukandiambadza kushatha,
kuti ndizo meya yangu imukudze isinyalale.
Yahwe Ndzimu wangu,
ndowomuboka nge kusingapele.
Ndotizhila ku muli Yahwe,
musitongondiletja abhatisiwa shoni;
munditjidze nge ndulamo yenyu.
Mundihweni, mundigwile tjinyolotjo!
Ibeni shongwe ye dizhilo langu,
dizhilo lakasima kunditjidza.
Ndimwi shongwe yangu ne dizhilo langu,
ngekwe zina lenyu munditungamile, mundikwebe.
Mundiduse mu gwanga gwandakasumbikigwa,
ngoti ndimwi dizhilo langu.
Meya yangu ndoyilonga mu maboko enyu.
Makandidzutunula Yahwe,
imwi Ndzimu unogalikabgwe.
Ndobenga ibabo banokudza zwifano zwisina nshingo,
koga imi ndogalabgwe muna Yahwe.
Ndowoshatha apululudza ngekwe
ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike,
ngoti makabona kudziyidzika kwangu,
mukaziba tshiyilo yangu.
Amuzondilonga mu maboko e tjita tjangu,
makamisa makumbo angu pathu pakashaladuka.
Ibeni ne ngoni nami Yahwe,
ngoti ndimu kudziyidzika,
mesho angu anyala ngolila,
meya yangu ne mmbili wangu zwanyalabo.
Butjilo gwangu gwashakadziwa ngohwa zogwadza,
makole angu atapudziwa ngolila.
Simba langu lopedziwa nge tshiyilo yangu,
ne mafupa angu ashakala.
Ndi madado pakati kwe zwita zwangu
ndotjisa ku babakidzani bangu.
Ibabo banondibona mu dzizila banonditizha.
Ndatjibhuda mu mikumbulo se nthu wakafa,
ndatjinga tjija tjakapkhwanyika.
Ee ndohwa banjinji benyebezela beti,
kotjisa pamwe ne pamwe!
Banolangana nge kwangu,
belanganila kundibulaya.
Koga ndomugalabgwe Yahwe,
ndoti “Mu Ndzimu wangu.”
Misi yangu imu maboko enyu;
mundiangule mu maboko e zwita zwangu
ne muna banondidziyidza.
Buso gwenyu ngagupenyele nlanda wenyu;
munditjidze mu ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike.
Musindiletje abhatisiwa shoni Yahwe,
ngoti ndodana imwi.
Letjani babi babhatisiwe shoni,
ngabangine mu bugalo gwe bafi nge tjitu.
Milomo inonyepa ngainyaladziwe,
inozwikudza izwida,
ilengudza balulwami.
Ndulamo yenyu ihwulu seni,
iyo yamakabigila ibabo banomutja,
ya munothama mu mesho e bana be bathu,
muthamila ibabo banotizhila ku muli.
Makabasumbika ngekubepo kwenyu,
mubasumbikila ndangano dzakabipa dze bathu,
makababakilila mu nshasha wenyu
mubavikila milomo ina zwilebo.
Yahwe ngabakudziwe,
ngoti bakandilakidza ludo gwabo gunotjenamisa,
mu tjibaka tjandakabe ndakakombiwa
se nzi nkulu wakombiwa nge ngwa.
Ndakati ndapaluka moyo ati,
“Ndatatigwa kutjena namwi.”
Koga imwi mohwa tjililo tjangu,
ha ndikumbila bhatsho yenyu.
Idani Yahwe imwi mose bayengemali!
Yahwe banotjidza banogalamoyo,
koga banobgwilizila nge buzhalo iye unozwikudza.
Simani, mube nge tjilopa,
imwi mose makalindila Yahwe.
Kwakakombolegwa iye una matjinyo akazwiibhatigwa,
iye una tjibi tjaka vukidziwa.
Kwakakombolegwa iye usingatilikwe nlandu ndi Yahwe,
iye usina bupitipiti mu meya iye.
Ha ndisingazwilebe tjibi tjangu,
mbili wangu unoshakadziwa nge kugomela zhuba lose.
Siku ne sikati shamu yenyu inondikulila.
Simba langu lakapela,
se doba lapedziwa ngopisa kwe tjilimo.
Ndizo aduma tjibi tjangu,
ngono asisumbike jinyo langu.
Ndakati, “Ndowozwileba matjinyo angu kuna Yahwe,”
ipapo mukandizwiibhatigwa tjibi tjangu.
Ndizo mmwe ne mmwe unogalamoyo
ngaamutembezele mu nsi we kudziyidzika,
kowoti misundila mikulu ye kudziyila
izha ikasinswikile.
Ndimwi mabgwatilo angu,
mowondibakila mu mbatsha,
mukandikombeledza nge njimbo dze kusunungugwa.
Ndowokulaya akudiya zila yawakafanila tobela,
ndowokukumbuludza ndakakulinga nge zhisho langu.
Usinge mbizi kene mowulo,
ukashaya kuhwisisa,
zwinolaugwa nge tomu,
kuzhe kwa ikoko azwingayendidzane nawe.
Kudziyila kunji ngekwe babi,
koga ludo gusingazunguzike gwakapoteleka
ibabo banogalabgwe muna Yahwe.
Shathani muna Yahwe mupululudze,
imwi balulwami, mumimile nge kushatha,
imwi mose be mimoyo yakatambunuka.
Shathani muna Yahwe imwi balulwami,
gudzo lofanila bakatambunuka.
Kudzani Ndzimu nge dende, mubathamile
nlidzo nge tjilidzo tjina misungo ili gumi.
Mubambile lumbo butshwa, lidzani misungo
iyeyo nge bunyambi umbila pezhugwi.
Ngoti dama la Yahwe lakatambunuka,
ne nshingo wabo wose unothamiwa nge kugalikabgwe.
Yahwe banoda ndulamo ne ndulamiso,
shango izhele ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike.
Kudzimu kwakathamiwa nge dama la Yahwe,
ne zwinjinji zwinowang'wako
zwakathamiwa nge mafemo e nlomo wabo.
Bakakubunganya vula dze gungwa se dzimu butili,
Bakabiganya vula mu ng'umba dze mbiganyilo.
Shango yose ngayitje Yahwe,
Bagali bose be shango ngababalumbidze!
Ngoti bakalebeleka, ngono ikabeyapo,
bakalaula kukashingikala.
Yahwe banothama ndangano dze tjaba
dzikasibe tjimwe, banopaladza ndongoloso dze bathu.
Ndongoloso ya Yahwe imili nge kusingapele,
mazwimisilo abo anoyenda nge zwizekugwana zose.
Kwakakombolegwa itjaba tjina Yahwe bali Ndzimu watjo,
bali bathu babashalula kube thaka yabo!
Yahwe banolinga pasi bali kudzimu,
banobona bathu bose.
Kudwa kwabagele mu tjigalo tje bushe
banolinga bagali be shango bose.
Ndibo banobumba mimoyo yabo bose,
banoziba mishingo yabo yose.
She nkulu aatotjidziwa nge babhayani babe banjinji,
mbhayani aatotjidziwa nge masimba awe makulu.
Mbizi ye ngwa ate tjimwe tjinga gagwabgwe kukunda,
nge masimba ayo makulu ayingatjidze.
Bonani, Yahwe banotjengeta ibabo banobatja,
ibabo banogalabgwe mu ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike,
kuti basunungule meya yabo mu lufu,
ne kubatjidza mu bhamba.
Meya yedu yakalingilila kuna Yahwe,
ndibo bhatsho yedu ne tjivikili tjedu.
Ee, mimoyo yedu inoshathisiwa ndibo,
ngoti togalabgwe mu zina labo lakayengemala.
Ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike, Yahwe,
ngagube naswi, koga sekwatinogalabgwe mumuli.
Ndowokudza Yahwe misi yose;
kubakudza kowodwilila kuli mu nlomo wangu.
Meya yangu inozwikudza muna Yahwe,
banodziyidziyidzika ngabahwe bashathe.
Kudzani Yahwe nami,
ngatikudzeni zina labo tose.
Ndakashaka Yahwe, bakandidabila,
ngono bakandisunungula mu kutja kwangu kose
Lingani kubali mupenye,
ndizo musibhakhwe nge shoni.
Iwoyu nthu usina bhatsho wakadana,
ngono Yahwe bakanhwa,
bakan'dusa muna zose zwinondziyidza.
Ntumwa wa Yahwe unobakilila ibabo banobatja,
ngono ukabaangula.
Labilani mubone kuti Yahwe bakalulwama!
Kwakashatha ibabo banotizhila mubali.
Kudzani Yahwe imwi bayengemali babo,
ngoti ibabo banobakudza abana tjabanosheta.
Shumbana dzoti dzikasheta
ngono dzikabhakhwa nge zhala.
Koga ibabo banoshaka Yahwe
abana tjimwe tjakalulwama tjabanosheta.
Izhani bana munditeedze,
ndowomudiya kutja.
Ndiwupi nthu unoda butjilo,
eyemula kutjila mazhuba manjinji,
kuti aje zwinozipa?
Tjengeta lulimi gugo mu kuleba zwakabipa,
ne milomo iyo mu kuleba manyepkhwa.
Bhuda mu bubi, uthame ndulamo,
shaka kunyalala ukusale shule.
Yahwe banotjengeta balulwami,
ne zebe dzoteedza tjililo tjabo.
Buso gwa Yahwe gwakasunganila bashingi be bubi,
kudusa njalakang'wa nge kwabo mu shango.
Ha balulwami belila beshaka bhatsho,
Yahwe banobahwa bakabasunungula
muna zose zwinobadziyidza.
Yahwe bapejo ne bakanyalamoyo,
banotjidza ibabo bakapelegwa nge kugalamoyo.
Kudziyidzika kwe nlulwami kunjinji,
koga Yahwe banonsunungula mu kuli kose.
Banotjengeta mafupa awe wose,
akuna ne ling'ompela lingavunika.
Bubi gowobulaya babi,
na ibabo banobenga balulwami banowolashiwa.
Yahwe banodzutunula butjilo gwe balanda babo;
akuna waibabo banotizhila mubali unowolashiwa.
Yahwe, nyanyayidzanani na ibabo
banonyanyayidzana nami,
igwani na ibabo banogwa nami!
Tolani tjivikili ne thumo,
mundimile!
Dusani thumo ne nsebe mubhayane
ne batatamili bangu!
Muti ku meya yangu,
“Ndimi sununguko iyo!”
Ngababhatisiwe shoni balengudziwe
ibabo banoshaka kundibulaya.
Ngabashandusiwe bakawumana
ibabo banolangana mbipo nge kwangu.
Ngabange bunye pana phepo,
Ntumwa wa Yahwe ngaabatutudzile mbeli.
Zila yabo ngayibe zhalima itedzemuke
ntumwa wa Yahwe akatatana nabo.
Bakanditeya nge gwanga gwabo ndisina nlandu,
bakanditshila bhuzhu ndisina nlandu.
Kulobesiwa ngakubawile batjakazwikangwang'wa.
Gwanga gwabakateya ngagubhate ibo,
ngabawile muguli balobesiwe.
Ipapo meya yangu inowoshatha muna Yahwe,
ishatha mu jidzo labo.
Mafupa angu wose anowoti,
“Yahwe, apa ndiyani unonga imwi kene?
Imwi munotjidza ibabo basina matatabuko
muna ibabo bakabasimila.
Motjidza basina matatabuko
ne basheti muna ibabo banobatolela.”
Batendeki babiibi banomilika,
banondibhuzwa zwithu zwandisingazibe.
Banondilipila ndulamo nge mbipo,
be siya meya yangu ili mu kudziyidzika.
Koga imi ndakati begwala aambala jila le saka,
azwidziyidza nge kuzwinyima zojiwa.
Ndakatembezela ndakakotamisila nsholo pa ifuba tjangu,
se ndinohwilazogwadza nzwalani kene mwana wa tate.
Ndakanga nthu unolilila mmeyabe,
ndakakotama ndilila.
Koga ndakati ndikuthiwa bakakubungana ngoshatha,
bakakubungana bebhayana nami,
zwilema zwandakabe ndisingazibe
zwikaleba bubi nge kwangu zwisingamise.
Bakandidadila bakandikuwelela,
bakandinyenamila nge lubengo.
Kowobe lini Yahwe makalingilila koga?
Mundigwile mu kundigwisa kwabo,
angulani butjilo gwangu mu shumba.
Ndizo ndowomuboka mu gubungano gulu,
mu gubungano lakasima ndowomukudza.
Musiletje zwita zwangu zwinondibenga,
zwikashathila kudziyidzika kwangu,
kakale musiletje ibabo banondibengela suli
bakatsika zhisho nge kushatha.
Ngobe abatoleba mbakiso,
koga banolukila bagedzikane
mu shango matama e kutjebela.
Banondiashamisila milomo yabo kwazo,
beti “Ehe, Ehe, mesho edu atjibona tjashingikala.”
Yahwe, makubona,
musinyalale.
She, musi be kule nami.
Muzwizunguze mumile fanilo yangu,
mundimile Ndzimu wangu She wangu!
Lakidzani kuti andina nlandu
kuyendidzana nge ndulamo yenyu
Yahwe Ndzimu wangu,
musibaletje bakandidadila.
Musibaletje bakazwidwa bakati,
“Ehe, yemula dze mimoyo yedu dzashingikala.”
Musibaletje bakati, “Tapedza naye!”
Thamani kuti bose banoshathila kudziyidzika
kwangu babhakhwe nge shoni
bahwumane balengudzike.
Thamani kuti shoni dzitshe
banozwikudza pezhugwi kwangu.
Banoshathila kutambunuka kwangu
ngabamimile nge kushatha,
ngono bapaphe bati, “Yahwe bankulu,
ibo banoshathila mamuko akanaka e nlanda wabo.”
Ipapo lulimi gwangu gowoleba ngekwe ndulamo yenyu
nenge kukudziwa kwenyu zhuba lose.
Kutjuluka nlayo we Ndzimu kwe mbimbi,
kukati mukatikati kwe moyo wangu,
mu nli kutja Ndzimu akupo.
Ngoti unozwitjengedza mu nkumbulo eti,
jinyo lile alingazibgwe likabengiwa.
Matama e nlomo uwe i mbipo ne kutjebela,
wakaletja kushinga nge butjenjedu
nenge kuthama tjakalulwama.
Unoluka maano mabiibi alilele mu ngubo dzidze,
wakazwilonga mu zila isakalulwama,
aatolambana ne bubi.
Yahwe ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike
goandamila kudzimu, kugalikamoyo
kwenyu koswika ku makole.
Ndulamo yenyu inotungama se matombo e Ndzimu,
kusumikilisa kwenyu konga gungwa gwakangina.
Nthu ne phuka mozwitjidza imwi Yahwe.
Ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike gosheteka seni, Ndzimu.
Bathu bose bangatizhila mu ntutshi we mapapiro enyu.
Banoja thundu ye ng'umba yenyu nge bunji gwayo,
mobang'wisa mu gwizi gwe kushatha kwenyu.
Ngobe mumuli kodwilila butjilo;
mu tjedza tjenyu tobona tjedza.
Dwilidzani ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike
muna ibabo banomuziba.
Ne jidzo lenyu ngalibe
kuna ibabo bakatambunuka mu moyo!
Musiletjedze bathu basina mazwibhato
bakanditshamba nge makumbo,
kene kuli iko kutatiwa nge babi.
Babi balele nge mitumbu;
bakalashigwa pasi, abatotubula milika.
Usizwidziyidze ngekwe bathu babi,
usitongo dwila moyo bashingi be mbipo.
Ngekuti banowobuna se bushwa,
bebe bewoma se mitinyana minyolo.
Galabgwe muna Yahwe, ushinge ndulamo
kuti ndizo ugale mu shango ushathile kugadzikana.
Shatha muna Yahwe,
ngono banowokupa yemula dze moyo uwo.
Biga butjilo gugo muna Yahwe,
galabgwe mubali ngono ibo banowoshinga.
Banowodusila ndulamo iyo patjena se tjedza
ne ndulamo iyo se masikati makulu.
Dzikama mbeli kwa Yahwe,
ubalindile nge moyo nlefu.
Usizwidziyidze ngekwe unodwilila mu zila iye,
kene iye unoluka mano akabipa.
Uzwidzibe mu kugwadzamoyo,
ne mu bushongola, goyisa mu mbipo koga.
Ngoti babi banolobesiwa, koga ibabo
banolindila Yahwe banothuwa shango.
Kowobe tjibakana koga,
babi banowobe basitjipo.
Kene ukalingisisa pa magalo awe,
unowobe asipo ipapo.
Koga bana moyo nnyolo banowothuwa shango,
ngono banowoshatha mu kubhudilila kwakawanda.
Mbi unolukila mano nlulwami,
enlinga nge lubengo.
Koga Yahwe banoseka mbi,
ngono banobona kuti zhuba lile laswika.
Babi banoshomola mathumo abo bakapeta matati abo,
kutemela pasi ibabo banosheta,
kubulaya ibabo bakatambunuka.
Mathumo abo anowobhaya mimoyo yabo,
matati abo anowovunika.
Kushomanana nlulwami kwaanako
koyita pa fumwa njinji ye babi.
Maboko e babi anowovung'wa,
koga Yahwe banowosimisa bakalulwama.
Yahwe banoziba mazhuba e basina nlandu,
ne lukata gwabo gowogala nge kusingapele.
Abangabhakhwe nge shoni mu misi yakabipa,
mu mazhuba e bhamba bana zwakalizana.
Koga babi banowoloba, zwita zwa Yahwe
zofanana ne bubuya gwe shango, zowopela se busi.
Mbi unoadzima ngono kasibgwilize tjaanokolota,
koga nlulwami aatonyimana, unopana.
Ibabo bakakombolegwa ndi
Yahwe banowothuwa shango,
koga babakalonga bhiso banowothubugwa.
Thambo dze nthu dzodwa muna Yahwe,
koga banosimisa banobashathisa.
Kene awa aatoti kakandalalila tjose,
ngoti Yahwe bakabhata luboko gugwe.
Ndakabe ndili ntukununu,
ngono ngwenu ndakwegula.
Koga andithu abona nlulwami elashiwa kene
bana babe bekumbila zojiwa.
Unopana tjibaka tjose kaadzimana,
ne bana babe banobe gombolelo.
Siya mbipo, ushinge ndulamo,
ndizo unowogala nge kusingapele.
Ngoti Yahwe banoda ndulamo,
abangasiye balulwami babo.
Balulwami banowotjengetiwa nge kusingapele,
koga bana be babi banowothubugwa.
Balulwami banowothuwa shango
bakagala mu ili nge kusingapele.
Nlomo we nlulwami unoleba butjenjedu
ne lulimi gugwe goleba ndulamo.
Nlayo we Ndzimu umu moyo uwe,
aatodzembeleka.
Mbimbi unolalila nlulwami,
eshaka kumbulaya.
Koga Yahwe abanganletjedzele mu simba lile,
kene kuli kunletja etilikwa nlandu ha esumikilisiwa.
Milila Yahwe ulondolodze zila yabo,
ibo banowokukudza ukathuwa shango,
unowobona kulobesiwa kwe babi.
Ndakabona nthu wakabipa
akapasula se nti we nsida we Lebhanoni.
Ndakapinda ipapo kakale ngono kabe asitjipo,
nenguba ndakanshaka kwakabe kusina paangawang'wa.
Linga nthu usina nlandu, ubone nthu wakatambunuka,
ngoti una bumangwana.
Koga batjuluki be nlayo banowolobesiwa tjose,
ludzi gwabo gowobulawa.
Jidzo le nlulwami lodwa kuna Yahwe,
ndibo dizhilo lile mu nsi we kudziyidzika.
Yahwe banobabhatsha bakabaangula,
banobaangula mu babi,
ngekuti banotizhila kubali.
Yahwe, musinditjemele makagwadzamoyo,
kene kundilaya nge bushongola.
Misebe yenyu yakadzikila mundili,
ne tjiazha tjenyu tjandikatsha.
Akutjina mamuko mu mbili wangu,
nge kugwadzamoyo kwenyu,
akutjina mamuko mu mafupa angu nge tjibi tjangu.
Ngobe tjibi tjangu tjakandipinda,
tjotjinga ntolo unondilemela.
Mbonje dzangu dzonyikishila kakale dzonuhwa
nge bulengwe gwangu.
Ndakagogonyala ndakagoba,
zhuba lose, ndoyendayenda ndilila.
Mbili wangu unopisa,
akuna kuzwihwa mu mbili wangu.
Anditjina gwangu ndapelegwa,
ndogomela nge kuhwazogwadza kwe moyo wangu.
She, zose zwandakashuba mozwiziba,
kugomela kwangu akuzosumbikala kumuli.
Moyo wangu unoloba, matatabuko angu anopela,
ne mesho angu aatjabona.
Bazwalani bangu ne bakhwinya bangu
bamilile kulekule nge mbonje dzangu,
ne makamu angu amile kutjena nami.
Ibabo banovima butjilo gwangu bakanditeya;
ibabo banoshaka kundihwisa zogwadza
banoleba ngekwe kundikubadza,
banolangana bupitipiti zhuba lose.
Koga ndonga bhubuzebe, anditohwa,
ndonga mbebebe isingalebeleke.
Ee, ndonga nthu usingahwe,
ne nlomo uwe usingalebeleke.
Koga ndimilile imwi Yahwe,
ndimwi Yahwe Ndzimu wangu munowodabila.
Ndotembezela nditi,
“Tjikulu musiletje bakashatha nge kwangu,
ibabo banondikuwelela ha ndisodzoloka!”
Ndabepejo ngowa,
gwadziwa akutopela mundili.
Ndozwileba jinyo langu;
ndohwisiwa zogwadza nge tjibi tjangu.
Babengi bangu imi ndisina nlandu nabo bakasima,
banjinji banondibenga kusi nge fanilo.
Ibabo banobgwilizila ndulamo nge bubi
banonditjinya zina ngoti ndoshinga ndulamo.
Musindilashe Yahwe.
Ndzimu wangu, musibekule nami.
Libilidzilani kundibhatsha,
imwi She jidzo langu.
Ndakati, “Ndowotjengeta zila dzangu
kuti ndisitongotjinya nge lulimi gwangu,
ndowobhata nlomo wangu ha babi bali pandili.”
Ndakazwiyita tjimumu ha nyalala,
azwibhata kukasibhatshe tjimwe.
Kuhwazogwadza kwangu kukapaphidzika.
Moyo wangu ukapisa mukati kwangu.
Ndakati ndiaalakana kwazokwazo, moto ukapisa,
ngono alebeleka nge lulimi gwangu.
“Yahwe, thamani kuti ndizibe bhelelo langu,
nenge mbalo ye mazhuba angu.
Thamani kuti ndizibe kuti butjilo
gwangu gopela gulibilidza tjini.”
Makathama mazhuba angu kabe mashomanana,
ne butjilo gwangu ategulitjinwe mu mesho enyu.
Malebeswa hwuti mmwe ne mmwe unonga meya yafemiwa.
Malebeswa hwuti nthu unoyenda se ntutshi
Malebeswa kuti banodziyidzikila suli,
unokubunganya fumwa asingazibe ntoli wayo.
Ngono ngwenu She, nditjakalindilani?
Ndogalabgwe mumuli.
Mundisunungule mu matjinyo angu.
Musindithame iseko tje zwilengwe.
Ndi tjimumu anditozhula nlomo wangu,
ngobe ndimwi makathama ikoku.
Dusani shamu yenyu mundili,
ndatjishakadzwa ngotibugwa nge luboko gwenyu.
Ha muloba nthu mu ntjemelela tjibi,
molobesa zwaanoda se sola.
Malebeswa nthu unonga meya koga yafemiwa.
Ihwani ntembezelo wangu Yahwe,
muteedzeni tjililo tjangu,
musinyalale ha nditebula mishodzi.
Ngoti ndi mwezi wenyu unopinda,
ndin'yendi sa bobatategulu bangu bose.
Musinditjebuke kuti ndizo ndibone kushatha
ndisathu ayenda, ndisingawobong'wa kakale.
Ndakalindila Yahwe nge moyo nlefu,
bakanditeedza bakahwa tjililo tjangu.
Bakandidusa mu gomba lina mbatsha,
bakandidusa mu dope.
Bakandimisa pezhugwi kwe shongwe,
besimisa thambo dzangu.
Bakalonga lumbo lutshwa mu nlomo wangu,
lumbo gwe gudzo ku Ndzimu wedu.
Banji banowobona bakatja,
ndizo banowogalabgwe Yahwe.
Wakakombolegwa nthu
unogalabgwe muna Yahwe.
Usingayende kuna banozwikudza,
kuna ibabo banolashika betobela
midzimu ye manyepkhwa.
Yahwe Ndzimu wangu, makashinga
mishingo yenyu inotjenamisa
ne njalakang'wa dzenyu nge kwedu,
akuna mmwe unonga imwi.
Ha ndabe ndingaleba nge kwazo,
ate zwingabalika nge bunji.
Zwibhayilo ne zwipo ate izo zwamunoyemula,
koga tjamakandipa i zebe inohwa.
Zwipo zwinopisiwa ne zwipo zwinodusigwa tjibi,
amuzotongozwishaka.
Ndizo ndakati, “Bonani, ndozha;
mu lukwalo kwakakwagwa nge kwangu.
Ndoshathila kuthama kuda kwenyu,
Ndzimu wangu nlayo wenyu umu moyo wangu.”
Ndakaleba ndebo mbuya ye
kutjidziwa mu gubungano gulu.
Sekwa munoziba andizozhalila
nlomo wangu anyalala Yahwe.
Andizosumbika bhatsho yenyu
inotjidza mukati kwe moyo wangu.
Ndakaleba ngekwe kugalikabgwe
kwenyu nenge jidzo lenyu.
Andizosumbika ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike
nenge kugalikabgwe kwenyu mu gubungano gulu.
Musindishayile ngoni Yahwe,
ludo gwenyu ngusingazunguzike ne kugalikabgwe
kunditjengete nge kusingapele.
Zwibiibi zwisina mbalo zwakandipoteleka.
Zwibi zwangu zwakandikulila
kuswikila ndisingatjabone.
Zopinda mavudzi e nsholo wangu,
moyo wangu wandipedza masimba.
Shathisiwani nge kunditjidza Yahwe.
Yahwe libilidzani kundibhatsha.
Bose banoshaka kundibulaya
ngababhatisiwe shoni bahwumanyiwe.
Ngababgwiliziwe shule basilumbidziwe
ibabo banoshaka kundikubadza.
Ngabakaabadziwe ngobhatisiwa shoni kwabo
ibabo banoti kundili, “Ehe, Ehe!”
Koga bose banomushaka
ngabapululudze bashathe mumuli.
Bose banoda jidzo lenyu
ngabagale beti, “Ku nkulu Yahwe!”
Koga imi nge kwangu ndi nshayi ndosheta,
koga Yahwe banokumbula nge kwangu.
Ndimwi bhatsho ne nsununguli wangu,
musinonoke Ndzimu wangu.
Iye unokumbula bashayi wakakombolegwa,
Yahwe banonsunungula mu nsi we mbatsha.
Yahwe banontjengeta bakantjidza.
Unodang'wa wakakombolegwa.
Amutonletjedzela kuda kwe zwita zwizwe.
Yahwe banonsimisa ha ali mu thobo dzinopisa.
Mompodza mu kugwala kukwe mukansimisa.
Nge kwangu imi ndakati,
“Yahwe, mundihwile ngoni
mundipodze, ngoti ndakamutjinyila.”
Zwita zwangu nge yemula mbimbi zoti nge kwangu,
“Unowofa lini zina lile likatongokanganika?”
Koga ha mmwe ezha kuwondibona,
unoleba matama asina tjaanodwa,
mu moyo uwe ekubunganya zwakabipa.
Ha ebhudila kuzhe unozwiandamisa.
Bose bakandibenga banondiseba,
banokumbula kuti ndowowigwa ne zwakabipisisa.
Beti tjithu tjinobulaya tjakandinamatila,
aatjowomuka kakale paalele.
Naiye nzwalani wangu nkulu
wandakabe ndigalabgwe munli,
iye watakabe tija tjiwunga tjangu tose,
wakatjindishandukila.
Koga imwi, Yahwe, ibeni ne ngoni nami
mundimilidze kuti ndibabgwilizile.
Ndiyeyo zila ndowoziba kuti moshathiswa ndimi,
ngoti tjita tjangu atjizondikunda.
Koga makandisimisa nge zila yekutambunuka kwangu,
mukandigadza pa muli nge kusingapele.
Ngabakudziwe Yahwe Ndzimu we Iziraela,
kudwa ntolo kunoti ne kusingapele kose.
Ngakujalo Ngakujalo.
Ndzimu, ndakamushuba
se bhizha lishuba vula dzinowunga.
Meya yangu ina nyota ye Ndzimu.
Ndowodza abona buso gwe Ndzimu lini?
Mishodzi yangu yatjibe zojiwa zwangu
siku ne sikati,
ha bathu ibo bedwilila beti kundili,
“Ungayi Ndzimu uwo?”
Zwithu izwezwi ndozwikumbula
andidusa tjinogwadza meya yangu:
Sekwa ndakayenda ne bunji,
ndakagutungamila takalongolokela ku ng'umba ye Ndzimu,
timimila nge kushatha nenge njimbo dzinoboka,
mbunga uli mu nzano.
Ini uli mu buyendasi iwe meya yangu,
ini wakanyalala mukati kwangu?
Galabgwe mu Ndzimu ngoti ndowowukudza kakale,
iwo bhatsho yangu
ne Ndzimu wangu.
Meya yangu imu buyendasi mukati kwangu,
ndizo ndomukumbula
ndili mu shango ye Jorodani neye Heremoni,
kudwa ku dombo le Miza.
Misundila inodana misundila
mu nsindo we mabilila enyu.
Matuthu ne mabundo e vula yenyu akandifukidza.
Masikati Yahwe banolakidza ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike,
mu busiku ndomba lumbo gwabo,
ntembezelo ku Ndzimu we butjilo gwangu.
Ndodwa Ndzimu shongwe yangu nditi,
“Ini makandikangang'wa?
Ini ndakafanila yendayenda nge kuhwazogwadza
ndakatshambilidziwa nge tjita?”
Ndonga ndina banga gulu mu mbili wangu,
banyanyayidzi bangu banondisapula,
bedwilila beti,
“Ungayi Ndzimu uwo?”
Ini uli mu buyendasi meya yangu,
ini ulinyelele mukati kwangu?
Galabgwe mu Ndzimu, ngobe ndowoti kakale awukudza,
mbhatshi wangu, Ndzimu wangu.
Lakidzani kusabe ne nlandu kwangu, Ndzimu,
mundigwile mu bathu basingazibe Ndzimu,
mundigwile mu batjengedzi basina ndulamo.
Ngoti mu Ndzimu wandinotizhila mu wuli,
ini makandilasha?
Ini ndiyendayenda nge kuhwazogwadza
ndakatshambilidziwa nge tjita?
Tumani tjedza ne malebeswa enyu,
ngazwinditungamile
ngazwindiyise ku dombo lenyu lakayengemala
ne kubugalo gwenyu.
Ipapo ndowoyenda ku tjibeso tje Ndzimu,
ku Ndzimu iwo kushatha kwangu,
ngono ndowomukudza nge dende,
Ndzimu, Ndzimu wangu.
Ini uli mu buyendasi meya yangu,
ini wakanyalala mukati kwangu?
Galabgwe mu Ndzimu,
ngoti nditjawowukudza kakale,
bhatsho yangu Ndzimu wangu.
Takahwa nge dzedu zebe, Ndzimu,
bobatategulu bedu bakatibudza,
mishingo yamakashinga mu misi yabo,
mu mazhuba a ntolo.
Imwi nge maboko enyu makatata tjaba,
koga ibo mukabadzikila,
makadziyidza njudzi,
koga ibo mukabasunungula.
Abazotapa shango nge mathumo abo
ne tjiazha tjabo atjizobapa kukunda
koga nge tjiazha tjenyu tje luji ne luboko gwenyu
ne tjedza tje buso gwenyu,
ngoti makabashathila.
Imwi mu She nkulu wangu ne Ndzimu wangu,
ndimwi munolaula kuti Jakubo akunde.
Nge simba lenyu toligila pasi zwita zwedu,
nge zina lenyu totshambila pasi banogwa naswi.
Ngoti anditogalabgwe mu dati langu,
kene thumo langu alinganditjidze.
Koga makatigwila mu zwita zwedu,
mukashanganya misholo ye banotibenga.
Todwilila tizwikudza mu Ndzimu,
kakale towoboka zina lenyu nge kusingapele.
Koga makatilasha mukatiyisa pasi,
amuzoyenda ne babhayani bedu.
Makathama kuti titizhe zwita zwedu,
zwita zwedu zwakatapa thundu dzedu.
Makatithama tikanga pkhwizi dzinobhayiwa,
mukatipaladza nge zwitjaba.
Makatengesa bathu benyu nge themba isi ye tjimwe,
kusina tjinomubuyila mu thengeso yabo.
Makatithama sapa le babakidzani bedu,
todadigwa ndi ibabo bakatipoteleka.
Makatithama tikabe sumo mu zwitjaba,
tabe iseko pakati kwe bathu.
Zhuba lose ndolengudzika,
ne shoni dzandikombola,
ngekwe matama e batukani ne badadili,
nge kubona tjita ne mbuzuludzi.
Kose ikoku kwakadelukila mutili,
nenguba tisakamukangang'wa,
kene kuli kushandukila tjidumano tjenyu.
Mimoyo yedu ayizoshandukila shule,
ne makumbo edu aazobhuda mu zila yenyu,
kwamungabe makativunilila mu tjimo tje phungubgwe,
makatifukidza nge zhalima gulu.
Ha tabe takakangang'wa zina le Ndzimu,
kene takanamata ndzimu upoga.
Apa Ndzimu wabe usingake ukaziba ikoku kene?
Ngobe unoziba zwikohwa zwe moyo.
Tobulawa zhuba lose nge kwenyu,
tonga pkhwizi dzinobhayiwa.
Muzwimuse! Mulelileni, She?
Mukani, musitilashile tjose!
Ini musumbika buso gwenyu?
Ini mukangang'wa dziyidzika kwedu
ne kutshambilidzwa kwedu?
Tatjibhubama mu hwuluba,
mibili yedu yakakokomela pasi
Milikani muzhe kuwotibhatsha,
mutitjidze, muthamila ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike.
Moyo wangu unotebukana nge matama akanaka.
Matama angu ndakaalingisa kuna She nkulu.
Lulimi gwangu gonga pensele yakalulwamisigwa kukwala.
Iwe wakanaka kupinda balume bose,
milomo iyo izhele ludo.
Ndizo Ndzimu wakakukombolela nge kusingapele.
Dedelani thumo lenyu imwi muna masimba,
ndumbidzo nge yenyu ne buzinda.
Mu buzinda gwenyu kundilani malebeswa
kubakilila ndulamo.
Luboko gwenyu gwe luji ngagumudiye mishingo inotjisa.
Misebe yenyu inopitsha
inobhaya mimoyo ye zwita zwa She nkulu.
Bathu banowila kusi kwenyu.
Tjigalo tjenyu tje bushe tjigelile tjose.
Ludozo gwenyu gwe bushe ludozo gwe ndulamo.
Moda ndulamo mukabenga bubi.
Ndizo Ndzimu, iwo Ndzimu wenyu,
wakamupa tjibombo pezhugwi kwe balizani namwi
nge kumuzhodza mafuta e kushatha.
Hazu dzenyu dzonuhwilila mira ne gonde ne khasiya.
Mu mbako dze bushe dzakabakwa nge nyanga dze zhowu
kolila zwilidzo zwe misungo zwinomushathisa.
Bakololokadzi ba boshe bakulu
bapakati kwe bakadzi banolumbidziwa,
ku luboko gugo gwe luji kumile Nfumakadzi
akaambala golide ye Ofi.
Ihwa, iwe nkololokadzi, kumbula uzhule zebe,
kangang'wa bakanyi kwenyu ne be nsha wa tate babo.
She nkulu banowoshathisiwa nge bubuya gugo.
Se bali she uwo, ubatete.
Bathu be Tire banowoshaka ludo gugo nge zwipo,
bafumi kupindisa.
Fumwa dzose ngosiyana kwadzo.
Nkololokadzi wa she nkulu umu ng'umba iye
akaambala hazu dzakalukiwa nge golide.
Unowotungamiligwa kuna she nkulu
akaambala hazu dzina mibalabala,
epelekwa nge baanadi.
Na ibobo banowozhisiwa kumuli.
Banopululudza bakashatha bakatungamigwa
bengina mu ng'umba ye bushe ya she nkulu.
Mu bumo gwa bobatategulu benyu
kowobe ne bakololo benyu,
mowobathama bakabe boshe mu shango.
Ndowothama kuti zina lenyu likudziwe mu zwizekugwana zose.
Ndizo njudzi dzowomukudza nge kusingapele.
Ndzimu i dizhilo ledu kakale i simba ledu,
i bhatsho ipejo pejo mu lubaka gwe kudziyidzika.
Ndizo atingatje, nenguba shango ingashanduka
nenguba matombo angatetema
mu kudzongeka kwe vula ye gungwa.
Nenguba vula ye gungwa ingawona ikatutuma mafulo,
nenguba matombo angatetema mu kudzongeka kwe vula ye gungwa.
Kuna gwizi gwe vula inoshathisa nzi nkulu we Ndzimu,
bugalo gwakayengemala gwa iye Upezhugwi zhugwi.
Ndzimu upakati kwe nzi nkulu, awunga tshedugwe nge tjimwe;
Ndzimu unowobhatsha nzi nkulu mu mangwanana makulu.
Zwitjaba zwakadzongeka, ne mibuso inotetema
Ndzimu unodusa hwi lawo, shango ikanyauka.
Yahwe we mibunga unaswi;
Ndzimu wa Jakubo i dizhilo ledu
Izhani mubone mishingo ya Yahwe;
bonani kudziyidzika kwabakazhisa mu shango.
Banothama kuti ngwa dzime ne kunopelela shango;
banovuna dati bakathubulila thumo
banopisa zwivikili nge moto.
“Dzikama, uzibe kuti ndi Ndzimu!
Ndokudziwa pakati kwe zwitjaba.
Ndomilidzigwa pezhugwi mu shango.”
Yahwe we mibunga unaswi
Ndzimu wa Jakubo i dizhilo ledu.
Lobani phande, imwi bathu mose;
Mimililani Ndzimu mumbile pezhugwi njimbo dze shatho.
Ngobe Yahwe, ibo bapezhugwizhugwi banotjisa,
ndi She nkulu kupinda we shango yose.
Bakathama kuti bathu babe pasi kwedu,
ne zwitjaba bakazwiyisa kusi kwe makumbo edu.
Ndizo bakatishalila lukata,
ndiko shatha kwa Jakubo iye wabanoda.
Ndzimu wayenda pezhugwi nge mpululu,
ibo Yahwe bayenda nge nlidzo we lunyanga;
Mbilani Ndzimu njimbo dze gudzo, imbani njimbo dze gudzo!
Mbilani She nkulu njimbo dze gudzo, imbani njimbo dze gudzo!
Ndzimu ndiwo She nkulu we shango yose,
mu nkudze nge njimbo.
Ndzimu ndi She nkulu we zwitjaba;
Ndzimu ugele mu tjigalo tjawo tjakayengemala tje bushe.
Bakololo be bushe banokubungana bali bathu
be Ndzimu wa Abhurahama.
Zwivikili zwe shango ngezwe Ndzimu;
bakamilidzigwa pezhugwi tjoselele.
Yahwe bankulukulu kakale bakafanila kudziwa kukulukulu
mu nzi nkulu we Ndzimu wedu.
Dombo labo lakayengemala,
lakanaka nge bulefu gwalo,
ndilo shatho ye shango yose,
Dombo le Ziyoni, kulekule kubunamdzwa,
iwo nzi nkulu wa She nkulu.
Mu matizhilo e nzi nkulu
Ndzimu wakazwilakidza uli iwo bhakasa lakasima,
Ndizo boshe bakulu bakakubungana,
bakashangana bose.
Bakati tjinyolotjo bebona ikoku bakatjenama kukulu;
bakalobgwa nge hana, bakatola makumbo bakatizha
Ipapo kutetema kukabe mubali,
bakabe nge zwibhayo zwinonga zwe nkadzi unotshibama,
Se phepo inodwa ku bhezhuba
ipkhwanya migoro ye Thashishi.
Sekwa takati tikahwa, ngwenu tatjizwibonegwa
mu nzi nkulu wa Yahwe we mibunga, muna
iwo wakabambiwa nge Ndzimu nge kusingapele kose.
Wakabambiwa nge Ndzimu ukagalila tjose nge kusingapele kose.
Tokanuka ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike Ndzimu,
pakati pe ng'umba yenyu.
Zina lenyu, koga sekudziwa kwenyu,
nailo loswika ku phelelo dze shango.
Luboko gwenyu gwe luji gokunda kwazo.
Dombo le Ziyoni ngalishathe,
mizi ye Juda ngayishathe
nge zila yekusumikilisa kwenyu.
Yenda mu nzi we Ziyoni, uwupoteleke,
bala thungamakole dzawo.
Alakana kwazo makuma akabakilila
nzi nkulu iwoyo ne matizhilo awo
kuti ndizo ubudze tjizekugwana tjinowozha.
Kuti iwoyu Ndzimu,
Ndzimu wedu nge kusingapele kose,
unowobe ntungamili wedu nge kusingapele kose!
Ihwani woku imwi bathu bose;
teedzani imwi bagali be shango yose,
bapasi kose ne bakamilidzika,
bafumi kose ne bashayi.
Nlomo wangu unowoleba butjenjedu;
ndebeleko ye moyo wangu inowobe kuhwisisa.
Ndowoteedza makungulupeswa;
ndowolidza dende awana dabilo ye malipa.
Ini nditja mu misi ye kudziyidzika,
ha matjinyo aibabo banobhayana
nami akandipoteleka,
ibabo banogalamoyo mu fumwa dzabo kakale
bezwikudza ngekwe bunji gwe thundu dzabo?
Malebeswa, akuna nthu tjaangatenganya butjilo nditjo,
akuna themba nthu yaangabigila Ndzimu nge kwago.
Tjinotenganya butjilo themba yatjo i pezhugwi kwazo,
kakale akungashingikale
kuti nthu atjilile tjose, asitongongina mu gomba.
Ngobe atilinga batjenjedu, towana befa;
tjilengwe ne tjihema banoloba bose
besiyila bamwe fumwa yabo.
Zwikumbu ndizo mizi yabo nge kusingapele,
ndiwo magalo abo ne zwizekugwana zose,
nenguba bakatumila shango nge mazina abo.
Koga nthu angagalile tjose mu kuzwikudza kukwe
unonga phuka dzinoloba.
Elo ndilo bhelelo le zila ye bulengwe,
bhelelo la ibabo banoshathisiwa nge thundu dzabo.
Se pkhwizi, bakashaligwa gomba le lufu;
lufu gowobe nlisi wabo;
banodelukila koga mu ikumbu,
ne mbumbiko yabo inowokolomoka;
Gomba le lufu ndilo linowobe nzi wabo.
Koga Ndzimu unowodzutunula meya yangu
mu simba le lufu,
ngobe iwo unowondiamutjila.
Musitje ha bamwe befuma,
ha fumwa dze mizi yabo dzipaphidzika.
Ngobe ha befa akuna tjabanowosenga,
fumwa yabo ayitowobatobela.
Nenguba mu butjilo gwabo bakabe bezwidwa beti bakashatha,
ngoti nthu unokudziwa ha wuzwithamila kwakanaka,
banowoyenda kuna bobatategulu babo,
ibabo basingatjawobona tjedza kakale.
Koga nthu angagalile tjose mu kuzwikudza kukwe;
unonga phuka dzinoloba.
Ibo nkulukulu, Ndzimu Yahwe,
banolebeleka kakale banodana shango
kudwa mu kubhuda kwe zhuba kunoti kungina kwalo.
Kudwa mu Ziyoni, igo bubuya nge kwago,
Ndzimu unopenyelela.
Ndzimu wedu unozha kakale awutonyalala koga
wakatungamidza moto unonyeledza,
ne vula inona nge dutu yakabapoteleka.
Unodana kudzimu, kadana mu shango kuti
ndizo usumikilise bathu babo;
“Mundikubunganyile bagalimoyo, ibabo bakathama
tjidumano nami nge kudusa tjibhayilo!”
Kudzimu koleba ngekwe bululwami gwawo,
ngobe Ndzimu ngekwawo nsumikilisi.
“Hwililani, bathu bangu, ngono ndowolebeleka,
iwe Iziraela ndowotendeka ngekwe bubi gugo.
Ndimi Ndzimu, Ndzimu uwo.
Anditokutjemelela zwibhayilo zwizo;
zwibhayilo zwizo zwakapisiwa zwipa mesho
angu tjibaka nge tjibaka.
Anditowoamutjila nkono unodwa ku nzi uwo
kene dzili mbudzi mu danga lilo.
Ngobe phuka imwe ne imwe ye shango nge yangu
na idzo ng'ombe dzimu matombo ali tjiwulu.
Ndoziba nyuni dzose mu shango,
ne tjimwe ne tjimwe tjinoyenda mu shango nge tjangu.
“Ha ndabe ndina zhala, ndabe ndisingawomubudza,
ngobe shango na kose kumu ili nge kwangu.
Apa ndoja nyama ye mikono kene,
na iwo malopa e mbudzi apa ndoang'wa kene?
Ipa Ndzimu tjipo tje kuboka,
ulipe tuna kuko kuna iye Upezhugwi zhugwi.
Undidane mu nsi wekudziyidzika;
ndowokutjidza, ngono unowondikudza.”
Koga ku babi Ndzimu ukati,
“Unotola ngayi kuleba ndaulo dzangu
kene kuli kuleba ngekwe tjidumano tjangu nge nlomo uwo?”
Unobenga tjemegwa,
kakale unoposela matama angu kutjena nawe.
Ha ubona mbava unozwihwananya nayo,
kakale unogala ntutshi ne phombgwe.
“Unoletjedza nlomo uwo ukalaugwa nge bubi,
ne lulimi gugo goleba bupitipiti.
Unogala pasi ukaleba kusakalulwama ngekwe
wakanyi kuko.
Unobulaya mwana wa mmeyabo.
Zwithu izwezwi wakazwithama ngono ndagala ndilinyelele;
wakabe ukumbula kuti ndimmwebo unofanana nawe.
Koga ngwenu ndokutjemela ndakasimisila
kakale ndikutilika nlandu.
“Zibani woku, imwi munokangang'wa Ndzimu,
kusijalo ndowomupalula na pakati,
ngono akuna unowomutjidza.
Ibabo banozhisa zwibhayilo zwe kuboka banondikudza;
kuna ibabo banoyenda mu zila ye malebeswa,
ndowobalakidza jidzo le Ndzimu.”
Ibeni ne ngoni mundili, Ndzimu,
kuyendidzana nge ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike;
bukushani matjinyo angu kuyendidzana ne ngoni dzenyu.
Sukani milandu yangu kwazo,
kakale musuke tjibi tjangu.
Ngobe ndoziba milandu yangu,
ne tjibi tjangu tji mbeli kwangu misi yose.
Ndakatjinyidzila imwi koga,
ndikathama tjakabipa mu mesho enyu,
kuti ndizo shamu yamunoloba bathu benyu ibe mu malebeswa
ne ngekuti mushayiwe nlandu ha mupedza ndebo.
Malebeswa hwuti ndakazwagwa ndina jinyo,
ndakabe ntjinyi mme yangu betola ntumbu.
Moshaka lebeswa mukatikati kwe nthu;
ndizo mundidiye butjenjedu mu moyo wangu.
Mundisuke nge hosapu ndizo ndowobe mbuyanana;
mundisuke, ndizo ndowobe ntjena kupinda kapuku.
Thamani kuti ndihwe mpululu ne shatho;
thamani kuti mafupa amakapkhwanya ashathe.
Zwimbani mesho enyu kuti musibone zwibi zwangu,
kakale mubukushe milandu yangu yose.
Bumbani mundili moyo mbuyanana, Ndzimu,
kakale mulonge meya tshwa yakalulwama mukati kwangu.
Musinditatile kutjena namwi,
kakale mosinditolele Meya yenyu yakayengemala.
Mundibgwilizile shatho ye jidzo lenyu,
kakale musimise mukati kwangu meya inoshaka ndulamo.
Ndizo ndowodiya batjinyi zila dzenyu,
ngono batjinyi banowoshandukila kumuli.
Munditjidze mukutebula lopa, Ndzimu,
Imwi Ndzimu we jidzo langu,
ngono lulimi gwangu gowombila pezhugwi ngekwe jidzo lenyu.
She, mumunulani nlomo wangu,
ndizo ndowomukudza ndiwo.
Amutoda zwibhayilo;
Ha ndabe ndingadusa zwipo zwakapisiwa,
amungazwishathile.
Tjibhayilo tjinoamutjilika ku Ndzimu,
i meya yakahwa zogwadza;
moyo umukuhwa zogwadza amungaulingile pasi.
Thamilani Ziyoni kwakalulwama mu kushatha kwenyu;
bakani kakale makuma e Jerusalema,
ndizo mowoshathisiwa nge zwibhayilo zwakapelela zwakapisiwa;
ndizo mikono inowobhayigwa mu zwibeso zwenyu.
Ini uzwikudza, iwe wakasima.
Uzwikudzila salulwama
zhuba lose,
unoshwa ualakana tjinya
lulimi gugo gonga reza,
bhitipiti ndiwe.
Unoda bubi kupinda ndulamo;
kakale unoda manyepkhwa kupinda malebeswa.
Unoda matama wose e kutjinya,
iwe lulimi gwe ntjengedzi!
Koga Ndzimu unowokukolomola nge kusingapele;
unowokudzamula ukakulashila kuzhe kwe nshasha uwo
unowokudzikunula mu shango ye batjili.
Balulwami banowobona, bakatja, ngono
banowoseka nshingi we bubi, beti,
“Bonani iye iwoyu usingake katizhila mu Ndzimu,
koga wakagalabgwe mu fumwa njinji,
kathama fumwa ikabe dizhilo lile!”
Koga imi ndonga ntoba mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu.
Ndogalabgwe mu ludo gwe Ndzimu gusingazunguzike
nge kusingapele kose.
Ndowomuboka nge kusingapele,
ngekwe tjamathama.
Ndowoleba ngekwe zina lenyu pana ibabo
banogalabgwe mumuli, ngobe zina lenyu lakalulwama.
Tjilengwe tjoti mu moyo watjo,
“Akuna Ndzimu.”
Bakabola nkumbulo, banothama zwithu zwakabipa;
Akuna iye unothama tjakalulwama.
Ndzimu unolinga bathu uli kudzimu
kubona kuti kene kuna wakatjenjela,
unoshaka Ndzimu.
Bose bakawa, bose banofanana koga,
mukusalulwama kwabo;
akuna iye unothama kwakalulwama,
aa, ndodwa ne nng'ompela dumbu.
Apa abana luzibo, ibabo bashingi be bubi kene,
ibabo banoja bathu bangu se banoja tjiwunga,
kakale basingadane Ndzimu?
Ipapo banowobe ne kutja kukulu,
mu kutja kusathu kukatongobe yapo,
ngobe Ndzimu unowopaladza mafupa e basina budzimu;
banowobhatisiwa shoni, ngobe Ndzimu wakabalasha.
Dzene jidzo le Iziraela labe lidwa mu Ziyoni!
Ndzimu aubgwiliza thundu ye bathu bawo,
Jakubo unowoshatha; Iziraela unowoshatha.
Munditjidze, Ndzimu, nge zina lenyu,
mundikundile nge simba lenyu.
Ihwani ntembezelo wangu, Ndzimu;
teedzani matama e nlomo wangu.
Bathu basina mazwibhato babe pezhugwi kwangu bendigwisa,
bathu basina ngoni banovima butjilo gwangu;
abatotungamidza Ndzimu mbeli kwabo.
Iko malebeswa, Ndzimu mbatshi wangu;
She mmilidzi we butjilo gwangu.
Unowobgwilizila zwita zwangu bubi gwazo.
Mukugalika bgwe kwenyu, mubapeleledze.
Nge tjipo tjandadusa nge ludo ndowomuthamila tjibhayilo;
ndowoboka zina lenyu, Ndzimu, ngobe lakalulwama.
Ndzimu wakanditjidza mukudziyidzika kose,
ngono zhisho langu lolinga zwita zwangu nge kukunda.
Teedzani ntembezelo wangu, Ndzimu;
musizwisumbikile kukumbila kwangu.
Mundibhatshe mundidabile;
ndodziyidzika mu kung'ong'ola kwangu.
Nsholo wangu wakashangashangana koga,
ngekwe zhoba ye tjita,
kakale ngekwe zhoba ye babi.
Banondisimisila butjilo,
banoshathisiwa nge kundigwadzila moyo.
Moyo wangu unogwadziwa kukulu,
lufu ne tjisa kwago zwimundili.
Lutjo ne tetema kwabe mundili,
ne kutjisa kunopalusa moyo kumundili.
Ndozwidwa nditi,
“Ha ndabe ndina mapapiro se njiba!
Ndabe ndowowuluka,
ayenda zwangu anonyaluluka;
Nge malebeswa, ndabe ndowotizhila kulekule;
ndabe ndowogala mu tjilambanyika;
Ndabe ndowolibilidzila kuzwiwanila bugalo
gwandinowotizhila phepo ne matutu muguli.”
She, shangashanganyani ndebo dzabo
mudzizhadze bulengwe;
ngoti ndobona bugebeng'a
ne kukwebakwebana mu nzi nkulu.
Siku ne sikati banopoteleka
liswingo gwakabakilila nzi nkulu,
butjinyi ne kudziyidzika zwimukati kwawo;
Kolomoka kwabe pakati kwawo;
matengeselo awo azhele
tshambilidzo ne bupitipiti.
Ate zwita zwinondidadila,
ngobe ndabe ndingadzikitadza;
ate babhayani nami banondishayila buthu,
ngobe ndabe ndowobagwatila.
Koga ndiwe, nkhwinya wangu,
iwe wandinogala ntutshi nawe,
nzwalani wangu wandakawolobela,
ibabo bandakabe ndibe nabo nge zila yakanaka;
takayenda mu Ng'umba ye Ndzimu ne mbunga.
Ngabazhigwe nge lufu;
ngabayende be tjila ku bugalo gwe bafi;
ngobe bubi gumu mizi yabo nenge mu mimoyo yabo.
Koga imi ndodana Ndzimu,
ngono Yahwe banowonditjidza.
Madekwana ne mangwanana nenge masikati
ndoleba ng'ong'olo yangu kakale ndigomela,
koga She banowohwa hwi langu.
Banowondidzutunula nge mbakiso
mu ngwa iyeyi yandinotangisa,
ngobe bathu banjinji bakazwilulwamisila kundigwisa.
Ndzimu, iwo ugele mu tjigalo tje bushe kudwa ntolo,
unowohwa, ngono unowobadelusa
ngobe abatoshanduka
kakale abatotja Ndzimu.
Nkhwinya wangu wakabhata nzwalani uwe nge maboko
ndizo kashandukila tjidumano tjedu.
Nge matama manyolo kupinda bhatha,
koga moyo uwe unoalakana ngwa koga;
nge matama manyolo kupinda mafuta,
koga malebeswa wukuti matama iyawo akabe ali mathumo akateya.
Tola mitolo iyo uyibige muna Yahwe;
ndizo banowokumilidza;
Yahwe abatowotongoletja balulwami bakatshedugwa.
Koga imwi, Ndzimu, mowobalashila pasi ibabo basakalulwama,
mu gomba lakangina.
Zwing'wamalopa ne mapitipiti abatowotjila
nenguba lili gaswa le mazhuba abo.
Koga imi ndowogalabgwe mumuli Ndzimu.
Ibeni ne ngoni kundili Ndzimu, ngobe bathu
banonditshamba nge makumbo;
zhuba lose zwita zonditshambilidza;
Zwita zwangu zonditshamba
nge makumbo zhuba lose,
ngobe bunji gogwa nami nge mazwikudzo.
Ha nditja,
ndogalabgwe mumuli.
Mu Ndzimu, iwo wandinokudza dama lawo,
ndogalabgwe mu Ndzimu ndisina lutjo;
nthu koga ungandishingani wali?
Zhuba lose banoshaka kundihwisa zogwadza
mikumbulo yabo ndeye kushaka kundithamila bubi.
Banozwikubunganya bakandilalila,
bakalingisisa mayendilo angu,
bezwidwa beti bangapedza butjilo gwangu,
ndizo buzuludzani jinyo labo;
mu bushongola gwenyu,
lashilani bathu ibabo pasi, imwi Ndzimu!
Makabala kuti ndakaposegwa
yeno na yeno kangana;
longani mishodzi yangu mu butili.
Apa azwizokwagwa mu hwalo
dzenyu dze kusumikilisa kene?
Ndizo zwita zwangu zowotizha
mu zhuba landinowodana.
Etji ndoziba kuti malebeswa,
kuti Ndzimu umile nami.
Mu Ndzimu, iwo wandinokudza dama lawo,
muna Yahwe, iye wandinokudza dama lile,
ndogalabgwe mu Ndzimu ndisina lutjo.
Nthu koga ungandithamani wali?
Gadzabgwe kwandakamuthamila ngotuna
ndakafanila kukulondolodza, Ndzimu;
Makatjidza meya yangu mu lufu,
ne makumbo angu mu kuwa,
kuti ndizo ndiyende mu mesho e Ndzimu
mu tjedza tje butjilo.
Ibeni nge ngoni mundili Ndzimu,
mundihwile ngoni,
ngobe mu mumuli meya yangu inowana dizhilo,
mu ntutshi we mapapiro enyu ndowana dizhilo,
kuswikila matutu e golomodzo epinda.
Ndolilila ku Ndzimu Upezhugwi zhugwi,
ku Ndzimu iwo unozhadzisa
kuda kwawo, uthamila imi.
Unowotumila uli kudzimu ukanditjidza,
unowobhatisa shoni ibabo
banonditshamba nge makumbo.
Ndzimu unowotumila ludo gwawo
gusingazunguzike nenge kugalikabgwe kwawo.
Ndilele pasi pakati kwe shumba
dzino zandabula bathu kwe bugovu;
meno adzo mathumo ne misebe,
ndimi dzabo mipanga ye ngwa inopitsha.
Kudziwani Ndzimu kupinda mazhuzhugwi.
Gudzo lenyu ngalibe mu shango yose.
Bakateya nge dati pandinotshamba
meya yangu yakabe yakashoba kwazo.
Bakatsha gomba mu zila yangu,
koga bakawila mulili ibo.
Moyo wangu wakadzikama, imwi Ndzimu,
moyo wangu wakadzikama.
Ndowomba lumbo athama nlidzo unozipa.
Muka meya yangu!
Muka tjilidzo tje dende ne tje laya,
ndowobinduka mazhokuyedza.
Ndowoyisa mboko yangu kumuli, She
pakati pe bathu;
ndowomba njimbo dzinomukudza pakati pe zwitjaba.
Ngobe ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike bukulukulu
goswika pezhugwizhugwi;
kugalikabgwe kwenyu koswika ku makole.
Kudziwani, Ndzimu, kupoteleka makole ndiyeno
gudzo lenyu ngalibe mu shango yose.
Apa imwi balauli motongoleba tje malebeswa kene?
Apa motongosumikilisa bathu kwakatambunuka kene?
Aa, moalakana zwisakalulwama mu mimoyo yenyu;
moshingisa maboko enyu kugwa mu shango.
Babi banopanduka batjazwagwa;
banotjinya kudwa mukuzwagwa kwabo,
beleba manyepkhwa.
Bana bushungu gunonga gwe nyoka
se thumbi isingahwe inozwizwina zebe,
kuti ndizo isihwe hwi le bazanisi be nyoka
na ibabo banolidzila nyoka nyele bedzizanisa kene bedzitshumwayidza
Ndzimu, vunani meno abo;
simulani meno e shumbana idzedzi, Yahwe!
Ngabanyelele, se vula yawunga;
ngabatshambiwe se bushwa bawomelele.
Ngabange mannyongovi tjinonyelela mu dope;
bange mwana washayiwa, usabona ilo zhuba.
Tjinyolotjo hali dzenyu dzisathu dzikahwa moto we mihwa,
minyolo kene inothuta, dzene Ndzimu ungabatshwayila ukabalasha!
Balulwami banowoshatha abebona mbuzuludzo ithamwa;
banowongula makumbo abo mu malopa e babi.
Bathu banowoti,
“Nge malebeswa balulwami banowana mbayilo.
Nge malebeswa Ndzimu unosumikilisa mu shango.”
Mundiangule mu zwita zwangu, Ndzimu;
mundivikile muna ibabo banondigwisa.
Mundiangule muna ibabo banoshinga bubi;
munditjidze muzwing'wamalopa.
Nangwenu bakandilalila beshaka pedza butjilo gwangu.
Ibabo bakasima banondigwisa,
ngono kusina mmwe nlandu
kene tjibi tjabanondigwisila Yahwe,
akuna itjo tjandakatjinya, koga banolabuka
bezwilulwamisila kundihwisa zogwadza.
Milikani, mundibhatshe kakale mubone tjinoshingikala!
Yahwe Ndzimu we mibunga, Ndzimu we Iziraela.
Mukani mulobe zwitjaba zose;
mushaye wamasiya waibabo bematjenjedu
banotjenjelela kuthama bubi.
Madekwana mamwe ne mamwe banobuya, bebukula
se mbgwa kakale beyendayenda mu nzi nkulu.
Habajee, banobomba nge milomo yabo,
ne matama anopitsha mu milomo yabo,
banoalakana beti, “Ndiani unowotihwa?”
Koga mobaseka, Yahwe
moseka tjaba dzose bulengwe.
Imwi simba langu, ndowogala ndilipejo namwi;
ngobe imwi, Ndzimu, ndimwi luswingo gwakandibakilila.
Ndzimu wangu unowondishanganidza mu ludo gwawo gusingazunguzike;
Ndzimu wangu unowothama kuti ndikunde zwita zwangu.
Musibabulaye, pamwe bathu bakanyi kwangu bangadwa bekangang'wa;
thamani kuti badzungayile nge simba lenyu,
mubadelusile pasi, imwi She, tjivikili tjedu.
Muthamila tjibi tje milomo yabo ne matama anodwa mu milomo yabo.
Ngababhatshigwe nge mazwikudzu abo.
Muthamila bhiso ne manyepkhwa abanoleba.
Mubalobese nge bushongola gwenyu,
mubalobese kuswikila bepelela.
Kuti bathu bazibe kuti Ndzimu unobusa tjaba ya Jakubo
kunoti ku phelelo dze shango.
Madekwana mamwe ne mamwe banobuya,
bebukula se mbgwa
kakale beyendayenda mu nzi nkulu.
Banotendeleka beshaka zojiwa,
kakale bebomba ha basingawane tjinobagutsha.
Koga ndowomba ngekwe simba lenyu;
ndowombila pezhugwi ngekwe ludo gwenyu
gusingazunguzike kuli mangwanana.
Ngobe makabe luswingo gwakandibakilila
nenge dizhilo langu mu nsi we kudziyidzika.
Imwi simba langu, ndowomumbila njimbo dzinomukudza,
ngobe imwi, Ndzimu, mu luswingo gwakandipoteleka,
mu iwo Ndzimu unondilakidza ludo gusingazunguzike.
Ndzimu, makatilasha, mukatifupatila,
makabe makagwadzamoyo ngatitjibgwililanani!
Makathama kuti shango itengenyeke;
makaipalula ikazhuka;
lulwamisani mikhwe imu shango, ngobe inozunguzika.
Makathama kuti bathu benyu badziyidziwe
nge zwithu zwinjinji zwakasima;
makatipa nkumbi kuti ting'we,
nkumbi iwoyo wakatidzungula.
Makabigila banomutja luvone,
kuti batizhile kuguli mathumo anodwa mu dati.
Thamani kuti tikunde nge luboko gwenyu,
kakale mutidabile,
kuti ndizo ibabo bamunoda batjidziwe.
Ndzimu wakalebeleka mu bugalo
gwawo gwakayengemala eti,
“Nge shatho ye kun'da kwangu,
ndowothubukanya Shekemu,
kakale ndowokobanya nkuku we Sakhoti.
Gileyadi nde yangu na Manase nde yangu;
Ifureimi i hwutshe ye tjivikili tje nsholo wangu,
Juda i swimbo yangu ye bushe.
Moabu i bhavu landinongulila;
Edomu iye ndomposa nge shangu yangu;
ndomimilila Filisitiya ngobe ndankunda.”
Ndiyani unowondiyisa ku nzi nkulu wakabakiligwa nge luswingo?
Ndiyani unowonditungamila ndiyenda ku Edomu.
Apa amuzotilasha kene Ndzimu?
Amutoyenda ne babhayani bedu Ndzimu.
Mutibhatshe mu zwita,
ngobe bhatsho ye nthu ayina nshingo.
Ndzimu unowotipa tjilopa
ndiwo unowotshamba zwita zwedu nge makumbo.
Ihwani tjililo tjangu Ndzimu,
hwililani ntembezelo wangu.
Ndomudana ndili ku phelelo dze shango,
ngoti moyo wangu usitjina matatabuko.
Munditungamile mu ndiyise ku dombo,
ilo lakakulila pezhugwi kundipinda.
Ngobe ndimwi dizhilo langu,
ndimwi mbako yakakulila pezhugwi kundivikila mu zwita.
Mundigadze mu nshasha wenyu nge kusingapele,
mundiwanile dizhilo kusi kwe mapapiro enyu.
Ngobe imwi, Ndzimu, makahwa tuna kwangu,
makandipa lukata gunopiwa ibabo banotja zina lenyu.
Paphidzani butjilo gwa She nkulu
dzene makole awe angaswika mu zwizekugwana zose.
Dzene angagala mu tjigalo tje bushe nge kusingapele
thamani kuti ludo gusingazunguzike
nenge bugalimoyo zwi nlise!
Ndizo ndowomba ndikudza zina lenyu misi yose,
ntome ndishingikadza kugadzabgwe kwandakagadzabgwe,
zhuba ne zhuba!
Meya yangu yakalindila Ndzimu koga nge kunyalala;
jidzo langu lodwa muwuli.
Ndzimu woga ndiwo bgwe langu kakale jidzo langu,
ndiwo luswingo gwakandibakilila;
anditowotongo zunguzika.
Apa mowotatana ne nthu wamunukunda kuswikila lini kene?
Kuti mutshindike guma lakaleleka,
guma linozunguzika kene?
Kulangana kwabo hwupinganyidza nthu unobhudilila.
Banoshathisiwa nge manyepkhwa.
Banokombolela nge milomo yabo,
koga mukati kwabo banolonga bhiso.
Meya yangu yakalindila Ndzimu koga nge kunyalala,
ngobe kugalabgwe kwangu kumu Ndzimu.
Ndzimu woga ndiwo jidzo langu,
ndiwo luswingo gwakandibakilila;
andingazunguziwe.
Tjidziwa kwangu ne kudziwa kwangu kumu Ndzimu
Ndzimu i dombo ne dizhilo langu.
Galanibgwe muwuli misi yose imwi bathu;
dusilani Ndzimu mazwihwo
anodwa mukatikati kwe mimoyo yenyu;
Ndzimu i dizhilo ledu.
Ibabo bapasi banonga mafemo e nthu,
ibabo bakamilidzika banonga mawoloto asina nshingo;
ha bebigwa mu ikale banobe balelulelu;
balelulelu kupinda phepo.
Usigalebgwe mu kutolela,
kakale usigalebgwe mu kukwiba;
ha fumwa ipaphidzika, usibige moyo uwo mu ili.
Ndzimu wakalebeleka ka nng'ompela;
imi ha hwa ikoku kabili:
kuti simba ngele Ndzimu,
nenge ludo gusingazunguzike
nge gwenyu, imwi She.
Molipa mmwe ne mmwe kuyendidzana ne mishingo iye.
Imwi Ndzimu, mu Ndzimu wangu, ndomushaka,
meya yangu ina nyota nge kwenyu;
moyo wangu unotshwigwa nge kwenyu,
ndonga shango yakawomelela kakale yakashakala isina vula.
Ndizo ndakamushaka mu bugalo gwenyu gwakayengemala,
ndibona simba lenyu ne bukulu gwenyu.
Ngoti ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzeke goyita pa butjilo,
ndizo ndowomukudza.
Ndizo ndowomukudza butjilo gwangu gose;
ndowomilidza maboko angu adana zina lenyu.
Meya yangu igedzikane se imu nzano nkulu,
ndizo ndomukudza nge kushatha
andimukumbula ndililele mubulalo gwangu,
kakale ndodana zina lenyu mu moyo wangu busiku gose,
ngoti ndimwi magala muli bhatsho yangu,
ndizo ndomba ngoshatha ndili mu ntutshi we mapapiro enyu.
Meya yangu yakamunamatila
luboko gwenyu gwe luji gwakandisimisa.
Koga ibabo banoshaka kukolomola butjilo gwangu
banowongina mu gomba lakangina le lufu kwazo,
banowolongwa thumo,
banowobe zojiwa zwa bophungubgwe.
Koga She nkulu unowoshatha mu Ndzimu;
bose banotuna ndiwo banowokudziwa,
ngobe milomo ye banyepi inowonyaladziwa.
Ihwani hwi langu, imwi Ndzimu, mu kung'ong'ola kwangu;
tjengetani butjilo gwangu mu tjita tjinotjisa.
Mundisumbike pa kulangana kwe babi,
ne mu goko le babi,
ibo banokuswa ndimi dzabo se mathumo
banoleba matama anobhaya se misebe,
beposa balilelile bathu basina nlandu;
banolibilidza beposa kakale basingatje.
Banonamatila mazwimisilo abo mabiibi;
banolebeleka ngekwe kuteya matati abo pakasumbikika,
bealakana beti, “Ndiani ungatibona?
Ndiani ungashakisisa kabona bugebeng'a gwedu?
Tabumba nkumbulo we kulalila nge butjenjedu.”
Moyo we nthu ne njalakang'wa dzidze zwimukatikati.
Koga Ndzimu unowobaposa nge nsebe wawo;
banowokubadziwa tjinyolotjo.
Nge zila ye ndimi dzabo, Ndzimu unowobalobesa;
bose banowobabona banowotetema ngotja.
Ndizo mmwe ne mmwe unowotja
banowoleba tjakazhisiwa nge Ndzimu,
bakakanuka tjawakathama.
Balulwami ngabashathe muna She
kakale batizhile muwuli.
Bose bakatambunuka mu moyo ngabakudziwe.
Gudzo nge lenyu, Ndzimu, mu Ziyoni;
kugadzabgwe kwedu towokushingikadza.
Imwi munodabila ntembezelo!
Mmwe ne mmwe unowozha kumuli.
Ngekwe zwibi zwedu,
ha matjinyo edu eti kulila,
motizwiibhatigwa.
Bakakombolegwa ibabo bamakashala
mukabazhisa kutjilila mu ng'umba yenyu.
Towogutshiwa nge ndulamo ye ng'umba yenyu,
ng'umba yenyu yakayengemala.
Nge mishingo inotjisa motidabila nge jidzo,
Ndzimu we jidzo ledu;
ndimwi galabgwe kwe phelelo dzose dze shango
ne gungwa gumwe ne gumwe.
Nge simba lenyu makathama matombo;
muna masimba makulu.
Monyaladza zhoba ye makungwa wose,
zhoba ye matuthu e vula dzawo,
kudzongana kwe bathu.
Ibabo banotjilila mu migathu ikule kule ye shango
banotjisiwa nge zwilakidzo zwenyu;
mothama zila dze mangwanana ne
dze madekwana dzikamimila ngoshatha.
Mokumba shango mukayidilidzila,
moyifumisa kwazo;
gwizi gwe Ndzimu guzhele vula;
mopa bathu mathunde,
ngobe makayilulwamisila ikoko.
Modilidzila ngolo dzayo kwazo,
mutambunudza mabundo ayo
munyolodza mavu ayo nge midumbi,
mukombolela kula kwe zwidzwalo.
Moambadza lubaka gwe gole nge tjiala tje guto;
pa mapinda fumwa inotebukana.
Mafulo amu tjilambanyika anotebukana nge zojiwa,
matombo anozwiambadza shatho,
Makula amuhwunde ye gwizi azhele pkhwizi ne mbudzi,
minda izhele mathunde,
zose zomimila zwimba nge shatho.
Thamilani Ndzimu zhoba ye shatho, imwi shango yose.
Imbani ngekwe bukulu gwe zina lawo;
muwupeni gudzo gulugulu.
Idwani Ndzimu muti, “Mishingo yenyu inotjisa seni!
Nge zila ye simba lenyu gulu,
zwita zwenyu zoshushubala mbeli kwenyu.
Shango yose inomunamata;
banomumbila njimbo dzinomukudza
banomba njimbo dzinokudza zina lenyu.”
Izhani mubone mishingo ya thamwa nge Ndzimu.
Mishingo yawo mikulu seni yaunothamila bathu!
Wakashandula gungwa gukabe shango yakawomelela;
bakatjuluka gwizi nge makumbo.
Ipapo takashatha muwuli,
iwo unobusa nge simba lawo gulu nge kusingapele,
zhisho lawo lakalinga zwitjaba zose,
bapanduki ngabasizwikudze.
Kudzani Ndzimu wedu, imwi bathu,
zhoba ye kukudziwa kwawo ngayihwike,
iwo wakatilisa pakati pe batjili
kakale awuzoletja makumbo edu katelela.
Imwi Ndzimu, makatilika;
makatilika se siliva ilikiwa.
Makatibhatshila nge gwanga;
makabiga mitolo inolema kushule kwedu;
makaletja bathu bakatatha pezhugwi kwe misholo yedu;
takapalama moto kakale
tikapalama vula;
koga makatizhisa pathu pakashaladuka.
Ndowozha mu ng'umba yenyu ne zwipo zwinopisiwa;
ndowoshingikadza tuna kwangu,
iko kwandakaleba nge nlomo wangu kakale
agadzabgwe nge wangu nlomo ndili mu kudziyidzika.
Ndowomudusila zwipo zwinopisiwa zwakakola,
zwili mu busi gwe tjibhayilo tje nyondo;
ndowothama tjibhayilo tje mikono ne mbudzi.
Izhani muhwe, imwi mose munotja Ndzimu,
ngono ndowoleba tjawakandithamila.
Ndakalilila pezhugwi ndililila iwo,
ngono wakakudziwa nge ndebo yangu.
Ha ndakabe ndashathila jinyo mu moyo wangu,
She banobe basakanditeedza;
koga malebeswa Ndzimu wakateedza
bakateedza matama e ntembezelo wangu.
Ndzimu ngaukudziwe,
ngobe awuzolamba ntembezelo wangu
kene kuli kusandipa ludo gwawo gusingazunguzike.
Dzene Ndzimu bangatihwila ngoni bakati kombolela
kakale bakatipenyesela buso gwabo.
Kuti ndizo zila yenyu izibgwe mu shango,
simba lenyu linotjidza lizibgwe mu zwitjaba zose.
Bathu ngabamukudze, imwi Ndzimu;
bathu bose ngabamukudze.
Tjaba ngadzishathe dzimbe dzipululudze,
ngobe mosumikilisa bathu nge kulizana,
kakale motungamila tjaba dzose dze shango.
Bathu ngabamukudze imwi Ndzimu;
bathu bose ngabamukudze.
Shango yakadusa zwizwalo zwakawanda;
Ndzimu, iwo Ndzimu wedu, wakatikombolela.
Dzene Ndzimu bangadwilila nge kutikombolela;
phelelo dzose dze shango ngadzitete Ndzimu.
Ndzimu ngabamilike, zwita zwawo zose ngazwipaladziwe;
bose banowubenga ngabapaladziwe.
Se busi gututudziwa nge phepo, Ndzimu ngawubatutudze;
se phola inyawuka pa moto,
babi ngabalobesiwe nge Ndzimu.
Koga balulwami ngabashathe;
ngabashathe mbeli kwe Ndzimu;
ngabashathe kwazokwazo bapululudze.
Mbilani Ndzimu, imbani njimbo dzinokudza zina lawo;
milidzani mahwi muwumbile lumbo
iwo unoyenda ali mu uli makole
zina lawo ndi Yahwe muukudze.
Tate besiyang'wa kakale mmilili we tjilikadzi
ndiwo Ndzimu mu bugalo gwawo gwakayengemala.
Ndzimu unopa badziyili nzi kuti bagale muwuli;
unotungamilila basungwa mukubhudilila,
koga bapanduki banotjilila mu shango yakathukudzika.
Imwi Ndzimu, makati pamakabe makatungamila bathu benyu,
makapalama tjilambanyika,
shango yakatengenyeka, zhuzhugwi kukatebula vula,
pawakabe ulipo Ndzimu, Ndzimu we Sinai,
pawakabe ulipo Ndzimu, Ndzimu we Iziraela.
Ndzimu, makanisa vula isishoma;
makamusa shango yenyu yakabe yathukudzika.
Pkhwizi dzenyu dzakawana bugalo ipapo;
mubululwami gwenyu, Ndzimu, makapa basheti.
She banopa ndaulo;
banji bakasenga matama iwawo;
“Boshe bakulu be babhayani banotizha, banotizha!”
Bakadzi ku mizi bakathubukana thundu yakatapiwa,
nenguba begala pakati kwe pkhwizi,
mapapiro e njiba akambadziwa siliva,
malunganilo akambadziwa golide ye mbala nkwakwa.
Pakati Masimbawose bakapaladza boshe bakulu ikoko,
kapuku tjikawa mu Zalimoni.
Iwe dombo gulu, dombo le Bhashani.
Iwe dombo linatheswi njinji,
dombo le Bhashani!
Ini ulinga ngoyemula,
iwe dombo letheswi njinji,
ku dombo lakadiwa nge Ndzimu,
kuti libe bugalo gwawo,
iko Yahwe kwabanowogala nge kusingapele?
Nge koloyi hwuluhwulu njinji dzili zwiwulu zwinjinji,
She bakadwa ku Sinai
bezha pathu pakayengemala.
Makatatha dombo lakakulila pezhugwi,
makatungamila bakatapiwa mu ngwa kakale
muamutjila zwipo mu bathu,
ne muna ibabo banopandukila bugalo gwa Yahwe Ndzimu.
Ndzimu ngawukudziwe,
iwo unotimilidza zhuba ne zhuba;
Ndzimu i jidzo ledu.
Ndzimu wedu Ndzimu we jidzo
Ndzimu, ibo She, idizhilo lebanotizha lufu.
Koga Ndzimu unowopkhwanya
misholo ye zwita zwawo.
Zwiala zwina bukuse zwa ibabo banoyenda
mu zila dzabo dze bubi gwabo.
She bakati,
“Ndowobabuza kudwa ku Bhashani,
ndowobabuza kudwa kusikusi kwe gungwa,
kuti ndizo mungule makumbo enyu mu malopa abo,
kuti ndizo mbgwa dzenyu dziwane gobe mu zwita zwenyu.”
Nlongolongo we bathu benyu
wakabong'wa ne mmwe ne mmwe,
nlongolongo we gubungano le Ndzimu She nkulu wangu
lingina pa bugalo gugwe gwakayengemala.
Bambi bali mbeli, balidzi be zwilidzo bali shule,
pakati kwabo kuna baanadi belidza dzithamborini
“Kudzani Ndzimu mu gubungano gulu,
ibo Yahwe, imwi mu nsenya usingapkhwe we Iziraela!”
Bhenjamini, iye ntukunu tjose mubali, akabatungamila
hadzasha dze Juda ne gupo labo,
ne hadzasha dze Zebhuloni,
ne hadzasha dze Nafutali.
Zhisani masimba enyu makulu, Ndzimu;
lakidzani simba lenyu, Ndzimu, sekwa makatongothama
mu lubaka gwakapinda.
Muthamila ng'umba yenyu iku Jerusalema
boshe bakulu kwabanoyisa zwipo.
Tjemelani Egipiti inonga vubu inogala mu shanga dze gwizi.
Tjemelani tjaba dzinonga mikono ina phulu,
dzinotshamba tshamba bathu dzishaka siliva.
Tshambani nge makumbo ibabo banotolela bathu makhetho,
paladzani bathu banoshathisiwa nge ngwa.
Hadzasha dzowodwa ku Egipiti;
shango ye Itopiya ngailibilidzile kumilidzila
Ndzimu maboko abo beukudza.
Mbilani Ndzimu imwi mibuso ye shango;
mbilani Ndzimu njimbo dzinoukudza,
ibo banoyenda mu zhuzhugwi, zhuzhugwi lakabepo ntolo tjose,
hwililani, Ndzimu unodusa hwi lawo lina masimba makulu.
Lebani muti Ndzimu una masimba,
unobusa Iziraela;
zhuzhugwi lolakidza simba lawo.
Ndzimu unotjenamisa seni uli mu bugalo gwawo gwaka yengemala,
Ndzimu we Iziraela
unopa simba ne matatabuko bathu bawo.
Ndzimu ngawukudziwe.
Munditjidze Ndzimu,
ngobe vula yabe pejo ngotola butjilo gwangu.
Ndophobela mu dope njinji lakangina
akuna pandingamapo.
Ndangina mu vula yakangina,
ndizo nsundila unonditola.
Ndatjinyadziwa ngolila kwangu;
hwulo dzangu dzakawomelela
mesho angu aatjabona kwazo
ndanyala ngokulindila dabilo, Ndzimu wangu.
Ibabo banondibenga banji pa mavudzi e nsholo wangu,
koga ndisabati tjimwe;
ibabo banoshaka kundilobesa banjinji,
zwita zwangu zwinonditilika nlandu zwindinyepela.
Apa ndakafanila bgwiliza tjandisakakwiba kene?
Imwi Ndzimu wangu;
zwithu zwandakatjinya azwizosumbikika mu mesho enyu.
Musiletjedze ibabo banogalabgwe mumuli
bakabhatisiwa shoni nge kwangu,
imwi She, Ndzimu we Mibunga
musiletjedze ibabo banogalabgwe mumuli
bakabhatisiwa shoni nge kwangu,
imwi Ndzimu we Baiziraela.
Ndi nge kwenyu kuti ndibe ndakadzikitadzila tukwa,
nenge kubhatisiwa shoni.
Ndatjibe ntaya muna bakanyi kwedu,
ndatjibe nzhi mu bana ba mme yangu.
Kutukutilila ng'umba yenyu, ndiko kunondija;
masapa a ibabo banomutuka akawila mundili.
Ndakati ndizwiyisa pasi nge kuzwinyima zojiwa,
bakanditukila kuthama ndiyijalo,
ndakati ndithama saka tjiambalo tjangu tje tjililo,
ndakashanduka mazapkhwa mubali.
Pagegwe ntutshi konyeyiwa imi,
kakale balaladzi banothama njimbo nge kwangu.
Koga imi nge kwangu, ntembezelo wangu
ndowulingisa kumuli, imwi Yahwe.
Mu lubaka gwakafanila, Ndzimu, mu buzhalo
gwe ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike, mundidabile.
Nge bhatsho yenyu isingabgwilile shule,
mundibhatshe kuti ndisiphobele mu dope;
thamani kuti ndiangule mu zwita zwangu ne mu vula yakangina.
Musiletje nsundila ukanditola,
kene kuli kumidziwa nge dziba lakangina,
kene kuli kuvukidzigwa nge gomba.
Mundidabile Yahwe, ngobe ludo gwenyu
gusingazunguzike gwakalulwama, kuyendidzana
nge bunji gwe ngoni dzenyu mundikumbule.
Musisumbikile nlanda wenyu buso gwenyu,
ngobe ndodziyidzika kukulu, libilidzilani kundidabila.
Sedzelani pandili, munditjidze,
mundiangule ngekwe zwita zwangu.
Moziba masapa andinotukwa,
nenge kubhatisiwa shoni kwangu,
nenge kushayigwa buthu;
zwita zwangu zose mozwiziba.
Masapa akandigwadzisa moyo, ndatjizwitoboka.
Ndakashaka ungandihwila ngoni, asheta.
Bakandipa nti unobulaya beti zojiwa,
ndakati ndina nyota bakandipa
nkumbi wakatyorowa kuti nding'we.
Dzene tafuli yabo ingabe dati kubali,
ikabe dati linowobhatshila bazwalani babo.
Mesho abo ngaapofupale kuti ndizo basibone,
mishongoshongo yabo ngayi gale yakagogonyala.
Mubadile lifushe gwe kugwadzamoyo kwenyu,
kugwadzamoyo kwenyu kunothuta ngakubapise.
Dzene magalo abo angabe matongo;
ngakushete unowogala mu mishasha yabo.
Ngobe banogwadzisa ibabo bamakaloba,
banodwilila bedziyidza ibabo bamakakubadza.
Paphani shamu yabo nge imwe shamu;
dzene bakasibe nge gobe mu jidzo lenyu.
Ngababukushiwe mu lukwalo gwe banotjila;
ngabasikwagwe pang'ompela ne balulwami.
Koga imi ndakazwiyisa pasi
kakale ndimukuhwa zogwadza,
dzene jidzo lenyu Ndzimu, lingandivikilila.
Ndowokudza zina le Ndzimu ne lumbo;
ndowokudza Ndzimu nge kumboka.
Oku kowoshathisa Yahwe kupinda tjipo tje ngabe
kene uli nkono una manyanga ne thozo.
Bakatshambilidziwa ngabakubone ikoku bashathe;
imwi munoshaka Ndzimu, mimoyo yenyu ngayimuke.
Ngobe Yahwe banohwa mitembezelo ye basheti,
kakale abatolengudza bathu babo bamu busungwa
kudzimu ne shango ngazwikudze She,
gungwa gumwe ne gumwe
nenge tjimwe ne tjimwe itjili tjimuali ngazwikudze She.
Ndzimu unowotjidza Ziyoni
kakale unowomusa mizi mikulu ye Juda;
nenge balanda bawo banowogala imomo
bakayizwitolegwa iyeyo mizi;
bana be balanda be Ndzimu banowozwitolegwa mizi iyeyo,
na ibabo banoda zina lawo banowogala mu mizi iyeyo.
Shathilani kundiangula Ndzimu.
Yahwe, libilidzilani kundibhatsha!
Ibabo banovima butjilo gwangu
ngabahumanyiwe kakale babhatisiwe shoni.
Ibabo banoshaka kundihwisa zogwadza
ngabashandugwe bashayigwe buthu.
Ibabo banoti “Ahaa, Ahaa!”
Mubabhatise shoni.
Ibabo banomushaka ngabapululudze bamushathile.
Ibabo banoda jidzo lenyu ngabalebeleke
