ngekusingapele kose bati, “Ndzimu nkulukulu!”
Koga imi ndi nshayi kakale ndosheta;
mundilibilidzile Ndzimu!
Ndimwi bhatsho yangu ne ntjidzi wangu,
imwi Yahwe, musinonoke!
Ndotizhila kumuli Yahwe;
thamani kuti ndisitongo bhatisiwa shoni.
Mu bululwami gwenyu munditjidze kakale mundigwile;
munditeedze kakale munditjidze.
Ibeni shongwe ye dizhilo langu.
Ibeni luswingo gwakasima, kuti nditjidziwe,
ngobe mu shongwe yangu kakale mu luswingo gwangu.
Munditjidze, Imwi Ndzimu wangu,
mundiduse mu simba le babi,
mu kubhakhwa nge basingazibe ndulamo kakale
bana mimoyo mikukutu mu kushinga bubi.
Imwi She, ndimwi kugalabgwe kwangu,
ndokagalabgwe mumuli Yahwe
kudwa mu butjetjana gwangu.
Ndakanayila imwi kudwa mu kuzwagwa kwangu;
ndimwi makandidusa mu ntumbu wa mmeyangu.
Ndodwilila nge kumukudza.
Ku banji ndakabe ndinga tjilema,
koga imwi mu dizhilo langu lakasima.
Nlomo wangu uzhele kumukudza,
ne kukudza zina lenyu zhuba lose.
Musindilashe mu nsi we kukwegula kwangu;
musindifupatile andapelegwa nge masimba.
Zwita zwangu zolebeleka nge kwangu,
ibabo banoshaka ndibulaya banolangana.
Banoti, “Muntatamile mu mbhate,
Ndzimu wankanlasha
akuna ungantjidza.”
Imwi Ndzimu, musibe kule nami;
Imwi Ndzimu wangu, libilidzani kundibhatsha!
Ibabo banonditilika nlandu
ngababhatisiwe shoni kakale banyeledziwe;
ibabo banoshaka kundihwisa zogwadza
ngabadadigwe bashayigwe hanya kunobhatisa shoni.
Koga imi ndowodwilila ndigalabgwe,
kakale ndowodwilila ndimukudza kakale kanjinji.
Nlomo wangu unowoleba ngekwe mishingo yenyu ye ndulamo,
ne ngekwe mishingo yenyu ye jidzo zhuba lose,
nenguba ili minji kusina tjilizanyo.
Ndowozha ndikudza mishingo mikulu ya She Ndzimu,
ndowokudza ndulamo yenyu koga.
Imwi Ndzimu, kudwila mu butjetjana gwangu makandidiya,
ndizo ndodwilila ndikudza mishingo yenyu inotjenamisa.
Ndizo ne mu nsi we kukwegula ne kuthunya nsholo,
Imwi Ndzimu musindilashe,
kuswikila ndileba ngekwe simba lenyu gulu
mu zwizekugwana zose zwinowozha.
Simba lenyu nenge ndulamo yenyu, imwi Ndzimu,
zoswika pezhugwi zhugwi,
imwi makathama zwithu zwikulu,
imwi Ndzimu, ndiani unonga imwi kene?
Imwi makathama kuti ndibone kudziyidzika
kunjinji ne zogwadza zwinjinji
mowondimusa kakale;
kudwa pasi pasi kwe shango
mowondimilidzila pezhugwi kakale.
Mowopapha kukudziwa kwangu,
mukandinyaladza kakale.
Ndowomukudzabo nge dende
ndimukudzila kugalikabgwe kwenyu imwi Ndzimu.
Ndowomba njimbo dzinomukudza
ndilidza tjilidzo tje laya,
imwi N'yengemali we Iziraela.
Nlomo wangu unowomimila ngoshatha
andimumbila njimbo dzinomukudza;
na iyo meya yangu yamakatjidza.
Zhuba lose lulimi gwangu gowolebeleka
ngekwe bululwami gwe bhatsho yenyu,
ngobe ibabo bakagwisa kundihwisa zogwadza
bakabhatisiwa shoni, bakashayigwa ngoni.
Imwi Ndzimu ipani She nkulu zila ye kusumikilisa kwakatambunuka,
nkololo we bushe mumpe ndulamo yenyu,
kuti ndizo She nkulu asumikilise bathu benyu nge ndulamo,
nenge bathu benyu banosheta basumikilisiwe kwakatambunuka.
Dzene shango ingabe ne kunyalala ikabhudilila
nenge kubona ndulamo.
Dzene She nkulu lebelekela bashayi,
katjidza bana be basheti
kakale kapkhwapkhwata batshambilidzi.
Dzene bathu bakamunamata zhuba ne mwedzi zwitjapenya,
mu zwizekugwana zose.
Dzene anganga vula inona mu likulakula,
se midumbi inodilidzila shango.
Kuti mu mazhuba awe dzene ndulamo ingawanda,
nenge kunyalala kuandame kuswikila mwedzi wafa.
Dzene angabusa kudwa ku gungwa kunoti ku gungwa
ne kudwa ku gwizi kunoti ku phelelo dze shango.
Dzene zwita zwizwe zwinganthigamila,
kakale zwita zwizwe ngazwilengudzike.
Dzene boshe bakulu be Thashishi
nebe zwigwizi zwikulekule banganzhisila zwipo,
dzene boshe bakulu be Shebha
nebe Sebha banganzhisila zwipo.
Dzene boshe bakulu bose bangawila pasi bakanthigamila,
tjaba dzose ngadzinshingile.
Ngobe unotjidza basheti abedana,
bashayi na ibabo basina mbhatshi.
Unohwila zogwadza ibabo basina matatabuko kakale besheta,
kakale unotjengeta matjilo e basheti.
Mukutshambilidzwa nenge kuhwisiwa zogwadza,
unobatjidza kakale matjilo abo
anosheteka kwazo mu mesho awe.
Dzene angatjila tjibaka tjilefu!
Dzene golide ye Shebha ingaipiwa.
Dzene angatembezelegwa misi yose.
Dzene angakombolegwa nge misi yose.
Dzene shango ingabe ne mathunde manjinji
dzene angapasula kafukidza shango;
dzene zwizwalo zwayo zwikanga zwe Lebhanoni;
kakale dzene bathu bangawanda mu mizi mikulu
se bushwa gumu shango.
Dzene zina lile lingabepo tjatjose,
tjilumbi tjitje tjilalame se zhuba.
Dzene tjaba dzose dzinga kombolegwa nge zina lile;
bathu bose banon'dana wakakombolegwa!
Ngakukudziwe Yahwe, Ndzimu we Iziraela,
iwo koga unothama zwithu zwinotjenamisa.
Ngakukudziwe zina lawo gulu nge kusingapele:
dzene gudzo lawo linga zhala shango yose.
Ngakujalo kakale Ngakujalo.
Mitembezelo ya Dafite nkololo wa Jesi yapelela.
Malebeswa Ndzimu wakalulwamila Iziraela,
ibabo bana mimoyo mitjena.
Koga imi ngekwangu ndoyenda ndikweba makumbo;
ndakanyala nkumbulo.
Ndakabe ndina ndandala ngekwe banozwikudza,
pandakabe ndabona bhudilila kwe babi.
Ngobe basina mang'oni,
mibili yabo yakazwilizanila kakale ikwidzima.
Abateli mu tshiyilo se bamwe bathu,
abana magwadzi se bamwe bathu,
Bakasenga mazwikudzo abo se bakaambala i timbi.
Phipiti yakabaambala se hazu.
Mimoyo yabo inotebukana nge mbipo,
mikumbulo yabo ye bubi ainatjilizanyo.
Banogongobola kakale belebeleka nge lubengo
banozwiloba zwifuba ngekwe tshambilidzo.
Banonyanyayidza mazhuzhugwi,
ndimi dzabo dzikalaula shango.
Ndizo bathu banoshanduka bakabakudza,
bebuya beshaya nlandu mubali.
Ndizo banoti, “Ndzimu ungaziba tjini?
Apa kuna luzibo muna Upezhugwi zhugwi kene?”
Ndiko sekwa babi bali iko
bagele bakati khenyenye, banowatsha fumwa dzabo.
Ndakatjenapadzila moyo wangu suli
ndakangulila maboko angu suli ndilakidza ndisina nlandu.
Zhuba lose ndakahwisiwa zogwadza,
kakale ndolobgwa shamu mangwanana mamwe ne mamwe.
Ha ndakabe ndati, “Ndowolebeleka yetji.”
Ndakabe ndowobe ndashayila bana benyu lebeswa.
Koga ndakati ndigwisa hwisisa kose ikoku,
awana ili masimbamalashe,
kudzina ndangina mu bugalo gwe Ndzimu
gwakayengemala, ndizo ahwisisa bhelelo labo.
Nge malebeswa mobagadza mu magalo anosodzoloka,
mubaligila mu golomodzo.
Banokolomogwa tjinyolotjo seni,
bekubigwa kutjena nge lutjo!
Mowoti mumuka imwi Yahwe banonga mawoloto
anokanganika ha nthu emuka mu wope.
Mukumuka kwenyu mowobanyeledza bakakanganika.
Kwakati meya yangu yahwa zogwadza kwazo,
pandakabe ndabhayika mu moyo,
ndakabe ndili tjilengwe kakale ndisina luzibo,
ndakabe ndinga tjibandana mbeli kwenyu.
Nenguba kwakajalo ndinamwi misi yose,
makandibhata nge luboko gwangu gwe luji.
Makandilakidza zila nge gumbuludzo lenyu,
gwe bupelo mowondiamutjila nge kunditeta.
Apa ndiani wandinaye kuzhe kwenyu kene?
Mu shango akuna tjandinoyemula kuzhe kwenyu.
Nyama yangu ne moyo wangu zwinga kong'wa,
koga Ndzimu ndiwo simba le moyo wangu
ne gobe langu nge kusingapele.
Ndolebesa, ibabo bakule namwi banowoloba,
molobesa bose ibabo basingagalebgwe mumuli.
Koga imi nge kwangu, kwanaka kugala pejo ne Ndzimu.
Ndakathama Yahwe Ndzimu dizhilo langu,
kuti ndizo ndilebe ngekwe mishingo yabo.
Ndzimu, ini mutilashila tjose kene?
Ini bushongola gwenyu guthungayilila
pkhwizi dze fulo lenyu kene?
Kumbulani gubungano lenyu lamakazwishaluligwa ntolo,
ilo lamakadzutunula kube itjaba tje lukata gwenyu.
Kumbulani Dombo le Ziyoni, ipo pamakatongo gala.
Shandukilani ku matongo agelile tjose,
tjita tjakakolomola tjimwe ne tjimwe mu bugalo gwakayengemala.
Zwita zwenyu zwakabomba mu bugalo gwenyu gwakayengemala
bakabiga zwilakidzo zwabo zwe kukunda.
Bakazwitola se balume bakabhata mashathu
bepalama ishaka benotema miti ne mashathu.
Bakapkhwanya kose kwakabezhiwa kukanakisiwa ngokwagwa,
nge mashathu ne zwishakhwana zwabo.
Bakapisa bugalo gwakayengemala nge moto,
bakatemapadza bugalo gwe zina lenyu,
nge kuguligila pasi.
Bakazwidwa beti, “Towobakolomodza tjoselele,”
bakapisa mabazhe wose e bushanganilo e Ndzimu mu shango.
Atitjabona zwilakidzo zwedu,
akutjina balebesambeli, ngono akuna ne nng'ompela
upakati kwedu unoziba kuti kowodza kukabe lini.
Kowodza kukabe lini Ndzimu, tjita tjimulengudza kene?
Apa tjita tjowotuka zina lenyu nge kusingapele kene?
Ini mushungata luboko gwenyu,
hwutini mulambisila luboko gwenyu pa ifuba tjenyu kene?
Koga Ndzimu She nkulu wangu kwakadwila ntolo,
muzhisa jidzo mu shango.
Makathubukanya gungwa nge simba lenyu gulu,
makapkhwanya misholo ye bhophona mu vula.
Ndimwi makapkhwanya misholo ye zhithu le gungwa,
mukalipa zwitjili zwe tjilambanyika kulija.
Makazhula misenya ne hwobana
makapkhwisa njizi dzagala dziwunga dzisingapinde.
Masikati nde enyu, busiku na igo nde gwenyu,
makabiga zhuba ne mwedzi mu magalo azo.
Ndimwi makathama migathu yose ye shango,
makathama tjilimo ne mbaba.
Kumbulani Yahwe sekwa makalengudziwa nge tjita
ne sekwa bathu be zwilengwe bakatuka zina lenyu.
Musipe zwibandana meya ye njiba yenyu,
musikangang'wile tjose butjilo gwe bashayi benyu.
Kumbulani tjidumano tjenyu,
ngobe magalo akatizwi e shango,
azhele magalo e bupanduki.
Musiletjedze banolingigwa pasi bakabhatisiwa shoni,
dzene bashayi ne basheti bakakudza zina lenyu.
Milikani imwi Ndzimu, muzwilebelekele,
kumbulani sekwa zwilengwe zwinomulengudza zhuba lose.
Musikangang'we zhoba ye banyanyayidzi benyu,
dzonga kwe zwita zwenyu kunomilika kuyendilambeli.
Toboka imwi, imwi Ndzimu tomuboka.
Toboka, zina lenyu li pejo pejo.
Bathu banoleba ngekwe makaabadzo enyu.
“Mu lubaka gwandakabiga,
ndowosumikilisa kwakatambunuka.”
Ha shango itengenyeka ne bagali bayo bose,
ndimi ndinosimisa phanda dzayo.
Ndoti kuna banozwikudza, “Musizwikudze,”
ku babi ndoti, “Musizwikukumadze.
Musitongo yita manyimwe,
kene kuli lebeleka makawomeledza mitshibha.”
Ngobe kumilidzigwa pezhugwi akutodwa ku bhezhuba
kene golombedzo kene kuli ku tjilambanyika.
Koga Ndzimu ndiwo unosumikilisa,
udelusila mmwe pasi, umilidzila mmwe pezhugwi.
Ngobe mu luboko gwa Yahwe kuna bhepe,
lina nkumbi we nzhambi unotutuma, wakavubegwa zubuyanana,
banowoutebulila pasi,
ngono babi bose be shango
banowoung'wa bakakunika kose ne matshikidili.
Koga ndowoshatha nge kusingapele,
ndowomba ndikudza Ndzimu wa Jakubo.
Ndowopedza simba le babi bose,
koga nyanga dze bayengemali dzowomilidziwa.
Ndzimu unozibgwa mu Juda,
zina lawo ligulu mu Iziraela.
Nshasha wawo umu Salemu,
bugalo gwawo gumu Ziyoni.
Ndipo pawakavunila misebe yakateswa,
ne tjivikili ne makanu, zwibhayano zwe ngwa.
Mopenyelela makashongoloka,
kupinda matombo, bugalo ndigele.
Bakasima tjilopa bakatolegwa kose kwabakatapa
mu ngwa bakaizela bakafa,
akuna ne nng'ompela we bagwi bakasima
wakatubula kumilidza luboko gugwe.
Pamakatjemela, imwi Ndzimu wa Jakubo, kara ne mbizi
zwe ngwa zwakatogwa zwakaizela se zwakafa.
Imwi moga ndimwi makafanilo tjiwa!
Apa ndiani ungama mbeli kwenyu,
ha magwadza moyo kene?
Makapedza ndebo muli kudzimu,
shango ikatja, ikanyalala koga,
Ha Ndzimu umilika usumikilisa,
kutjidza bose be shango bakatshambilidziwa.
Bushongola gwenyu mu nthu gozhisa kukudziwa kwenyu,
ngono bakatjila mu bushongola gwenyu bakatubula.
Tunani ndi Yahwe Ndzimu wenyu,
ngono mushingikadze zwamatuna,
bose bakabapoteleka, ngabazhise zwipo
kubali bakafanila tjiwa,
ibo banothubula meya ye hadzasha,
ibo banolonga lutjo muna boshe bakulu be shango.
Ndakalilila pezhugwi ndililila ku Ndzimu,
ndimimilila ku Ndzimu kuti ndizo undihwe.
Mu zhuba le kudziyidzika kwangu ndoshaka She,
mu busiku luboko gwangu gwakatambunudziwa gusinganete,
meya yangu yakalamba nyaladziwa.
Ndokumbula ngekwe Ndzimu, ngono agomela,
ashakisisa mu moyo wangu, ngono apela meya.
Mondikonedza kubhatshanya mesho.
Ndodziyidzika kunondikonedza lebeleka.
Ndokumbula ngekwe mazhuba akapinda,
ndokumbula makole a ntolo.
Ndobalabala ne moyo wangu busiku,
ndoalakana abuya ashakisisa meya yangu.
Ngono abe nditi,
“Apa She banowotilashila tjose kene?
Apa abangatjame nami kakale kene?
Apa ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike gowotothola tjose kene?
Apa kugadzabgwe kwabo kwe tjibaka tjose kwakapela kene?
Apa Ndzimu wakakangang'wa kube ne ngoni kene?
Apa bushongola gwawo gwakasitila mahwilo zogwadza awo kene?”
Ngono ndoti, “Wuhwa zogwadza kwangu
kunothama kuti luboko gwe luji
gwe Upezhugwi zhugwi gundishandukile.”
Ndowokumbula mishingo ya Yahwe;
ee, ndowokumbula makaabadzo enyu a ntolo.
Ndowoshakisisa mu moyo mishingo yenyu yose,
ndibuya ndikanuka ngekwe mishingo yenyu mikulu.
Zila yenyu Ndzimu yakayengemala.
Apa ndiupi ndzimu nkulu se Ndzimu wedu kene?
Mu Ndzimu unothama makaabadzo,
makalakidza simba lenyu mu njudzi.
Nge simba le luboko gwenyu makadzutunula bathu benyu,
bakololo ba Jakubo na Josefa.
Kwakati vula dzimubona, Imwi Ndzimu,
kwakati vula dzimubona, dzikatja,
vula dzi pasi pasi dzikatetema.
Makole akatebula vula,
zhuzhugwi kukadadamula,
misebe yenyu ikapenya mbizho dzose.
Nsindo we kudadamula kwenyu kwakabe mu dutu,
lupenyo gwenyu gwakavoneka shango,
shango ikatetema ikazunguzika.
Zila yenyu yakapalama gungwa,
mmwazha wenyu ukapalama vula ina masimba.
Koga gumbo lenyu pamakatshamba likasibong'we.
Makatungamila bathu benyu se ngubi ye pkhwizi,
nge luboko gwa Mushe na Aroni.
Bhulutanani zwidiyo zwangu, imwi bathu bangu,
teedzani matama andinoleba.
Ndowozhula nlomo wangu apa ifaniso
ndowozumbunula masumbesumbe muna zwa ntolo,
zwithu zwatakahwa tikazwiziba
zwatakabudziwa ndi bobatategulu bedu.
Atitowozwisumbikila bana babo,
towozwibudza tjizekugwana tjinozha,
gudzo le mishingo ya Yahwe, ne masimba abo,
ne makaabadzo abakathama.
Bakathama ndayo kuna Jakubo,
bakabiga nlayo mu Iziraela,
iwo wabakalaulila bobatategulu bedu
kuudiya bana babo.
Kuti ndizo tjizekugwana tjinozha tjiizibe,
bana basathu bakazwagwa,
banowomilika bakaibudza bana babo,
kuti ndizo babige kugalabgwe kwabo mu Ndzimu,
ne kusakangang'wa mishingo ye Ndzimu,
koga balondolodze milayo yawo,
kuti basitongodwa binga bobatategulu babo,
tjizekugwana tjakawoma nsholo kakale tje bupanduki,
tjizekugwana tje moyo wakabe ududumwa,
tje meya yakabe isingagalebgwe mu Ndzimu.
Baifureimi, bakabhata matati,
bakashanduka mu zhuba le ngwa.
Abazolondolodza tjidumano tje Ndzimu,
koga bakalamba kuyendidzana ne nlayo wawo.
Bakakangang'wa tjawakabe wathama,
ne makaabadzo awakabe wabalakidza.
Mu mesho a bobatategulu babo mu Egipiti
mu ntuthu we Zoani wakashinga makaabadzo.
Wakapalalanya vula ye gungwa ukabapitsha mu guli,
ukathama kuti vula ime se duluthulu.
Masikati wakabatungamila nge gole,
ngono busiku gose ukabatungamila nge tjedza tje moto.
Wakaphatula shongwe dzikazhuka mu tjilambanyika,
ukabang'wisa vula njinji se inodwa mu madziba akangina.
Wakathama wobana dzikadwa mu shongwe,
ukathama kuti vula iwungile pasi se njizi.
Koga bakadwilila beutjinyila kwakapindilila,
bepandukila Upezhugwi zhugwi bali mu tjilambanyika.
Bakalika Ndzimu mu mimoyo yabo
nge kushaka zojiwa zwabakabe beyemula kwazo.
Bakalebeleka kusakanaka ngekwe Ndzimu
beti, “Apa Ndzimu ungatilulwamisila
zojiwa mu tjilambanyika kene?
Nenguba akaloba shongwe vula ikatebukana
hwobana dzika wunga,
apa ne tjiwunga ungatipa itjobo,
kene ukapa bathu bawo nyama kene?”
Ndizo, Yahwe bakati behwa, bakazhala bushongola,
moto wabo wakathuta wakalingisana na Jakubo,
gwadzamoyo kwabo kukalingisana Iziraela,
ngobe bakabe basina bugalimoyo mu Ndzimu,
kakale basingagalebgwe simba lawo linotjidza.
Ipapa Yahwe belaya zhuzhugwi,
bakazhula mikoba ye kudzimu,
bakabanisila mana kuti baje,
bakabapa thunde le kudzimu.
Bathu bakaja tjiwunga tje batumwa be kudzimu,
bakabazhisila zojiwa zwakawanda.
Bakathama kuti phepo ye bhezhuba
ihwuhwudze mu mazhuzhugwi,
nge simba labo bakatungamila phepo ye burwa,
bakabadelusila pezhugwi kwabo
nyuni dzinowuluka dzili njinji se hwuluba,
dzili nyama njinji se nsetje we phili ye gungwa,
bakathama kuti dzizhe pa bugalo gwabo,
kupoteleka mishasha yabo.
Ngono bakaja bakaguta,
ngobe bakabapa tjabakabe beyemula kwazo.
Koga bakati basathu bakagutsha njemulo dzabo,
zojiwa zwitji mu milomo yabo,
bushongola gwe Ndzimu gukabamukila,
ngono ukabulaya bakasima tjose mubali,
ukalobesa bazhuzha bakakomba be Iziraela.
Pezhugwi kwa ikoku kose bakadwilila ngotjinya.
Pezhugwi kwe makaabadzo e Ndzimu abazogalamoyo.
Ndizo wakathama kuti mazhuba abo apele se mfemo,
ne makole abo abe mu lutjo.
Ndzimu wakati ubabulaya, bakaushaka,
bakashandukila ku uli nge malebeswa.
Bakakumbulukigwa kuti Ndzimu ndiwo shongwe yabo,
Ndzimu Upezhugwi zhugwi, ndzutunuli wabo.
Koga bakashaya lebeswa mu milomo yabo,
bakaunyepela nge ndimi dzabo.
Mimoyo yabo inodudumwa nge kwawo,
bakabe basina malebeswa mu tjidumano tjawo.
Ipapa iwo una ngoni,
wakazwiibhatigwa matjinyo abo,
ngono ukasibalobese,
kanjinji wakazwidziba mu kugwadza moyo kwawo,
ngono ukasimuse bushongola gwawo gose.
Wakakumbula kuti bani, koga banyama, bathu koga,
phepo inopinda isingatjowoshanduka kakale.
Ndikanjinji seni beupandukila pakati kwe shango,
kakale bakauhwisa zogwadza mu tjilambanyika!
Bakalika Ndzimu bepaphulula kanjinji,
beshongola N'yengemali we Iziraela.
Abazotongo kumbula simba lawo,
kene zhuba lawakabadzutunula mu tjita.
Pawakalakidza zwilakidzo zwawo mu Egipiti,
ne matjenamiso awo mu ntuthu we Zoani.
Wakashandula vula dze njizi dzabo dzikabe malopa,
kuti ndizo basitongong'wa mu wobana dzabo.
Wakabatumila nlunda we thuzi, dzakabaluma
ne mazhula, zwakabakolomola.
Zwiling'wa zwabo wakazwipa zwikonyana,
ne zwizwalo zwazo zwikapiwa phashu.
Wakabulaya mizhambi yabo nge tjivulamabgwe,
misikamori ukaibulaya nge makaa.
Wakabulaya ng'ombe dzabo nge tjivulamabgwe,
wakalobesa zwithuwo zwabo nge vula.
Wakabaligila bushongola gunotjisa,
bushongola ne kugwadzamoyo ne buyendasi,
kuli batumwa be kudzimu banokolomola.
Wakathamila kugwadzamoyo kwawo zila,
awuzobapitsha lufu,
koga wakalonga butjilo gwabo mu magwadzi.
Wakabulaya mbano dzose dze Egipiti
bana be kutanga be simba le nthu mu mishasha ya Hamu.
Ndizo ukatungamila bathu bawo se pkhwizi,
ukabatungamila mu tjilambanyika se zwithuwo.
Wakabatungamila, wakabatjengeta mu mbatsha,
kuti ndizo basitje, koga gungwa gukakwididza zwita zwabo.
Wakabaswikisa ku duthu lawo lakayengemala,
ku dombo lawazwitolela nge luboko gwawo gwe luji ngokunda.
Wakatata zwitjaba mbeli kwabo,
wakabapa shango kube lukata gwabo,
ukagadza njudzi dze Iziraela mu mizi yadzo.
Koga bakalika kakale bakapandukila Ndzimu Upezhugwi zhugwi,
abazolondolodza ndayo dzawo,
bakashandukila ntome bakathama bupitipiti sa bobatategulu babo,
basingagalikebgwe se dati lakapeyama.
Ngobe bakaukutha, bakaugwadzisamoyo nge magalo abo apezhugwi,
bakaulonga fupa nge midzimwana yabo.
Ndzimu wakati uhwa, ukazhala bushongola,
ukalasha Iziraela tjose.
Ukasiya bugalo gwawo guku Shilo,
nshasha wawakabe ugala pakati kwe bathu.
Ukayisa bhokisi le simba lawo ku busungwa,
gudzo lawo ukaliyisa ku luboko gwe tjita.
Ukaletjedza bathu bawo kubulawa nge thumo,
ukazhulila bushongola gwawo mu lukata gwawo.
Moto wakalotesa bazhuzha babo,
baanadi babo bakasibe ne lumbo gwe ndobolo.
Bapirisiti babo bakabulawa nge bukanu,
tjilikadzi dzabo dzikasitongobe mu tjililo.
Ndizo She bakamuka sebanomuka mu hwope,
se mbayani wakasima ekuwa ngobe ang'wa nkumbi we zhambi.
Wakabgwiliza zwita zwawo shule,
wakababhatisa shoni nge kusingapele.
Wakalamba nshasha wa Josefa,
awuzoshalula ludzi gwa Ifureimi,
koga wakashalula ludzi gwa Juda,
dombo le Ziyoni, ilo launoda.
Wakabaka bugalo gwawo gwakayengemala gukanga mazhuzhugwi,
se shango, iyo yawakathama kuti igale nge kusingapele.
Wakashalula nlanda wawo Dafite,
wakantola ali mu matanga e pkhwizi,
wakan'dusa mu kutjengeta pkhwizi zwele
kuti abe nlisi we bathu bawo be ludzi gwa Jakubo,
Baiziraela, lukata gwawo.
Wakabatjengeta nge moyo wakatambunuka,
ngono wakabatungamila nge bunyambi gwe luboko gugwe.
Imwi Ndzimu, bezwitjaba bakanginilila lukata gwenyu,
bakatemapadza ng'umba yenyu yakayengemala,
bakaliga Jerusalema ukabe matongo.
Bakapa magola zwidumbu zwe balanda benyu kuti aje,
bakapa zwibandana zwe shango nyama ye bayengemali benyu.
Bakatebulila malopa abo pasi se vula,
kupoteleka Jerusalema wose,
ngono akuna wakababiganya.
Tatjibe sapa mu babakidzani naswi,
todadigwa tikasekwa nge bakatipoteleka.
Apa kowodza kukabe lini Yahwe,
makagwadzamoyo kene?
Apa kowodza kukabe lini kene,
bushongola gwenyu gowodwilila gupisa se moto?
Delusilani bushongola gwenyu mu zwitjaba zwisingamuzibe,
ne mu mibuso iyeyo isingadane zina lenyu.
Ngobe bakalobesa Jakubo
bakakolomola nzi uwe.
Musititilike milandu yabo batategulu bedu,
tjimbidzani mutihwile ngoni,
ngobe takaisiwa pasi kwazo.
Mutibhatshe, Imwi Ndzimu we jidzo ledu,
ngentha ye gudzo le zina lenyu,
mutisunungule kakale mutizwiibhatigwe zwibi zwedu,
ngentha ye zina lenyu.
Ini zwitjaba zwingabhuzwa zwiti,
“Ndzimu wabo ungayi kene?”
Kubgwilizila kwe kutebugwa kwe malopa
e balanda benyu ngakuzibgwe mu zwitjaba mbeli kwenyu.
Gomela kwe basungwa ngakuswike mu zebe dzenyu,
nge simba lenyu bakililani ibabo bakasumikilisigwa lufu.
Bgwilizilani katendeka babakidzani naswi,
kugongobola kwabakamugongobola imwi She!
Ndizo iswi bathu benyu, ngubi ye mafulo enyu,
towomuboka nge kusingapele,
kudwa mu tjizekugwana kunoti ku tjizekugwana,
towoleba ngekwe kukudziwa kwenyu.
Teedzani, imwi nlisi we Iziraela.
Imwi munotungamila Josefa se ngubi ye pkhwizi!
Imwi mugele mu tjigalo tje bushe
pakati kwe dzikherubhu, dwililani ngopenya,
mbeli kwa Ifureimi na Bhenjamini na Manase!
Lakidzani simba lenyu,
ngono muzhe kowotitjidza!
Mutibake imwi Ndzimu,
penyesani buso gwenyu, kuti ndizo titjidziwe.
Imwi Yahwe Ndzimu we mibunga,
mowogwadzilamoyo mitembezelo
ye bathu benyu kuswikila lini kene?
Makabajisa tjiwunga nge mishodzi,
mukabapa mishodzi kuti bang'we nge buzhalo.
Motithama tikabe madado e babakidzani naswi,
zwita zwedu zwikatiseka mahanya.
Mutibake imwi Ndzimu we mibunga,
mutipenyesele buso gwenyu, kuti titjidziwe.
Makazhisa nzhambi kudwa ku Egipiti,
makatata zwitjaba mu shango ngono mukaudzwala.
Makakulila nzhambi lubazhe,
midzi yawo ikangina pasi ngono ukazhala shango.
Matombo akafukidzwa nge ntutshi wawo,
miti ye misida ikafukidzwa nge thabi dzawo,
ikadusila thabi dzawo ku gungwa,
thadzwana dzinothinila dzikaswika ku gwizi.
Ini ngono makapkhwanya makuma awo,
bapindi nge zila kwabanopinda betjela zhambi dzawo?
Ngulube ye shango inoupulula,
na zose zwinoyenda mu shango zouja.
Tendebukilani kutili, imwi Ndzimu we mibunga!
Lingani pasi muli kudzimu mubone,
ibeni nge hanya ngekwe nzhambi uwoyu.
Iwo nti wakadzwagwa nge luboko gwenyu gwe luji.
Nzhambi wenyu wakatemwa ukaligigwa pasi, wakapisiwa nge moto,
dzene bangalobesiwa nge kutjemela kwenyu makashweshwanya phazha.
Koga tjiazha tjenyu ngatjibe pezhugwi kwa ibabo baku luboko gwenyu gwe luji,
tjaba yamakazwisimisila.
Ndizo atingatjamufupatile kakale,
mutipe butjilo, ngono towodana zina lenyu.
Mutibake imwi Yahwe Ndzimu Masimbawose,
penyesani buso gwenyu, kuti titjidziwe.
Mbilani pezhugwi, mumbile Ndzimu iwo simba ledu;
pululudzilani Ndzimu wa Jakubo!
Shobani lumbo, mulidze tjilidzo tje thamborini,
lidzani tjilidzo tje laya ne dende kunozipa.
Lidzani lunyanga mwedzi ugala,
ne uyedzegwa, mu zhuba ledu le nzano.
Ngekuti i ndayo mu Iziraela,
ndayo ye Ndzimu wa Jakubo.
Yawakalaya Josefa,
paakabhuda mu shango ye Egipiti.
Ndohwa hwi landisakatongoziba.
“Ndakamutula ntolo mu mathudzi,
amutula itundu mu misholo.
Wakati uli mu kuhwazogwadza kukulu akudana,
ngono ndakakuangula,
ndakakudabila ndili mu kudidima kwe makole
ndakakulika ku vula dze Meribha.
Ihwani, imwi bathu bangu, ha ndimutjenjedza!
Iwe Iziraela, ha wabe unganditeedza!
Kusitongowanika ndzimu usingazibgwe mumuli,
musitongonamata ndzimu upoga.
Ndimi Yahwe Ndzimu wenyu,
wakamudusa mu shango ye Egipiti.
Ashama, ngono ndowokupashika.
“Koga bathu bangu abazoteedza hwi langu,
Iziraela azotongobe ne tjimwe nami.
Ndizo ndakabaletjedza nge moyo yabo mikukutu,
kuti batobele njalakang'wa dzabo.
Ha bathu bangu, babe banganditeedza,
ha Iziraela abe angatobela zila dzangu,
ndabe ndowotebamisa zwita zwabo tjinyolotjo,
ndibe ndishandulila luboko gwangu ku banyanyayidzi babo!
Ibabo banobenga Yahwe banowoshushubala bakabalinga,
ngono bakalobgwa shamu nge kusingapele.
Koga ndowomujisa korong mbuyanana kwazo,
ndabe ndowomugutsha nge butji gwe nyutji, gunodwa mu shongwe.”
Ndzimu ugele mu bugalo gwawo mu gubungano,
unosumikilisa uli pakati kwe midzimu.
“Apa kowodza kukabe lini musumikilisa nge kusakatambunuka,
mulakidza kumilila babi kene?
Imani ne basina matatabuko ne siyang'wa,
tjengetani fanilo dze bashayi ne bakatshambilidziwa.
Gwilani basina matatabuko ne basheti,
mubaangule mu maboko e babi.”
Abana luzibo ndodwa kene ili hwisiso,
banoyendayenda mu zhalima,
thiwa dzose dze shango dzotengenyeka.
Ndakati, “Imwi mu midzimu,
bana be Upezhugwi zhugwi, imwi mose.
Nenguba kwaka jalo, mowofa se bathu koga,
kakale mowowa se nkololo mmwe ne mmwe we bushe.”
Milikani, imwi Ndzimu, musumikilise shango,
ngobe zwitjaba zose nde zwenyu!
Imwi Ndzimu, musinyalale koga,
musidzikame koga makati hwuu, imwi Ndzimu!
Bonani sekwa zwita zwenyu zwamumukila,
ibabo bakamubenga bamilidza misholo yabo.
Banolukila bathu benyu gwanga,
banolangana kuti bagwise ibabo bamunobakilila.
Banoti, “Izhani, ngati balobeseni bose,
zina le Iziraela lisitongotjafa lakumbugwa ndodwa.”
Banolangana bakadumana,
bethama tjidumano nge kwenyu,
mishasha ye Edomu ne Baishimaela, Moabu ne Bahagira,
Gebhala na Amoni na Amaleke,
Filisitiya ne bagali be Tire,
Asiriya na iye wazwibhatshanya nabo,
ndibo babhayani bakasima be bana ba Lote.
Bathamileni tjamakathama ne Midiya,
ne Sisera ne Jabhini ku gwizi gwe Kishoni,
bakakolomogwa ku Endo,
bakabe dokonobe linodigwa mu mavu.
Thamilani banokudziwa tjamakathama
ne Orebhe ne Zeebhi,
hadzasha dzabo Zebha na Zalimuna,
ibo bakati, “Ngatizwitolegweni shango ye Ndzimu ibe yedu.”
Ndzimu wangu, mubathame bange
hwuluba ye tjampupudze,
bange bunye gunotogwa nge phepo.
Se moto upisa ishaka,
kene se nthuto upisa matombo.
Mubatutudze nge dutu lenyu,
mubuye mubatjise nge dutu gulu.
Njiso dzabo mudziambadze nge shoni,
kuti ndizo bashake zina lenyu, imwi Yahwe.
Ngababhatisiwe shoni
kakale bahwumanyiwe nge kusingapele,
ngabalobe bakalengudzika.
Ngabazibe kuti mumoga,
imwi be zina linoyi Yahwe,
muli pezhugwi zhugwi kwe shango yose.
Bugalo gwenyu gwakanaka sene,
imwi Yahwe we Mibunga!
Meya yangu yakamuzhuba kwazo,
inotshwigwa kubona magalo a Yahwe,
moyo wangu ne meya yangu zombila Ndzimu nge shatho.
Ne zhazho ina nzi,
ne nyenganyenga inozwibakila shaka,
paingagadza majindana ayo,
pa zwibeso zwenyu, imwi Yahwe Masimbawose,
She nkulu wangu ne Ndzimu wangu.
Bakakombolegwa ibabo banogala mu ng'umba yenyu,
bemba bemukudza misi yose.
Bakakombolegwa balume be simba labo limumuli,
ibo bakazwimisila mu mimoyo yabo kutathila ku Ziyoni,
sekwa kwabanopalama guku le Bhakha
banolithama pathu pe misenya,
vula dze nseulo na idzobo dzopafukidza nge madziba.
Banodwilila besima,
Ndzimu we midzimu unowobong'wa mu Ziyoni.
Imwi Yahwe Ndzimu we mibunga, ihwani ntembezelo wangu,
bulutanani, imwi Ndzimu wa Jakubo!
Bonani tjivikili tjedu, imwi Ndzimu,
lingani mu buso gwe nzhodziwa wenyu.
Ngobe zhuba ling'ompela mu ng'umba yenyu loyita,
pa tjiwulu (1000) pamwe pathu.
Ndingabe ntjengeti we nkoba mu ng'umba ye Ndzimu wangu,
pana kuti ndigale mu mishasha ye bubi.
Ngobe Yahwe Ndzimu i zhuba ne tjivikili,
banokuba kuzwalana ne kuteta.
Akuna tjakanaka Yahwe tjabanonyima,
ibabo banoyenda mu lebeswa.
Imwi Yahwe Ndzimu Masimbawose,
bakakombolegwa ibabo banogalabgwe mumuli.
Yahwe, makama ne shango yenyu,
makabgwilizila Jakubo makombolelo.
Makazwiibhatigwa bathu benyu milandu,
makabazwiibhatigwa zwibi zwabo zose.
Makashandukila bushongola gwenyu gose,
mukashandukila kugwadzamoyo kwenyu kwakabe kunopisa.
Mutibake, imwi Ndzimu we jidzo ledu,
muletjedze kusatishathila kwenyu.
Apa mogwadzila moyo tjatjose kene?
Apa bushongola gwenyu gowodwilila
kunoti ku zwizekugwana zose kene?
Apa amutowomusa kakale kene?
Kuti ndizo bathu benyu bamushathile kene?
Muti lakidze mahwilongoni enyu, imwi Yahwe,
kakale mutipe jidzo lenyu.
Ngandihwe kuti Ndzimu Yahwe banowolebani,
ngobe banowoleba kunyalala mu bathu babo,
ku bayengemali babo, kuna banoshandukila kubali.
Malebeswa jidzo lawo libe pejopejo na ibabo banoutja,
kuti gudzo lawo ligale mu shango yedu.
Ludo gusingazunguzike ne kugalikabgwe zwishangane,
ndulamo ne kunyalala zwidziyisane.
Kugalikabgwe kowomela gudwa pasi,
ngono ndulamo inowolinga pasi kudwa zhuzhugwi.
Ee, Yahwe banowopa tjakanaka,
ngono shango yedu inowowana zwizwalo zwakawanda.
Ndulamo inowobatungamila,
ibuya ibathamila mmwazha pabanotshamba.
Zhulani zebe dzenyu, imwi Yahwe, mundidabile,
ngobe ndi nshayi kakale ndi nsheti.
Tjengetani butjilo gwangu, ngobe ndakadumila mumuli,
tjidzani nlanda wenyu, unogalabgwe mumuli.
Mu Ndzimu wangu.
Ibeni ne ngoni mundili, imwi She,
ngobe ndolilila kumuli zhuba lose.
Shathisani meya ye nlanda wenyu, imwi She,
ngobe ndomilidzila meya yangu pezhugwi, kumuli.
Ngobe imwi, imwi She, makalulwama kakale mozwiibhatigwa,
muzhele ludo gusingazunguzike muna bose banomudana.
Zhulani zebe, imwi Yahwe, muhwe ntembezelo wangu.
Teedzani tjililo ne kumbila kwangu.
Mu nsi we kudziyidzika kwangu ndodana imwi,
ngobe mondidabila.
Akuna unonga imwi pakati kwe midzimu, imwi She,
kene kuli mishingo inonga yenyu.
Zwitjaba zose zwamakathama zowozha,
zwikathigama mbeli kwenyu She,
ngono zowokudza zina lenyu.
Ngobe munkulukulu kakale mothama zwithu zwinotjenamisa,
imwi moga mu Ndzimu.
Mundidiye zila yenyu, imwi Yahwe,
kuti ndizo ndiyende mu lebeswa lenyu,
mundipe moyo nng'ompela
kuti nditete zina lenyu.
Ndomuboka, imwi She Ndzimu wangu,
nge moyo wangu wose,
ndowokudza zina lenyu nge kusingapele kose.
Ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike bukulu seni mundili,
makasunungula meya yangu mu bugalo gwe bafi.
Banozwikudza bakandimukila, imwi Ndzimu,
goko le basina ngoni lovima butjilo gwangu,
ibo basina hanya namwi.
Koga, imwi She, mu Ndzimu una ngoni ne lubu,
amuto tjimbidza gwadzamoyo
muzhele ludo gusingazunguzike ne kugalikabgwe.
Shandukilani kundili mundihwile ngoni,
ipani nlanda wenyu simba
tjidzani nkololo we nlandakadzi wenyu.
Mundilakidze tjilakidzo tje ndulamo yenyu,
kuti ndizo zwita zwangu zwitjibone zwibhakhwe nge shoni,
ngobe imwi Yahwe, makandibhatsha mukabuya mukandinyaladza.
Mu dombo lakayengemala kumile nzi wawakasika,
Yahwe banoda mikoba ye Ziyoni
kupinda magalo wose a Jakubo.
Zwithu zwibuyanana zolebgwa nge kuko,
iwe nzi nkulu we Ndzimu.
Pakati kwa ibabo banondiziba,
ndonanga Rahabhu ne Bhabhiloni,
Filisitiya na iyebo, ne Tire ne Itopiya banoti,
“Iwoyo wakazwaligwa ikweno.”
Ngono ngekwe Ziyoni kowolebgwa kuyi,
“Uwoyo na uwouje bakazwaligwa muwuli.”
Ngobe iwo Upezhugwi pezhugwi ngekwawo unowosika.
Yahwe banokwala beti abe kwalisa zwitjaba.
“Iwoyu wakazwaligwa ikweno.”
Bambi ne bazani ngofanana banoti,
“Misenya yangu yose imumuli.”
Imwi Yahwe, Ndzimu we jidzo langu,
ndolila ndili mbeli kwenyu siku ne sikati.
Ndokumbila kuti ntembezelo wangu uzhe mbeli kwenyu,
hwililani tjililo tjangu.
Ngobe meya yangu izhele kudziyidzika,
ne butjilo gwangu gosedzela ku gomba le lufu.
Ndobaligwa muna ibabo banoyenda ku gomba le lufu.
Ndonga nlume usina simba,
ndonga ibabo bakalashigwa bapakati kwe bafi,
ndonga bakabulawa balele mu zwikumbu,
ndonga ibabo basingatjaalakane,
ngobe bakathubugwa mu kuwana bhatsho yenyu.
Makandibiga pasi pasi kwe gomba,
mukatikati kwakati zwititi.
Bushongola gwenyu gondilemela,
kakale gondivuna mitshibha.
Makathama kuti bakhwinya bangu bandiambuke
makandithama abe tjithu tjinobatjisa.
Ndakabhatshigwa kuti ndizo ndisitongo pudzumuka.
Mesho angu apofupadziwa nge buyendasi.
Zhuba nge zhuba ndomudana, imwi Yahwe,
ndosuka maboko anngu mbeli kwenyu.
Apa moshingila bafi matjenamiso kene?
Apa mitutshi inomilika kumukudza kene?
Apa ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike
golebgwa mu bugalo gwe bafi kene?
Kene kugalikabgwe kwenyu
kolebgwa mu gomba le golomodzo kene?
Apa makaabadzo enyu anozibgwa mu zhalima,
kene mishingo yenyu ye ndulamo inolebgwa
ngekwayo mu shango ye kukanganika kene?
Koga imi, imwi Yahwe, ndolilila kumuli,
mangwanana ntembezelo wangu
ndowoyisa mbeli kwenyu.
Imwi Yahwe, apa ini mundilashila kutjena kene?
Ini mundisumbikila buso gwenyu kene?
Tjinga kudwa mu butjetjana gwangu
ndili mu busungwa kakale ndili pejo nge lufu,
ndakadziyidziwa nge kutjisa kwenyu
ngono ndatjizwitoboka.
Bushongola gwenyu gondikulila,
kutjisa kwenyu kondikolomola.
Zhuba lose zwakandipoteleka
se nsundila zwakandifukidza.
Makathama kuti bazwalani bangu bandiambuke,
zhalima ndilo nzwalani wangu nkulu.
Ndowomba ngekwe ludo gwa Yahwe
gusingazunguzike, nge nlomo wangu ndowoleba
kugalikabgwe kwenyu ku zwizekugwana zose.
Ndileba kuti ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike gugelile tjose
kugalikabgwe kwenyu kwakadzikila se zhuzhugwi.
Makati, “Ndakathama tjidumano ne nshalugwa wangu,
ndakatuna pa nlanda wangu Dafite nditi,
‘Ndowobiga zwizekugwana zwizo nge kusingapele,
kakale ndowobakila zwizekugwana zose tjigalo tje bushe.’ ”
Zhuzhugwi ngakukudze matjenamiso enyu,
imwi Yahwe, kugalikabgwe kwenyu
ngakukudziwe mu gubungano le bayengemali.
Apa ndiani uku makole ungafanidzanyiwa na Yahwe kene?
Apa ndiani pakati kwe zwitjili zwe kudzimu unonga Yahwe kene?
Ndzimu unotjiwa mu gubungano le bayengemali,
nkulu kakale unotjisa kupinda bose bakaupoteleka kene?
Imwi Yahwe Ndzimu we mibunga,
apa ndiani una simba samwi, imwi Yahwe,
ne kugalikabgwe kwenyu kwakamupoteleka kene?
Molaula kodzongeka kuna masimba kwe gungwa;
matuthu e vula ye gungwa aemiduka moadzikamisa.
Makapkhwanya Rahabhu se ntumbu we phuka,
makapaladza zwita zwenyu nge luboko gwenyu gwakasima.
Zhuzhugwi nde kwenyu, shango na iyo nde yenyu,
shango yose na zose zwimuili ndimwi makazwithama,
burwa ne bunamdzwa makazwithama,
Matombo e Thabhori ne Heremoni anomba akashathila zina lenyu.
Luboko gwenyu guna simba gulu,
kwakasima luboko gwenyu ne tjiazha tjenyu tje luji.
Ndulamo ne kutambunuka ndizo thiwa dze tjigalo tjenyu tje bushe,
ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike ne kugalikabgwe makazwitungamidza.
Bakakombolegwa ibabo banoziba mpululu we nzano,
banoyenda mu tjedza tji mbeli kwenyu, imwi Yahwe.
Banomilidza zina lenyu pezhugwi zhuba lose,
bebuya bekudza ndulamo yenyu.
Ngobe ndimwi gudzo le simba labo,
nge bumilili gwenyu, lunyanga gwedu gwakamilidzigwa pezhugwi.
Ngobe tjivikili tjedu ndetja Yahwe,
She nkulu wedu, kunli iye N'yengemali we Iziraela
Ntolo makalebeleka nge mbono mukadwa Unogalikabgwe wenyu muti,
“Ndakaambadza tjiala iye una masiba
ndakamilidzila pezhugwi iye wandakashala mu bathu.
Ndakabona nlanda wangu Dafite,
ndakanzhodza ne mafuta angu akayengemala.
Kuti ndizo simba le tjiazha tjangu libe naye,
luboko gwangu gonsimisa.
Tjita atjingankunde,
mbi aangankulile.
Ndowopkhwanya zwita zwizwe mbeli kukwe,
ndibuya ndilobesa ibabo banombenga.
Kugalikabgwe kwangu ne ludo gwangu gusingasingazunguzike zwibe naye,
ngono lunyanga gugwe gowomilidzika mu zina langu.
Ndowobiga tjiazha tjitje pezhugwi kwe gungwa,
ne luboko gugwe gwe luji pezhugwi kwe njizi.
Unowondililila eti,
‘Mu tate bangu, Ndzimu wangu,
kakale Shongwe ye jidzo langu!’
Ndowonthama mbano yangu,
upezhugwi kwa boshe bakulu be shango.
Ndowombiganyila ludo gwangu gusingazunguzike nge kusingapele,
ne tjidumano tjangu naye atjitozunguzika.
Ndowobiga ludzi gugwe nge kusingapele,
ne tjigalo tjitje tje bushe se mazhuba e kudzimu.
Ha bana babe bangalasha nlayo wangu,
kakale basingatobele milayo yangu,
ha betjuluka ndaulo dzangu,
ngono basingalondolodze milayo yangu,
ndizo ndowobaloba shamu ngekwe matjinyo abo,
ne milandu yabo ndowobahwisila iyo zogwadza.
Koga anditowo tothodza ludo gwangu gusingazunguzike munli,
kene kuli kubashayila lebeswa mu kugalikabgwe kwangu.
Anditowo shandukila tjidumano tjangu,
kene kushandula dama labhuda mu nlomo wangu.
Ndatuna gwe kutanga kakale kuli kwe bupelo nge buyengemali gwangu,
anditowonyepela Dafite.
Lutshinga gugwe gowodwilila nge kusingapele,
ne tjigalo tjitje tje bushe tjowogalila tjose mbeli kwangu se zhuba.
Tjowobigwa nge kusingapele se mwedzi,
se ntendeki we malebeswa ku makole.”
Koga ngwenu manshandukila mukanlamba,
muzhele bushongola ngekwe nzhodziwa wenyu.
Mazwilandula tjidumano tjenyu ne nlanda wenyu,
makabumbuludza tjiala tjitje mu hwuluba.
Manginilila makuma awe wose mupkhwanya,
mukasiya matizhilo awe ali matongo.
Bose banopinda ndipapo banonkwibila,
watjibe madado mu babakidzani naye.
Makamilidza luboko gwe luji gwe zwita zwizwe,
mukashathisa zwita zwizwe zose.
Makapumisa bukano gugwe,
kakale amuzoma naye mu ngwa.
Makantolela swimbo ye bushe mu luboko gugwe,
mukaposela pasi tjigalo tjitje tje bushe.
Makatapudza mazhuba awe e butjetjana,
makambhatisa shoni.
Kowodza kukabe lini, imwi Yahwe? Apa mowozwisumbika tjatjose kene?
Apa kodza kukabe lini bushongola gwenyu gothuta se moto kene?
Kumbulani kuti butjilo gwangu gufupi tjini,
ngobe tjamakabumbila bakololo be bathu masimba malashe!
Apa ndiupi nthu ungatjila kasife kene?
Ndiani ungazwitjidza mu simba le gomba le lufu kene?
She, ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike gwa ntolo gungayi kene,
igo gwamakatuna ndigo kuna Dafite nge kugalikabgwe kwenyu?
Kumbulani, imwi She, kuti nlanda wenyu wadadigwa tjini,
sekwa ndinodzikitadzila masapa anodwa mu bathu,
andinotukwa nge zwita zwenyu, imwi Yahwe,
abakatuka papinda nzhodziwa wenyu ndiwo.
Kukudziwe Yahwe nge kusingapele kose.
Ngakujalo kakale Ngakujalo.
She, magala muli bugalo gwedu,
mu zwizekugwana zose.
Kwakati matombo asathu kabe yapo, kene kuli iko bumbiwa,
kene musathu mukabumba shango kene lubumbo,
kudwa mu tjibaka tjisingapele kunoti mu tjibaka
tjisingapele mu Ndzimu.
Mobgwiliza nthu mu hwuluba,
mube muti, “Bgwililani, imwi bana be bathu!”
Makole ali tjiwulu (1000) mu mesho enyu,
anonga zhuba ling'ompela lipinda.
Kene anonga watji kuli busiku
Motshwailila bathu kutjena, banonga mawoloto,
banonga bushwa gunomela kuli mangwanana,
mangwanana gopasula gukabe likulakula,
mu madekwana gotimbama guswaba.
Ngobe tolobesiwa nge kugwadzamoyo kwenyu,
totjisiwa nge bushongola gwenyu.
Makabiga zwibi zwedu mbeli kwenyu,
zwibi zwedu zwakasumbikika zwimu tjedza tje buso gwenyu.
Mazhuba edu wose anopitshiwa mu bushongola gwenyu,
makole edu anopinda se phepo.
Mazhuba e bupenyu gwedu makole ali makumi ali kutendeka koga,
kene pamwe ali makumi ali zhanakadzi, ha takasima,
nenguba kwakajalo paphidzo yawo
inobe yabe manyalo koga ne tshiyilo,
anotjimbidza apela, tibe tiwulukila kutjena.
Apa ndiani unoziba simba le kugwadzamoyo kwenyu?
Ngobe bushongola gwenyu bukulu,
golizana koga ne sekwamakafanila tjiwa ndiko.
Ndizo mutidiye kubala mazhuba edu
kuti pamwe ndizo tiwane moyo we butjenjedu.
Shandukani, Imwi Yahwe! Apa kowodza kukabe lini kene?
Ibeni ne ngoni mu balanda benyu!
Mutigutshe mu mangwanana nge ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike,
kuti ndizo tibe mu kushatha mazhuba wose.
Mutishathise mazhuba anolizana ne amakatigwadzisa,
ne makole ano lizana na iyawa atakabona mbipo.
Thamani kuti nshingo wenyu ulakidzike mu balanda benyu,
ne simba lenyu gulu ku bana be balanda benyu.
She Ndzimu wedu ngababe naswi,
thamani kuti mishingo ye maboko edu ibhudilile.
Ee, mishingo ye maboko edu ngaibhudilile!
Iye ugele mu nshasha we upezhugwi zhugwi,
unogalila tjose mu ntutshi we Ndzimu Masimbawose.
Unowoti kuna Yahwe,
“Mu dizhilo langu kakale mu mbakililo yangu,
Mu Ndzimu wangu, iwo wandinogalabgwe muwuli.”
Ngobe unowokuangula mu dati le nteyi we nyuni,
ne mu bugwele gusina ndapo.
Unowokufukidza ne misiba yawo,
ngono mu mapapiro awe unowowana dizhilo,
kugalikabgwe kwawo tjivikili ne mbakililo.
Awutowotja zwinotjisa busiku,
kene nsebe unowuluka masikati,
kene bugwele gusina ndapo gunozha mu zhalima,
kene golomodzo linotjinya zhuba lili mpani.
Tjiwulu (1000) tje bathu tjingafa pawunde nawe,
zwiwulu zwili gumi (10 000) ku luboko gugo gwe luji,
koga golomodzo ne bugwele azwingasedzele pakuli.
Koga unowolinga ukabona nge mesho awo,
lobgwa kwe babi.
Ngobe wakathama Yahwe dizhilo lilo,
ibo bapezhugwi zhugwi bugalo gugo,
akuna mbipo ingakuwila,
akuna zogwadza zwinowozha pawunde ne nshasha uwo.
Ngobe unowodwa batumwa bawo,
kuti bakulise mu zila dzidzo dzose.
Banowokugamila pezhugwi nge maboko abo,
kuti ndizo usikuthiwe nge bgwe.
Unowotshamba shumba ne ipakupaku nge makumbo,
shumbana ne nyoka unowozwitshamba nge makumbo.
“Ngekuti unondida, ndowon'angula,
ndowombakilila, ngobe unoziba zina langu.
Abendidana, ndowon'dabila,
ndowobe naye mu kudziyidzika,
ndowontjidza kakale ankudza.
Ndowon'gutsha nge kumpaphidzila mazhuba
awe e butjilo, kakale ndowonlakidza jidzo langu.”
Kojalo Ndzimu.
Kwakanaka kutenda Yahwe,
ne kumba njimbo dzinokudza zina lenyu,
imwi mu pezhugwi zhugwi.
Kuleba ngekwe ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike mangwanana,
nenge kugalikabgwe kwenyu kuli busiku,
kulidza tjilidzo tje misungo ne dende,
ne nlidzo we tjilidzo tje laya.
Ngobe imwi Yahwe, mandishathisa nge nshingo wenyu,
ndomba nge shatho ndimbila mishingo ye maboko enyu.
Mishingo yenyu mikulu seni, imwi Yahwe!
Njalakang'wa dzenyu dzimukatikati!
Tjimata atjingazibe,
tjilengwe atjingahwisise woku:
Nenguba babi betutuma se dishwa
ne bashingi be mbipo benaka,
bakalingisana nge golomodzo nge kusingapele.
Koga imwi Yahwe, mu pezhugwi nge kusingapele.
Ngobe zwita zwenyu, imwi Yahwe,
tjoselele zwita zwenyu zowoloba,
bose bashingi be mbipo banowopaladziwa.
Koga makamilidza lunyanga gwangu se gwe phofu.
Makandizhodza mafuta matshwa.
Mesho angu akabona kukundiwa kwe zwita zwangu.
Zebe dzangu dzakahwa phipiti ye zwita zwangu.
Balulwami banonaka se nlala,
kakale banokula se miti ye misida ye Lebhanoni.
Bakadzwagwa mu Ng'umba ya Yahwe,
banonaka mu magalo e Ndzimu wedu.
Mu bukwegu gwabo batjina mitjelo,
banogala bekwidzima kakale bakasima.
Kulakidza kuti Yahwe bakatambunuka,
ndibo shongwe yangu, kakale akuna mbipo mu bali.
Yahwe banobusa, bakaambala hazu ye bushe,
Yahwe bakaambala hazu, bakasunga thunji nge masimba.
Shango ayingatshedugwe,
tjigalo tjenyu tje bushe tjakabepo kudwila ntolo,
makadwila nge kusingapele.
Makungwa amilika, imwi Yahwe,
makungwa amilidza mahwi awo,
makungwa anobomba.
Yahwe bankulu kupinda dadamula kwe vula hwulu.
Bankulu kupinda matuthu e vula ye gungwa,
Yahwe bana masimba makulu seni!
Milayo yenyu aitoshanduka
buyengemali gofanila ng'umba yenyu
nge kusingapele, imwi Yahwe.
Imwi Yahwe, imwi Ndzimu we mbuzuludzo,
imwi Ndzimu we mbuzuludzo, dwililani ngopenya!
Milikani, imwi nsumikilisi we shango,
ipani banozwikudza tjakabafanila!
Imwi Yahwe, kowodza kukabe lini babi,
apa kowodza kukabe lini babi bekholisa kene?
Matama e mazwikudzo anotebuka mu milomo yabo
bose bashingi be bubi banozwikukumadza.
Banopkhwanya bathu benyu, imwi Yahwe!
Banotshambilidza lukata gwenyu.
Banobulaya tjilikadzi ne nzhi,
banobulaya siyang'wa.
Ngono banoti, “Yahwe abatobona,
Ndzimu wa Jakubo autobonesesa.”
Hwisisa iwe tjilengwe tjinopinda bathu bose,
zwilengwe, apa mowotjenjela lini kene?
Apa iye wakathama zebe aatohwa kene?
Iye wakabumba zhisho, aatobona kene?
Iye unolaya zwitjaba,
iye unodiya bathu luzibo,
apa aatotjemela kene?
Yahwe banoziba njalakang'wa dze bathu,
kuti iphepo isina tjayakasenga.
Bakashatha ibabo bamunolaya, imwi Yahwe,
ne mubadiya mu nlayo wenyu.
Mubanyalulusa kudwa mu mazhuba e kudziyidzika,
kuswikila gomba litshigwa babi.
Ngobe Yahwe abangalashe bathu babo,
abatowolasha lukata gwabo,
Ngobe ndulamo inowobgwilila ku balulwami
ndizo bose bakatambunuka mu moyo banowoitobela.
Apa ndiani unoma nami mu babi kene?
Apa ndiani unondimila mu bashingi be bubi kene?
Ha Yahwe babe basandibhatsha
meya yangu inobe yalibilidzila kunogala mu shango yakanyalala.
Ndakati ndialakana kuti, “Gumbo langu lotelela,”
Ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike, imwi Yahwe, gwakandisimisa.
Ha njemulo dze moyo wangu dzili njinji,
nyaladzo yenyu koshathisa meya yangu.
Apa babusi babi bangashingidzana namwi kene,
ibabo banothama mbipo nge kukombamisa nlayo?
Banoshangana beluka gwanga ngekwe balulwami,
kakale banosumikilisa bathu lufu basina nlandu.
Koga Yahwe batjibe dizhilo langu,
kakale Ndzimu wangu shongwe ye dizhilo langu.
Banowopa babi mbayilo we bubi gwabo,
banowobalashila kutjena nge zila ye bubi gwabo,
Yahwe Ndzimu wedu unowobatshwayila.
Izhani, ngati mbileni Yahwe,
ngati pululudzileni shongwe ye jidzo ledu!
Ngati zheni mbeli kwabo nge kutenda,
ngati longeni mpululu we shatho ne njimbo dzinoba kudza!
Ngobe Yahwe Ndzimu nkulu kwazo,
kakale She nkulu mu midzimu yose.
Shango yose imu luboko gwabo,
zwilungwani zwe matombo naizobo nde zwabo.
Gungwa nde gwabo, ngobe bakaguthama,
nenge shango, yakabumbiwa nge maboko abo.
Izhani, ngatikotamiseni misholo tinamate,
ngati thigameni mbeli kwa Yahwe, Mbumbi wedu!
Ngobe Ndzimu wedu,
iswi ti bathu be mafulo awo,
kakale ti pkhwizi dzaunotjengeta!
Dzene tshene nasi mungateedza hwi lawo!
Musitongo simisa mimoyo sa bobatategulu benyu ku Meribha,
se zhuba labakasimisa mimoyo ku Masa mu tjilambanyika.
Kwakati pandakalikwa ndi bobatategulu benyu,
bebuya bandishakisisa, nenguba bakabebona nshingo wangu.
Ndakakuthiwa nge ludzi igogu kwe makole ali makumi manna,
abe ati, “Bathu be mimoyo yakalashika,
kakale abana hanya nge zila dzangu.”
Ndizo ndakati mu kugwadzamoyo kwangu atuna nditi,
“Abatowongina mu bugalo gwangu gwe kunyaluluka.”
Mbilani Yahwe lumbo gutshwa,
mbilani Yahwe, shango yose.
Mbilani Yahwe, kudzani zina labo,
lebani ngekwe jidzo labo zhuba ne zhuba.
Lebani ngekwe gudzo la Yahwe mu zwitjaba,
mishingo yabo inotjenamisa mu bathu bose.
Ngobe Yahwe bankulu kwazo,
kakale bakafanila kudziwa kwazo,
bakafanila tjiwa kupinda midzimu yose.
Ngobe midzimu yose ye zwitjaba zwifano,
koga Yahwe bakathama kudzimu.
Gudzo ne bushe zwimbeli kwabo,
masimba ne bubuya zwimu bugalo gwabo.
Ipani Yahwe, imwi misha ye zwitjaba,
ipani Yahwe gudzo ne masimba.
Ipani Yahwe gudzo lakafanila zina labo,
zhisani tjipo, mungine mu misha yabo.
Namatani Yahwe mu bubuya gwakayengemala,
tetemani mbeli kwabo shango yose.
Idwani zwitjaba muti, “Yahwe banobusa!
Shango yakathamwa, aitofa yatshedugwa.
Banowosumikilisa bathu nge ndizandizanyo.”
Kudzimu ngakushathe, shango ngayi kholise,
gungwa ngagubombe, na kose kumuguli,
Shango ngayi kudze, na zose zwimuili.
Ndizo miti yose ye ishaka inowomba nge shatho.
Mbeli kwa Yahwe, ngobe baswika,
banozhila kuwosumikilisa shango.
Banowosumikilisa shango nge ndulamo,
ne bathu nge malebeswa abo.
Yahwe banobusa! Shango ngayishathe,
zwigwizi zose zwe gungwa ngazwishathe!
Makole ne zhalima lakati zwititi lakabapoteleka.
Ndulamo ne kutambunuka ndizo thiwa dze tjigalo tjabo tje bushe.
Moto wakabatungamila,
unopisa banyanyayidzi babo mbizho dzose dze shango.
Lupenyo gwabo govoneka shango yose,
shango inobona ikatetema.
Matombo anonyawuka se phola mbeli kwa Yahwe,
mbeli kwa she we shango yose.
Kudzimu koleba ngekwe ndulamo yabo,
ne zwitjaba zose zobona gudzo labo.
Banamati bezwifano bose banobhatisiwa shoni,
ibabo banozwikudza ngekwe zwifano zwisina nshingo,
midzimu yose inokotamisa misholo mbeli kwabo.
Ziyoni inohwa ikashatha,
ne mizi ye Juda inoshatha,
ngekwe kusumikilisa kwenyu, imwi Ndzimu.
Ngobe imwi Yahwe, mu pezhugwi kwe shango yose,
mokudziwa kwazo kupinda midzimu yose.
Yahwe banoda ibabo banobenga bubi,
banotjengeta matjilo e bayengemali babo,
banobagwila mu luboko gwe babi.
Tjedza tjopenyela balulwami,
ne shatho kuna bakatambunuka mu moyo.
Shathilani Yahwe imwi bakalulwama,
kakale muboke zina labo lakayengemala!
Mbilani Yahwe lumbo butshwa,
ngobe bakathama zwithu zwinotjenamisa.
Tjiyazha tjabo tje luji ne luboko gwabo gwakayengemala
zwabathamila kukunda.
Yahwe bakazibisa jidzo labo,
bakazwimbunulila zwitjaba ndulamo yabo.
Bakakumbulukigwa ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
ne kugalikabgwe kwabo, ngekwe ng'umba ye Iziraela.
Midzibo yose ye shango yabona
kukunda kwe Ndzimu wedu.
Shathilani Yahwe nge mpululu, imwi shango yose,
shobani lumbo gwe shatho ne gunobakudza.
Imbani njimbo dzinokudza Yahwe nge tjilidzo tje laya,
ili laya ye nlidzo unozipa.
Pululudzani nge shatho mbeli kwa She nkulu, ibo Yahwe,
nge lunyanga.
Gungwa ngagubombe, na zose zwimuguli,
shango na bose banogala muili.
Vula ye nkubila ngailobe phande,
matuthu ngaambe wose ngoshatha.
Mbeli kwa Yahwe, ngobe baswika,
kowosumikilisa shango.
Banowosumikilisa shango nge ndulamo,
ne zwitjaba nge ndizandizanyo.
Yahwe banobusa, bathu ngabateteme!
Bagele mu tjigalo tje bushe pakati kwe dzikherubhu,
shango ngayi tengenyeke!
Yahwe bankulu mu Ziyoni,
banokudziwa kupinda zwitjaba zose.
Ngabakudze zina lenyu gulu linotjika.
Bakayengemala!
She nkulu, bana masimba banoda ndulamo
imwi makathama ndizandizanyo
makashingikadza thambunuko
ne ndulamo muna Jakubo.
Kudzani Yahwe Ndzimu wedu,
namatani muli pa tjigalo tje makumbo abo.
Bakayengemala!
Mushe na Aroni bakabe bali bamwe be Bapirisiti babo,
Samuele wakabe ali mmwe we bakadana zina labo.
Bakalilila Yahwe, ngono bakabadabila.
Bakalebeleka nabo bali mu gole,
bakahwilila milayo yabo,
ne ndaulo dzabakabapa.
Imwi Yahwe Ndzimu wedu, makabadabila,
makabe Ndzimu unobazwiibhatigwa,
koga mu mbgwilizili we matjinyo abo.
Kudzani Yahwe Ndzimu wedu,
ngono munnamate ku dombo labo lakayengemala,
ngobe Yahwe Ndzimu wedu bakayengemala.
Pululudzilani Yahwe nge shatho, shango yose.
Shingilani Yahwe nge shatho,
izhani mbeli kwabo mumba makashatha.
Zibani kuti Yahwe ndibo Ndzimu.
Ndibo bakatibumba, ngono iswi tibabo,
ti bathu babo, ne pkhwizi dze mafulo abo.
Nginani nge mikoba yabo nge mboko,
ne mu misha yabo nge kubakudza.
Mubatende, kudzani zina labo.
Ngobe Yahwe bakalulwama,
ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike gumile nge kusingapele,
ne kugalikabgwe kwabo mu zwizekugwana zose.
Ndowomba ngekwe kugalikabgwe ne ndulamo
ndowombila imwi Yahwe.
Ndowozwidiya zila dzakalulwama.
Apa mowozha kundili lini kene?
Ndowoyenda nge moyo ntjena,
mu ng'umba yangu.
Anditowobiga tjimwe,
pa mesho angu tjakabipa.
Ndobenga bathu be mija yakabhuda
mu zila, aingandinamatile.
Moyo wakakombama unowobe kutjena nami,
anditowoziba tjimwe ngekwe bubi.
Iye unowoleba shaya ngekwe mbakidzani naye ndowonlobesa.
Nthu we mesho akakangadzika ne moyo we mazwikudzo,
anditowonletjedzela.
Ndowoma ne banogalikabgwe mu shango,
kuti ndizo batjile nami,
mmwe ne mmwe unoyenda muzila isingasoleke, unowondishingila.
Akuna nthu unothama butjebeli
unowogala mu ng'umba yangu,
akuna nthu unoleba manyepkhwa unowogala pandili.
Mangwanana mamwe ne mamwe ndowolobesa
babi bose mu shango,
ndithubula bashingi be bubi bose
kudwa mu nzi nkulu wa Yahwe.
Ihwani ntembezelo wangu, imwi Yahwe,
tjililo tjangu ngatjiswike kumuli.
Musindisumbikile buso gwenyu
mu zhuba le kudziyidzika kwangu.
Zhulani zebe dzenyu,
mutjimbidze kundidabila andidana!
Ngobe mazhuba angu anopinda se busi,
mafupa angu anopisa se moto we vutho.
Moyo wangu wakaputa wakaswaba se bushwa,
ndokangang'wa kuja zojiwa.
Anditjina nyama ndabe mafupa woga,
ngekugomelela kwangu pezhugwi.
Ndonga gola le tjilambanyika,
se gunda le matongo.
Ndolala ndakalinga,
ndonga nyuni iyoga pezhugwi kwe tjilungwani tje ng'umba.
Zwita zwangu zoshwa zwileba nge kwangu,
ibabo banondigongobola banoshingisa
zina langu kupa bhiso.
Ndoja nlota se zojiwa,
mishodzi yangu yakashangana ne tjandinong'wa,
ngobe kugwadza moyo kwenyu kukulu,
makandimilidza mukandiposela kutjena.
Mazhuba angu anonga ntutshi we madekwana,
ndoswaba se bushwa.
Koga imwi Yahwe, mugele mu bushe nge kusingapele kose,
zina lenyu loswika ku zwizekugwana zose.
Mowomilika mukahwilangoni Ziyoni,
ngobe gwabe lubaka gwe kummilila,
lubaka gwakabigwa gwatjiswika.
Ngobe mabgwe awo ndianodika kwazo mu balanda benyu,
kakale banohwila ngoni hwuluba yawo.
Zwitjaba zowotja zina la Yahwe,
na boshe bakulu bose be shango banowotja gudzo labo.
Ngobe Yahwe banowomusa Ziyoni kakale,
banowoboneka mu gudzo labo.
Banowodabila ntembezelo we nshayi,
abatowolingila pasi ntembezelo wabo.
Oku ngakukwaligwe tjizekugwana tjinowozha,
kuti itjaba tjisathu tjazwagwa tjizhe tjikudze Yahwe.
Ngobe bakalinga pasi kudwa
kudzimu ku bugalo gwabo gwakayengemala,
kudwa kudzimu Yahwe bakalinga shango,
kuti bahwe gomela kwe basungwa,
kusunungula ibabo bakabe basumikilisigwa lufu,
kuti ndizo balume basumikile zina la Yahwe mu Ziyoni,
nekuti likudziwe mu Jerusalema,
ha zwitjaba zwikubungana,
ne mibuso, kunamata Yahwe.
Bakanditema mafupa pakati kwe tjibaka,
bakanditapudzila mazhuba e butjilo.
Ndoti, “Imwi Ndzimu wangu, musinditole
makole angu atji pakati,
makole enyu anoswika
ku zwizekugwana zose.”
Imwi makati ntolo mukateya thiwa dze shango,
nenge zhuzhugwi nshigo we maboko enyu.
Zowoloba, koga imwi mowogalila tjose.
Zowoshakala se tjiambalo.
Mozwilabadzana se zwiambalo, ngono zopinda,
koga imwi monga se kwamagala muli iko,
ne makole enyu aana paanopelela.
Bana be balanda benyu banowotjila bakavikiligwa,
bana babo banowotjilila mbeli kwenyu.
Kudza Yahwe, iwe meya yangu,
ne zose zwimundili,
ngazwikudze zina labo lakayengemala.
Kudza She, iwe meya yangu,
usikangang'we mbuzilo yabo yose.
Ibo banozwiibhatigwa milandu iyo yose,
banopodza magwele awo wose,
ndibo banodusa butjilo gugo mu gomba,
banokuambadza tjiala tje ludo gusingazunguzike ne ngoni,
ibo banokugutsha nge zwakanaka butjilo gugo gose
kuti ndizo butjilo gugo gube gutshwa segwe dzu.
Yahwe banoshinga bubuya
ne ndulamo muna bose banotshambilidziwa.
Bakazibisa Mushe zila dzabo,
mishingo yabo ku bathu be Iziraela.
Yahwe bana ngoni ne lubu,
abatotjimbidza gwadza moyo kakale bazhele ludo gusingazunguzike.
Abatowogala betjemela,
kakale abatogwadzilamoyo tjose.
Abatoshingidzana naswi kuyendidzana ne zwibi zwedu,
nenguba kuli kutibgwilizila kuyendidzana ne milandu yedu.
Sekwa kudzimu kuli pezhugwi kwe shango,
ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike bukulu seni muna ibabo banobatja!
Sekwa kuli thambo kudwa mu bhezhuba kunoti ku golombedzo,
sa ikoku, ndiyo thambo yabakatola kusuka matjinyo edu.
Sekwa tate be bana bana ngoni mu bana babo,
ndizo Yahwe bana ngonibo muna ibabo banobatja.
Ngobe banoziba sekwa takabumbgwa,
banokumbulukigwa kuti tihwuluba.
Ngekwe nthu, mazhuba awe anonga bushwa,
unothinila se luba le shango.
Phepo inofula pezhugwi kwalo, ngono lakabe liyenda nayo,
ne bugalo gwalo gube gwalikangang'wa tjose.
Koga ludo gwa Yahwe gusingazunguzike gumuna ibabo banontja,
kudwa kusina budwilo kunoti kusingapele
ne ndulamo yabo ku bana ne bana be bana babo,
kuna ibabo banobhata tjidumano tjabo
kakale bekumbulukigwa milayo yabo.
Yahwe bakathama tjigalo tjabo tje bushe kudzimu,
ne mbuso wabo unobusa kose.
Kudzani Yahwe, imwi mose batumwa babo be kudzimu,
imwi bakasima banothama dama labo,
imwi banohwilila dama labo labanoleba.
Kudzani Yahwe, imwi mibunga yabo,
bashingili babo banoshinga kuda kwabo.
Kudzani Yahwe, mose zwibumbiwa zwabo,
mu magalo wose e mbuso wabo.
Kudza Yahwe, iwe meya yangu.
Kudza Yahwe, iwe meya yangu.
Imwi Yahwe Ndzimu wangu, mu nkulu kwazo.
Makaambadziwa kutetiwa ne bushe,
Makazwifukidza nge tjedza se tjiambalo.
Imwi munobambula kudzimu se nshasha we saile.
Imwi munomisa phanda dze mbako dzenyu mu vula,
imwi munothama makole kara yenyu ye bushe,
imwi motatha mapapiro e phepo,
mothama phepo batumwa benyu,
moto ne nthuto bashingili benyu.
Mobiga shango mu thiwa dzayo,
kuti ndizo isitongofa yazunguziwa.
Moifukidza nge madziba e gungwa se tjiambalo,
vula yakabe ilimile pezhugwi kwe matombo.
Amutjemela banotizha,
mu nsindo we kudadamula kwenyu bakatizha.
Matombo akamilika,
mikuku ikawungila pathu pamakailaulila.
Makabiga n'gathu kuti ndizo basitongopinda,
kuti ndizo basitongofukidza shango kakale.
Mowungisila misenya mu mikuku,
inowunga pakati kwe matuthu,
inong'wisa phuka imwe ne imwe,
mbizi dze shango dzozwidusa nyota.
Pawunde nayo nyuni dzobaka mashaka,
dzomba dzili pakati kwe thabi dze miti.
Kudwa mu bugalo gwenyu gupezhugwi modilidzila matombo,
shango inogutshiwa nge zwizwalo zwe nshingo wenyu.
Momedzela ng'ombe bushwa,
ne miti kuti ishingisiwe nge nthu,
nekuti aduse zojiwa mu mavu,
ne nkumbi kushathisa moyo we nthu,
ne mafuta anothama kuti buso gugwe gupenye,
ne zojiwa zwinogadza nthu moyo.
Miti ya Yahwe inodilidzigwa kwazo,
misida ye Lebhanoni yabakadzwala.
Nyuni dzobaka mashaka adzo muili,
hwondo inobaka shaka layo mu miti isina mihwa.
Matombo malefu anogala ngululu,
shongwe i dizhilo le mbila.
Makathama kuti mwedzi ulakidze misi ye gole,
zhuba loziba tjibaka tjalo tjongina.
Mothama zhalima, kukabe busiku,
lubaka gwe phuka dze shango dziyenda mulili.
Shumbana dzobombela tjadzingabulaya,
dzishaka zojiwa zwadzo mu Ndzimu.
Ha zhuba libhuda, dzonobgwata
dzinolala mu mazwimba adzo.
Nthu unoyenda ku nshingo uwe,
enoshinga kudza kube madekwana.
Zwakawanda seni zwithu zwamakathama, imwi Yahwe!
Makazwithama zose nge butjenjedu,
shango izhele zwitjili zwenyu.
Ndiyeno i gungwa, bukulu kakale gwakaashama,
guna zwitjili zwinonyewula zwe bunji gusingabalike,
zwitjili zose zwitukununu ne zwikulu kulu.
Zwikepe zoyenda muguli,
ne zhithu le gungwa lamakabumba kuti lizanile muguli.
Zose izwezwi zwakalinga kumuli
kuti muzwipe zojiwa mu tjibaka tjakalingisana.
Amuzwipa, zotjinunga, amufumbatunula
tjiazha tjenyu, zogutshiwa nge zwithu zwakanaka.
Amusumbika buso gwenyu, zotja, amushomola
meya yazo zofa, zwibe zwibgwilila
mu hwuluba pazwakadwa.
Amudusa meya yenyu, muituma zobumbika,
kakale mothama mbumbiko ye shango ikabe tshwa.
Dzene gudzo la Yahwe lingama nge kusingapele,
dzene Yahwe bangashathila mishingo yabo.
Ibo banolinga shango ikatetema,
banokutha matombo kathungayila bhulubusi.
Ndowombila Yahwe mu butjilo gwangu gose,
ndowomba ndikudza Ndzimu wangu anditjatjila.
Dzene kukumbula kwangu kungabashathisa,
ngobe ndowoshatha ndili muna Yahwe.
Batjinyi ngabalobesiwe mu shango,
ne babi basitjafe babepo.
Kudza Yahwe, iwe meya yangu.
Kudza Yahwe!
Tendani Yahwe, danani zina labo,
thamani kuti mishingo yabo izibike mu bathu.
Mubambile, imbani njimbo dzinobakudza,
lebani ngekwe mishingo yabo yose inotjenamisa.
Gudzo mu zina labo lakayengemala.
Mimoyo ya ibabo banoshaka Yahwe ngaishathe.
Shakani Yahwe nenge simba labo,
dwililani mushake buso gwabo.
Kumbulani mishingo inotjenamisa yabakathama,
matjenamiso abo, nenge kusumikilisa kwabakathama.
Imwi lutshinga gwa Abhurahama nlanda wabo,
bakololo ba Jakubo, bashalugwa babo.
Ndibo Yahwe Ndzimu wedu,
kusumikilisa kwabo kumu shango yose.
Banokumbulukigwa tjidumano tjabo nge kusingapele,
ngekwe dama labakadwa, zwizekugwana zwili tjiwulu.
Tjidumano tjabakathama na Abhurahama,
kutuna kwabo begadzabgwe Isaki,
kwabakatshambilidza muna Jakubo se nlayo,
muna Iziraela tjili tjidumano nge kusingapele,
beti, “Ndowomupa shango ye Kanana
se gobe lenyu kube lukata.”
Pabakabe basibangana nge mbalo,
bali bashomanana, kakale bali bazhi muili,
beyenda kudwa mu tjaba imwe benoti ku imwe,
bedwa mu mbuso mmwe benoti ku mmwe,
akuna wabakadumilila kuti abatshambilidze,
bakatjemela boshe bakulu mu bumo gwabo,
beti, “Musitongo kuma bazhodziwa bangu,
musitongogwadzisa balebesambeli bangu.”
Bakati bezhisa bhamba mu shango
bakapedza zojiwa zose,
bakabe batungamidza nlume mbeli kwabo,
Josefa, wakabe atengesiwa ali nlanda.
Makumbo awe akahwisiwa zogwadza nge miketani,
ntshibha uwe wakapombedziwa tshipi,
kuswikila tjaakaleba tjishingikala,
dama la Yahwe lakanlika.
She nkulu wakalaila kuti asunungugwe,
nlauli we itjaba wakansunungula.
Wakanthama she we ng'umba iye,
ne nlauli we thundu iye yose,
kuti ape ndaulo hadzasha dzawo se kwaanoda
kakale kuti adiye batungamili babe butjenjedu.
Ndizo Iziraela akazha mu Egipiti,
Jakubo wakagala se deluka mu shango ya Hamu.
Ngono Yahwe bakawatsha bathu babo kwazo,
kakale bakabasimisa kupinda zwita zwabo,
bakashandula mimoyo yabo kuti babenge bathu babo,
kuti bashinge ne balanda babo nge bupitipiti.
Bakatuma nlanda wabo Mushe,
na Aroni ibo babakashalula.
Bakathama zwilakidzo zwabo pakati kwabo,
ne matjenamiso mu shango ya Hamu.
Bakatuma zhalima, bakathama kuti shango itizwii,
bakashandukila matama abo
bakashandula vula dzabo dzikabe malopa,
bakathama kuti hwobe dzabo dzife.
Shango yabo ikazhala mazhula,
nenge mu ng'umba dzabo she bakulu babo.
Bakalebeleka, kukazha nlunda we thuzi,
ne nyunyu dzikazhala mu shango yabo yose.
Bakabaligila tjivulamabgwe mu bumo gwe vula,
ne lupenyo gwe vula gukapenya mu shango yabo yose.
Bakaloba mizhambi ne mikuyu yabo,
ngono bakavunilila miti ye shango yabo.
Bakalebeleka, phashu dzikazha
ne phashwana dze bunji gusingabalike,
dzakaja zwimela zose mu shango yabo.
Bakabulaya mbano dzose mu shango yabo,
zwizwalo zwe kutanga zwe simba labo lose.
Ndizo kapeleka Baiziraela bakasenga siliva ne golide,
akuna ne nng'ompela mu ludzi gugwe wakakuthiwa.
Baiziraela bakati bemilika Egipiti ikashatha,
ngobe bakabe bobatja.
Bakatambunudza gole kubafukidza,
ne moto kuti kube ne tjedza busiku.
Bakakumbila, ngono bakabazhisila masukunyuni,
bakabapa zojiwa zwinodwa kudzimu zwili zwinjinji.
Bakazhula shongwe vula ikatebukana,
ikawunga ipalama tjilambanyika se gwizi,
ngobe bakakumbulukigwa kugadzabgwe kwabo kwakayengemala,
ne nlanda wabo Abhurahama.
Ndizo bakapeleka bathu babo ngekushatha,
bashalugwa babo bemba.
Bakabapa shango dze zwitjaba,
ngono bakazwitolegwa fumwa yakazwishabigwa nge zwitjaba,
kuti ndizo kubupelo babhate milayo yabo
ne kutjengeta ndaulo dzabo.
Kudzani Yahwe!
Kudzani Yahwe!
Tendani Yahwe ngobe bakalulwama,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike gumile nge kusingapele kose.
Apa ndiyani ungaleba ngekwe mishingo mikulu ya Yahwe,
kene kulakidza kukudziwa kwabo kene?
Bakakombolegwa bana njele ne ndulamo,
ibabo banothama ndulamo misi yose.
Mundikumbule, imwi Yahwe, ha mumilila bathu benyu,
mundibhatshe amubatjidza,
kuti ndibone gombolelo le bashalugwa benyu,
kuti ndishathile shatho ye itjaba tjenyu,
kuti ndimukudzebo ne lukata gwenyu.
Takatjinya iswi tose na bobatategulu bedu,
takathama tjibi, tikathama bubi.
Bobatategulu bedu bali ku Egipiti,
abazothamila hanya mishingo yenyu inotjenamisa,
abazokumbulukigwa bunji gwe ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike,
koga bakapandukila Upezhugwi pezhugwi pa gungwa gushaba.
Koga ibo bakababhatsha bethamila zina labo,
kuti ndizo kuzibgwe ngekwe simba labo gulu.
Bakatjemela gungwa gushaba, gukapkhwa.
Bakabatungamila mu tjilambanyika.
Ndizo bakabadzutunula mu luboko gwe nnyanyayidzi,
bakabadzutunula mu luboko gwe tjita.
Vula ika kwididza banyanyayidzi babo.
Akuna ne nng'ompela wabo wakasala.
Ndizo bakagalamoyo mu matama abo,
bakamba njimbo dzinokudza Ndzimu.
Koga tjinyolotjo bakakangang'wa mishingo yabo,
abazolindila gumbuludzo labo.
Koga bakabe ne kudzungayila kwe njemulo pakati kwe shango,
ndizo bakalika Ndzimu mu tjilambanyika,
Ukabapa tjabakabe bakumbila,
koga ukatumila bugwele gwakabipa pakati kwabo.
Balume ba mu mishasha bakathamila Mushe fupa
na Aroni N'yengemali wa Yahwe,
shango ikazhuka ikamidza Dathani,
kakale ikavukidzila goko la Abhiramu.
Moto na iwobo ukamuka ukapisa goko labo,
nthuto ukapisa babi.
Bakathama ifano tje phulu ku Horebhu
ngono bakanamata ifano tjakabumbiwa.
Bakatetshanya gudzo le Ndzimu
nge ifano tje ngabe inofula bushwa.
Bakakangang'wa Ndzimu ntjidzi wabo,
wakathama zwithu zwikulukulu mu Egipiti,
mishingo inotjenamisa mu shango ya Hamu,
ne mishingo inotjisa pa gungwa gushaba.
Ndizo wakabe eti unobalobesa,
ha Mushe nshalugwa wawo, akabe,
asama mu nkoto mbeli kwawo,
kushandusa bushongola gwawo mu kubalobesa.
Ndizo bakasola shango inoyemulika,
bakashaya kugalamoyo mu kugadzabgwe kwawo.
Bakang'ong'ola mu mishasha yabo,
ngono bakasiteedze hwi la Yahwe.
Ndizo bakamilidza luboko gwabo bakatuna
kuti banowobathama kuti bawe mu tjilambanyika,
kakale banowopaladza zwizekugwana zwabo nge zwitjaba,
bebapaladza bezhala shango.
Ndizo bakazwibhatshanya na Bhaale we Peori,
bakaja zwibhayilo zwakapiwa bafi,
Bakashongola Yahwe bebagwadzisa moyo nge mishingo yabo mibi,
ngono shamu ikabawila.
Ndizo Finihasi kamilika kabakumbilila,
ngono shamu ikamisiwa.
Ikoku kwakatogwa ili ndulamo ya Finihasi
kudwa mu tjizekugwana kunoti ku tjimwe nge kusingapele kose.
Bakagwadzisa Yahwe moyo ku misenya ye Meribha,
ngono Mushe wakangina mu manikano nge zila yabo,
ngobe bakadzonga meya dzidze,
bakathama kuti Mushe alebe matama mafu.
Abazolobesa zwitjaba
sekwa kwabakadwiwa ndi Yahwe,
koga bakalobolelana ne zwitjaba zwipoga
ngono bakazwidiya mipanga yabo.
Bakashingila midzimu yabo,
kwakabe gwanga kubali.
Bakathama bakololo babo zwibhayilo
ne bakololokadzi babo bakababhayila midzimu.
Bakatebula lopa lisina nlandu,
lopa le bakololo ne bakololokadzi babo,
babakadusa ili zwibhayilo ku midzimu ye Bakanana,
ngono shango ikatemapadziwa nge lopa lile.
Bakazwitemapadza nge mishingo yabo,
kakale bakathama bufukula nge zwabanoshinga.
Ndizo Yahwe bakagwadzila moyo bathu babo,
ngono bakashima lukata gwabo,
bakabalonga mu maboko e zwitjaba zwipoga,
kuti ndizo babusiwe ndi ibabo bakababenga.
Zwita zwabo zwakabatshambilidza,
bakakundiwa bakabe pasi kwe simba lazo.
Yahwe bakabagwila kanjinji,
koga ibo bakabapandukila nge mazwimisilo abo,
ngono bakayisiwa pasi ngekwe matjinyo abo.
Nenguba kwakajalo bakabayitila hanya mu kuhwa zogwadza kwabo,
pabakahwa tjililo tjabo.
Bakakumbulukigwa tjidumano tjabo nge kwabo,
kuyendidzana nge ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike bakabuza moyo.
Bakathama kuti bahwigwe zogwadza
nge bathu bose bakabe bakabathama basungwa.
Mutitjidze, imwi Yahwe, Ndzimu wedu,
kakale mutikubunganye kudwa mu zwitjaba,
kuti ndizo tiboke zina lenyu lakayengemala
ne gudzo mu kukudziwa kwenyu.
Ngakukudziwe Yahwe, Ndzimu we Iziraela,
kudwa kusingapele kunoti kusingapele.
Ngono bathu bose ngabati, “Ngakujalo.”
Kudzani Yahwe!
Tendani Yahwe, ngobe bakalulwama,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike gumile nge kusingapele kose.
Bakadzutunugwa ndi Yahwe ngabalebe bejalo,
ibabo bakadzutunugwa mu tjiazha tje tjita
babazwibuzila kudwa mu shango,
kudwa ku bhezhuba ne kudwa golombedzo,
kudwa ku bunamdzwa ne kudwa ku burwa.
Bamwe bakadzungayila mu tjilambanyika tjisina ugele mutjili,
basingawane zila inoyenda ku nzi nkulu kwabangagala.
Bakabhakhwa nge zhala ne nyota,
bakabe bepela meya.
Ndizo bakalilila kuna Yahwe mukudziyidzika kwabo,
ngono bakabasunungula mu manikano dzabo.
Bakabatungamila nge zila yakatambunuka,
kuswikila beswika ku nzi nkulu wabangagala.
Ngababokele Yahwe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike,
nenge mishingo yabo inotjenamisa mu bathu.
Ngobe banogukhwisa bana nyota,
ne bana zhala banobagutsha nge zwithu zwakanaka.
Bamwe bakagala mu zhalima ne mu lima dema lakatizwi,
basungwa bali mu kuhwazogwadza ne mu dzitshipi,
ngobe bakapandukila matama e Ndzimu,
bakalasha gumbuludzo le Upezhugwi zhugwi.
Bakapaugwa nge nshingo unolema,
bakawila pasi, kusina ne unobabhatsha.
Ndizo bakalilila kuna Yahwe mu kudziyidzika kwabo,
bakabatjidza mu kuhwazogwadza kwabo,
bakabadusa mu lima ne mu zhalima lakati zwititi,
bakathubula misungo yabo na pakati.
Ngababokele Yahwe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike,
nenge mishingo yabo inotjenamisa mu bathu.
Ngobe banopkhwanya matendele akathamwa nge bhurasi,
bebuya bethubula mazhalilo e tshipi na pakati.
Bamwe bakabe begwalisiwa nge zila dzabo dze bubi,
kakale bakadziyila ngentha ye milandu yabo,
zojiwa zose zwakabe zwibashimisa,
bakashanduka pa gomba le lufu.
Ndizo bakalilila kuna Yahwe mu kudziyidzika kwabo,
ngono bakabatjidza mu kuhwazogwadza kwabo.
Bakatumila dama labo ngono likabapodza,
likabatjidza mu kulobesiwa.
Ngababokele Yahwe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
nenge mishingo yabo inotjenamisa mu bathu.
Ngabaduse zwibhayilo zwe dendo, kakale balebe
ngekwe mishingo yabo nge njimbo dzabo dze shatho.
Bamwe bakadelukila mu gungwa bali mu zwikepe,
beshaba bali mu vula hwuluhwulu dze gungwa,
Bakabona mishingo ya Yahwe,
mishingo yabo inotjenamisa mu kati kati kwe vula.
Ngobe bakalaula kukamilika matutu makulu,
akamilidza matuthu e vula ye gungwa.
Akamidukila pezhugwi, kabgwilila mukati kati,
bakatemeka mafupa bali mu mbatsha,
bakadzunguluka bakatshatsharika se bakalaladza,
ne luzibo gwabo gukabe mwina we tjigu.
Ndizo bakalilila kuna Yahwe mu kudziyidzika kwabo,
bakabadusa mu manikano dzabo,
bakadzikamisa dutu,
ne matuthu e gungwa akadzikama.
Ndizo bakashatha ngobe zwakabe zwadzikama,
bakanobaswikisa ku bukotokelo gwe njemulo dzabo.
Ngababokele Yahwe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike,
nenge mishingo yabo inotjenamisa mu bathu.
Ngabamilidzile Yahwe pezhugwi mu gubungano le bathu,
babakudze mu nshangano we bahwola.
Banoshandula njizi dzikabe tjilambanyika,
misenya ikabe lidondo,
Shango ye zwizwalo ikabe gukuno,
kuli ngekwe bubi gwe bagali bayo.
Banoshandula tjilambanyika madziba e vula,
shango ye makwakwa ikashanduka misenya.
Banothama kuti bana zhala batjilile ipapo,
kakale babake nzi unogagwa muuli,
banodzwala mu minda, bakadzwala minda ye mizhambi,
ndizo bakavuna kunjinji.
Nge gombolelo labo, banowanda kwazo,
ngono abatoletja ng'ombe dzabo dzitapudzika.
Abatapudzika bakabe bashomanana,
balengudzika ngotshambilidziwa, kudziyidzika, nenge kuhwa zogwadza,
banotebulila kulengudzika mu hadzasha,
bethama kuti badzungayile mu shango pasina zila,
koga banomilidza basheti mu tshiyilo,
bebe bewatsha misha yabo se ngubi ye pkhwizi.
Bakatambunuka banokubona bebe beshatha,
koga babi bose banozhalila milomo yago.
Batjenjedu ngabateedze zwithu izwezwi,
kakale babe ne njele ngekwe ludo gusingazunguzike gwa Yahwe.
Moyo wangu wakadzikama, imwi Ndzimu,
moyo wangu wakadzikama,
ndowomba lumbo athama nlidzo unozipa.
Muka iwe meya yangu!
Muka tjilidzo tje dende ne tje laya!
Ndowobinduka mazhokuyedza.
Ndowomutenda imwi Yahwe, pakati kwe zwitjaba,
kakale ndowomba njimbo dzinomukudza pakati kwe zwitjaba.
Ngobe ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike,
gupezhugwi kupinda zhuzhugwi,
kakale kugalikabgwe kwenyu koswika ku makole.
Kudziwani, imwi Ndzimu, mumilidzigwe
pezhugwi kupinda zhuzhugwi, ne gudzo
lenyu ngalibe mu shango yose.
Mutikundile nge luboko gwenyu gwe luji,
mubuye mundidabile,
kuti ndizo ibabo bamunoda batjidziwe.
Ndzimu wakagadzabgwe,
uli mu bugalo gwawo gwakayengemala:
“Mu kukunda ndowothubukanya Shekemu,
kakale ndowokobanya nkuku we Sakhoti.
Gileyadi nde yangu na Manase nde yangu;
Ifureimi i hwutshe ye tjivikili tje nsholo wangu,
Juda i swimbo yangu ye bushe.
Moabu i bhavu landinongulila;
Edomu iye ndomposa nge shangu yangu;
ndomimilila Filisitiya ngobe ndankunda.”
Ndiyani unowondiyisa ku nzi nkulu wakabakiligwa nge luswingo?
Ndiyani unowonditungamila ndiyenda ku Edomu
Apa amuzotilasha kene Ndzimu?
Amutoyenda ne babhayani bedu Ndzimu.
Mutibhatshe mu zwita,
ngobe bhatsho ye nthu ayina nshingo.
Ndzimu unowotipa tjilopa
ndiwo unowotshamba zwita zwedu nge makumbo.
Imwi, Ndzimu wandinokudza, musinyalale koga!
Ngobe milomo mibibi ne ye bupitipiti inondikuwelela,
banoleba nge kwangu manyepkhwa.
Banondipomba nge matama e lubengo
kakale bendigwisa ndisina nlandu.
Banoshandula ludo gwangu nge kundibenga,
nenguba kwakajalo ndobatembezelela.
Ndizo bakandibokela ndulamo nge mbipo,
bakandibengela ludo gwangu.
Banoti, “Mumbigile nthu mbimbi mbeli kukwe,
nthu unontilika nlandu ngaame ku luji gugwe.
Ha esumikilisiwa, ngaawang'we nlandu,
ntembezelo uwe ngautogwe se tjibi.
Mazhuba awe ngaabe mashomanana,
dzene mmwe angatola mamo awe.
Dzene bana babe bangabe siyang'wa
nenge nkadzi uwe kabe tjilikadzi.
Dzene bana babe bangadzungayila beyenda bekumbila,
dzene bangatakhwa mu matongo abanogala.
Dzene baanokolota bangantapila kose kwaanako,
dzene bathu basingazibgwe bangantolela zwizwalo zwe dukuta lile.
Dzene kungasheta unonhwilangoni,
nenguba ali iye ungahwilangoni siyang'wa dzidze.
Dzene lutshinga gugwe gungalobesiwa,
dzene zina lile lingafidziwa mu tjizekugwana tje bubili.
Dzene matjinyo a tate babe angakumbugwa mbeli kwa Yahwe,
ne tjibi tja mmeyabe tjikasibukushiwe,
ngazwidwilile zwili mbeli kwa Yahwe,
ne kukumbugwa kukwe kulashiwe mu shango.
Ngobe aazotongo kumbula kulakidza ngoni,
koga wakadziyidza bashayi ne basheti
ne be mimoyo yakapaluka kuswikila befa.
Wakabe eda kulonga bhiso, bhiso ngalibe munlibo.
Azobe eda kukombolegwa, makombolelo ngaabe kutjena naye.
Wakazwiambadza bhiso se tjiambalo tjitje,
dzene lingang'wila mu mbili uwe se vula,
se mafuta mu mafupa awe.
Ngalinge tjiambalo tjaanozwipomba nditjo,
se mwandabula waanozwisunga ndiwo zhuba ne zhuba.”
Dzene ikoko kungabe mbayilo we banonditilika nlandu muna Yahwe,
wa ibabo banoleba mbipo nge butjilo gwangu.
Koga imwi, Yahwe She wangu,
mundimile ngekwe zina lenyu,
ngobe ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike gwakalulwama,
mundisunungule.
Ngobe ndi nshayi kakale ndi nsheti,
ne moyo wangu wakabhayika mukati kwangu.
Ndopinda se ntutshi we madekwana,
ndoshashamugwa se phashu.
Zwidwi zwangu zolengezha ngozwinyima zojiwa,
anditjina nyama pa mbili.
Ndatjibe sapa muna ibabo banonditilika nlandu,
ha bendibona, banodzungudza misholo.
Mundibhatshe imwi Yahwe, Ndzimu wangu!
Munditjidze kuyendidzana nge ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike.
Thamani kuti bazibe kuti igogu luboko gwenyu,
imwi Yahwe, makuthama.
Bangabalonga bhiso, koga imwi mowokombolela.
Dzene bagwisi bangu bangabhatisiwa shoni,
nlanda wenyu ngaashathe.
Bagwisi bangu ngabalengudzike,
shoni ngadzibakombole bange basakaambala.
Nge nlomo wangu ndowoyisa mboko hwulu kuna Yahwe,
ndowokudza Yahwe pakati kwe mbunga we bathu.
Ngobe banoma ku luboko gwe luji gwe basheti,
kuti babatjidze muna ibabo bangabalashila mu lufu.
Yahwe bakati kuna she wangu,
“Gala ku luboko gwangu gwe luji
kuswikilila ndithama zwita zwizo tjigalo tje makumbo awo.”
Yahwe banowotambunudza swimbo ye simba lilo,
kudwa mu Ziyoni.
Busa pakati kwe zwita zwizo.
Bathu babo banowozwipa mu zhuba launowotungamila ngwa.
Bakalongoloka nge mbumbiko yakayengemala.
Kudwa mu ntumbu we mangwanana,
bazhuzha babo banowozha ku kuli se khawa.
Yahwe bakatuna ngono abatowoshandula nkumbulo wabo,
“U mpirisiti ngekusingapele ngekwe ndongoloso ya Melikizedeki.”
She baku luboko gugo gwe luji,
unowopkhwanya boshe bakulu mu zhuba le kugwadzamoyo kwabo.
Unowosumikilisa pakati kwe zwitjaba,
ezhadza shango nge zwidumbu,
unowopkhwanya misholo
mu shango yose.
Unowong'wa mu likobana gupa hwunde ne mmwazha,
ndizo unowomilidza nsholo uwe.
Kudzani Yahwe!
Ndowotenda Yahwe nge moyo wangu wose,
mu nshangano we bakatambunuka, ne mu gubungano.
Mishingo ya Yahwe mikulu seni!
Inokumbugwa ndibose banoishathila.
Nshingo wabo i gudzo ne bushe,
ngono ndulamo yabo imile nge kusingapele.
Bakathama kuti mishingo yabo inotjenamisa ikumbugwe,
Yahwe bana ngoni ne lubu.
She banopa ibabo banobatja zojiwa,
banokumbula ngekwe tjidumano tjabo ngekwe kusingapele.
Bakalakidza bathu babo simba le mishingo yabo,
nge kubapa shango dze zwitjaba zwimwe.
Mishingo ye maboko abo inogalikabgwe kakale yakatambunuka,
ndayo dzabo dzose dzogalikabgwe.
Yakathamwa nge kusingapele kose,
yakathamwa nge malebeswa ne nge kutambunuka.
Bakazhisa dzutunulo ku bathu babo,
bakalaula tjidumano tjabo nge kusingapele kose.
Zina labo lakayengemala kakale lotjisa.
Kutja Yahwe ndigo budwilo gwe butjenjedu,
bose banokuthama bana hwisiso yakanaka.
Kudziwa kwa Yahwe kumile nge kusingapele.
Kudzani Yahwe!
Kwakakombolegwa nthu unotja Yahwe,
iye unoshathila milayo yabo.
Zwizekugwana zwizwe zowobe ne simba mu shango,
tjizekugwana tje wakatambunuka tjowokombolegwa.
Bufumi ne fumwa zwimu ng'umba iye,
ne ndulamo iye imile nge kusingapele.
Tjedza tjobhudila bakatambunuka,
balume bana ngoni ne lubu ne ndulamo.
Kwakalulwamila nlume una buthu kakale eadzimana akasununguka,
unothama mishingo iye nge kwakatambunuka.
Ngobe nlulwami atowotshedugwa,
unowokumbugwa nge kusingapele.
Atotja thawu dzakabipa,
moyo uwe wakatilingindi, ugelebgwe muna Yahwe.
Moyo uwe wakadzikama, autotongotja,
kuswikila ebona kuyemula kukwe mu zwita zwizwe.
Wakakoba nge sununguko, wakapa bashayi,
ndulamo iye imile nge kusingapele,
simba lile lowotolegwa pezhugwi ngotetiwa.
Nlume mbi unogubona kagwadzamoyo,
unotafunanya meno awe kanyawuka kapela,
kuyemula kwe mbi akute kuli tjimwe.
Kudzani Yahwe!
Imwi balanda ba Yahwe,
kudzani zina la Yahwe.
Ngakukudziwe zina la Yahwe
kudwila ngwenu kudwilila ne kusingapele.
Kudwa mu kubhuda kwe zhuba kunoti ku kungina kwalo,
zina la Yahwe ngalikudziwe.
Yahwe bapezhugwi kwe zwitjaba zose,
ne gudzo labo lopinda zhuzhugwi.
Apa ndiani unonga Yahwe Ndzimu wedu,
ibo bagele tjigalo tje bushe kudzimu,
banokotamila pasi,
kulinga kudzimu ne shango kene?
Banomilidza bashayi mu hwuluba,
bebuya bemilidza basheti mu tjizhalanlota,
bebagadza ne bakololo be bushe,
ne bakololo be bushe gwe bathu babo.
Banopa nkadzi usina mbeleko nzi,
benthama mme be bana bakashatha.
Kudzani Yahwe!
Kwakati Iziraela edwa mu Egipiti,
ng'umba ya Jakubo idwa mu bathu be lulimi gupoga,
Juda wakabe bugalo gwe Ndzimu gwakayengemala,
Iziraela kabe bushe gwawo.
Gungwa gwakalinga gukatizha,
Jorodani gukashandukila shule.
Matombo akatjuluka se nyondo,
matuthu akatjuluka se pkhwizana.
Ini tjathama kuti utizhe iwe gungwa?
Iwe Jorodani, washandukila shule kene?
Imwi matombo, ini makatjuluka se nyondo,
imwi matuthu ini mutamba se pkhwizana kene?
Tetema, iwe shango, mbeli kwa Yahwe,
mbeli kwe Ndzimu wa Jakubo,
iwo wakashandula shongwe ikabe dziba le vula,
bgwe linopenya likashanduka nsenya we vula.
Kusi kutili, imwi Yahwe, kusi kutili,
koga ku zina lenyu ngakube ne gudzo,
ngentha ye ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike ne kugalikabgwe kwenyu.
Ini zwitjaba zwingati,
“Ndzimu wabo ungayi?”
Ndzimu wedu u kudzimu,
unothama tjaunoda.
Midzimu yabo i siliva ne golide,
zwakathamwa nge maboko e bathu.
Ina milomo koga ayitolebeleka,
ina mesho koga ayitobona.
Ina zebe koga ayitohwa,

Ina maboko ngono ayitohwa tjayabhata,
ina makumbo ngono ayitoyenda,

Ibabo banoithama banonga iyo,
na bose banogalabgwe muili.
Iwe Iziraela, galabgwe muna Yahwe!
Ndibo bhatsho ne tjivikili tjabo.
Iwe ng'umba ya Aroni, galabgwe muna Yahwe,

Imwi banotja Yahwe, galanibgwe muna Yahwe!
Ndibo bhatsho ne tjivikili tjabo.
Yahwe bagala bakatikumbula, banowotikombolela,

Banowokombolela ibabo banotja Yahwe,

Dzene She bangamuwatsha,
mose imwi ne bana benyu.
Dzene mungakombolegwa ndi Yahwe,
ibo bakathama kudzimu ne shango.
Kudzimu ndekwa Yahwe,
koga shango bakaipa bathu.
Bafi abatokudza Yahwe,

Koga ndiswi tinowokudza Yahwe

Kudzani Yahwe.
Ndoda Yahwe, ngobe bakahwa

Ngobe bakanditeedza,

Misungo ye lufu yakabe yakandipomba,

Ndizo ndakadana zina la Yahwe:
“Imwi Yahwe, ndomukumbila, munditjidze!”
Yahwe bana ngoni, kakale bakalulwama
Ndzimu wedu una lubu.
Yahwe banogwila basingatubule
ndakati ndikong'wa, bakanditjidza.
Bgwilila, iwe meya yangu mu kunyaluluka kuko,

Ngobe imwi Yahwe, makadusa meya yangu mu lufu,

Ndoyenda mbeli kwa Yahwe

Ndakadwilila nge kugalamoyo kwangu,

Mu gaabadzo langu ndakati,
“Bathu bose abatogalikabgwe.”
Apa ndowopani Yahwe

Ndowoshingikadza tuna kwangu kuna Yahwe

Lufu gwe balulwami,

Imwi Yahwe, ndi nlanda wenyu,

Makanyebesa misungo yangu.

Ndowoshingikadza tuna kwangu kuna Yahwe

Kudzani Yahwe.
Kudzani Yahwe, imwi zwitjaba zose,

Ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike bukulu mutili,

Kudzani Yahwe!
Isani dendo kuna Yahwe, ngobe bakalulwama,

Iziraela ngaati, “Ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike

Yahwe bamile nami kuti bandibhatshe,

Andingafe, koga ndowotjila,

Yahwe ndibo Ndzimu,

Makabhata thabi, thamani nlongolongo,

Mu Ndzimu wangu, ngono ndowomutenda,

Tendani Yahwe, ngobe bakalulwama,
