ngobe abatolondolodza milayo yenyu.
Bonani sekwandinoda milayo yenyu,
munditjidze kuyendidzana ne ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike.
Matama enyu wose malebeswa,
ndulamo ye ndaulo dzenyu dzose imile nge kusingapele.
Bakololo be bushe banondisumikilisila kusina,
koga moyo wangu unotja matama enyu.
Ndoshathila dama lenyu,
se nthu wawana thundu yatapiwa ku ngwa.
Ndobenga kakale ndoshima manyepkhwa,
koga ndoda nlayo wenyu.
Ndomukudza katendeka nge zhuba,
ngekwe ndaulo dzenyu dzakalulwama.
Banoda nlayo wenyu bana kunyalala kukulu,
akuna tjinobakutha.
Ndakalindila jidzo lenyu, imwi Yahwe,
ngono ndoshingikadza milayo yenyu.
Ndohwa milayo yenyu,
ndoyida kupindisisa.
Ndohwa milayo ne ndaulo dzenyu,
ngobe zila dzangu dzose modziziba.
Imani tjililo tjangu tjiswike kumuli, imwi Yahwe.
Mundipe hwisiso kuyendidzana ne dama lenyu.
Mitembezelo yangu ngaiswike mbeli kwenyu
mundisunungule kuyendidzane ne kugadzabgwe kwenyu.
Nlomo wangu unowomukudza kunjinji,
ngobe mondidiya milayo yenyu.
Lulimi gwangu gowomba ngekwe kugadzabgwe kwenyu,
ngobe milayo yenyu yose yakalulwama.
Luboko gwenyu ngagugale gwakazwilulwamisila
kundibhatsha, ngobe ndolondolodza milayo yenyu.
Ndina nyota ye jidzo lenyu, imwi Yahwe,
ngobe nlayo wenyu i shatho yangu.
Tshene munganditjidza kuti ndizo ndimukudze,
ne ndaulo dzenyu dzindibhatshe.
Ndakamila ndonga pkhwizi yakalashika,
shakani nlanda wenyu,
ngobe anditokangang'wa milayo yenyu.
Mu manikano dzangu ndolilila kuna Yahwe,
kuti bandidabile.
“Munditjidze, imwi Yahwe,
mu milomo inonyepa,
mu lulimi guzhele butjebeli.”
Apa unowopiwani kene?
Apa ini tjaunowothamigwa kupinda kene,
iwe lulimi guzhele butjebeli?
Misebe yakateswa ye babhayani,
ne masimbe anothuta e nti we ntshwayilo!
Yee mme wee! Ndapalala imi nzhi mu Mesheke
ngekuti ndogala mu mishasha ye Keda!
Ndakagala tjibaka tjilefulefu ne bathu
pakati kwa ibabo banobenga kunyalala.
Imi ndoshaka kunyalala,
koga ha ndilebeleka,
ibo banoshaka ngwa.
Ndomilidzila mesho angu ku matombo.
Apa bhatsho yangu inowodwa ngayi?
Bhatsho yangu inodwa kuna Yahwe,
ibo bakathama kudzimu ne shango.
Abatowoletja gumbo lilo likatedzemuka,
ibo wakakutjengeta aatowotshumwayila.
Ngelebeswa, ibo bakatjengeta Iziraela,
abangatshumwayile naiko ku izela dumbu.
Yahwe ndibo ntjengeti uwo,
Yahwe ndibo ntutshi uwo ku luboko gugo gwe luji.
Zhuba alingakuphobole masikati,
kene naiwo mwedzi busiku.
Yahwe banowokutjengeta mu mbipo yose,
banowotjengeta butjilo gugo.
Yahwe banowotjengeta
kubhuda kuko ne swika kuko
kudwa ngwenu kunoti nge kusingapele kose.
Ndakashatha pa bakandidwa beti,
“Ngatiyende ku Ng'umba ya Yahwe!”
Makumbo edu amile
mukati kwe mikoba iyo, iwe Jerusalema.
Jerusalema, wakabakwa se nzi nkulu
umile wakasomana kwakasima.
Njudzi dzoyenda ku uli,
njudzi dza Yahwe,
sekwa kwakalauligwa Iziraela,
kuti aboke zina la Yahwe.
Ngobe ndiko kwakabigwa zwigalo zwe bushe,
zwigalo zwe bushe zwe ng'umba ya Dafite.
Tembezelelani kunyalala kwe Jerusalema:
“Dzene bangabhudilila ibabo banokuda.
Kunyalala ngakube mukati kwe bhakasa lilo,
ne mbakililo mu thungamakole dzidzo.”
Kuthamila zwikamu ne bazwalani bangu.
Ndowoti, “Kunyalala ngakube nawe.”
Kuthamila ng'umba ya Yahwe Ndzimu wedu,
ndotembezelela kubhudilila kuko!
Ndomilidzila mesho angu kumuli,
imwi mugele mu tjigalo tje bushe kudzimu!
Sekwa mesho e balandalume
elinga luboko gwa tetshi wabo,
sekwa mesho e nlandakadzi
elinga luboko gwe nfumakadzi waanoshinga,
naswibo mesho edu anolinga kuna Yahwe Ndzimu wedu,
kuswikila betihwila ngoni.
Mutihwile ngoni, imwi Yahwe, mutihwile ngoni,
ngobe takatukwa kwagala.
Meya yedu izheligwe kupinda tjilizanyo
nge kudadigwa kwa ibabo bagedzikane
ne tukwa kukulu nge banozwikudza.
Ha kwabe kusi Yahwe bakabe bama naswi,
Iziraela ngaalebeleke ngwenu ati,
ha kwabe kusi Yahwe bakabe bama naswi,
patakamukigwa nge bathu,
bangabe bakatimidza titjila,
pabakabe bakatigwadzilamoyo kwazo
tobe takasengwa nge nsundila
vula inobe yakating'wisa nkokhwi.
Vula yakabe yakatifukidza
inobe yakating'wisa nkokhwi.
Ngakukudziwe Yahwe
ibo basakatilonga
mu milomo ye zwibandana.
Takapudzumuka se nyuni
mu dati le bateyi be nyuni,
dati lathubuka,
ngono tikapudzumuka.
Bhatsho yedu imu zina la Yahwe,
bakabumba kudzimu ne shango.
Ibabo banogalabgwe muna Yahwe banonga Dombo le Ziyoni,
lisingake likatshedugwa, koga lakadzikila nge kusingapele kose.
Se matombo akapoteleka Jerusalema,
Yahwe na ibobo bakapoteleka bathu babo,
kudwa sangwenu kunoti nge kusingapele kose.
Swimbo ye bushe gwe mbipo aingagale
mu shango yakapiwa balulwami,
kuti ndizo balulwami basitongo tambunudza
maboko abo kuthama bubi.
Thamilani ndulamo ibabo bakalulwama imwi Yahwe,
nanga ibabo be mimoyo yakatambunuka.
Koga ibabo banoyendila ntome kwe zila dzabo dzakakombama,
Yahwe banobatatila kutjena ne bashingi be mbipo.
Kunyalala ngakubepo mu Iziraela!
Kwakati Yahwe bebuzila bakabe batapkhwa ku Ziyoni,
takanga banowolota.
Tikaseka tikagwadziwa nge mbadu,
ne ndimi dzedu tikapululudza,
ndizo bezwitjaba bakaleba beti,
“Yahwe babathamila zwithu zwikulukulu.”
Yahwe batithamila zwithu zwikulukulu,
ngono toshatha.
Mutibuzile thundu dzedu, imwi Yahwe,
se hwobana dziku Negebu.
Banodzwala nge mishodzi
ngabavune nge mipululu.
Ibo banowobhudila kuzhe belila,
bakasenga mbewu kunodzwala,
banowoshanduka ne mipululu,
bakasenga mathunde abo.
Kuzhe kwekuti Yahwe babake ng'umba,
ibabo banoibaka banoshingila masimba malashe.
Kuzhe kwekuti Yahwe balinde nzi nkulu,
nlindi unolindila suli.
Akuna bhatsho kumuka mangwanana
ngono mube munoyizela pakati kwe busiku,
muja zojiwa nge mang'oni,
ngobe banopa hwope babo babanoda.
Bana lukata gunodwa kuna Yahwe,
ba ntjelo we tjibumbilo.
Bana bakazwagwa mu butjetjana gwe nthu,
banonga misebe imu luboko gwe mbayani.
Kwakakombolegwa nthu una bana banjinji.
Ngobe aatokundiwa
ha enyanyayidzana ne zwita zwizwe mu lubazhe.
Wakakombolegwa mmwe ne mmwe unotja Yahwe,
iye unotobela zila dzabo!
Unowoja ntjelo we dukuta le nshingo we maboko awo,
unowoshatha, kakale kowonlulwamila.
Nkadzi uwo unowonga nzhambi unozwala
mukati kwe nzi uwo
bana babo banowonga thinila kwe thabi dze ntoba,
bakapoteleka tafuli iyo.
Ndiko sekwa kwakunowokombolegwa
nthu unotja Yahwe!
Yahwe banokukombolela bali mu Ziyoni.
Dzene ungabona makombolelo e Jerusalema
mazhuba wose e butjilo gugo.
Dzene ungabona bana be bana babo.
Kunyalala ngakube mu Iziraela!
“Tjinga kwabakandigwisa kudwa mu butjetjana gwangu.”
Iziraela ngaalebeleke ati,
“Tjinga kwabakandigwisa kudwa mu butjetjana gwangu,
nenguba kwakajalo abathu bakandikunda.
Balimi bakandipalula kushule se bulime,
bakathama foro dzabo dzikabe ndefundefu.”
Yahwe bakalulwama,
bakathubula mitjili ye babi.
Dzene bose banobenga Ziyoni
bangabhatisiwa shoni bakashandusigwa shule.
Ngabange bushwa gunomela ku zwilungwani zwe ng'umba,
gunoswaba gusathu gukakula,
gusingazhale tjiazha tje mmwayi
ne basungi abatothama fukatigwa mu maboko abo,
bapindi pabasingake bakalebeleka beti,
“Dothodzo la Yahwe ngalibe mumuli!
Tomutothodza nge zina la Yahwe!”
Ndolilila kumuli ndili mu manikano njinji Yahwe.
She ihwani hwi langu!
Muzhule zebe dzenyu
kuteedza hwi le mitembezelo yangu!
Ha mabe mubiganyidza milandu, Yahwe,
Yahwe, apa ndiyani wabe angapudzumuka kene?
Koga kuna kuzwiibhatigwa mumuli,
kuti ndizo mutjiwe.
Ndolindila Yahwe, meya yangu inolinda,
kakale ndogalabgwe mu dama labo,
Meya yangu yakalindila Yahwe
kupinda ibabo bakalinda yedza kwe zhuba,
kupinda ibabo bakalinda yedza kwe zhuba
Iwe Iziraela, galabgwe muna Yahwe!
Ngobe muna Yahwe kuna ludo gusingazunguzike,
kakale mubali kuna simba gulu linodzutunula.
Ndibo banowodzutunula Iziraela
mu matjinyo abo wose.
Imwi Yahwe, moyo wangu autozwikudza,
mesho angu azokangazhika,
anditozwilonga mu zwithu zwikulukulu
kakale zwinganditjenamisa kwazo.
Koga ndakadzikama kakale ndanyaladza meya yangu,
se mwana apkhwigwa ana mmeyabe,
meya yangu igele mundili se mwana wapkhwigwa.
Iwe Iziraela, galabgwe muna Yahwe,
kudwa ngwenu kunoti nge kusingapele kose.
Imwi Yahwe, kumbulukigwani kuma na Dafite
mu mang'oni wose aakadzikitadzila.
Sekwa akatuna kuna Yahwe kakale
kagadzabgwe Ndzimu Masimbawose wa Jakubo,
“Anditowongina mu ng'umba yangu
kene aizela mu bulalo gwangu,
anditowo tongowanisa mesho angu hwope
kene kuli kutshumwayila,
kudzina ndiwanila Yahwe bugalo,
bugalo gungagagwa ndiwo Ndzimu Masimbawose wa Jakubo.”
Takahwilila ngekwako mu Efurata
tikakuwana mu shango ye Jaa.
“Ngatiyendeni ku bugalo gwawo.
Ngatiunamateni pa tjigalo tje makumbo awo.”
Milikani, imwi Yahwe,
muyende ku bunyatutukilo gwenyu
imwi ne Bhokisi le Tjidumano tje simba lenyu.
Bapirisiti benyu ngabaambadziwe nge ndulamo,
bagalimoyo benyu ngabapululudze.
Ngwekwa Dafite nlanda wenyu
musitongo lamba nzhodziwa wenyu.
Yahwe bakatunila Dafite nge malebeswa
kwabasingake bakakushandukila beti,
“Mmwe we zwizekugwana zwizo,
ndowon'gadza pa tjigalo tjitjo tje bushe.
Ha bakololo babo bangalondolodza tjidumano tjangu
ne milayo yandinowobadiya iyo,
bakololo babo nge kusingapele,
banowogala mu tjigalo tjitjo tje bushe,
nge kusingapele kose.”
Ngobe Yahwe bakashalula Ziyoni,
bakaiyemulila kube bugalo gwabo.
“Ogu ndigo bugalo gwe bunyatutukilo
gwangu nge kusingapele kose,
ndowogala ipapa, ngobe ndakapada.
Ndowopakombolela kwazo nge zojiwa zwapo,
ndowogutsha bashayi bapo nge tjiwunga.
Bapirisiti bapo ndowobaambadza nge jidzo,
ne bagalimoyo bapo banowopululudza.
Ipapo ndowomedza lunyanga gumilile Dafite,
ndakalulwamisila nzhodziwa wangu luvone.
Zwita zwizwe ndowozwimbatisa shoni
koga munli, tjiala tje nsholo uwe tjowongadzima.”
Kubuyanana kakale koshathisa seni!
Ha bana be nthu baligedzane bakabhatana!
Konga mafuta e themba ipezhugwi mu nsholo,
ewunga edelukila ku ndedu,
mu ndedu dza Aroni,
ewunga edelukila mu kheipi dze hazu lile.
Konga khawa ye Heremoni,
inowila mu matombo e Ziyoni.
Ngobe ndipo Yahwe pabakagadzabgwe makombolelo abo
butjilo gusingapele.
Izhani, tikudze Yahwe, imwi mose balanda ba Yahwe,
imwi munoma busiku mu ng'umba ya Yahwe!
Milidzilani maboko enyu pezhugwi ku bugalo gwakayengemala,
ndizo mu kudze Yahwe.
Dzene Yahwe, mbumbi we kudzimu ne shango,
bangamukombolela kudwa mu Ziyoni.
Kudzani Yahwe!
Kudzani zina la Yahwe,
mubakudze, imwi balanda ba Yahwe,
imwi bamile mu ng'umba ya Yahwe,
mu misha ye ng'umba ye Ndzimu wedu.
Kudzani Yahwe, ngobe Yahwe bakalulwama,
mbilani zina labo njimbo dzinobakudza, ngobe bana ngoni.
Ngobe Yahwe bakazwishalulila Jakubo,
iye Iziraela kube fumwa yabo.
Ngobe ndoziba kuti Yahwe bankulukulu,
She wedu upezhugwi kwe midzimu yose.
Tjimwe ne tjimwe Yahwe tjabanoda thama
banotjithama, kudzimu ne mu shango,
mu makungwa ne kusi tjose kwe vula.
Ndibo banothama kuti makole amilidze ku phelelo dze shango,
banothama lipenyo gwe vula
bebe bedusa phepo mu mabiganyilo abo.
Ndibo bakabulaya mbano dze Baegipiti
dzose dze bathu ne dze phuka
bakazhisa zwilakidzo ne matjenamiso
pakati kuko, iwe Egipiti,
muna Faro ne balanda babe bose.
Bakalobesa zwitjaba zwinjinji
bakabulaya boshe bakulu bakasima,
Sihoni, she nkulu we Bamori,
na Ogo, she nkulu we Bhashani,
ne mibuso yose ye Kanana,
bakakoba shango yabo kube lukata
lukata gwe bathu babo Baiziraela.
Zina lenyu, imwi Yahwe, limile nge kusingapele,
tjilumbi tjenyu, imwi Yahwe, tjoswika ku zwizekugwana zose.
Ngobe Yahwe banowogwila bathu babo,
kakale banowohwila ngoni balanda babo.
Midzimu ye zwitjaba i siliva ne golide,
yakathamwa nge bathu nge maboko
Ina milomo koga ayitolebeleka,
ina mesho koga ayitobona,
ina zebe koga ayitohwa,
kakale ayina meya mu milomo yawo.
Ibaba banoyithama
na bose banoigalabgwe
banowonga iyo.
Imwi ng'umba ye Iziraela, kudzani Yahwe!
Imwi ng'umba ya Aroni, kudzani Yahwe!
Imwi ng'umba ya Levi, kudzani Yahwe!
Ngakukudziwe Yahwe mu Ziyoni
ibo bagele mu Jerusalema.
Kudzani Yahwe.
Tendani Yahwe, ngobe bakalulwama,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Tendani Ndzimu we midzimu,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Tendani She wa boshe,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Ndibo boga banothama matjenamiso makulu,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Ibo nge hwisiso yabo bakathama kudzimu,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Ibo bakawala shango pezhugwi kwe vula,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Ibo bakathama mavone makulu,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Bakathama zhuba kuti libuse masikati,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Bakathama mwedzi ne nyenyedzi
kuti zwibuse busiku,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Bakaloba Egipiti ngobulaya mbano dzabo,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Kakale bakadusa Iziraela pakati kwabo,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele,
nge tjiazha tjakasima
ne luboko gwakatambunuka,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Ibo bakathubukanya Gungwa Shaba na pakati,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele,
ngono bakapalamisa Iziraela pakati kwago,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele,
koga kafukidza Faro ne babhayani babe
mu gungwa Shaba,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Ibo bakatungamila bathu babo mu tjilambanyika,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Ibo bakabulaya boshe bakulu,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele,
kakale bakabulaya boshe bakulu bana tjilumbi,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele,
Sihoni she nkulu we Bamori,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele,
na Ogo, she nkulu we Bhashani,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele,
bakakoba shango yabo kube lukata,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele,
lukata ku balanda babo Baiziraela,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Ndibo bakatikumbula
patakabe tikuligwa nge mishingo yedu,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele,
kakale bakatiangula mu zwita zwedu,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Ibo banopa bathu bose zojiwa,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele.
Tendani Ndzimu we kudzimu,
ngobe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike
gumile nge kusingapele!
Pa njizi dze Bhabhiloni,
takagala pasi ngono tikalila
ha tikumbula Ziyoni.
Mu miti inoyi wilo
tikatilika matende edu.
Ngobe batapi bedu
bakati tibambile njimbo,
ne balisi bedu beti tibambile tibashathise,
bakatidwa bakati,
“Mutimbile gumwe gwe njimbo dze Ziyoni!”
Apa tingamba lumbo gwa Yahwe tjini
mu shango ye butaya kene?
Ha ndingakukangang'wa, iwe Jerusalema,
luboko gwangu gwe luji ngagushweshwane!
Lulimi gwangu ngagunamatile bgwasha gwangu,
ha ndisinga mukumbulukigwe,
ha ndisinga tole Jerusalema
ili shatho yangu wulu.
Kumbulani, imwi Yahwe,
ngekwe tjakathamwa ne Baedomu
mu zhuba lakawa Jerusalema
sekwa bakalebeleka beti, “Muwulige! Muwulige!
Kudwa pezhugwi kunoti ku thiwa dzawo!”
Iwe nkololokadzi we Bhabhiloni, iwe mpaladzi!
Bakakombolegwa ibabo banowokubgwilizila
itjetji tjawakatithama!
Bakakombolegwa ibabo banotola ngawana dzidzo
bebe bedzipkhwanyila pa shongwe!
Ndomutenda, imwi Yahwe,
nge moyo wangu wose,
ndomba njimbo dzino mukudza
mbeli kwe badzimu.
Ndokotamisa nsholo ndakalingisana
ne ng'umba yenyu yakayengemala,
ndiboka zina lenyu ngekwe ludo
gwenyu gusingazunguzike
ne galikabgwe kwenyu,
ngobe makamilidza zina lenyu ne dama lenyu
kupinda tjimwe ne tjimwe.
Mu zhuba landakadana, makandidabila,
makandipaphidzila simba le meya.
Boshe bakulu bose be shango
banowomukudza, imwi Yahwe,
ngobe bakahwa matama e nlomo wenyu.
Banowomba ngekwe zila dza Yahwe,
ngobe gudzo la Yahwe ligulu.
Nenguba Yahwe balipezhugwi,
bana hanya ne bapasi
koga banozwikudza,
banobalingila kulekule.
Nenguba ndiyenda pakati kwe manikano,
monditjidza mu bushongola gwe zwita zwangu,
motambunudza luboko gwenyu,
kakale luboko gwenyu gwe luji gonditjidza.
She banowoshingikadza
mazwimisilo abo nge kwangu,
ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike
imwi Yahwe, gumile nge kusingapele.
Musitongolasha nshingo we maboko enyu.
Imwi Yahwe, makandishakisisa mukabuya mukandiziba.
Moziba ha ndigala pasi ne ndimilika,
moziba njalakang'wa dzangu kutji kule kule.
Moshakisisa zila yandinotobela ne pandinolala,
kakale moziba zila dzangu dzose.
Ne dama lisathu likabe mu nlomo wangu,
imwi Yahwe, moliziba nge buzhalo.
Makandipoteleka mbizho dzose,
kakale mobiga luboko gwenyu pezhugwi kwangu.
Luzibo gwenyu gonditjenamisa kwazo,
gupezhugwi kwazo kupinda hwisiso yangu.
Apa ndingayenda ngayi kutizha Meya yenyu kene?
Kene ndingayi kwandingatizhila buso gwenyu?
Ha nditathila pezhugwi, muyapo ikoko,
ha ndithama bulalo gwangu mu gomba le lufu muyapo ikoko.
Ha ndibinduka mangwanana
ndinogala ku phelelo tjose dze gungwa,
na ikokobo luboko gwenyu gowonditungamila,
kakale luboko gwenyu gwe luji gowondibhata.
Ha nditi, “Tjoselele zhalima lowondifukidza,
ne tjedza tjakandipoteleka tjikabe busiku,”
na ilo zhalima alitelili zhalima kumuli,
busiku gopenya se masikati,
ngobe zhalima longa tjedza kumuli.
Ngobe ndimwi makabumba zwimukati kwangu,
makandiluka mundibhatshanya ndili mu tjibumbilo tja mme yangu.
Ndomukudza ngobe ndakabumbgwa nge zila inotjisa kakale inotjenamisa.
Mishingo yenyu inotjenamisa,
woko ndokuziba zubuyanana.
Mbumbiko yangu yakabe isakamusumbikalila,
pandakabe ndibumbiwa pakasumbikala,
ndilukiwa mu ntumbu we shangu.
Mesho enyu akabona lopa langu lisathu likabumbiwa.
Mu lukwalo gwenyu kwakabe kwakakwagwa,
mazhuba wose andakabigigwa,
ngono kusina lawo lathu likabepo.
Njalakang'wa dzenyu dzakalulwama seni, imwi Ndzimu!
Bunji gwadzo gungapani kene!
Ndogwisa kudzibala, dzinji kupinda nsetje,
ndozha ku bupelo, nditjinamwi.
Ha mabe mungabulaya babi, imwi Ndzimu,
ibo bana nyota ye tebula malopa badwe pandili,
ibabo banomugongobola,
kakale bezwikudza beleba bubi nge kwenyu!
Apa anditobenga ibabo banomubenga kene imwi Yahwe?
Apa anditoshima ibabo banomumukila kene?
Ndobabenga nge lubengo gupatjena,
ndobatola bali zwita zwangu.
Mundishakisise, imwi Ndzimu, mubuye muzibe moyo wangu,
mundilike mubuye muzibe njalakang'wa dzangu.
Mubone kene kuna imwe zila mbimbi imu ndili,
ngono munditungamile mu zila nge kusingapele kose.
Mundiangule imwi Yahwe, mu bathu babiibi
mundibakilile muna ibabo banoda ngwa,
ibabo banoalakana zwithu zwibiibi mu mikumbulo yabo
kakale bemusa ngwa zhuba ne zhuba.
Banokuswa ndimi dzabo dzikapitsha se dze nyoka,
mukati kwe milomo yabo kuzhele bushungu gwe zwitumbimilidzo.
Mundibakilile imwi Yahwe mu maboko e babi.
Mundibakilile muna banoda ngwa
bakazwimisila kundidusa mu zila.
Banozwikudza bakandisumbikila bhuzha
kakale bakandiwalila gwanga nge misungo,
bakanditeya nenge pakati kwe zila.
Ndodwa Yahwe nditi, “Mu Ndzimu wangu,
mundihweni Yahwe, mu ntembezelo wangu!”
Imwi Yahwe, She wangu, ntjidzi wangu wakasima,
makafukidza nsholo wangu mu zhuba le ngwa.
Musiletje babi bakashinga njemulo dzabo,
imwi Yahwe, musidwilidze mazwimisilo abo e bubi.
Ibabo bakandipoteleka,
bubi gwabano ndiyemulila
ngagushanduke guwile pezhugwi kwabo!
Masimbe anopisa ngaatebukile pezhugwi kwabo!
Ngabatshindikigwe mukati kwe gomba, basitjafe babhuda!
Nlebi we shaya ngaashaye midzi mu shango,
bubi ngagutjimbidze guvime banoda ngwa gubatshibikile!
Ndoziba kuti Yahwe banomila ndebeleko ye nsheti,
kakale banothamila ndulamo bashayi.
Tjoselele balulwami banowotenda zina lenyu,
bakatambunuka banowotjilila mbeli kwenyu.
Ndodana imwi Yahwe, tjimbidzani muzhe kundili,
teedzani hwi langu ha ndimudana.
Ntembezelo wangu ngaunge motsha unonuhwa zwinozipa mbeli kwenyu
ne kumilidza maboko angu kunge tjibhayilo tje madekwana.
Mubige nlisi pa nlomo wangu, imwi Yahwe,
galani makalisa zhuka kwe nlomo wangu.
Musitongoshandulila moyo wangu ku bubi kene guli gupi,
kwandinganginikana ne mishingo mibi,
ndashanganyila ne bashingi be zwibi
musindiletje aja mizipo yabo.
Imani nlulwami andilobe,
n'galimoyo andikumbuludze.
Mafuta e babi ngaasizhodziwe mu nsholo wangu,
ngobe ntembezelo wangu unogwa misi yose ne mishingo yabo mibi.
Ha batjilongwa mu maboko a ibabo banowobasumikilisa,
ndiko kwabanowoziba kuti matama a Yahwe malebeswa.
Se bgwe linokwamugwa likapkhwanyikila pasi,
ndiko mafupa abo sekwa kwaanowoandamisiwa pa nlomo we gomba le lufu.
Koga mesho angu akalinga kumuli, imwi Ndzimu, She wangu,
ndoshaka dizhilo mumuli, musindiletjedze ndifa.
Mundibakilile mu gwanga gwabakandilukila,
ne mu bhuzha le bashingi be bubi.
Babi ngabawile mu makwanga abo,
imi ndipudzumuke!
Nge hwi langu ndolilila kuna Yahwe
nge hwi langu ndotembezela kuna Yahwe.
Ng'ong'ola kwangu ndokuzhisa mbeli kwabo,
ndoleba kudziyidzika kwangu mbeli kwabo.
Ha ndipela meya,
moziba zila yangu.
Mu zila yandinotobela
bakanditshila bhuzha.
Lingani ku luboko gwangu gwe luji mubone,
akuna iye una hanya nami,
akuna dizhilo landisalila,
akuna una tjimwe nami.
Ndomulilila, imwi Yahwe,
ndoti, “Ndimwi dizhilo langu,
gobe langu mu shango ye batjili.”
Hwililani tjililo tjangu,
ngobe ndopelegwa nge simba.
Mundiangule mu bagwadzisi bangu,
ngobe banondikulila.
Mundiduse mu ng'umba ye busungwa,
kuti ndizo ndiboke zina lenyu.
Balulwami banowondipoteleka,
ngobe mowondithamila ndulamo nge buzhalo.
Ihwani ntembezelo wangu, imwi Yahwe,
munditeedze nge zebe mukugalikabgwe kwenyu,
mundidabile mu ndulamo yenyu.
Musisumikilise nlanda wenyu,
ngobe akuna iye unotjila wakalulwama mbeli kwenyu.
Ngekuti tjita tjakanditobelela,
tjakandibumbuludza mu mavu,
tjikandigadza mu zhalima sa ibabo bakafa ntolo.
Ndabe pejo ngekuzwitoboka,
ndotjilungayila koga.
Ndokumbula mazhuba a ntolo
ndoalakana ngekwe mishingo yenyu.
Kozha mu nkumbulo wangu mishingo ye maboko enyu.
Ndomilidzila maboko angu kumuli,
meya yangu ina nyota nge kwenyu sa pasi pakawoma.
Mundidabile tjinyolotjo imwi Yahwe,
ndopela meya.
Musindisumbikile buso gwenyu,
ndingadwa ndinga ibabo banowila mukati kwe gomba.
Ngandihweni ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike
mu mangwanana, ngobe ndogalabgwe mumuli.
Mundidiye se kwandakafanila yenda,
ngobe ndomilidzila meya yangu kumuli.
Mundiangule mu zwita zwangu, imwi Yahwe,
ndatizhila kumuli dizhilo.
Mundidiye kuthama kuda kwenyu,
ngobe mu Ndzimu wangu.
Meya yenyu yakalulwama inditungamile,
mu zila yakalizalizana.
Ngekwe zina lenyu, imwi Yahwe,
biganyidzani butjilo gwangu.
Mu ndulamo yenyu mu ndiduse mu tshiyilo.
Mu ludo gwenyu gusingazunguzike
lobesani zwita zwangu,
kakale mulobese bose banondigwisa,
ngobe ndi nlanda wenyu.
Ngakukudziwe Yahwe, shongwe yangu,
ibo banodiya maboko angu kugwa,
ne zwinyala zwangu kugwa ngwa,
Shongwe yangu kakale mbakililo yangu,
mbako yangu yakasima kakale ntjidzi wangu,
tjivikili tjangu, mubali ndowana dizhilo,
imwi munothama kuti bathu babe pasi kwangu.
Imwi Yahwe, nthu ini kwamungabe ne hanya naye,
kene nthu we nyama ne lopa ini,
wamungashwa munkumbula kene?
Nthu unonga phepo
mazhuba awe anonga ntutshi unopinda.
Webani zhuzhugwi kwenyu Yahwe,
ngono mudelukile pasi,
kuthani matombo kuti athungayile bhulubusi.
Penyesani lupenyo gubapaladze,
tumidzilani misebe yenyu mubatate.
Tambunudzani luboko gwenyu kudwa pezhugwi,
munditjidze mundiangule mu vula dzina masimba,
mu maboko e bataya,
be milomo inoleba manyepkhwa,
ne maboko abo e luji aana malebeswa.
Ndowomumbila lumbo gutshwa, imwi Ndzimu
ndowomulidzila dende le misungo ili gumi,
Imwi munopa boshe bakulu kukunda.
Imwi munogwila nlanda wenyu Dafite.
Mundigwile mu thumo lisina ngoni,
kakale mundiangule mu maboko e bataya,
be milomo inoleba manyepkhwa,
kakale maboko abo e luji aana malebeswa.
Dzene bakololo bedu mu butjetjana gwabo
banganga miti yakakula kwakapelela.
Bakololokadzi bedu bange phanda dze ndzibo,
dzakatemegwa mbako ye ng'umba ye bushe.
Dzene matula edu angazhala,
azhadziwe nge zwilimwa zwakasiyasiyana,
dzene pkhwizi dzedu dzingazwala dzikabe zwiwulu,
dzikabe makumi e zwiwulu mu mafulo edu,
dzene mangabe angasima kakweba ntolo unolema,
kuti kusitongobe ne ungathukila kene unotapiwa,
ngakusibe ne tjililo tje kuhwa zogwadza mu mikoto yedu!
Kwakashatha ibabo
bathu banokombolegwa kwakajalo.
Kwakashatha bathu banotola
Yahwe bali Ndzimu wabo!
Ndowomukudza, Ndzimu wangu kakale She nkulu wangu,
ngono ndowokudza zina lenyu nge kusingapele kose.
Zhuba ne zhuba ndowomukudza.
Ndowokudza zina lenyu nge kusingapele!
Yahwe bankulukulu kakale bakafanila kudziwa kukulu kwazo,
bukulu gwabo agutolondeka.
Tjizekugwana tjimwe tjowokudza mishingo yenyu kunoti ku tjimwe
ngono banowoleba ngekwe bukulu gwe mishingo yenyu.
Mu bubuya ne bukulu gwe mbuso wenyu,
ngekwe mishingo yenyu inotjenamisa,
akutowondidwa mu moyo.
Bathu banowosumikila ngekwe mishingo yenyu inotjenamisa
ngono ndowoleba ngekwe bukulu gwenyu.
Banowolumbidza ngekwe kuandama kwe bululwami gwenyu,
kakale banombila pezhugwi ngekwe ndulamo yenyu.
Yahwe bana ngoni ne lubu,
abatotjimbidza gwadzamoyo
kakale ludo gwabo nde gusingazunguzike.
Yahwe bakalulwamila bose,
kakale mahwilongoni abo
amuna zose zwabakathama.
Mishingo yenyu yose inowoboka, imwi Yahwe,
kakale bagalimoyo benyu bose banowomukudza.
Banowoleba ngekwe gudzo le bushe gwenyu,
bebuya beleba ngekwe simba lenyu,
kuzibisa bathu bose ngekwe mishingo yenyu mikulu,
ne gudzo le bubuya gwe bushe gwenyu.
Bushe gwenyu bushe gusingapele,
nenge ndaulo yenyu imile kuswikila zwizekugwana zose.
Yahwe banogalikabgwe mu matama abo wose,
kakale bana ngoni mu mishingo yabo yose.
Yahwe banosimisa bose ibabo banowa,
kakale banomisa nge makumbo bose bakatemeka mafupa.
Mesho abose akalinga kumuli,
ngono mobapa zojiwa zwabo nge nsi wakalingisana.
Mofumbatunula tjiazha tjenyu,
mugutsha njemulo dze zose zwinotjila.
Yahwe bakatambunuka mu zila dzabo dzose,
kakale bana moyontjena muna zose zwabakathama.
Yahwe bapejopejo na bose ibabo banobadana,
kuna bose banobadana nge malebeswa.
Banoshingikadza njemulo dza bose ibabo banobatja,
kakale banohwa zwililo zwabo, ngono banobatjidza.
Yahwe banotjengeta bose ibabo banobada,
koga banowolobesa babi bose.
Nlomo wangu unowogala ukudza Yahwe,
ne bathu bose ngabakudze zina
labo lakayengemala nge kusingapele kose.
Kudza Yahwe!
Kudza Yahwe, iwe meya yangu!
Ndowokudza Ndzimu ha nditjatjila,
ndowomba njimbo dzinokudza
Ndzimu wangu butjilo gwangu gose.
Usigalebgwe mu bakololo be bushe,
mu bathu ibo basina bhatsho.
Ha meya yabo ithubukana nabo
banobgwilila mu mavu muna
ilelo zhuba mazwimisilo abo anopela.
Wakakombolegwa iye unowana bhatsho
mu Ndzimu wa Jakubo,
iye unogalabgwe muna Yahwe Ndzimu uwe,
iwo wakathama kudzimu ne shango,
gungwa na zose zwimuzwili,
iwo unogalikabgwe nge kusingapele.
Iwo unolakidza ndulamo muna bakatshambilidziwa,
iwo unopa bana zhala zojiwa.
Yahwe banosunungula basungwa,
Yahwe banopofunula mapofu,
Yahwe banomisa nge makumbo ibabo bakagoba,
Yahwe banoda balulwami.
Yahwe banotjengeta bataya,
banobhatsha siyang'wa ne tjilikadzi,
koga banofubisa zila ye babi.
Yahwe banowobusa nge kusingapele,
Ndzimu uwo, iwe Ziyoni, we zwizekugwana zose.
Kudza Yahwe!
Kudzani Yahwe!
Kwakanaka seni kumba njimbo
dzinokudza Ndzimu wedu,
ngobe una ngoni,
kakale lumbo gunobakudza gobafanila!
Yahwe banobaka Jerusalema,
banokubunganya Baiziraela bakabe batapiwa.
Banopodza be mimoyo yakapaluka,
kakale banosunga mabanga abo.
Banolaula mbalo ye nyenyedzi,
banodzitumila mazina adzo dzose.
She bedu bankulu kwazo,
kakale bana masimba makulu,
hwisiso yabo ayina tjilizanyo.
Yahwe banomilidza banozwiyisa pasi,
Yahwe banoposela babi pasi.
Mbilani Ndzimu nge mboko,
thamilani Ndzimu wedu nlidzo
unozipa nge tjilidzo tje laya!
Yahwe banofukidza zhuzhugwi nge makole,
banonisa vula mu shango,
banomedza bushwa mu matuthu.
Banopa phuka zojiwa zwadzo,
ne majindana e makungubo ha elila.
Nzhazho wabo aute uli mu masimba e mbizi,
kene shatho yabo aite ili mu lubilo gwe nlabuki.
Koga Yahwe banoshathila ibabo banobatja,
muna banogalabgwe ludo gwabo gusingazunguzike.
Kudza Yahwe, iwe Jerusalema!
Kudza Ndzimu uwo, iwe Ziyoni!
Ngobe banosimisa mazhalilo e mikoba iyo,
banokombolela bathu ba mukuli.
Banokupa kunyalala mu migathu iyo,
banokugutsha nge korong mbuyanana.
Banotumilila ndaulo yabo mu shango,
dama labo lolabuka lilibilidza.
Banozhisa kapuku tjinonga wulu,
banoandamisa makaa se nlota.
Banoposela tjivulamabgwe pasi se mamburumburu,
apa ndiani ungamilila butotho gwabanozhisa kene?
Banotuma dama labo, ngono bakazwinyausa,
banothama phepo yabo ikawuwudza,
ne vula dzikawunga!
Banoleba dama labo kuna Jakubo,
milayo yabo ne ndaulo bakazwipa Iziraela.
Akuna tjimwe itjaba tjabakatongothamila sa ikoko,
abatoziba milayo yabo.
Kudzani Yahwe!
Kudzani Ndzimu!
Kudzani Ndzimu muli kudzimu,
mubakudze muli pezhugwi tjose!
Mubakudze, mose batumwa babo
mibunga yabo yose mubakudze!
Mubakudze, imwi zhuba ne mwedzi,
mubakudze, imwi nyenyedzi dzinopenya!
Mubakudze, imwi mazhuzhugwi zhugwi,
namwi vula dzipezhugwi ku makole!
Zose ngazwikudze zina la Yahwe,
ngobe bakadusa ndaulo ngono zwikathamiwa!
Bakazwithama kuti zwibeyapo nge kusingapele kose,
bakabiga milayo igelile tjose.
Kudzani Yahwe muli mu shango,
imwi mazhithu e gungwa ne madziba wose,
Lipenyo gwe vula ne tjivulamabgwe,
kapuku ne makaa,
dutu linohwa ndaulo yabo!
Matombo ne matuthu wose,
miti ye mitjelo ne ye misida!
Phuka dze shango ne zwithuwo zose
ne zwitjili zose ne nyuni dzinowuluka!
Boshe bakulu be shango ne bathu bose,
bakololo be bushe ne babusi bose be shango.
Bazhuzha kose ne baanadi
bathuntana kose ne batjetjana!
Ngabakudze zina la Yahwe,
ngobe ndilo zina loga linokudziwa,
gudzo labo lipezhugwi kwe kudzimu ne shango.
Bakamilidzila bathu babo lunyanga
kulumbidza bagalimoyo babo bose,
bethamila bathu be Iziraela bapejo ne moyo wabo.
Kudzani Yahwe!
Kudzani Yahwe!
Mbilani Yahwe lumbo gutshwa,
kudziwa kwabo kumu gubungano le bagalimoyo.
Iziraela ngaashathile Mbumbi uwe,
bana be Ziyoni ngabashathile She nkulu wabo.
Ngabakudze zina labo ngozana,
mubambile kunozipa mu lidza thamborini ne laya.
Ngobe Yahwe banowana nzhazho mu bathu babo,
banonakisa banozwiyisa pasi ngokunda.
Bagalimoyo ngababakudze mu kukunda kwabo,
ngabambe nge shatho bali mu malalo abo.
Gudzo gulu le Ndzimu ngalibe mu mimoyo yabo
ne makano anotema ntha dzose mu maboko abo,
Kuti babgwilizile be zwitjaba,
ne kuloba bathu shamu,
kusunga boshe bakulu nge mitjili
na botumbale babo ne dziketani,
kuti bashingikadze sumikiliso ngekwe nlayo.
Oku i gudzo mu bagalimoyo babo.
Kudzani Yahwe!
Kudzani Yahwe!
Kudzani Ndzimu mu bugalo
gwawo gwakayengemala,
mu bakudze mu kusima kwabo kukulu!
Muukudzile mishingo yawo mikulu,
Muukudze kuyendidzana ne bukulu gwawo
gusina tjilizanyo!
Muukudze nge n'dumo we lunyanga,
muukudze nge tjilidzo tje fuluti netje dende!
Muukudze nge thamborini nenge kuzana,
muukudze nge zwilidzo zwe misungo ne nyele!
Muukudze nge zwilidzo zwe dzisimbali,
muukudze nge kudzilobanya dzililila pezhugwi!
Zwithu zose zwina meya ngazwikudze Yahwe!
Kudzani Yahwe!
